MAT 19:25 Lino basikwiiya nibakamvwa oobo, bakagambilwa loko, akwaamba kuti, “Ino ngwani ukoonzya kuyofutulwa?”
MAT 19:26 Jesu wakabalanga akwaamba kuti, 'kubantu tachikonzeki, pesi kuli Leza zintu zyoonse zilakonzeka.”
MAT 19:27 Mpawo Pita wakavwiila akwamba kuti “Langa, twasiya zintu zyesu zyoonse twatobela nduwe. Ani mpawo tukajanenzi?”
MAT 19:28 Jesu wakati kuli mbabo, “Ndamwambila kasimpe kuti, muchiindi chiza Mwana a Muntu nayokkala achuno chakwe chabulemu, inywe nimwakanditobela muzokkala azyuno zilikkumi azibili, mukabeteke misyobo ili kkumi ayibili ya Izilayeli.
MAT 19:29 Woonse oyo iwakasiide maanda, babunyiina, bachizi, wisi, banyina niiba myuunda nkambo kazina lyangu uyotambula tuli mbuli mwanda umwi akukona buumi ibutamani.
MAT 19:30 Pesi bataanzi baanji bayoba bakumamanino, abakumamanino bayoba batanzi.
MAT 20:1 “Nkambo bwami bwakujulu buli mbuli mwanimunda wakazwa kuseni loko kuyotamba basikubeleka mumuunda wakwe wamasansa.
MAT 20:2 Nikwakamana kuzuminana abasimulimu kudinali lyomwe abuzuba, wakabatuma kumunda wamasansa wakwe.
MAT 20:3 Alubo wakenda chindi chamahola atatu mpawo wakabona bamwi basimilimu kabayimvwi kabatakwe nchibachita kubusena bwakuuzizya.
MAT 20:4 Kuli mbabo wakati, 'Anywebo, kamuya mumuunda wamasansa alubo ndilakumupa zilikabotu.' Nkako bakayinka kumulimu.
MAT 20:5 Alimwi wakiinka kunze muhola lyamusanu alimwi amuhola lyamusanu aane, akuyochita chikozyenie.
MAT 20:6 Limbi lubo kusika kuhola lyakkumi alimwi wakazwa alimwi wakujana bamwi balimvwi katakwe nchibalikuchita.
MAT 20:7 Wakati kulimbabo, 'nkambonzi nimwimvwi awa kamutakwe nchimulikuchita zuba lyoonse?' “Kulinguwe bakamba kuti, 'nkambo takwe pe watutambila mulimo.' “kulimbabo wakati, ánywebo lubo mwinke mumunda wamasansa.”
MAT 20:8 Lino nilyakaba golezya, mwani muunda wakati kumupati wamulimo, 'Yita basikubeleka alubo ubape bulumbu bwabo, utangune abasyalizi umane akumutaanzi.'
MAT 20:9 Eelyo basimilimo bakanjila ahola lyakkumi alimwi bakeza, awumwi wabo wakatambula dinali.
MAT 20:10 Nibakeza basimulimo batanzi, bakalikuyeya kuti balatambula zyiingi, pesi abalabo bakatambula dinali lyomwe awumwi.
MAT 20:11 Nibakatambula bulumbu bwabo, bakasyoloka atala mwanimunda.
MAT 20:12 Bakati, 'Aba basimulimo basyalizi babeleka biyo hola lyomwe, pesi mwabachitila bvukozyenie andiswe, iswebo nitwaminwa buzuba bonse alubo muzuba lyuumpa obu.'
MAT 20:13 “Pesi mwanimunda wakavwiila umwi wabo wati, 'mwenzuma, takwe chibi nchindamuchitila. Temwazuminene andime na ku dinali lyomwe?
MAT 20:14 Amubweze zyanu mwende enzila yanu. Ndasala kupa basimulimo basyalizi zikozyenie azyenu.
MAT 20:15 Tazili mumulawu na kuchita mbuli m bwenjanda achintu changu? Wabasibbivwe na nkambo ndimwabi?'
MAT 20:16 Nkinkako musyalizi uyoba mutanzi, amutaanzi uyoba musyalizi.” Malembe aansiku mabotu takwe banji bayitidwe, pesi basalidwe mbache.
MAT 20:17 Lino Jesu nakalikuya ku Jelusalema, wakabweza abalikkumi ababili kumbali, alubo munzila wakati kulimbabo,
MAT 20:18 “Amubone, tuyobuya ku Jelusalema, alubo Mwana Muntu nkwayowabwa mumaboko abapayizi bapati abalembi basimulawu. Bayomutama kusikila kulufu
MAT 20:19 alubo bayomutola kuli bamasi kuti bamuniake, akumuuma, akuyomubambula. Pesi mubuzuba bwatatu uyobusigwa.”
MAT 20:20 Mpawo banyina babana balombe ba Zebbediya bakaza kuli Jesu abana babo. Wakafugama aansi kunembo lyakwe alubo wakakumbila chimwi chintu kulinguwe.
MAT 20:21 Jesu wakati kulinguwe, “Niinzi ncholombozya?” wakati kulinguwe, “Layila bana bangu aba kuti bakkale, umwi kululyo umwi kulumwensi lwaluboko, mubwami bwako.”
MAT 20:22 Pesi Jesi wakasandula wati, “Tochizi nchokumbila. Ulakonzyana kunywa mukanywido nkindaamba kunywa?” Kulinguwe bakamba kuti, “Tulakonzya.”
MAT 20:23 Wakamba kuti kulimbabo, “Kanywido kangu mulakonzya kunywa. Pesi kukkala kululyo lwangu akuchimweensi tendime uupa pe, pesi nzizyabaabo bakabambilwa a Taata.”
MAT 20:24 Elyo basikwiya bamwi balikkumi nibakachimvwa echi bakanyema kapati abaaba babunyina babili.
MAT 20:25 Pesi Jesu wakabita kulinguwe akwamba kuti, “mulizi kuti bendelezi babamaasi balabendelezya, abalabo bapati baabo babulemu bezyanisya nguzu zyabo alimbabo.
MAT 20:26 Pesi tazyelede kuti kube anzila eyo akati kenu. Anukuti, kufumbwa ulomboozya kuba mupati akati kenu abe mulanda wenu,
MAT 20:27 alubo kufumbwa ulombozya kuba mutanzi akati kenu welede kuba mulanda wenu,
MAT 20:28 mbuli Mwana Muntu mbatakazidide kukutawukilwa, pesi kukutawuka, akupa buumi bwakwe mbuli muulo wabingi.”
MAT 20:29 Nibakazwa ku Jelikko, inkamu mpati yakamutobela.
MAT 20:30 Kwakali balumi babili boofu bakakkede kumbali lyamugwagwa. Elyo nibakamvwa kuti Jesu walikwiinda, bakompolola, “Mwami, Mwana Davida, ba aluzyalo andiswe.”
MAT 20:31 Mbungano yakaba kalalila, bababuzya kuti bawumune, pesi bakakwila chakwindilila, “Mwami, Mwana Davida, ba luzyalo kulindiswe.”
MAT 20:32 Mpawo Jesu wakayima alubo wakita kulimbabo wati, “ninzi nchimulombozya kuti ndimuchitile?”
MAT 20:33 Bakaamba kuti kulinguwe, “Mwami, kuti meso esu ajulike.”
MAT 20:34 Mpawo Jesu, kali wasungilizigwa aluzyalo, wakabaguma meso aabo, mpoonya awo bakatambula kubona akumutobela.
MAT 21:1 Awo Jesu abasikwiya bakwe nibakasika ku Jelusalema alubo bakakusika ku Bbetipegi, kukalundu ka Olivusi, mpawo Jesu wakatuma basikwiya bakwe bobile,
MAT 21:2 wakati kuli mbao, “Kamuya kumunzi ulikunembo, alimwi muyofwambana kubona donki lyangidwe nkuko, alubo akana kelyo. Mwawangunune mwalete kulindime.
MAT 21:3 Kuti kwaba utabe achakwamba atala angawo, mukambe kuti, 'Mwami ulayanda,'alimwi oyo muntu uyofwambana kumupa ngawo.
MAT 21:4 'Lino kwakaba kuti ezyo zyakali zyambwa kwinda kumusinsimi zizuzikizigwe. Wakati,
MAT 21:5 “Ambila mwana musimbi we Zioni, 'Langa, Mwami wanu ulaza kulindinywe, Ulibombede alimwi ulitantide a donki, Akukana ka donki, mwana we donki.”
MAT 21:6 Mpawo basikwiya bakinka bakuchita mbunya Jesu mbwakabalayililide.
MAT 21:7 Bakakuleta donki akana alubo bakabika zikobela zyabo a donki, alimwi Jesu Jesu wakakkala ajulu azikobela.
MAT 21:8 Makamumakamu manji akayala zikobela zyabo mumugwagwa, alimwi bamwi bakagonka ntabi zyamisamu akuyobuyala mumugwagwa.
MAT 21:9 Mpawo makamu akenda kunembo lya Jesu alubo abaabo bakali kuyobutobela kabayobompolola, “Hosana kumwana wa Davida!” Ulongezezegwe ngoyo uuza muzina lya Mwami! Hosana kuli simajulu!”
MAT 21:10 Elyo Jesu nakasika ku Jelusalema, idolopo lyoonse lyakali lyanyonganisigwa akwamba kuti, “Ngwani oyu?”
MAT 21:11 Makamumakamu akasandula, “Oyu ngu Jesu musinsimi uzwa waku Nazaleta mu Galili.”
MAT 21:12 Mpwo Jesu wakanjila mungánda ya Leza. Wakaandilanze boonse abo bakali kuula akuuzya mungánda ya Leza, alubo wakasandamuna matafula abasikuzizya mali alubo azikkalo zyababo bakali kuzya nziba.
MAT 21:13 Wakati kulimbabo, “Kulilembedwe, 'Ngánda yangu iyowambwa kuti ngánda yakukambya; pesi mwayichita kuti ibe chikkalilo chababb.”
MAT 21:14 Mpawo mofu achilima bakeza kulinguwe mungánda ya Leza, alubo wakabaponya.
MAT 21:15 Pesi elyo bapayiza bapati alubo abalembi bamulawu nibakabona zintu nzyakachita, alubo elyo nibakamvwa bana balompolola mungánda yaLeza alubo balamba, “Hosana kumwana a Davida, “bakaba akunyema kupati.
MAT 21:16 Bakati kulinguwe, “Ulibamvwide na kuti balikutyeni Jesu wakati kulimbabo, “Iyii! Pesi takwe nimwakabalide, 'kuzwa kumilomo yabana banini atunyonka wakabamba intembawuzyo'?”
MAT 21:17 Mpawo Jesu wakabasiya alubo akuzwa mudolopo lya Bbetani akumana busiku nkuko.
MAT 21:18 Lino kuseni wakayinka nakali kujokela kudolopo, wakali waba anzala.
MAT 21:19 Nakabona mukuyu munsi lyamugwagwa, wakayinka kulinguwo akujana kakutakwe chintu kuli nguwo kunze kwamatu. Wakaamba kuti kulinguwo, “Kutakabi kuti kukabe michelo lubo kuzwa kulinduwe alimbi,” alubo mponya awo mukuyu wakapusama.
MAT 21:20 Elyo basikwiya nibakawubona, bakagamba akwamba bati, “Ibiyeni mukuyu wapusama mpawonyaawa?”
MAT 21:21 Jesu wakasandula akwamba kulimbabo, “Masimpe ndamba kulindinywe, na mulijisi lusyomo alubo kamutadoneki, tamukwe nimuyochita zyakachitwa amukuyu biyo pe, pesi muyowamba nikuba kuchilundu echi, 'Zyukuka akuwalwa mulwizi; alubo ziyochitika.
MAT 21:22 Kufumbwa nchimuyolomba munkombyo, chakuzumina, muyozitambula.”
MAT 21:23 Elyo Jesu nakasika mungánda yaLeza. Bapayizi bapati antomwe abapati babantu bakasika kulinguwe kali mukuyisya basikuti, “Anguzu nzi nzyochitya zintu ezi, alubo ngwani wakakupa nguzu ezi?”
MAT 21:24 Jesu wakasandula akwamba kulimbabo, “Ambebo ndilamubuzya mubuzyo umwi. Na mwandambila, ndiyomwambila kuti nkunguzunzi nzindichitya ezi.
MAT 21:25 Lubbabbatizyo lwaJoni - nkukuli nkulwakazwa? Lwakazwa kujulu na kuti nkubantu?” Bakambuzyania akati kabo, bakati,
MAT 21:26 “Na tutedi, Luzwa kujulu,' Ulamba kuti kulindiswe, 'Nkambonzi mpo nimwakatamusyoma?'Pesi na tutedi nkubantu,'tuyowa nkamu yabantu nkambo boonse babona Joni mbuli musinsimi.”
MAT 21:27 Mpawo bakasandula Jesu alubo bati, “Tatuzi pe.” Wakamba alimwi kulimbabo, “Nsikwe nensikamwambile ambebo kuti ninguzunzi nzindichitya azyozintu ezi.
MAT 21:28 Pesi muyeyaanzi mwalumi wakali abana balombe babili. Wakaya kumutanzi alubo wakati, “mwanangu, koya ukabeleke sunu mumunda wamasansa.
MAT 21:29 “Mwana wakasandula wati, “Tandiinki, pesi mukuya kwachiindi wakasandula mizezo yakwe wakinka.
MAT 21:30 Mpawo mwalumi wakaya kumwana wachibili akwamba chintu chikozyenie. Wakasandula wati, 'Ndilayinka, 'Ta; pesi takwe nakinka pe.
MAT 21:31 Nguuli mubana babili aba wakachita kuyanda kwawisi?” Bakati, “Mutanzi.” Jesu wakati kulimbabo, “Masimpe ndaamba kulindinywe, basimutelo abasimamambe bayonjila mubwami bwa Leza kamutana kunjila.
MAT 21:32 Nkambo Joni wakeza kulindinywe minzila yabululami, pesitemwakamusyoma pe. Pesi basimutelo abasimamambe bakamusyoma. Pesi nywebo, nikuba elyo mwakazibona ezi, temwakeempwa mukuya kwachindi alubo temwakamusyoma.
MAT 21:33 “Amuswilile kuli ambi mambilambali. Kwakali umwi mwalumi, mukamwini munda wakabyala masansa, wakayaka lubaya alinguwo; wasikusya chikandilo mukati kawo, wayaka ngánda yamujulu, alubo wakayiboleka kuli basikulima masansa. Mpawo wakaya kulichimwi chisi
MAT 21:34 Elyo chiindi chakutebulwa kwamasansa nichakasika, wakatuma bamwi babelesi kuli basikulimina masansa kuti bakabweze michelo yakwe.
MAT 21:35 Pesi basikulimina masansa bakabweza babelesi bakwe bawuma umwi, bajaya awumwi, alubo bamutulula mabwe.
MAT 21:36 Alubo, mwanimunda wakatuma bambi babelesi bayingi kwinda batanzi, pesi basikulimina masansa bakabajata zikozyenie.
MAT 21:37 Kwiinda awo, mwanimunda wakazotuma mwanakwe kulimbabo, kuti, 'Bayo mulemeka mwanangu.
MAT 21:38 “Pesi elyo balimi bamasansa nibakabona mwana, bakati akati kabo, 'Ngoyu sikukona. Mubole, muleke tumujaye akubweza lukono.
MAT 21:39 'Nkinkako bakamubweza, bamusowela kunze amuunda akumujaya.
MAT 21:40 Lino elyo mwanimunda asika, ninzi nchayochita abo balimi bamasansa?”
MAT 21:41 Bakati kulinguwe, “Uyonyonyona abo baalumi babuyo muli imwi nzila njumu, alubo uyobatandila aanze amuunda akubika bambi basikulimina masansa, bantu bayomupa chabilo chazilimwa kuchiindi chakuyebula.”
MAT 21:42 Jesu wakati kulimbabo, “Sena temwakabala mumalembe, Íbbwe bayaki ndibakakaka lyakachitwa munsemo. Echi chakazwa ku Mwami, alubo zilagambya mumeso esu'?
MAT 21:43 Nkinkako ndamba kuti kulindinywe, bwami bwa Leza buyobwezwa kuzwa kulindinywe akuyopegwa kuchisi chiyopanga michelo yacho.
MAT 21:44 Kufumbwa uwida atala abbwe eli ulakutyoka kuba tumpanzi, pesi umwi ngulitawide atala ulakupwasuka.”
MAT 21:45 Elyo bapayizi bapati aba Falisi nibakamvwa mambilambali akwe, bakamvwisisisya kuti wakalikwamba ataala ambabo.
MAT 21:46 Bakayandula kumwanga, pesi bakayoowa makamu abantu, nkambo bantu bakali mujisi mbuli musinsiimi.
MAT 22:1 Jesu wakambula lubo kulimbabo mumambila mbali wakati,
MAT 22:2 “Bwami bwakujulu buli mbuli umwi mwami wakabambila ipobwe lyakukwatana lyamwanakwe.
MAT 22:3 Wakatuma babelesi bakwe kuyoyita abo bakatambidwe kuti baze kupobwe pesi tebakasika.
MAT 22:4 Alimwi mwami wakatuma bambi babelesi, kuti, bambile aabo batambidwe, “Mulange, ndabambilila chisusulo chabasune bangu angómbe zyangu zinenede zyajayigwa, alubo zintu zyoonse zyabizwa. Muze kupobwe lyalukwatano.”
MAT 22:5 Pesi tebakaswilila pe alimwi bakainka, umwu kumunda wakwe mupati, awumwi kumakwebo akwe.
MAT 22:6 Bamwi bakajata babelesi ba Mwami, bakabajata enzila ifwisya nsoni, akubajaya.
MAT 22:7 Mwami wakanyema, akutuma basilumamba bakwe akuyonyonyona aabo bajayi akubawumpila dolopo lyabo.
MAT 22:8 Mpawo wakati kubabelesi bakwe, kuswanizigwa kwazulila, pesi abo bakatambidwe tebakali kwelela.
MAT 22:9 Aboobo kamuya mumanzanino anzila akuyotamba bantu banji kupobwe lyakukwatana mbuli mbimutajane.'
MAT 22:10 Babelesi bakayinka enzila akubunganya antomwe bantu boonse mbibakajana, bonse babi ababotu. Nkinkako ngánda yepobwe lyakukwatana yakazozula abantu.
MAT 22:11 Pesi Mwami nakasika mukati kuzolanga batambidwe, wakabona kakuli mwalumi wakatazwete zizwato zyapobwe lyalukwatano.
MAT 22:12 Mwami wakati kulinguwe, Mwenzuma, wanjila byeni omuno kotasamide zizwato zyapobwe lyalukwatano?'Pesi mwalumi wakabula alyakwamba.
MAT 22:13 Mpawo mwami wakati kubabelesi, 'mumwange mwalumi oyu kumaboko akumawulu, alubo mumusowele aanze mumudima, oko kunoli kulila akuluma ntwino.'
MAT 22:14 Nkambo mbingi bantu batambidwe, pesi mbache biyo basalidwe.”
MAT 22:15 Mpawo baFalisi bakinka akuyobamba mbubatamuche Jesu kuzwa kungambwido yakwe.
MAT 22:16 Mpawo bakatuma kulinguwe basikwiya babo, antomwe abaka Helodiya. Bakati kuli Jesu, 'Ómuyisyi, tulizi kuti uli wakasimpe, alubo kuti uyiisya nzila yaLeza mubwini. Tomvwi miyeyo yawumwi pe alubo totondezya kusiyanisya pe akati kabantu.
MAT 22:17 Mpo kotwambila, uyeyanzi? Zili mumulawu na kubbadala mutelo kuli Siza na pe?”
MAT 22:18 Pesi Jesu wakamvwisisisya bubi bwabo wakati, “Nkambonzi nimundisunka, nywebo nobasikuupawupa?
MAT 22:19 Munditondezye mali yabbwe yamutelo.” Mpawo bakamwetela dinali kulinguwe.
MAT 22:20 Jesu wakati k ulimbabo, “Ngwani ulachechi chikozyanisyo e zina?”
MAT 22:21 Bakasandula kuti, “nzizya Siza.” Mpawo Jesu wakati kulimbabo, “alimwi amupe Siza zintu zya Siza, alubo kuli Leza zintu zya Leza.”
MAT 22:22 Elyo nibakazimvwa, bakagamba. Mpawo bakamusiya akwenda.
MAT 22:23 Mubuzuba oobo bamwi ba Sadusi, abo baamba kuti takwepe bubuke bwabafu, bakeza kulinguwe. Bakamubuzya,
MAT 22:24 kabati, 'Muyisyi, Mozesi wakatedi, “Na mwalumi wafwa, kataside bana, mukulana wakwe welede kukwata banakwe akumujanina bana mukulana wakwe.
MAT 22:25 Kwakali bakulana bali musanu ababili. Mutanzi wakakwata mpawo wakafwa katasiide bana, wakasiya mwanakazi wakwe kumwanike wakwe.
MAT 22:26 Alimwi alakwe mwanike wachibili wakachita chintu chikozyania, mpawo awatatu, mulongo woonse kusikila kuli wamusanu ababili.
MAT 22:27 Kwinda kwabo boonse, mwanakazi wakazofwa.
MAT 22:28 Lino kububuke bwabafu, ngwani utakabe mwani mwanakazi mubakulana bali musanu ababili? Nkambo boonse bakali mukwete.”
MAT 22:29 Pesi Jesu wakbasandula akuti kulimbabo, “Nywebo muliswekede, nkambo tamuzi malembe naa inguzu zya Leza.
MAT 22:30 Nkambo mububuke bwabo takwe nekuba kukwata nikuba kukwatisigwa. Anukuti, bayoba mbuli baangelo bali kujulu.
MAT 22:31 Pesi atala abubuke bwabafu, temwakabala na zyakaambwa kulindinywe a Leza, kuti
MAT 22:32 Ndime Leza wa Abbulahamu, Leza wa Ayizeki, alimwi Leza wa Jakobo'? Leza teensi Leza wabafwide, pesi waba pona.”
MAT 22:33 Eelyo makamu nakamvwa eezi, bakagamba kunjiisyo zyakwe.
MAT 22:34 Pesi ba Falisi nibakamvwa kuti Jesu wakawumuzya ba Saduki, bakalibungania lwabo beni antomwe.
MAT 22:35 Umwi wabo, uyiide zyamulawu, wakamubuzya mubuzyo, kumusunka -
MAT 22:36 “Muyiisi, nguuli mulayizyo mupati mumulawu?”
MAT 22:37 Jesu wakati kulinguwe “Yanda Mwami Leza wako a moyo woonse, alubo amiyeyo yako yoonse.'
MAT 22:38 Oyu ngomulazyo mupati alubo ngomutanzi.
MAT 22:39 Alimwi awabili mulayizyo ulimbuli oyu - Ýanda mwenzinyokwe mbuli mboliyanda lwako.'
MAT 22:40 Amilawu eyi ibili mpokuzulila mulawu woonse abasinsimi.”
MAT 22:41 Lino ba Falisi nibakachibungene antomwe, Jesu wakababuzya mubuzyo.
MAT 22:42 Wakati, “muyeeyanzi aatala a Kkilisito? Mwana wani?” Bakamusandula, “mwana wa Devidi.”
MAT 22:43 Jesu wakati kulimbabo, “Biyeni mpo Devidi mumuuya ulamwiita kuti Mwami, kaamba,
MAT 22:44 'Mwami wakati ku Mwami wangu. “Kkala kuluboko lwangu lwachilisyo, kusikila ndayita basinkonyokwe chikkalilo chamawulu ako”?
MAT 22:45 Kuti Devidi wakiita Kkilisito kuti 'Mwami,' nkambonzi nali mwana wa Devidi?”
MAT 22:46 Takwe wakakonzya kumusandula jwilyomwe, alubo takukwe wakachili kuyanda kumubuzya imbi mibuzyo kuzwa elyo zuba.
MAT 23:1 Mpawo Jesu wakambuula kubbunga lyabantu alimwi akuli basikwiiya bakwe.
MAT 23:2 Wakati, “Balembi aba Falisi bakkala muchuno cha Mozesi.
MAT 23:3 Nkiinkako kufumbwa nchibamulayilila kuchita amuchite nzizyo akuzibeleka. Pesi mutakatobelezyi inchito zyabo pe, nkambo baambula zintu nzibatachiti pe.
MAT 23:4 Iyii, balabamba mitolo miyumu kukwinyampula, alimwi balabikkala amakkuko aabantu. Pesi bo lwabo tabanyampuli pe kanwe kabo kuti banyampule.
MAT 23:5 Balachita zyoonse nzibachita kuti babonwe abantu. Balalichitila zipati alimwi balakomezya myoombe yezibaki zyabo.
MAT 23:6 Bayanda zyuuno zyabapati kumapobwe alimwi azyuuno ezyuuno zyabapati muzikombelo,
MAT 23:7 alimwi bayanda injuzyo zilikabotu muzisambalilo, alimwi akwiitwa kuti 'Mwami'abantu.
MAT 23:8 Pesi inywebo tamwelede pe kwitwa kuti 'Mwami' nkambo mulijisi umwi alimwi nywebo moonse mulibabunyina.
MAT 23:9 Alimwi mutayiti muntu anyika ansi aano kuti Taata, nkambo mulawe omwe Taata, alimwi ulikujulu.
MAT 23:10 Nikuba kuti ngamulategwa muyiisi, nkambo mulijisi muyisi umwi luzutu, Kkilisitu.
MAT 23:11 Pesi oyo mupati akati kenu uyoba mulanda wenu.
MAT 23:12 Nikuba nabaani ulisumpula uyofwinsigwa, alimwi nikubaani ulifwinsya uyosumpulwa.
MAT 23:13 Pesi maawe kuli ndinywe, nobalembi alimwi abaFalisi, nobasikuupawupa! mulajala abwami bwakujulu kubantu.
MAT 23:14 Nkambo tamunjili pe nywebo, alimwi tamukwe nimubazumizya aabo abayanda kunjila kuti banjile.
MAT 23:15 Maawe kulindinywe, nobalembi alimwi nobaFalisi, basikuupawupa! nkaambo muulya zintu zili mumaanda abamukabafu kamukomba nkombyo ndamfu. Muyotambula mulandu mupati. Maawe kulindinywe, nobalembi alimwi nobaFalisi, basikuupawupa! Nkambo mulayinka akulwizi alimwi akunyika kuti mukasandule muntu umwi, alimwi na waba oyo umwi, ngamwamuchita tubili kuba mwana wegehena mbuli ndinywe.
MAT 23:16 “Maawe kuli ndinywe, nobeenzyi baboofu, inywe nimuti, “Ooyo ukonka antempele takwe pe. Pesi ooyo ukonka angolida zyantempeli, ulangidwe kuchizuminano chakwe.
MAT 23:17 Inywe noboofu bafubafuba! Niinzi chipati, ingolida nikuba ntempeli eyo ichita ngolida kuti isalale?
MAT 23:18 Alimwi, óyo ukonka kuchipayililo, takukwepe. Pesi ooyo ukonka echo chili achipayililo, ulaangidwe kuchizuminano chakwe.
MAT 23:19 Inywe nobantu boofu, Niinzi chipati, ichipo nikuba chipayililo eecho chichita kuti ichipo chisalale?
MAT 23:20 Eelyo, ooyo ukonka kuchipayililo ukonka nchiicho alimwi azyoonse ezyo zili alinchicho.
MAT 23:21 Ooyo ukonka kuntempeli ukonka njiiyo alimwi ayooyo ukkala mukati.
MAT 23:22 Alimwi ayooyo ukonka akujulu ukonka achuuno chabulemu bwa Leza alimwi ayooyo ukkala alinchiicho.
MAT 23:23 Maawe kulindinywe nobalembi alimwi anoba Falisi basikuupawupa! Nkambo mulapayizya chakumi chazisyu zyachinsyungwa abbonko akanyansya, pesi mwasiya akutachita zintu zipati ezyo zyaamba mulawu- bwendelezi bubotu alimwi aluzyalo mpawo alusyomo. Pesi eezi mwalelede kuti naka mwazichita alimwi akutasiya nikuba chimwi chanzizyo.
MAT 23:24 Inywebo nobasikwenzya boofu, mulatingwa akawuka pesi mumena inkamela!
MAT 23:25 Maawe kulindinywe, nobalembi alimwi aba Falisi, basikuupawupa! Nkaambo musanzya inkomeki kunze kwayo mpawo andyido, pesi muzili mukati zilizwide kutangala akutayendelezegwa kabotu.
MAT 23:26 Inywe noba Falisi boofu! Musanzye muzili mukati nkomeki sansina amukati kandyido, kuchitila kuti kunze kusambe akulako.
MAT 23:27 Maawe kulindinywe, nobalembi aba Falisi basikuupawupa! Nkaambo mulimbuli tubanda tulambidwe amilambo ituuba, eezyo zilangiika kubota anze, pesi mukati zizwide mafuwa abantu bakafwa alimwi azyoonse zyamudima.
MAT 23:28 Munzila njiyeeyo, anywebo aanze kwanu muli mbuli bantu baluleme kubantu, pesi mukati mulizwide kuupawupa ameso alimwi abubi.
MAT 23:29 Maawe kulindinywe, nobalembi aba Falisi, basikuupawupa! Nkaambo mulayaka tubanda twabasinsiimi alimwi akubotezya tubanda twabaluleme.
MAT 23:30 Mwamba kuti, “Kwanoli twakaliko mumazuba abamataata, nikuli tetwakabape mulibaabo bakatila bulowa bwabasinsiimi.'
MAT 23:31 Nkinkaako mulalyaamba nobeeni kuti muli bana babaabo bakajaya basinsiimi.
MAT 23:32 Alimwi mwazuzikizya bulemu bwabamawuso.
MAT 23:33 Inywe nobazooka, inywe nobana bachipile, muyokuchija biyeni kubetekwa kwagehena?
MAT 23:34 Nkambo kako, amubone, ndamutumina basinsimi abalumi basongo alimwi abalembi. Bamwi babo muyobajaya akubagankamina, alimwi bamwi muyobakwipawula muzikombelo zyenu alimwi muyobatanda kuzwa kumunzi akumunzi.
MAT 23:35 Impindu njakuti andinywe kuyozwa bulowa boonse bwabataluleme oobo bwakatika enyika, kuzwa kubulowa bwa Abbelu mululami, domane kubulowa bwa Zakkaliya mwana wa Bbelekkiya, ooyo ngumwakajaya akati kantempeli achipayililo.
MAT 23:36 Kasimpe ndamwambila, zintu eezi zyoonse ziyozida aabo bapona sunu
MAT 23:37 “Jelusalema, Jelusalema, inywe nimujaya basinsiimi alimwi akudonkola aabo batumwa kuli nduuwe! Ndakaliswini kuyanda kubunganya bana bako antoomwe, mbuli inkuku mbifukatila twana twayo munsi lyamababa ayo, pesi tewakazumina pe!
MAT 23:38 Amubone, ngánda yenu yachaala kulindinywe yaba mbulitongo.
MAT 23:39 Alimwi ndamwambila, tamuchizondiboni pe kuzwa lino dokusikila mukaambe kuti, uulachoolwe ooyo uuza muzina lya Mwami.”
MAT 24:1 Jesu wakazwa aanze achikombelo weenda. Basikwiiya bakwe bakeza kulinguwe kuzomutondezya mayake achikombelo.
MAT 24:2 Pesi wakabasandula wati kulimbabo, “Tamuzibwene pe zintu eezi zyoonse? Nkasimpe ndamwambila, takukwe ibbwe liyochala atala alimwi litakwe kuyobwalwa aansi.”
MAT 24:3 Nakachikkede atala lyechilundu cha Olivusi, basikwiiya bakamusikila kumbali bati, “twambile, ndilili nikuyochitika zintu eezi? Ninzi chiyoba chitondezyo chakuboola kwaako alimwi amamanino anyika?”
MAT 24:4 Jesu wakabasandula wati kulimbabo, “Amuchenjele kuti kutabi umwi umusowa.
MAT 24:5 Nkaambo kuyozwa bayingi muzina lyangu. Bayowaamba kuti, 'ndindime Kkilisito, álimwi bayosowa bantu bayingi.
MAT 24:6 'Muyomvwa nkondo azyaambo zyankondo. Amukalange kuti zitakamukatazyi pe, alimwi eezi zintu zyeelede zichitike; pesi mamanino katanakuba pe.
MAT 24:7 Nkambo inyika iyobukila nyikanyina, alimwi bwami abwaminyina. Kuyoba nzala alimwi amuzuzumina wenyika mumabazu asiyene siyene.
MAT 24:8 Pesi zintu ezi zyoonse matangunino biyo amachise amuntu sikutumbuka.
MAT 24:9 Elyo bayomutola kukwezegwa akuyomujaya. Muyosulwa enyika zyoonse akambo kezina lyangu.
MAT 24:10 Eelyo bantu bayingi bayobukilwa, alimwi akwaba umwi awumwi akusulana umwi awumwi.
MAT 24:11 Basinsiimi bayingi babeji bayoza akuzosowa bayingi.
MAT 24:12 Nkambo bupapi buyovula, luyando lwabayiongi luyotontola.
MAT 24:13 Pesi oyo uyokakatila kusikila kumamanino uyofutulwa.
MAT 24:14 Ayamakani mabotu abwami ayokawukwa munyika yoonse mbuli bukamboni kumanyika oonse. Eelyo mamanino ayosika.
MAT 24:15 “Lino, nimuzobona chisesemyo chisisidwe, chaakambwa a Daniyele musinsiimi, kayiimvwi mubusena busalala” ( ooyo ubala amvwisisisye).
MAT 24:16 Amuchite kuti aabo balimuJudiya bachijile kuzilundu,
MAT 24:17 ooyo uli achiluli changanda ataseluki aansi kuzobweza nikuba chimwi chintu chilimungánda,
MAT 24:18 alimwi amuchite ooyo ulimumuunda aleke kujokela kuzobweza chakusama chakwe.
MAT 24:19 Pesi maawe kubabo bamintide akuli baabo banyonsya bana mumazuba aayo!
MAT 24:20 Amukombe kuti kuchija kwenu kutakabi muchindi champeyo nikuba mubuzuba bwasabata.
MAT 24:21 Nkambo kuyoba mapenzi mapati loko, aayo atana kubonwa pe kuzwaida kumasangunino anyika kuzosikila lino, pe, takwe nikuzoba zili mbubobu pe.
MAT 24:22 Nakuti mazuba aayo pesi afwinsigwa, tekwali kunooba naba muntu walikuzofulwa. Pesi nkambo kabasale aayo mazuba ayofwinsigwa.
MAT 24:23 Lino kuti umwi muntu wamba kulindinywe kuti, 'Langa, ngoyu Kkilisito!'mutakamuzuminini pe akuzisyoma.
MAT 24:24 Nkambo baKkilisito bakubeja abasinsimi babeji bayosika akuchita malele mapati azigambyo, kuti baleesye, nikuba, aabo basale.
MAT 24:25 Amubone, ndamwambila kazitana kuchitika pe.
MAT 24:26 Lino kuti baamba kuti kulindinywe, 'Mulange, ulimunkanda, 'mutakayinki pe oko kunkanda. Nikuba kuti, 'mulange, mwali mungánda zyamukati, 'mutakasyomi pe.
MAT 24:27 Mbuli lulabi mbulumweka kuzwa kubuzwezuba alimwi lulamvwikkila koonse kusikila kububbila, oko kuyoba nkuboola kwa Mwana Muntu.
MAT 24:28 Oko kuli munyama ufwide, nkukubungene makubi.
MAT 24:29 Pesi mpawawo kwakumana mazuba amapenzi aya izuba liyosiya, mweezi tuchiko kuyopa mumuni pe, inyenyezi ziyoowa kuzwa kujulu, alimwi manguzu ejulu ayotikinisigwa.
MAT 24:30 Lino chitondezyo cha Mwan a Muntu chiyoboneka mujulu, alimwi misyobo yoonse iyolila. Bayomubona Mwana a Muntu kalikuza atala lyamayoba akujulu anguzu alimwi abulemu bupati.
MAT 24:31 Uyotuma baangelo bakwe akulila kwamweembo, alimwi bayobunganya antomwe basale bakwe kuzwa kumabazu aane, kuzwa kumpela imwi kuyosika kumpela yomwe yakujulu kusikila kuliimwi.
MAT 24:32 Amwiiye chiiyo kuzwa kumukuyu. Aawo mutabi nuuba muteete akusyuuka matu, ngamwaziba kuti mayiinza abafwifwi.
MAT 24:33 Lino zilikozyenie, naa mwabona zintu ezi zyoonse, mweelede kuziba kuti waba afwifwi, amulyango loko.
MAT 24:34 Nchobeni ndamwambila, izyalani eeli talikoyomana pe kazitanachitika pe zintu eezi.
MAT 24:35 Ijulu anyika ziyomana, pesi majwi aangu takwe natakamane pe.
MAT 24:36 Pesi takukwe uuzi buzuba nikuba chiindi niziyochitika eezi, nikuba baangelo bakujulu, nikuba Mwana a Muntu, pesi Taata alike.
MAT 24:37 Mbuli kumazuba a Nowa, mbukuyooba kubola kwa Mwana a Muntu.
MAT 24:38 Mbuli kumazuba kakutana boola zambangulwe bakali kulya alimwi akunywa, kabakwatana akukwatanisigwa kusikila kubuzuba Nowa mbwakanjila mubwato.,
MAT 24:39 alimwi takukwe anchibakalizi pe kusikila izambangulwe lyabatola - lino mbukuyoba kusika kwa Mwana a Muntu.
MAT 24:40 Eelyo bantu babili banoli mumuunda - umwi akati kabo uyobwezegwa, alimwi umwi uyosiigwa.
MAT 24:41 Banakazi babili banoli kabaziiya aziiyo - umwi akati kabo uyobwezegwa, alimwi umwi uyosiigwa.
MAT 24:42 Nkinkaako amuchenjele, nkambo tamuzi pe buzuba Mwami wenu nayoboola.
MAT 24:43 Pesi amuzizibe eezi, kuti kwanoli mwani ngánda walizi chindi akati kamansiku sikubba namusikila, walikuno lindide alimwi talikunoleka ngánda yakwe pe kuti itululwe.
MAT 24:44 Nkinkaako anywebo mulelede kulibambila, nkambo Mwana Muntu uyobola muchiindi nchimutalangilide pe.
MAT 24:45 “Lino nguuli mulanda usyomekede alimwi kalimusongo ooyo wakabikwa asimalelo wakwenkuti abaambe ngánda yakwe kuchitila kuti abape chakulya kuchiindi cheelede?
MAT 24:46 Uli achoolwe ooyo mulanda uyojanwa kachita oobo.
MAT 24:47 Nkasimpe, ndamwambila kuti simalelaakwe uyomubika kuti akabambe zintu zyoonse.
MAT 24:48 Pesi mulanda mubi kuti waamba eezi mumoyo wakwe, 'Simalelaangu wanonoka,
MAT 24:49 alimwi akatangune kuuma balanda bakwe, alimwi kulya akunywa azidakwa,
MAT 24:50 lino simalelaakwe ooyo mulanda uyosika mubuzuba ooyo mulanda mpatalibambilide pe alimwi achindi nchatazipe.
MAT 24:51 Simalelaakwe uzomugonkola goonkola akumwaaba kubusena kuti bakabe aamwi abasikuupawupa, ooko kuyoba kulila akuluma ntwino.
MAT 25:1 Lino bwami bwakujulu buyokozyanisigwa abasimbi balikkumi bakabweza malampi aabo alimwi bayinka kuyochinga simusa.
MAT 25:2 Balimusanu baabo bakali bafubafuba alimwi balimusanu bakali basongo.
MAT 25:3 Aawo basimbi bafubafuba nibakabweza malampi aabo, tebakabweza pe mafuta aabo.
MAT 25:4 Pesi basimbi basongo bakabweza mafuta aabo muzibikilo.
MAT 25:5 Lino simusa wakanonoka, boonse bakaguna alimwi bakoona.
MAT 25:6 Pesi akati kabusiku kwakamvwigwa ikongolola, Ámulange, simusa! Amuzwe aanze alimwi mukamuchinge akumutambula.
MAT 25:7 Éelyo basimbi boonse bakabuka alimwi bayasya malampi aabo.
MAT 25:8 Bafubafuba bakaamba kuti kubasongo, 'mutwabile amwi mafuta aanu nkambo malampi esu azima.'
MAT 25:9 'Pesi bo basongo bakasandula kuti, 'mbokunga takotukwanina swebo andinywe, amwinke kuli baabo basambala alimwi mukalyulile eenu nobeni.
MAT 25:10 Áawo nubakachili kukuyowula, simusa wakasika, alimwi aabo bakalibambilide bakayinka aawe kupobwe, alimwi imulyango wakajalwa.
MAT 25:11 “Kumane boobu bamwi basimbi abalabo bakaboola alimwi baamba kuti, “Simalelo wesu, Simalelo wesu, tujulile.'
MAT 25:12 “Pesi wakabasandula alimwi wakati, 'Nchobeni ndamwambila, tandimuzi pe.
MAT 25:13 Nkinkaako amuchenjele, nkambo tamulizi izuba nikuba ichindi.
MAT 25:14 “Zyakozyania amwalumi wakali afwifwi akuya munyika iimbi. Wakayita balanda bakwe alimwi wabaabila buvubi bwakwe.
MAT 25:15 Umwi wakamupa matalenta alimusanu, mpawo umwi wakamupa aabili, alimwi umbi lubo wakamupa limwi talenta. Umwi awumwi wakatambula eecho chendelana ambuli mbakonzya, mpawo mwalumi ooyo wakeenda mulweendo lwakwe.
MAT 25:16 Ooyo wakatambula matalenta alimusanu wakeenda wakubuka akwabelesya mpawo wakabbindawuka ambi alimusanu.
MAT 25:17 Mbuboobo, oyo wakatambwide aabili alakwe wakabbindawuka wajana aambi aabili.
MAT 25:18 Pesi oyo mulanda wakalalimwi wakeenda, wakusya kkomba mulubuwa, alimwi wakasisa mamali asimalelaakwe.
MAT 25:19 Lino mumazuba simalelo wabalanda aaba boonse wakaboola wazolangalanga myeelwe yabuvubi antomwe ambabo balanda bakwe.
MAT 25:20 Mulanda oyo wakatambwide matalenta alimusanu wakaboola alimwi weeta aambi alimusanu. Wakamba kuti, 'Simalelo wangu, Langa, ndakakubbindawuka aambi alimusanu.
MAT 25:21 “Simalelaakwe wakati kulinguwe, 'wakachita kabotu, iwe nomulanda mubotu alimwi usyomeka! Walikusyomeka muzintu ziche. Ndiyokubika kuti ukeendelezye zintu zyiingi. Njila mubusekelezi bwasimalelaako.'
MAT 25:22 “Ooyo mulanda wakatambwide matalenta aabili wakaboola waamba kuti, 'Simalelo wangu, wakandipa matallenta aabili. Langa, ndakabbindawuka aambi abili lubo.
MAT 25:23 “Simalelo wakwe wakati kuli nguwe, 'wakachita kabotu, iwe numulanda mubotu alimwi usyomeka! Walikusyomeka muzintu ziche. Ndiyokubika kuti ukeendelezye zintu zyiingi. Njila mubusekelezi bwasimalelo wako.'
MAT 25:24 “Eelyo oyo mulanda wakatambwide talenta lyomwe wakasika alakwe wati, 'Simalelo wangu, ndilikwizi kuti ulimwalumi ukalala. Ulatebula mpotabyalide, alimwi ulatebula mpotakwe niwamwaya.
MAT 25:25 Ndakayoowa, lino ndakeenda mpawo ndakusiisa talenta munyika. Langa ndeeli lyako ndabozya.
MAT 25:26 “Pesi Simalelaakwe wakamusandula wati kulinguwe, Íwe nomulanda mubi alimwi mutolo, wakaziba kuti ndilatebula aawo mpondatabyalape alimwi ndilatebula aawo mponditamwayide pe.
MAT 25:27 Nkiinkaako wakeelede kupa mamali kulibasikulondola, alimwi kukuyobola kwangu ndakati kunobweza aangu antoomwe ayaayo alikunozyalwa.
MAT 25:28 Nkiinkako amumubwezele talenta alimwi mulipe ooyo mulanda ulamatalenta alikkumi.
MAT 25:29 Mpawo kuli umwi awumwi weeta zyiingi uyopegwa, alimwi uyooba azyiingi. Pesi kuliyooyo utayeti chintu, uyonyanzigwa nikuba eecho nchajisi.
MAT 25:30 Mumubwale mumudima ooyo mulanda utakwe anchabede, omo mulikulila alimwi akuluma ntwino.'
MAT 25:31 “Eelyo Mwana a Muntu nayoboola mubulemu alimwi abaangelo bakwe boonse, uyokkala achuuno chakwe chabulemu.
MAT 25:32 Kuyobunganisigwa misyobo yoonse, alimwi uyopambula bantu umwi akulumwi, mbuli mwembeli mbwapambula imbelele kuzwa kumpongo.
MAT 25:33 Uyobika mbelele kuchilisyo chakwe, pesi mpongo kuchimweensi chakwe.
MAT 25:34 Eelyo Mwami uyowamba kuli zeezyo zitanoli kuchilisyo kuti, 'Muze, inywe nimulongezezegwe a Taata, amujane bwami oobo mbumwakabambilidwe kuzwa kumatalikilo anyika.
MAT 25:35 Nkaambo ndakali enzala alimwi mwakandipa chakulya.' ndakali enyota alimwi mwakandipa chakunywa.' ndakali mwenzu alimwi mwakandinjizya mungánda.'
MAT 25:36 ndakali chintanda alimwi mwakandisamika.' ndakali kuchiswa alimwi mwakandisilika.' ndakali mujele alimwi mwakandiswaya.'
MAT 25:37 Éelyo baluleme bayosandula alimwi kabati, 'Mwami, ndilili nitwakakubona koli enzala alimwi twakakusanina? Nikuba nyota alimwi twakakupa meenda?
MAT 25:38 Ndilili nitwakakubona koli mwenzu alimwi twakakutambula akukunjizya? Nikuba chintaanda alimwi twakakusamika?
MAT 25:39 Alimwi ndilili nitwakakubona kochiswa nikuba muntolongo alimwi twasika kulinduwe?'
MAT 25:40 “Eelyo Mwami uyosandula alimwi uyoti kuli mbaabo, 'Nchobeni ndamwambila, nzimwakachitila kumunini wabakwesu, mwakazichitila ndime.'
MAT 25:41 Eelyo uyoti kuli baabo batanoli kuchimweensi chakwe, 'Muzwe kuli ndime, inywe nimutukidwe, munjile mumulilo utamani ooyo ubambilidwe Satani abaangelo bakwe,
MAT 25:42 nkambo ndakali enzala, pesi temwakandipa pe chakulya; ndakali enyota, pesi temwakandipa pe meenda;
MAT 25:43 ndakali mweenzu, pesi temwakandinjizizye pe mungánda; ndakali chintanda, pesi temwakandisamika pe; ndakali kuchiswa alimwi nikuba nindakali muntolongo, pesi takwepe nchimwakayeeya andime.'
MAT 25:44 “Mpawo abalabo bayosandula alimwi kabati, 'Mwami ndilili nitwakakubona koli enzala, nikuba nyota, nikuba koli mwenzu, nikuba chintanda, nikuba kochiswa, nikuba koli muntolongo, alimwi twakaleka kukubelekela?'
MAT 25:45 “Eelyo uyobasandula kuti, 'Nchobeni ndamwambila, nzimwakatachitila abo banini babaaba, temwakazichita pe kulindime.'
MAT 25:46 Aaba bayonjila muchisubulo chitamani, pesi baluleme bayonjila mubuumi ibutamani.”
MAT 26:1 Lino chakaba kuti Jesu nakamana majwi aya oonse, wakati kuli basikwiya bakwe,
MAT 26:2 “Mulizi kuti kwayinda mazuba abili pobwe lyakwindilila ngalyasika, e; yo Mwana Muntu waabwa kuti akagankaminwe.”
MAT 26:3 Mpawo mupayizi mupati abapati bamwi babantu bakali bungene aantomwe mungánda yamuapyizi silutwe, wakalikutegwa ngu Kkayafasi.
MAT 26:4 Bakalangula inzila isisikene kabali antomwe kuti bamwange Jesu chakumubba akuyomujaya.
MAT 26:5 Nkambo bakali kwamba kuti, “kutabi chiindi chapobwe litakwe bumena, kuti kutabi kunyongana akati kabantu.”
MAT 26:6 Lino Jesu nakali mu Bbetani mungánda ya Sayimoni sichinsenda,
MAT 26:7 Nakalikulya atafula, elyo kwakasika mwanakazi wakajisi cinkuli wamafuta adula, elyo wakatila Jesu amutwe
MAT 26:8 Pesi basikwiya bakwe nibakaziba, bakabilila alimwi bakati,
MAT 26:9 “Ninzi chapa kuti aanyonyone obu? Ayaa alikuzigwa amali inyingi akuyopa bachete.”
MAT 26:10 Pesi Jesu nakaziba echi wakati kulimbabo, “Nkambonzi nimumukatazya mwanakazi ooyu? Nkambo wandichitila chintu chibotu.
MAT 26:11 Bachete mulaabo chiindi chonse, pesi tamukoyooba andime pe chindi choonse.
MAT 26:12 Nkambo mpatila mafuta aya amubili wangu, wazichitila kuzikwa kwangu
MAT 26:13 kasimpe ndamwambila kuti kufumbwa nkwayokambawukwa makani mabotu, munyika yoonse echi nchaachita mwanakazi oyu chinoyowambwa kuti bakamwibaluke.
MAT 26:14 Mpawo umwi wabali kkumi ababili, wakali kuteghwa Judasi sikaliyoti, wakayinka kumupayizi mupati
MAT 26:15 Alimwi wakati, “Ninzi nchimuyanda kundipa kuti ndimwabe kulindinywe?” Bakazuminana makumi ataatu ansiliva kuti bamupe.
MAT 26:16 Kuzwa kuleechochindi wakalangula mwenya wakumwaba kulimbabo.
MAT 26:17 Lino mubuzuba butaanzibwachinkwa chitakwe bumena basikwiya bakaza kuli Jesu akumwambila kuti, “Nkukuli nkoyanda kuti tukakubambilile kuti ukalye pobwe lyakwindilila?
MAT 26:18 Wakamba kuti, “Ngamwinke mumyuunzi kuli umwi mwalumi akumwambila kuti, “Muyisi wati, “chindi changu chaba mumaanza. Ndiyobamba ipobwe lyakwindilila kungánda yako abasikwiya bangu.
MAT 26:19 Basikwiya bakachita mbuli Jesu mbwakabalayilila, alimwi bakakubamba kulya kwapobwe lyakwindilila.
MAT 26:20 Lino nichakaba chindi chagoko, wakakkala aansi kuti alye abasikwiya balikkumi ababili.
MAT 26:21 Awo nibakali kulya, wakabambila kuti, “Nkasimpe ndamwambila kuti umwi wanu uyondaaba.”
MAT 26:22 Bakawusa kapati, elyo umwi wakatalika kumubuzya kuti, “Zyanchonzyo tendime na Mwami?”
MAT 26:23 Wakasandula kati, “Ngumwi oyo unika kuboko kwakwe andime mukabbavu ngonguwe uyondaaba.
MAT 26:24 Mwana Muntu uleenda, mbuli mbukulembedwe atala anguwe, pesi maawe kulooyo muntu uwaaba Mwana a Muntu! Chalikubota kuloyo muntu natakazyalwa.”
MAT 26:25 Judasi oyo wakali wakayanda kuyomuuzya wakati, “Ndime na, Mwami?” wakamwambila kuti, “walyambila olikke.”
MAT 26:26 Kabalimukulya, Jesu wakabweza chinkwa, wachilongezya, akuchikwamuna. Wakachipa basikwiya akubambila kuti, “Mubweze, mulye. Ooyu ngomubili wangu.”
MAT 26:27 Wakabweza nkomeki akulumba, alimwi wakabapa akwamba kuti, “Munywe, moonse.
MAT 26:28 Nkambo obumbulowa bwangu bwachizuminano butililwa bayingi kuti balekelelwe zibi.
MAT 26:29 Pesi ndimwambila kuti, tandi koyonywa limbi muchelo wamasansa, kusikila mubuzuba obo mbwintakanywe bupya andinywe mu Bwami bwa Taata.”
MAT 26:30 Lino nibakazwa kwimba lwiimbo, bakayinka kuchilundu chama oliva.
MAT 26:31 Mpawo Jesu wakabambila kuti, “moonse muyolebwa mansiku aano nkambo kandime, nkambo kuli lembedwe kuti, Ndiyowuma mwembeli alimwi butanga bwambelele buyomwayika.'
MAT 26:32 Pesi musule ndakubusigwa, ndiyomusangunina kuya mu Galili.”
MAT 26:33 Pesi Pita wakati kulinguwe, “Nekuba boonse balebwa nkambo kanduwe, mebo andike tandikoyolebwa pe.”
MAT 26:34 Jesu wakamwambila kuti, “chakasimpe ndakwambila kuti, busiku mbubobuno, mukombwe katana kukokolika, unoli wandikaka tutaatu.”
MAT 26:35 Pita wakamwambila kuti, “Nikuba kufwa anduwe ndilakonzya, nsikoyokukaka pe. “Boonse basikwiya bakamba chomwe.
MAT 26:36 Mpawo Jesu wakinkabo kubusena ibutegwa Gesemane alimwi wakati kuli basikwiiya bakwe, “Amukkale aano ninchiya kukukomba.”
MAT 26:37 Wakabweza Pita abana ba Zebbedi babili antoomwe anguwe alimwi bakatalika kuba amawuse aku katazika.
MAT 26:38 Mpawo wakati kuli mbabo, “Muuya wangu wawusa kapati, nikuba kusikila akulufu. Amuchale ano alimwi mulindile.”
MAT 26:39 Wakayinka anembo kulekule, wakakotamika busyu bwakwe, akukomba wakamba kuti, “Taata, na chakonzeka, nkomeki eyi ngindiinde. Pesi, kutabi kuyanda kwangu, pesi kube kuyanda kwako.
MAT 26:40 Wakaboola kuli basikwiya akubajanabalimukoona, alimwi wakati kuli Pita, “Niinzi, sa tamukonzyi kulindila andime hoola limwi?
MAT 26:41 Amulindile akukomba kuti mutanjilinmukusunkwa. Nchoonzyo Muuya ulayanda, pesi mubili wezuuka.”
MAT 26:42 Wakayinka lwachibili akuyokoomba. Wakamba kuti, “Taata, kuti echi tachikonzeki kwinda kumbali kwakuti ndinywe, kuyanda kwako kuchitwe.
MAT 26:43 Wakaza lubo wazobajana balikoona, nkambo meso aabo akali alema.
MAT 26:44 Wakabasiya lubo, wakayinka akuyokoomba kachitaatu, kayindulula majwi omwe.
MAT 26:45 Mpawo Jesu wakeza kuli basikwiya akubambila kuti, “Muchoona na akulyokezya? Amulange, hola lyaba mumaboko, alimwi Mwana Muntu waabwa mumaboko abasizibi
MAT 26:46 Mubuke, twinkeAmulange, oyo sikundaaba waba afwifwi.”
MAT 26:47 Nakachili kwambula, Judasi, umwi wabali kkumi awumwi, wakasika, wakaaza amakamu makamu abantu kuzwa kumupayizi mupati abapati babantu. Bakeza amafulo enkoli.
MAT 26:48 Lino oyo mwalumi wakali kuyanda kuuzya Jesu wakali bapede chitondezyo, chamba kuti, “oyo ngwensikamyonte ngonguwe. Mukamuvumpile.”
MAT 26:49 Mpawawo wakasika kuli Jesu akwamba kuti, “Wapona, Omuyisi!” akumumyonta.
MAT 26:50 Jesu wakamwambila kuti, “Mweenzuma, chita echo nchwazida kuzochita.” mpawo bakasika, babika maanza ali Jesu, akumuvuntila.
MAT 26:51 Amulange, umwi wababo bakali a Jesu wakatandabika janza lyakwe, wasomona kafulo, akuma muzike wamupayizi mupati, akumudyunkula kutwi kwakwe.
MAT 26:52 Mpawo Jesu wakati kulinguwe, “Bwedezya kafulo kako muchibikilo chako, nkambo boonse abo babweza tufulo bayolobesegwa atufulo.
MAT 26:53 Muyeeye kuti tendali kukonzya na kwiita Taata, alimwi walikunditumina baangelo bayinda myuya mibi ilikkumi ayibili?
MAT 26:54 Pesi alikuyo zuzikizigwa biyeni malembe, “kuti echi chichitike?”
MAT 26:55 Kuleecho chindi Jesu wakati kumakamu abantu, “Mwaaza azifulo enkoli kuti muzondivuntile mbotatedi ndimubbi? Mazuba oonse ndakali kuyiisya mungánda ya Leza, alimwi tamwakandaanga pe.
MAT 26:56 Pesi zyoonse eezi zyachitika kuti malembe amusinsimi azuzikizigwe. “Mpawo basikwiya boonse bakamutakata akuchija.
MAT 26:57 Abo bakamuvuntila Jesu bakamutola kuli Kkayafasi muapayizi mupati, oko balembi abapati nkabakabungene.
MAT 26:58 Pesi Pita wakamutobelela kule kule kusikila mulubuwa lwamupayizi mupati. Wakanjila mukati akukkala aansi abasikulinda kuti abone chitachitike.
MAT 26:59 Lino mupayizi mupati abankuta boonse bakali kulangila bukamboni bwakubeja aatala a Jesu kuti bakonzye kumubika kulufu.
MAT 26:60 Takwepe nchibakajana, nekuba kuti bakamboni bakubeja bakeza. Pesi nichakaba chiindi babili bakasika.
MAT 26:61 Akwamba kuti, “Oyu mwalumi wakali kuti, 'Ndilakonzya kumwayula ngánda ya Leza akwiyakulula mumazuba ataatu.”
MAT 26:62 Mupayizi mupati wakimikila akumwambila kuti, “Tukwe nsandulo na?” Niinzi zyoonse eezi nzibalokukukwambila atala anduwe?”
MAT 26:63 Pesi Jesu wakawumuna. Mupayizi mupati wakamwambila kuti, “Ndakulayilila muli Leza upona, twambile na nduwe Kkilisito, Mwana a Leza.”
MAT 26:64 Jesu wakamuvwiila kati, “wamba nduwe omwini. Pesi ndakwambila, kuzwa lino uyoobona Mwan Muntu kakkede kukuboko kwachilisyo kwenguzu, akuyoboola mumayooba akujulu.”
MAT 26:65 Mpawo mupayizi mupati wakadelula zisamo zyakwe akwamba kuti, “wambula masampu! Nkambonzi nituchiyanda bukamboni? Amulange lino mwamvwa masampu.
MAT 26:66 Muyeyaanzi? Bakasandula akwamba kuti, “Welede lufu.”
MAT 26:67 Mpawo bakamuswida kumeso akumuuma, akumuvatula mabbayi,
MAT 26:68 akwamba kuti, “Tusinsimine, webo Kkilisito. Ngwani wakuuma?”
MAT 26:69 Lino Pita wakalikkede aanze mukati kalubbaya lwankuta, elyo mulanda musimbi wakasika kulinguwe akumwambila kuti, “wakalawe Jesu mu Galili.”
MAT 26:70 Pesi wakazikaka kunembo lyabo boonse kaamba kati, “tandizizi pe eezyo nzyolikwamba.”
MAT 26:71 Lino nakazwa anze amulyango walubaya, awumwi musimbi mulanda wakamubona akwambila abo mbakalabo, “Ooyu mwalumi wakali awe Jesu waku Nazaleta.”
MAT 26:72 Wakakaka lubo chakukonka, “tandimuzipe me mwalumi ooyu.”
MAT 26:73 Musule lyakayindi abo bakalimvwi bakasika akwamba kuti kuli Pita, “Nchamasimpe uli umwi wabo, nkambo nzila njowambula ayo ilakwamba.”
MAT 26:74 Mpawo wakatalika kutukila akukonka, “tandimuzi pe mwalumi oyu,” alimwi mpawawo mukombwe waka kokolika.
MAT 26:75 Pita wakayeeya majwi Jesu ngakaambide, “mukombwe katana kokolika uyonditama tutatu.” Mpawo wakaya aanze wakutalika kweema.
MAT 27:1 Lino nikwaba kuseni, boonse bapayizi bapati abapati babantu bakalangula inzila mbubanga balamubika kulufu Jesu.
MAT 27:2 Bakamwaanga, akumutola aanze, akumusisya kuli Payileti mwendelezi.
MAT 27:3 Mpawo Judasi, wakamuuzya, nakabona kuti Jesu wapegwa mulandu, wakasanduka akujosya mali yansiliva ili makumi atatu kubapayizi bapati akuzuluzi,
MAT 27:4 alimwi wakati ndabisya akwaaba bulowa butakwe mulandu. Pesi bakati, “Niinzi echo kulindiswe? Libonene olikke.”
MAT 27:5 Mpawo wakasowela aansi tumpanzi twansiliva mungánda ya Leza, akwinka, alimwi wakaya anze wakulisina.
MAT 27:6 Mupayizi mupati wakatubweza tupanzi twansiliva akwamba kuti, “tachili mumulawu pe kuti eechi chibikwe muchiyobwedo nkambo muulo wabulowa.”
MAT 27:7 Bakambuuzyania antoomwe, alimwi bakawula muunda wamubumbi muzikkilwa beenzu.
MAT 27:8 Nkambo kacheechi, oyo muunda wakategwa, “Muunda wabulowa.” kusika lino.
MAT 27:9 Mpawo echo chakambidwe amusinsimi Jelemiya chakazuzikizigwa, chaamba kuti, “Bakabweza tumpanzi tulimakumi ataatu twansiliva, muulo wakabamba abana ba Izilayeli,
MAT 27:10 alimwi bakawupa kuti muunda wamubumbi, mbuli Mwami mbakandilayilila.
MAT 27:11 Lino Jesu wakayimikila kunembo lyamwendelezi, alimwi mwendelezi wakamubuzya, “Uli Mwami waba -Juda na?” Jesu wakavwila kuti, “wamba mbubo.”
MAT 27:12 Pesi nakatamikizigwa amupayizi mupati abapati, takwepe nakasandula.
MAT 27:13 Mpawo Payileti wakamwambila kuti, “Sa totumvwide twambo ntubalo kukutamikizya?”
MAT 27:14 Pesi takwe nakasandula niliba ijwi lyomwe, awo mwendelezi wakagamba kapati.
MAT 27:15 Lino kupobwe mbuli bwakali mulawu wamwendelezi kuti bagwisye umwi mwaange wasaluzigwa abantu.
MAT 27:16 Kuchindi eecho kwakali mwaange wakale mpewo utegwa Bbalabbasi.
MAT 27:17 Lino nibakabungana antomwe Payileti wakabambila kuti, “ngwani ngumuyanda kuti ndimwangunwide? Bbalabbasi na Jesu utegwa ngu Kkilisito?”
MAT 27:18 Wakalizi kuti bapeda Jesu kulinguwe nkambo kakwemuzya.
MAT 27:19 Awo nakakkede achuuno chabbetekelo, mwanakazi wakwe wakamutumina ijwi elyo lyakati, “utachiti chintu kumwalumi oyo utakwe kaambo. Nkambo ndakatazigwa loko sunu nkambo kaziloto nzindalota atala anguwe.”
MAT 27:20 Lino bapayizi bapati abendelezi bakasungilizya makamu abantu kuti bakumbile Bbalabbasi, akupegwa Jesu kuti akajiigwe.
MAT 27:21 Mwendelezi wakababuzya kuti, “Nguuli akati kababili ngumuyanda kuti ndimwangunwide?” bakaamba kuti, “Bbalabbasi.”
MAT 27:22 Payileti wakababuzya kuti niinzi nchinjelede kuchitila Jesu utegwa ngu Kkilisito? Bakamuvwiila boonse bakati, Ngagankaminwe.”
MAT 27:23 Mpawo wakamba kuti, “Nkambonzi, mbubiinzi mbwaachita?” Pesi bakompololesya kapati, “Mumugankamine.”
MAT 27:24 Lino Payileti nakabona kuti takwe chintu nchakali wajana, pesi kuti kunyongana kwakali kwatalika, wakabweza maanzi wasamba maboko kunembo lyamakamu abantu, akubambila kuti, tandikwe pe mulandu kubulowa bwamwalumi oyu. Amulibonene lwenu.”
MAT 27:25 Boonse bantu bakati, “Mbubo bulowa bwakwe abube kulindiswe abana besu.”
MAT 27:26 Mpawo wakabaangunwida Bbalabbasi, pesi wakawuma Jesu achimboko akumupeda kulimbabo kuti akagankaminwe.
MAT 27:27 Mpawo basilumamba abeendelezi bakabweza Jesu akumutola mukati kangánda yabwendelelezi bapati akubungania nkamu mpati yoonse yabasilumamba.
MAT 27:28 Bakamuzwatununa akumusamika bbaki lisalalisya.
MAT 27:29 Bakaluka musini wamvwa akumuzwatika amutwe wakwe, akumubika mufunko kukuboko kwakwe kwalulyo. Bakafugama aansi kunembo lyakwe akumuniaka, kabamba kuti, “Mwalemekwa Mwami waba Juda!”
MAT 27:30 Bakamuswida mate, alimwi bakabweza mufunko akumuuma mumutwe kabalokwindulula.
MAT 27:31 Lino nibakamuniaka, bakamuzwatununa bbaki lyabo akumuzwatika zisamo zyakwe, akumutola kuyomugankamina.
MAT 27:32 Awo nibakazwa aanze, bakajana mwalumi uzwa ku Sayilini utegwa Sayimoni, ngubakaangila kuti beende aamwi kuti anyumpule chiingano chakwe.
MAT 27:33 Bakasika kubusena butegwa Gologota, kachamba kuti, “Mbusena bwatupepe twamitwe.”
MAT 27:34 Bakamupa wayini uvwelene andulwe kuti anywe. Pesi nakalabila wakakaka kunywa.
MAT 27:35 Lino nibaka mugankamina, bakabaana zyakusama zyakwe akuuma chisolo,
MAT 27:36 alimwi bakakkala ani kabali kumulinda.
MAT 27:37 Atala amutwe wakwe bakabikka bulembo bumubeteka, bwamba kuti, “Ooyu ngu Jesu Mwami waba Juda.”
MAT 27:38 Kwakali basikubba bobile mbakagankaminwa aabo, umwi kuchimweensi aumwi kuchilisyo chakwe.
MAT 27:39 Aabo bakali kwinda enzila bakali kumutukila, kabatikinia mitwe yabo
MAT 27:40 kabamba kuti, “Iwe nuyomwaya ngánda ya Leza akwiyakulula mumazuba ataatu, lifutule omwini! do kuli Mwan a Leza, seluka achingano aawo!”
MAT 27:41 Munzila ikozyenie abalabo bapayizi bapati bakali kumuniaka kabala balembi abapati kabamba kuti,
MAT 27:42 wakali kufutula bamwi, pesi we takonzyi pe kulifutula. Ngu Mwami wa Izilayeli. Ngaseluke aachingano, alimwi tuyomusyoma.
MAT 27:43 Wakali kusyoma Leza, Leza ngamuvune lino, na Leza kayanda kumwangununa. Nkaambo wakali kwamba kuti ndimwana a Leza.”
MAT 27:44 Munzila ikozyenie abalabo basikubba mbakagankamidwe aabo abalabo bakamutukila.
MAT 27:45 Lino kuzwa kuchindi chahola lamusanu alimwi mudima wakasikila nyika yoonse kuyosika kuhola lyamusanu aane.
MAT 27:46 Nichakaba chiindi chamusanu mwaane, Jesu wakoompolola ejwi pati kaamba kuti, Eli, Eli, lama, sabakkatani?” Kazyamba kuti, Leza wangu Leza wangu, nkambonzi niwandisiya?”
MAT 27:47 Lino abo bakiimvwi mpawo bakazimvwa, bakaamba kuti, “ulikwiita Elayija.”
MAT 27:48 Mpawo umwi wakachijana akuyobweza nsisa akwizuzya awayini ulwela, wakisekka kumufunko, elyo wakamupa kuti ayinywe
MAT 27:49 Bayingi boonse bakati, mumuleke alikke, Tumubone na Elayija uleza na kuzomufutula.”
MAT 27:50 Mpawo Jesu wakalila lubo ajwi pati elyo wakapa muuya wakwe.
MAT 27:51 Amubone, chisitilizyo changánda ya Leza chakanduka muzimpanzi zibili kuzwa kujulu kusika aansi, anyika yakandendema, amabwe akaanduka.
MAT 27:52 Tubanda twakavunuka, amibili yabasalali bakali boona yakabusigwa,
MAT 27:53 Bakazwa mutubanda musule lyakubuka kwakwe, bakanjila mugunzi lisalala, akuboneka kubayingi.
MAT 27:54 Lino silumamba mupati abaabo bakali kulinda Jesu bakawubona muzuzumo azintu zyakachitika, bakayoowa baamba kuti, “Chamasimpe ooyu wali Mwana a Leza.”
MAT 27:55 Banakazi biingi bakali batobela Jesu kuzwa ku Galili kuti bamukutawukile bakali kulanga alaale.
MAT 27:56 Akati kabo kwakali Meli Magadalini, Meli banyina ba Jemusi a Jozefa, abanyina babana ba Zebbedi.
MAT 27:57 Lino nilyakaba goko, kwakasika mwalumi uzwa ku Alimatiya, utegwa Jozefu, wakali sikwiiya wa Jesu.
MAT 27:58 Wakayinka kuli Payileti akuyokumbila mutunta wa Jesu. Mpawo Payileti wakalayilila kuti awupegwe.
MAT 27:59 Jozefu wakabweza mutunta, wamuzambilila mulembo utenteema,
MAT 27:60 wakulazika mukabanda kakwe kapya nkakali wafokola mubbwe. Mpawo waka kkunkulisya ibbwe pati wasinka amulyango wenda.
MAT 27:61 Meli Magadalini amumwi Meli bakaliwo, bakalikkede kulubazu lyakabanda.
MAT 27:62 Buzuba bwakatobela bwakali buzuba bwinda bwakulibambila, bapayizi bapati abaFalisi bakali bungene antomwe a Payileti.
MAT 27:63 Bakali kwamba kuti, “Mwami, tuchiyeeya ulya silweno nakachili kupona, wakaamba kuti, “kwinda mazuba ataatu ndiyobuka alubo.'
MAT 27:64 Nkinkaako layilila kuti kabanda kakwe kalindwe kusikila kubuzuba bwatatu. Chimwi chindi ulabona basikwiya bakwe basika bazomubba akwambila bantu, 'Kuti wabuka kuzwa kubafu.'Alweeno lwakumamanino ngalulayinda lwakusanguna.”
MAT 27:65 Payileti wakabambila kuti, “mwinke mukalinde mbuli mbumukonzya.”
MAT 27:66 Mpawo bakiinka akuyochita kuti kabanda kalindwe, bakazilulula abbwe akubikka basikulinda.
MAT 28:1 Lino niyakayinda isabata, kakuya kubuchedo mubuzuba butanzi bwamviki, Meli magadalini awumwi Meli bakaza kuzolanga chibunda.
MAT 28:2 Amulange, wakaba muzuzumo mupati wanyika, nkambo angelo wamwami wakaseluka kuzwa kujulu, wakaza akukunkulisya ibbwe, akukkala alindilyo.
MAT 28:3 Chiiwa chakwe chakali mbuli lulabi, azyakusama zyakwe zyakalikutuba mbuli buluba bwatonje.
MAT 28:4 Balindizi bakandengenda akuyowa alimwi bakaba mbuli bantu bafwide.
MAT 28:5 Mu angelo wakazibya banakazi akwamba kuti kulimbabo, “Mutayowi, ndilizi kuti mulangula Jesu, wakagankaminwa.
MAT 28:6 Tawope okuno, pesi wabuka, mbuli mbwaakamba. Amuze mubone abusena Mwami mpakalilazikidwe.
MAT 28:7 Mwinke chakufwambana alimwi mwambile basikwiiya bakwe, 'wabuka kuzwa kubafu. Amubone, ulikunembo lyanu kuyaku Galili. Ámulange, ndamwambila.”
MAT 28:8 Banakazi bakazwa mukabanda chakufwambana kabala akuyoowa akukondwa kupati, alimwi bakachijana kuyowambila basikwiya bakwe.
MAT 28:9 Amulange Jesu wakabaswania akubambila kuti, “Mwapona!” Banakazi bakaza, bajana mawulu akwe akumukomba.
MAT 28:10 Mpawo Jesu wakabambila kuti, “Mutayowi. Amwinke mwambile bakwesu kuti bayinke ku Galili. Nkuko nkubayondibonena.”
MAT 28:11 Lino awo banakazi nibakalikwenda, Amulange, bamwi babalindizi bakayinka mugunzi akuyowambila bapayizi bapati zintu zyoonse zyakachitika.
MAT 28:12 Lino bapayizi nibakaswanana abapati akuyooma aabo ikkani eeli, bakapa mali nyiingi kuli basilumamba
MAT 28:13 akubaambila kuti, “Mwambe kuti kuti bamwi, 'Basikwiiya ba Jesu basika mansiku akubba mutunta wakwe nitwachilikoona.
MAT 28:14 'kuti na makani aya asika kumwendelezi, tulamukombelezya akugwisya makatazyo alimulindinywe.”
MAT 28:15 Mpawo basilumamba bakabweza mali akuchita mbuli mbubakalayililwa. Aya makani akamwayika kapati akati kama Juda alimwi akeendelela anembo nikuba asunu.
MAT 28:16 Pesi basikwiiya ibalkkumi awumwi bakayinka ku Galilii, kuchilundu oko Jesu nkwakabalayilila.
MAT 28:17 Mpawo nibakamubona, bakamukomba, pesi bamwi bakadoneeka.
MAT 28:18 Jesu wakaza kuli mbabo akwaambula abo akuti, “Nguzu zyoonse ndakazipegwa kujulu aansi.
MAT 28:19 Aboobo amwinke alimwi mukachite basikwiiya bamisyoobo yoonse. Mukaba bbabbatizye muzina lya Taata, lya Mwana, alya Muuya Uusalala.
MAT 28:20 Mubayiisye kulemeka zintu zyoonse nzindakamulayilila, amubone, ndilandinywe chiindi choonse, nikuba kusikila kumamanino.”
MAR 1:1 Aya ngingawo matalikilo a makani mabotu a Jesu Kilisito, Mwana wa-Leza.
MAR 1:2 Mbuli mbukulembedwe kuli Isaya musinsimi, “Mulange, ndatuma mutumwa kunembo lyabusyu bwake oyo ulolulamika nzila yako.
MAR 1:3 Ijwi lya oyo uwompolola munkanda, “Mubambe inzila yaMwami; mululamike inzila yakwe”.
MAR 1:4 Joni wakasika, kabbizya munkanda alimwi kakambawuka lubbizyo lwakusanduka. Akulekelelwa izibi.
MAR 1:5 Ichisi choonse cha Judiya abantu boonse baku Jelusalemu bakayinka kulinguwe. Bakabbizigwa anguwe mumulonga utegwa Jodani, bakalyamba zibi zyabo.
MAR 1:6 Joni wakali kuzwaata zizwaato zyaboya bwankamela alukumba lwachikumba muchibuno chakwe, nkabela wakali kulya insozi abuchi bwalusaka.
MAR 1:7 Wakambula wati, “Oyu uza musule lyangu ulanguzu kwiinda ndime, lukole lwambatata zyakwe nsikwe chelelo chakukotama ansi akuzyangununa.
MAR 1:8 Ndamubbizya amanzi, asi we uyomubbizya a Muuya Usalala”.
MAR 1:9 Zyakachitika mumazuba ayo Jesu wakazwa ku Nazaleta ya Galili, alimwi wakabbizigwa a Joni mumulonga utegwa Jodani.
MAR 1:10 Kachizwa biyo Jeso mumanzi, wakabona ijulu kalyanzana akujulika
MAR 1:11 alimwi Muuya kuseluka akukkala atala anguwe mbuli nziba. Ijwi lyakazwa kujulu kalyamba kuti, “Ulimwana wangu. Ndiboteledwe kapati anduwe”.
MAR 1:12 Nkabela Muuya wakamusungilizya kuya munkanda.
MAR 1:13 Wakali munkanda mazuba makumi ane, kalokusunkwa aSatani. Wakali abanyama balusaka, alimwi bangelo bakamugwasizya.
MAR 1:14 Lino musule Joni kalimwangwa, Jesu wakasika muGalilaya kakambawuka makani mabotu aLeza. Wakamba kuti, “Ichindi chazuzikizigwa,
MAR 1:15 alimwi bwami bwaLeza bwaba afwifwi. Musanduke musyome makani mabotu”.
MAR 1:16 Nakalibwenda kumbali alwizi lwaGlili, wakabona Sayimoni a Andilaya muzyalwanyina wa Sayimoni kabawala kanyandi mulwizi, nkambo bakali bazubi babaswi.
MAR 1:17 Jesu wakabambila kuti, “Kamuzuba, munditobele, alimwi ndilomuchita bazubi babantu”.
MAR 1:18 Akufwambana bakasiya tunyandi twabo mpawo bamutobela.
MAR 1:19 Elyo Jesu nakachilikuyobweda kuya kunembo, wakabona Jakobo mwana wa Zebbediya amuzyalwanyina wakwe Joni; bakali mubwaato kabaluka tunyandi.
MAR 1:20 Wakabayita alimwi bakasiya wisi Zebbediya antoomwe ababelesi mubwaato mpawo bamutobela.
MAR 1:21 Lino bakasika kuKkapenawume, alimwi kabuli bunsi bwaSabata, Jesu wakanjila muchikombelo wakuyisya.
MAR 1:22 Bakagamba kunjisyo yakwe, nkambo wakali kuyisya mbuli muntu ulanguzu utali mbuli balembi pe.
MAR 1:23 Mpawo awo mwalumi wakali amuuya mubi wakakwiila muchikombelo, kati,
MAR 1:24 “Tulanzi anduwe, Jesu waNazaleta? Waza kuzotunyonyona na? Ndilikwizi kuti nduwe ni. Nduwe Usalala Mwana wa-Leza!”.
MAR 1:25 Jesu wakakalalila dayimona kati, “Tedi zwa alimwi uzwe mulinguwe!”
MAR 1:26 Idayimona lyakamuwalila ansi mpawo lyazwa mulinguwe akukwiila kupati.
MAR 1:27 Bantu boonse bakagamba, akubuzyanya, “Kuti ninzi eechi? Ninjisyo impya ilanguzu Ukonzya kutanda madayimona na amuswilizye”
MAR 1:28 Alimwi mpuwo yakwe yakazula muchisi choonse chaGalilaya.
MAR 1:29 Musule lyakuzwa muchikomelo, bakayinka kunganda yaSayimoni a Andilaya, kabali antoomwe a Jakobo a Joni.
MAR 1:30 Lino banyinazyala baSayimoni bakalikuchiswa intutumanzi, alimwi bakamwambila Jesu atala amukayintu oyu.
MAR 1:31 Wakaza wakamujata aluboko, wamubusya; intutumanzi yakazwa, mpawo watalika kubakutawukila.
MAR 1:32 Igolezya izuba kalili lyabbila, baketa kulinguwe boonse bachiswa abakanjidwe amadayimona.
MAR 1:33 Ibantu bamunzi boonse bakabungana amulyango.
MAR 1:34 Wakaponya boonse bakalamalwazi asiyene-siyene akutanda madayimona miingi, asi takazumizya madayimona kwambula nkambo akalimuzi.
MAR 1:35 Wakabuka kuseni, kakuchisiya; wakayinka kusisikene kuyokomba.
MAR 1:36 Sayimoni ababo bakali anguwe bakamuyandula.
MAR 1:37 Bakamujana bamwambila kabati, “Bantu boonse balokukuyandula”.
MAR 1:38 Wakabambila wati, “Ngatuye kumbi, anze kumadolopo alafwifwi, kuti ndikakambawuke akulako. Ncindazwide anze obu”.
MAR 1:39 Wakayinka kuGalilaya yoonse, kakambawuka muzikombelo zyabo akutanda madayimona.
MAR 1:40 Sichipele wakasika kulinguwe. Kumukumbila; wakafugama wamba wati, “Kuti kuyanda, ulakonzya kundisalazya”.
MAR 1:41 Wakazula luzyalo, Jesu wakatandabika kuboko kwakwe wamuguma, kamba kuti, “Ndilayand. Kopona”
MAR 1:42 Mpawo awo chipele chakayinka, mpo wasalazigwa.
MAR 1:43 Jesu wakamulayilila changuzu mpo wamuti yinka.
MAR 1:44 Wakamwambila kuti, “Ube asimpe lyakuti tubuzyi naba omwe muntu, asi kuya, ukalitondezye kumupayizi, ukapayilile nkambo kakusalazigwa kwako, mbuli Mozesi mbwakalayilila, mbuli bukamboni kuli mbabo”.
MAR 1:45 Asi wakiinka watalika kwaambula kangunukide kamwaya ijwi, zyakachitisya kuti Jesu takachili kukonzya kunjila idolopo kangunukide, asi wakakkala anze mumyunzi. Nikuba bobo bantu bakachili kusika kulinguwe kabazwa kumasena asiyene-siyene.
MAR 2:1 Nakabola kuKkapenawumi nikwakiinda mazuba mache kwakamvwika kuti Jesu mwali mumunzi.
MAR 2:2 Bantu bingi bakabungana kwakuti takwe nikwachili busena, munganda nikuba kumulyango, Jesu kali kukambawuka ijwi kuli mbabo.
MAR 2:3 Kwakasika balumi bakanyampwide mwalumi wakayuminide mubili; kanyampwidwe abalumi bone.
MAR 2:4 Nibakabula mweenya wakuswena afwifwi anguwe nkambo kakuvula kwabantu, bakavumbula kaluli awo Jesu mpakabede nibakavumbula bakaseluzya bulo bwawaka yuminide mubili mpakabede.
MAR 2:5 Nakabona kusyoma lwabo, Jesu wakati kuli wakayuminide mubili, “Omwana, zibi zyako zyalekelelwa”.
MAR 2:6 Lino bamwi balembi bakekkede, bakayeya munyono yabo,
MAR 2:7 “Nkambonzi mwalumi oyu nambula obu? Utuka Leza alikke?”
MAR 2:8 Chakufwambana Jesu wakaziba mumuya wkwe nzibakali kuyeya mumyoyo yabo. Wakati kulimbabo, “Nkambonzi nimulikuyeya ezi mumyoyo yanu?
MAR 2:9 Nchechili chuuba kwamba kuti kumulwazi, “Walekelelwa zibi, na kuti bweza bulo bwako weende?”
MAR 2:10 Asi kuti muzibe kuti Mwana aMuntu ulamanguzu ano ansi enyika kulekelela zibi, wakati kuliwakayuminide mubili
MAR 2:11 “Ndati kulinduwe nyampuka, bweza bulo bwako, uye kunganda yako”.
MAR 2:12 Wakanyampuka chakufwambana wabweza bulo, wakazwa munganda kunembo lyabantu boonse, abobo boonse bakagamba bapabulumbu kuli Leza, bati, “Ezi tatuna zibona pe”.
MAR 2:13 Wakayinka lubo kunkomwe yalwizi, makamu abantu akamutobela, mpawo wakabayiisya.
MAR 2:14 Kayabweenda, wakabona Levi mwana wa Alufayewusi kakkede mutente lyabasimutelo wakati kulinguwe, “Nditobele”. Wakanyampuka wamutobela.
MAR 2:15 Jesu wakali kulya munganda yaLevi, abasimutelo abasizibi bakali kulya awe abasikwiiya bakwe, kwakali biingi abobo bakamutobela.
MAR 2:16 Balembi, bakali baFalisi, nibakabona Jesu kalikulya abasizibi, bakati kuli basikwiiya bakwe, “Nkamboonzi nalya abasimutelo abasizibi?”
MAR 2:17 Jesu nakamvwa obo wakati kulimbabo, “Bantu baponede mumubili tabayandi musilisi; asi bachiswa, mbibayanda musilisi. Tendazida kwiita baluleme asi basizibi”.
MAR 2:18 Lino basikwiiya ba Joni abaFalisi kali kulyimya kulya. Bamwi bantu bakasika kulinguwe, “Nkambonzi basikwiiya baJoni abaFalisi balalyiima, asi bako tabalyimyi pe?”
MAR 2:19 Jesu wakati kulimbabo, “Nkujana basikutambwa kubwinga balyiimya na sibwiinga nkalabo?” Nkachilabo sibwiinga, tabalyimyi.
MAR 2:20 Ayosika mazuba sibwiinga akubwezegwa kuzwa kulimbabo, ayo mazuba bayolyiimya.
MAR 2:21 Takwe usuma chigamba chamulembo mupya achizwato chikulukulu, chigamba chilakonzya kudeluka, chipya kuzwa kuli chachiindi, chiyodelukisya.
MAR 2:22 Takwe ubikka wayini mupya munkomo yachiindi wabona wayini ulabbalula inkomo mpawo zyoonse wayini a ziyonyonyoka. Wayini mupya ubikwa munkomo mpya.
MAR 2:23 Musabata Jesu wakayinda mumunda wamayila, basikwiiya bakabweza mayila.
MAR 2:24 Mpawo baFalisi bakati kulinguwe, “Langa nkambonzi basikwiiya nibalikuchita zintu zityola mulawo abuzuba bwaSabata?”
MAR 2:25 Wakati kulimbabo, “Temwakabala na kuti Davida nakabula akuba anzala - we abalumi mbakalabo -
MAR 2:26 mbakanjila munganda yaJehova Abbiyata nkali mupatiyizi mupati, akulya chinkwa chabukamu, chitazumizigwi kuligwa amuntu kupela kunze kwabapayizi, wakapa abalabo mbakalabo?”
MAR 2:27 Jesu wakati, “Sabata lyakalengelwa bantu, pepe bantu kulengelwa Sabata.
MAR 2:28 Aboobo, Mwana aMuntu Mwami, ku Sabata”.
MAR 3:1 Jesu wakanjila lubo muchikombelo, wakajana mwaalumi wakakokonyene kuboko.
MAR 3:2 Bantu biingi bakamulangisisya kuyanda kubona kuti ulamuponisya na mubuzuba bwa Sabata bamupe mulandu.
MAR 3:3 Jesu wakaambila mwaalumi wakakokonyene kuboko kuti, “Nyampuka uyimikile aakati kabantu aaba.”
MAR 3:4 Mpawo wakati kubantu, “Ncheechili chibotu, kuchita chibotu na chibi mubuzuba bwa Sabata; kuvuna buumi na kujaya?” Pesi bakawumuna.
MAR 3:5 Wakabalanga chakunyema, alimwi kawuside, nkaambo kakuyuma kwamyoyo yabo, wakati kumwaalumi ooyo, “Tandabika kuboko kwako. ” Mpawo wakatandabika, elyo kuboko kwakwe kwakaba kabotu.
MAR 3:6 Lino ba Falisi bakazwa aanze mpawo, antoomwe aba Heloda bakatanguna kulanguula nzila mbubanga balamujaya.
MAR 3:7 Mpawo Jesu, wakasosoloka abasikwiiya bakwe baya kulwizi, elyo makamu makamu abantu kuzwa kuGalilii, aku Judiya akabatobela.
MAR 3:8 Lino nibakamvwa nzyakali kuchita, bantu bayingi bakeza kuli nguwe kuzwa ku Jelusalema, Idumiya azisi zilimutala a Jodani azyeengelede Taya a Sidoni.
MAR 3:9 Nkaambo kamakamu aabantu wakaambila basikwiiya bakwe kuti bamubambile bwaato buniini afwiifwi, kuti akonzye kusosoloka aakati kabantu.
MAR 3:10 Nkaambo wakalikusilika bayingi, aboobo bakali aamalwazi balikuchundana kabaya kunembo kuti bamugume.
MAR 3:11 Kufumbwa myuuya mibi niyakamubona yakawida aansi kunembo lyakwe akoompolola, kuti, “Nduwe Mwana wa Leza. ”
MAR 3:12 Alimwi wakayilayila changuzu kuti itamudomboli kuti ngwani.
MAR 3:13 Wakatanta achilundu akwiita aabo mbakalikuyanda, alimwi bakeza kulinguwe.
MAR 3:14 Wakasaluuzya balikkumi ababili; (aabo mbakati mmbatumwa) kuti bakabe aamwi anguwe, alimwi kuti akabatume kukukambawuka,
MAR 3:15 akubapa ngunzu, zyakutanda myuuya mibi.
MAR 3:16 Aaba mbimbabo bali kkumi ababili mbakasaluuzya: Sayimoni, oyu wakamupa zina lyakuti ngu Pita;
MAR 3:17 Jemusi mwana wa Zebbediya, aJoni mwana wakwabo wa Jemusi, aba wakabawuzika kuti mba Bbowanejesi, nkukwamba kuti bana ba ndabi;
MAR 3:18 Andulo, Filipo, Bbatolomiya, Matayo, Tomasi, Jemusi mwana wa Alifasi, Tediyasi, a Sayimoni munkutwe
MAR 3:19 a Judasi Sikkaliyoti, nguwe wakazomuuzya.
MAR 3:20 Mpawo wakabweeda kumuunzi, alimwi makamu aabantu akamubunganina, aboobo basikwiiya bakwe anguwe tebakachili kujana chiindi chakulya pe.
MAR 3:21 Lino bang'anda yakwabo nibakamvwa zyalikuchitika, bakamulanguula, kabaamba kuti “Wapenga. ”
MAR 3:22 Balembi bakazwa kuJelusalema bakaamba kuti, “Unjidwe muuya mubi utegwa Bbelizabbeli,” akuti “Alimwi nguzu nzyatanzya myuuya mibi nzizyakwe Bbelizabbeli mwami wamyuuya mibi.”
MAR 3:23 Jesu wakabayita mpawo watanguna kwaambula ambabo muzikozyanio, “Satani ulakonzya biyeni kulitanda?
MAR 3:24 Na bwaami kabupambukene, bwaami oobo tabukonzyi kwiimikila.
MAR 3:25 Alimwi na tekwaba kumwvanana mung'anda, eeyo ng'anda tikonzyi kwiimikila.
MAR 3:26 Alimwi na Satani walikazya elyo kanzeene, takonzyi kwiimikila; nkokuti mamanino aakwe asika.
MAR 3:27 Pesi taakwe muntu ukonzya kunjila mung'anda yamwaalumi singuzu kuti abbe lubono lwakwe, atatanguna kumuzunda akumwaanga ooyo mwaalumi singuzu. Awo mpanga ulakonzya kubba lubono mung'anda eeyo.
MAR 3:28 Ndamwaambila kasimpe, zyoonse zibi akusampawula kwabantu kulalekelelwa,
MAR 3:29 pesi kufumbwa muntu usampawula Muuya Uusalala takonzyi kulekelelwa; ulaamulandu wachibi chitamani. ”
MAR 3:30 Jesu wakabaambila eezi, nkaambo bakalikwaamba kuti, “Ulaa muuya mubi.”
MAR 3:31 Mpawo banyina abakwabo bakasika. Kabayimvwi aanze, bakatuma umwi kuti amwiite.
MAR 3:32 Bantu bayingi bakalikkede kabamubunganide, alimwi bakamwaambila kuti, “Banyoko abanike bako balaanze baliikukulanguula.”
MAR 3:33 Wakabasandula wati, “Baama abakwesu mbaani? ”
MAR 3:34 Lino wakalanga aabo bakakkede kabamuzyungulukide wati, “Bakwesu abaama mbaaba!
MAR 3:35 Kufumbwa uuchita kuyanda kwaLeza nguumukwesu wangu abaama.”
MAR 4:1 Alimwi Jesu wakatalika kuyiisya kali kumbali aalwizi. Inkamu yabantu bakamuzyungulukide yakali mpati loko zyakuti wakanjila mubwaato, kuchitila kuti akonzye kusosolokela mumaanzi akukkala, bantu boonse bakalitobezezye lwizi kunkomwe.
MAR 4:2 Mpawo wakabayiisya zintu zyiingi kabelesya zikozyanio, alimwi mukuyiisya kwakwe wakati,
MAR 4:3 “Amuswiilizye, mulimi wakaya kukumiza mbuto yakwe.
MAR 4:4 Awo naakali kumiza mbuto, imwi yakawida munzila, mpawo tuyuni twakasika twiilya.
MAR 4:5 Imwi yakawida amwaala, aatakwe muse mwiingi. Yakamena kufwambaana, nkaambo muse wakali muche.
MAR 4:6 Pesi zuba nilyakabala yakapya, mpawo yakayuma nkaambo kamiyanda yakatabbide.
MAR 4:7 Imwi mbuto yakawida mumaamvwa, maamvwa akakomena asyanikizya matu aayo, aboobo teeyakakonzya kuzyala.
MAR 4:8 Imwi mbuto yakawida mumuse uvubide. Yakamena, akukomena mane yazyala michelo, imwi makkumi otatwe, imwi makkumi musanu alimwi, imwi mwaanda. ”
MAR 4:9 Lino wakati, “Ooyo ulaamatwi aakumvwa, ngamvwe.”
MAR 4:10 Lino Jesu naakaba alike, mbakali aabo antoomwe abasikwiiya bakwe balikkumi ababili bakamubuzya aatala azikozyanisyo eezyo.
MAR 4:11 Wakabaambila wati, “Insiswa ya bwami bwa Leza ilipedwe kuli ndinywe. Pesi kuli bamwi biyo bali kunze, zyoonse zyaambwa muzikozyanisyo,
MAR 4:12 kuchitila kuti, lyoonse kababona pesi kabatabonesesyi, alimwi kabamvwa lyoonse, pesi kabatamvwisisisyi; kansinga balikumvwa balikunosanduka kabalekelelwa zibi zyabo.”
MAR 4:13 Lino wakati kuli mbabo, “Ani sena tamulokumvwisisisya na chikozyanisyo eechi? Na kakuli boobo nga kulakonzeka biyeni kuti mumvwisisisye zimwi zikozyanisyo?
MAR 4:14 Mulimi uumiza mbuto nguwe uumiza jwi.
MAR 4:15 Bamwi bantu bali mbuli nzila, aawo mpulimizidwe jwi. Mpawo mbubalimvwa biyo, Satani wasika wabweza jwi lyali lyamizwa muli mbabo.
MAR 4:16 Bamwi, mbuli muse ulaamwaala mpuyakamizwa mbuto, balalimvwa jwi, mpawo, akufwambaana balalitambula chakubotelwa.
MAR 4:17 Pesi nkaambo tabajisi miyanda ibbide, balajata kwachiindi chiniini biyo. Nikwasika mapenzi nikuba kusyonsegwa nkaambo kajwi, balafwambaana kuwa.
MAR 4:18 Alubo bamwi, mbuli muse ulaamaamvwa muyakamizwa mbuto, balalimvwa jwi,
MAR 4:19 pesi masukusyo aanyika, kweenwa aabuvubi aziyandisyo zyazimwi zintu zyabuyo zilasika zyasyanikizya jwi, zyachita kuti litabi aamichelo.
MAR 4:20 Bamwi, mbuli muse uuvubide muyakabyalwa mbuto, balalimvwa jwi, balitambula, akuzyala michelo imwi makkumi otatwe, imwi makkumi musanu alimwi, imwi kusika mwaanda.”
MAR 4:21 Jesu wakati kuli mbabo, “Sena nga mweeta lambi kuti mulitibbike alusuwo, na kulibika muchinkuma chabulo? Ani nga tamulibiki atala aachibikilo chalyo na?
MAR 4:22 Nkaambo zintu zyoonse zisisidwe ziyooyubununwa, alimwi choonse chitibbikidwe chiyotibbulwa.
MAR 4:23 Kufumbwa ulamatwi akumvwa ngamvwe.”
MAR 4:24 Wakaya kunembo akubaambila kuti, “Amuchenjele loko nzimumvwa. Cheelesyo nchimubelesya anywebo muyoyelesegwa anchicho, nikuba kwindilila kulindinywe.
MAR 4:25 Nkaambo kufumbwa uujisi uyoopegwa zyiingi. Ooyo uutajisi, niziba nzyalaazyo uyoonyanzigwa.”
MAR 4:26 Alimwi wakati, “Mbobubede oobu bwami bwa Leza mbuli muntu uumiza mbuto aansi.
MAR 4:27 Mpawo uloona mansiku akubuka nibwacha, pesi mbuto ilamena akukomena, nikuba kuti tazi mbozichitika.
MAR 4:28 Muse awulike: ulamezya nseke zyamayila kusaanguna munsonga, kakutobela miyungi, mane miyungi yatuba.
MAR 4:29 Mayila mbaatuba biyo, ulabelesya chakunenzya, nkaambo chiindi chakutebula chasika.”
MAR 4:30 Alimwi wakati, “Sena niinzi nchitujnga tulachikozyanisya abwami bwa Leza, nakuti tubelesye chikozyanisyoonzi kubupandulula?
MAR 4:31 Buli mbuuli mbuto itegwa musitada, ni mbuto ndiini loko njobyala aansi.
MAR 4:32 Pesi niyabyalwa, ilakomena kwiinda zilimwa zyoonse zyamumuunda, kilaamitabi mipati izyakuti tuyuni tulakonzya kukala mumweenzule wayo.”
MAR 4:33 Jesu wakabaambila jwi kabelesya zikozyanisyo zyiingi mbuuli mbubalikumvwa,
MAR 4:34 mpawo taakwe nchaakabaambila pe katabelesezye chikozyanisyo. Pesi nakaba alike abasikwiiya bakwe, wakapandulula zyoonse.
MAR 4:35 Oobo buzuba, nilyakaba goko, wakati kuli mbabo, “Atuzubuke tuye mutala. ”
MAR 4:36 Bakasiya makamu makamu aabantu musule, bakamutobela, mubwaato mwakabede Jesu. Amwi maato akaliwo aalawo akamutobela.
MAR 4:37 Mbubakendeenda biyo kwakawunga guwo pati, alimwi mayuwe akalikukupila maanzi mubwaato, mane bwaato bwakasizule.
MAR 4:38 Jesu wakalilede kasegede musego, kusule mubwaato. Basikwiiya bakamubusya alimwi bakati kuli nguwe, “Omuyiisyi, sena tokwe nolikataazya nikuba kuti twaamba kufwa? ”
MAR 4:39 Wakabuka, wakalayilila guwo, alimwi wakati kumayuwe, “Umuna! Batama! ” Mpawo guwo lyakuumuna, mayuwe akayosa, kuumuna kuti zii!
MAR 4:40 Wakati kuli basikwiiya bakwe, “Nkamboonzi nimuyoowa boobu? Sena ambuli sunu tamunaba lusyomo na? ”
MAR 4:41 Bakayoowa loko alimwi bakabuzyania bati, “Ani ngwani ooyu, nkaambo guwo amayuwe zilamumvwa akumuswiilila?”
MAR 5:1 Bakazubuka lwizi baya kuchisi cha Jelasenesi.
MAR 5:2 Mpawaawo Jesu nakazwa mubwaato, mwaalumi wakanjidwe muuya mubi kazwa kuzibunda wakaza kuli nguwe.
MAR 5:3 Ooyu mwaalumi wakali kukkala kumawumbwe, alimwi katakwe naba umwi wakachili kukonzya kumwaanga, nikuba kuti wabelesya nsimbi.
MAR 5:4 Nkaambo chiindi chiingi wakanoonga waangwa nsimbi kumaboko akumawulu, pesi wakanoonga wazipasuula akutyola zyoonse nzyakanoonga waangwa aazyo. Takwe naba umwi wakali anguzu zyakumuzunda
MAR 5:5 Chiindi choonse sikati amansiku wakali kukwiila kumawumbwe amuzilundu akulichubbulula amabwe.
MAR 5:6 Lino naakabona Jesu kulekule, wakachijaana wakuwa bufugeme munsi lyamawulu aakwe, kunembo lyakwe.
MAR 5:7 Wakoompolola ajwi pati wati, “Uyaandanzi kulindime Jesu, Mwana wa Leza Mupati Kampatila? Ndakumbila muzina lya Leza kuti utandipenzyi pe! ”
MAR 5:8 Nkaambo Jesu wakali wati kuli nguwe, “Zwaa mumwaalumi oyu iwe nomuuya mubi!”
MAR 5:9 Lino Jesu wakabuzya kuti, “Nduweni izina lyako? ” Wakasandula wati, “Izina lyangu ndime Ligiyoni, nkaambo tulibayiingi. ”
MAR 5:10 Wakakombelezya Jesu kuti atabatandi pe kuzwa mubusena oobo.
MAR 5:11 Kwakali butanga bupati bwangulube bwakali kuchela aakalundu kali afwiifwi,
MAR 5:12 myuuya mibi yakakombelezya Jesu yati, “Tutandile mungulube; utuzumizye kuti tunjile mulinzizyo. ”
MAR 5:13 Wakayizumizya, elyo myuuya mibi yakazwa yaakunjila mungulube. Mweelwe uli zyuulu zibili wabutanga bwa ngulube zyakagwilimina kujenga zyaaliwalila mulwizi zyanikila
MAR 5:14 Aabo bakali kweembela ngulube bakachijanina kuyowaamba kudolopo amumyuunzi, lino bantu bakayinka kuyobona chakali chachitika.
MAR 5:15 Lino nibakasika kuli Jesu, bakamubona mwaalumi wakanjidwe ligiyoni wamyuuya mibi. Wakalikkede, kasamide, amizeezo yakwe yakali yaba kabotu. Eelyo bakayoowa.
MAR 5:16 Abo bakazibona bakaambila bantu azyakachitika kuli ooyu mwaalumi wakanjidwe muuya mubi, bakapandulula azyakachitika kungulube.
MAR 5:17 Mpawo bantu bakatanguna kumukombelezya Jesu kuti azwe muchisi chabo.
MAR 5:18 Lino Jesu nakaanjila mubwaato, mwaalumi wakanjidwe muuya mubi wakamukumbila kuti beende amwi.
MAR 5:19 Jesu wakamukakila, pesi wakati, “Kuya kumuunzi kuli bakulindinywe ukabaambile Mwami nzyaakuchitila, ambaakufwida luzyalo. ”
MAR 5:20 Eelyo mwaalumi ooyu wakeenda wakwaambila baku Dekkapolisi nzyakamuchitila Jesu. Mpawo bantu boonse bakagamba.
MAR 5:21 Lino Jesu naakazubuka lubo abwaato kuya mutala alwizi, bantu bayingi bakamubunganina kali kunkomwe yalwizi.
MAR 5:22 Lino umwi mweendelezi wachikombelo utegwa Jayilosi, wakaya nkukooko. Naakabona Jesu, wakawida kumawulu aakwe.
MAR 5:23 Mpawo wakamukombelezya chamoyo woonse wati, “Mwanaangu musimbi waamba kufwa, wenche kuza umubike maboko, ulasilikwa apone. ” Lino Jesu wakeenda awe.
MAR 5:24 Bantu bayiingi bakamutobela bamubunganina bamubika aakati.
MAR 5:25 Mpawo awo kwakali mwanakazi wakali kuchiswa kalobola kwaminyaka ilikkumi ayibili.
MAR 5:26 Wakafwaba kapati loko mukusilikwa abasilisi bayingi, alubo wakamana lubono lwake loonse. Nikuba boobo taakwe nakapona pe, bulwazi bwakayindilila.
MAR 5:27 Kali wamvwa impuwo zya Jesu, wakasika wanjila munkamu kusule lya Jesu wajata chisamo chakwe.
MAR 5:28 Nkaambo wakayeeya kuti, “Kufumbwa ndaguma chisamo chakwe ndilapona. ”
MAR 5:29 Mpawo awo bulowa bwakagama, alimwi wakamvwa mumubili wakwe kuti wapona bulwazi bwakwe.
MAR 5:30 Mpawo awo Jesu wakamvwa kuti nguzu zyamana mumubil wakwe. Wakachebukila musule wabuzya wati, “ani ngwani waguma chisamo changu? ”
MAR 5:31 Basikwiiya bakwe bakasandula bati, nga ulabuzya biyeni kuti, “ngwani wandiguma? ” Kubwene bantu bayiingi balikubunganidile bakubikkide akati.
MAR 5:32 Pesi Jesu wakachiliswini kalanguula oyo wakamuguma.
MAR 5:33 Lino mwanakazi olya mbwakalizi zyoonse zyakachitika alinguwe, wakaza kuli Jesu wawa kumawulu akwe, kazazama mukuyoowa, wamwaambila choonzyo chakachitika.
MAR 5:34 Lino wakamwaambila kuti, “Mwanaangu lusyomo lwako lwakuponia. Kuya muluumuno, waangunuke kuzwa mumafwabi ako.”
MAR 5:35 Lino Jesu kachaambula, kwakasika bamwi bantu bakazwa kung'anda yaJayilosi Muzulwidi wambungano bati, “uchimukatazizyaanzi Muyiisi, ” teemwanaako musimbi wafwa kale?.”
MAR 5:36 Jesu tatambwide pe ezizyakali kwaambuulwa, wakaambila Jayilosi kuti, “Syoma utayoowi pe. ”
MAR 5:37 Wakeenda aPita, Jemusi aJoni mukulana waJemusi, tewakazumizya bantu bayiingi pe.
MAR 5:38 Lino nibakasika kung'anda yamweendelezi wachikombelo, Jesu wakabona kunyongana, akuchundaana kwabantu balila akomooka kupati.
MAR 5:39 Mpawo wakanjila mukati wabaambila kuti, “Nkaambonzi nimunyongana akoomoka, Mwana tafwide pe uledebiyo? ”
MAR 5:40 Mpawo bakamuseka. Lino naakamana kubatandila anze boonse, wakabweza wisi amusimbi abanyina abasikwiiya mbakali abo, wanjila omo mwakali mwana.
MAR 5:41 Wakajata luboko lwamusimbi wamwaambila kuti, “Talita kkumi! ” (chaamba kuti, kasimbi buka! ”)
MAR 5:42 Mpawo awo musimbi wakanyampuka, weendeenda (wakali aminyaka ilikkumi ayibili). Alizeezi, bantu bakagambwa loko.
MAR 5:43 Wakabaambila malayilile mayumu akuti bataambili muntu atala azyakachitika, mpawo wakati amumupe chakulya.
MAR 6:1 Wakazwa awo mpawo waya ku chisi chakulimbabo, mpawo basikwiiya bakwe bakamutobela.
MAR 6:2 Lino buzuba bwa Sabata nibwakasika, wakatalika kuyiisya muchikombelo. Bantu bayiingi bakamumvwa kayiisya bakagamba. Bakabuzya kuti, “Ooyu mwaalumi wakazijana kuli njiisyo eez? i” “Mbusongoonzi mbwapedwe?” “Maleele alibuti aaya ngachita amaanza aakwe?”
MAR 6:3 “Ooyu teensi nguwena mubezi mwana wa Meli? Mwana wakwabo waJemusi, Josefa, Judasi aSayimoni? Bachizi bakwe teensi mbabo aaba mbitulabo na? Mpawo bakamubijilwa Jesu.
MAR 6:4 Jesu wakati kulimbabo, “Musinsimi tajani bulemu pe, kunze kwamuchisi, amung'anda mwazyalwa aakati kabasinzubo zyakwe. ”
MAR 6:5 Tewakakonzya pe kuchita malele, kunze kwakukumbila biyo bachiswa akubabikka maboko akubasilika.
MAR 6:6 Alimwi kutasyoma kwabo kwakamugambya. Wakeendeenda mugunzi eelyo kayabuyiisya.
MAR 6:7 Mpawo wakayita bali kkumi ababili wabatuma babili babili akubapa nguzu zyakuzunda myuuya mibi,
MAR 6:8 mpawo wakabaambila kuti tababwezi chintu mulweendo lwabo kunze, chakulya niiba nkomwe niiba mali mumikumba yanu kunze amufunko,
MAR 6:9 pesi basame nsangu pesi batabwezi zisamo zimbi.
MAR 6:10 Mpawo wakati kuibabo, “Nimuyoonjila mumuunzi mukkale mumo omo lumwi do mukazwe mugunzi eelyo.
MAR 6:11 Na kulibusena nkubakaka kumutambula nikuba kumuswiilizya, nimuyozwa mubusena oobo, mukasansamune lusuko kumawulu anu bukabe bukamboni atala lyambabo.”
MAR 6:12 Bakazwa baya kukukambawuka kuti bantu basanduke.
MAR 6:13 Bakaanda myuuya mibi miingi mpawo bakananika bachiswa bayiingi amafuta alimwi bakapona.
MAR 6:14 Mwami Helodi wakazimvwa eezi, nkaambo zina lya Mwami Jesu lyakali lyazibikana loko. Bamwi bakati, “Amwi ngu Joni Mubbabbatizyi wabusigwa kuzwa kubafu, nkikaako nguzu zyamalele nzizilikubeleka mulinguwe. ”
MAR 6:15 Bamwi bakati, “Ngu Elayija”. Alimwi bamwi bakati, “Musinsimi, nguumwi wabasinsimi bachiindi.”
MAR 6:16 Pesi Helodi naakamvwa obu wakati, “Joni mwaalumi oolya ngundakadunsula mutwe wakabusigwa kuzwa kubafu. ”
MAR 6:17 Nkaambo Helodi lwake ngwakali wapa nguzu kuti Joni aangwe, alimwi wakaangwa akubikwa muntolongo nkaambo ka Helodiyasi (muka Filipi mwanana wakwabo) ngwakali wakwata.
MAR 6:18 Nkaambo Joni wakanoonga waambila Helodi kuti, “Tachili chibotu kuti ukwate mukayintu wamwana wakwenu. ”
MAR 6:19 Lino Helodiyasi wakalijisi mfwindilili yakuyanda kujeya Joni, pesi tewakakonzya pe,
MAR 6:20 nkaambo Helodi wakali kumuyoowa Joni; wakalimwizi kuti muntu ululeme kali musalali, aboobo wakali kumutabilila. kumuswiilila kwakalikumunyongania loko, pesi wakalikumumvwa chiindi choonse kawangunukide.
MAR 6:21 Lino mweenya wakaba awo Helodi naakachita pobwe lyakuzyalwa kwakwe mpawo wakachita pobwe pati kachitila bapati abasilumamba bakwe, abeendelezi bapati bamu Galili.
MAR 6:22 Mpawo mwana musimbi waHelodiyasi nakasika wazyana, zyakabotezya Helodi abeenzu bakatambidwe kupobwe. Lino Mwami wakati kumusimbi, “Ndikumbile kufumbwa nchuyanda, ndilakupa.”
MAR 6:23 Mpawo wakamusyomezya achikonke wati, “Kufumbwa nchuyokumbila nichiba chipanzi cha bwami bwangu, ndilakupa. ”
MAR 6:24 Wakazwa waya kuli banyina wakwaamba kuti, “Ngandilakumbilaanzi? ” Banyina bakati, “Mutwe wa Joni Mubbabbatizyi”
MAR 6:25 Mpawo aawo wakanjila akufwabaana kuMwami achikumbilo chakwe wakwaamba wati: “Ndiyanda kuti lino, undipe mutwe waJoni Mubbabbatizya mukasuwo.”
MAR 6:26 Nikuba kuti eechi chakamuchisa loko mwami, pesi nkaambo kachikonke achikumbizyo, antoomwe abeenzu bakwe taakayanda kumukakila pe.
MAR 6:27 Mpawo wakafwambaana kutuma silumamba kuti akeete mutwe waJoni. Lino wakeenda wakudunsula mutwe waJoni muntolongo,
MAR 6:28 mpawo wawuleta mukasuwo wamupa musimbi oyo, mpawo musimbi, wakatola kuli banyina.
MAR 6:29 Nibakamvwa oobo, basikwiiya baJoni bakaza kuzobweza mutumba akuubaamba muchibunda.
MAR 6:30 Mmpawo baTumwa, bakamubunganina Jesu, bamwaambila zyoonse nzibakachita akuyiisya.
MAR 6:31 Lino nkaambo kakuti bantu bayiingi bakalikuza kabeenda kabatakwe nibajana chiindi chakuti balye, wakati kulimbabo, “Muzide okuno kusitikide mulyookezye. ”
MAR 6:32 Bakeenda muli chabochabo mubwaato bazubuka baya kutakwe bantu pe.
MAR 6:33 Lino bamwi bakababona nibakazubuka bakabaziba mpawo bakeenda amawulu kuzwa mumyuunzi yoonse bakubatangunina kusika.
MAR 6:34 Lino nibakasika kuchito Jesu wakabona makamu makamu abantu, wakabafwida luzyalo, nkaambo bakali mbuli mbelele zitakwe mweembeli. Mpawo wakatanguna kubayiisya zintu zyiingi.
MAR 6:35 Lino muchiindi eechi lyakali lyaba goko, basikwiiya bakwe bakaza kuli nguwe bakati, “Okuno nkubusena butakwe chintu, alubo chiindi chamana.
MAR 6:36 Baande bantu aba baye mumyuunzi izyungulukide munyika oomu bakalyulile chakulya.”
MAR 6:37 Pesi wakabasandula wati, “Mubape chakulya ndinywe. ” Bakati kuli nguwe, “Nga tulayinka na tukawule mikamu yachinkwa yiita myaanda yobile yama denari kuti tubape balye?”
MAR 6:38 Wakababuzya wati, “Mujisi zinkwa zingane? Mwiinke mukalange. ” Nibakalanguula bakati, “Tujisi zinkwa zili musanu abaswi babili.”
MAR 6:39 Wakabalayilila kuti baambile bantu boonse kuti bakkale muzibumga zibumga abwizu butete.
MAR 6:40 Mpawo bakakkala ansi muzibunga; muzibunga zyamyaanda azya makumi musanu.
MAR 6:41 Wakabweza zinkwa zili musanu abaswi babili, mpawo wakalanga kujulu, wakapa kulumba elyo wakakwamuna zinkwa mpawo wazipa kuli baikwiiya kuti bape bantu. wakakwamuna baswi babili mpawo wabapa boonse.
MAR 6:42 Bakalya boonse bakkuta.
MAR 6:43 Bakabwezelela bufwefwelenga bwazinkwa, abaswi bwakachala bazuzya zisuwo zili kkumi azibili.
MAR 6:44 Imweelwe wabaluumi bakalya wakali kusika kuzyuulu zili musanu.
MAR 6:45 Mpawaawo wakaambila basikwiiya bakwe kuti banjile mubwaato bazulule baye mutala, ku Betisayida, wakaambila bantu kuti bamwayike.
MAR 6:46 Nibakeenda, wakaya kuchilundu kuti akakombe.
MAR 6:47 Lino nilyakaba goko, bwaato bwakali akati kalwizi, we wakachaala alikke kunze.
