MAR 6:48 Wakabona kuti kuti balokuzundaana aluuwo, nkaambo luuwo lwakabalwanisya. Achiindi chamansiku wakeenda atala ameenda, kaya kuli mbabo. Wakali wamba kubayinda kumbali.
MAR 6:49 Pesi nibakamubona keenda atala alwizi, bakayeeyanga ncheelo, bakoomba,
MAR 6:50 nkaambo boonse nibakamubona bakayoowa. Mpawo awo wakabaambuuzya wati, “Mujate moyo! Ndime. Mutayoowipe!”
MAR 6:51 Elyo wakatanta mubwaaato ambabo, mpawo luuwo lwakamana. Bakagambwa loko,
MAR 6:52 mbokunga tebakamvwisisisya pe atala azinkwa; myoyo yabo yakayumisigwa.
MAR 6:53 Lino nibakazubukila mutala, bakasika ku Jenesaleti bakaanga bwaato kunkomwe yalwizi.
MAR 6:54 Kabachizwa biyo mubwaato bantu batalika kumuziba Jesu.
MAR 6:55 Bakachijaana chisi choonse alimwi bakabweza bachiswa amalo akubatola oko kufumbwa nkubakamvwa kuti nkwabede.
MAR 6:56 Lino kufumbwa kumyuunzi nkwakaya, kumadolopo naanka kumabazu anyika bakalikubikka bachiswa muzisambalilo. Bakamukumbila kuti bajate chisamo chakwe, abaabo bakajata bakaponesegwa.
MAR 7:1 BaFalisi abamwi bayiisyi bamulawu bakali bazwa ku Jelusalema bakamubunganina
MAR 7:2 Mpawo bakabona bamwi basikwiiya bakwe kabanikulya chakulya amaboko “atasalali, ” nkukuti, atasambide.
MAR 7:3 (BaFalisi abaJuda boonse tabalyi chakulya kabatasambide maboko pe mbuli kuchiyanza chabo, nkaambo bajisi mbuli tunsiyasiya twabapati.
MAR 7:4 Nibazwa kuzisambalilo ba Falisi tabalyi pe kabatasambide. Balalondola atumwi tunsiyansiya twiingi, tuli mbuli kusanzya nkomechi, nongo zyameenda azilongo nzikbalida.)
MAR 7:5 Lino baFalisi abayiisyi bamulawu bakabuzya Jesu bati, “Nkaamboonzi basikwiiya bako nibatalondoli tunsiyansiya twabapati, balalya kabatasambide?”
MAR 7:6 Wakabasandula wati, “Isaya wakasinsima kabotu aatala andinywe nibasikuupawupa; mbuli mbaakalemba kuti: 'Aba bantu bandilemeka amilomo yabo, pesi myoyo yabo ilikule andime.
MAR 7:7 Nkombyo zyabo tazikwe nchizyaamba, bayiisya milawu yabantu aziyanza zyabo.'
MAR 7:8 Mwakalekezya milawu yaLeza, mpawo mwajatisya ziyanza zyabantu. ”
MAR 7:9 Mpawo wakabaambila wati, “Mujisi nzila inembene yakusunzulusya mulawu waLeza akuubikka kumbali kuti mulondole kabotu tunsiyansiya twanu!
MAR 7:10 Mozesi wakati, 'Lemeka wuso abanyoko,' akuti 'kufumbwa muntu utukila wisi abayina, weelede kujeegwa.'
MAR 7:11 Pesi nywe mulati, 'Na muntu waamba kuli wisi abanyina, kuti “Kufumbwa zilibiyeni nzimwakagwasigwa kulindime ngu ‘Kkobbani’ (nkukuti, 'Nchilumbyo cha Leza',) -
MAR 7:12 elyo tamumuzumizyi kuti achitile wisi abanyina chimwi chintu.
MAR 7:13 Mulalobya ijwi lya Leza nkaambo katunsiyansiya twanu ntumwakabamba. Alimwi mulachita zintu zyiingi zili mbuli eezyo.”
MAR 7:14 Mpawo Jesu wakayita makamumakamu abantu wati kulimbabo, “Amundiswilizye, moonse, mumvwisisisye.
MAR 7:15 Takwe chili kunze amuntu chikonzya kumuninaania kuti chanjila mulinguwe. Chininaania muntu ncheecho chizwa mukati mumoyo wamuntu nchimuninaania.”
MAR 7:16 
MAR 7:17 Jesu kali wasiya makamumakamu aabantu akunjila mung'anda, basikwiiya bakwe bakamubuzya atala achikozyano eechi.
MAR 7:18 Jesu wakati, “Tamunaaba akumvwisisisya pe? ” Tamubwene na kuti taakwe chinjila mumuntu chili kunze kwamuntu chinga chilamuninaania chanjila mukati mulinguwe, mbukunga
MAR 7:19 tachinjili mumoyo wakwe pesi muubula biyo mpawo chazwa kunze. ” Mukwaamba oobu Jesu wakasalazya zyakulya zyoonse.
MAR 7:20 Wakati, “Chizwa mumuntu nchichita kuti aninaane.
MAR 7:21 Nkaambo mukati ka myoyo ya bantu, muzwa mizeezo mibi, buyangwe, kubba, bujayi,
MAR 7:22 bwamu, bwaanka, luuni, lweeno, cheendwe, ibbivwe, kusinga, kulipunayizya abufubafuba.
MAR 7:23 Zibi eezi zyoonse zizwa mumoyo nzizininaania muntu.”
MAR 7:24 Wakanyampuka aabusena oobo akuya kuchlikiti cha chaTaya a Sidon. Wakanjila mung'anda alimwi tewakayanda kuti azibinkane kuti mpali amuntu naba omwe, nekuba boobo wakakachilwa kuyuba kuti bantu batamuboni.
MAR 7:25 Mpawaawo umwi mwanakazi wakali amwana wakanjidwe muuya mubi, mbakamvwa biyo aatala aJesu wakaza wawida kumawulu aakwe.
MAR 7:26 Mwanakazi oyu wakali wamusyobo waba Gilikki wakazyalilwa kuSiliya Fonisiya. Wakakumbila Jesu kuti atande muuya mubi uzwe mumwana wakwe.
MAR 7:27 Wakamwaambila wati, “Weelede kulekela bana kuti balye saansi. Nkaambo tachili kabotupe kubweza chakulya chabana mpawo usowele bankala. ”
MAR 7:28 Pesi wakamuvwiila wati, “Iiyi, Mwami, nekubaboobo alabo bankala balabwezelela bumbulumbulu bulosya bana munsi lyatafula.”
MAR 7:29 Mpawo wakamwaambila kuti, “Mbwasandula obo, enda biyo, muuya mubi wazwa kale mumwana wako. ”
MAR 7:30 Mpawo wakajoka kung'anda wajana mwana ulilede abulo, muuya mubi kali wazwa kale.
MAR 7:31 Lino Jesu wakazwa kubusena bwaTaya wakeenda wayinda muSidoni, katozya kulwizi lwaGalili mpawo wanjila muchilikiti chaDekkapolisi.
MAR 7:32 Ooku, bamwi bantu bakamweetela mwaalumi musinkematwi kali sichilimilimi, mpawo bakamukumbila kuti amubikke luboko lwakwe amuponisye.
MAR 7:33 Wakamubweza wakamugwisya mubantu biingi wamutola kumbali, wakamunjizya minwe mumatwi. naakaswida wamudompa alulimi.
MAR 7:34 Mpawo wakalungumana walanga kujulu, woompomoka wati kulinguwe, “Efata, ” nkukwaamba kuti, “Sinkuka! ”.
MAR 7:35 Nizyakachitwa eezi mwaalumi oolya akasinkuka matwi aakwe, lulimi lwakwe lwakaangunuka mpawo watanguna kwaambuula kabotu.
MAR 7:36 Wakabalayilila kuti bataambili bantu. Pesi nakanoonga wabalayilila oobu, bantu nibakayindilila loko kwaambuula azyakachitika.
MAR 7:37 Bantu bakazula kugamba kabaamba kuti, “Uchita kabotu loko muzintu zyoonse ulaponia basinkematwi abasichilimilimi.”
MAR 8:1 Kumazuba ayo, kwakaba alubo bantu bayingi loko, alimwi kabatajisi nekuba chakulya. Jesu wakayita basikwiya bakwe mpawo wakati kulimbabo,
MAR 8:2 “Ndamvwa lweetelelo amakani nkaambo bakendelela kunembo kabali ambebo kale kwamazuba otatwe alimwi kabatakwe nchebakalya.
MAR 8:3 Na ndabambila kuti kabaya kumyuunzi yabo katakwe nchebalya, bayoowizuka munzila. Bamwi babo bazwa musinzo mulamfu”.
MAR 8:4 Basikwiiya bakwe bakamusandula, “Nkukuli nkotuyojana chinkwa chizulide mubusena buyuminide buyokkutya bantu aba?”
MAR 8:5 Wakababuzya, “Mujisi zinkwa zyongane?” Bakamba kuti, “Musanu azibili”.
MAR 8:6 Wakalayilila makamu kuti akkale ansi. Wakabweza zinkwa musanu azibili, wakapa kulumba alimwi wakazikwamuna. Wakapa basikwiiya bakwe kuti babikke kunembo lyabo, alimwi bakabikka kunembo lyamakamu.
MAR 8:7 Aboobo bakala answi ziche, nakamana kupa kulumbila mbabo, wakalayilila basikwiiya kuti baabe azezi lubo.
MAR 8:8 Bakalya pele bakakkuta, pele bakabwezazelela bufwefwelenga bwakachala, insuwo mpati zilimusanu azibili.
MAR 8:9 Kwakachibe zyuulu zyoone zyabantu.
MAR 8:10 Mpawo wakabatuma kuti beende. Nibakamana bakanjila mubwaato abasikwiiya bakwe, alimwi bakaya kuchisi chaku Dayimanuta.
MAR 8:11 Mpawo baFalisi bakasika anze kumukanza. Bakakumbila zitondezyo zyakujulu, kuti bamusunke.
MAR 8:12 Wakagamba kapati wayoyela mukati wamba wati, “Nkambonzi izyalane eli niliyandula zitondezyo? Nchobeni ndamwambila kuti, takwe chitondezyo nchiyopegwa kuzyalane eli”.
MAR 8:13 Mpawo wakabasiya, wabweeda mubwaato lubo, akwiinka kulubazu lumbi.
MAR 8:14 Lino basikwiiya bakaluba kubweza chinkwa beni. Tebakachilikwe chinkwa nikuba chomwe mubwaato.
MAR 8:15 Wakabalayilila wakati, “Mube akulangila alimwi muchenjele kubumena bwama Falisi akubumena bwa Heloda”.
MAR 8:16 Basikwiiya bakabonisyana umwi awumwi, “Nkambo kakuti tatukwe chinkwa”.
MAR 8:17 Jesu wakaziziba ezi, wakati kuli mbabo, “Nkambonzi nimulikubonisyana akubula chinkwa? Sa tamuna kubona? Sa tamuna kumvwisya? Sa myoyo yanu ichilimiyumu?
MAR 8:18 Mula ameso, tamuboni na? Mulamatwi, tamumvwi na? Sa tamuyeyi?
MAR 8:19 Nindaka kwamuna zinkwa zilimusanu mumwelwe wamusanu wazyuulu, nzingane nsuwo zyakazwide zyabufwefwelenga bwazinkwa nzimwakabwezelela? Bakati kulinguwe, “Ikkumi azibili.
MAR 8:20 “Nindakakwamuna zinkwa zilimusanu azibili mumwele wazyuulu zine, nzingane nsuwo zyabufwefwelenga bwazinkwa nzemwakabweza?” Bakati kulinguwe, “Musanu azibili”.
MAR 8:21 Wakati, “Sa tamunakumvwisya na?”
MAR 8:22 Bakasika kuBetisayida. Bantu bankuko bakamwetela umwi mwalumi mofu alimwi bakakumbila Jesu kuti amugume.
MAR 8:23 Jesu wakajata mwalumi mofu ajanza, akumutola kumbali agunzi. Nakasikaswida aansi wakanda bulongo wakamunanika kumeso akwe akumubikka janza lyakwe, wakamubuzya, “Kuli nchwabona na?”
MAR 8:24 Wakalanga kujulu wakati, Ndabona balumi balangika anga minsamu ilokweenda.
MAR 8:25 Alimwi wakabikka lubo maanza atala ameso akwe, aboobo mwalumi wakabona, meso akwe akabweda, akubona zintu zyoonse chaantanganana.
MAR 8:26 Jesu wakamutuma wakati koya kumunzi wanu, “Utakunjili mudolopo”.
MAR 8:27 Jesu wakiinka abasikwiiya bakwe mugunzi lyaKayisala Filipo. Kabachili munzila wakabuzya basikwiiya bakwe, “Bantu bandamba kuti ndimeni?”
MAR 8:28 Bakamusandula bakati, “Joni muBbizyi. Bamwi baamba kuti Eliya, abamwi, nduwe umwi wabasinsimi”.
MAR 8:29 Wakababuzya, “Pele nywebo mundamba kuti ndimeni?” Pita wakati kulinguwe, “Nduwe Kilisito”
MAR 8:30 Jesu wakabachenjezya kuti batambili nikuba umwi atala anguwe.
MAR 8:31 Wakasanguna kubayiisya atala akuti Mwana Muntu uyofwabisigwa muzintu zyingi, alimwi uyokukakwa abapati akuba payizi bami akubalembi, akuyojayigwa, pele mumazuba atatu uyobuka.
MAR 8:32 Wakamba makani aya chaantanganana. Mpawo Pita wakamutola kumbali akumukalalila
MAR 8:33 Pele Jesu wakachebuka akulanga basikwiiya bakwe mpawo wakakalalila Pita wakati, “Kozwa kusule lyangu, Satani! Tubikkide miyeyo yako kuzintu zya-Leza, pele kuzintu zyabantu”.
MAR 8:34 Mpawo wakayita makamu abasikwiiya antoomwe, wakabambila kuti, “Na kulumwi uyanda kunditobela welede kulitakata lwakwe mwini, abweze chingano chakwe, akunditobela
MAR 8:35 Kufumbwa uyanda kufutula buumi bwakwe uyobuswekelwa, ayoyo usweekelwa bumi bwakwe akuyanda kwangu akujwi lyangu uyobujana.
MAR 8:36 Nimpindunzi njajana muntu kukuvuba nyika yoonse alimwi akuyoswekelwa buumi bwakwe?
MAR 8:37 Nchili muntu nchakonzya kupa kwinda buumi bwakwe?
MAR 8:38 Kufumbwa ufwa nsoni akaambo kangu amajwi angu muchibaka chamamambe achibi chazyalane, Mwana aMuntu uyowusigwa nsoni anguwe nakusika mubulemu bwaWisi antoomwe abangelo basalala”.
MAR 9:1 Wakati kulimbabo, “Nchobeni ndati kuli ndinywe, mpubali bamwi banu bayimvwi awa katakoyofwa banjila kabatana bona Bwami bwakujulu bwa-Leza busika kabuli anguzu.
MAR 9:2 Nikwakayinda mazuba alimusanu alimwi, Jesu wakabweza Pita, Jemusi aJoni wakeenda ambabo atala amulundu, lwakwe ambabo. Mpo wakasanduka kunembo lyabo.
MAR 9:3 Zyakusama zyakwe zyakangayima, zyakatubisisya kwiindilila loko kutuba kwiinda chintu chitubisisya munyika chinga chilakonzya kupenda chimwi.
MAR 9:4 Mpawo Elayija kali aMozesi wakalibonya kulimbabo alimwi wakalikwambula a Jesu.
MAR 9:5 Pita wakasandula akwamba kuti kuli Jesu, “Muyiisi, nchibotu kuba ano toonse, atuyake zilawu zyotatwe, chimwi chibe chako, chimwi chibe chaMozesi alimwi chimwi chibe cha Eliya”.
MAR 9:6 (Takalizi zyakwamba, nkambo wakali yowede.)
MAR 9:7 Ijoba lyakasika akubavumba. Mpawo ijwi lyakazwa mujoba,”Ooyu ngomwana wangu ngundiyandisya. Amumuswiilile”.
MAR 9:8 Aboobo, nibakalanga kumbali, bakabona kakutachikwe muntu akati kabo pesi Jesu alikke.
MAR 9:9 Nibakalikuya buseluka kuzwa achilundu, wakabalayilila kuti tabelede kubuzya kufumbwa omwe nzibakabona kusikila Mwana aMuntu akabuke kuzwa kubafu.
MAR 9:10 Mpo bakabamba twaambo twabo beni, pesi bakazuwisyana lwabo beni ninzi “Kubuka kuzwa kubafu” zyambaayi.
MAR 9:11 Bakamubuzya, “Nkambonzi balembi nibakati Eliya nguyelede kutalika kusika?”
MAR 9:12 Wakati kulimbabo, “Eliya ulelede kutalika kusika kuzobambulula zintu zyoonse. Lino nkaambonzi nikulembedwe kuti Mwana waMuntu nelede kufwabisigwa kuzintu zyiingi akunyonganisigwa?
MAR 9:13 Pesi ndamwambila kuti Eliya wasika, bakachita kufumbwa nzibayanda kuchita alinguwe mbuli mbukulembedwe atala anguwe”.
MAR 9:14 Mpawo nibakasika kuli basikwiiya, bakabona makamu abantu kabazyungulikide.
MAR 9:15 Mpo balembi bakali kukazyanya ambabo. Lino nibakabona Jesu, makamu woonse akagamba nibakamuchijanina bakamujuzya.
MAR 9:16 Wakabuzya basikwiiya bakwe, “Mulikukazyananzi ambabo?”
MAR 9:17 Umwi wakalinkamu wakasandula, “Omwiiyi, ndeeta mwana wangu kulinduwe ulamuuya umwiita kuti atambuulipe.
MAR 9:18 Umumana manguzu akumuwunsizya ansi akuzwa kkovu mumulomo, ngawayuma ntwiinyo, akuyuma mubili. Ndakabuzya basikwiiya bako kuti bamugusye asi bakakachilwa”.
MAR 9:19 Wakabasandula, “Mazyalane atasyomi, ndakkala andinywe kwachiindi chilibuti? Ndiyomukombelezya kuchiindi chilibuti? Mumweete kuli ndime”
MAR 9:20 Bakamweta mulombe kulinguwe. Kuchindi muuya nwakabona Jesu, mpawo awo lyakamuwisya lyamupa kugwigwima. Mulombe wakawida ansi akuzwa ikkovu mumulomo.
MAR 9:21 Jesu wakabuzya wisi, “Kwaba chiindi chilibiyeni kazichitikana?” Wisi wakati, “Kuzwa kachili mwanikenike”.
MAR 9:22 Chimuwisizya mumulilo kkana mumanzi akwezya kumujeyakuti kukonzya kuchita kufumbwa, tufwide luzyalo utugwasye”.
MAR 9:23 Jesu wakati kulinguwe, “Kuti kazikonzeka zyoonse zintu zilakonzeka kuliyoyo usyoma!”
MAR 9:24 Mpawo wisi wamwana wakalila akwamba kuti, “Ndimusyomi! kondigwasya akutasyoma kwangu!”
MAR 9:25 Jesu nakabona makamu kabachijanina, wakatanda myuuya mibi akwaamba kuti, “Nutambuli nutamvwi ndakwambila kuti, zwamulinguwe, utazobi nunjila lubo mulinguwe”.
MAR 9:26 Lyakalila akugwigwimya mulombe akuzwa mulinguwe. Mulombe wakalanga mbuli wakalifwide, biingi bakati,”Ulifwide”.
MAR 9:27 Pele Jesu wakamubeza aluboko wamunyampula, mulombe wakayimikila.
MAR 9:28 Jesu nakasika munganda, basikwiiya bakamubuzya chakusisikizya, “Nkambonzi nitwatalitanda?”
MAR 9:29 Wakati kulumbabo, “Ezi zyamisyobo oyu tazitandiki pesi akukomba”.
MAR 9:30 Bakeenda kuzwa awo akwiinda muGalilaya. Takalikuyanda kufumbwa kuti bazibe nkubakabede,
MAR 9:31 nakalikuyiisya basikwiiya bakwe. Wakati kulimbabo, “Mwanamuntu uyopendekezegwa mumaboko amuntu, alimwi bayomujeya. Natayobikwe kulufu, nikutakayinde mazuba atatu uyobuka kuzwa kubafu.
MAR 9:32 Pesi tebakazimvwisisisya pe nzyakali kwamba, alimwi bakalikuyowa kumubuzya.
MAR 9:33 Mpawo nibakasika kuKkapenamu. Mpawo nakanjila munganda wakababuzya, Mwalikwambanzi munzila?”
MAR 9:34 Pesi bakawumuna. Mbulikuti bakalibuya bukazyanya awumwi amwenzinyina kabali munzila atala akuti ngwani mupati.
MAR 9:35 Nakakkala ansi, wakayita basikwiiya bakwe bali kkumi ababili kabali boonse alimwi wakati kulimbabo, “Na kuli uyanda kuba wakusanguna, welede kuba wakumaninsizya kuli boonse akubalanda boonse”.
MAR 9:36 Wakabweza mwana munini wakamibikka akati kabo. Wakamubweza akumubikka amakwiko akwe alimwi wakati kulimbabo,
MAR 9:37 “Kufumbwa utambula mwana oyu muzina lyangu watambula ndime, kufumbwa oyo unditambula tatambuli ndime pesi utambula oyo wakandituma”.
MAR 9:38 Joni wakati, “Muyiisi, twabona umwi katanda badayimona munzina lyako alimwi twamukasya, nkaambo tatutobeli pe”.
MAR 9:39 Pesi Jesu wakati, “Mutamukasyi, mbulikuti takwe utakachite milimu mipati muzina lyangu alimwi mbulikuzwa awo bakambule kufumbwa zili atala andime.
MAR 9:40 Kufumbwa utakazyani andiswe ngwesu.
MAR 9:41 Kufumbwa ukupa nkomesi yamanzi kuti unywe muzina lyangu nkambo uzwa kwaKilisito, nchobeni ndamwambila kuti, takoyoyibulikilwa impindu yakwe.
MAR 9:42 Kufumbwa uchita banikenike bandisyoma kui bae, zinoli zibotu kulinguwe kuti abeze ibwe asungililwe munsingo yakwe alimwi awalwe mulwizi.
MAR 9:43 Naa kuboko kwako kwakubisizya, kudunsule. Nchibotu kunjila mubwami bwakubotelwa kwiinda kuba amaboko abili alimwi wakuwida mubbibi lyamulilo, kumulilo utazimi.
MAR 9:44 Munchali 44mutabikkilizidwe mu ULB. Amba kuti ichikoye chabo tachikoyofwa, alimwi mulilo tukoyozimwa.
MAR 9:45 Na kuulu kwako kwakuchita kuti ubisye, kudunsule. Nchibotu kunjila mubuumi bwakubotelwa kuli chilema kwiinda kuba amawulu abili alimwi wakuwida mubbibi lyamulilo.
MAR 9:46 Munchali 46 tabikkidwe pe mu ULB. Amba kuti ichikonye chabo tachikoyofwa, alimwi mulilo tukoyozimwa.
MAR 9:47 Na liso lyako lyakuchita kuti ubisye, ligusye. Nchibotu kunjila mubwami bwakujulu aliso limwi kwiinda kuba ameso abili wakuwisigilwa mubbibi lyamulilo,
MAR 9:48 kutayofwa kwachikonye chabo, mulilo tukoyozima.
MAR 9:49 Nkaambo moonse muyolungwa amunyo wamulilo.
MAR 9:50 Munyo mubotu, pesi kuti munyo wasapuka, ulachitwa biyeni kuti ube munyo lubo? Amube munyo nywebo nobeni, alimwi mube alumuno kuli umwi awumwi”.
MAR 10:1 Jesu nakazwa kubusena obo waya kuchisi chaku Judiya a kubusena bwamutala a mulongaJodani, alimwi bantu biingi bakaza lubo kulinguwe. Wakali kubayiisya lubo, mbuli mbakali wazibila kuchita.
MAR 10:2 Mpawo baFalisi bakaza kulinguwe kuzomusunka alimwi bakmubuzya kuti, “Chili mumulawu na kuti mwalumi aleke banakwe?” Wakasandula,
MAR 10:3 “Wakamulayilila buti Mozesi?”
MAR 10:4 Bakati, “Mozesi wakazuminina mwalumi kulemba lugwalo lwakulekana alimwi akumutanda”.
MAR 10:5 “Nkuyuma kwamyoyo yanu chakapa kuti alembe mulawo oyu”, Jesu wakabambila.
MAR 10:6 “Pele kuzwa kumatalikilo akulenga, 'Leza wakababumba, mwalumi amwanakazi'.
MAR 10:7 “Akambo kachechi mwalumi uyozwa kuliwisi abanyina
MAR 10:8 alimwi akakkale abanakwe, alimwi bobile bayooba nyama yomwe! Aboobo tabachili bobile pe, pele nyama yomwe”.
MAR 10:9 Aboobo Leza nzyaswanizya antoomwe, kutakabi muntu uzyaanzania”.
MAR 10:10 Awo nibakali mun'anda, basikwiiya bakamubuzya lubo aatala achechi.
MAR 10:11 Wakati kulimbabo, “Naba ani uleka mwanakazi akukwata umbi wamuchita bumambi.
MAR 10:12 Naa mukayintu waleka mulumi wakwe wakwatwa awumbi mwalumi, wachita bumambi”.
MAR 10:13 Mpawo bakeeta bana babo banini kulinguwe kuti abagume, pele basikwiiya bakabakalalila.
MAR 10:14 Pele Jesu nakazibona, tezyakamubotezya pe alimwi wakati kulimbabo, “Muzumizye bana mutabakasyi, nkambo bwami bwaLeza mbubwabo bali boobo.
MAR 10:15 Chakasimpe ndamwambila, naba ani utatambuli bwami bwaLeza mbuli mwana munini takonzyi kuyobunjila”.
MAR 10:16 Mpawo wakababweza bana mumanza akwe alimwi wabalongezya nakabikka maboko akwe alimbabo.
MAR 10:17 Nakatalisya lweendo lwakwe, umwi mwalumi wakachijana wazofugama kunembo lyakwe alimwi wabuzya, “Muyisi mubotu, ndichite buti kuti ndikajane buumi butamani?”
MAR 10:18 Jesu wakati, “Nkambonzi nuti ndimubotu? Tako pe mubotu naba umwi kunze kwaLeza alikke.
MAR 10:19 Ulizi milawo: 'Utajayi, utachiti bumambi, utabbi, utabejelezyi umwi, utabbi chakweenena, lemeka uso abanyoko.”
MAR 10:20 Mwalumimwakati, “Muyisi, zyoonse ezi zintu ndakazitibelezya kuzwa kandichili mukubusi”.
MAR 10:21 Jesu wakamulanga alimwi wamuyanda. Wakati kulinguwe, “Chintu chimwi nchobula. Weelede kuuzya zyoonse nzulazyo alimwi uzipe kubachete, elyo uyojana buvubi kujulu. Mpawo sika, unditobele”.
MAR 10:22 Pesi akaambo kamakani aya wakawusa kapati alimwi wakayinka kafwisya nsoni, nkambo wakali azintu zyiingi.
MAR 10:23 Jesu wakalangalanga mpawo wakati kulibasikwiiya bakwe, “Nchiyumu buti kubavubi kunjila mu bwami bwaLeza!”
MAR 10:24 Basikwiiya bakagamba kumajwi akwe.
MAR 10:25 Pesi Jesu wakabambila lubo, “Nobana, nchuubawuba kunkamela kuti yiinde mumpako yanaliti kwiinda muvubi kuti anjile mubwami bwaLeza”.
MAR 10:26 Bakagamba kapati alimwi baambilana kuti, “Ngwani unga ulakonzya kufutulwa?”
MAR 10:27 Jesu wakabalanga alimwi wati, “Kubantu tachikonzeki, pele kuli Leza chilakonzeka. Nkambo zintu zyoonse zilakonzeka a Leza”.
MAR 10:28 Pita wakatalika kwambula kulinguwe, “Boona, twasiya zyoonse twakutobela”.
MAR 10:29 Jesu wakati, “Nchobeni ndamwambila, takwe pe wasiya n'anda naa banyandumi naa bachizi naa banyina naa bana naa nyika akambo kandime alimwi akambo kavangeli,
MAR 10:30 utakabule kutambula zyiindulwidwe mwaanda munyika omuno lino: n'anda abanyandumi a bachizi a mamama abana anyika, mukupenzegwa, munyika utobela, buumi butamani.
MAR 10:31 Pele biingi balikumatangunino bayooba bakumamanino”.
MAR 10:32 Bakali mumugwagwa kabayabuya kuJelusalema, alimwi Jesu wakali kunembo lyab. Basikwiiya bakagamba, alimwi abaabo bakali kutobela musule bakayowa. Mpawo Jesu wakabweza bali kkumi ababili wabatola kumbali alubo watalika kubambila zizochitikana kulinguwe kuchiindi chitobela linolino.
MAR 10:33 “Amubone, tuyabuya kuJelusalema, alimwi Mwana waMuntu uyowabwa kubapayizi bapati abalembi.
MAR 10:34 Bayomupa mulandu walufu akumwaaba kulibamasi. Bayomusonsya, bayomuswida mate amubili, bayomuuma, alimwi bakamujeye. Pele kwiinda mazuba atatu uyobuka.
MAR 10:35 Jemusi a Joni, bana baZebbadi, bakaza kulinguwe bati, “Muyisi, tuyanda kuti mutuchitile kufumbwa nzituyomukumbila kulinduwe”.
MAR 10:36 Wakati kulimbabo, “Niinzi nchimuyanda kuti ndikamuchitile?”
MAR 10:37 Bakati, “Tuzumizye kuti tukkale anduwe mubulemu bwako, umwi kuchilisyo umwi kuchimwensi.”
MAR 10:38 Pele Jesu wakabasandula, “Tamuchizi nchimuli kukumbila. Mulakonzya na kunywa nkomechi njesikanywe naa kukakatila kulubbizizyo ndwesikabbizigwe andulo?”
MAR 10:39 Bakati kulinguwe, “Tulakonzya.” Jesu wakati kulimbabo, “Nkomechi njesikanywe, muyoyinywa, alimwi lubbizizyo ndwesikabbizigwe andulo, anywebo muyolubbizigwa.
MAR 10:40 Pele utakakkale kuchilisyo kana kuchimwensi tensi ndime nensyambe pe, pele nkukwabaabo babambilidwe mbubo.”
MAR 10:41 Awo bamwi balikkumi nibakamvwa eecho, bakatalika kunyemena Jemusi a Joni.
MAR 10:42 Jesu wakabayita kulinguwe wati, “Mulizi aabo baambwa kuti mbendelezi babamasi balabeendelezya, alimwi basikutwe babo bakatondezya manguzu aabo alimbabo.
MAR 10:43 Pele tazikoyooba mbubo pe akati kanu. Naba ani uyanda kuba mupati akati kanu weelede kuba mupati mulanda,
MAR 10:44 alimwi naba ani uyanda kuba mutanzi akati kanu weelede kuba muzike waboonse
MAR 10:45 Nkambo Mwana aMuntu takazida kuzofutulwa pe, pele kufutula, alimwi akupa buumi bwakwe kukwangununa biingi.”
MAR 10:46 Bakasika kuJelikko. Nakazwa kuJelikko abasikwiiya bakwe amakamu makamu, mwana wa Timiyasi, Bbatimiyasi, moofu, wakalikkede kumbali amugwagwa.
MAR 10:47 Awo nakamvwa kuti Jesu muNazaleni, wakatalika koompolola wati, “Jesu Mwana waDavida, ndifwide luzyalo!”
MAR 10:48 Biingi bakamukasya mwalumi boofu, bamwambila kuti awumune. Pele wakompolola changuzu, “Mwana waDavida, ndifwide luzyalo!”
MAR 10:49 Jesu wakayimikila alimwi wabalayilila kuti bamwiite. Bakamwiita mwalumi moofu, bati, “Koyuma! Nyampuka! Ulikukwiita.”
MAR 10:50 Wakasowela ansi chikobela chakwe, wasotoka alimwi wasika kuli Jesu.
MAR 10:51 Jesu wakamusandula wati, “Niinzi nchuyanda kuti ndikuchitile?” Mwalumi moofu wakati, “Muyisi ndiyanda kubona.”
MAR 10:52 Mpawo Jesu wakati kulinguwe, “Kuya. Lusyomo lwako lwakuponya.” Mpaawo wakabona lubo, alimwi wakamutobela mumugwagwa.
MAR 11:1 Nibakasika ku Jelusalemu kabali aafwiifwi aku Bbetipeji a Bbetani aku Chilundu chama Oliva, Jesu wakatuma basikwiiya bakwe bobile,
MAR 11:2 wakati kuli mbabo, “Amwiinke kugunzi lilikunembo lyenu, mbumutakanjile biyo, muyoojana mwana wembongolo waangidwe nkuko, uutanatantwa naba womwe muntu. Mukamwaangunune mumweete okuno.
MAR 11:3 Na kuli uyomubuzya kuti, “Muchitilaanzi oobu”? mukamwaambile kuti, ‘Mwami nguulikumuyanda alubo ulamuboozya aano muchiindi chifwiifwi.”
MAR 11:4 Bakayinka baakumujana mwana wedonki kumbali aamunzi, kaangidwe kumanjililo aamunzi. Nibakamwaangununa.
MAR 11:5 Bamwi bantu bakayimvwi mpawo bakabuzya kuti, “Muchitaanzi, nimwaangununa mwana wembongolo donki ooyu? ”
MAR 11:6 Bakasandula mbuli Jesu mbaakabaambilide, mpawo bantu bakabazumizya kuti beende.
MAR 11:7 Nibakamweeta mwana wembongolo kuli Jesu bakayala majansi amusana wakwe, Jesu wakakkala aalinguwe.
MAR 11:8 Bantu biingi bakayala milembo yabo mumugwagwa, bamwi bakayala matu ngibakatemene mumuunda.
MAR 11:9 Bakazulwide abakalimusule bakoompolola kabati, “Hossana! Ulilongezezedwe ooyo uza muzina lyaMwami.
MAR 11:10 Bulilongezegedwe ibwaami buyobuza ibwa taata wesu Davida! Hossana mujulu lyamajulu!”
MAR 11:11 Jesu wakanjila mu Jelusalema akwiinka ku Chikombelo bakalangalanga boonse busena, pele nkaambo kakuti lyakali lyaba goko, wakayinka ku Bbetani abalikumi aababili.
MAR 11:12 Buzuba butobela nibakaboola kuzwa ku Bbetani, wakali waba aanzala.
MAR 11:13 Mukubona mukuyu amatu aawo chakule, wakayinka kuti akabone kuti ulaamichelo na. Naakasika afwiifwi wabona matu luzutu kakutakwe michelo, kambo techakali chiindi chankuyu pe.
MAR 11:14 Elyo wakaambila mukuyu kuti, “Kutazoobi naba womwe uzoolya michelo kulinduwe. ” Basikwiiya baakwe bakamumvwa kawamba majwi aayo.
MAR 11:15 Naakasika mu Jelusalema, wakanjila muchikombelo mpawo wakatalika kwaandingania bakalikuula akuuzya oomo. Wakatonta matebuli aabasimuchincha mali ezyuuno zyabaabo bakalikuuzya nkwilimba.
MAR 11:16 Mpawo takwe naakazumizya naba omwe kuti abweze zyakalikuuzigwa mulubaya lwatempele.
MAR 11:17 Mpawo naakabayiisya wakati, “Tachilembedwe na kuti: `Ng'anda yangu iyotegwa ning'anda yakukombela kwamanyika wonse’? Pesi nywebo mwayichita ng'anda yabasikubba. ”
MAR 11:18 Bapati babapayizi abasimilawo bakaamvwa makani aya eelyo bakayandula nzila zyakumujaya aazyo, bakalikumuyowa nkaambo bantu biingi boonse bakaba aakugamba enjiisyo yakwe.
MAR 11:19 Nilyakaba igoko, bakazwa mudolopo.
MAR 11:20 Chifumofumo nkabayobweenda, bakabona mukuyu nkuuyumide kuzwa kumiyanda.
MAR 11:21 Pita wakayeeya mpawo wakati kuli Jesu, “Muyisi wangu langa! Mukuyu ngwakatukila wayuma!”
MAR 11:22 Jesu wakasandula kuti, “Amube aalusyomo muli Leza.
MAR 11:23 Ndimwaambila kasimpe kuti, na umwi wati kuchilundu, ‘Nkoya ukaliwalile mulwizi, ’ mpawo nkatadooneki mumoyo wakwe pesi nkasyoma kuti ezyo nzyawamba ziyochitika, ziyochitika mbubo.
MAR 11:24 Nkaako ndamwaambila kuti: Kufumbwa nchimuyookumbila mukukomba, amusyome kuti muyoochijana, mpawo chiyooba chanu.
MAR 11:25 Mpawo naa wayimikila kokomba, na nkowangilide umwi moyo, mulekelele, nkokuti Wuso wako ulikujulu akulekelele zibi zyako.
MAR 11:26 [“Nkambo kuti inywe nkamutalekeleli bantu balaamilandu kuli ndinywe, alakwe Wuso uulikujulu takoyoomulekelela milandu yenu”.]
MAR 11:27 Bakasika lubo kuJelusama. Eelyo Jesu naakayobweenda mulubuwa lwaChikombelo, bapayizi bapati, abayisyi bamulawu abapati bembungano bakeza kulinguwe.
MAR 11:28 Bakati, “Mumanguzu aani mochita zintu ziloobu? Alimwi ngwani ukupa inguzu zyakuchita zintu eezi? ”.
MAR 11:29 Jesu wakasandula kuti, “Ndiyobuzya mubuzyo womwe. Mundisandule, eelyo ndiyomwaambila kuti munguzu zyani mwendiikuchita zintu eezi.
MAR 11:30 Lubbabbatizyo lwaJohani, lwakalikuzwa kujulu na, nakuti lwakazwa kumuntu? Mundambile!”
MAR 11:31 Bakayizya aatala amakani aaya mpawo bakakazyania bati, “Nitwaamba kuti, ‘Luzwa kuzulu, ’ ulatubuzya kuti 'Nkamboonzi nimutamusyomi? ’
MAR 11:32 Pesi nitwaamba kuti, 'Luzwa kumuntu’.... ” bakayoowa bantu nkaambo muntu woonse wakalizi kuti Joni musinsimi mwinimwini.
MAR 11:33 Alimwi bakasandula Jesu kuti “Tatuzi pe.” Mpawo Jesu wakabaambila kuti, “Nsikomwaambila pe ambebo kuti manguzu aani ngechita aawo zintu eezi”.
MAR 12:1 Mpawo wakasanguna kubaambila maambila mbali wakati, “Mwaalumi umwi wakabyala misamu yamisansa. Wakayakila lubaya aalinjiyo, wakasya dindi lyakudinina nsansa, akuyaka ingaze yasikulinda. Alimwi wakajana kupa bamwi balimi mpawo wakaya kuchisi chimbi.
MAR 12:2 Muchiindi chakutebula wakatuma umwi wababelesi bakwe kuyoobweza michelo yamansansa.
MAR 12:3 Pesi balimi abo bakakumujata, akumuma, akumwaanda nkakutakwe nchakabweda aacho pe.
MAR 12:4 Wakatuma uumbi mubelesi; oyo mwaalumi bakamutulula mumutwe akumusampawula. Wakatuma uumbi, alubo oyo bakakumujaya.
MAR 12:5 Wakatuma bambi bingi; bamwi bakawumwa, bamwi bakajayigwa.
MAR 12:6 Kwakasyaala omwe biyo wakutuma, nkali mwana ngwaakali kuyandisya kapati. Wakamutuma nkali wakumaninsizya, wakati, “Bayomulemeka mwanaangu.”
MAR 12:7 Pesi balimi bakaambilana kuti, “Ooyu ngusimulya lukono. muze tumujaye, mpawo lukono luyoba lwesu.”
MAR 12:8 Nkabela bakamujata akumujaya, akumuwaalila anze aamuunda waminsansa.
MAR 12:9 Aboobo ulachita buti mwani muunda? Ulasika akujaya balimi akape bambi muunda wamisaansa.
MAR 12:10 Tamuna kwaabala na malembe: ‘Ibbwe lyakasowedwe abasikuyaka ndilyakazooba ibbwe lyachooko.
MAR 12:11 Mwaami ngwaakachichita eechi, mpawo chilabotezya kumenso eesu? ’”
MAR 12:12 Eelyo bakayanduula nzila yakumwaanga aayo nkaambo bakaziba kuti wakali kwaamba mbabo kumaambila mbali aaya. Pesi bakayoowa inkamu yabantu yakaliwo, nkaako bakamusiya mpawo bakeenda.
MAR 12:13 Muchiindi chitobela bakatuma bamwi baba Falisi aba Heloda kuli Jesu kuti bakamujate mumakani aakwe.
MAR 12:14 Bakasika kulinguwe bakati, “Muyisi, tulizi kuti ulimwaalumi ulaabulemu usyomekede. Topenzegwi abantu, nkaambo toswiilizyi makani aamuntu na kulanga chiwa chamuntu; pesi uyiisya nzila ya Leza mbuli mbiibede amubwini. Chileede na kutela kuli Kkayisala na pe? Tweelede kuti tubbadale na, naa kuti pe? ”
MAR 12:15 Pesi Jesu wakalizi kuupawupa kwabo. Jesu wakababuzya kuti, “Kaambonzi nimulikweezya kunditeya? ” Wakati, “Amundeetele nsiliva yanu alimwi ndiibone mbiibede.”
MAR 12:16 Elyo bakiiyeta nsiliva, alimwi wakababuzya kuti, “Mbubwani busyu obu? Alimwi ndizina lyani lilembedwe mpawo? ” Bakasandula kuti, “Nzizya Kkayisala. ”
MAR 12:17 Mpawo Jesu wakati kulimbabo, “Amupe Kkayisala zyaKkayisala, alimwi mupe Leza izya Leza. ” Bakaba aakugamba aatala anguwe.
MAR 12:18 Mpawo ba Saduki, baamba kuti takwe bubuke, bakaza kulinguwe amubuzyo. Bakati,
MAR 12:19 “Muyisi, Mozesi wakatulembela kuti, 'Na mukulana wamulumi mpawo wasiya mwanakazi kabatakwe bana, mwaalumi weelede kukwata mukamufu mpawo babe abana bamukulana.'
MAR 12:20 Kwakali bana bachaalumi bali musanu ababili. Mutaanzi wakakwata mpawo wakafwa katasiide mwana naba womwe.
MAR 12:21 Wachibili wakakwata mukamufu, pesi alakwe wakafwa katasiide mwana. Chakaba mbubo akuli watatu.
MAR 12:22 Tawope akati kababa bali musanu ababili wakasiya mwana. Kumamanino, alakwe mwanakazi wakafwa.
MAR 12:23 Kububuke bwabafu, oyu mwanakazi uyooba wani? Mbunga boonse kabali musanu abatatu bakalimukwete.”
MAR 12:24 Jesu wakasandula kuti, “Tamuli mubulubizi na kambo malembe tamwaazi naa kuti manguzu aa Leza?
MAR 12:25 Bafu nibayoobuka, tabakoyookwata nikuba kukwatanisigwa; bayooba mbuli bangelo kujulu.
MAR 12:26 Lino mukwaamba atala abafu nibayoobuka temwakabala na muBbuku lyaMozesi, kuleezyo zyakachitika kuchiteyo, Leza mbakaambula kulinguwe, ‘Ndime Leza wa Abbulamu, Leza wa Ayizeki, alubo Leza wa Jakobo?'
MAR 12:27 Tali Leza wabafwide, pesi ngwababapona. Mulilubizizye kapati!”
MAR 12:28 Umwi wabayisyi bamulawo naakasika wakamvwa kabakazyania. Nkabwene kuti Jesu wakali wabapa nsandulo mbotu, wakabuzya Jesu kuti, “Nguuli mulawo mupati kwiinda imwi akati kamilawo yoonse? ” Jesu wakamusandula kuti,
MAR 12:29 “Ngooyu: ‘Amuswiilile, noma Izilayeli, Mwaami Leza wesu, Mwaami ngumwi.
MAR 12:30 Yanda Mwami Leza wako amoyo wako woonse, amizeezo yako yoonse, mpawo amanguzu aako woonse. ’ Wabili ngooyu:
MAR 12:31 ‘Yanda mweenzinyokwe mbuli mboliyanda. ’ Tuwope mulawo mupati wiinda eeyi.”
MAR 12:32 Oyu mwaalumi wakasandula kuti, “Waamba kabotu omuyisyi, waamba kabotu kuti Leza ngumwi alubo takukwe umbi kunze kwakwe alike.
MAR 12:33 Kumuyanda amoyo wako woonse, akumvwisisisya kwako alubo amanguzu aako woonse, mpawo akuyanda simabambanwa wako mbuli mboliyanda nkubotu loko kwiinda zipayizyo. ”
MAR 12:34 Lino Jesu naakabona kuti wasandula chabuchenjezu, wakati kuli nguwe, “Tolikulepe a Bwami bwa Leza. ” Elyo kuzwa awo tawope naba omwe wakeezya kumubuzya iimbi mibuzyo.
MAR 12:35 Nkali kuyiisya Jesu mulubuwa lwatempele, wakabuzya mubuzyo wakati, “Nkamboonzi bayiisi bamulawo nibati Kilisitu mwana waDavida? We lwakwe
MAR 12:36 Devidi, kaambuzigwa a Muuya Uusalala, wakachaamba antanganana wakati: ‘Mwami wakati kuMwami wangu, kkala kukuboko kwachilisyo kwangu kusikila basinkondonyokwe ndibabike kunsi amawulu aako. ’
MAR 12:37 We lwakwe Devidi umwiita kuti ‘Mwami. ’ Ani inga ulaba mwana wakwe biyeni? ” Inkamu yabantu yaka muswiilizya chalumwemwe.
MAR 12:38 Naakalikuyiisya Jesu wakati, “Amubachenjelele bayiisi bamulawo balayandisya kweendeenda kabatungana mulongo kabajuzigwa kumasambalilo,
MAR 12:39 alubo akupegwa zyuuno zibotu mumambungano akulemekwa kapati aabungene bantu.
MAR 12:40 Balanyonyoona maanda abamukabafu kabakomba ankombyo ndamfu chakweebwa. Aaba bantu bayoopegwa chisubulo chipati.”
MAR 12:41 Jesu wakakkala kumbali lyachiykoobwedo chazituzyo mung'anda ya Leza; bantu nibakalikuwaala mali muchiyobweedo. Bavubi biingi bakalikuwala imali nyingi.
MAR 12:42 Pesi mukamufu muchete wakabika biyo tupeni tobile, tweelene aaseleni lyomwe.
MAR 12:43 Lino wakayita basikwiiya bakwe, wakati, Ndiikumwaambila kasimpe kuti, ooyu mukamufu wabika kwiinda boonse muchiyobwedo.
MAR 12:44 Boonse bapa mukweendelana abuvubi bwabo; pesi we, mubuchete bwakwe, wabika zyoonse nzyaalangilide mubuumi bwakwe kuti apone anzizyo.”
MAR 13:1 Awo Jesu nakali kweenda kuzwa mucikombelo, umwi wabasikwiiya bakwe wakati kuli nguwe, “Muyiisi langa imabwe aziyako zigambwa!”
MAR 13:2 Wakati kulinguwe, “Ulizibwene na iziyako zipati eezi? Takwe ibwe lyomwe litakasyale atala alimwi litakwe kwakukolomwedwa ansi”.
MAR 13:3 Awo nakakkala achilundu chama Oliva chilengene achikombelo, Pita a Jemusi a Endulu bakabuzya chakusisikizya,
MAR 13:4 “Twambile eezi zintu ziyochitikana lili? Niinzi chiyooba chitondezyo chazintu eezi kuti zyamba kuchitika?”
MAR 13:5 Jesu wakatalika kubambila, “Amukachenjele kuti kutakabi uyomwena.
MAR 13:6 Bangi bayoza muzina lyangu kabati, 'Ndime nguwe', pesi bayoyena bangi.
MAR 13:7 Chiindi nimuyomvwa inkondo ampuwo zyankondo, mutakalikatazyi; ezi zintu kuleede zikachitike, pesi mamanino anoli katanasika pe.
MAR 13:8 Nkaambo inyika iyobukilana enyika, abwami buyobukilana abwaminyina. Kuyoba kuteketa kwamasena mangi anzala zyiingi. Ezi matalikilo amachise akutumbuka.
MAR 13:9 Amukalinde. Bayomupeda kukubetekwa, alimwi muyowumwa muzikombelo. Muyoyima kunembo lyabendelezi abaami nkambo kangu, kuti bukabe bukamboni kuli mbabo.
MAR 13:10 Pesi makani mabotu ayotalika kukambawuka kunyika zyoonse.
MAR 13:11 Alimwi nibayomwanga akumupeda, mutakalikatazyi ikuti muyotyeni. Nkambo muchiindi echo nzimutakambe muyozipegwa; teensi ndinywe mutanowambule, pesi Muuya Usalala.
MAR 13:12 Mukulana uyoozya mwanike kulufu, a wisi kumwanakwe. Bana bayobukilana abazyali babo bakabatole kulufu.
MAR 13:13 Muyosungwa abantu boonse nkambo kazina lyangu. Pesi utajatilile mane kukabe kumamanino, oyo muntu uyofutulwa.
MAR 13:14 Nimuyobona chisesemyo chalunyonyoko kachimvwi mpuchitelede kwimikila (Oyo ubala ngamvwisye), abanolimu Judiya abachijile mumalundu,
MAR 13:15 akube kuti oyo uli achiluli changanda ataseluki kuya mun'anda naba kuti kuyotola chintu mukati,
MAR 13:16 ayoyo uli mulukuba atakabwedi kukutola chisamo.
MAR 13:17 Pesi maawe kuli babo balamada ababo banyonsya bana batete mumazuba ayo!
MAR 13:18 Amukombe kuti ezi zitakachitikani mumpeyo.
MAR 13:19 Nkambo ayo anoli mazuba akupengana kupati, atakabawo kuzwa kumatalikilo, awo Leza nakalenge nyika, kusikila lino, pe, nikuba kuti achiza alimwi.
MAR 13:20 Na kuti Mwami takafwiinsya mazuba, takwe mubuli walikuzofutulwa. Pesi nkaambo kababo basale abo basalala, wakafwiinsya mazuba.
MAR 13:21 Ino kuti umwi akatedi kulindime, 'Amulange, ngoyu Kilisito!' na kuti 'Amulange, ngulya!' mutakasyomi pe.
MAR 13:22 Nkambo kuyoba aba Kilisito bakubeja aba sinsimi bakubeja batakalibonye alimwi kuyoba zitondezyo azigambyo atakaboneke, na kuti chali chuba, basale.
MAR 13:23 Amukalindile! Ndamwambila zintu zyoonse kunembo lyachiindi.
MAR 13:24 Pesi musule lyamazuba akupenzegwa, zuba liyoba mudima, amweezi tukoyopa mumuni,
MAR 13:25 Nyenyezi ziyoloka kuzwa kujulu, alawo manguzu alikujulu ayoteketegwa.
MAR 13:26 Alimwi nibatakabone Mwana waMuntu kazamumayoba amanguzu a bulemu.
MAR 13:27 Alimwi uyotuma bangelo bakwe, uyobunganya aamwi basale bakwe kuzwa kumyuya yone, kuzwa kumamanino anyika kusika kumamanino ajulu.
MAR 13:28 Amwiiye chiiyo kuzwa kumukuyu. Awo ntabi niyisyukila matu, mwaziba kuti minza aswena.
MAR 13:29 Mbubobo, na kuti mwabona zintu kazchitikana, muzibe kuti waswena, afwifwi amilyango.
MAR 13:30 Nchobeni, ndamwambila, olu luzubo talukoyoyinda ezi zintu kazitana chitikana.
MAR 13:31 Ijulu anyika ziyoyinda, pesi majwi angu takoyinda pe.
MAR 13:32 Pesi buzuba obo achiindi, takwe muntu uzi, nikuba bangelo kujulu, na kuti Mwana, pesi kuti Taata.
MAR 13:33 Muchengele! Mulange, nkambo tamuzi kuti chiindinzi. Amwi malembe achiindi alembedwe muchiGilikki: Muchenjele! Mulange akukomba.
MAR 13:34 Zilimbuli muntu winka musinzo - wabusiya nganda yakwe wakwiibikka mumanza abalanda bakwe kuti bayibambe, umwi awumwi amulimu wakwe, wawabambila balinda nganda kuti amubuke.
MAR 13:35 Aboobo amuchenjele nkambo tamuzi kuti simalelo wanganda nabola kunganda; zilakonzya kuba goko, na kuti akati kamansiku, awo mukuku niwulila, na kuti bwacha.
MAR 13:36 Na kuti asike mpawawo, atakajani mulilede.
MAR 13:37 Nzindimwambila nywebo nditi kumuntu woonse: Linda!”
MAR 14:1 Lino kakutanasika mazuba abili kuya kupobwe lyakwindilila alyamikamu bwachinkwa chitakwe bumena. Mupati wabapayizi abalembi bakalangula inzila isisikene kuti ngabalamujata biyeni Jesu akumujaya.
MAR 14:2 Nkambo balikwamba kuti “kutabi muchindi chapobwe, kuti kutabi kunyongana akati kabantu”
MAR 14:3 Lino Jesu kalimu Bbetani mun'anda ya Sayimoni sichinsenda, kachili mukulya atafula, mwanakazi wakasika kulinguwe amunkuli watununkilizyo tudula loko, ooyo wakali wanadi. Wakapwaya munkuli akutila nadi amutwe wakwe.
MAR 14:4 Pesi kuli bamwi bakabijilwa. Bakambuzyana akati kabo kabati, “Wanyonywedanzi?
MAR 14:5 Tununkilizyo otu tweelede kuuzigwa ikwiinda myaanda itatu yamaseleni ikapegwe bachete”. Mpawo wakamukasya.
MAR 14:6 Pesi Jesu wakati, “Amumusiye alikke. Mumukatazizyanzi? Wandichitila chintu chibotu.
MAR 14:7 Bachete mulaabo kaale lyoonse, kufumbwa chindi nimwayanda mulakonzya kubachitila kabotu, tamukoyooba andime lyoonse pe. Wachita eecho nchakoonzya.
MAR 14:8 Wananika kale mubili wangu kuti ukazikwe.
MAR 14:9 Ndamwambila kasimpe kuti, kufumbwa makani mabotu nkwayookambawukwa munyika yoonse, eechi nchachita mwanakazi ooyu chinowambuulwa, mukumuyeya”.
MAR 14:10 Mpawo Judasi Isikkaliyoti umwi balikkumi ababili wakaya kubapayizi kuti akamupede kuli mbabo.
MAR 14:11 Lino bapayizi bapati nibamvwa oobo, bakabotelwa akumusyomezya kuti apege mali. Wakatalika kuyandula mweenya wakumupeda kuli mbabo.
MAR 14:12 Mubuzuba butaanzi bwachinkwa chitakwe bumena, lino nibakapayizya kabelele kapobwe lyakundilila, basikwiiya bakati kuli nguwe, “Nkokuli nkuyanda kuti tukabambilile kuti ukalye chakulya chapobwe lyakwindilila?”
MAR 14:13 Wakatuma basikwiiya babili akubaambila kuti, “Kamuya mugunzi, eelyo muyooswanana amwalumi unyampwide munkuli wameenda mumutobele.
MAR 14:14 Ooko nkwayojinka mun'anda mukamutobele mukati kuli munan'and, 'Muyisi wati, “Ilikuli yangu n'anda yabeenzu ooko nkundiyolinda ipobwe lyakwindilila abasikwiya bangu?”
MAR 14:15 Uyomutondezya n'anda mpati yamujulu ibambidwe kabotu. Mukatubambilile mumo”.
MAR 14:16 Mpawo basikwiya bakazwa bayinka mumunzi. Lino bakazijana zyoonse mbuli mbakabambila, eelyo bakambilila chakulya chapobwe lyakwindilila.
MAR 14:17 Nikwakaba golezya, wakaza abali kkumi ababili.
MAR 14:18 Aawo nibakali yeeme atafula akulya, Jesu wakati kasimpe ndamwambila kuti umwi wanu ngundilikulya aawe uyonduuzya.
MAR 14:19 Mpawo boonse bakawusaloko, alimwi awumwi wakati kuli nguwe, “Masimpe tensi ndime pe?”
MAR 14:20 Jesu wakasandula wakati kuli mbabo, “Nguumwi wabali kkumi ababili, ooyu wazwa kunika chinkwa lino mundido andime?”
MAR 14:21 Aboobo Mwana waMuntu uyoyinka mbuli mbukulembedwe atala anguwe. Pesi maawe kulooyo muntu wachitya kuti Mwana aMuntu awuzigwe chali kubota kumntu ooyo natakazyalwa”.
MAR 14:22 Aawo nibakachili kulya Jesu wakabweza chinkwa, wachilongezya, akuchikwamuna. Wabapa akwamba kuti, “Mubeze eechi ngumubili wangu”.
MAR 14:23 Alimwi wakabweza nkomechi, wapa kulumba, akukapa, eelyo bakanywa boonse.
MAR 14:24 Wakati kuli mbabo, “Oobu mbubulowa bwangu bwachizuminano, bulowa butilwa baangi”
MAR 14:25 Kasimpe ndamwambila kuti, nsikoyonywa limbi e ooyu muchelo wamasansa kusikila buzuba oobo nindiyoonywa mubwami bwaLeza”.
MAR 14:26 Mpawo nibakali kwiimba lwiimbo, bakazwa baya kuchilundu chaOlivisi.
MAR 14:27 Jesu wakati kuli mbabo, “Moonse muyoowa, mbuuli mbukulembedwe, 'Ndiyowuma mwembeli butanga buyomwayika'.
MAR 14:28 Pesi kandili ndabuka, ndilamwindila kunembo kuya kuGalili”.
MAR 14:29 Pita wakateedi, “Nikuba kuti boonse bawa pesi mebo pe”.
MAR 14:30 Jesu wakati kulinguwe, “Kasimpe ndakwambila, sunu iyii, mbubo busiku oobuno mukombwe kutana kokolika tubili uyondikaka tutatu.
MAR 14:31 Lino Pita wakati kuti kandeleede kufa ayebo, mezyo chikozyene.
MAR 14:32 Bakasika kubusena butegwa Gesemane, mpawo Jesu wakati kuli basikwiya bakwe, “Amukkale aawo nenchiya kukukomba”.
MAR 14:33 Wakabweza Pita, Jemusi a Joni, winka aabo, watalika kulilya akulikataazya.
MAR 14:34 Wakati kuli mbabo, “Muuya wangu wawusa loko, nikuba kusika kulufu. Muchaale aawa kamulindide”
MAR 14:35 Kabachiya kunembo, Jesu wakawida aansi akukomba kuti nichali kukonzeka chiindi echi chimwiinde.
MAR 14:36 Wakati, “Abba, Taata, kuti nduwe zintu zyoonse zilakonzeka. Gwisya nkomechi eeyi kuli ndime pesi kutabi kuyanda kwangu pe, asi kwako”.
MAR 14:37 Wakaboola, wakajana baloona, mpawo wakati kuli Pita, “Sayimoni, muloona na? Tamukonzyi kulindila hola lyomwe?
MAR 14:38 Mulindile akukomba kuti mutanjili mukusunkwa.
MAR 14:39 Lino wakazwa lwabili wakukomba majwi ngawonya.
MAR 14:40 Nakaboola lubo wakajana balokoona, nkambo meso aabo akali alema. Tebakaziba chakwamba kuli nguwe.
MAR 14:41 Wakaza kachitatu wakati kulimbabo, “Muchili koona na? Kwazulila! Chindi chasika. Amulange! Mwana aMuntu uli kuziigwa mumaanza abasizibi.
MAR 14:42 Munyampuke; tweende. Amulange, sikunduuzya waba afwifwi.”
MAR 14:43 Kachili kwambula, Judasi, umwi wabali kkumi ababili wakasika, ankamu mpati kabajisi mapanga amasumu, kuzwa kubapati babapayizi, abalembi, abaalu.
MAR 14:44 Lino sikumuuzya wakapa chitondeezyo, wati, “Ooyo ngundiyomyonta ngonguwe. Amumujate mumtole atamuchiji pe.”
MAR 14:45 Awo Judasi nakasika, mpawoawo wakaya kuli Jesu wati, “Muyisi!” Akumumyonta.
MAR 14:46 Mpawo bakabikka maboko alinguwe bamwaanga.
MAR 14:47 Pesi umwi wababo bakalimvwi wakasomona ipanga wakakwazula akudunsula kutwi kwamuzike wamupayizi mupati.
MAR 14:48 Jesu wakati kulimbabo, “Mwaza mbuli muyanda sikubba, amapanga, amasumu kuzondijata?
MAR 14:49 Aboobo ndali anywebo mazuba woonse akuyisya mun'anda yaLeza, temwakandisunga pe. Pesi eechi chachitika kuti malembe azuzikizigwe”.
MAR 14:50 Boonse mbakali aabo Jesu bakamusiya akumuchija.
MAR 14:51 Mwalumi munini, wakali samide mulembo luzutu uteentema ngwakali lipopode wakali kutobela Jesu.
MAR 14:52 Lino baalumi nibakamwanga wakasiya mulembo uteentema wachija kali chintanda.
MAR 14:53 Bakatola Jesu kumupayizi mupati. Bamubunganina bapayizi bapati, abaalu abalembi.
MAR 14:54 Lino Pita wakali buya butobela kulaale kulubaya kwamupayizi mupati wakakkala akati kabalindizi bakali afwifwi amulilo kuti akasalilwe.
MAR 14:55 Lino bapati babapayizi ankuta yoonse yaba Juda yakali kuyandula bukamboni bubi kuchita kuti bamutole kulufu. Pesi tebakabujana pe.
MAR 14:56 Eelyo biingi bakaleta bukamboni bwakubeja atala aanguwe, pesi bukamboni obu tebwali kuzuminina pe.
MAR 14:57 Bamwi bakayima akupa bukamboni bwakubeja atala anguwe; Kabati,”
MAR 14:58 Twakamumvwa kati, 'Ndiyomwaya n'anda yaLeza yakwa amaanza, mukati kwamazuba atatu ndiyoyiyaka imbi itachitwi amaanza”.
MAR 14:59 Nikuba boobo bukamboni bwabo tebwakazumina pe.
MAR 14:60 Mupayizi Mupati wakayimikila akati kabo wabuzya Jesu, “Tujisi nsandulo na? Ninzi eezi aaba balumi nzibapeda bukamboni atala anduwe?”
MAR 14:61 Asi we wakawumuna takwe nakasandula chintu pe. Alubo mupayizi mupati wakati wakamubuzya kuti, “Nduwe Kkilisito, Mwana wawulongezedwe?”
MAR 14:62 Jesu wakati, “Ndime! alimwi muyoomubona Mwana aMuntu ulikkede kululyo lwaluboko lwasinguzu akuboola amayoba akujulu.”
MAR 14:63 Mupayizi mupati wakadelula zisamo mpawo wati, “Sa tuchiyanda bukamboni?
MAR 14:64 Mwamvwa mbwamba chisapi. Muzeezo wanu ngwakutyeni?” Mpawo bakamupa mulandu welela lufu.
MAR 14:65 Bamwi bakatalika kumuswida mate akumuvumba busyu akumunabba akwamba kuti kuli nguwe, “Sinsima!” Basolooli bakamubweza akumuuma.
MAR 14:66 Eelyo Pita kachili munsi alubaya umwi wabalanda basimbi bamupayizi mupati wakaza kuli nguwe.
MAR 14:67 Nakabona Pita kali kuyota mulilo, wakalangisisya akwamba kuti, “Mwakali aamwi a Jesu muNazaleta”.
MAR 14:68 Pesi wakakaka akwamba kuti tandimuzi pe nikuba kumvwa atala anzinokwambuula anzizyo”. Lino wakazwa waya anze aamulyango. Alimwi malembe achindi alawungizya. Mpawo mukombwe wakokolika.
MAR 14:69 Pesi mulanda musimbi wakamubona mpawo watalika kwamba lubo kuti aabo balimwi mpawo, “Ooyu mwalumi nguumwi wabo!”
MAR 14:70 Lino wakakaka alubo. Nikwakayinda chindi chinini aabo bakalimvwi aawo bakati kuli Pita, kasimpe nduwe umwi wabo, nkambo alako uli muna Galiliyeni.”
MAR 14:71 Mukombwe mpawawo wakakokolika kachibili. Mpawo Pita wakayeeya majwi aaJesu ngakamwambila:
MAR 14:72 “Mukombwe kutana kukokolika kachibili, uyondikaka tutatu” alimwi wakawusa akulila.
MAR 15:1 Muchifumofumo, bapati babapayizi bakabungana abaalu abalembi abasilutwe babbooma lya Judiya. Bakamwanga bamutola. Akumupeda kuli Payileti.
MAR 15:2 Payileti wakabuzya kuti, “Nduwe Mwami waba Juda na?” Wakasandula kuti, “Wamba”.
MAR 15:3 Bapayizi bapati bakali kumutamikizya zintu zyiingi.
MAR 15:4 Alubo Payileti wakabuzya, “Tosanduli na?” Langa kuvula zintu zyiingi nzibali kukutamikizya!”
MAR 15:5 Pesi Jesu takwe naakamusandula, mpawo eecho chakamugambya Payileti.
MAR 15:6 Kuchindi chapobwe, Payileti wakaba angunywida umwi wabange, mwange ngubatanoli bakumbila.
MAR 15:7 Mpawo kwakali mwalumi utegwa Bbanabbasi muntolongo kalamwi abapati bakali amilandu yabujayi muchindi chalupapi.
MAR 15:8 Makamu akaza kuli Payileti mpawo bakatalika kukumbila kuti achite echo nchakali kunoonga wabachitila.
MAR 15:9 Payileti wakabasandula wati, “Muyanda kuti ndimwangunwide Mwami waba Juda na?”
MAR 15:10 We wakalizi kuti nkambo kabbivwe bapayizi bapati nchibakaaba Jesu kulinguwe.
MAR 15:11 Pesi bapayizi bapati bakasungilizya makamu kuti balilile kwangununwa kwaBbanabbasi.
MAR 15:12 Payileti wakasandula lubo wakati, “Mpoo ndichite biyeni aMwami wabaJuda?”
MAR 15:13 Bakawompolola lubo, “Ngagankaminwe!”
MAR 15:14 Payileti wakabambila kuti, “Mulandunzi ngwakachita?” Pesi bakayinkilila kunembo akoompolola kuti, “Amumugankamine”.
MAR 15:15 Payileti wakayanda kukutisika makamu, elyo wakabangunwida Bbanabbasi. Wakamupenzya Jesu mpawo wamupeda kuti akagankaminwe.
MAR 15:16 Basilumamba bakamutola bamunjizya mubbetekelo (alingawo maanda afulumende mapati), mpawo bakayita imbunga yabasilumamba.
MAR 15:17 Bakamubikka kunembo wantumbula Jesu, mpawo bakazinga musini wamaamvwa elyo bakamusamika.
MAR 15:18 Bakatalika kumuseka kabati, “Mwalemekwa, Mwami wabaJuda!”
MAR 15:19 Bakali kumumuma mumtwe atete mpawo bakamuswida mate. Bamufugamina akumukotamikila mitwe.
MAR 15:20 Nibakamana kumusonsya, bakamugwisya mulembo wantumbula mpawo bamusamika zisamo zyakwe, elyo bakamutola kuyomugankamina.
MAR 15:21 Umwi mwalumi, Sayimoni wakuSayilini, wakayabuza kuzwa kumunzi (wakali wisi wa Alekizanda a Lufusi), mpawo bakamwangila kuti amubwezele chiingano.
MAR 15:22 Basilumamba bakeeta Jesu kubusena butegwa Gologota (busenandululwa kutegwa, “Busena bwazipepe zyamyitwe”).
MAR 15:23 Bakamupa wayini ivwelengene andulwe, pesi takanywa pe.
MAR 15:24 Bakamugankamina mpawo bakaabana zisamo zyakwe bakasaana chisolo kuti basilumamba babone kuti umwi ulabweza chisamo chaali
MAR 15:25 Chakali chiindi chahola lyatatu nibakamugankamina.
MAR 15:26 Achikwankwani bakalemba mulandu ngubakamupa, bakati, “Mwami wabaJuda”.
MAR 15:27 Bakamugankamina aamwi ababbi babili, umwi kululyo lwakwe umwi kulumwensi lwakwe.
MAR 15:28 Malembi mabotu akale taakwe Makko 15: 28, (Malembe akazuzikizigwa akuti, “Wakabb. alikizigwa amwi abasikutyola milawo)
MAR 15:29 Abo bakali kwiinda nibakamubona bakali kutikinia mitwe kabati, “Iiwe! nokonzya kumwaya chikombelo mpawo akuchiyakulula mumazuba otatwe,
MAR 15:30 Livune useluke achingano!”
MAR 15:31 Munzila ikozyenie, bapati bapayizi bakati kumuniaka antoomwe abalembi, mpawo bakati, “Wakafutula bamwi, pesi takonzyi kulifutula.
MAR 15:32 Akube kuti Kilisito, Mwami wa Izilayeli, aseluka lino achingano ikuti tubone akusyoma.” Abalabo bakagankaminwa amwi anguwe bakamuseka.
MAR 15:33 Muhola lyamusanu alimwi, mudima wakazulila busena boonse kusikila kuhola lyamusanu aane.
MAR 15:34 Muhola lyamusanu aane Jesu wakalila ajwi pati wakati, “Eloyi, Eloyi, sabakkatani?” echi chipandulula kuti, “Leza wangu, Leza wangu wandisilaanzi?”
MAR 15:35 Bamwi babaabo bakayimvwi kumbali bakamvwa majwi akwe mpawo bakati, “Langa, ulikwiita Elija.”
MAR 15:36 Umwi wakachijana, wakanika nsinsa muwayini ilweela, wachibikka atete, mpawo wakamupa kuti anywe. Mwalumwi oyu wakati, “Atubone naa Elija ulaza kuzomwangununa.”
MAR 15:37 Elyo Jesu wakalila ajwi pati mpawo wafwa.
MAR 15:38 Isila lyachikombelo lyakadeluka muzipanzi zibili kuzwa kujulu kusika ansi.
MAR 15:39 Elyo mupati wabasilumamba balimwaanda wakayimvwi kalangide Jesu naakabona kuti wafwa munzila eyi, wakati, “Masimpe mwalumi oyu wali Mwana waLeza.”
MAR 15:40 Kwakaliko alimwi banakazi bakali kweebela chakule. Akati kabo kwakali Maliya Magadalini, Maliya (bayina a Jemusi mwanike a Josesi) mwalumi walikutegwa Josesi lino utegwa Jozefu muli Makko 6: 3. Izina liti Josefu lyiimikilila mbuli mbulyakali kwaamba muchiHebbulu, mpawo izina liti Josesi lyiimikilila mbuli mbulyakali kwaambwa muchiGilikki, mpawo a Salume.
MAR 15:41 Nakali muGalili bakalikumutobela mpawo akuchita milimu yakwe. Alimwi banakazi bayingi abalabo bakali kumusindikila ku Jelusalema.
MAR 15:42 Nilyakaba golezya, nkambo kakuti lyakaliZuba lya Mabambe, nkuukuti, izuba lilimusanu abuzuba butegwa Sabata,
MAR 15:43 Jozefu waku Alimatiya wakasika aawo. Wakali kulemekwa kali umwi wabapati bachisi wakali kulindila bwaami bwaLeza. Wakayinka chabulemu kuli Payileti mpawo wakakumbila mutunta waJesu.
MAR 15:44 Payileti chakamgambya kuti Jesu wakali wafwa kale; wakayita mupati wabasilumamba bali mwaanda mpawo wakabuzya kuti kulinguwe Jesu wafwa.
MAR 15:45 Elyo Payileti nakaziba kuzwa kumupati wabasilumamba balimwaanda kuti Jesu wafwa, wakuupa Jozefu mutunta.
MAR 15:46 Jozefu wakawula mulembo utentema wakamwangununa achingano, wamuvungilizya amulembo utentema, mpawo wamulazika muchiyumbwe chamumpako yabbwe. Elyo wakatendelesya bbwe wajala mulyango wachumbwe.
MAR 15:47 Maliya Magadalini a Maliya bayina a Josesi bakakubona busena Jesu mbwakalazikwa.
MAR 16:1 Nibwakamana buzuba butegwa Sabata, Meli Magadaleni, Meli banyina aJemusi, a Salome bakawula tununkilizyo kuti bayinke kuyoonanika mutumba wa Jesu.
MAR 16:2 Chifumo fumo mubuzuba butaanzi bwamviki, zuba mbulyakapasula buyo bakayinka kuchibunda.
MAR 16:3 Alimwi kabacheenda munzila bakabuzyania umwi awumwi kuti, “Nguni uutakatugwisizye bbwe kuzwa kumulyango wachibunda? ”
MAR 16:4 Pesi balange buyo, bakabona bbwe lyakali pati oko, kaligwisizigwe kale.
MAR 16:5 Nibakanjila muchibunda, bakabona mwaalumi mukubusi kasamide chisamo chituba, kakkede kululyo, mpawo bakagamba a kuyoowa.
MAR 16:6 Wakati kulimbabo, “Mutayoowi. Mulanguula Jesu mu Nazeleta, wakagankaminwa aachiingano. Tawo pe aano, ulibukide! Amulange aabusena mpubakamubikide.
MAR 16:7 Pesi kamuya, mukaambile basikwiiya bakwe a Pita kuti, ulazulula kunembo lyanu kaya ku Galilii. Nkukonya muyoomubona, mbuli mbwakaamwaambilide,”
MAR 16:8 Mbubakazwa muchibunda; kabatalika kuchijaana bakalikuteketa kabagambide. Taakwe nchimbakaambilana pe nkaambo bakali yoweede.
MAR 16:9 [Malembe mayingi aakutanguna abukamboni bwachiindi mubbuku lya Maakko Chandano 16. munchali 9 kusika ku 20 taawo pe. ] Mubuzuba butaanzi bwamviki, naakabuka, wakasanguna kulitondeezya kuli Meli Magadalena, ooyo ngwakagwisya myuuya mibi ili musanu ayiibili.
MAR 16:10 Wakayinka wakwaambila aabo bakali anguwe, aabo bakali komookaakulila.
MAR 16:11 Pesi nibakamvwa kuti Jesu muumi akuti wamubona, tebakasyoma pe.
MAR 16:12 Nikwakiinda zintu eezi, wakalibonia muzila zisiyene kuli babili, nibakalikuyobweenda kuya kumyuunzi.
MAR 16:13 Bakayinka kuyowambila basikwiya boonse, pesi taakwe nibakabasyoma
MAR 16:14 Mukweenda kwachiindi Jesu wakalibonia kulibali kkumi awumwi nibakali kulya; wakabakalalila mukutasyoma akuyuma kwamyoyo yabo, nkaambo bakakaka kuzuminina aabo bakamubona naakabuka.
MAR 16:15 Wakaamba kuti kulimbabo, “Kamuya munyika yoonse alimwi mukakambawukile zilengwa zyoonse.
MAR 16:16 Kufumbwa uusyoma akubbapatizigwa uyoofutulwa, pesi kufumbwa uutasyomi uyoopegwa mulandu.
MAR 16:17 Alimwi zigambyo eezi ziyoobatobela boonse basyoma: Bayootanda myuuya mibi muzina lyangu. bayoowambuula mumilaka mipya.
MAR 16:18 Bayoojata nzoka amaboko aabo, alimwi nibayoonywa chijaya, tachikwe kuyoobachisa pe, bayoobika maanza aabachiswa, alimwi bachiswa bayoopona.”
MAR 16:19 Mpawo Mwami naakamana kubaambila, wakatolwa kujulu mpawo wakakukkala kuluboko lwalulyo lwa Leza.
MAR 16:20 Mpawo basikwiiya bakazwa akuyookambawuka koonse koonse, alimwi Mwami wakabeeleka aabo akusiimya jwi lyakwe azitondeezyo zyakali aandilyo.
LUK 1:1 Biingi bakatola mulimu wakubikka antoomwe zintu zyakazuzikizigwa akati kesu,
LUK 1:2 mbuli mbuzyakayinzigwa kizosika kulindiswe abaabo kuzwa chiindi bakali bakamboni alubo kabali bala bejwi.
LUK 1:3 Chakabaanga nchibotu kulindime ambebo - nkaambo ndakachita mfunkununo izulide aatala azeezyo zyakachitika kuzwa kumatalikilo - kuti ndikulembele lugwalo, webo nomusongo Tiofilasi.
LUK 1:4 Kuti uzibe choonzyo aatala azintu nzuwakayiisigwa.
LUK 1:5 Mumazuba aHelodi mwami waku Judiya, kwakali umwi mupaizi wakalikutegwa Zekaliya, wakali kwakulubazu lwa Abija. Mukayintu wakwe Elizabeti alubo wakali walunyungu lwa Aaloni.
LUK 1:6 Bakaliluleme boonse kunembo lya Leza, kabalemeka milawu yoonse anzyatalide Mwami.
LUK 1:7 Pesi tebakalikwe mwana pe nkaambo Elizabetji wakali ngomwa, alubo bakali bachembaala boonse mulechi chiindi.
LUK 1:8 Lino kwakasika aachiindi Zekkaliya mpakali mubuliwo bwa Leza, kalikuchita milimu ya bupayizi mbuli mumabambe aakwe.
LUK 1:9 Mbuli munzila yachiyanza yakusala mupayizi utabeleke, wakali wasaligwa achisolo kuti anjile muchikombelo cha Leza kuti akatente tununkilizyo.
LUK 1:10 Choonse chibunga chabantu chakali kukomba aanze kuhola eelyo tununkilizyo nitwakali kutentwa.
LUK 1:11 Mungelo wa Mwami wakalibonia kuli nguwe alimwi wakayima kubbazu lyakululyo lyachipayililo,
LUK 1:12 Zekaliya, naakamubona wakateketa nkaambo kuyoowa kwakamujata.
LUK 1:13 Pesi mungelo wakati kulinguwe, “Utayoowi, Zekaliya, nkaambo nkombyo yako yamvwika. Mukako Elizabetki ulakuzyalila mwana mulombe. Uzomuuzika kuti ngu Joni
LUK 1:14 Uyooba aakukondwa akusekelela, alubo banji bayoobotelwa akuzyalwa kwakwe.
LUK 1:15 Nkaambo uyooba mupati kubusyu bwa Mwami. atazonywi wayini na zinywigwa zilula, alubo unozwide Muuya Uusalala kuzwa mwida lyabanyina.
LUK 1:16 Biingi bana ba Izilayili bayobweeda ku Mwami Leza wabo.
LUK 1:17 Uzoya kunembo lya Mwami mumuuya amumanguzu aa Elija. Uzoochita eezi kuti azosandule myoyo yamataata kuti ibweede kubana babo, kuchitila kuti batalemeki mulawu bazoyende mubusongo bwabaluleme - kuchitila kubambila Mwami bantu babambilidwe nguwe.”
LUK 1:18 Zekaliya wakati kumungelo.”Ndilaziziba biyeni eezi? Nkaambo ndachembaala abanangu bachembaala.”
LUK 1:19 Mungelo wakamusandula wati kulinguwe, “Ndime Gabbuliyeli, wiima mububewo bwa Leza. Ndatumwa kuti ndizowambule aanduwe, ndikweetele majwi mabotu aaya.
LUK 1:20 Langa, uyowumuna, tokoyokonzya kwaambula pe, kuyosika zikachitike zintu eezi. Eezi zyachitika nkaambo taakwe niwasyoma majwi aangu, ayoozuzikizigwa muchiindi cheelede.”
LUK 1:21 Lino bantu bakalikulinda Zekaliya, bakagamba kuti nkaambonzi naatola chiindi chilamfu chiloobu kachili muchikombelo.
LUK 1:22 Pesi naakazwida aanze takachili kukonzya pe kwaambula. Bakakubona kuti wakabona chilengaano nakali muchikombelo. Wakalikwaambuula katondeeka biyo muchuumunizi.
LUK 1:23 Chiindi chakumana kwamulimu wakwe nichakasika wakabweeda kung'anda yakwe.
LUK 1:24 Musule lyamazuba aaya, mukayintu wakwe Elizabeti wakajata da. Wakalisisa kwamyeezi musanu. Wakaamba kuti,
LUK 1:25 “Eechi nchaandichitila Mwami naakandilanga wandimvwida luzyalo kuti andigwisye mawuse kunembo lyabantu.
LUK 1:26 Mumweezi wamusanu awumwi, mungelo Gabbuliyeli wakatumwa kuzwa kuli Leza kuya kudpolopo lyaku Galilii litegwa Nazaleta,
LUK 1:27 kuya kuli nakalindu wakatangidwe kumwaalumi wakalikutegwa Jozefu. Wakali walunyungu lwa Devidi, alubo pzina lyamusimbi lyakali Meli.
LUK 1:28 Wakasika kulinguwe wati, “Wapona iwe noopedwe luzyalo lupati. Mwami uli aayebo.”
LUK 1:29 Pesi wakanyonga kapati amajwi aamungelo alwimwi wakagamba kuti nkujuzigwa kulibiyeni ooku.
LUK 1:30 Mungelo wakati kulinguwe, “Utayoowi, Meli, nkaambo wajana luzyalo kuli Leza.
LUK 1:31 Langa uzoojata da uzoozyale mwana mulombe. uzomuuzika zina lyakuti, 'Jesu'.
LUK 1:32 Unooli mupati alubo unoyitwa kuti Mwana wa Simajulu. Mwami Leza uyomupa chuuno chabwami bwa syanyinakulu Devidi.
LUK 1:33 Uzooyendelezya ng'anda ya Jakobo mane kukabe kutamani, alimwi bwami bwakwe tabukozoomana pe.
LUK 1:34 Meli wakati kumungelo, “Ziyoochitika biyeni eezi nkaambo nsinaziba mwaalumi pe?”
LUK 1:35 Mungelo wakatgi kulinguwe, “Muuya Uusalala uzoosika kulinduwe, alubo nguzu zya Simalelo zizoosika alinduwe. Aboobo ooyo uusalala uutazozyalwe uzootegwa Mwana wa Leza.
LUK 1:36 Langa munakwenu Elizabeti ulaada lyamwana mulombe mubuchembele bwakwe, lino wanba mumweezi wamusanu awumwi, ooyo wakalikutegwa ningomwa.
LUK 1:37 Nkaambo taakwe chimukachila pe Leza.
LUK 1:38 Meli wakati, “Langa ndimulanda waMwami, azibe kulindime mbuli majwi aako.” Mpawo mungelo wakamusiya.
LUK 1:39 Mpawo mumazuba aayo Meli wakanyamnpuka watgozya kubusena bwazilundu, kudolopo lya Judiya.
LUK 1:40 Wakanjila mung'anda ya Zekaliya wakujuzya Elizabeti.
LUK 1:41 Aawo Elizabeti naakamvwa kujuzya kwa Meli, mwana wakali mwida lyakwe wakasotoka, mpawo Elizabeti wakazuzigwa aMuuya Uusalala.
LUK 1:42 Wakoompolola ajwi pati wati, “Ulilongezezegwe iwe akati kabamwi banakazi, alubo ulilongezezegwe muchelo weda lyako.
LUK 1:43 Nkamboonzi nikchachitika kuti banyina aMwami wangu basike kulindime?
LUK 1:44 Nkaambo langa, majwi aako akundijuzya naanjila mumatwi aangu mwana uulimwida lyangu wasotoka alukondo.
LUK 1:45 Aboobo ulilongezezegwe ooyo uuyoosyoma kuti kuyooba kuzuzikizigwa kwazintu eezi nzyaakambilwa kuzwa kuMwami.”
LUK 1:46 Meli wakati moyo wangu ulalumbayizya Mwami,
LUK 1:47 alubo muuya wangu ulalumbayizya Leza mufutuli wangu.
LUK 1:48 Nkaambo wakalanga chiimo chaansi chamulanda wakwe. Nkaambo amulange, kuzwa lino mazyalane woonse ayondiijta kutghi ndili longezezegwe.
LUK 1:49 Nkaambo ooyo wandichitila zintu zipati, alimwi zina lyakwe lilasalala.
LUK 1:50 Luzyalo lwakwe luyoozulila kuzwa kuzyalane kuya kulilimbi zyalane kuli aabo bamuyoowa.
LUK 1:51 Wakatondeezya nguzu ejanza lyakwe; wakasansaanya aabo balisumpula aatala amizeezzo yamyoyo yabo.
LUK 1:52 Wakagwisya bana babaami kuzwa kuzyuno zyaabo alimwi wakasumpula aabo bali aachiimo chilaansi.
LUK 1:53 Wakakutya basinzala azintu zibotu, pesi bavubi wakabaanda kabatakwe chintu.
LUK 1:54 Wakapa lugwasya kuli Izilayeli mulanda wakwe, kuti ayeeye kutondeezya luse
LUK 1:55 (mbuli mbakaamba kuli basikale besu) kuli Abraham alunyungu lwakwe.”
LUK 1:56 Meli wakakkala a Elizabeti kwamyeezi yotatwe mpawo wabweda kung'anda yakwe.
LUK 1:57 Lino chakasikachiindi chakuti Elizabeti atumbuke aboobo wakatumbuka mwana mulombe.
LUK 1:58 Basimabambanwa antoomwe abasinzubo zyakwe bakamvwa kuti Leza wakamutondeezya luzyalo, mpawo bakabotelwa aamwi anguwe.
LUK 1:59 Mpawo mubuzuba bwamusanu aatatu bakasika kuzopalula mwana. Bakalikuyanda kumuuzika kuti “Zekaliya” zina lyawisi.
LUK 1:60 Pesi banyina bakasandula bati “Pe. ulayitwa kuti ngu Joni.”
LUK 1:61 Bakati kulinguwe, taakwe pe kuluzubo lwesu loonse ulazina eeli.”
LUK 1:62 Mpawo bakaambuula awisi anzila yakutondeeka kababuzya kuti uyanda kuti mwana awuzikwe zina lili.
LUK 1:63 Wisi wakakumbila aakulembela, mpawo wakalemba kuti, “Izina lyakwe ngu Joni.” Boonse zyakabagambya eezi.
LUK 1:64 Mpawaawo mulomo wakwe wakajulika mpawo lulimi lwakwe lwakaangunuka. Wakaambula akulumbayizya Leza.
LUK 1:65 Kuoyoowa kwakabasikila boonse bakalikukkala afwiifwi ambabo. Impuwo yoonse eeyi yakazula kumalundu achisi cha Judiya.
LUK 1:66 Boonse bakazimwa bakazibamba mumyoyo yabo, kabati, “Ooyu mwana uzooba nyamaanzi?” Nkaambo kuboko kwa Leza kwakali aanguwe.
LUK 1:67 Wisi Zekaliya wakazula Muuya Uusalala mpawo wakasinsima, kati,
LUK 1:68 “Atembawulwe Mwami, Leza wa Izilayeli, nkaambo wasika kuzogwasya alimwi weeta lufuko kubantu bakwe.
LUK 1:69 Wakatunyampwida lwija lwalufutuko mung'anda yamulanda wakwe Devidi,
LUK 1:70 mbuli mbakaambula amilomo yabasinsimi bakwe basalala bakale.
LUK 1:71 Ulatufutula kuzwa kulibasinkondoma akulibaabo batusulide.
LUK 1:72 Uzoochita eezi mukutondezya luzyalo kumataata esu akuyeeya chizuminano chakwe chisalala,
LUK 1:73 chikonke nchaakachita kuli Abbulahamu taatesu.
LUK 1:74 Wakakonka kuti swe, nitwakafutgulwa kuzwa kumaanza abasinkondoma, tuzomubelekele kaututayoowi pe,
LUK 1:75 mubusalali amubululami kunembo lyakwe mumazuba esu woonse.
LUK 1:76 Iyii, anduwe, nomwana, uzoyitwa kuba musinsimi waSimajulu, nkaambo uzoyhinda kunembo lya Mwami koyabubamba nzila, kobambila bantu mukusika kwakwe,
LUK 1:77 kupa luzibo lwalufutuko kubantu bakwe akulekelelwa kwazibi zyabo.
LUK 1:78 Eezi zizoochitika nkaambo kaluzyalo lwa Leza wesu, nkambo mukuyozwa kwazuba uzoosika kuzotugwasya,
LUK 1:79 likabamunikile bakkede mumudima amumweenzule walufu. Uyoochita eezi kuti akazulwide mawulu eesu munzila yaluumuno.”
LUK 1:80 Lino mwana wakakomena wasima mumuuya, alimwi wakakkala munkanda kuyoosika buzuba mbwakalitodeezya kuli Izirayeli.
LUK 2:1 Lino mulayo mazuba, kwakasika akuti oyo siza Agasitasi wakatamuna mulumbe kulayilila kuti kubalwa kwachitwe kwabantu boonse bapona munyika.
LUK 2:2 Oku kwakali kubalwa kutanzi kwakachitwa chiindi kkwiniliyasi nakali mwendelezyi wa Siliya.
LUK 2:3 Aboobo muntu woonse wakiinka kudolopo lyakwe kuti akalembesye kubalwa
LUK 2:4 Josefa alakwe wakinka atala kuzwa ku Galile, kuzwa kudolopo lya Nazaleta, kuya kuJudiy, kuya kudolopo lyaDavida, oyo utegwa Betelehema, nkaambo wakali wang'anda a lunyungu lwaDavida.
LUK 2:5 Wakayinka ooko kuti akalembesye aantomwe a Meli, ooyo ngwakatuminide alumwi wakali aatambu.
LUK 2:6 Lino kwakasika kuti biyo nibakachiliko oko, ichindi chakasika chakwe kuti atumbuke mwana wakwe.
LUK 2:7 Wakatumbuka mwana mulombe, mwana mutanzi wakwe, alimwi wakamuputila mumalembo akasala malamfu alimwi wamulazika muchata, nkaambo tekwakalikwe busena bulabo munga'nda yabenzu.
LUK 2:8 Kwakaliwo bembeli mubusena obo bakalikukkala mumyuunda, kabalo kulinda butanga bwabo mansiku.
LUK 2:9 Mungelo wamulami wakaboneka kuli mbabo, alimwi abulemu bwaMwami bwaka yubununwa alimbababo, alimwi bakazula akuyowa kupati.
LUK 2:10 Mpawo mungelo wakamba wakati, “Mutayowinkambo ndamwetela makani mabotu ayo atazo yete kukondwa kupati kubantu boonse.
LUK 2:11 Sunu mufuli wazyalilwa ndinywe mudolopo lyaDavida nguKKilisto mwami!
LUK 2:12 Echi nchichitondezyo chitakapegwe kuli ndinywe. Mulojana mwana kaputilidwe mulembo likasalaalimwi kalede luchaata.”
LUK 2:13 Mpawo mpawo kwakaliwo antomwe abangelo biingi loko bazwa kujulu, kulumbaizya Leza alimwi kabati,
LUK 2:14 “Bulemu kuli Leza usumpukide, alimwi ngakube luumuno munyika akati kabantu amwi amoyo ngwaboteledwe.” Amwi malembo achiindi achi Greeki alakupeleta kusiyenesiyene oko kubona kwaamba kwamabala abili akonzya kwaamba zilikumamanino amabala mache a muchala 14, yabili nkili njiyandisigwa. Kubona kwaamba nkoku.” chiyandisisyo chibotu kubantu kana akati kabantu alumwi awoyo we (LEZA) ngwabo teledwe
LUK 2:15 Kwakaba kuti awo bangelo kabali bayinka kuzwa alimbabo kuya kujulu, bembeli bakati kuli umwi awumwi, “ngatwiinke lino ku Betelehema alimwi tukabone echi chintu chachitika, echo Mwami nchatuyubnwida.
LUK 2:16 Bakafwambanina nkuko alumwi bakujana Malia, Josefa, amwana oyo wakalede muchata
LUK 2:17 Kuzwawo abo nibakabamubona, bakazibisya ezyo zimbakali babuzigwa bo atala amwana.
LUK 2:18 Boonse abo bakamvwa bakagamba kuli zezyo zyakambwa abembeli.
LUK 2:19 Pesi Maliya wakali kuyeya a makani ngakali wamvwa, wakalondolawo mumoyo wakwe.
LUK 2:20 Bembeli bakabweda kabalumbaizya akutembawula Leza kuli zyoonse ezyo zibakamvwa akubona, mbuli mbubaka mbilwa.
LUK 2:21 Elyo kwakiinda mazuba masanu aatatu, elyo nakabalulwa, wakuzikwa wategwa Jsu, izina ndyakapedwe amungelo musule katana mintwa mwida
LUK 2:22 Elyo ilangililwa mweelwe yamazuba akulisalazya kwabo nakiinda, mbuli mumulawo waMozesi, bo bakamweta kuchikombelo kuJelusalema kulomupeda kumwaami.
LUK 2:23 Mbuli mbukulembedwe mumulawu wamwami, “woonse mwana mulombe ujula ida ulo bikkwa kumbali kuMwami.”
LUK 2:24 Abobo bakapa chipaizyo mbuli ezyo zyakambidwe mumulawu wamwana, “inziba zibili nabana bankuilimba.
LUK 2:25 Amubone kwakali mwalumi muJelusalema ula zina litegwa Simiyoni, alumwi oyo mwalumi wakali luleme a kulipeda. Wakali kalangilila kumbilizigwa kwabaIzilayeli, alubo muuya usalala wakala tala anguwe.
LUK 2:26 Zyakali zyayubununwa kuli nguwe amuya usalala kutitakozobona lufu katanakubona uNanikidwewaMwami.
LUK 2:27 Kazulwidwa aMuuya, Simiyoni waka sika muchikombelo. Elyo bazyali bakanjizya mukati mwana Jeso, kulo muchitila mbuli chiyanza chabo chamulawo.
LUK 2:28 Wakamubweza mumaboko aakwe alimwi walumbaizya Leza, alimwi wakati,
LUK 2:29 “Lino leka mulandawako ayiinde mulumuno, mwami, mbuli ijwi lyako.
LUK 2:30 Nkaambo menso angu abona lufutuko lwako,
LUK 2:31 olo mbwakambilwa abuliwo bwabantu boonse.
LUK 2:32 “Mumuni wachiyubunuzyo kuli bamasi alimwi bulemu kubantu bako izilayeli.”
LUK 2:33 Wisi abanyina, bakagambilwa aatala azintu zyakalikwaambulwa aatala amwana wabo.
LUK 2:34 Simiyoni wakabalongezya mpawo wakati kuli banyina, “Amulange mwana ooyu ulisalidwe kuti kube kuwa akusumpulwa kwabamwi bantu biingi muli Izirayeli achitondeezyo chikakidwe -
LUK 2:35 alimwi ipanga liyoyasa muuya wako - kuchitila kuti myoyo myiingi ikayubununwe.”
LUK 2:36 Musinsimi mwanakazi uutegwa Ana wakaliwo. Wakali mwana musimbi waFanuwelo kuzwa kumukowa wa Asha. Wakali wapona amulumi wakwe minyaka ili musanu ayibili kuzwa kubusimbi bwakwe.
LUK 2:37 Alimwi wakali mukamufu kwamwinyaka ili makumi musanu aatatu atune. Takwe nakazwide muchikombelo pesi wakali kubelekela kulyimya a kukomba mansiku, asikati.
LUK 2:38 Kuli ndilelyo wola wakaswena afwifwi kuli mbabo almwi wakatalika kupa kulumba kuli Leza, alimwi wakambula alubo aatala amwana kubantu boonse abo bakali kulindila kufutulwa kwaJelusalema.
LUK 2:39 Eelyo aabo boonse nibakamanisya nzibakeelede kuchitambuli mulawo wamwami, bakabweeda ku Galilii, kudolopo lyabo lya Nazaleta.
LUK 2:40 Mwana wakakomena alimwi wakasima, kuyungizya mubusongo, alimwi luzyalo lwaleza lwakali aanguwe
LUK 2:41 Bazyali bakwe bakali kwiinka munyaka umwi awumwi ku Jelusalema kupobwe lya kwindilila.
LUK 2:42 Awo nakaba aminyaka kkumi ayibili, bakabweda lubo mbuli chiindi chachiyanza chabo kupobwe.
LUK 2:43 Nibakakkala mazuba azulide aa pobwe, bakabweda kumunzi. Pesi mulombe Jeso wakasyala ku Jelusalema alimwi bazyali bakwe tebakazipe.
LUK 2:44 Bakayelela kuti wakali akabunga ako nkibakayobwenda aako, mpawo bo bakenda musinzo wazuba limwi. Mpawo bakasanguna kumulangula akati kanzubo zyabo abeenzinyina.
LUK 2:45 Eelyo nibakamubula, bakabweda ku Jelusalema alimwi bakatalika kumuyandula nkuko.
LUK 2:46 Zyakachitika kuti musule lyamazuba aatatu bakasanguna kumuyandula mung'anda ya Leza, kakkede akati kabayisyi, kalokubaswilizya akubabuzya mibuzyo.
LUK 2:47 Boonse bakamumvwa bakagamba kukumvwisisisya kwakwe akunsandulo zyakwe
LUK 2:48 Elyo nibakamubona bakakankabala. Banyina bakati kulinguwe, “Mwanaangu, nkambonzi nwatujata enzila eyi? Langa, wuso andime twalikukuyandula achakutankalinkana.”
LUK 2:49 Wakati kulimbabo, “Nkambonzi nimwalikundiyandula? Temwazi na kuti ndeelede kuba mungánda yandeende?”
LUK 2:50 Pesi bo tebakamvwisisya nzyakalikwamba awayo majwi.
LUK 2:51 Elyo wakabweda kumunzi kulimbabo kuNazaleta alimwi wakali kulibombya kuli mbabo. Banyina bakalondola zyoonse ezi mumoyo wabo.
LUK 2:52 Pesi Jeso wakaya kunembo akukomena mubusongo a muchiimo, alimwi wakayungizya kuluzyalo kuli Leza aku bantu
LUK 3:1 Mumunyaka wakkumi amusanu mubweendelezi bwa Tibeliyasi Kkayisala - aawo Pontiyasi Payileti nakali mwendelezyi waku Judiya, Heloda kali mwendelezyi waku Galilii, mwana wakwabo Filipo kali mweendelezi wachisi chaku Ituliya a Tilankonitis, a Lisaniyasi kali mwendelezyi waku Abilene,
LUK 3:2 kuzwa kubupayizyi bwa Anasi aKkefasi - ijwi lya Leza lyakasika kuli Joni mwana wa Zakaliya munkanda.
LUK 3:3 Wakeenda muzisi zyoonse zizyuungulukide Joodani kakambauka lubbabbatizyo lwakusanduka akulekelela kwazibi.
LUK 3:4 Mbuli mbukulembedwe mubbuku lyamakani aIsaya musinsimi, “Ijwi lyasikompolola munkanda, 'Amubambenzila yamwami, amululamike nzila zyakwe
LUK 3:5 Yonse mimpata iyozuzukizigwa, a zilundu zyoonse atulundu tuyoba ansi amigwagwa ipilingene iyo lulamikwa, amasen aatabambinkene ayooyakwa akuba migwagw,
LUK 3:6 bantu boonse bayoobona lufutuko lwa Leza.'”
LUK 3:7 Mpawo Joni wakati kumakamu akalikuza kuzo bbabbatizigwa anguwe, “Nywebo nobana bachipile! ngwani wakamuchenjezya kuti muchije kuzwa kubukali bulokuza?
LUK 3:8 Aaboobo, muzyale michelo mibotu iitondezya kusanduka alimwi mutataliki kwaamba mukati kanu, “Tula Abulahamu kali taata wesu; mbundamwambila kuti Leza ulakonzya kusumpula bana ba Abulahamu kuzwa kumabwe aya.
LUK 3:9 Alino kaleba kalibikidwe kale kumiyanda yamisamu. Aboobo kufumbwa musamu utazyali muchelo mubotu ulawugonkela kunsi akuuwalila mumulilo.”
LUK 3:10 Alimwi makamu akendelela kunembo akumubuzya bakati, “Niinzi mpawo nzitutachite?”
LUK 3:11 Wakasandula akuti kulimbabo, “Na kulumwi uujisi twakuzwata tubili, uleelede kwabana amuntu utakwe ayooyo ujisi chakulya ayiite mbobo.”
LUK 3:12 Abasimutelo abalabo bakaza kuzo bbabbatizigwa, akwamba kuli nguwe kuti, “Muyisi, niinzi nchitweelede kuchita?”
LUK 3:13 Wakati kulimbabo, “Mutakabwezi mali nyiingi njimutabuzizigwe kubweza.”
LUK 3:14 Bamwi basilumamba abalabo bakamubuzya, bakati, “Aniswe ninzi nchitweelede kuchita?” Wakati kulimbabo, “Mutakabwezi mali kufumbwa kulumwi changuzu, alimwi mutakapenzyi omwe chakubeja. amukakutisikane amiholo yanu.”
LUK 3:15 Lino bantu nibakachili kulindila chakupekezya kusika kwa Kkilisto boonse bakali kugamba mukati kamooyo yabo aatala aJoni, kutii ngunguwe Kkilisto.
LUK 3:16 Joni wakasandula wakati kuliboonse, “Imebo lwangu ndamubbabbatizya amanzi, pele kulumwi ulobuza ulanguzu kwiinda ndime, aboobo nsikonzyi nikuba nkwangununa misungo yansangu zyakwe. Uyomu bbabbatizya aMuya Uusalala antomwe amulilo.
LUK 3:17 Kajisi pologwe yakupupuluzya mujanza lyakwe chakusalazya lubuwa lwakwe akubunganya bbali munganda yakwe. Pele uyowumpa buungu amulilo alimwi mulilo tukoyoozima pe.”
LUK 3:18 Mubwingi bwakumusumpula Joni wakalikwambula makani mabotu kubantu.
LUK 3:19 Alimwi Heloda kali mwendelezyi wakazumizigwa kukukwata mwanakazi wamwana wakwabo Helodiyasi azyoonse zintu zibi Heloda nzyakachitide,
LUK 3:20 wakayungizya ezi kulimbabo boonse, akujalila Joni muntolongo.
LUK 3:21 Lino nichakasika chiindi aawo bantu boonse bakabbabbatizigwa Jesu alakwe wakabbabbatizigwa, nibakachili kukomba, majulu akajulika,
LUK 3:22 aMuuya Uusalala muchimo chamubili wakaza mbuli nziba, alimwi jwi lyakazwa kujulu “Ulimwana wangu ngwendiyandisisya. Ndabotelwa anduwe.”
LUK 3:23 Mpawo Jesu naakatalika mulimu wakwe wakali amyaaka yakuzyalwa makumi aatatu. Wakali mwana mulombe (mbuli mbukwakaklikuyelelwa) kuti Josefa mulombe waHeli,
LUK 3:24 mwana waMatati, mwana waLevi, mwana Melichi, mwana wa Janayi, mwana waJosefa.
LUK 3:25 Josefa wakali mwana wa Matatiyasi, mwana wa Amos, mwana wa Naumi, mwana wa Esili, mwana wa Nagayi,
LUK 3:26 mwana wa Mati, mwana wa Matatiyasi, mwana wa Simiyoni, mwana wa Josekki, mwana wa Juda.
LUK 3:27 Joda wakali mwana waJowanani, mwana wa Lesa, mwana wa Zelubbabbeli, mwana wa Salatiyeli, mwana wa Neli,
LUK 3:28 mwana wa Melikki, mwana wa Elimadamu, mwana wa Eli,
LUK 3:29 mwana wa Joshuwa, mwana wa Eliyeza, mwana wa Jolimu, mwana wa Matati, mwana wa Levi
LUK 3:30 Levi wakali mwana wa Simiyoni, mwana wa Juda, mwana wa Josefa, mwana wa Eliyakim, mwana wa
LUK 3:31 Meliya, mwana wa Mena, mwana Matata, mwana wa Natani, mwana wa Davida,
LUK 3:32 mwana wa Jese, mwana wa Obbeti, mwana wa Bbowazi, mwana wa Salimoni, mwana wa Nasiyoni.
LUK 3:33 Nashoni wakali mwana wa Aminadabu, mwana Adimini, mwan wa Alini, mwana wa Heziloni, mwana wa Perez, mwana wa Juda,
LUK 3:34 mwana wa Jakkobo, mwana wa Isakka, mwana wa Abbulamu, mwana wa Tela, mwana wa Nawoli,
LUK 3:35 mwana wa Selugi, mwana wa Lewu, mwana wa Pelegi, mwana wa Ebba, mwana wa Shela.
LUK 3:36 Sila wakali mwana wa Kkayinani, mwana wa Alipazada, mwana wa Semu, mwana wa Nowa, mwana wa Lameki,
LUK 3:37 mwana wa Metusela, mwana wa Inoki, mwana wa Jaledi, mwana wa Mahalaleli, mwana wa Kkayini,
LUK 3:38 mwana wa Inosi, mwana wa Seti, mwana wa Adamu, mwana wa Leza.
LUK 4:1 Mpawo Jesu, kazwide Muuya Uusalala, wakaboola kuzwa kumulonga wa Jodani, wakazulwidwa a Muuya kuya munkanda
LUK 4:2 ooko nkwakaakusunkwa mazuba makumi one adyabbulosi. Takwe nchakalya mumazuba aayo, kumamanino achiindi echo wakaba aanzala.
LUK 4:3 Dyabbulosi wakati kulinguwe. “na kana koli mwana wa Leza lailila ibwe eli libe chinkawa.”
LUK 4:4 Jesu wakamusandula wati, “Zililembedwe, 'Muntu taponi achinkwa luzutu pe.”'
LUK 4:5 Mpawo dyabbulosi wakazulida Jesu akutomudenzya bwaami boonse bulanyika muchindi chinini.
LUK 4:6 Mpawo dyabbulosi wakati kulinguwe, “Ndilapa nduwe bwendelezi boonse abulemu mbuli mbundakabupegwa, alimwi ndilakonzya kupa kufumbwa ngundiyanda.
LUK 4:7 Kuti mpawo, na wafugama akundikomba, zilaba zyako.”
LUK 4:8 Pesi Jesu wakamusandula wati, “Zililembedwe, 'Ulelede kukomba Mwaami Leza wako, akumumanina milimu yakwe.”'
LUK 4:9 Mpawo dyabbulosi wakatola Jesu ku Jelusalema akumubikka ansonge yakaluli katempele, akumwambila kuti, “Na koli mwana wa Leza liwaalile, aansi kuzwa aawa.
LUK 4:10 Nkaambo kulilembedwe kuti, 'Uyolailila bangelo bakwe atala andinywe, kuti bakukwabilile,
LUK 4:11 mpawo bayokunyampula amaboko aabo, kuchitila kuti utakaligubbuli.'”
LUK 4:12 Nakamusandula Jesu wakati, “Kulaambidwe kuti, 'Utabiki Mwami Leza wako kumisunko.”
LUK 4:13 Mpawo diyabbulosi nakamana ku sunka Jesu, wakeenda wakamusiya kusikila chiindi chimbi.
LUK 4:14 Jesu wakabweda ku Galillaya munguzu zyamuuya, a makani atala anguwe akazulila mukati kachisi chizyungulukide.
LUK 4:15 Mpawo wakasanguna kuyisya muzikombelo zyabo alimwi wakalumbaizigwa aboonse.
LUK 4:16 Nakasika ku Nazaleta nkwakakomenezegwa, a mbuli muchiyanza, wakannjila muchikkomnbelo muzuba bwa sabata wakayimikila akubala chakompolola.
LUK 4:17 Mabhuku amunsinsimi Isaya akapegwa mumaboko akwe. Wakajula bhuku akujana ndawu yakalembedwe kuti.
LUK 4:18 “Muuya wa Leza uli aalindime, nkaambo wakandinaanika kuti ndaambe makani mabotu kuli bafwaba, wakandituma kuzowamba lwaangunuko kuli aabo baangidwe akuzobonia batakuboni, kwangununa aabo baadyaminizigwe,
LUK 4:19 kuzowamba munyaka wa Luse.”
LUK 4:20 Nakajula mabhuku, wakapa lubo kuli baka bungene kabakkede aansi. Menso aboonse bakali muchikombelo kamulangide.
LUK 4:21 Wakatalika kwambula ambabo, “Sunu eli jwi lyazuzikizigwa mukumvwa kwanu.”
LUK 4:22 Boonse awo bakambula zibotu atala anguwe akugamba majwi aakwe alumbayizigwa akalikuzwa mumulomo wakwe, bakali kuti, “Ooyu temwana wa Josefa na?”
LUK 4:23 Wakati kulimbabo, “Chamasimpe muyowaamba kasimpi aaka kulindime, musilisi liponye omwini. Kufumbwa nzitwakamvwa nzuwakachita mu Kapenawumu, ita zikozyenie akudolopo lyakulindinywe.
LUK 4:24 Pele wakati, “Nchobeni ndamwambila kuti takwe musinsimi utambulwa mudolopo lyakwe.
LUK 4:25 Pele mukasimpe ndamubuzya kuti kwakali bamuka bafu biingi mu Izilayeli muchiindi cha Elayija, ijulu nilyajalwa kwaminyaka iitatu amyeezi iilamusanu awumwi alimwi nzaala mpati yakasika munyika.
LUK 4:26 Pele Elayija taakwe nakatumwa nikuba kuli umwi wabo, pele kuli Zalafati mu Sidoni, kulimukamufu ukkala nkukooko.
LUK 4:27 Kwakali bali aazipele biingi mu Izilayeli kwamazuba a Elisya musinsimi, pele takwe nikuba umwi wakali salazidwe kusiya Namani muSayilini.”
LUK 4:28 Boonse bantu muchikombelo bakazula kuyoowa nibakamvwa zintu eezi.
LUK 4:29 Bakabuka bamutanda kuti azwe mudolopo akumuizya atala akalundu idolopo lyabo nkulyakayakilidwe nkumbali kulundu, kabayanda kuti bakamutontele aansi.
LUK 4:30 Pesi wakayinda akati kabo waya kuli bumbi busena.
LUK 4:31 Alimwi wakeendelela akuya ku Kkapenamu, idolopo lilimu Galilii, alimwi wakasanguna kubayiisya atala aSabata.
LUK 4:32 Bakagamba enjisyo yakwe, nkaambo wakali kwambula changuzu.
LUK 4:33 Lino muchikombelo kwakali mwaalumi wakali aamuuya mubi wadayimona, alimwi wakalila akoompolola ajwi pat,
LUK 4:34 “Aah! Niinzi nzitwelede kuchita anduwe, Jesu waku Nazareta? Wasika kuzotujaya na? Ndilizi kuti nduweni - Uusalala wa Leza!”
LUK 4:35 Jesu wakamutukila dayimona, akwaamba kuti, “Utaambuli zwa mulinguwe. Aawo dayimona nakamuwisya mwaalumi aakati kabo, wakazwa mulinguwe, alimwi telyakamuchisa abunini.
LUK 4:36 Boonse bantu bakagamba, alimwi bakaliswini kwambula atala anzizyo umwi awuumwi. Bakat, “Musyobo nzi wamabala ali obu? Wakulayilila myuuya mibi chabwendelezi anguzu alimwi yazwa.”
LUK 4:37 Alimwi makani mabotu akatalika kuyanzala kumabazu woonse akuchisi.
LUK 4:38 Mpawo Jesu wakazwa muchikombelo, alimwi wakanjila mung'anda ya Sayimoni. Lino banyinazyala ba Sayimoni bakalikuchiswa akupya mubili, alimwi bakabakombelezezya kuli nguwe.
LUK 4:39 Mpawo wakayimikila kunembo lyamwanakazi akukalalila kupya kwamubili, alimwi bwakamusiya bulwazi. Mpawo, wakanyampuka akutalika kubakutawukila.
LUK 4:40 Mpawo zuba nilyakabbila, bantu bakamwetela Jeso boonse bakali aamalwazi asiyenesiyene wakabika maboko akwe kuli boonse akubaponia.
LUK 4:41 Madayimona alawo akazwa kubayingi babo, kalikulila kaamba kuti, “Uli Mwana wa Leza!” Jesu wakakalalila ma daimona alimwi akutazumizya kuti uaambule nkaambo akalizi kuti ngu Kkilisto.
LUK 4:42 Lino nibwakasika buzuba bwakulyokezya, wakaya kubusena buumwide. Makamu abantu akalikumulanguula akasika nkwaakabede. Bakeezya kumukasya kuti atazwi pe akati kabo.
LUK 4:43 Pele wakati kulimbabo, “Ndilelede alimwi kukambawuka ijwi atala abwami bwa Leza kumadolopo miingi, nkaambo aka nkikambo nkindakatuminwa.”
LUK 4:44 Alimwi wakeendelela kukambawuka muzikombelo zyoonse zyamu Judiya.
LUK 5:1 Lino kwakachitika kuti bantu nibakabungene munsi aJeso akuswilila jwi lya Leza, awo nakimvwi kulubbazu lwalwizi lwa Genesareti.
LUK 5:2 Wakabona maato obile kagwisigilwe kunkomwe ya lwizi. Basikuzuba nswi bakali bazwa mulingawo bakali kusanzya tunsabwe twabo.
LUK 5:3 Jeso wakanjila mulilimwi lya bwaato, ilyakali lya Sayimon, akumukumbila kuti aligwisye kuzwa mumanzi kwamusinzo mufwifwi anyika. Alimwi wakakkala ansi akuyiisya bantu anze abwaato.
LUK 5:4 Awo nakamana kwambuula, wakati kuli Sayimoni, “Bweeza bwato ububike mumanzi uwaale mansabwe kuti uche.”
LUK 5:5 Sayimoni wakasandula wati, “Mwaami, twabeleka busiku boonse pesi takwe nchitwajata, pesi mujwi lyako, ndilawala mansabwe.
LUK 5:6 Lino nibakachita oobo, bakabungika nswi nyinji, a nsabwe zyabo zyakalikudeluka.
LUK 5:7 Mpawo bakobola benziina bakali muli bumwi bwaato kuti baboole akuzobagwasya. Bakasika akuzuzya maato obile, alimwi batalika kubbila.
LUK 5:8 Aboobo Sayimoni Pita, nakachibona wakawida kumawulu aJeso wamba, “Kozwa kulindime nkaambo ndimwaalumi uuchita zibi, Mwami.”
LUK 5:9 Nkaambo wakagamba, aboonse mbakali aabo, kunswi nzibakajata eezyo nzibakatola.
LUK 5:10 Eechi chakabikkilizya Jemusi a Joni, bana ba Zebediya, bakali basimulimunyina a Sayimoni. Jeso wakati kuli Sayimoni, “Utayoowi nkaambo kuzwa sunu kuya kunembo uyozuba bantu.”
LUK 5:11 Nibakeeta maato aabo kunze, bakasiya zyoonse akutomubela.
LUK 5:12 Chakachita kuti nakali kuli limwinya dolopo mwaalumi wakazwide chipele wakali mo. Elyo nakamubona Jeso, wakawida kubusyu bwakwe akumukumbila, wati, “Mwaami, kuti wayanda kondi salazya.”
LUK 5:13 Mpawo Jeso wakatambika janza lyakwe wamujata, wati “Ndilayanda kosalala.” Mpawaawo chipele chakamusiya.
