LUK 19:4 Nkinkaako wakachijaanina kunembo lyabantu waakutanta mumukuyu kuti amubone, nkaambo Jesu wakalikwiinda munzila eeyo
LUK 19:5 Lino Jesu naakasika aawo wakalanga mujulu mawo wati kulinguwe, “Zekiyasi, seluka chakufwambaana, nkaambo sunu ndiyookkala mung'anda yako.”
LUK 19:6 Aboobo wakaseluka chakufwambaana akumutambula chakubotelwa.
LUK 19:7 Lino bantu boonse nibazibona eezi, bakanyontooka, kabaamba kuti, “Waya kuyooswaya mwaalumi ulazibi.”
LUK 19:8 Lino Zekiyasi wakayima wati ku Mwami, “ Langa, Mwami, chisela chalubono lwangu ndilachipa bachete kuti na ndakeeneena kufumbwa muntu, ndilamujosezya kazipetedwe tume kumuulo.”
LUK 19:9 Jesu wakati, “Sunu lufutuko lwasika kung'anda eeno, nkaambo alakwe ooyu mwana wa Abbulahamu.
LUK 19:10 Nkaambo Mwana wa Muntu wakasika kuzooyandula akufutula bantu basweekede.”
LUK 19:11 Nibakachiswiilide eezi zintu, wakasngua kubaambila chikozyanisyo, nkaambo wakali afwiifwi a Jelusalemu, alimwi bakayeeya kuti bwami bwa Leza bwamba kuboneka mpawaawo.
LUK 19:12 Aboobo wakati, “Umwi mwaalumi musongo wakayinka kunyika iilikule kuyotambula bwami mpawo akuyoboola
LUK 19:13 Wakayita balanda bakwe bali kumi, mpawo wakabapa mali aalikumi akuti kulimbabo, 'Amuchite mabbindawuko mane ndikaboole.'
LUK 19:14 Pesi basichisinyina bakalimusulide alomwi bakamutumina bantu bakamutobela, bakati, 'Tatuyandi pe kuti oyu waamlumi atutonge.'
LUK 19:15 Zyakachitika naakaboola lubo, kali watambula bwaami, wakalayilila kuti bayitwe babelesi bakwe aabo mbakapede mali, kuti azibe kuti nimpindunzi njibakajana mukuchita kwabo makwebo.
LUK 19:16 Wakusanguna wakasika kunembo lyakwe wati, 'Mwami, mali yako yakazyala aambi mamali aalikumi.'
LUK 19:17 Mwaalumi wabusongo wakati kulinguwe, 'Wakachita kabotu, omubelesi mubotu. Nkaambo wakasyomeka muzintu ziniini lino ndakupa manguzu aatla amadolopo aalikumi.'
LUK 19:18 Wabili wakasika, wati, 'Mali yako, mwami, yakapanga aambi mali alimusanu.'
LUK 19:19 Mwaalumi uulemekeka wakati kulinguwe, 'Iwe tola madolopo alimusanu.'
LUK 19:20 Umwi alakwe wakasika, wati, 'Mwami, njeyi mali yako, ndakayibambide kabotu mumulembo,
LUK 19:21 nkaambo ndakakuyoowa, nkaambo ulasisa, ulabweza chuwatabikide akutebula mpuwatabyalide.'
LUK 19:22 Mwaalumi uulemekeka wakati kulinguwe, 'Amajwi aako ndilakubeteka, mubelesi mubi, wakalizi kuti ndilimuntu uusesa, ndilabweza nchindatabikide, akutebula nchindatabyalide.
LUK 19:23 Wakalumwayi nuwakatabikide mali yangu mubbanka, kuchitila kuti nindalikuyooboola ndalikuzoyijana kiili yaba aampindu?'
LUK 19:24 Mwaalumi uulemekeka wakati kuli aabo bakayimvwi kumbali, 'Amumunyanzye mali yomwe eeyo mupe ooyo uulamamali aalikumi.'
LUK 19:25 Bakati kulingwe, 'Mwami, ulamamali aalikumi kale.'
LUK 19:26 'Ndati kulindinywe, woonse uulazyo, uyoopegwa zimbi, pesi ooyo uutakwe, acheecho nchali aacho uyoonyanzigwa.
LUK 19:27 Pesi aaba basinkondoma, aabo bakatalikuyanda kuti ndibatonge, amubeete aano mubajaye kunembo lyangu.'”
LUK 19:28 Nakaamba zintu eezi, wakayinda kaya ku Jelusalemu.
LUK 19:29 Kwakachitika kuti naakasika afwiifwi abusena bwa Betipeji a Betani, kukalundu kakalikutegwa Oliveti, wakatuma basikwiiya bakwe babili,
LUK 19:30 kati, “Amunjile mugunzi lilikunembo. Mwanjila biyo mulajana mwana wadonki uutana kutantwa. Mumwaangunune mumweete kulindime.
LUK 19:31 Na kwaba utamubuzye kuti, 'Nkaambo nzi nimumwaangununa?' mukatedi, 'Mwami ulamuyanda.'”
LUK 19:32 Aabo bakatumwa bakamujana mwana wa donki mbuli mbakabalayilide Jesu.
LUK 19:33 Nibakali kumwaangununa mwana wadonki, bani bawe bakati, “Nkaambo nzi nimwaangununa mwana wa donki ooyo?”
LUK 19:34 Bakati, “Mwami ulamuyanda.”
LUK 19:35 Mpawo bakamweeta kuli Jesu, mpawo bakawaala majansi aabo aatala amwana wa donki mpawo bakakkazika Jesu aataka.
LUK 19:36 Naakalikuyabweenda bakalikuya buyala majansi aabo munzila.
LUK 19:37 Naakali waamba kusika abusena aawo Kalundu kama Oliva mpuka nkunuka, mbunga yoonse yabasikwiiya yakasanguna kubotelwa akulumbayizya Leza ajwi pati nkaambo kamilimu mipati njibakali babona,
LUK 19:38 kabati, “Ulilongezezegwe mwami uuza muzina lya Mwami! Luumuno kujulu abulemu kumajulu!”
LUK 19:39 Bamwi ba Falisi bakali munkamu bakati kuli ngwe, “Muyiisyi bakkabule basikwiiya bako.”
LUK 19:40 Jesu wakasandula wati, “Kanskinga aaba baluumwine, mabwe alikunoompolola.”
LUK 19:41 Jesu naakasika mudolopo, wakalila aatala andilyo,
LUK 19:42 kati, “Kansinga wali waziba mubuzuba oobu, ayebo, zintu zikweetela luumuno! Pesi lino zilisisidwe kulinduwe.
LUK 19:43 Nkaambo mazuba ayoosika alinduwe, aawo basinkondonyokwe nibayoyaka kaanda akukuzyunguluka akukusyanikizya kuzwa kumabazu woonse.
LUK 19:44 Bayooku wisizya aansi abana bako. Taakwe nobayoosiya niliba bbwe aatala alimwi, nkaambo taakwe nuwakachibona Leza naakalikweezya kukufutula.”
LUK 19:45 Jesu wakanjila muchikombelo akutanda boonse nakali kuuzya,
LUK 19:46 wakati kulombabo, “Kulilembedwe kuti, 'Ng'anda kyangu iyoba ng'anda yakukombela,' pesi mwayisandula kba ng'anda yabasikubba.”
LUK 19:47 Aboobo Jesu wakalikuyiisya abuzuba muchikombelo. Bapayizi bapati abalembi bamulawu abazululi babanti bakali kuyanda kumujaya,
LUK 19:48 pesi taakwe nibakajana nzila yakuzichita, nkaambo bantu boonse bakali kumuswiilila loko.
LUK 20:1 Bumwi buzuba, Jesu naakali kuyiisya bantu mutempeli akoompolola majwi mabotu, bapayizi bapati abalembi bamulawu bakasika kulinguwe abapati.
LUK 20:2 Bakaambula kabati, kabati kulinguwe, “Twaambile kuti mumanguzu aani mochita eezi zintu? Nakuti ngwani ukupa nguzu zyakuchita eezi zintu?”
LUK 20:3 Wakabasandula wati, “Ambebo ndilamubuzya mubuzyo. Amundaambile aatala
LUK 20:4 alubbabbatizyko lwa Joni. Lwakali kuzwa kujulu na kumuntu?”
LUK 20:5 Bakaambula aakati kabo, kabati, “Twati, 'Kuzwa kujulu', ulati, 'Naambo nzi nimwakatamusyoma?'
LUK 20:6 Pesi twati, 'Luzwa kumuntu,' bantu balatutulula mabwe nkaambo bazi kuti Joni wakali musinsimi.”
LUK 20:7 Aboobo bakasandula kuti tabazi pe kuti lwakali kuzwa kulini.
LUK 20:8 Jesu wakati kulimbabo, “Ambezo nsikomwaambila pe kuti ninguzu zyani nzyechita aazyo zintu eezi.”
LUK 20:9 Wakaambila bantu chikozyanisyo eechi, “Umwi mwaalumi wakabyala chiilili chama sansa, mpawo wakawubikka mumaboko anbaabo balima masansa waya kulimbi nyika kwachiindi chilamfu.
LUK 20:10 Muchiindi chakasalwa, wakatuma mubelesi wakwe kulibasimuunda. Pesi basimuunda mbakamuuma akutanda katakwe chintu.
LUK 20:11 Wakatuma lubo umbi mubelesi mpawo bakamuuma, akumunyansya akmutanda lubo katakwe chintu.
LUK 20:12 Wakatuma lubo uumbi watatu alimwi bakamuchisa, akumutandila aanze.
LUK 20:13 Aboobo mwami wachilili wakati, 'Ndilachita biyeni? Ndilatuma mwandu wangu ngweyandisya amwi balikuyomulemeka.'
LUK 20:14 Pesi nibakamubona, bakaambula aakato kabo, kabati, 'Ooyu ngosili lukono. Atumujaye kuchitila kuti lukono lube lwesu.'
LUK 20:15 Bakamusowela kunze kwalubaya, mpawo bamujaya. Niinzi lino nchabatachite mwani muunda?
LUK 20:16 Ulasika azobajaye boonse balimi nbamasansa, mpawo ape muunda kuli bamwi.” Nibakamvwa eezyo bakati, “Inche atazizumini pe Leza kuti zibe oobo!”
LUK 20:17 Pesi Jesu wakabalanga, wati, “Aambaanzi malembe aaya? 'Bbwe ndibakaka bayaki, lyakazoba ndilyo lyakazooba bbwe lya chooko'?
LUK 20:18 Woonse uuwoda abbwe eelyo uyyotyoloolwa muzimpanzi. Pesi ooyo ngujliyoowida, liyoomu pwaya
LUK 20:19 Aboobo balembi bamulaw abapayizi bapatgi bakayanda kutgi bamujate muchiindi nchicheecho, nkaambo bakalizi kuti wakaambula chikozyanisyo eechi kaamba mbabo. Pesi bakayoowa bantu.
LUK 20:20 Nibakamulangisisya obotu obotu, bakamutumina bantu bakali kulyeeneenia mbuli basalali, kuti bamuyandwiide mpatabisye kwaambuula, kuchitila kuti bamupede kabotu kulibasimilawu akumulawu wamweendelezi.
LUK 20:21 Bakabuzya kulinguwe bati, “Muyiisyi, tulizi kuti wambuula akuyiisya choonzyo, alimwi toktobelezyi mizeezo yabantu pe, pesi uyiisya choonzyo aatala anzila ya Lez.
LUK 20:22 Chili mumulawu na kuti tubbadale mitelo kuli Siza nape?”
LUK 20:23 Pesi Jesu wakalumvwisisisya lweeno lwabo, mpawo wakati kulimbabo,
LUK 20:24 “Amunditomndeezye kobili. Mbusyu azina lyani lilembedwe mpawo?” Bakaamba kuti, 'Nzizya siza.”
LUK 20:25 Wakati kulimbabo, “Akboobo amupe kuli Siza zintu zya Siza, akuli Leza zointu zya Leza.”
LUK 20:26 Bakakachilwa nbulewusi muli nzyakaamba kunembo lyabantu. Bakayimikila akugamba aatala anandulo yakwe alimwi taakwe chimbi nchibakaamba.
LUK 20:27 Lino ma Sadiusi nibakasika kulinguwe, aabo baamba kuti takukwe bubuke kubafu,
LUK 20:28 bakamubuzya bati, “Muyisyi, Molzesi wakatulembela kuti na mukulana wamwaalumi wafwa, kali walikwete, pesi katakwe mwana, ooyo mwanike weelede kukwata bana mukulana azyalile mukulana mwana.
LUK 20:29 Kwakali bananyina bali kmusanu ababili, alimwi wakusanguna wakakwata, mpawo wakafwa katakwe mwana pe,
LUK 20:30 awabili lubo.
LUK 20:31 Watatu wakanjila munda, aboobo boonse musanu ababili bakanjla mung'anda pesi boonse bakafwa taakwe wakasiya mwana pe.
LUK 20:32 Musule wakazoofwa alakwe mwanakazi.
LUK 20:33 Lino kububuke, uyooba mwanakazi wanu? Nkaambo boonse kabali musanu ababili bakali mukwete.”
LUK 20:34 Jesu wakati kulimbabo, “Bana balombe banyika iino balakwata alimwi balapegwa mulukwatano.
LUK 20:35 Pesi aabo bataka[jane bulemu bwakutambula kubuka kubafu taakwe nibatakakwate na kupegwa mulukwatano.
LUK 20:36 Tabakoyoofwa alimbi, nkaambo banooli bakozyania abangelo alimwi mbana ba Leza nkaambo mbana babubuke.
LUK 20:37 Pesi abalabo bafwide bazobusigwa, alakwe Mozesi wakatondeezya kubusena bwalusaka, awo nayita kuti Leza wa Abbulahamu a Leza wa Ayizeki a Leza wa Jakobo.
LUK 20:38 Lino tachili Leza wabafwide pe, pesi wabawumi, nkaambo boonse bapona kulinguwe.
LUK 20:39 Bamwi balembi bamulawu bakasandula bati, “Muyiisyi wasandula kabotu.”
LUK 20:40 Nkaambo taakwe nibakachilikuyanda kweezya kumubuzya lubo iimbi mibuzyo.
LUK 20:41 Jesu wakatghji kulimbabo, “Baamba biyeni kuti Kkilisito mwana wa Davida?
LUK 20:42 Nkaambo Davida lwakwe mu Bbjuku lya Ntembawuzyo waamba kuti, Mwami wakati ku Mwami wangu, 'Kkala kululyo lwangu,
LUK 20:43 mane ndikachite basinkondo nyokwe bakabe kunsi aamawulu aako'
LUK 20:44 Aboobo Davida wiita Kkilisito kuti 'Mwami', mpo mwana wa Davida biyeni?”
LUK 20:45 Kabamvwide bantu boonse wakati kulibasikwiiya bakwe,
LUK 20:46 “Amubaschenjelele balembi bamilawu, bayanisya kweenda kabazweete majansi malamfu, kabayanda kujuzigwa kulinsini muzisambalilo, azyuuno zipati muzikombelo azyuuno zisumpukide kumapobwe.
LUK 20:47 Balatola maanda aabamukabafu, akweeneena kumchita nkombyo ndamfu. Aba bayotambula kunyonyoonwa kupati.”
LUK 21:1 Jesu wakalanga wabona balumi bavubi kabalokubikka zipo munkomo yakubikkila mali.
LUK 21:2 Wakabona umwi muka mufu ufwaba kalokubikka tunini tobile.
LUK 21:3 Lino wakati, “Kasimpe ndamba obu kulindunywe, oyu muchete mukamufu wapa kwinda boonse.
LUK 21:4 Boonse bapa zipo mukwindilila mukuvula kwazyo. Pesi mukamufu, kwinda buchete bwakwe, wabikka toonse twayelede kupona ato”.
LUK 21:5 Abamwi bakali kwambula achikombelo, yasamika mabwe mabotu azituuzyo, wakamba,
LUK 21:6 “kulizezi zintu nzimubwene, izuba liyosika nikuyochala katachikwe bbwe lilatala abbwe nyina liyochala kalitawidide ansi.”
LUK 21:7 Bamumuzya bati, “Muyisi, ndilili niziyochitika zintu ezi?” Alubo nchiinzi chiyoba chitondezyo chakuti zintu ezi zyaamba kuchitika?”
LUK 21:8 Jesu wakasandula, “Amuchenjele kuti muteenwi. Nkambo bayosika muzina lyangu kabati 'ndime oyoo'a 'chindi chaba afwifwi' mutakabatobeli.
LUK 21:9 Mwakumvwa nkondo ampyompyongano mutakayowi, nkambo zintu ezi zyelede kuchitikana kusanguna, pele mamanino takayochitika kufwambana”.
LUK 21:10 Mpawo wakati kulimbabo, “Chisi chiyolwana achisi nyina.
LUK 21:11 Kuyooba mizuzumino mipati munyika, anzala mumasena asiyenesiyene azilwazi, kuyoba ziyosya azitondeezyo zipati zizwa kujulu.
LUK 21:12 Pesi kakutanachitika ezi zintu, bayobikka manza abo alindinywe akumupenzya, bamwabe muzikombelo amuntolongo, akumweeta kunembo lyabami abendelezi nkambo kazina lyangu.
LUK 21:13 Kuyoba bukamboni kulindinywe.
LUK 21:14 Nkambo kako amukanze mumyoyo yanu kuteezeezya makani ngimuyowamba,
LUK 21:15 nkambo ndime usikamupe majwi abusongo kuti boonse basinkondo nyokwe bakachilwe kukaka akukazya.
LUK 21:16 Pele muyozipegwa atala abazyali, bakulana, nzubo, abenzuma alimwi bayobikwa bamwi bana mulufu.
LUK 21:17 Muyosulwa moonse nkambo kazina lyangu.
LUK 21:18 Pele takukoyooba kasusu kakumitwe yanu kayooloba.
LUK 21:19 Kumakatazyo muyoobujana bumi bwanu.
LUK 21:20 “Nimwakubona Jelusalema yazyungulukwa ampi, lino muyoziba kuti kusaalwa kwabo kwaba afwifwi.
LUK 21:21 Lino abo bali muJudiya abachijile mumalundu, alubo bali mudolopo abazwe, abo alabo bali anze achisi tabelede kunjila mudolopo.
LUK 21:22 Nkambo aya mazuba akubwedzya chibi, kuti zintu zyoonse zilembedwe ziyoozuzikizigwe.
LUK 21:23 Mawee kuli babo bamisi akulibabo banyonsya kumazuba ayo! Nkambo kuyoba mapenzi mapati munyika, ayendelana abantu aba.
LUK 21:24 Bayojegwa apanga, bayootolwa baange kuzisi zyoonse a Jelusalemu uyoozunganisigwa abamasi kusikila chindi chabamasi chizulile.
LUK 21:25 Kuyooba zitondeezyo kuzuba, akumwezi, amunyenyezi. Amunyika, nyika iyoba akakukatazigwa nkambo kakuvuuma kwamayuwe amulwizi.
LUK 21:26 Kuyoba bantu bayoomana nguzu akuyowa akuyeya zintu zitasikile nyika. Nkambo nguzu zyakujulu ziyozunganisigwa.
LUK 21:27 Mpawo bayomubona Mwana mulombe wa Muntu kaboola mujoba munguzu amubulemu bupati.
LUK 21:28 Pele zintu ezi zyakutalika kuchitika, amunyampuke akulungumika mitwe yanu, nkambo lwangunuko lwanu lwaba afwifwi”.
LUK 21:29 Jesu wakabambila muzikozyano, “Mulange mukuyu amasamu onse.
LUK 21:30 Lino na asyuuka ndelema, anga mwabona lwanu akuziba mayinza aba afwifwi.
LUK 21:31 Lino aboobo, na mwabona zintu ezi kazichitika, muyoziba kuti bwami bwaLeza bwaba afwifwi.
LUK 21:32 Kasimpe ndamwambila obu nywe, olu lunyungu talukayindi mane zintu ezi zikachitike.
LUK 21:33 Ijulu anyika ziyoyinda, pele ijwi lyangu talikoyomana pe.
LUK 21:34 Pesi amuswilile lwanu, kuti myoyo yanu italemenwi akwindilizya kunywa akukolwa akulipenzya abuumi, azuba elyo talikoyomujana kufwambana pe
LUK 21:35 mbuli kakole. Nkambo chiyosikila kuli boonse bapona kubusyu bwanyika yoonse.
LUK 21:36 Pesi amulibambile chindi choonse, mukombe kuti mube anguzu akuchija zintu ezi zitachitike, akwiima kunembo lya Mwana mulombe wa Muntu”.
LUK 21:37 Lino kuzwa kuseni kusikila goko wakali kuyiisya muzikombelo, munsi wakali kuzwa anze akuyokkala kutegwa Oliveti.
LUK 21:38 Bantu boonse balikusika kuseni kuzomuswilizya mutempele.
LUK 22:1 Lino pobwe lyachinkwa chitakwe bumena chakali chaamba kusika, litegwa Pasika.
LUK 22:2 BaPayizi bapati alimwi abalembi bakalikuyaandula mbubanga balabika Jesu kulufu, nkaambo bakalikuyoowa bantu.
LUK 22:3 Lino Satani wakanjila muli Judasi Isikkaliyoti, ooyo wakali umwi wabalikkumi ababili.
LUK 22:4 Judasi wakayinka kubapayizi bapatki akubapati babasilumamba waakubaambila mbanga ulapeda Jesu kulimbabo.
LUK 22:5 Bakabotelwa alimwi bazuminana kuti bamupe mali.
LUK 22:6 Wakazumina alimwi wakayaandula mweenya wakubapa kule abantu.
LUK 22:7 Nibwakasika buzuba bwachinkwa chitakwe bumena, aawo nikwakeelede kupayigwa kabelele kakwiindilila.
LUK 22:8 Jesu wakatuma Pita a Joni kaamba kuti, “Mweende mukatubambile chakulya cha Pasika kuchitila kuti tzolye.”
LUK 22:9 Bakabuzya kulinguwe bati, “Nkookuli nkoyanda kuti tukachite mabambe aaya?”
LUK 22:10 Wakabasandula kuti, “Amulange naa mwanjila mumuunzi, mulaswaana mwaalumi utukkide nongo yamanzi. Mukamutobele mung'anda eeyo njatakanjile.
LUK 22:11 Amukatedi kuli muna ng'anda, “Muyiisi wati kulinduwe, ilikuli ng'anda yakulida, oomo munditalide Pasika abasikwiiya bangu?”
LUK 22:12 Uyokutondezya n'anda mpati yakulala yakujulu iili aazyoonse. Kachite mabambe ooko.”
LUK 22:13 Aboobo bakiinka, alimwi bakujana zyoonse mbuli mbakali waamba kulimbabo. Mpawo bakabamba kulya kwa Pasika.
LUK 22:14 Eelyo chiindi nichakasika, wakakkala aansi abasikwiiya.
LUK 22:15 Mpawo wakati kulimbabo, “Ndalikuyandisya kapati kulya Pasika andinywe nkesinapenzegwa,
LUK 22:16 Nkaambo ndati kulindinywe, nsikoyoolya lubo kusikila zyazuzikizigwa mubwaami bwa Leza.”
LUK 22:17 Mpawo Jesu wakabweza nkomeki, alimwi eelyo nakapa kulumba, wakati, “Mubweze eechi, alimwi mukachaabane aakati kanu.
LUK 22:18 Nkaambo ndati kulindinywe, nsikoyoonywa muchelo wa musaansa lubo kusikila bwaami bwa Leza bwasika.”
LUK 22:19 Mpawo wakabweza chinkwa, alimwi eelyo nakapa kulumba, wakachikwamuna, alimwi wakabapa, kati, “Ooyu mubili wangu, ooyo wapegwa akaambo kanu. Mukachite eechi mukuyeya ndime.”
LUK 22:20 Wakabweza nkomeki munzila yeeelene musule lya chilalilo, kalikuti, “Eeyi nkomeki nchizuminano changu chipya mu gazi lyangu, lyatilwa akaambo kanu.
LUK 22:21 Pesi muswiilile. Ooyo undiwuzya uli andime antafula.
LUK 22:22 Nkaambo Mwana mulombe wa Muntu nchobeni uliinka mbuli mbuzyakabambwa. Pesi mawe kuliwoyo muntu uyonduuzya!”
LUK 22:23 Bakatalika kuzuwisyania chabochabo kuti ngwani unga uyookonzya kuchita eechi.
LUK 22:24 Mpawo kwakaba kukazyania aakati kabo aatala akuti nguuli wabo wakalikubwezwa kali mupati.
LUK 22:25 Wakati kulimbabo, “Baami ba bamaasi mbasimalelo aatala ambabo, alimwi aabo bali aabweendelezi aatala ambabo babonwa mbuli baabo bachita bubotu kubantu babo.
LUK 22:26 Pesi tazyeelede kuba boobu pe andinywe. Anikuti, muleke ooyo mupati aakati kanu abe mbuli muniini, alimwi muleke ooyo uli alugwasyo abe mbuli ooyo ubeleka.
LUK 22:27 Nkaambo ngwani mupati, ooyo uukkala antafula, na ooyo ubeleka? Nikubaboobo ndili aakati kanu mbuli woyo uubeleka.
LUK 22:28 Pesi ndinywe nimwakiinkilila kunembo andime mumasukukusyo aangu.
LUK 22:29 Ndapa kulindinywe bwaami, mbuli Taata wangu mbakapa bwaami kulindime,
LUK 22:30 kuti mukonzye kulya akunywa aantafula lyangu mubwaami bwangu, alimwi uyookkala azyuuno kolikubeteka mikowa iilikkumi ayibili ya Izilayeli.
LUK 22:31 Sayimoni, Sayimoni, chenjela, Satani wakukumbila, kuti amwi walikukonzya kukupupulula mbuli witi.
LUK 22:32 Pesi ndakukombela, kuti lusyomo lwako lutakachilwi. Niwabweda msule lubo, simwa bakulana bako.”
LUK 22:33 Pita wakati kulinguwe, “Mwaami, ndililibambilide kwiinka ayebo koonse kuntolongo alimwi a kulufu.”
LUK 22:34 Jesu wakamusandula, “Ndakwaambila, Pita, mukuku takoyookokolika buzuba obuno, iwebo kotanandikaka tutatu kuti tondizi pe.”
LUK 22:35 Mpawo Jesu wakati kulimbabo, “Eelyo nindakamutuma aanze kamutakwe chikkwama chemali, chikkwama chazyoonse, na nsangu, mwakakubula chintu na?” Bakasandula, “Takwe pe.”
LUK 22:36 Mpawo wakti kulimbabo, “Pesi lino, ooyo uli echikkwama, mumuleke achibweze, alimwi lubo chikkwama chazyoonse. Ooyo utakwe panga weelede kuzya chikobela chakwe alimwi awule limwi.
LUK 22:37 Nkaambo ndati kulindinywe, eezyo zilembedwe aatala andime zyeelede kuzuzikizigwa, 'Wakabalwa aantomwe abatakwe mulawu.'
LUK 22:38 Mpawo bakati, “Mwaami, langa! Ngaya mapanga obile.”wakati kulimba, kwakkwana.”
LUK 22:39 Jesu wakiinka, mbuli mbakalikukkala kachita chiindi chiingi, ku Chilundu cha Olivi, alimwi basikwiiya bakamutobela.
LUK 22:40 Eelyo nibakasika, wakati kulimbabo, “Mukombe kuti mutanjili mumasukusyo.”
LUK 22:41 Wakazwa aakati kabo afwifwi aasikila bbwe lyakuwala amaboko, alimwi wakafugama aansi alimwi wakakomba,
LUK 22:42 kati, “Taata, na kamuyanda, mugwisye nkomeki eeyi kuzwa kulindime. Nikubaboobo pe pe lwangu luyando, pesi lwanu ngalukachitwe.”
LUK 22:43 Mpawo mungelo kuzwa kujulu wakaboneka kulinguwe, kalikumusimya.
LUK 22:44 Kali mukulila kupati, wakakombesya loko chanchobeni, alimwi nkasaalo yakwe yakaba mbuli malosi mapati agazi kayilikulokela anyika.
LUK 22:45 Eelyo nakazwa kukukomba kwakwe, wakaya kui basikwiiya bakwe alimwi wakabajana kabalikoona akaambo kabuusu bwakwe
LUK 22:46 alimwi wakababuzya, “Nkaambonzi nimulikoona? Mubuke mukombe, kuti mutakanjili mumasukuusyo.”
LUK 22:47 Aawo nakachilikwaambula, bona, inkamu yakaboneka, aantomwe a Judasi, umwi wa bali kkumi ababili, kali kubazulwida. Wakaza afwifwi a Jesu kuzomumyonta,
LUK 22:48 pesi Jesu wakati kulinguwe, “Judasi ulikuuzya Mwana mulombe wa Muntu alumyonto?”
LUK 22:49 Eelyo bakazyungulukide Jesu nibakabona zyakali kuchitikana, bakati, “Mwaami, tuume na apanga?”
LUK 22:50 Mpawo umwi wabo wakawuma mulanda wa mupayizi mupati, alimwi wakakwapula kutwi kwakwe kwachilisyo.
LUK 22:51 Jesu wakati, “Eezyo zyakkwana!” Wakaguma kutwi kwakwe, alimwi wakamuponia.
LUK 22:52 Jesu wakati kuli silutwe wa bapayizi ba muchikombelo, alimwi akubapati bakamubukila, “Muza mbuli kumubbi, kamuli amapanga a nkoli?
LUK 22:53 Eelyo nindakali aandinywe mazuba oonse muchikombele, takwe nimwakabika maboko aanu alindime. Pesi eeli ndihola lyanu, alimwi bweendelezi bwamumudima.”
LUK 22:54 Kabamukwensa, bakamubweza alimwi bamutola kun'anda yamupayizi mupati. Pesi Pita wakalikutobela kulekule.
LUK 22:55 Musule lyakudukula mulilo aakati kabbetekelo alimwi kabali bakkala aansi aantomwe, Pita wakakkala aakatai kabo.
LUK 22:56 Umwi mulanda mwanakazi wakamubona aawo nakakkende mumumuni wamulilo alimwi wakalanga kulinguwe chakumudunamina alimwi wakati, “Ooyu mwaalumi alakwe wakali aanguwe.”
LUK 22:57 Pesi Pita wakakaka, kati, “Mwanakazi, nsimwizi pe.”
LUK 22:58 Musule lyakayindi kaniini loko umwi wakamubona, alimwi wakati, “Nduwe umwi wabo.” Pesi Pita wakati, “Mwaalumi, tensi ndime.”
LUK 22:59 Nikwakiinda hola lyomwe uumbi mwaalumi wakasisimpizya alimwi wakati, “Nchobeni mwaalumi ooyu alakwe wakali aanguwe, nkaambo ngwaku Galili.”
LUK 22:60 Pesi Pita wakati, “Mwaalumi, nsizi pe eecho ncholikwaamba.” Chakufwambaana, nakachilikwaambula, mukuku wakakokolika.
LUK 22:61 Wakachebuka, Mwaami wakalanga Pita, alimwi Pita wakayeya ijwi lya Mwaami, eelyo nakati kulinguwe, “Mukuku katanaakokolika sunu uyondikaka tutatu.”
LUK 22:62 Pita wakiinka aanze alimwi wakakulila kapati.
LUK 22:63 Mpawo baalumi bakalindide Jesu bakamuseka alimwi bakamuuma.
LUK 22:64 Bakabika chivumbyo aatala lyakwe alimwi bakamubuzya, kabati, “Sinsima! Ngwani ooyo wakuuma?”
LUK 22:65 Bakaambula zimwi zyiingi zintu aatala a Jesu, kabalikumutuka.
LUK 22:66 Chakufwambaana mbuli mbulyakali zuba, bapati babantu bakaswaanana aantomwe, bapayizi bapati alimwi abalembi. Bakamutola mu Nkuta
LUK 22:67 alimwi bakati, “Na koli Kkilisito, twaambile.” Pesi wakati kulimbabo, “Na ndamwaambila, tamukoyoondisyoma pe,
LUK 22:68 alimwi na ndamubuzya, tamukoyoosandula pe.
LUK 22:69 Pesi kuzwa lino kaziya kunembo, Mwana mulombe wa Muntu unoyokkede kuchilisyo chamanguzu aa Leza.”
LUK 22:70 Boonse bakati, “Nkokwaamba kuti uli Mwana mulombe wa Leza?” Jesu wakati kulimbabo, “Mwaamba kuti ndime.”
LUK 22:71 Bakati, “Nkaambonzi nituchiyanda mukamboni? Nkaambo lwesu tobweni twalimvwida kuzwa kumulomo wakwe.”
LUK 23:1 Yoonse nkamu yabo yakanyampuka, mpawo bakeeta Jesu kunembo lya Payileti.
LUK 23:2 Bakasanguna kumupa milandu, kabati, “Twajana mwaalumi ooyu kali kunyongania chisi chesu, walikukaka kuti tulemeke Siza, alimwi walikwaamba kuti we ngo Kkilisito, mwai.”
LUK 23:3 Payileti wakamubuzya wati, “Uli Mwami waba Juda na?” Mpawo Jesu wakamusandula wati, “Nduwe waamba oobo.”
LUK 23:4 Payileti wakati kubapayizi bapati akunkamu yabantu, “Taakwe bubi pe mbundabona mumwaalumi ooyu.”
LUK 23:5 Pesi bakasungwaala kabaamba kuti, “Unyongania bantu, ulayiisya mu Judea lyoonse, kuzwa ku Galilii kuzosika okuno.”
LUK 23:6 Aboobo Payileti naakamvwa eezi, wakabuzya kuti ooyu mwaalumi muna Galilii na.
LUK 23:7 Naakamvwa kutgi wakali munsi lyanguzu zya Helodi, wakamutumina kuli Helodi, ooyo alakwe wakali mu Jelusalemu muli aayho mazuba.
LUK 23:8 Helodi nakabona Jesu, wakabotelwa loko, nkaambo wakalikuyandisya kumubona kwachiindi chnilamfu. Wakalikmvwa aatala anguwe alimwi wakali kulipeekezya kubona malele ngachita.
LUK 23:9 Helodi wakamubuzya makani miingi, pesi Jesu taakwe naakasandula pe.
LUK 23:10 Bapayizi bapati abalembi bamulawu bakaliimvwi aawo kabamupa milandu.
LUK 23:11 Helodi abasilumamba bakwe bakamusampawula, akumuweela, bakamuzwaatika zisamo zibotu mpawo baka bweedezya Jesu kuli Payileti.
LUK 23:12 Helodi a Payileti bakazwaaba bazolani buzuba mbuboobo (bakalibasinkondonyina chiindi choonse).
LUK 23:13 Mpawo Payileti wakiita antoomwe bapayizi bapati, batgongi antoomwe ankamu yabantu,
LUK 23:14 wakati kulimbabo, “Mwandeetela mwaalumi ooyu, mbuli muntu ulikupa kuti bantu babisye, pesi amulange, mebo, ndamubuzisisya kunembo lyenu, taakwe nindajana bubi pe kulinguwe aatala amilandu njimwamupa.
LUK 23:15 Peepe, alakwe Helodi taakwe nchaajana, nkaambo wamuboozya kulindiswe, alimwi amulange, taakwe cheelede lufu pe nchakachita.
LUK 23:16 Ndilamusubula biyo mpawo ndimwaangunune.
LUK 23:17 
LUK 23:18 Pesi boonse bakoompolola kabati, “Tatumuyandi pe swe ooyu mwaalumi, twaangunwide Bbarabbasi!”
LUK 23:19 Bbarabbasi wakali mwaalumi wakabikidwe muntolongo nkaambo kakutatgobelezya imwi milawu akujaya.
LUK 23:20 Payileti wakaambula lubo, kulimbab kali achiyandisyo chakumwaangununa Jesu.
LUK 23:21 Pesi bakoompolola, bakati, “Abambulwe, abambulwe.”
LUK 23:22 Wakabaambila lwatatu, wakati, “Nkaambo nzi, ncheechili chibi nchaachita ooyu mwaalumi? Taakwe nchindajana pe chiyanda kuti apegwe chisubulo chalufu aalinguwe. Aboobo nindazwa kumusubula ndilamwaangununa.”
LUK 23:23 Pesi bakasungwaala amajwi mapati, kabayanda kuti abambulwe. Alimwi majwi aaya akamupa kuzumina Payilet.
LUK 23:24 Aboobo Payileti wakazumina kubapa chiyandisyo chabo.
LUK 23:25 Wakaangununa ooyo ngubakali bakumbila ooyo wakabikidwe muntolongo nkaambo kabupanduki akujaya. Pesi wakapeda Jesu kuluyando lwabo.
LUK 23:26 Nibakali kuya bumuzulwida, bakajata umwi mwaalumi utegwa Sayimoni waku Sayilini, walikuzwida munyika, bakamupikuzya chiingano kayobutobela Jesu.
LUK 23:27 Nkamu mpati yabantu, abanakazi bakalikuya bumulila, bakamutobela.
LUK 23:28 Pesi wakabacheba, Jesu wakati, “Nobana basimbi ba Jelusalema, tamulili ndime, pesi amulilile lwanu abana benu.
LUK 23:29 Nkambo amulanga, alasika mazuba aawo nibayoti, 'Zililongezezegwe ngomwa, ayaayo mala akatazyalwa, ankolo zyakatanyonkwa.'
LUK 23:30 Mpawo bayootalika kuti kutulundu, 'Tuwide,' akumwaala, 'Tuvumbe.'
LUK 23:31 Nkaambo nabachita oobu kumusamu mutete, bayochita biyeni kulooyo muyumu?”
LUK 23:32 Bamwi baalumi, basimilandu babili, bakabingwa antoomwe anguwe kuti bakajiigwe.
LUK 23:33 Nibakasika kubusena butegwa “Chifuwa,” ooko bakaubambula abasimilandu babili, umwi kuulyo umwi kuchimweensi.
LUK 23:34 Jesu wakati, “Ndeende, balekelele, nkaambo tabazizi nzibachita.” Mpawo bakawuma chisilo kabaabana zisamo zyakwe.
LUK 23:35 Bantu bakaliimvwi kabalangide alimwi batkongi bakali kumuweela, kabati, “Wafutula bamwi. Alifutule, na kali Kkilisito wa Leza uusalidwe.”
LUK 23:36 Basilumamba abalabo bakamusyonsya kabamupa viniga kuti anywe,
LUK 23:37 bakati, “Na koli Mwami waba Juda, lifutule.”
LUK 23:38 Kwakaliwo alimwi chitondeezyo kumutwe aakwe chakalembedwe kuti, “Ooyu Mwami waba Juda.”
LUK 23:39 Umwi wabasimilandu wakali kulengelela kumbali aakwe wakamutukila watgi, “Teensi nduwe Kkilisito na? Lifutule utufutule aswebo.”
LUK 23:40 Pesi umwi wakamukalalila wati, “Tomuyoowi na Leza, nkaambo ulimunsi lyachisubulo chikozyenie na?
LUK 23:41 Swebo tuli aano mukweelela, nkaambo tulikutambula zitweelede kunchito zyesu. Pesi ooyu mwaalumi taakwe chibi nchachita pe.”
LUK 23:42 Alimwi wakayungizya wati, “Jesu, ukandiyeeye wakunjila kubwami bwako.”
LUK 23:43 Jesu wakati kulinguwe, “Nchobeni ndakwaambila, sunu uyoba andime mu paladiso.”
LUK 23:44 Lino lyakali lyaba wola lyamusanu akamwi, kwakaba mudima nyika yoonse mane kwakusika wola lyamusanu atune
LUK 23:45 nkaambo zuba lyakakachilwa kumunika. Mulembo wamuchikombelo waka deluka akati kuzwa kujulu do aansi.
LUK 23:46 Akukwiila ajwi pati, Jesu wakati, “Ndeende, mumaanza aako ndabikka muuya wangu.”Naakamana kwaamba oobo wakafwa.
LUK 23:47 Silumamba wa mwaanda naakabona kazichitika eezi, wakalumbayizya Leza, wakati, “Nchobeni ooyu wali mwaalumi uusalala.”
LUK 23:48 Lino bantu boonse bakabungene kuzobona zyakalikuchitika nibakabona zintu eezi zyakachitwa, bakabweeda kabafwide nsoni loko.
LUK 23:49 Pesi bazolani bakwe boonse abanakazi bakabatobede kuzwa ku Galilii bakayimikila kulekule, kabalikweeba zintu eezi.
LUK 23:50 Amulange kwakali mwaalumi wakalikutegwa ngu Jozefu, wakali waNkuta, wakali mwaalumi mubotu uululeme
LUK 23:51 (taakwe naakazuminene awo pe muzeezo wabo), wakalikuzwa kudolopo lyaku Judiya litegwa Arimathea alimwi wakalikulinda bwami bwa Leza
LUK 23:52 Ooyu mwaalumi wakayinka kuli Payileti, wakukumbila mutunta wa Jesu.
LUK 23:53 Wakawuseluzya, akuvunga mumicheka mibotu, akulazika mukabanda kakali kabbwe libezedwe, alimwi taakwe muntu wakalina lazikwa oomo pe.
LUK 23:54 Bwakali buzuba bwakubambila, alimwi buzuba bwa Sabata bwakali bwaswena.
LUK 23:55 Banakazi bamukatobede kuzwa ku Galilii, bakatobela, bakakukabona kabanda ambaakavwikwa.
LUK 23:56 Bakaboola, bakabamba tununkilizyo amafuta. Mu Sabata bakalyookezya mbuli mumulawu
LUK 24:1 Chifumofumo mubuzuba bwakusanguna bwamvwiki, bakasika kukabanda, kabeeta tununkilizyo tubakali babamba.
LUK 24:2 Bakajana bbwe lilitontedwe kuzwa kukabanda.
LUK 24:3 Bakanjila mukati, pesi tebakawujana pe mutunta wa Mwami Jesu
LUK 24:4 Zyakachitika kuti, aawo kabachigambide aatala azeezi, mpawaawo, kwakiimikila baalumi babili kumbali lyabo kabazwete zisamo zibayima.
LUK 24:5 Aawo banakazi nibakazula kuyoowa bakafundamika busyu bwabo, bakati kubanakazi, “Muyandwiidanzi bapona kubafu.”
LUK 24:6 Tawo pe aano, pesi wabusigwa! Amuyeeye mbakaambula kulindinywe naakachili ku Galili,
LUK 24:7 kati Mwana wa Muntu weelede apedwe kumaanza abasizibi akabambulwe, mpawo mubuzuba bwatatu akabuke lubo.”
LUK 24:8 Banakazi bakayeeya majwi aakwe,
LUK 24:9 bakeenda kuzwa kukabanda bakwaambila zyoonse eezi kulibalikumi awumwi abamwi boonse.
LUK 24:10 Lino Meli Magadalena, Jowana, Meli banyina a Jemusi abamwi banakazi mbibakali aabo, bakakwaamba zintu eezi kubatumwa.
LUK 24:11 Pesi majwi aaya akabaanga ngakubeja nibakaamvwabatumwa, tebakabasyoma pe banakazi.
LUK 24:12 Mpawo Pita wakanyampkuka wachijaanina kuchuumbwe, wakakotama kalikuyuna mukati wakabona micheka kiili ayilikke, wakabula kuti niinzi chachitika.
LUK 24:13 Amulange babili babo bakalikuyabweenda buzuba mbuboobo kabatozya kugunzi litegwa Emawusi, lyakali kasinzo kuzwa ku Jelusalema.
LUK 24:14 Bakalikuyabuzuwa aatala azintu zyakachitika.
LUK 24:15 Zyakachitika kuti, kabachiyabuzuwa akubuzisisyania, Jesu lwakwe wakabeezya weenda aabo.
LUK 24:16 Pesi menso aabo akaksigwa kuti bamuzibe.
LUK 24:17 Jesu wakati kulimbabo, “Nobabili niinzi nchimuyobwaambula nimuyobweenda awa?” Bakayimikila kabali amawuse.
LUK 24:18 Umwi wabo uutegwa Kiliyopasi, wakamusandula, “Te nduwe olike mu Jelusalem uutazi zintu zyalikuchitika mumo mazuba aaya?”
LUK 24:19 Jesu wakati kulimbabo, “Zintu nzi eezyo?” Bakamusandula bati, “Zintu zili aatala a Jesu muna Nazaleta, wakali musinsimi, wakali aanguzu kunchito akujwi kunembo lya Leza akubantu boonse.
LUK 24:20 Ambubakamupeda bapayizi bapati abatongi besu kuti apegwe mulandu wakujiigwa.
LUK 24:21 Pesi ytwakali twasyoma kuti nguwe uutakaangunune Izilayeli. Iyii, kunze kwazyo zyoonse eezi, kwaba mazuba aatatu zintu zyoonse eezi kazichitikide.
LUK 24:22 Pesi kakuliboobo, bamwi banakazi mbituyabweenda aabo batugambya, nibalikuchibuda chifumo.
LUK 24:23 Nibakuubula mutunta wakwe, bakuboola, kabaamba kuti babona chilengano chabangelo babili balikubaambila kuti wabuka.
LUK 24:24 Bamwi lubo baalumi mbituli aabo bachijaanina kuchibunda bakujana mbubo mbuli mbubaamba banakazi. Pesi tabamubwene pe.”
LUK 24:25 Jesu wakati kulimbabo, “Nywebo nobaalumi bafubafuba animuli aamyooyo iichedwa kusyoma kulizyoonse zyakaambwa abasinsimi!
LUK 24:26 Teensi zyakaleelede na kuti Kkilisito aswaanane amapenzi woonse aya na, akuti anjile mubulemu bwakwe?”
LUK 24:27 Mpawo kusangunina kuli Mozesi akubasinsimi boonse, Jesu wakali kubapandulwida zyoonse zyakalangene aawe mumalembe woonse
LUK 24:28 Kabali baamba kusika kugunzi eelyo nkukbakali kuyabuya, Jesu wakachita aanga uyanda skwinda kaya kunemboo.
LUK 24:29 Pesi bakamukombelezya, bakati, “Kkala aswebo, nkaambo lyaamba kuba goko zuba lyaamba kubbila.” Aboobo Jesu wakanjila wakkala aabo.
LUK 24:30 Chakachitika kuti, naakakkala aansi ambabo kuti balye, wakabweza chinkwa, wakachilongezya, wakachikwamuna mpawo wakabapedekezya.
LUK 24:31 Mpawo menso aabo akajulika, mpawo bakamuziba, mpawo tebakachilikumubona pe.
LUK 24:32 Bakati aakati kabo, “Myoyo yesu niyatapya mukati kesu, nalikwaambuula kulindiswe munzila, aawo nalikutujulila magwalo?”
LUK 24:33 Bakanyampuka mu wola ndileelyo babweda ku Jelusalema. Bakajana balikumi awumwi kababungene antoomwe, antoomwe abaabo mbibakali aabo,
LUK 24:34 bakalikuti, “Mwami wabuka nchobeni, alimwi walibonia kuli Sayimoni.”
LUK 24:35 Aboobo bakabaambila zintu zyakachitika munzila, akuti Jesu wakayubununwa byeni kulimbabo naakali kukwamuna chinkwa.
LUK 24:36 Kabachaambula zintu eezi, Jesu lwalkwe wakayimikila aakati kabo, wakati kulimbabo, “Luumuno alube kulindinywe.”
LUK 24:37 Pesi bakateketa akuzula kuyoowa, bakayeeya kuti babona cheelo.
LUK 24:38 Jesu wakati kulimbabo, “Nkaambo nzi nimulikataazya? Nkaambo nzi mibuzyo niyazula mumyoyo yenu?
LUK 24:39 Amulange maboko aangu amawulu aangu, kuti ndime nchoonzyo. Amundigume mubone. Nkaambo cheelo tachikwe nyama amafuwa, mulindibwene me ndilaazyo.”
LUK 24:40 Naakaamba eezi, wakabatondeezya maboko amawulu aakwe.
LUK 24:41 Nibakachizwide lukondo lwiingi, alimwi okambagambide, Jesu wakatgi kulmbabo, “Mujisi chakulya na?”
LUK 24:42 Bakamupa chimpanzi chamuswi wakabizizigwe.
LUK 24:43 Jesu wakachibweza, alimwi wakalya kunembo lyabo.
LUK 24:44 Wakati kulmbabo, “Nindakachili aandinywe, ndakamwaambila kuti zyoonse zilembedwe mumulawu wa Mozesi abasinsimi amuntembawuzyho zyeelede kuzuzikizigwa.”
LUK 24:45 Mpawo wakajula menso aabo kuti bamvwisisisye malembe.
LUK 24:46 Wakati kuli mbabo, “Aboobo kulilembedwe, kuti Kkilisitu welede kupenzegwa, akabuke lubo kubafu mubuzuba bwatatu.
LUK 24:47 Alimwi kusanduka akulekelelwa kwazibi kweelede kukakambawukwe muzina lyakwe, kunyika zyoonse, kutalikila mu Jelusalema.
LUK 24:48 Mulibakamboni bazeezi zintu.
LUK 24:49 Amulange ndilikutumina kulindinywe eecho Ndeende nchakasyomezya. Pesi amukkale mudolopo kusikila mukajane nguzu kuzwa kujulu.”
LUK 24:50 Mpawo Jesu wakabazulwida kunze mane bakusika afwiifwi aku Bbetani. Wakanyampula maboko aakwe, wakabalongezya.
LUK 24:51 Zyakachitika kuti, naakachili kubalongezya, wakabasiya alimwi wakanyampwidwa kujulu.
LUK 24:52 Aboobo bakamukomba, mpawo bakabweeda ku Jelusalemu mulukondo lupati.
LUK 24:53 Bakakkala kabali muchikombelo kabalongezya Leza
JOH 1:1 Kumatalikilo kwakali Ijwi, mpawo Ijwi wakali aaLeza, aboobo Ijwi wakali Leza.
JOH 1:2 Ooyu wakali aaLeza kumatalikilo.
JOH 1:3 Zyoonse zintu zyakaanzwa kwiindila mulinguwe, alimwi naatali nguwe nekutakwe chomwe chakaanzwa.
JOH 1:4 Mulinguwe momwakali buumi, alimwi buumi oobo bwakali mumuni wabantu.
JOH 1:5 Imumuni ulamunika mumudima, alimwi mudima tuuzundide pe.
JOH 1:6 Kwakali mwaalumi wakatumidwe kuzwa kuli Leza, zina lyakwe wakali Joni.
JOH 1:7 Wakazide mbuli kamboni kuzoolungulula aatala amumuni, kuti boonse basyome kwiinda mulinguwe.
JOH 1:8 Joni taakali mumuni pe, pesi wakazide kuzoopa bukamboni aatala amumuni.
JOH 1:9 Imumuni wamasimpe, uumunikila bantu boonse, wakalikuyobuza munyika.
JOH 1:10 Wakali munyika, inyika yakaanzwa kwiinda mulinguwe, aboobo inyika teyakamuziba pe.
JOH 1:11 Wakaza kulibakwe mwini, alimwi ibakwe mwini tebakamutambula pe.
JOH 1:12 Pesi kuli boonse bakamutambula, ibakasyoma muzina lyakwe, wakabapa cheelelo chakuba bana ba Leza.
JOH 1:13 Aaba tebakazyalwa ku bulowa, nanka kukuyanda kwanyama, nanka kukuyanda kwa mwaalumi, pesi kukuyanda kwa Leza.
JOH 1:14 Ijwi wakaba mubili akupona aakati kesu. Twakabona bulemu bwakwe, bulemu bubaanga mbubwayooyo omwe alimwi alike wakazwa kuli Taata, uuzwide luzyalo a bwini.
JOH 1:15 Joni wakamupeda bukamboni akukwiila nkati, “Ooyu ngonguwe ngundakali kuti, 'Ooyo uuza musule lyaangu mupati kwiinda ndime, nkaambo mutaanzi kulindime.'”
JOH 1:16 Nkaambo kuzwa mukuzulila kwakwe toonse twakatambula luzyalo kuzwa ku luzyalo.
JOH 1:17 Nkaambo mulawu wakapegwa kwiinda kuli Musa. Luzyalo a bwini zyakaza muli Jesu Kkilisito.
JOH 1:18 Tawo pe wakali wabona Leza. Leza uumwi alike, uulikubbazu lya Taata, wakachita kuti Leza azibikane.
JOH 1:19 Oobu mbobukamboni bwa Joni eelyo ma Juda nibakatuma bapayizi a baLevi kulinguwe kuzwa ku Jelusalema kuyomubuzya kuti, “Nduweni?”
JOH 1:20 Wakaamba - teensi wakakaka pe, pesi wakaamba - “Teensi ndime Kkilisito pe.”
JOH 1:21 Eelyo bakamubuzisisya, “Nduweni mpo? Nduwe Elayija na?” Wakati, “Nsilinguwe pe.” Bakati, “Ulimusinsimi na?” Wakasandula wati, “Pe.”
JOH 1:22 Mpawo bakayi kulinguwe, “Nduweni, kuchitila kuti tukape nsandulo kulibabo bakatutuma? Ulityeni nomwini?”
JOH 1:23 Wakati, “Ndili jwi, lyoompolola munkanda: 'Mululamike inzila ya Mwaami; mbuli Isaya musinsimi mbwakaamba.”
JOH 1:24 Lino bamwi benkamu ya baFalisi bakatumwa,
JOH 1:25 mpawo bakabuzya kulinguwe nkabati, “Nkaambonzi nobbabbatizya na kotali Kkilisito na Elayija na musinsimi?”
JOH 1:26 Joni wakabasandula, wati, “Ime ndibbabbatizya aamanzi. Pesi aakati kenu kwiimvwi uumwi ngomutazi.
JOH 1:27 Ngonguwe uyoobuza musule lyangu, ngwesikonzyi kwaangununa ntambo yansangu zyakwe.”
JOH 1:28 Eezi zintu zyakachitwa mu Bbetani mutal aa Jodani, ooko Joni nkwakali kubbabbatizya.
JOH 1:29 Nebwakacha Joni wakabona Jesu nkayobuza kulinguwe mpawo wamwaambila kuti, “Langa, ngoyu mwana wembelele wa Leza uuugwisya zibi zyanyika! Ooyu ngonguwe ngundakali kuti,
JOH 1:30 “Ooyo uuza musule lyangu mupati kwiinda ndime.'
JOH 1:31 Teensi ndakalimwizi p, pesi kuti ayubununwe kuli Izilayeli nchenchicho nchendakaza nkebbabbatizya amanzi.”
JOH 1:32 Joni wakapa bukamboni nkati, “Ndabona Muuya nkaseluka mbuli nziba kuzwa kujulu akukkala alinguwe.
JOH 1:33 Tendamwizi pe, pesi ooyo wakandituma kubbabbatizya mumaanzi wandibuzya kuti, “Ali yooyo ngotabone Muuya kaseluka akukkala aalinguwe, ngonguwe uubbabbatizya muMuuya Uusalala.'
JOH 1:34 Ndabona aantomwe akupa bukamboni kuti ooyu Mwaana waLeza.”
JOH 1:35 Alubo, zuba lyakatobela, aawo Joni kayimvwi abasikwiiya bakwe babili,
JOH 1:36 bakabona Joni Jesu kayobweend, mpawo Joni wakati, “Amubone, Mbelele ya Leza!”
JOH 1:37 Basikwiiya bakwe bobile bakamumvwa nkawamba oobu mpawo bakatobela Jesu.
JOH 1:38 Mpawo Jesu wakacheba wababona nkabayobumutobela eelyo wakabaambila kuti, “Muyandaayi?” Bakasandula, “Rabbi” (chitolekelwa kuti “Muyiisi”), “Ukkala kuli?”
JOH 1:39 Wakabaambila kuti, “Musike muzoobone.” Mpawo bakayinka akuyoobona aawo mpakali kukkala, bakakkala anguwe zuba eelyo, nkaambo lyakali hola lyakkumi.
JOH 1:40 Umwi wababili aaba wakamvwa Joni nkawambuula mpawo akutobela Jesu wakali Endulo, ngubazyalwa kumwi a Sayimoni Pita.
JOH 1:41 Wakasanguna kubonana amwana wakwabo Sayimoni akumwaambila kuti, “Twamubona Mesiya” (chitolekelwa kut, Kkilisito).
JOH 1:42 Wakamweeta kuli Jesu aboobo Jesu wakamulanga akwaamba kuti, “Nduwe Sayimoni mwana wa Joni. Uyooyitwa kuti Sifasi” (chitolekeledwe: Pita).
JOH 1:43 Nebwakacha, aawo Jesu nakali kuyanda kuya ku Galilaya, wakajana Filipi mpawo wakamwaambila kuti, “Nditobele.”
JOH 1:44 Eelyo Filipi wakalikuzwa ku Bbetisayida, idolopo lyaba Endulo a Pita.
JOH 1:45 Filipi wakajana Nataniyeli mpawo wamwaambila kuti, “Ooyo Mozesi ngwakalemba mumulawu, aba Sinsimi, twamubona: Jesu mwana wa Josefa, uuzwa ku Nazaleta.”
JOH 1:46 Nataniyeli wakati kulinguwe, “Kuli chintu chibotu na chikonzya kuzwa mu Nazaleta?” Filipi wakati kulinguwe, “Kweza alimwi ubone.”
JOH 1:47 Jesu wakabona Nataniyeli kayobuza kulinguwe mpawo waamba kuti aatala anguwe, “Bona, mu Izilayeli wamasimpe, utakwe lweeno!”
JOH 1:48 Nataniyeli wakati kulinguwe, “Wandiziba biyeni?” Jesu wakasandula akwaamba kuti kulinguwe, “Nkatanakukwiita Filipi, nkoli munsi aamukkuyu, ndalikubwene.”
JOH 1:49 Nataniyeli wakasandula, “Rabbi, uli mwana wa Leza! Uli Mwaami wa Izilayeli!”
JOH 1:50 Jesu wakamusandula nkati, “Nkaambo kakuti ndati kulinduwe, 'Ndakubona koli munsi aamukkuyu; ulasyoma na? Uchizoobona zintu zipati kwiinda eezi.”
JOH 1:51 Mpawo wakati, “Nchobeni, ndakwaambila kasimpe, uyoobona julu nkali julikide, abangelo ba Leza nkabatanta akuseluka aatala aMwana wa Muntu.
JOH 2:1 Nkakutanayinda mazuba otatwe, kwakaba muchado kuKkana ku Galili, mpawo banyina a Jesu bakaliko.
JOH 2:2 Jesu a basikwiya bakwe bakalitambidwe kumuchado.
JOH 2:3 Lino wayini nakamana, banyina a Jesu bakati kuli nguwe, “Tabachikwe wayini.”
JOH 2:4 Jesu wakati kuli mbabo, “yomwanakazi, nkambonzi noza kulindime? Ichiindi changu tachina sika.”
JOH 2:5 Banyina bakati kubalanda, “kufumbwa nchata mwambile, muchichite.”
JOH 2:6 Lino kwakali musanu ayimwi mpoto zyamabwe zyakali kubelesegwa a ma Juda kuma pobwe akusanzya, achimwi nkachili abulamfu kusikila kututatu.
JOH 2:7 Jesu wakabaambila kuti, “Ngamuzuzye mpoto zyamanzi.” Aboobo bakazuzya kusikila kulumpimpito. Mpawo wakabambila babelesi,
JOH 2:8 “Mubweze lino aakupa mupati wakwaaba.” Bakachita mbubobo.
JOH 2:9 Mupati wakwaba wakalabila maanzi akaba wayini, Pesi takaziba kwakazwa manzi ( Pesi babelesi bakatekede manzi bakalizi). Mpawo wakazwa sibwinga.
JOH 2:10 mpawo wakaya kuli nguwe, “woonse muntu uupa wayini mubotu lutanzi alimwi ulamuulo uselukide wayini nibakolwa. Pesi kabambala wayini mubotu kusikila lino.”
JOH 2:11 Echi chitondezyo nchitanzi Jesu nchakachita mu Kkana ya Galili, alubo wakayubununa bulemu bwakwe, antomwe abasikwiya bakwe bakasyoma mulinguwe.
JOH 2:12 Musule lyazeezi Jesu, abanyina, abana bakwabo, mpawo abasikwiya bakaselukila ku Kapenawumu alimwi bakakukkala kwamazuba mache biyo.
JOH 2:13 Lino i Pasika lyaba Juda lyakali afwifwi, mpawo Jesu wakatanta akuya ku Jesu Jelusalemu.
JOH 2:14 Wakajana basambali baaba sune ambelele abasambali benkwilimba muchikombelo, abasikula bakalikkede mumo.
JOH 2:15 Lino wakachita chimboko chakoosa akubatanda boonse aanze kuzwa muchikombelo, kubika antomwe ambelele ang'ombe. Wakamwayusya makobili amali zyabawuli mpawo wasowa matafula.
JOH 2:16 Kubasambazyi bankwilimba wakati, “mubweze zintu zizwe awa. Muleke kuchita ing'anda ya Taata chisambalilo.”
JOH 2:17 Basikwiya bakwe bakayeeya kuti zyakalilembedwe, “busungu bwakumaandenu bwandisyukuta.”
JOH 2:18 Alimwi ba Juda bendelezi bakaziswilila mpawo bakati kuli nguwe, “Nchitondezyoyi nchotatutondezye?”
JOH 2:19 Jesu wakasandula, “Amumwayule chikombelo, mpawo mumazuba otatwe ndachimika lubo.”
JOH 2:20 Lino bendelezi baba Juda bakati, “Eechi chikombelo chakayakwa muminyaka ilimakkumi oone - amusanu - alimwi, mpawo ulibusya mumazuba otatwe?”
JOH 2:21 Nikuba kuti, wakalikwambula ataala achikombelo chamubili wakwe.
JOH 2:22 Kunembo akubusigwa kuzwa kulufu, basikwiya bakwe kabayeya kuti wakalambide, mpawo bakasyoma kumalembe akutwambo ntwaakamba Jesu.
JOH 2:23 Lino kali mu Jelusalemu kupobwe lya pasika, kali kupobwe, biingi bakasyoma muzina lyakwe nibakabona zitondezyo nzyakachiita.
JOH 2:24 Pesi Jesu takabasyoma nkambo wakalibezi boonse,
JOH 2:25 nkambo takayanda kuti naba omwe ape bukamboni atala a muntu, nkambo wakalizi chakali mulinguwe.
JOH 3:1 Lino kwakaliwo mu Falisi wakali kutegwa Nikkodimasi, muzululi wama Juda.
JOH 3:2 Ooyo mwaalumi wakaza kuli Jesu mansiku, mpawo wakati kulinguwe, “Muyiisyi kuti uli muyiisyi wakazwa kuli Leza, nkaambo tawope ukonzya kuchita zitondeezyo eezyo chita ado Leza ulaanguwe.
JOH 3:3 Jesu wakasandula kuli nguw, “Nkasimpe, kasimpe ado muntu wazyalwa bupya lubo takonzyi kubona bwami bwa Leza.”
JOH 3:4 Nikkodemasi wakati kulinguwe, “Mbubuli muntu mbwakonzya kuzyalwa nkali wachembaala? Tachikonzyoi kunjila lwabili mutumbu lyabanyina mpawo akuzyalwa, ulakonzya na?
JOH 3:5 Jesu wakasandula, “Nkasimpe, nkasimpe ado muntu wazyalwa amaanzi amuuya, takonzyi kunjila mubwami bwa Leza.
JOH 3:6 Eecho chizyalwa kunyama ninyama, mpawo eecho chizyalwa kumuuya muuya.
JOH 3:7 Utagambi eecho nchindakwaambila, uyeelede kuzwalwa bupya.
JOH 3:8 Luuwo luloonga kufumbwa nkuluyanda; ulamvwa muzuumo pesi tokonzyi kuziba nkulwazwa nekunba nkuluya. Nkikaako woonse muntu ooyo uzyalwa amuuya mbwabede.
JOH 3:9 Nikkodemasi wakasandula kuti, “Mbubuli mbuzikonzya kuba zintu eezi?”
JOH 3:10 Jesu wakasandula wati kulinguwe, “ Uli mwiiyi wa Isiolayili na aboobo tomvwisyi zintu eezi?
JOH 3:11 Nkasimpe, nkasimpe ndakwaambila, twaambwa nzitwizi, mpawo tupa bumboni aatala anzitwakabona. Aboobo totambuli bumboni bwesu.
JOH 3:12 Na ndakaambide aatala azintu zyanyika mpawo twasyoma, mbuli mbokonzya kusyoma na ndakwambila ataala azintu zyajulu?
JOH 3:13 Tawope wakaliinkide kujulu kunze kwayooyo wakaseluka kuzwa kujulu- Mwana aa Muntu.
JOH 3:14 Mbubonya mbuli Mozesi mbwakasumpula nzoka munkanda, mbobonya Mwana aa Muntu mbwayosumpulwa,
JOH 3:15 kuti boonse basyoma bakabe abuumi butamani.
JOH 3:16 Mbuli Mozesi mbwakasumpula nzoka munkanda, mbombubo Mwana aa Muntu mbwazoosumpulwa, kuchitila boonse basyoma mulinguwe kuti babe aabuumi butani.
JOH 3:17 Oobuya Leza mbwakayandisya nyika, eelyo wakiipa Mwana wakwe simuzyalwa aalike kuti kufumbwa uumusyoma mulinguwe atafwidilili pesi kuti aabe aabumi butamani. Obuya Leza takatuma Mwana munyika kuti azoobeteke nyoka, pesi kuti azoofutule nyika kwiinfa mulinguwe.
JOH 3:18 Ooyo usyoma muli nguwe takoyoobetekwa, pesi ooyo utasyomi wabetekwa kale nkaambo taasyoma muzina lya Mwana alike wa Leza.
JOH 3:19 Aaka nkikaambo kakutonga: Mumuni wasika munyika mpawo bantu bayanda mudima kwiinda mumuni nkaambo nchito zyabo nzyabubi.
JOH 3:20 Woonse uuchita bubi wasula mumuni aboobo tasiki kumumuni, kuchitila nchito eezi kuti zitabonwi.
JOH 3:21 Nikuba kuti, ooyo uuchita kasimpe wasika kumumuni kuchitila zilaantanganana ziboneke eezyo nchito kuti zyachoitwa muli Leza.
JOH 3:22 Musule acheechi, Jesu abasikwiiya bakwe bakayinka munyika ya Judiya. Ooko wakakukkala kkala antoomwe ambabo akubbabbatizya.
JOH 3:23 Lino Joni alakwe wakali kubbabbatizya mu Ayinoni afwiifwi ku Salimu nkaambo kwakali meenda mayingi nkuko. Bantu bakalikusika kulinguwe mpawo bakali ku bbabbatizigwa,
JOH 3:24 nkaambo Joni takalina waalwa muntolongo.
JOH 3:25 Lino aawo kwakabuka lukazyano aakati kabasikwiiya ba Joni aba Juda aatala aapobwe lyakusanzyania.
JOH 3:26 Bayiinka kuli Joni mpawo bamwaambila kuti, “Labbi, ooyo wakali aanduwe kulimwi bbazu lyamulonga wa Jodani, aatala ayooyo ngwakalungulula, laanga, uliiku bbabbatizya mpawo boonse balikwiinka kulinguwe.”
JOH 3:27 Joni wakasandiula, “Muntu takonzyi kutambula chintu na chapegwa kulinguwe kuzwa kujulu.
JOH 3:28 Iwe lwako omwini ulanzya kupa bukamboni bwacheecho nchindakaamba, pesi kuti takatumwa kunembo lyakwe.
JOH 3:29 Mulumi ngwaasibwiinga. Lino muzolwani wasibwiinga, ooyo uyiimikila akuswiilila nguwe, ulabotelwa kapati nkkambo kajwi lyasibwiinga. Eechi lino, ndo0lukondo lwangu ngalwazulila.
JOH 3:30 Weelela kuti kusumpulwa mebo ndifwiinsigwe.
JOH 3:31 Ooyo uzwa kujulu ulaajulu azyoonse. Ooyo uzwa aansi uzwa aansi mpawo wambuula aatala aansi. Ooyo uzwa kujulu uli aajulu azyoonse.
JOH 3:32 Ulungululua aatala acheecho nchakabona anchakamvwa, pesi taakwe uzumina bukamboni bwakwe.
JOH 3:33 Ooyo utambula bukamboni wazuminina kuti Leza nkasimpe.
JOH 3:34 Ooyo Leza ngwatuma wambuula majwi aa Leza. Pesi tapi mweelo wamuuya.
JOH 3:35 Taata uyanda Mwana mpawo wakamupa zyoonse zintu mumaboko aakwe.
JOH 3:36 Ooyo usyoma ku Mwana uli aabuumi butamani, pesi ooyo ukaka Mwana takwe kuyoobona buumi, pesi bukali bwa Leza bulakkala aalinguwe.”
JOH 4:1 Awo Jesu nakaziba kuti ba Falisi bakamvwa kuti wakalikuba abasikwiya biingi mbakali kubbabaatizya kwinda Joni
JOH 4:2 (nekuba kuti welwakwe mwini tensi wakali kubbabbatizya pe, pesi basikwiya bakwe mbabo bakali kubbabbatizya),
JOH 4:3 wakazwa mu Judiya wabweda lubo ku Galilaya.
JOH 4:4 Pesi chakalelede kuti ayinde mu Samaliya.
JOH 4:5 Elyo wakasika mumunzi wamu Samaliya utegwa Sychal afwifwi achipanzi chanyika eyo Jakobo njakali wapa mwanakwe Josefa.
JOH 4:6 Chikala cha Jakobo chakaliwo. Jesu wakali wakatala kuzwa mulwendo lwakwe mpawo wakakkala kumbali achikala. Lyakali sikati.
JOH 4:7 Umwi mukayintu mu Samaliya wakaza kuzoteka manzi, elyo Jesu wakati kulinguwe, “Ndipe manzi nwe”.
JOH 4:8 Nkambo basikwiya bakwe bakali banjila mumunzi kuyowula kulya.
JOH 4:9 Mpawo mukayintu mu Samaliya wakamwambila kuti, “Chikonzeka buti, kuti webo nomu Juda undikumbile chakunywa imebo ndemukayintu mu Samaliya”. nkambo ma Juda tabakwe bulidilano pe ama Samaliya.
JOH 4:10 Jesu wakasandula wati, “ anoli walizi chipo cha Leza, akuti ngwani ukukumbila manzi, wayinokumbila nduwe, nkekupa manzi mawumi”.
JOH 4:11 Mukayintu, wakati kulinguwe, “ Yomwalumi, tokwe chakutesya pe mpawo chikala nchilamfu. Ani mpo ulaajanayi ayo manzi abuumi?
JOH 4:12 Tooli mupati, mbubo na, kwinda taata Jakobo, wakatupa chikala akunwa kuli nchicho lwakwe mwini, abana bakwe ambono zyabo?
JOH 4:13 Jesu wakasandula wati kulinguwe, “woonse unywa manzi amuchikala echi uyoba anyota lubo. Kufumbwa unywa manzi nginjomupa takoyoba a nyota limbi.
JOH 4:14 Pesi, manzi ngesikamupe ayoba kasensa kamanzi mulinguwe, kakunka mane kukabekutamani”.
JOH 4:15 Mukayintu wakati kulinguwe, “ Mwami, ndipe manzi ayo kuchitilakuti nsikabi anyota akuti nsizoboli lubo kuzoteka manzi awa.”
JOH 4:16 Jesu wakati kulinguwe, “ koya, ukite mulumako, mpawo ubolano”
JOH 4:17 Mukayintu wakati kulinguwe, “nsikwe mulumi pe”. Jesu wakati, “waamba kasimpe kuti nsijisi mulumi pe”.
JOH 4:18 Nkambo wakala baalumi musanu, ooyo ngolawe lino temulumako pe. Nzwawamba zilisinizizye.”
JOH 4:19 Mukayintu wakati kulinguwe, “mwami ndabona kuti ulimusinsimi.
JOH 4:20 Mataata esu bakali kukomba muchilundu echi pesi muti Jelusalema mbobusena bantu nkubelede kukombela.”
JOH 4:21 Jesu wakati kuli nguwe, “yomukayintu ndisyome, chindi chilasika awo nemutakakombe Taata kutali muchilundu echi nabi mu Jelusalemu.
JOH 4:22 Mukomba nchomutazi. Swebo tukomba nchetuzi, nkambo lufutuko luzwa kuba Juda.
JOH 4:23 Nekubaboobo chindi chilasika, nchenchichechi, awo bakomba mukasimpe mpobayomukomba Taata mumuya amubwini, nkambo Taata mbembabo bantu mbayandula kuti babe basikumukomba.
JOH 4:24 Leza ngumuya, aboobo bantu bamukomba belede kumukomba mumuya amubwini”.
JOH 4:25 Mukayintu wakamwambila kuti, “ndilizi kuti Mesiya uyobuza( ooyo utegwa Kilisito)”. Nazosika uzotupandulwida zyonse.
JOH 4:26 Jesu wakamwambila kuti, “ndendime nguwe oyu uwambula ayebo”.
JOH 4:27 Aleecho chindi basikwiya bakwe bakaboola. Elyo bakagamba kuti nkamboyi nambula amukayintu, pesi taakwe wakamba kuti, “uyandayi?” na kuti “Nkamboyi nambula awe?”
JOH 4:28 Awo mukayintu ooyu wakasiya noongo yakwe yamanzi, wabweda kumunzi, wakwambila bantu,
JOH 4:29 “kamuza, muzobone mwalumi wandambila zintu zyonse nzendakachita. Oyu tekujana waba Kilisito na, nkujana waba nguwe?”
JOH 4:30 Bakazwa mumunzi baza kulinguwe.
JOH 4:31 Achindi nchichecho, basikwiya bakwe bakali kumukombelezya kuti “Rabbi, lya”
JOH 4:32 Pesi wakati kulinguwe, “Ime ndakulya nkomutazi atala ankuko.”
JOH 4:33 Awo basikwiya bakakazyania akati kabo, “Takwe muntu wamwetela kulya pe, mpali na?”
JOH 4:34 Jesu wakati kulimbabo, “kulya kwangu nkuchita luyando lwayoyo wakandituma akumaninsizya mulimu wakwe.
JOH 4:35 Sa tamwambi kuti, 'kuchili myezi yoone nekutakabe goloka'? Ndokumwambila kuti, amunyampule meso anu mulange myunda, nkambo yabizwa kale yelela kutebulwa!
JOH 4:36 Oyo utebula utambula chakufola akubungika michelo yabumi butamani, kuchitila kuti oyo ubyala ayooyo utebula bakakondwe antomwe.
JOH 4:37 Mulichechi kalasinizya kambyo kati, “umwi ulabyala utebula ngumbi”.
JOH 4:38 Ndakamutuma kuyotebula nchemwakata lima. Bamwi bakalima, inywe mwakanjila mumilimu yabo.
JOH 4:39 Bantu biingi bamu Samaliya bamumunzi oyu bakamusyoma nkambo ka mbakalungulula mukayintu wakali kupa bukamboni, “wandambila zyonse nzendakachita”.
JOH 4:40 Bantu bamu Samaliya nibakasika kulinguwe, bakamu kumbila kuti akkale aboo, wakakkala mumunzi oyu kwamazuba aabili.
JOH 4:41 Kwakaba bambi biingibakamusyoma nkambo kajwi lyakwe.
JOH 4:42 Bakati kumukayintu ooyu, “Tatuchisyomi nkambo kanzwawamba pe, pesi nkambo swebo tobeni twalimvwida, mpawo twaziba kuti nsonzyo oyu mufutuli wanyika”
JOH 4:43 Nakiinda mazuba aya obile oko waya ku Galilaya.
JOH 4:44 Nkambo Jesu lwakwe mwini wakamba kuti musinsimi takwe bulemu muchisi mwazwa.
JOH 4:45 Nakasika mu Galilaya, bantu bamu Galilaya bakamutambula. Bakali bazibona zyonse nzyakali wachita mu Jelusalemu chindi chapobwe, nkambo abalabo bakaliko kupobwe
JOH 4:46 Alimwi wakaboola lubo ku Kenani mu Galilaya, oko nkwaka sandula manzi kuba wayini. Elyo kwakali umwi sichuno ulemekwa wakala mwana wakali kuchiswa mu Kapenawume.
JOH 4:47 Nakamvwa kuti Jesu wasika mu Galilaya kuzwa mu Judiya, wakaya kuli Jesu akumukumbila kuti aakaponie mwana wakwe, wakali wamba kufwa.
JOH 4:48 Jesu mpawo wakati kuli kulinguwe, “Ado mubone zitondezyo azigambyo, tamukosyoma”.
JOH 4:49 Ooyu sichuno wakamwambila kuti, “Mwami, boola natana fwa mwanangu”.
JOH 4:50 Jesu wakati kuli nguwe, “kooy. Mwanako ulapona”. Ooyu mwalumi wakasyoma majwi Jesu ngakamba kulinguwe, mpawo wakenda.
JOH 4:51 Nakachili kuyobwenda wakaswanana aabalanda bakwe, bakamwambila kuti, mwanakwe muponi.
JOH 4:52 Elyo wakababuzya chindi mwanakwe nakatalika kumvwa kabotu. Bakamwambila kuti, “jilo sikati nakapona”
JOH 4:53 Mpawo wisi wakayibalukwa kuti nchechindi awo Jesu, “Mwana wako wapona.” Elyo we lwakwe mwini abanganda yakwe bakasyoma.
JOH 4:54 Echi chakaba chitondezyo chabili echo Jesu nchakachita nakazwa mu Judiya kaya mu Galilay.
JOH 5:1 Nikwakamana aya kwakaba pobwe lya maJuda, alakwe Jesu wakayinka kuJelusalema.
JOH 5:2 Elyo muJelusalema afwifwi amulyango wambelele kwakali kalambw, kitwa kuti muchi Alamayiki Betesida, kwakayakidwe nganda ilamanda alimusanu.
JOH 5:3 Ibantu bingi bakali kuchiswa, boofu, bateendi, abalebukide bakalikulinda mpawawo.
JOH 5:4 Nkambo mungelo wakali kuseluka akukopa manzi mulizimwi zyindi elyo kufumbwa walikunjila imanzi nkachikopegwa wakali kupona kuzwa kubulwazi fumbwa mbwali kuchiswa.
JOH 5:5 Awo kwakali umwi mwalumi wakali kuchiswa kwaminyaka ilimakkumi otatwe amusanu ayitatu. Awo Jesu nakamubona nkalede
JOH 5:6 mpawaw, nkali waziba kuti waliwawo kwachindi chilamfu. Wakati kulinguwe, “ulayanda na kuponesegwa?”
JOH 5:7 Mulwazi wakati, “Mwami, nsikwe muntu wakundinjizya mudambwa awo manzi na kopanisigwa, awo nenti njile, umwi anga wandindila kunjila.”
JOH 5:8 Jesu wakamwambila kuti, “Nyampuka, bweza buulo bwako, uyende.”
JOH 5:9 Mpawawo oyu mwalumi wakapona, mpawawo wakabweza buulo bwakwe elyo wakenda. Yino obo buzuba bwakali kutegwaSabata.
JOH 5:10 Aboobo bamaJuda bakamwambila kuti oyu mwalumi wakaponesegwa, “ Sunu niSabata tozumizigwi pe kubweza buulo bwako.”
JOH 5:11 Wakati, “Oyo wandiponia wati kulindime, 'bweza buulo bwako wende.”'
JOH 5:12 Bakamubuzya kuti, 'ngwani mwalumi oyu mwalumi wakubuzya kuti, bweza buulo bwako uyende'?”
JOH 5:13 Nekuliboob, iwakasilikwa takamwizi pe kuti ngwani nkambo Jesu wakazwebeleka wanjila mubantu, mukuti kwakali bantu bingi abusena oobu.
JOH 5:14 Kuzwawo, Jesu wakamujana mutempele wamwambila kuti “boona, wapona! Utakabisyi limbi, kuchitila kuti zibi kwinda awa zitakakuchitikili.”
JOH 5:15 Imwalumi oyu wakazwa waya kuyobuzya maJuda kuti nguJesu wamuponia.
JOH 5:16 Ino nkambo kazezi zintu maJuda bakapenzegwa Jesu, mukuti wakachita zintu ezi muzuba litegwa Sabata.
JOH 5:17 Jesu wakati kulimbabo, “ Taata ulokubeleka ayin, aboobo ambebo, ndookubeleka.”
JOH 5:18 Nkambo kazez, maJuda bakayindilila kuyanda kumujaya mukuti takatyola Sabata biyo pe, pesi akuti lubo wakita Leza nkati nguwisi mwini, kulyelanisya aLeza.
JOH 5:19 Jesu wakabasandula, “Nchobeni, imwana takonzyi kuchita chintu mwini, ado biyo zyabona Taata nkachita, nkambo kufumbwa Taata nchalokuchita, Imwana uchita munzila njiyo.
JOH 5:20 Nkambo Taata ulamuyanda Mwana aboobo ulamutondezya zyonse nzyachita mwini, akumutondezya zintu zipati kwinda ezi kuti mugambe.
JOH 5:21 Mbubo Taata mbabusya bafwide akubapa buumi, aboobo alakwe Mwana ulapa buumi kuli kufumbwa ngwasal.
JOH 5:22 Nkaambo Taata takwe ngwabeteka, pesi wakapa lubeta loonse kuMwami.
JOH 5:23 Kuchitila kuti bantu boonse bakalemye Mwana mbuli mbobalemya Taata. Oyo utalemyi Mwana talemyi Taata wakamutuma.
JOH 5:24 Nchobeni, nchobeni, Oyo umvwa ijwi lyangu akumusyoma wakandituma ulabuumi butamani mpawo tayopegwa mulandu, pesi winda kuzwa kulufu kuya kubuumi.
JOH 5:25 Nchobeni, nchobeni, ndamwambila chindi chiyobuza, ayino nchenchichechino, awo bafwide mpobayomvwa ijwi lyamwana Leza, abaabo bamvwa bayo pona.
JOH 5:26 Nkaambo mbuli Taata mbala buumi mulinguwe mbubo mbapede Mwana kuti abe abuumi muli nguw,
JOH 5:27 Mpawo Taata wakapa mwana bwendelezi bwakubeteka nkambo mwana wa muntu.
JOH 5:28 Mutagambi aatala azez, nkaambo kulichindi chiyobuza mulinchicho woonse muntu ulimuchumbwe mpayo limvwa ijwi lyakwe
JOH 5:29 Mpawo bayozwa aboobo bakachita kabotu kububuke bwamwami aabobo bakachita bubi kububuke bwalubeta.
JOH 5:30 Nsikonzyi kuchita chintu lwangu. Mbuli mbomvwa ndabeteka, mpawo kubeteka kwangu kuliluleme nkaambo nsiyobuyandula luyando lwangu pesi luyando lyayoyo wakanditum.
JOH 5:31 Ikuti ndalipeda bukamboni lwangu ndemwin, bukamboni bwangu tabunosinizyi pe.
JOH 5:32 Kuli umwi upeda bukamboni atala andime mpawo ndizizi kuti bukamboni mbwapa atala anduwe bulisinizizye.
JOH 5:33 Mwakatuma bantu kuli joni mpawo wakapa bukamboni businizizye.
JOH 5:34 Pesi bukamboni mbotambula tabuzwi kumuntu. Ngwamba zintu ezi kuti mukonzye kufutulwa.
JOH 5:35 Joni wakali lampi lyakali kuyaka akumunik, mpawo mwakanda kukondwa mumumuni wakwe kwakindi.
JOH 5:36 Pesi ibukamboni mbondabo mbupati kwinda bwa Jon, nkaambo imilimu eyo
JOH 5:37 Taata njandipa kuti njimanisizy, njiyo milimo njechit, indipede bukamboni kuli Taata wakandituma. Taata wakandituma lwakwe mwini wakandipeda bukambon.
JOH 5:38 Tamuna kumumvwida jwi nanka kumubona chimo chakwe naba achili chind. Tamukwe ijwi likkalilide pe mulindinyw, nkaambo tamulikusyoma pe muliyooyo ngwakatum.
JOH 5:39 Mulayandula magwalo nkaambo muyeye kuti muli ngawo mulibuumi butaman, mpawo ngayaya magwalo apeda bukamboni aatala andime.
JOH 5:40 Inywe tamukwe chiyandisyo chakuza kulindime kuti mukonzye kuba abuumi.
JOH 5:41 Nsitambuli mulema buzwa kumuntu,
JOH 5:42 , pesi ndilizi kuti tamukwe luyando lwa Leza pe mulindinywe.
JOH 5:43 Ndasika muzina lya Taat, inywe inywe tamunditambuli pe. Ikuti umwi wasika muzina lyakw, mulakonzya kumutambul.
JOH 5:44 Mbobuli mbomunga mulasyom, inywe nomutambula bulemu kuzwa kulibamwi banu pesi tamuyanduli bulemu buzwa kuli Leza alike?
JOH 5:45 Mutayeyi kuti lwangu ndemwini njomupa mulanda kunembo lya Taata. Uyomupa mulanda ngu Musa, mulinguwe mumwakabikide bulangizi.
JOH 5:46 Ikuti mwakamusyoma Mus, mwayinondisyoma ambeb, nkambo wakalemba atala ambebo.
JOH 5:47 Ikuti kamutasyomi malembe akw, mbobuli mbomuyosyoma majwi angu?”
JOH 6:1 Nikwakayinda zintu ezi, Jesu wakayinka bubambene alwizi lwaku Galili, lwambwa kuti lwizi Tebeliyasi.
JOH 6:2 Inkamu mpati yakamutobela nkaambo bakabona zitondezyo zyakali kuchita kuli bakachisidwe.
JOH 6:3 (Jesu wakaya kuchilundu oko wakaakukkala ansi abasikwiiya bakwe.
JOH 6:4 Lino Pasika, pobwe lyaba Juda, lyakali aafwifwi.)
JOH 6:5 Elyo Jesu wakalanga kujulu wakabona makamu makamu aleza kuli nguwe, wakaamba kuti kuuli Filipo,” nkuukuuli nkutunga tulawula chinkwa kuti balye aaba?.”
JOH 6:6 ( Pesi Jesu wakaamba ezi kuti asunke Filipo, wee wakalizi kuti niinzi nzyatachite.)
JOH 6:7 Filipo wakamusandula, “myaanda yobile yampondo tiikokwana pe kuti umwi awumwi ajane nikati kucheya.”
JOH 6:8 Umwi wabasikwiiya, Andileya mukulana wa Simoni Pita, wakaamba kuti kuli Jesu,
JOH 6:9 kuli kalombe okiya kalaazinkwa zili musanu zinkwa zyabbali atuswi tubili, pesi niinzi ezi akati kabiingi?”
JOH 6:10 Jesu wakati,” chita kuti bantu bakkale aansi, bakali mweelwe wazyuulu zili musanu.
JOH 6:11 Mpawo Jesu wakabweza zinkwa alimwi naakamana kupa kulumba wakapa abo bakakkede ansi. Wakachita bukozyeniye akunswi, kazili zyiingi mbuuli mbubakayandide.
JOH 6:12 Bantu nibakakkuta, wakati kuli basikwiiya bakwe,” amubunganiye bufwefwelenga bwachaala, mpawo kaatakwe buta bulike pe.”
JOH 6:13 Mpawo bakabunganiya bufwefwelenga bazuzya nsuwo zili kkumi azibili kuzwa bufwefwelenga bwazinkwa zili musanu zyabbali twachaala nibali kulya.
JOH 6:14 Mpawo, bantu nibakabona ezi zitondeezyo nzyaakachita, bakati, “Akakasimpe kuti musinsimi usikide munyika.”
JOH 6:15 Jesu naakaziba kuti baamba kusika kukumujata changuzu akumuchita mwami, wakabweeda kuchilundu alikke.
JOH 6:16 Nilyakaba mansiku, basikwiiya bakwe bakaya munsi aalwizi.
JOH 6:17 Bakanjila mubwaato, bakaya bweenda atala alwizi lwaku Kkapenawumi. kwakali kwasikila kuli cheecho chiindi, alimwi Jesu takayinaasika pe kulimbabo.
JOH 6:18 Iguwo lili anguzu lyakabawuma, elyo lwizi lwaka yuuntana.
JOH 6:19 Nibakakwasula mamayela asikabe makkumi abili amusanu naa makkumi atatu amamayeli bakabona Jesu Jesu uleenda atala alwizi alimwi kazabuza kubwaato, eelyo bakayoow.
JOH 6:20 Pesi wakaamba kuti kuli mbabo, “Ndime! mutayoow.”
JOH 6:21 Mpawo bakayandisya kumutambula mubwaat, aboobo bwaato bwakafwambana kuyosika anyika nkubakali kuya.
JOH 6:22 Izuba litobela, inkamu yakayimvwi mumbali aalwizi yakabona kuti takuchikwe bwaato kunze kwabumwi, Jesu mbwatanjila abasikwiiya bakwe pesi basikwiiya bakwe bakayinka abalikke.
JOH 6:23 Nikuba boobo, kwakali aamwi maato akazwa kuli Tibbeliyasi kubambene abusena nkubakali kuula zinkwa naakamana kupa kulumba mwaami.
JOH 6:24 Nkamu niyakaziba kuti naa Jesu naa basikwiiya bakwe bakaliwo, abalabo bakanjila mubwaato elyo bakaya ku kkapenawume kuya bulanguula Jesu.
JOH 6:25 Nibakamujana kubbazu limwi lya lwizi bakaamba kuti kuli nguwe,” Muyiisi, wakasika lili okuno?”
JOH 6:26 Jesu wakabasandula, wati,” kasimpe, mulandilanguula, kutali kuti mwaba zitondeezyo pe, pesi nkaambo kakuti mwakalya zinkwa akukkuta zinkwa alimwi mwaka kkuta.
JOH 6:27 Mutabelekeli kulya kumana, pesi mubelekele kulya kutola kubuumi butamani buumi Mwana a Muntu mbwayomupa, aboobo Leza Taata uyodinda chidindo chakwe alimbabo.
JOH 6:28 Mpawo bakaamba kuti kulinguwe,” nchinyamaanzi nchitweelede kuchit, kuchitila kuti tuchite mulimu wa Leza?”
JOH 6:29 Jesu wakasandula akwaamba kuti kuli mbabo,” Oyu ngumulimu wa Leza: kuti musyome oyo ngwakatuma.”
JOH 6:30 Mpawo bakaamba kuti kuli nguwe,” Nchichili chitondeezyo nchutachite, kuchitila kuti tubone akusyoma? Ulachita buyeni?
JOH 6:31 BamaTaata bakalya mana munkanda, mbuuli mbukulembedwe, 'wakapa zinkwa kuzwa kujulu kuti balye.
JOH 6:32 Mpawo Jesu wakabasandula wat, “nkasimpe, nkasimpe, tali Mozesi pe wakamupa zinkwa kuzwa kujulu, pesi ngu Taata uumupa zinkwa zinkwa chini chini chizwa kujulu.
JOH 6:33 Aboobo chibunge cha Leza nheecho chisika aansi kuzwa kujulu akupa buumi kunyika.”
JOH 6:34 Mpawo bakamwaambila kuti,” Mwaalumi, kotupa chinkwa echi lyoonse.
JOH 6:35 Jesu wakabaambila kuti, “ndime chinkwa chabuumi; oyo uuza kulindime tachiyoobi anzala limbi, ayooyo uusyoma mulindime takoyobaa anyota limbi.
JOH 6:36 Pesi ndamwaambila obu kuti mulindibwene, alimwi tamusyom.
JOH 6:37 Boonse mbaandipa Taata balasika kuli ndime abo baza kulindime, tandibasweeli aanzepe.
JOH 6:38 Ndakasika aansi kuzwa kujuli, pe kuchita luyando lwangu, pesi kuyanda kwayooyo wakandituma.
JOH 6:39 Oku nkuyanda kwayooyo wakandituma, kuti nditasweekelwi omwe aabo mbakandipa, pesi ndiyoobabusya kubuzuba bwamamanino.
JOH 6:40 Eno olu ndoluyando lwa Taata, ikuti umwi awumwi uubona Mwana akusyoma mulinguwe uyooba abumi butamanini alimwi ndiyomubusya mubuzuba bwamamanino.
JOH 6:41 Mpawa ba Juda bakatongawuka aatala anguwe nkambo wakamba kuti,” ndichinkwa chakazwa kujulu.”
JOH 6:42 Bakaamba kuti,” saa tali ooyu Jesu mwana wa Jozefu, wisi abanyina mbituzi, mpaali mpaambila obo, ' Ndaza aansi kuzwa kujulu?”
JOH 6:43 Jesu wakasandundulu akubaambila kuti,” amuleke kutongawuka akati kanu
JOH 6:44 tawope naba omwe uuza kulindime anukuti Taata wakandituma wamweeta, aboobo ndomubusya mubuzuba bwama maninino.
JOH 6:45 Kuli lembedwe mubasinsimi,” ikuti boonse balooyisigwa a Leza. Umwi awumwi wakamvwa akwiiya kuli Taata ulaza kulindime.
JOH 6:46 Taakwe wakabona Taata kunze kwayooyo wakazwa kwa Leza wakabona Taata.
JOH 6:47 Nkasimpe, nkasimpe, ooyo usyoma ulaabumi butamani.
JOH 6:48 Ndichinkwa chabuumi.
JOH 6:49 Bamawuso bakalya mana munkanda, aboobo bakafwa.
JOH 6:50 Echi chinkwa chizwa kujulu, lino kuti muntu wachilya tafwi.
JOH 6:51 Ndichinkwa chabuumi chakaza aansi kuzwa kujulu. Kuti naa umwi wachilya chinkwa eechi, uyoopona lyoonse. Chinkwa nchipa ngomubili wangu bube buumi bwanyika.”
JOH 6:52 Bajuda bakanyema akati kabo akukazyania kabaamba kuti,” anga mwaalumi oyu ulatupa buti mubili wakwe kuti tulye?”
JOH 6:53 Mpawo Jesu wakabaambila kuti,” Nkasimpe, nkasimpe, kuti tewalya mubili wa Mwanaamuntu akunywa bulowa bwake, tamukoyooba aabumi pe.
JOH 6:54 Kufumbwa uulya mubili wangu akunywa bulowa bwangu uyooba aabumi butamani alimwi ndiyomubusya kubuzuba bwamamanino.
JOH 6:55 Nkaabo mubili wangu nkulya kwini abulabo bulowa bwachakunywa chinichin.
JOH 6:56 Umwi awumwi uulya mubili wangu akunywa bulowa bwangu ulakkalilila mulindim, ambebo mulinguwe.
JOH 6:57 Mbuli Taata mbwakandituma, ambuuli mbupona nkaambo ka Taata, aboobo uundilya me, uyoopona nkambo kandime.
JOH 6:58 Echi nchinkwa chakaseluka aansi kuzwa kujulu, chitali eecho bamaTaata nchibakalya akufwa. Uulya chinkwa eechi uyopona lyoonse.”
JOH 6:59 Pesi Jesu wakaamba zintu eezi muchikombelo naakachili kuyiisya mu Kkapenamu.
JOH 6:60 Mpawo biingi basikwiiya bakwe bakamvwa bakati,” okukwaamba nkuyumu; ngwani uukonzya kukumvwisya?”
JOH 6:61 Jesu, nkaambo wakalizi lwakwe kuti basikwiiya bakwe kuti balokutongawuka azazi, wakabaambila kuti,” zyamukataazya na?
JOH 6:62 Mpawo muyochita buti mwaakubona Mwana a Muntu wayinka oko nkwakabede saansi?
JOH 6:63 muya uuchita buponi; inyama tiikwe mpindupe. Majwi ngindakamwaambila ngamuuya, alimwi alapona.
JOH 6:64 Nikuba oobo mpubali bamwi banu batasyomi,” nkaambo Jesu wakalizi kumatalikilo bamwi bakatali kusyoma alimwi bakali basikumwaaba.
JOH 6:65 Wakaamba kuti,” nkaambo kazezi nchindaamba kuti taakwe naba omwe uukonzya kusika kuli ndime kuti tapegwa aa Taata.”
JOH 6:66 Nkaambo kazeezi, basikwiiya bakwe biingi bakamwayika alimwi taakwe nibakachilikweenda awe.
JOH 6:67 Mpawo jesu wakaambila bali kkumi ababili,” tamundi na kwiinka anywebo, mulayandana?'
JOH 6:68 'Simoni Pita wakasandula kuti,” mwaami, tulaya kuliini? uuli amajwi aabumi butamani,
JOH 6:69 alimwi twakasyoma akuziba kuti nduwe uusalala wa Leza.”
JOH 6:70 Jesu wakabaambila kuti,” teensi ndakamusalana, balikkumi ababili, akati kanu umwi ngu satani?”
JOH 6:71 lino wakali kwamba Judasi mwana wa Simoni Isikkaliyoti, wakalinguwe, omwe akati kabali kkumi ababili, uutamwabe Jesu.
JOH 7:1 Nikwakamana zintu ezi Jesu wakayinka ku Galili, nkambo talikuyanda kwinka ku Judiya nkambo ba Juda balikumulangula kuti bamujaye.
JOH 7:2 Lino ipobwe lyaba Juda lyamadumba lyakali afwifwi.
JOH 7:3 Bakulana bakwe bakati kuli nguwe, “zwa busena obu uyeku Judiya, kuchitila kuti basikwiya bakwe babone milimu njabeleka.
JOH 7:4 Takwe chelede kuchitwa mukusisikizya kuti kayanda kuzibinkana antanganana. Kuti mwachita zintu ezi, litondezye kunyika.
JOH 7:5 Nkambo abalabo bakkulana bakwe tebakali kumusyoma.
JOH 7:6 Jesu wakabambila kuti, “Chindi changu tachinasikape, pesi chindi chanu mpuchili kale.
JOH 7:7 Inyika timuswilide pe nywebo, pesi mebo ilindiswilide nkambo ndamba kuti milimu yaayo mibi.
JOH 7:8 Kamuya mupobwe; mebo tandikoyinka pe kupobwe nkambo chiindi changu tachina zuzikizigwa pe.”
JOH 7:9 Nakamana kwamab zintu ezi kulimbabo, wakakkala mu Galili.
JOH 7:10 bakulana bakwe bakiinka kupobwe, alakwe wakinka, kutali kwantanganana pe pesi mukusisikizya.
JOH 7:11 Ba Juda bakali kumulangula kupobwe balamba kuti, “Ulikuli?”
JOH 7:12 Kwakali mizeezo myiingi akati kankamu yabantu atala anguwe. Bamwi bakati, “Mwalumi mubotu.” Bamwi bakati, “pe, ulokusowa makamu abantu.”
JOH 7:13 Katakwe wakambula antanganana atala anguwe bakali kuyowa ba Juda.
JOH 7:14 Ipobwe nilyakaba akati kuti limane, Jesu wakanjila muntempele akutalisya kuyisya.
JOH 7:15 Mpawo ma Juda bakagamba, bati, “Nkamboyi nazi kwindilila? Takwe anakayiide pe.”
JOH 7:16 Jesu wakabasandula kuti, “kuyiisya kwangu takuli kwangu, pesi nkukwayoyo wakandituma.
JOH 7:17 Kuti umwi wachita kuyanda kwakwe, ulaziba njiisyo eyii, kuti nansya yazwa kuli Lez, akuti na ndalyambwida lwangu. Ulyambwida lwangu.
JOH 7:18 Ulyambwida lwakwe ulilangwida bulemu bwakwe mwini, pesi oyo ulangula bulemu bwayoyo wakamutuma, ooyo muntu wakasimpe; alimwi takwe bululami mulinguwe.
JOH 7:19 Mozesi takamupede mulawu na? Katakwe naba omwe wakubaamba. Niinzi nimulokulangula kuti mundijaye?”
JOH 7:20 Inkamu yakasandula, “Uli aadimoni. Ngwani ulokulangula kuti akujaye?”
JOH 7:21 Jesu wakasandula kuti kulimbabo, “Ndakachita mulimo omwe, alimwi moonse mwakagamba nkambo kanguwo.
JOH 7:22 Mozesi wakamupa kupalulwa (pe kuzwa kuli Mozesi, pesi kuzwa kuli basikale) alimwi mubuzuba butegwa Sabata mwakapalula baluumi.
JOH 7:23 Kuti na muntu watambula kupalulwa mubuzuba bwesabata nkukuti mulawu wa Mozesi tewakatyolwa pe, Nkambo nzimwandinyemena me akambo kakuti ndachita kuti muntu amaninine kupona kubuzuba bwesabata.”
JOH 7:24 Mutabeteki achiimo, pesi amubeteke chakululama.”
JOH 7:25 Bamwi babo bazwa ku Jelusalema bakamba, “teensi yooyu na ngubali kulangula kuti bamujaye?”
JOH 7:26 Amubone wamba antanganana, alimwi nchibamba anguwe. Tachikooba obo pe kuti bendelezi kuti oyu ngu Kkilisitu, tensi mbubo pe?
JOH 7:27 Iswetuli oyu nkwazwa. Pesi Kkilisitu asik, takwe naba omwe uzoziba nkwazwa.”
JOH 7:28 Mpawo Jesu wakoompolola mutempele, kalookuyisya akwamba kuti, “moonse mulindizi ankundakazwa mulikwizi. Tendakalizidilide lwangu, pesi wakandituma ulakasimpe, alimwi tamumwizi pe.
JOH 7:29 Ndimwizi me nkambo ndakazwa kulinguwe alimwi wakandituma.”
JOH 7:30 Bakali kwezya kumwanga, pesi takwe wakabika luboko alinguwe nkambo chindi chakwe techakalina sika pe.
JOH 7:31 Pesi bayingi munkamu bakasyoma mulinguwe, alimwi bakamba kuti, Kkilisitu nasika, uzochita zitondezyo zyingi na kwinda nzyachita oyu?”
JOH 7:32 Ba Falisi bakamvwa kabalo kuvwiya vwiya zintu ezi atala a Jesu, alimwi bapati babapayizi aba Falisi bakatuma bamapulisa kuti bamusunge.
JOH 7:33 Jesu wakamba kuti, “ndichili andinywe, kuchindi chinini, alimwi ndizoyinka kuliyoyo wakandituma.
JOH 7:34 Muyondiyandawula pesi tamukoyondijana pe mebo oko nkwenja, Tamukonzyipe pe kusika.”
JOH 7:35 Abo ba Juda bakabuzyania akati kabo, “Nkukuli nkwaya mwalumi oyo nkotutakonzyi kuyomujana? Sena ulayinka kuli bamwayikide akati kaba Giliki akuyoyiisya baGiliki?
JOH 7:36 Katyeni kambo aka nkaamba kakuti muyondiyandawula, pesi tamukoyondijana pe. Oko nkwenja, tamukonzyi kukusika?”
JOH 7:37 Lino mubuzuba bwakumaninsya, izuba pati lyepobwe, Jesu wakanyampuka akompolola, kati, “Na umwi wafwa inyota, abole kulindime anywe.”
JOH 7:38 Umwi awumwi usyoma mulindime, mbuli melembe mbawamba, milonga yamanzi mawumi iyoyenda mwida lyakwe.”
JOH 7:39 Pesi wakamba ezi mumuuya, kulibabo basyoma mulinguwe bayotambula, Muuya tewakayinapegwa pe nkambo Jesu talina lemesegwa pe.
JOH 7:40 Bamwi benkamu, nibakamvwa ayamajwi, bakamba kuti, “Inchobeni oyu musinsimi.”
JOH 7:41 Bamwi bakati, “oyu nguKkilisitu.” Pesi bamwi bakati Kkilisitu inga ulazwa mu Galili?
JOH 7:42 Malembe sa tawambi kuti Kkilisitu ulazwa kulunyungu lwa Davidi alimwi kuzwa ku Betelehema, kumunzi Davida nkwakali kuzwa?”
JOH 7:43 Aboobo kwakaba kwaanzana akati kankamu nkambo kanguwe.
JOH 7:44 Bamwi bakayandide kumwaanga, pesi takwe wakabikka manza alinguwe.
JOH 7:45 Mpawo bamapulisa bakabola kubapati babapayizi aba Falisi, bakati kulimbabo “kwabanzi nimwatamweta?”
JOH 7:46 Bamapulisa bakasandula kuti, “Takwe naba omwe wakali wambula abo.”
JOH 7:47 Aboobo ba Falisi bakasandula, andinywe mwenwa na?.
JOH 7:48 Kulumwi na akati kabendelezi wasyoma mulinguwe, nikuba kuba Falisi?
JOH 7:49 Pesi eyi inkamu intaanzi mulawu, ulitukidwe.”
JOH 7:50 Nikkodimasi (umwi wabaFalisi wakasika akufwambana) wakati kulimbabo.
JOH 7:51 Mulawu wesu ulabeteka na muntu katutanaswilila na kulinguwe akuziba nzyachita?”
JOH 7:52 Bakamusandula bati kulinguwe, “ayebo uzwa ku Galili na? Langula ubone kuti takwe musinsimi uzwaku Galili.”
JOH 7:53 Mpawo umwi awumwi wakaya kung'anda yakwe.
JOH 8:1 Jesu wakaya kuchilundu cha Oliva.
JOH 8:2 Chifumofumo wakaya ku tempele lubo, eelyo bantu boonse bakasika; wakakkala aansi akubayiisya.
JOH 8:3 Balembi bamulawu abaFalisi bakeeta mukayintu wakajatwa nkalookuchita bumambe. Bakamubika aakati.
JOH 8:4 Mpawo bakati kulinguwe, “Muyiisi, ooyu mwanakaziwajatwa kalikuchita bumambe.
JOH 8:5 Lino mumulawu, Mozesi wakatulayilila kuti bantu baliboobu tubatulule mabwe; iwe utyeni aatala anguwe?”
JOH 8:6 Bakaamba eezi kuchitila kuti bamupe mulandu anzizyo, pesi Jesu wakakotama walemba aansi amunwe wakwe.
JOH 8:7 Nibakiinkilila aanembo akumubuzya mibuzyo, wakanyampuka akubaambila kuti, “Ooyo utakwe chibi aakati kenu, ngabe mutanzi kutulula mwanakazi ooyu ibbwe.”
JOH 8:8 Wakakotama aansi lubo, akulemba aanyika amunwe wakwe.
JOH 8:9 Nibakamvwa eezi bakeenda umwi awumwi, kutalika aamupati. Kumamanino Jesu wakasyaala aalike, nkali aamwanakazi ngubakabikide aakati.
JOH 8:10 Jesu wakanyampuka akumwaambila kuti, “Yoo mwanakazi, mbali basikukupa mulandu? Takwe muntu wajana mulandu na mulinduwe?”
JOH 8:11 Wakati, “Takwe, nikuba womwe Mwaami.” Jesu wakati, “Ambebo nsikupi mulandu. Koya alimwi utakabisyi limbi.”]
JOH 8:12 Alimwi Jesu wakaambuula aabo nkati, “Ndili mumuni wanyika; ooyo unditobela takoyoyenda mumudima pesi uyooba aamumuni wabuumi.”
JOH 8:13 Ba Falisi bakati kulinguwe, “Ulipeda bukamboni nomwini, bukamboni bwako tabusinizizye pe.”
JOH 8:14 Jesu wakabasandula akwaamba kuti kulimbabo, “Nekuba kuti ndipa bukamboni bwangu ndemwini, bukamboni bwangu bulisinizizye. Ndilikwizi nkundakazwa ankwenjobuya.
JOH 8:15 Mubeteka chanyama; Ime nsibeteki muntu pe.
JOH 8:16 Nikuba kuti ndabeteka, kubeteka kwangu kulisinizizye nkaambo nsili aandike pe, pesi ndili aaTaata wakandituma.
JOH 8:17 Iyii, alimwi mumulawu wenu kulilembedwe kuti bukamboni bwabantu babili bulisinizizye.
JOH 8:18 Ndili ooyo uulungulula bukamboni aatala alwangu, eelyo Taata wakandituma upeda bukamboni aatala andime.”
JOH 8:19 Bakati kulinguwe, “Ulikuli wuso?” Jesu wakasandula, “Takwe ngomuzi imebo na Taata; kansinga mwalindiz, mwalikunomuziba Taata alakwe.”
JOH 8:20 Aaya majwi wakaamba muchibambalilo nkali kuyiisya mutempele pesi takwe muntu wakamusunga nkaambo chiindi chakwe techakalinaakkwana pe.
JOH 8:21 Aawo wakabaambila lubo kuti, “Ndiyobwiinka, muyondiyanduula eelyo muyofwa muzibi zyanu. Ooko nkweya, tamukonzyi kusika pe.”
JOH 8:22 Ba Juda bakati, “Mpo ulalijaya na? Nchenchicho na mpo nchati, 'Nkweya tamuyosika?”
JOH 8:23 Jesu wakati kulimbabo, “Muli baansi; Imebo ndiwakujulu. Muli banyika eeyi; Mebo nsili wenyika eeyi pe.
JOH 8:24 Akaako ndakamwaambila kuti muyoofwa muzibi zyabo. Ado do mane musyome kuti NDIME, muyoofwa muzibi zyenu.”
JOH 8:25 Bakati kulinguwe, ikuti kuliboobo, “Nduweni?” Jesu wakabaambila kuti, “Nzindamwaambila kuzwa kumatalikilo.
JOH 8:26 Ndili aazintu zyiingi zyakwaamba azyakubeteka aatala andinywe. Nikubaboobo, ooyo wakandituma ulisinizizye; mpawo zintu nzyemvwa kuzwa kulinguwe, nzyezintu nzyewamba kunyika.”
JOH 8:27 Tensi bakamvwisisisya pe kuti wakalikwaambula aatala aTaata.
JOH 8:28 Jesu wakati, “Aawo mwayoonyampula Mwana waMuntu, mpempawo mpomuyooziba kuti NDIME, akuti nsichiti chintu alwangu. Mbubo Taata mbwakandiyiisya me, mbubo bewamba zintu eezi.
JOH 8:29 Ooyo wakandituma uli aandime, mpawo tandisiide andiike pe, nkaambo ndichita zintu zimukonda chiindi choonse.
JOH 8:30 Nkachaambula zintu eezi Jesu, bantu biingi bakasyoma mulinguwe.
JOH 8:31 Jesu wakati kuma Juda ibakali bamusyoma, “Na mwakkalilila mujwi lyangu, muyooba basikwiiya bangu basinizizye,
JOH 8:32 alimwi muyoziba kasimpe, eelyo kasimpe kayoomwaangununa.”
JOH 8:33 Bakamusandula, “Tulizyalane lya Abbulahamu mpawo tatunaaba bazike bamuntu pe; waambilaaaloi kuti, 'Muyowangununwa'?”
JOH 8:34 Jesu wakabasandula, “Nchobeni, nchobeni, ndamwaambila kuti, ooyo woonse uchita chibi muzike wachibi.
JOH 8:35 Muzike takkalilili mun'anda kwalyoonse; mwana ulakkalilila chalyoonse.
JOH 8:36 Akaako, na Mwana wakwaangununa, ulaangunuka cha nchobeni.
JOH 8:37 Ndilizizi kuti muli zyalane lya Abbulahamu; muyandula kundijaya nkaambo ijwi lyangu talikwe busena mulindinywe.
JOH 8:38 Ndiwamba nzindakabona kuli Taata, alimwi andinywe muchite nzimwakamvwa kuli wuso wanu.”
JOH 8:39 Bakamusandula alimwi bakati kulinguwe, “Taata wesu ngu Abbulahamu.” Jesu wakati kulimbabo, “Na mwali bana ba Abbulahamu, nimunga muchita milimu ya Abbulahamu.
JOH 8:40 Pesi, lino muyanduula kundijaya, muntu wamwaambila kasimpe nkendakamvwa kuli Leza. Abbulahamu takwe nakachita eechi.
JOH 8:41 Muchita milimu yawuso wenu.” Bakati kulinguwe, “Tetwakazyalilwa mubwamu pe; tuli aaTaata omwe: Leza.”
JOH 8:42 Jesu wakabaambila wakati, “Kaansinga Leza ngu Wuso wenu, mwalikunondiyanda, nkaambo ndakazwa kuli Leza mpawo ndili aano; nkaambo nsilizidilide pe ndemwini, pesi wakandituma.
JOH 8:43 Nkaambonzi nimutamvwisisisyi majwi aangu? Kuli oobu nkaambo tamukonzyi kumvwa majwi aangu.
JOH 8:44 Muli bawuso wenu, dyabbulosi, alimwi mukanza kuchita ziyandisyo zyawuso. Wakali mujayi kuzwa kumatangunino mpawo tayiimvwi muchisinizyo nkaambo takwe kusinizya mulinguwe. Aawo nawamba zyakubeja, uwamba kazizwa mubube bwakwe mwini nkaambo mubeji alimwi ngowisi wabubeji.
JOH 8:45 Eelyo, nkaambo ndiwamba lusinizyo, tamundisyomi pe.
JOH 8:46 Ngwani aakati kenu uundipa mulandu wachibi? Kuti ndaamba lusinizyo, nkambooyi nimutandisyomi?
JOH 8:47 Muntu waLeza woonse ulaamvwa majwi aa Leza; tamwaamvwi nkaambo tamuli ba Leza.”
JOH 8:48 Ba Juda bakamusandula alimwi bakati kulinguwe, “Nchoonzyo tatwaambi kuti uli mu Samaliya na akuti uli aadayimona?”
JOH 8:49 Jesu wakasandula, “Nsikwe dayimona pe, pesi ndilemya Taata wangu, alimwi inywe mulanduubawulusya.
JOH 8:50 Nsilanguuli bulemu bwangu ndemwini; kuli uumwi uuyandula akubeteka.
JOH 8:51 Chobeni, nchobeni, ndamwaambila, na umwi wabamba ijwi lyangu, takoyoobona lufu.”
JOH 8:52 Ma Juda bakati kulinguwe, “Lino twaziba kuti uli aadayimona. Abbulahamu abasinsimi bakafwa; pesi wamba kuti, 'Na umwi wabamba ijwi lyangu, takoyoolabila lufu.'
JOH 8:53 Toli mupati pe kwiinda taata Abbulahamu wakafwa, ulimupati na? Basinsimi abalabo bakafwa. Ulichita ani?”
JOH 8:54 Jesu wakasandula, “Kuti nkelipa bulemu ndemwini, bulemu bwangu mbwabuyo; ngu Taata undilemya - ooyo ngumuti ngu Leza wanu.
JOH 8:55 Tamunaamuziba pe, pesi ndilimwizi. Kuti ndati, 'Nsimwizi, ndilaba mbuli ndinyw, mubeji. Nikuba boobo, ndimwizi alimwi ndilabamba ijwi lyakwe.
JOH 8:56 Wuso wenu Abbulahamu wakabotelwa kubamba izuba lyangu; waklibona alimwi wakabotelwa.”
JOH 8:57 BamaJuda bakati kulinguwe, “Tonaakuba aaminyaka ili makkumi musanu pe, mpawo wakamubona Abbulahamu?”
JOH 8:58 Jesu wakati kulimbabo, “Nchobeni, nchobeni, ndamwaambila Abbulahamu nkatanaaba, NDIME.”
JOH 8:59 Mpawo bakabweza mabwe kuti bamutulule, pesi Jesu wakayuba akuzwa aanze kwe tempele.
JOH 9:1 Lino Jesu nakayinda, wakabona mwalumi moofu kuzwa kubuzyalwe bwakwe.
JOH 9:2 Basikwiya bakwe bakamubuzya, “Muyisyi, ngwani wakabisya, ngooyu mwalumi nakuti mbazyali bakwe, kuti azyalwe kali moofu?”
JOH 9:3 Jesu wakasandula kuti, “teensi nguwepe wakachita chibi, nikuba bazyali bakwe, pesi kuti milimu ya Leza iyubununwe mulinguwe.
JOH 9:4 Tulelede kubeleka milimu ya oyo wakandituma nelichili isikati. Mansiku alasika nikuyochala katachikwe uyobeleka.
JOH 9:5 Ninchili munyika, ndime mumuni wenyika.”
JOH 9:6 Nakamaninsya Jesu kwamba ezi zintu, wakaswida anyika, wakakanda bulongo amate, akunanika bulongo kumeso akwe.
JOH 9:7 Wakamba kuti kulinguwe, “Yinka, ukasambe mukalambwa kaku kaku Silawomi” (kupandululwa kuti “kutumwa”). Lino mwalumi wakayinka, wakusamba, wakubola wabbwazula.
JOH 9:8 Mpawo mbakayakilene aabo mwalumi abakamubonwene kali mukumbizi bakalikwamba kuti, “teensi nguwe na mwalumi oyu walimukumbizi?”
JOH 9:9 Bamwi bakamba kuti, “Nguwe.” bamwi bakati, “pe, pesi ukozyania awe biyo.” Pesi wakati, “Ndime.”
JOH 9:10 Bakamba kuti kulinguwe, “mpawo bakamubuzya kuti ajulika buti meso?”
JOH 9:11 Wakasandula, mwalumi utegwa Jesu wakakkanda bulongo akubunanika mumeso angu akwamba kuti kulindime, Ýinka ku Silawomi ukasamb. 'Lino ndakayinka akuyosamba, alimwi ndakatambula kubona kwangu.
