JOH 9:12 Bakati kulinguwe, “Ulikuli?” wakasandula, “Tandizi pe.”
JOH 9:13 Bakeeta mwalumi wakali moofu kubaFalisi.
JOH 9:14 Eno lyakali zuba lyakwe lyesabata. Jesu mpakakanda bulongo akumujula menso akwe.
JOH 9:15 Aboobo ba Falisi bakamubuzya kuti watambula buti kubona kwako. Wakati kulimbabo, wabika bulongo mumenso angu, ndakakusamba, alimwi lino ndabona.”
JOH 9:16 Bamwi baFalisi bakati oyu mwalumi tazwi kuli Leza nkambo tabambi buzuba bwaSabata.” Bamwi bakati, “Anga wakonzya buti mwalumi sizibi kuchita zitondezyo zili boobu?” Lino kwakaba kwanzana akati kabo.
JOH 9:17 Bakamubuzya moofu alimwi kuti, uwamba buti anguwe, mbwakajula menso aako?” Mwalumi moofu wakati, “Musinsimi.”
JOH 9:18 Nkambo kako baJuda takwepe nibakasyoma kuti nguwakali moofu alimwi kuti watambula kubona.
JOH 9:19 Bakakubuzya bazyali, “Oyu ngumwana ngumwana wenu na ulokwamba kuti wakazyalwa kali moofu?
JOH 9:20 Lino wabona?” Bazyali bakwe bakasandula, “Tuzi biyo kuti oyu mwana wesu akuti wakazyalwa kali moofu.
JOH 9:21 Kuti wazobona buti tatuzipe, akuti ngwani wajula menso akwe, tatuzipe. Amumubuzye, mupati. Ulakonzya kulyambwida lwakwe.”
JOH 9:22 Bazyali bakwe bakaamba ayamakani, nkambo bakali kuyowa ba Juda nkambo ma Juda bakali kuzumina kuti kufumbwa utazumine kuti ngu Kkilisitu, ulatandwa muchikombelo.
JOH 9:23 Nkambo kazezi, nchibakati, “Mupati, ulalyambwida.”
JOH 9:24 Lino bakamwita lwabili mwalumi wakali moofu akuti kuli nguwe, “kupa bulemu kuli Leza. Tulizi kuti oyu mwalumi ngu sizibi.”
JOH 9:25 Mpawo mwalumi wakasandula, “Tandizi pe kuti na ngu sizibi. Chintu chimwi nchinzi: Nkuti ndakali moofu, lino ndabona.”
JOH 9:26 Mpawo bakaamba kuti kulinguwe, “ninzi nchaachita kulinduwe? Waajula buti menso aako?”
JOH 9:27 Wakasandula, “ndamwambila kale, alimwi tamuswilizyi pe! Nkambonzi nimuyanda kumvwa lubo? Tamuyandi pe kuba basikwiiya bakwe, mulayandana?
JOH 9:28 Bakamutukila alimwi bakati, “Nduwe sikwiiya wakwe, pesi swebo tulibasikwiiya ba Mozesi.
JOH 9:29 Tulizi kuti Leza waambula kuli Mozesi, pesi tatwizi kuti ooyu uzwa kuli.”
JOH 9:30 Mwalumi wakasandula akuti kulimbabo, “Eechi chilayoosya, kuti tamumuwi nkwazwa, alimwi wajula menso angu.
JOH 9:31 Tulizi kuti Leza taswilizyi pe kuli basizibi, pesi umwi kuti walipeda akuchita luyando lwakwe, ulamuswilizya.
JOH 9:32 Kuzwa nyika niyakalengwa takuna mvwigwa pe kuti naba omwe wakajula menso amuntu wakazyalwa kali moofu.
JOH 9:33 Kuti mwalumi oyu katazwi kuli Leza, natakwe anchakonzya kuchita.”
JOH 9:34 Bakasandula akwamba kuti kuli nguwe, “Wakazyaligwa muchibi, alimwi ulokuyisya ndiswe?” Mpawo bakamutontela aanze.
JOH 9:35 Jesu wakamvwa kuti bamutandila aanze achikombelo. Wakamujana alimwi wakati, “Ulasyoma na mu Mwana a Muntu?”
JOH 9:36 Wakasandula kuti, “Ngwani, Mwami, kuti ndimusyome.
JOH 9:37 Jesu wakamwambila kuti, “Wamubona, alimwi nguwe ngulokwambula awe.
JOH 9:38 Mwalumi wakati, “Mwami, ndasyoma, “alimwi wakamukomba.
JOH 9:39 Jesu wakati, “Nkambo kakubeteka nchindasikamunyika ino kuti abo bataboni babone alimwi kuti babona babe boofu.”
JOH 9:40 Bamwi ba Falisi bakali awe bakamvwa zintu eezi alimwi bakamubuzya kuti, “Tuliboofu na toonse?”
JOH 9:41 Jesu wakati kuli mbabo, “Naa mwakali boofu, munoli kamutakwe chibi, pesi mwamba kuti, 'Tulabona, Aboobo zibi zyanu zilakkalila.
JOH 10:1 Nkasimpe, nkasimpe, ndamwambila, utanjili akwinda amulyango wachaata chambelele, pele ulatanta mujulu ayimbi nzila, ooyo muntu mubbi asikunyanga.
JOH 10:2 Ooyo unjila akwinda amulyango ngusikwembela mbelele.
JOH 10:3 Uubamba mulyango ulamujulila. Mbelele zilamvwa ijwi lyakwe, aboobo ulazyita mbelele zyakwe amazina azyo, akuzitola anze.
JOH 10:4 Chiindi nazigwisizya anze zyoonse zyakwe, ulinka kunembo lyazyo, abbobo mbelele ziyomutobela, nkambo zililizi ijwi lyakwe.
JOH 10:5 Tazikoyo tobela mwenzu nguzitazi pesi anukuti ziyomuchija, nkambo tazilizi pe ijwi lyamwenzu ngozitazi.
JOH 10:6 Jesu wakamba aya mambilambali kulimbabo, pesi takwe nibakamvwisisya kuti ezi zintu zyakali nzizyo nzyakali kubaambila.
JOH 10:7 Aboobo Jesu wakabambila lubo, “nchobeni, nchobeni ndamwambila, ndime, mulyango wambelele.
JOH 10:8 Boonse bakasika nkesina sika mbabbi abasikunyanga, pesi mbelele tezyakabaswilila.
JOH 10:9 Ndime mulyango. Kuti umwii unjila akwiinda mulindime, uyoo futulwa, uyoo njila akuzwa akujana machelelo.
JOH 10:10 Mubbi tazi kupela pe kunze kwakubba, kujaya akunyonyona. Ndaza kuti babe abuumi akuti buvule.
JOH 10:11 Ndime sikwembela mubotu. Sikwembela mubotu ulapeda buumi bwakwe kumbelele.
JOH 10:12 Oyoo mubelesi ubbadalwa tensi ngusikwembela pe aboobo tazilizyakwe mbelele. A bona wumpe ulaza aboobo ulazisiya mbelele akuchija, elyo wumpe uyoziluma akuzimwayisya.
JOH 10:13 Ulachija nkambo mubelesi sikubbadalwa aboobo talikatazyi ambelele.
JOH 10:14 Ndime sikwembela mubotu, aboobo zyangu zilindizi.
JOH 10:15 Taata ulindizi, andime ndilimwizi Taata, aboobo ndilapeda buumi bwangu kumbelele.
JOH 10:16 Ndilijisi zimwi mbelele zitali zyamuchata chambelele echino. Aboobo ndilelede kuzyeta azilazyo, alimwi ziyolimvwa ijwi lyangu elyo ziyoba taanga lyomwe asikwembela omwe.
JOH 10:17 Echi nchenchicho Taata nchandiyandila. Ndilapeda buumi bwangu elyo njobubweza lubo.
JOH 10:18 Takwe naba omwe uyobubweza kuzwa kuli ndime, pesi ndabupeda ndemwini. Ndila chelelo chakubupeda ndemwini. Ndila chelelo chakubupeda, aboobo ndilachelelo chakubu bweza lubo. Ndakatambula malayilile aya kuzwa kuli Taata”
JOH 10:19 Kwanzana lubo kwaka akati kama Juda nkambo kamajwi aya.
JOH 10:20 Biingi babo bakati “Ulijisi dimoni abobo ulisuwidwe. Nkambonzi nmumuswilila?”
JOH 10:21 Bamwi bakati, “Aya tensi majwi amuntu unjidwe dimoni. Sena dimoni lilakonzya kujula meso amoofu”?
JOH 10:22 Kwakali kuchindi chakusalazigwa mu Jelusalemu. Kwakali lya mpeyo,
JOH 10:23 aboobo Jesu wakali kuyowenda mu mutempele mu kota lya Solomon.
JOH 10:24 Pesi ba Juda bakamuzyunguluka akwamba kuti kuli nguwe, “Kukabe lili kojisi nkotwena? Kuti na nduwe Kilisito, twambile antanganana”.
JOH 10:25 Jesu wakabasandula, “Ndakamwambila, pesi tamusyomi pe. Milimu eyo njenchita muzina lya Taata njindipandulula lwangu me.
JOH 10:26 Pesi tamusyomi nkambo tamuli mbelele zyangu.
JOH 10:27 Mbelele zyangu zilamvwa ijwi lyangu. Ndilizizi aboobo zilanditobela me.
JOH 10:28 Ndazipa buumi butamani. Tazikoyoofwa pe, aboobo takwe naba omwe uyozikwempya mujanza lyangu.
JOH 10:29 Taata wangu wakazipa ndime, mupati kwinda bamwi boonse takwe naba omwe uyokonzya kuzikwempya kuzwa mujanza lya Taata.
JOH 10:30 Ime a Taata tuli umwi”.
JOH 10:31 Nkabela ma Juda bakabweza mabwe lubo kuti bamutulule
JOH 10:32 Jesu wakabasandula, “Ndamutondezya milimu myingi mibotu izwa kuli Taata. Pesi nguli wamilimu awa ngumunditulwida?”
JOH 10:33 Ba Juda bakamusandula, “Tetwakutulula nkambo kamilimu mibotu pe, pesi nkambo kakusampawula, nkambo webo, ulimuntu, ulichita Leza lwakwe”.
JOH 10:34 Jesu wakasandula “Sa tazilembedwe na mumulawu wanu, 'Ndati, “muli baleza”?
JOH 10:35 Kuti bategwa mbaleza, ooyo ngulyakazida ijwi lya Leza ( aboobo malembe takoyotyolwa),
JOH 10:36 uwamba kuli ooyo ngwakasala Taata akumutuma munyika, Muloku sampawula. nkambo ndamba kuti ndii mwana wa Leza?
JOH 10:37 Kuti na nsili kuchita milimu ya Taata, mutandisyomi.
JOH 10:38 Pesi na ndikuchita, nansya kuti temwandisyoma, musyome mumilimu kuchitila kuti mukazibe akumvwisisisya kuti Taata ulimulindime aboobo ambebo ndimuli Taata”.
JOH 10:39 Bakezya kumujata lubo, pesi wakapuzuka kuzwa kumanza abo.
JOH 10:40 Wakabweda lubo mutaala Jodani kubusena oko Joni nkwakatalikila kubbabbatizya, aboobo wakakukkala nkukoko.
JOH 10:41 Bantu biingi bakasika kulinguwe alimwi bakati, “Joni nchobeni takwe nakachita zitondezyo, pesi zyonse zintu Joni nzyakamba atala ayoyu mwalumi nzyakasimpe”.
JOH 10:42 Bantu biingi bakamusyoma mpawawo.
JOH 11:1 Lino umwi mwalumi walikutegwa Lazalo wakalikuchiswa. Wakali kuzwa ku Bbetani, igunzi mwakali kukkala Meli a amuchizi wakwe Maata.
JOH 11:2 Meli nguwe oyo iwakananika Mwami amuunde akumusinda mawulu akwe amasusu, ngula mukulana Lazalo wakachisidwe.
JOH 11:3 Bachizi bakananizya mulumbe kuli Jesu kabaamba kuti, 'Mwami, Langa, ooyo ngoyandisya wachiswa.”
JOH 11:4 Jesu nakamvwa eezi, wakati, “Óku kuchiswa tekwakufwa pe, pesi nkwabulemu bwa Leza kuti akonzye kulemekwa kuli nzizyo.”
JOH 11:5 Lino Jesu wakali kuyandisya Maata, mwanike wakwe, a Lazalo.
JOH 11:6 Nakamvwa kuti Lazalo wachiswa, Jesu wakakkala kwamazuba aabili lubo kubusena oobo nkwakabede.
JOH 11:7 Mpawo nikwakiinda eezi, wakati kuli basikwiiya bakwe, “Tubwede lubo ku Judiya.”
JOH 11:8 Basikwiya bakati kuli nguwe, “Muyiisyi, lino lino bama Juda balokwezezya kuti bakutulule alimwi uyanda kubweda luubo?”
JOH 11:9 Jesu wakavwila, “Taakuli mahoola alikkumi aabili na amumuuni mubuzuba bumwi? Na umwi weenda izuba kaliliwo, takonzyi pe kuti aligubbule, nkambo unobona amumuni wenyika.
JOH 11:10 Nikuba boobo, kuti weenda mansiku, ulawaa nkambo mudima tuli anguwe.”
JOH 11:11 Wakaamba zintu ezi, nakamana kwamba ezi, wakati kuli mbabo, imuzyalwama Lazalo ulookona, pesi njankuko kuchitila kuti nkamubusye kuzwa mukoona.”
JOH 11:12 Basikwiya mpawo bakati kuli nguwe, “Mwaami na kali ulokoona, ulabuka.”
JOH 11:13 Lino Jesu wakalaambide akufwa kwakwe, pesi bakayeya aanga wakali kwambula akoona kwakulyokezya.
JOH 11:14 Mpawo Jesu wakabambila kanzambwenene kuti, “Lazalo wafwa.
JOH 11:15 Ndabotelwa, nkambo kandinywe, kuti tendaliwope pe kuchitila kuti musyome. Twende kulinguwe.
JOH 11:16 Tomasi, ooyo walikwitwa kuti Didimasi, wakati kuli basikwiyanyina “Twiinke andiswe kuchitila kuti tukafwe a Jesu.”
JOH 11:17 Nakasika Jesu wakajana kuti Lazalo wakali mukabanda kwamazuba aane.
JOH 11:18 Lino Bbeteli yakali afwifwi a Jelusalema, mweelwe walikusika kumamayila obile.
JOH 11:19 Bama Juda biingi bakalizide kuli Maata a Meli, kuzobaambulizya atala amuchizi wabo.
JOH 11:20 Eelyo Maata, nakamvwa kuti Jesu wasika, wakayinka wakuswanana awe, pesi Meli wakali kkede mungánda.
JOH 11:21 Mpawo Maata wakati kuli Jesu, “Mwami, aanoli wakaliwo, mukulana wangu tayinofwa pe.
JOH 11:22 Nikuba lino, ndilizi kuti kufumbwa nchokumbila kuli Leza, ulakupa.
JOH 11:23 Jesu wakati kulinguwe, “Mukulana wako ulabuka lubo.”
JOH 11:24 Maata wakati kulinguwe, “Ndizi kuti ulabuka lubo kububuke muzuba lyakumamanino.”
JOH 11:25 Jesu wakati kulinguwe, “Ndendime bubuke abuumi, Ooyo uusyoma mulindime nikuba kuti wafwa, uyopona;
JOH 11:26 alimwi kufumbwa oyo upona akusyoma mulindime takoyofwa pe. Ulazisyoma na eezi?”
JOH 11:27 Wakati kulinguwe, “Iyii, Mwami, ndilasyoma kuli nduwe Kkilisito, Mwana wa Leza, ooyo utazosike munyika.”
JOH 11:28 Naakamba ezi wakazwa waya kukwita Meli chakusisilikizya. Wakati, “Muyiisyi ulaano alubo ulokukwiita.”
JOH 11:29 Mpakamvwa ezi, wakanyampuka achakufwambana akwinka kulinguwe.
JOH 11:30 Li no Jesu takalina kusika pe mumunzi pesi wakachili kubusena ooko Maata nkwakamuswene.
JOH 11:31 Mpawo awo ba Juda, bakalanguwe mungánda bakali kumumbulizya nibakabona Meli kanyampuka chakufwambana kaaya aanze bakamutobela kabayeeya aanga wakali kuya kuchuumbwe kukuyolila.
JOH 11:32 Meli nakasika abusena aawo Jesu mpakabede akumubona wakawida kundyato zyakwe akwamba kuti, “Mwami aanoli walaano, Mukulana wangu natafwide pe.”
JOH 11:33 Jesu nakamubona kalila, abaJuda mbakazide aabo kabalila, wakeetelela, wakatazikana akujatwa mumoyo wakwe.
JOH 11:34 Wakati, “nkokuli nkumwakakumulazika?” Bakati kuli nguwe, “Mwami, boola uzobone.”
JOH 11:35 Jesu wakalila.
JOH 11:36 Mpawo ba Juda bakati, “Boona kuti Lazalo walikumuyanda biyeni!”
JOH 11:37 Pesi bamwi baabo bakaamba kuti, “Talikukonzya na ooyu mwalumi wakajula meso amuntu moofu, kuchitila kuti ooyu muntu atafwi?”
JOH 11:38 Mpawo Jesu, kachizwide kukatazikana mulinguwe, wakayinka kuchuumbwe. Lino chumbwe yakali mpako, nkabela kwakasinkidwe ibbwe mpawo.
JOH 11:39 Jesu wakati, “Mugwisye ibbwe, “Maata muchizi wa Lazalo, ooyo iwakafwide wakati kuli Jesu, “Mwami, kuli eechi chiindi mubili unoli wabola, nkambo waba amazuba aane kafwide.
JOH 11:40 Jesu wakati kulinguwe, “Tendakwambila na kuti, wasyoma ulabona bulemu bwa Leza?”
JOH 11:41 Mpawo bakagwisya ibbwe balibikka kumbali. Jesu wakalanga kujulu akwamba kuti, “Taata, ndakulumba kuti wandiswilizya.
JOH 11:42 Ndalizi kuti ulandiswilizya chiindi choonse, pesi nkambo kankamu yabantu bayimvwi akati kangu nchindamba eezi, kuchitila kuti basyome kuli nduwe nuwakandituma.”
JOH 11:43 Nakamana kwambula ezi, wakawompolola ajwi lilaajulu, “Lazalo, zwida aanze!”
JOH 11:44 Mwalumi wakafwide wakazwida aanze, mawulu akwe amaboko akali zambilidwe asila. Jesu wakati kuli mbabo, “Amumuzambanune mumuleke ayeende.”
JOH 11:45 Mpawo bamaJuda biingi bakazide kuli Meli akubona ezyo Jesu nzyakachita, bakasyoma mulinguwe;
JOH 11:46 pesi bamwi baabo bakaya kuba Falisi bakubabuzya izintu Jesu nzyakali wachita.
JOH 11:47 Mpawo bapati babapayizi abaFalisi bakabungania bwendelezi amwi akwamba kuti, “Niinzi nchitutachite? Ooyu mwalumi uchita zitondezyo zyiingi.
JOH 11:48 Kuti tumusiye alikke kali boobu, boonse balasyoma kuli nguwe; ma Loma balaza akututolela busena bwesu achisi chesu.”
JOH 11:49 Nikuba oobo, umwi mwalumi akati kabo, Kkeyifasi, wakali mupayizi mupati ooyo munyaka, wakati kuli mbabo, Taakwe nchimuzi pe.
JOH 11:50 Tamulangisisyi na kuti nchibotu kuli ndinywe kuti kufwe umwi muntu kafwida bantu kwinda kuti nyika yoonse ifwidilile.”
JOH 11:51 Lino eechi wakachaamba kachitazwide mulinguwe anukuti wakali mupayizi mupati oyo munyaka, wakasinsima kuti Jesu welede kufwida nyika;
JOH 11:52 kutali chisi luzutu, pesi kuchitila kuti baana baLeza abo basanseene babunganisigwe aamwi babe umwi.
JOH 11:53 Mpawo kuzwa eelyo izuba kaziya kunembo bakalangula inzila yakuti Jesu bamujaye.
JOH 11:54 Jesu takachili kweenda antanganana pe akati kaba Juda, pesi wakeenda wazwa waya kuli imwi inyika afwifwi akunkaanda mudolopo litegwa Efulemu. Nkuko nkwakakkala abasikwiiya bakwe.
JOH 11:55 Lino ipasika lyabama Juda lyakali lyaba afwifwi, mpawo biingi bakaya ku Jelusalema kabazwa kuzisi bayinka kuti bakalisalazye beni.
JOH 11:56 Bakali kuyandula Jesu, kabalo kwambula umwi awumwi kabayimvwi muchikombelo, “Muyeyayi loko? kuti ulaleka kusika kupobwe?”
JOH 11:57 Lino bapayizi bapati aba Falisi bakali bapa malayilile akuti kufumbwa muntu unoli ulizi ooko Jesu nkwanobede, uyelede kuzyamba kuchitila kuti bamujate.
JOH 12:1 Mazuba musanu alimwi, kakutanayinda Pasika Jesu wakasika Betani, aawo aakali Lazalasi, ooyo Jesu ngwakabusya kuzwa kubafu.
JOH 12:2 Aabobo bakamubambila chilalilo nkuko, aMata wakali kubapa. Pesi lazalasi wakali umwi wababo wakalede munsi atafula kali aJesu.
JOH 12:3 Kuzwawo Mariya wakabweza kankuli kamafuta mabotu kwindilila, wakananika Jesu kumawulu angawo akupukuta kumawulu amasusu aakwe. Ngaanda yakazula bweema bubotu bwamafuta.
JOH 12:4 Juda Sikaliyoti, umwi wabasikwiya bakwe oyo sikumuzya, wakati,
JOH 12:5 “Nkambonzi mafuta aaya natakuzigwa amiyanda yotatwe akupegwa kubafwaba?”
JOH 12:6 Wakamba ezi nkaambo takalikulangisisya kubafwaba, pesi nkaambo wakal, mubbi. Wakali ankomo yamali akukkonzya kubba zyakabikidwe mukati.
JOH 12:7 Jesu wakati, “ Amumuzumizye kubaamba ezyo nzyalazyo kuzuba lyakuvwikwa kwangu.
JOH 12:8 Munoli aabo bafwaba kwalyoonse. Pesi tamukoyoba andime lyoonse.”
JOH 12:9 Lino nkamu mpati yamaJuda yakaziba kuti Jesu mpali, mpo bakasika kabatazidi Jesu alike pe, akuzobona Lazalasi, ooyo Jesu ngwakabusya kuzwa kubafu.
JOH 12:10 Ibapayizi bapati bakakkankayizya antomwe kuti bakonzye kujaya Lazalasi;
JOH 12:11 nkaambo kanguwe kuti MaJuda biingi bakeenda akusyoma kuliJesu.
JOH 12:12 Izuba litobela inkamu mpati yakasika kupobwe nibakamvwa kuti Jesu ulasika kuJelusalemu.
JOH 12:13 Bakabweeza mitabi yatukunka akwinka kuyoswananaawe akompolola kuti, wosana ulilongezegelwe, ooyo usika muzina lyaMwami, waIzilayeli.
JOH 12:14 Jesu wakajana kambongolo kanini wakkala alinkako; mbuli mbukwakalembedwe.
JOH 12:15 “ Mutayowi nobana basimbi baZiyoni, amubone Mwami wanu ulaz, kakkede amusana wambongolo.”
JOH 12:16 Basikwiya bakwe tebakamvwisisya pe kuzintu eezi kumatalikilo, pesi, aawo Jesu nakalemekezegwa bakayeya kuti eezi zintu zyakalembedwe ataala anguwe akuti bakachita zintu eezi kulinguwe.
JOH 12:17 Lino nkamu yakazuzikizigwa kuti bakali anguwe nakayita Lazalasi kuzwa muchumbwe akumubusya kuzwa kubafu.
JOH 12:18 Chakali nchicho chizato kuti inkamu inkamu yakaya kuyoswanana nkambo bakamvwa kuti wakachita chitondezyo.
JOH 12:19 Bafalisi mpawawo bakati lwabo lwabo, “Bona takwe nchokonzya kuchita: laang, nyika yinka kunembo aatala aakwe.”
JOH 12:20 Lino bamwi baGiliki bakali mulibaabo bakalikuya kukomba kupobwe.
JOH 12:21 Aabo bakaya kuliFilipo, oyoowakazwa KuBbetisyaida mu Galili mpo wakakumbila wati, “ Mwalumi tuyanda kubona Jesu.”
JOH 12:22 Filipo wakeenda akuyobuzya Andulo, Andulo wakeenda aFilipo, mpo wakabuzya Jesu.
JOH 12:23 Jesu wakabasandula mpo wati, chindi chasika chamwana amuntu, kuti alemekezegwe.
JOH 12:24 Nchobeni, nchobeni ndamwambila anukut, imbuto yabbale yakawida munyika mpo yafwa, iyosyala lwayo ayilike, pesi kuti yafwa, ilazyaala michelo myiingi.
JOH 12:25 Ooo uyandisya buumi bwakwe takoyobujana, pesi utayandisyi buumi bwakwe kulizyanyika eeyi uyobamba buumi butamani.
JOH 12:26 Kuti umwi undigwasya, akunditobela, ooko nkumbede, ooko nkokuko mulanda wangu nkwabede. Oyoo undimanina milimo, Taata uyakumulemeka.
JOH 12:27 Lino muuya wangu wapengeleka. Mpo ngambeenzii? “
JOH 12:28 Taata, lemekezya zina lyako.” Aboobo ijwi lyakazwa kujulu kaliti, “Ndachilemekezya mpo nzochilemekezya lubo.”
JOH 12:29 Aabobo nkamu yakayimvwi kumbali niyakamumvwa yakamba kuti kwakamvwika muzuzumo. Bamwi bakamba kuti mungelo ulawambula anguwe.”
JOH 12:30 Jesu wakasandula wati, “ Eeli jwi telyazida ndime pesi lyazida ndinywe.
JOH 12:31 Lino ndolu lubeta lwanyika eeyi: Lino muzululi wanyika eeyi uzosowelwa aanze.”
JOH 12:32 Aawo mpunjonyampulwa kuzwa munyika, ndiyoyobolola bantu boonse kulindime.
JOH 12:33 Wakamba bobu kutondezya lufu lwakwe mbolunobede.
JOH 12:34 Makamu akamusandula, “ Twakamvwa kuzwa kumulawu kuti Kkilisito uzokkala ikutamani. Wamba buyeni ikuti, ' Mwana Muntu uyelede kusumpulwa? Nguli ooyo Mwana Muntu?
JOH 12:35 Jesu wakabambila kuti, “ Mumuni unolandinywe kwachindi chifwifwi. Mwende nimuchili mumun, ikuti mudima tukamuvumbi. Ooyo wenda mumudima taazi ooko nkwaaya.
JOH 12:36 Nimuchilamumuni, amusyome mumumuni kuchitila kuti mube bana bamumuni.” Jesu wakaamba zintu eezi aboobo wakamba zintu eezi wakeenda akulisisa mulimbabo.
JOH 12:37 Nikuba kuti Jesu wakachita zitondezyo zyiingi kuli mbaabo, pele takwe nibakasyoma mulinguwe.
JOH 12:38 Kuti ijwi Ayizaya musinsimi lizuzikizigwe, muli zyakamba: “ Mwami, ooyo wakasyoma kwaamba kwesu, akuli oyoo luboko lwaMwami nkulyakayubunizidwa?”
JOH 12:39 Nkaambo kayaaya tebakayosyom, mbuli Ayizaya akakwe mwamba,
JOH 12:40 “Wakofwazigwa meso aabo, akuyumya myoyo yabo, muliyimwi nzila bazobona ameso aabo akumvwisisya amyoyo yabo, akusanduka alimwi njobaponia”.
JOH 12:41 Ayizaya wakaamba eezi zintu nkaambo wakabona bulemu bwajesu akwambula aatala anguwe.
JOH 12:42 Pesi nikuba boob, akube kuti bazulwidi basyome muliJesu; pesi nkaambo kabaFalisi, tebakakumbila kulekelelwa pe kuti bataka kasigwi kuya kuchikombelo.
JOH 12:43 Bakayanda bulemu bwakazwa kubantu kwiinda bulemu bwakazwa kuliLeza.
JOH 12:44 Jesu wakompolola wati, “Ooyo usyoma mulindime tasyomi biyo mulindime, Pesi akuliwoyo wakandituma,
JOH 12:45 aawoyo wabona ndime wabona nguwe ooyo wakatuma ndime.
JOH 12:46 Ndasika mbuli mumuni munyika, kuti ooyo usyoma mulindime takasyali mumudima.
JOH 12:47 Kuti wamvwa majwi aangu, pesi katabambide, simubeteki pe, tee ndaza kuzotonga nyika, pesi kufutula nyika.
JOH 12:48 Ooyo undikaka akutatambula majwi aangu, ulasikumubeteka. Ijwi ndindambula liyomubeteka kuzuba lyamamanino.
JOH 12:49 Nkambo nsilyambwidi pe, pesi nguTaata wandituma, ooyo wapa ndime chelelo chakwaamb, azyakwamba.
JOH 12:50 Ndiizi kuti chelelo mbuumi butamani, mbubobu nzizezi zindawamba - mbuli Taata mbwakambula kuli ndime, mbubobu ndilamba.”
JOH 13:1 Lino kalitana kutalika ipobwe lya Pasika. Jesu wakaziba kuti chiindi chakwe chasika chakuti azwe munyika eyi ayinke kuli Taata. Mbalikubayanda bakwe bakali munyika, wakabayanda mane kusika kumamamanino.
JOH 13:2 Lino Satani wakali wazibika kale mumoyo wa Judasi Sikaliyoti mwana wa Sayimoni, kuti awuzye Jesu. Ndilyo achilalilo.
JOH 13:3 Jesu wakalizi kuti wisi wakalimupede zyoonse mumanza akwe alimwi kuti wakazwide kul Leza alimwi wakali kubweda k uli Leza.
JOH 13:4 Wakanyampuka achilalilo mpawo wagwisya chikobela chakwe chakujulu.
JOH 13:5 Mpawo wakabweza chisansamuzyo walyaanga. Mpawo wakatila maanzi mubbede watalika kusanzya basikwiiya kumawulu akubayumya achisansamuzyo nchakangide muchikungu chakwe.
JOH 13:6 Mpawo wakasika kuli Sayimoni Pita wakati kulinguwe, “Mwami uyanda kundisanzya mawulu na?”
JOH 13:7 Jesu wakasandula akumubuzya zyakuti, “Eechi nchenchita tamukochimvwisisisya.”
JOH 13:8 Pita wakati kulinguwe, “tokonzyi kundisanzya mawulu angu, “Jesu wakamusandula wati, “kuti tendakusanzya tokooba abulyidilane pe ambebo.
JOH 13:9 Sayimoni Pita wakati kulinguwe, “Mwami, tondisanzyi kumawulu kupela pesi akumaboko angu akumutwe.”
JOH 13:10 Jesu wakati kulinguwe, Muntu wasamba tabuli, kutalisanzya mawulu biyokupela, pesi amubili woonse wasamba, wasalala, pesi temonse nimwasalala.”
JOH 13:11 (Nkambo Jesu wakalimwizi utakamuuzye; nchenchicho nchaakambila, “Moonse tamusalede pe.”)
JOH 13:12 Nakamana kubasanzya mawulu abo wakabweza zisamo zyakwe wakkala ansi lubo, mpawo wakati kuli mbabo, “mwazimvwisisisya na nzinda muchitila?
JOH 13:13 Mundiita kuti Muyiisyi a Mwami mwamba kabotu, nkambo ndime.
JOH 13:14 kuti nkendi Mwami a Muyiisy, wamusanzya mawulu, anywebo mwelede kusanzya mawulu awumwi awumwi.
JOH 13:15 Nkaambo ndamutondezya chikozyanisyo kuti anywebo kuti anywebo muchite mbuli mbundamuchitila.
JOH 13:16 , Chamasimpe, ndamwambila kuti, muzike talimupati kumubelesi wakwe naakuti mutumwa tali mupati kuli wamutuma.
JOH 13:17 Kuti kamuzizi eezi zintu mulilongezezegelwe kuti mwaziba.
JOH 13:18 Nsilokwamba moonse pe, ndibazi mbindakasala. Pesi ndaamba kuti malembe azuzikizigwe; Ooyo uulya chinkwa wandilyata akasindi kakwe.'
JOH 13:19 Ndamwambila zyoonse ezi kazitana chitika pe, kuchitila kuti zyazochitika muzosyome KUTI NDIME.
JOH 13:20 Nkasimpe, nkasimpe, ndamwambila kuti, woonse utambula ngundakatuma, wanditambula, awunditambula, watambula wakandituma.”
JOH 13:21 Nakaamba boobu Jesu, wakapengeleka mumuuya. Wakapandulula wati, “Nkasimp, nkasimpe, ndamwambila umwi wanu uyoondaba.
JOH 13:22 Basikwiiya bakwe bakalangana umwi awumwi kabagamba kuti ngwani ngwakali kwamba.
JOH 13:23 Umwi wabasikwiiya ba Jesu ngwakali kuyanda wakalilede atafula kumbali lya Jesu.
JOH 13:24 Sayimoni Pita wakamwambila sikwiya muyandisi kuti, “buzya kulinguwe kuti uwambani.”
JOH 13:25 Lino wakaseyama akaango ka Jesu akumwambila kuti, “Mwami, ngaulabani ngowamba?”
JOH 13:26 Mpawo Jesu wakasandula, “Oyu ngwensisunsile chinkwa akumupa.” Lino nakasunsa, wakapa Judasi mwana wa Sayimoni Sikaliyoti.
JOH 13:27 Mpawo nikwakiinda kulya chinkwa, satani wakanjila mulinguwe, kuzwawo Jesu wakamubuzya kuti “Eecho nchoyanda kuchita, chichite akufwambana.
JOH 13:28 Lino takwe naba omwe wabakalede atafula wakaziba kuti nkambozi nawambula oobo.
JOH 13:29 Bamwi bakayeeya kuti Judasi mbali sinkomo wamali, Jesu ambweni uyanda kuti akawule ziyandikana apobwe, “Naakuti ape zimwi kubantu bafwaba.
JOH 13:30 Naakamana kutambula chinkwa, wakeenda chakufwambana. Kwakali mansiku.
JOH 13:31 Lino Judasi nakeenda, Jesu wakati, “Lino Mwana a Muntu walamekezegwa, alakwe Leza ulalemekezegwa mulinguwe.
JOH 13:32 Leza ulalemezya mwana mulinguwe, alimwi ulamulemya lumwi chakufwambana.
JOH 13:33 Nobana banini, ndandinywe kwachiindi chifwifwi. Muyondiyandula mbuli mbundakabuzya ba Juda, “oko nkwenjobuya, tamukonzyi kusika. Lino ndamba eechi kulindinywe.
JOH 13:34 Ndamupa mulawu mupya, wakuti muyandane umwi awumwi.
JOH 13:35 Acheechi bantu boonse bazooziba kuti ndinywe basikwiya bangu, kuti mwaba luyando kulumwi amwenzinyina.”
JOH 13:36 Sayimoni Pita wakati kulinguwe, “Mwami, nkokuli nkoya? Jesu wakasandula, “ooko nkwenja tokonzyi kunditobela kwaino, pesi uzonditobela chaba chiindi.
JOH 13:37 Pita wakati kulinguwe 'Mwami nkamboonzi nentakkonzyi kukutobela? Ndatula buumi bwangu nkambo kako.
JOH 13:38 Jesu wakasandula, “ulatuula buumi bwako na nkambo kangu? Nkasimpe, nkasimpe ndakwambila kuti mukombwe takolila kotana kunditama totatwe.
JOH 14:1 “Myoyo yenu kitapengi. Musyome muli Leza, musyome amulindime.
JOH 14:2 Mun'anda yaTaata mwaali makkalilo miingi. Nikutalibbobo tendalikunoomwaambila pe, lino ndiya kukumubambila busena.
JOH 14:3 Na ndiinka kuyomubambila busena ndiyoboola kuzomutola, kuti ooko nkwebede mukabeko anywebo.
JOH 14:4 Muliizi inzila yakoko nkwenjobuya.”
JOH 14:5 Tomasi wakati kuli Jesu, “Mwaami, tatukwizi pe nkoyobuya, tuliiziba biyei nzila?”
JOH 14:6 Jesu wakati kulinguwe, “Ndime nzila, bwini, abuumi; tawo pe uuza kuli Taata natiinda mulindime.
JOH 14:7 Nansyo mulindizi, nimumwizi Taata alakwe. Kuzwa sunu mwamuziba alimwi mwamubona.”
JOH 14:8 Filipi wakati kuli Jesu, “Mwaami, tutondeezya Taata, aawo kunoli kwazuzikizigwa kulindiswe.”
JOH 14:9 Jesu wakati kulinguwe, “Ndakali aandinywe kwachiindi chilamfu alimwi tamunaa kundiziba, Filipi? Ooyo wandibona wabona Taata. Kujana ulaamba biyeni kuti, “Tutondeezye Taata?'
JOH 14:10 Tondisyomi na kuti ndili muli Taata alimwi Taata uli muli ndime? Majwi ngindamwaambila nywe nsyaawambi kuzwa munguzu zyangu, pesi Taata upona mulindime ulikuchita mulimu wakwe.
JOH 14:11 Mundisyome kuti ndili muli Taata, akuti Taata uli mulindime, nikuba kuti usyome akaambo kamilimu lwayo.
JOH 14:12 Nchobeni, nchobeni, ndamwaambila, ooyo uusyoma mulindime uyoochita milimu njechita, alimwi uyoochita milimu mipati kwiinda eeyi nkaambo ndiya kuli Taata.
JOH 14:13 Kufumbwa nchimuyookumbila muzina lyangu, ndiyomuchitila kuchitila kuti Taata akabe aabulemu mu Mwana.
JOH 14:14 Na mwakumbila kufumbwa muzina lyangu, ndiyomuchitila.
JOH 14:15 Na mwandiyanda muyoobamba milawu yangu,
JOH 14:16 alimwi ndiyookomba kuli Taata alimwi uyomupa uumbi mugwasyi kuchitila kuti akabe aandinywe kusikila kukabe kutamani -
JOH 14:17 Muuya wakasimpe. Ooyo nyika ngwitakabule kumutambula pe nkaambo timubwene pe na kumuziba. Pesi mulimwizi, alimwi ukkala andinywe alimwi uli mulindinywe.
JOH 14:18 Nsikoyoomusiya amulike, ndiyooboola kulindinywe.
JOH 14:19 Biyo kwachiindi chifwifwialimwi nyika tikozondibona lubo me, pesi muzondibona. Akaambo kakuti ndilapona, andinywe munoyopona.
JOH 14:20 Mubuzuba oobo muyoziba kuti ndili muli Taata, akuti muli mulindime, akuti ndili mulindinywe.
JOH 14:21 Ooyo uli amilawu yangu akwiibamba nguwe undiyanda, alimwi ooyo undiyanda uyooyandwa aTaata wangu, alimwi ndiyomuyanda akulitondeezya kulinguwe.”
JOH 14:22 Judas (pe pe Sikkaliyoti) wakati kuli Jesu, “Mwaami, nkaambonzi noyolitondezya kulindiswe notayolitondeezyi kunyika?”
JOH 14:23 Jesu wakasandaula alimwi wati kulinguwe, “Na kuli uumwi undiyanda, uyoobamba majwi aangu. Taata ulamuyanda alimwi tuyosika kulinguwe alimwi tuyoyaka muunzi anguwe.
JOH 14:24 Ooyo utandiyandi mebo takwe nabamba majwi aangu. Ijwi ndimumvwa talizwi kulindime pesi kuli Taata wakandituma.
JOH 14:25 Ndaamba zintu eezi kulindinywe kuchiindi nkechipona andinywe.
JOH 14:26 Nekubaboobo, Mugwasyi - Muuya Uusalala ooyo Taata ngwayootuma kwiindila muzina lyangu - uyoomuyiisya zyoonse akumuyezya zyoonse nzindakamwaambila nywe.
JOH 14:27 Ndamusiila luumuno; ndamupa luumuno lwangu. Tendamupa pe mbuli nyika mbwiipa. Myoyo yanu itapengi, alimwi mutapengi.
JOH 14:28 Mwakamvwa eezyo nzindakaamba kulindinywe; Ndiyobweenda alimwi nzooboola lubo kulindinywe. 'Na mwalikundiyanda, mwalikubotelwa nkaambo ndiya kuli Taata, nkaambo Taata mupati kwiinda ndime.
JOH 14:29 Lino ndamwaambila kazitanaachitikana kuchitila kut, nizyazochitika, muzosyoma.
JOH 14:30 Nsikoyoowambula twiingi andinywe, nkaambommweendelezi wanyika eeyi uyobuza. Takwe manguzu pe aatala andime,
JOH 14:31 pesi mukuti inyika izibe kuti ndilamuyanda Taata, ndilachita mbubo mbuli Taata mbaakandilayilila mebo. Ngatukanyampuke alimwi tukeende kuzwa aano.”
JOH 15:1 “Ndimusamu wakasimpwa Taata ngomuka mwini muunda?
JOH 15:2 Uyogwisya ntabi zyoonse mulindime zitazyali michelo, akukwezuula ntabi zitazyali michelo kuchitila kuti zikazyale michelo.
JOH 15:3 Ulasalala kale nkambo kamilumbe njindakawambula kulinduwe.
JOH 15:4 Kkalilila mulindime, andime mulinduwe, mbuli mutabi, utakonzyi kuzyala michelo lwayo, kunze kwakuti wayima kuchisiko, kuti amwi ulakonzya kuzyala, kunze kwakukkalilila mulindime.
JOH 15:5 Ndichisiko chamusamu, inywe muli mutabi. Oyo ukkalilila muli ndime, ambebo mulinguwe, ulazyalisya michelo, kotakwe ndime takwe nchokonzya kuchita.
JOH 15:6 Ooyo naba oomwe uutakkali mulindime, Uyosowegwa mbuli mutabi mpo uyoyuma, alubo iyobwezelelwa mitabi akuyowalilwa mumulilo, mpawo iyotentwa.
JOH 15:7 Kuti wakkalilila mulindime, akuti majwi angu akkala mulinduwe, kumbila kufumbwa nchoyanda, mpawo uyochitilwa mboyanda.
JOH 15:8 Taata ulalemekezegwa azeezi, kuti wazyalisya michelo akulitondezya kuti nduwe sikwiiya wangu.
JOH 15:9 Mbuli Taata mbandiyandisya mebo, Ndakuyanda ambebo; mukkalilile mulindime.
JOH 15:10 Kuti wabamba milawu yangu, unokkalilide muluyando lwangu, mbundaka bambamilawu ya Taata akukkalilila muluyando lwakwe.
JOH 15:11 Ndambuula ezi zintu kulindinywe nkuchitila kuti lukondo lube muli nduwe, akuchitila kuti lukondo lumaninine.
JOH 15:12 Ooyu ngomulwu wangu, kuti muyandane mbuli mbondakamuyanda.
JOH 15:13 Takwe naba omwe ulaluyando luli oobu-kuti umwi abambe buumi bwakwe mwenzinyina.
JOH 15:14 Muli benzuma kuti mwachita zintu nzindakamulayilila.
JOH 15:15 Nsichiyomwiti kuti babelesi, nkambo mubelesi tazi kuti simalelo akwe anzyachita. Ndamwita kuti benzuma, mbuli zyoonse nzindakamvwa kuli Taata, ndachita kuti zizibinkane kulindinywe.
JOH 15:16 Teensi mwakandisala mebo, pesi ndakamusala inywebo kumwimika nywe kuti mwelede kwenda akuzyala michelo, akuti michelo yanu ikkalilile. Eechi chamba kuti kufumbwa nchimuyokumbila kuli Taata kwinda muzina lyangu, uuyochipa kulindinywe.
JOH 15:17 Eezi zintu nzindamu layilila, kuti mukonzye kuyandana umwi awumwi.
JOH 15:18 Kuti nyika yakusula, ziiba kuti yakalindisulide nkitana kukusula webo.
JOH 15:19 Kuti wali muntu wenyika, inyika ilakuyanda lwayo. Pesi nkambo kakuti taliwanyika akambo kakuti ndakakusala kuzwa munyika, nkiinkako inyika iyokusula we.
JOH 15:20 Koyeeya ijwi ndindakakwambila we, Ímubelesi tali mupati kwinda simalelo.'Na bandipenzya mebo, bayomupenzya anywebo; Anukuti balondola majwi angu, bayowalondola amajwenu.
JOH 15:21 Bayochita zyoonsezi zintu kuli nduwe nkambo kezina lyangu, nkambo tabamwizi pe wakandituma.
JOH 15:22 Anoli tendakasika akwambuula kuli mbabo, teensi bayinobisya, pesi kwalino tabakwe nchebanga balatamizya kukubisya kwabo.
JOH 15:23 Ooyo wakkaka ndime ngonguwe wakkaka Taata.
JOH 15:24 Ikuti tendachita milimo takwe naaba oomwe ukazya akati kabo, takwe nibanola chibi pe, pesi lino bibona akusula ndime a Taata.
JOH 15:25 Pesi eezi zitondezya kuzuzikizya majwi alembedwe mumulawu, 'Bandisula nkenditakwe mulandu.'
JOH 15:26 Eelyo mugwasyi nayosika - ooyo ngwenjotuma kuli ndinywe kuzwa kuli Taata, nguwe ooyo Muuya wakasimpe, ooyo iwakazwa kuli Taata - Uyoopa bukamboni atala andime.
JOH 15:27 Uleelede ayebo kupa bukamboni, nkambo wakali andime kuzwa kumatalikilo.
JOH 16:1 “Ndamwambila ezi zintu kulindinywe kuchitala kuti mutalebwi.
JOH 16:2 Bayomusowela anze achikombelo pesi chiindi chiyosika echo woonse oyo utakamujaye uyochitanga wamanina Leza mulimo.
JOH 16:3 Bayochita ezi zintu nkaambo tabana kumuziba Taata nekuba ndim.
JOH 16:4 Ndamwambila ezi zintu kulindinywe kuchitila kuti chiindi chazyo chakusik, muyoyeya kuti kakamwambila atala anzizy. Tendakamwambila atala azezi zintu kumasangunin, kambo ndakachili anywebo.
JOH 16:5 Pele lino ndayinka kuliyoyo iwakanditum, takukwe akati kanu undibuzya kut, uyakuli?
JOH 16:6 'Pesi nkaambo ndamwambila ezi zintu kuli ndinyw, kubijilwa kwazula mumyoyo yanu
JOH 16:7 Pesi ndamwambila kasimp, chibotu kulindinywe kuti ndiink. Ukuti tendink, Mugwasyi takosika pe kulindinyw, pesi kuti ndayink, ndiyomutumina nguwe kuli ndinywe.
JOH 16:8 Elyo asik, Mugwasyi uyotondezya nyika kuti iibisizye atala aziib, atala abululam, atala alubetek,
JOH 16:9 atala aziib, nkaambo tabandisyomi.
JOH 16:10 ataala abululam, nkaambo ndilayinka kuli Taat, aboobo tamukachindiboni limbi,
JOH 16:11 alubeteko nkaambo nkaambo mweendelezi wanyika eyi wabetekwa kale.
JOH 16:12 Ndazyingi zintu zyakumwambil, pesi tamukomvwisisya lino.
JOH 16:13 pesi walo muuya wakasimp, asik, oyo umwenzya mukasimpe koonse, pesi takoyowamba izyakwe mwini. Pesi uyowamba ezyo zyatakamwvwe aboobo uyomwambila zintu izichiz.
JOH 16:14 Uzondilumbayizy, nkaambo uzobweza zyali zyangu akuzyambila ndinywe.
JOH 16:15 Zyoonse zyajisi Taata nzizyangu. Nchechich, nchindamba kuti Muuya ulabweza zyali zyangu akuzyambila ndinywe.
JOH 16:16 chaba chiindi chifwifwi tamuchikandiboni limb, aboobo kwakuyinda chiindi chifwifwi muyondibon.”
JOH 16:17 Alimwi bamwi basikwiya bakwe kuli umwi aumw, “Chamba nzi echi nchatwambila sweb, 'chaba chindi chifwifwi tamukachindiboni limbi aboob, 'Nkaambo ndayinka kuli Taata'?”
JOH 16:18 Nchechicho nchibakamba kut, Çhamba nzi echi chawamb, 'chaba chindi chifwifwi '? Tatuzi kuti uwambula atala anyamayi”.
JOH 16:19 Jesu wakabona kuti bakali kuyanda kubuzya kulinguw, aboobo wakabambila kut, Ézi nzizyo na nzimwalikulibuzya lwanu, kuti ndiwamba nzi kandamb, kuti muchindi chifwifwi tamuyokondibona limbi, aboobo muchindi chifwifwi muyondibona?
JOH 16:20 Nkasimp, nkasimp, ndamwambila muyokwila akoomok, pesi nyika iyokondw. Alimwi muyozula kubijilw, pesi mapenzi anu ayosanduka akuba lukondo.
JOH 16:21 Mwanakazi chiindi nayanda kutumbuka ulabijilwa nkaambo chiindi chakwe chasik, pesi chindi natumbuka mwan, tachiyeyi limbi machise akwe nkaambo kakukondwa kuti muntu watumbukwa mukati kanyika.
JOH 16:22 Anywebo mwabijilwa lin, pesi ndiyomubona lub, aboobo myoyo yanu iyo kondw, aboobo takwe naba omwe uyokonzya kumunyanga kukondwa kwanu.
JOH 16:23 Mubuzuba obo takukwe uyondibuzya chint. Nkasimp, nkasimp, ndamwambila kut, na mwakumbila kufumbwa chintu kuli Taata muzina lyang, uyomupa nchich.
JOH 16:24 Ambuleno tamunakukumbila chintu mu zina lyang. Kumbila uyopegwa, kuchitila kuti kukondwa kwanu kuzuzikizigwe”
JOH 16:25 Ndamwambila ezi zintu kuli ndinywe mutulabik, pesi chiindi chilasika nchetachiyomwambili mutulabik, pesi anukuti ndiyomwambila antaanganana atala aTaata.
JOH 16:26 Mubuzuba obo muyokumbila muzina lyangu aboobo nsikoyomwambila kuti ndiyomukombela kuli Taata,
JOH 16:27 pesi Taata lwakwe ulamuyanda nkaambo mwakandiyanda andime aboobo nkaambo mwakasyoma kuti ndakazwa kuli Leza.
JOH 16:28 Ndakazwa kuli Taat, aboobo ndakaza munyik. Lubo ndiyozwa munyika aboobo ndilayinka kuli Taata.”
JOH 16:29 Basikwiya bakwe bakati,' 'Bona, lino wambula antaanganana aboobo tolikubelesya tulabiko pe.
JOH 16:30 Lino twaziba kuti ulizi zintu zyoonse, aboobo toyandi naba omwe kuti akubuzye mibuzyo. Nkaambo kazezi, tulasyoma kuti wakazwa kuli Leza.”
JOH 16:31 Jesu wakabasandula,” Mwasyoma na lino?
JOH 16:32 Bon, chiindi chilasik, iyii, aboobo nchechicho echino chimuyowazana aumwi aumwi kumunzi wakw, aboobo aboobo muyondisiya andikk. Nekuba boobo nsili andikke pe nkaambo Taata ula ndim.
JOH 16:33 Ndamwambila ezi zintu kuti mube alumuno mulindim. Munyika mube mapakasy, pesi amube akujatilila; Ndakizunda nyika.
JOH 17:1 Jesu nakamana kwamba zintu eezi, wakatambya meso akwe kumajulu akwamba kuti, “Taata, chiindi chasika, mupe bulemu Mwanaako kuchitila kuti alakwe Mwana akupe bulemu -
JOH 17:2 mbuli mbwakamupa bwendelezi atala ailengwa zyoonse kuchitila kuti azope buumi butamani kuli woonse ooyo ngwakapa kuli nguwe.
JOH 17:3 Mbuli ibuumi butamani kuti bakuzibe, nduwe Leza wakasimpe, akuli nguwe ooyo ngwakatuma, Jesu Kkilisito.
JOH 17:4 Ndakakupa bulemu anyika. Ndakamaninsya mulimo oyo nguwakandipa kuti nguuchite.
JOH 17:5 Lino, Taata, kondilemya antomwe ayebo abulemu obo mbendali kujusi nkechili ayebo, inyika kitanaanzwa.
JOH 17:6 Ndakayubununa izina lyako kubantu aabo mbwakandipa kuzwa kunyika. Bakali bako, wakabapeda kuli ndime bakabamba ijwi lyako.
JOH 17:7 Lino bakaziba kuti zyoonse eezyo nzwakandipa zizwa kuli nduwe,
JOH 17:8 Nkambo ndakabapa woonse majwi ayo ngwakandipa. Bakaatambula mpawo akuziba bwini bwakuti ndakazwa kuli nduwe mpawo bakasyoma kuti wakandituma.
JOH 17:9 Ndabakombela. Nsikombeli banyika pe pesi aabo mbwakandipa nkambo mbibako.
JOH 17:10 Choonse eecho changu nchichaako mpawo chako nchichangu mpawo mpegwa bulemu mulimbabo.
JOH 17:11 Nsichili munyika, pesi aaba bantu balimunyika, mpawo ndikuza kuli nduwe. Taata Uusalala, babambe muzina lyako elyo nduwe wakandipa kuchitila kuti babe bamwi mbuli mbutuli bamwi.
JOH 17:12 Nindakachili ambabo, ndakabambide kabotu muzina lyako, eelyo ndwakandipa. Ndakaba kwabilila, mpawo takwe nikuba umwi wakanyonyoka, kusiya mwana wabajayi, kuchitila malembe kuti azuzikizigwe.
JOH 17:13 Lino ndaboola kulinduwe, pesi ndikwamba zintu eezi munyika kuchitila kuti lukondo lwangu luzozuzikizigwe muli mbabo.
JOH 17:14 Ndakabapa ijwi lyako, mpwao nyika yakabasula nkambo tabali benyika eeyi, mbuuli mbuntali wenyika.
JOH 17:15 Nsilokukumbila kuli nduwe kuti ubagwisye munyika, pesi kuti babambwe kabotu kulibaabo batalomene.
JOH 17:16 Tembanyika pe mbuli mbentali wenyika ambebo.
JOH 17:17 Mubaanzanisye kwinda kukasimpe. Ijwi lyako ndayakasimpe.
JOH 17:18 Mbuli mbowakandituma munyika ndabatuma ambebo munyika.
JOH 17:19 Akambo kambabo, ndalibamba lwangu kuchitila kuti abalabo babambwe mukasimpe.
JOH 17:20 Nsikombeli aaba luzutu pe, pesi abaabo batakasyome mulindime kwinda kujwi lyaako
JOH 17:21 Kuchitila kuti boonse bakabe umwi mbuli nduwe. Taata mbuli muli ndime, andime ndimuli nduwe. Aabalabo abaabe muli ndiswe kuchitila kuti inyika ikasyome kuti nduwe nuwakandituma.
JOH 17:22 Ibulemu oobo mbuwakandipa, ndakabupa kuli mbabo, kuchitila kuti babe uumwi, mbuli mbundi umwi.
JOH 17:23 Ime muli mbabo, mpawo iwe muli ndime - kuti mpobazulila mulukamantano, kuti inyika izibe kuti wakandituma akuti wakabayanda mbuli mbuwakayanda ndime.
JOH 17:24 Taata, njanda aabo mbwakandipa kuti baabe andime ooko nkuumbede, mpawo akubona bulemu mbwakandipa nkambo wakandiyanda intalisyo yenyika kitana kubambwa.
JOH 17:25 Taata ululeme, inyika teyaka kwizi pe, pesi mebo ndakali kwizi, mpawo aaba balizi kuti wakandituma.
JOH 17:26 Ndakachita kuti izina lyako lizibinkane kuli mbabo, nkabela ndichiyolizibya kuchitila kuti luyando ndwakandiyanda aalo lukabe muli mbabo, mpawo nooli muli mbabo.”
JOH 18:1 Jesu nakamana kwambula majwi aaya, wakainka kuli aanze abasikwiiya bakwe kuli bumwi busena mumusena wa Kkidiloni, oko kwakali chilili mwakakunjila abasikwiya bakwe.
JOH 18:2 Lino Judasi ooyo wakali sikuyo mwaba, alakwe wakalibwizi busenobu nkambo Jesu wakali kuswanana absikwiya bakwe nkuko.
JOH 18:3 Mpawo Judasi wakazulwida inkamu yabasilumamba abamwi bendelezi bazwa kubapayizi bapati akubaFalisi, abasizyuno, bakayinka nkukoko amalampi, azimunisyo, azilwanisyo.
JOH 18:4 Mpawo Jesu, iwakazi zyoonse zintu ezyo zyakali kuyochitika kulinguwe, wakaya kunembo wababuzya kuti, “Ngwani ngomulokuyanduula?”
JOH 18:5 Bakamusandula, “Jesu waku Nazaleta.” Jesu wakati ndamwambila kuti, “Ndime.” Judasi ooyo wakamuzya wakaliimvwi abasiliumamba.
JOH 18:6 Nakaamba kuli mbabo kuti, “Ndime,” bakabwedela musule bawidaansi.
JOH 18:7 Wakababuzya lubo, “Ngwani ngomulokuyanduula?” Lubo bakindulula bati, “Jesu waku Nazaleta.”
JOH 18:8 Jesu wakasandula, “Ndamubuzya kuti ndime. Na kamulokuyandula ndime, amubaleke aaba beende.”
JOH 18:9 Ezi zyakachitika kuti ijwi ndyakaamba lizuzikizigwe: “kuti kulibaabo mbwaakandipa takwe ngundakasowa pe.”
JOH 18:10 Alimwi Sayimoni Pita, wakali akafulo, wakakasomona wagonka mulanda wamupayizi mupati wamugonka kutwi kwakuchilisyo. Lino izina lyamulanda oyu wakali Malukkasi.
JOH 18:11 Jesu wakati kuli Pita, “Bweedezya ikafulo munkomo. Nsyelede kunywa muchinywido eecho Taata nchaakandipa mebo?”
JOH 18:12 Awo inkamu yabasilumamba amupati wabo, ababelesi babaJuda, bakajata Jesu akumwaanga.
JOH 18:13 Kutanguna bakamutola kuli Aanasi, nkambo wakali yisizyala wa Kkefasi, wakali mupayizi mupati munyokoyo.
JOH 18:14 Lino Kkefasi wakali nguwe wakapede lulayo kubaJuda kuti nichali chibotu kuti umwi muntu afwide bantu boonse.
JOH 18:15 Sayimoni Pita wakatobela Jesu, alimwi awumwi sikwiiya. Lino ooyu sikwiiya wakazibinkene kubapayizi bapati, aboobo wakanjila a Jesu munkuta yabapayizi bapati.
JOH 18:16 Pesi Pita wakaliimvwi amulyango kalaanze, mpawo umwi sikwiya, wakazibinkene kubapayizi bapati, wakazwa aanze kuyowambuula abalinda amulyango, mpawo wakanjizya Pita mukati.
JOH 18:17 Mpawo mulanda wachikayintu, wakalikubamba amulyango, wakabuzya Pita kuti, “Tooli umwi wabaabo basikwiiya bayooyu mwalumi na, wakasikuti, “teensi ndime pe.”
JOH 18:18 Lino balanda abasikubeleka muwofesi bakalimvwi awo, nkabela bakali bakutilizya mulilo nkambo kwakali kutontola, bakali kuyota. Pita ambabo kayimvwi kalikuyota alakwe.
JOH 18:19 Mupayizi mupati wakabuzya Jesu aatala abasikwiiya bakwe anjiisyo yakwe.
JOH 18:20 Jesu wakamusandula, “Ndakambuula entanganana kunyika. Choonse chiindi ndakali kuyiisya muzitumba amuzikombelo akoko baJuda nkubakali kuswanana. Taakwe pe nchindakaamba mukusisikizya.
JOH 18:21 Nkambonzi nimundibuzya? Kabuzye kuli bakandimvwa ataala azezyo nzindakaamba. Boona, aaba bantu balizizi nzindakaamba.”
JOH 18:22 Jesu nakamana kwamba eezi, umwi wababelesi wakayimvwi wakawuma Jesu wati, “Mbubo na mboyelede kusandula mupayizi mupati?”
JOH 18:23 Jesu wakatikuli nguwe, “kuti nkendi ndaambula bubi, paa bukamboni atala abubi, pesi kuti kakuli kabotu, unduuminayi?
JOH 18:24 Mpawo Aanasi wakamutola kaangidwe kuli Kkayifasi mupayizi mupati.
JOH 18:25 Lino Sayimoni Pita wakalimvwi kayoota mulilo. Bantu bakati kulinguwe, “Sena tenduwe umwi wabasikwiiya bakwe na? Wakakaka akwamba kuti, “Tensindime pe.”
JOH 18:26 Umwi wabalanda bamupayizi mupati, wakali munyina wamwalumi ulakutwi Pita nkwakagonkede, wakati, “Tooli nduwe na ngundakabwene muchilili anguwe?”
JOH 18:27 Mpawo Pita wakakaka lubo, mpawo mukuku wakakokolika.
JOH 18:28 Eelyo bakatola Jesu kuzwa kuli Kkayifasi kuya kukubetekwa. Kwakachili kuseni loko, nkabela tebakanjila pe mubbetekelo kuchitila kuti tabasofwazigwi pe pesi bakakonzye kulya pasika.
JOH 18:29 Awo Pilato wakazwa aanze waya kuli mbaboo wasikuti, “Nguuli mulandu ngumweeta ayoyu mwalumi?”
JOH 18:30 Bakasandula kabati kulinguwe, “Aanoli ooyu mwalumi tesimuchita zibi, Tetwayinomweeta kuli nduwe pe.”
JOH 18:31 Mpawawo Pilato wakati kulimbabo, “mumutole ndinywe, akuyomubeteka kwinda mumulawu wanu.” MaJuda bakati kulinguwe, “Tachili mumulawu pe kulindiswe kubikka kufumbwa umwi muntu kulufu.”
JOH 18:32 Bakaamba ezi kuchitila kuti ijwi lya Jesu lizuzikizigwe eelyo ndyakaamba kutoondezya atala amusyobo walufu ndwayizofwa.
JOH 18:33 Mpawo Pilato wakanjila mungánda yakubetekela lubo wayita Jesu wamubuzya kuti, “Nduwe Mwami waba Juda na?”
JOH 18:34 Jesu wakasandula, “Ulokulyambwida na, nakuti kuli bamwi bakambula atala andime kuli nduwe?”
JOH 18:35 Pilato wakasandula, “Nsili muJuda pe me, ndinguwe na? Bantu bako abapayizi bapati bakupeda kuli ndime. Niinzi nchiwachita?”
JOH 18:36 Jesu wakasndula, “Bwami bwangu tabuli bweenyika eeyi pe. Aanoli bwami bwangu bwali bwachimwi chipanzi chenyika eeyi, balanda bangu bayinokulwana kuchitila kuti nkindeka kwabwa kuba Juda. Pesi lino bwami bwangu tabuzwidi aano pe.
JOH 18:37 Pilato wakati kulinguwe, “Uli mwami na?” Jesu wakamusandul, “wamba kuti ndimwami. Kuuli aya makanze ndakazyaligwa, akuli aya makanze ndakasika munyika, kuti ngaambe bukamboni mukasimpe. Woonse ooyo uuli mukasimpe ulaswilizya kujwi lyaangu.”
JOH 18:38 Pilato wakati kulinguwe, “niinzi kasimpe?” Ndakazwa kwaamba eezi, wakayinka kumaJuda wamba kuli mbabo, Takwe mulandu pe ngundajana mumwalumi ooyu.
JOH 18:39 Pesi mulachiyanza chakuti ndiwangunune umwi muntu kuli ndinywe apasika. Aabobo mulayandana kuti ndimulekezezye mwami waba Juda?”
JOH 18:40 Mpawo bakoompolola lubo akwamba kuti, pepe oyu mwalumi, pesi Bbalabbasi.” Lino oyu Bbalabbasi wakaali mubbi.
JOH 19:1 Mpawo Pilato wakatola Jesu akuyomunabba.
JOH 19:2 Basilumamba bakalunda ingowani yamamvwa. Bakayibikka amutwe waJesu bamuzwatika asila lyamusyobo wantuumbula.
JOH 19:3 Bakasika kulinguwe basikuti, wabonwa, “Mwami waba Juda!” mpawo basikumuma.
JOH 19:4 Pilato wakabbuda aanze lubo wasikuti kulimbabo, “Mubone, ndikumweeta anze kulindinywe kuchitila kuti muzibe kuti nsijene mulandu pe aalinguwe.”
JOH 19:5 Awo Jesu wakabbuda aanze, kazweete musini wamamvwa asiila lyachikobela chamusyobo wantumbula. Pilato wakati kulimbabo, “Mubone ngooyu mwalumi!”
JOH 19:6 Mpawo awo bapayizi bapati ababelesi nibakabona Jesu, bakoompololesya bati, “Aababmbulwe, abambulwe!” Pilato wakati kuli mbabo, “Mumutole ndinywe mukamubambule nkambo nsijene mulandu pe kulinguwe.”
JOH 19:7 Ba Juda bakamusandula, “Tulijisi mulawu, alubo kwinda mumulawu oyoo, welede kufwa nkambo wakali kulyaamba kuti Mwana waLeza.”
JOH 19:8 Aawo Pilato nakamvwa nkani eeyi, wakayoweesya loko.
JOH 19:9 Wakanjila mungánda yakubetekela lubo wati kuli Jesu, “Uuzwa kuli? Pesi Jesu takwakasandula pe.
JOH 19:10 Mpawo Pilato wakati kulinguwe, “Towambuli na kulindime?” Toozi na kuti ndilenguzu zyakukwangununa aanguzu zyakukubambula?
JOH 19:11 Jesu wakamusandula, “Tojisi pe kupanguzu alindime kusiya eecho nchiwakapegwa kuzwa kujulu, nikuba oobo, ooyo wandipedya kuli nduwe ulaachibi chipati.”
JOH 19:12 Kunsandulo eeyi, Pilato wakeezya kumwangununa pesi bama Juda bakawompoolola kabati, “kuti wangununa mwalumi ooyu, “Tooli muzolwani wa Siza. Woonse ulichita mwami uuwambula ataala a Siza.
JOH 19:13 Pilato nakamvwa makani aaya wakeeta Jesu aanze wakkala aachuno chakubetekela mubusena bwiitwa kuti “Ibbuwa lyamabwe,” pesi mumulaka wachi Hibbulu, ni “Gabbata.”
JOH 19:14 Lino lyakali izuba lyakubambililwa kwapasika, chiindi chamahola aali musanu alimwi. Pilato wakati kuba Juda, “Mulange ngoyu mwami wenu!”
JOH 19:15 Bakawompolola, “Kuule anguwe, kule anguwe, “Abambulwe!” Pilato wakati kuli mbabo, “Mubambule na mwami wenu?” Bapayizi bapati bakasandula, “Tatukwe mwami pe, pesi Siiza.”
JOH 19:16 Mpawo Pilato wakapedekezya Jesu kuli mbabo kuti abambuulwe.
JOH 19:17 Mpawo bakatola Jesu, bayinka aanze, kalibwezelede chiingano, kubusena butegwa “Kaanza,” chiitwa kuti “Gologota.” mumulaka wachi Giliki.
JOH 19:18 Bakamubambula Jesu nkuko, antomwe abamwi baalumi babili umwi kuli eeli bbazu, umwi kuli eeli, Jesu kali akati.
JOH 19:19 Pilato wakalemba chitondezyo wachibika achiingano. Chakalembedwe obu: JESU, MWAMI WABA JUDA.
JOH 19:20 BaJuda biingi bakalikuchibala chitondezyo eechi nkambo busena Jesu nkwakabambwidwe bwakali afwifwi adolopo. Chitondezyo chakalembedwe mumilaka eyi, chi Hibbulu, Latini, antomwe amuchi Giliki.
JOH 19:21 Eelyo bapayizi bapati babaJuda bakati kuli Pilato, “Utalembi kuti, “Mwami wabaJuda, pesi utedi, “Ooyu uulyamba kut, “Ndimwami wabamaJuda.””
JOH 19:22 Pilato wakasandula kuti nzindalemba, ndalemba.”
JOH 19:23 Basilumamba nibakabambula Jesu, bakatola zisamo zyakwe, bazyabana akati kabo muzibeela zyoone, kuti baabane umwi awumwi, achilacho chibaki. Lino chibaki chakali abusumyo buumwi kuzwida ajulu.
JOH 19:24 Mpawo bakati kuli umwi awumwi, “Tatuchideluli pe, pesi aatusonde kuchitila kuti chilyaambe kuti chilaaba chani. Eechi chakachitika kuchitila kuti malembe azuzikizigwe awamba kuti, “Bakaabana zikobela zyangu akati kaabo akusonda zisamo zyangu. Eezi nzibakachita basilumamba.”
JOH 19:25 Lino ibakayimvwi afwifwi achiingano cha Jesu, kwakali banyina Jesu, kwakali mukulana wabanyina, Meli muka Kkilopasi, a Meli Magadalina. Aaba bamakayintu bakalimvwi afwifwi achiingano cha Jesu.
JOH 19:26 Jesu nakabona banyina asikwiiya ooyo ngwakali kuyandisya kabimvwi afwifwi, wakati kuli banyina, “Yomwanakazi, “Langa, mwanako!”
JOH 19:27 Mpawo wakati kuli sikwiiya, “Langa banyoko.” Kuzwa kuchiindi echo sikwiya wakabatola banyina kungánda yakwe.
JOH 19:28 Nikwakayinda ezi Jesu, nkambo wakaziba kuti zyonse lino zyakali zyamana, akuchitila kuti malembe ayelede kuzuzikizigwa, Jesu wakati, “Ndaaba enyota”
JOH 19:29 Chibikilo chakazwide wayini upanyuka chakaliwo, mpawo bakabika akasamu kakaangidwe chisana chakazwide wayini upanyuka bamutambikizya amulomo wakwe.
JOH 19:30 Jesu nakanywa wayini upanyuka wakati “Kwamana.” wakalanzya mutwe aansi akupedya muuya wakwe.
JOH 19:31 Mpawo baJuda, akambo kakuti lyakali izuba lyakulibambila, akuti mibili teyakali kuchaala aachingano kuchindi chasabata ( elyo Sabata yakali mpati loko), bakakumbila Pilato kuti atyole mawulu aabo akubagwisya.
JOH 19:32 Mpawo basilumamba bakasika akutyola mawulu amwalumi wakutanguna awabili wabo bakabambwidwe a Jesu.
JOH 19:33 Nibakasika kuli Jesu, bakabona kuti wakali wafwa kale, aboobo tebakamutyola pe mawulu akwe.
JOH 19:34 Nikuba obo, umwi wabasilumamba wakamuyasa limwi bbazu esumu, mpawo kwakazwa iganzi amaanzi.
JOH 19:35 Ooyo wakabona eechi wakaamba bukamboni, abukamboni bwakwe mbwakasimpe. Ulizi kuti nzyawamba ninchobeni kuchitila kuti anduwe usyome.
JOH 19:36 Nkambo eezi zintu zyakachitika kuchitila kuzuzikizya malembe, “Takwe nikuba limwi fuwa lyakwe litakatyolwe.”
JOH 19:37 Alubo, aamwi malembe aamba kuti, “Bayolanga kulinguwe ooyo ngubakayasa.”
JOH 19:38 Nikwakamana ezi zintu, Josefa waku Alimatiya mbuli kuti wakali sikwiiya ( pesi mukusisikizya akuyoowa baJuda) wakakukumbila kuli Pilato kuti atoole mubili waJesu, Pilato wakamuzumizya. Aboobo Josefa wakaboola akuutola mubili waJesu.
JOH 19:39 Nikkodimasi alakwe wakasika, nguwe wakazide kutangna kuli Jesu mansiku. Wakeeta tununkilizyo tuvwelene twamuula atwatyati, mweelwe wamuyanda umwi wampondo.
JOH 19:40 Mpawo bakatola mubili wa Jesu bawuvungilizya zisani zituba atununkilizyo mbuli muchaanza chaba maJuda kukuvwikka mubili.
JOH 19:41 Lino mubusena mwakabambwidwe kwakali chilili, omu muchilili mwakali kabanda kakatalina kulazikwa muntu naba umwi pe.
JOH 19:42 Nkambo kakuti lyakali izuba lyakuli bambilila lyabama Juda alimwi akambo kakuti kabanda kakali afwifwi, bakamulazika mumo Jesu.
JOH 20:1 Lino chifumo mubuzuba butaanzi bwamviki, nkakuchisiya, Meli Magadalina wakaza kuchuumbwe alimwi wakabona ibbwe kalikkunkulisigilwe kuzwa kuchuumbwe.
JOH 20:2 Akaako wakachijaana alimwi wasika kuli Sayimoni Pita a kuli bamwi basikwiiya aabo Jesu mbakali kuyanda, alimwi wabaambila wati, “Bamubweza Mwaami kuzwa muchuumbwe, alimwi tatuzi nkubamulazika.”
JOH 20:3 Mpawo Pita abamwi basikwiiya bakazwa, alimwi bakaya kuchuumbwe.
JOH 20:4 Aantomwe bakachijaana, alimwi umwi sikwiiya wakachijaanisya kwiinda Pita akusika kuchuumbwe lutaanzi.
JOH 20:5 Lino wakalangisisya aansi, wakabona mulembo wazizwaato zyakwe kazilede aawo, pesi takanjila pe mukati.
JOH 20:6 Sayimoni Pita lino wakasika kunembo lyakwe alimwi wanjila muchuumbwe. Wakabona chilembo chachizwato kachiyalidwe awo,
JOH 20:7 achilembo chakali aatala amuutwe wakwe. Techakayalidwe aamwi azilembo zimwi pesi chakalivungidwe mubusena bwacho achilike.
JOH 20:8 Lino umwi sikwiiya, ooyo wakatanguna kusika kuchuumbwe, alakwe wakasika wanjila muchuumbwe, alimwi wakabona aalimwi wasyoma.
JOH 20:9 Nkaambo kusikila kuchiindi eecho tebakalinaaziba malembe aamba kuti uzobuka kuzwa kubafu.
JOH 20:10 Akaako basikwiiya bakabweeda kumunzi lubo.
JOH 20:11 Pesi Meli wakaliimvwi aanze aachuumbwe. Nkachilila, wakalangisisya aansi muchuumbwe.
JOH 20:12 Wakabona bobilwe bangelo muzituba balikkede, umwi kumutwe, alimwi umwi kumawulu aawo mubili wa Jesu mpuwakalede.
JOH 20:13 Bakati kulinguwe, “Yo mwanakazi, ulilaanzi?” Wakati kulimbabo, Nkaambo babweza Mwaami wangu, alimwi tandizi pe kuti bamubika kuli.”
JOH 20:14 Nakaamba eechi, wakachebuka alimwi wabona Jesu kayimvwi aawo, pesi takaziba pe kuti ngu Jesu.
JOH 20:15 Jesu wakamwaambila, “Yo mwanakazi ulilaanzi? Ngwani ngolanguula?” Wakayeya kuti ngu sichilili. akaako wakati kulinguwe, “Yo mwaalumi, na wamubweza, ndaambile nkuwamubika, alimwi ndiyomubweza.”
JOH 20:16 Jesu wakati kulinguwe, “Meli.” Wakachebuka, alimwi wati kulinguwe muchi Alamayiki, “Labboni,” (chitolekelwa kuti: “Muyiisi.”)
JOH 20:17 Jesu wakati kulinguwe, “Utandijati, nsinayinka kujulu kuli Taata, pesi inka kubakkulana bangu alimwi ubaambile kuti ndiyobwiinka kujulu kuli Taata wangu a Taata wenu, alimwi Leza wangu a Leza wenu.”
JOH 20:18 Meli Magadalina wakasika alimwi waambila basikwiiy, 'Ndamubona Mwaami,” alimwi azintu nzyaakamwaambila.
JOH 20:19 Nikwakaba goko, mubuzuba oobo, izuba taanzi lya mviki, alimwi amakkoma aakooko basikwiiya nkubakabede, akalijalidwe mukuyoywa ba Juda, Jesu wakasika alimwi wiima aakati kabo wasikwaamba kuti, ”'Luumuno kulindinywe.”
JOH 20:20 Nakamana kwaamba eezi, wakabatondezya maboko aakwe a bbazu lyakwe. Mpawo basikwiiya nibakabona Mwaami, bakabotelwa.
JOH 20:21 Jesu lino wakabaambila alubo, Luumuno kulindinywe. Mbuli Taata mbwakandituma, lino ndili kumutuma.”
JOH 20:22 Aawo Jesu naakaamba eezi, wayoyela aalimbabo alimwi wasikuti kulimbabo, “Mutambule Muuya Uusalala.
JOH 20:23 Kufumbwa chibi chani nchimuyolekelela, ngachalekelelwa; kufumbwa ngumubweedezezya chibi, ngazyabweedezegwa.”
JOH 20:24 Tomasi, umwi wenkamu yabalikkumi ababili, utegwa Didimasi, takali aantomwe pe abamwi aawo Jesu naakasika.
JOH 20:25 Bamwi basikwiiya nikwakiinda chiindi bakati kulinguwe, “Twamubona Mwaami.” Wakabaambila kuti, “Ado ndabona mumaboko aakwe impa zya zipikili, alimwi ndibike munwe mukati ke mpa zya zipikili, akubika luboko lwangu mubbazu lyakwe, nsikoyoosyoma.”
JOH 20:26 Nikwakayinda mazuba ali musani aatatu basikwiiya bakwe bakali mukati alubo, alimwi Tomasi wakali aakati kabo. Jesu wakanjila aawo makkoma kaajalidwe, alimwi wiimikila akati kabo, wati, “Luumuno kulindinywe.”
JOH 20:27 Lino wakati kuli Tomasi, “Seyomeka munwe wako, alimwi ubone maboko aangu, sikila amunwe wako, alimwi ubike mumampango aangu, utabi uutasyomi, pesi syoma.”
JOH 20:28 Tomasi wakasandula alimwi wakati kulinguwe, “Mwaami wangu a Leza wangu.”
JOH 20:29 Jesu wakati kulinguwe, “Nkaambo wandibona, wasyoma. Balilongezegelwe batanaabona, alimwi basyoma.”
JOH 20:30 Lino Jesu wakachita zitondezyo zyiingi kunembo lya basikwiiya, zitondezyo zyakatalembwa pe mumagwalo,
JOH 20:31 pesi eezi zyakalembwa kuti tusyome kuti Jesu ngu Kkilisito, Mwana wa Leza, alimwi mukusyoma, ube aabuumi muzina lyakwe.
JOH 21:1 Nikwakayinda eezi zintu Jesu wakaliyubununa lwakwe mwini alubo kuli basikwiiya bakwe ku lwizi lwa ku Tibbaliyasi. Oobu mbombubo mbwakaliyubununa lwakwe mwini.
JOH 21:2 Sayimoni Pita wakali aantomwe a Tomasi uutegwa Didimasi, Nataniel uuzwa ku Kkana mu Galili, ibana ba Zebbedi, alimwi ababili basikwiiya ba Jesu.
JOH 21:3 Sayimoni Pita wakati kulimbabo, “Ndiyobuya ku kuloba.” Bakati kulinguwe, “Aswebo, tuyobwiinka anduwe.” Bakiinka alimwi banjila mubwaato, pesi takwe nchibakajata busiku boonse.
JOH 21:4 Lino, nkakuli kwa chifumofumo, Jesu wakaliimvwi kunkomwe yalwizi, pesi basikwiiya tebakaziba pe kuti wakali Jesu.
JOH 21:5 Akaako Jesu wakati kulimbabo, “Yo balombwana, muli aachakulya na?” Bakamusandula, “Tatukwe.”
JOH 21:6 Wakati kulimbabo, “Kamuwaala bunsabwe bwenu kubbazu lyalulyo lwa bwaato, alimwi muyoojana zimwi.” Akaako bakawaala bunsabwe bwabo, pesi tebakakonzya pe kubukwelela mukati akaambo kakuvulisya kwe nswi.
JOH 21:7 Alimwi sikwiiya Jesu ngwakali kuyandisya kapati wakati kuli Pita, “Ngu Mwaami. “Aawo Sayimoni Pita naakamvwa kuti Mwaami, wakadelula chisamo chakwe chaanze (nkaambo wakali maya), alimwi waliwaalila mulwizi.
JOH 21:8 Bamwi basikwiiya bakaza mubwaato (tebakali kule pe kuzwa anyika, mbuli myaanda yobile yatukkokola kuzwa aawo), alimwi bakayobukkwela bunsabwe buzwide nswi.
JOH 21:9 Aawo nibakazwa aanze aatala anyika, bakabona makkala aamulilo nkakulazikidwe muswi aatala lyawo achinkwa.
JOH 21:10 Jesu wakati kulimbabo, “Mweete zimwi nswi nzimwajata.”
JOH 21:11 Sayimoni Pita wakayinka aajulu akukkwela bunsabwe aanyika, kakuzwide baswi ba pati, mwaanda omwe amakkumi musamu aatatu mbuzyakabede, pesi nikuba kuti zyakali nyingi, bunsabwe tebwakadeluka pe.
JOH 21:12 Jesu wakati kulimbabo, “Kamuza akulya chilyo chachifumo.” Takwe aakati kabasikwiiya wakayanda kumubuzya kuti, “Nduweni?” Bakali zizi kuti ngu Mwaami.
JOH 21:13 Jesu wakaza wabweza chinkwa, alimwi wachipa kulimbabo, a nswi azilazyo.
JOH 21:14 Oolu lwakali lwatatu Jesu kali kuliyubununa mwini kuli basikwiiya musule aakubuka kwakwe kuzwa kubafu.
JOH 21:15 Nebakamana kulya chilyo chachifumo, Jesu wakati kuli Sayimoni Pita, “Sayimoni mwana wa Joni, ulandiyanda na kwiinda eezi?” Pita wakati kulinguwe, “Iyi Mwaami wangu, ulizi kuti ndilakuyanda.” Jesu wakati kulinguwe, “Sanina mbelele zyangu.”
JOH 21:16 Wakati kulinguwe lwabili, “Sayimoni mwana wa Joni, ulandiyanda na?” Pita wakati kulinguwe, “Iyi Mwaami wangu, ulizi kuti ndilakuyanda.” Jesu wakati kulinguwe, “Bamba mbelele zyangu.”
JOH 21:17 Wakati kulinguwe lwatatu, “Sayimoni mwana wa Joni, ulandiyanda na?” Pita wakali wanyema nkaambo Jesu wakali wamubuzya lwatatu, “Ulandiyanda na?” Wakati kulinguwe, “Mwaami, ulizizi zyoonse eezi zintu, ulizi kuti ndakuyanda.” Jesu wakati kulinguwe, “Sanina mbelele zyangu.
JOH 21:18 Nchobeni, nchobeni, ndakwaambila, niwakachili muniini, wakalikulizwaatika akweenda kufumbwa nkuwakali kuyanda, pesi niwakkomena, uyootandabika maboko aako, alimwi umwi uyookuzwatika a kukubweza kukutola nkotayandi kwiinka.”
JOH 21:19 Lino Jesu wakachaamba eechi kuchitila musyobo walufu Pita ngwatakalemeke Leza. Nakamana kwaamba eechi, wakati kuli Pita, “Nditobele.”
JOH 21:20 Pita wakachebuka alimwi wabona sikwiiya ooyo Jesu ngwakali kuyandisya nkayoobubatobela, ooyo wakali aafwifwi kubbazu lya Jesu kuchiindi cha chilalilo alimwi wakati, “Mwaami, utakakuuzye?”
JOH 21:21 Pita wakamubona akwaambila Jesu, “Ulachita biyeni mwaalumi ooyu?”
JOH 21:22 Jesu wakati kulinguwe, “Na ndayanda kuti akkale kusikila ndaboola, niinzi eecho kulinduwe? Nditobele.”
JOH 21:23 Lino aaka kaambo kakasaalila kuli babunyina, kuti ooyo sikwiiya takoyoofwa. Pesi Jesu teensi wakateedi kuli Pita kuti ooyo sikwiiya takoyoofw, pesi, “Na ndayanda kuti ukkale kusikila ndaboola, niinzi eecho kulinduwe?”
JOH 21:24 Ooyu ngonguwe sikwiiya uupa bukamboni aatala azint, alimwi iwakalemba zintu eezi, alimwi tulizi kuti bukamboni bwakwe mbwanchoonzyo.
JOH 21:25 Kuli zintu zyiingi alubo Jesu nzyakachita. Na chimwi achimwi chakalembwa aansi, ndibona kuti niiba nyika lwayo teyalikunokonzya pe kubamba magwalo anoli alembwa.
ACT 1:1 Tiyofilasi, lugwalo lutanzi ndundakalemba, ndakaamba zyoonse eezyo Jesu nzyakatalika kuchita akwiisya,
ACT 1:2 mane kubuzuba mbwakatolwa kujulu, nakamana kupa mulalilo kwiinda mu Muuya Uusalala kuba tumwa mbakasalide.
ACT 1:3 Nakamana kupenga, wakalitondezya lwakwe muzitondezyo zyiingi zizundikizya. Wakaliyubununa kuli mbabo kwamazuba aali makumi aane, mpawo wakambula aatala aabwami bwa-Leza.
ACT 1:4 Chindi nakali kubungana aamwi ambabo, wakabalayilila kuti batazwi mu Jelusalema, pesi bakalindile chisyomezyo cha Taata, Eecho nchaakamba kuti, “mwakamvwa kulindime
ACT 1:5 kuti choonzyo, Joni waka bbabbatizya a meenda, pesi nywebo mumazuba mache biyo muyo bbabbatizigwa muMuuya Uusalala.”
ACT 1:6 Aawo nibaka bungene aamwi bakabuzya kuti, “Mwami, sena echi nchechindi nchoyobusilizya Bwami ku Izilayeli?”
ACT 1:7 Wakabambila kuti, “tachili kulindinywe kuziba zyiindi eezyo Taata nzyakabamba munguzu zyakwe.
ACT 1:8 Pesi muyotambula nguzu aawo Muuya Uusalala nuyosika aalindinywe, mpawo muyooba bakamboni bangu mu Jelusalemu amu Judiya moonse amu Samaliya, akumamanino anyika.”
ACT 1:9 Chiindi Mwami Jesu nakaamba eezi zintu, mpawawo kabachilangide kujulu, wakanyamoulwa mujulu, mpawo ijoba lyakamusisa kuzwa kumeso aabo.
ACT 1:10 Mbubonya kabachilangisisya kujulu mbuli mbwakeenda, mpawo mpawo, baalumi babili bakayimikila kulubazu lwabo kabasamide zisamo zituba.
ACT 1:11 Bakaamba kuti, “Yo balumi baku Galili, nkambonzi nomwimvwi aano akulanga mujulu? Jesu ooyu watansiikwa kuzwa kulindinywe kuya kujulu, mbubonya uuyobola muchiimo nchichonya nchomwamubona kayinka aacho kujulu.
ACT 1:12 Mpawo bakajokela ku Jelusalema kabazwa kuchilundu chitegwa Oliveti, eecho chili aafwifwi aku Jelusalemu, lweendo lwabuzuba bwa Sabata.
ACT 1:13 Mpawo nibakasika, bakatanta mung'anda yamujulu, oomo mubakali kukkala. Bakali Pita, Joni, Jemusi, Andulo, Filipu, Tomasi, Bbatolomyu, Mateyo, Jemusi mwana wa Alufiyasi, Sayimoni mu Ziloti, a Judasi mwana wa Jemusi.
ACT 1:14 Boonse bakali peda kumulimo wakukomba antomwe abanakazi, a Meli banyina ba Jesu Kkilisito abanabakwabo.
ACT 1:15 Mumazubayo Pita wakiimikila akati kababakwabo, bakati kabe mwaanda amakkumi aabili, akwamba kuti,
ACT 1:16 “Nobakwesu, chakalelede kuti magwalo azuzikizigwe kuti Muuya Uusalala wakamba lutanzi kumulomo wa Devidi azya Judasi, ooyo wakazulwida aabo bakaanga Jesu.
ACT 1:17 Nkaambo wakaluumwi wesu mpawo wakatambula chaabilo chamulimo ooyu.”
ACT 1:18 Lino mwaalumi ooyu wakawula muunda a mpindu nzyakatambula mububi bwakwe, eelyo nkukonya wakawa watola mutwe lutaanzi amubili wakwe wakabbaluka alimwi mala aakwe akafwasukila kunze.
ACT 1:19 Boonse bakkali bamu Jelusalemu bakamvwa ataala achechi, mpawo bakawulika muunda ooyo mumwaambo wabo “Akeludama, “nkukwamba kuti, “Muunda wa Bulowa.”
ACT 1:20 “Nkaambo kuli lembedwe mulugwalo lwa Ntembawuzyo, 'Muunda wakwe awuchitwe chisesemyo, alimwi kutabi naba omwe muntu ukkala nkuko; 'Akube umwi uumbi ubweza chuuno chakwe chabuzulwidi.
ACT 1:21 Nkinkako, kulelede, kuti umwi wabantu bakeenda aswe chiindi choonse Mwami Jesu nakanjila akuzwa aakati kesu,
ACT 1:22 kutalikila kuzwa kulubbabbatizyo lwa Joni kulosika kubuzuba mbwakabwezegwa kuzwa kulindiswe, abe kamboni andiswe kububuke bwakwe.”
ACT 1:23 Mpawo bakabika baalumi babili kunembo, Jozefu uutegwa Bbasabbasi, ooyo wakawulikwa lubo izina lyakuti Jasitasi, a Matiyasi.
ACT 1:24 Eelyo bakakomba akwamba kuti, “Mwami, webo, ulizi myoyo yabantu boonse, nkinkaako yubununa kuti nguuli wababili aaba; ooyo ngosalide
ACT 1:25 abweze busena mumulimo oyu abutumwa oobo mbwakasiya Judasi akuya kubusena bwakwe.”
ACT 1:26 Mpawo bakawuma chisolo, alimwi chisolo chakawida kuli Matiyasi, mpawo wakabalwa aamwi abatumwa bali kkumi awumwi.
ACT 2:1 Nibwakasika buzuba bwa Pentekosita, boonse bakali aantomwe aabusena bomwe.
ACT 2:2 Mpawaawo kwakasikka muzuzumo wakazwa kujulu ulimbuli kuunga waguwo pati, wakazuzya ng'anda yoonse mubakabede.
ACT 2:3 Mpawaawo kwakalibonia ndimi zilimbuli zyamulilo zyakabakkala, alimwi zyakabakkala umwi awumwi.
ACT 2:4 Boonseni bakazula aMuuya Uusalala mpawo bakatalika kwaambuula mumilaka, mbuli mbubakazumininwa aMuuya.
ACT 2:5 Lino kwakali baJuda bakali kukkala mu Jelusalemu, bakalo aabuna leza, balikuzwa kumanyika woonse alimunsejulu.
ACT 2:6 Ooyu muzuzumo niwakamvwigwa, makamu makamu aabantu akaboola aamwi alubo bakagamba nkaambo bakabamvwa kabaambuula mumilaka yabo.
ACT 2:7 Bakayoowa akugamba; bakati sena aaba boonse balikwaambula tabali bamu Galilii na?
ACT 2:8 Nkamboonzi nitulikubamvwa, umwi awumwi mumilaka yabuzyalwe bwesu?
ACT 2:9 Baku Patiya abaku Medesi abaku Elamiya, abaabo bakkala ku Mesopotamiya, mu Judiya abaku Kkapadokkiya, ku Pontasi aku Ezhia,
ACT 2:10 ku Pirigiya aku Pamfiliya, ku Ejipiti aamwi mabazu a Libbiya aku Sayilini, abeenzu bakalikuzwa ku Roma,
ACT 2:11 baJuda abakasanduka baku Kkilete abana Arabiya, twabamvwa balaambuula mumilaka yesu aatala amilimu iigambya yaLeza.”
ACT 2:12 Boonse bakakankama akuyoowa kupati, bakambuula umwi kuluumwi, “Eechi chaambaanzi?”
ACT 2:13 Pesi bamwi bakabaniaka bati, “Bakkuuta wayini mupya.”
ACT 2:14 Pesi Pita wakayimikila abalikumi awumwi, wakatola muju jwi lyakwe, wakabaambila kuti, “Nobaalumi bamu Judiya, antoomwe amoonse nimukkala mu Jelusalema, eechi achizibinkane kulindinywe; amuteelele loko kumajwi aangu.
ACT 2:15 Nkaambo aaba bantu tabakoledwe pe mboli mbumulikubayeyela, nkaambo lichili biyo wola lyatatu lyabuzuba.
ACT 2:16 Pesi eechi nchenchicho chakaambidwe kuzwa kumusinsimi Jowelu:
ACT 2:17 'Kuyooba kumazuba akumamanino,' Leza uwamba oobo, 'Ndiyotila muuya wangu aatala anyama yoonse, bana benu balombe abasimbi bayoosinsima, bakubusi bayoobona zilengaano, abamanene benu bayoolota ziloto.
ACT 2:18 Chanchoonzyo balanda bangu bachaalumi abalanda bachanakazi mumazuba aayo nindiyotila Muuya wangu, bayoosinsima.
ACT 2:19 Ndiyotondezya zigambyo kujulu azitondezyo aanyika, bulowa, mulilo, akawuntumusi kabusi.
ACT 2:20 Zuba liyoosiya amweezi uyooba bulowa, kabutana kusika buzuba bupati bwakuboola kwa Mwami.
ACT 2:21 Kuyoba kuti boonse bayita muzina lya Mwami bayofutulwa.
ACT 2:22 Nobaalumi baku Izilayeli, amumvwe majwi aaya: Jesu muNazalata, wakali mwaalumi ngumwakasalilwa a Leza amanguzu mapati antoomwe azigambyo azitondezyo nzyakachita Leza kwiinda mulinguwe akaki kenu, mbubonya mbuli mbomuzi.
ACT 2:23 Ooyu mwaalumi mwakamupegwa kwiinda mumakanze amuluzibo; andinywe, kwiinda mumaanza aabatalemeki mulawu, mwakamubambula akumujeya;
ACT 2:24 pesi Leza wakamubusya, wakamwaangununa kumachise aalufu, nkaambo teensi chakalikukonzeka kuti akkalilile mulindulo.
ACT 2:25 Nkaambo Devidi waamba boobu aatala anguwe, 'Ndakabona Mwami lyoonse kubusyu bwangu, nkaambo uliko kulubazu lwakululyo kuti nsikasunzulusigwi.
ACT 2:26 Nkenkaako moyo wangu wakabotelwa alulimi lwangu lwakakondwa. Alubo, nyama yangu iyookkala mubusichaamba.
ACT 2:27 Nkaambo tokoyoolekela muuya wangu mu Hadesi, nikuba kuyozumina Musalali wako kuti akabone bubozi.
ACT 2:28 Wakachita kuti zizibwe kulindime nzila zyabuumi; uyondipa kuti ndikazule lukondo kubusyu bwako.'
ACT 2:29 Nobayandwa, eechi chililuleme kulindime kuti ngambuule aatala asikale Devidi, wakafwa akuvwikwa, kabanda kakwe mpukachili ambulisunu akati kesu.
ACT 2:30 Nekubaboobo, wakalimusinsimi alubo wakalizi kuti Leza wakali wasyomezya muchikonke kulinguwe kuti, uyoonanika umwi wamumazyalane aakwe uutakakkale aachuuno chakwe.
ACT 2:31 Wakabona zyakali kuyanda kuchitika muchiindi chiboola kwaamba aatala abubuke bwa Kkilisito, 'Taakwe pe anakalekelwa mu Hadesi, nuuba amubili wakwe taakwe niwakabola pe.'
ACT 2:32 Ooyu Jesu, Leza ngwaakabusya, uuli ngonguwe toonse ngotuli kaamboni.
ACT 2:33 Nkenkaako kwiinda mukusumpulwa akubikwa kujanza lyalulyo lwa Leza alubo amukutambula Muuya Uusalala wachisyomezyo kuzwa kuli Wisi, wakatila eechi, eecho nchimubona akumvwa.
ACT 2:34 Nkaambo Devidi taakwe pe naakatanta kuya kujulu, pesi uwamba kuti, 'Mwami wakati kuMwami wangu,'”Kokkala kujanza lyakuulyo lwangu
ACT 2:35 mane ndikachite basinkondonyokwe chilyatilizyo chandyatyo zyamawulu aako.”'
ACT 2:36 Aboobo, akube kuti yoonse ng'anda ya Izilayeli izibe kuti Leza nguwakamuchita kuba Mwami a Kkilisito, ooyu Jesu ngumwakabambula.”
ACT 2:37 Lino nibakamvwa eezi zyoonse, bakayaswa mumyoyo yabo, bakaambila Pita antoomwe abatumwa boonse bati, “Nobakwesu, tuchite biyeni?”
ACT 2:38 Mpawo Pita wakabaambila kuti, “Amusanduke, alubo mubbabbatizigwe, umwi awumwi wenu muzina lya Jesu Kkilisito kuti mulekelelwe zibi zyenu, mpawo muyootambula chipo cha Muuya Uusalala.
ACT 2:39 Nkaambo chisyomezyo nchichanu abana banu aboonse bazwa kule, abuvule bwabantu boonse mbatanoli wiita Mwami Leza.”
ACT 2:40 Aambi majwi miingi wakabapa bukamboni akubalayilila, akwaamba kuti, “Amulifutule kuzwa kuli eeli zyalane lyabubi.”
ACT 2:41 Mpawo bakatambula ijwi lyakwe, bakabbabbatizigwa, bakayungizigwa oobo buunsi bakasanduka kabayeyelwa kusika kuzyuulu zitatu.
ACT 2:42 Bakalipeda kunjiisyo zyabatumwa, akubulyidilano, mukukwamuna chinkwa amukukomba.
ACT 2:43 Kuyoowa kwakabawo kumuntu amuntu, antoomwe azigambyo azitondeezyo zyiingi zyakachitwa kwiinda mubatumwa.
ACT 2:44 Boonse bakazumina bakali antoomwe kabali aazintu zyoose mukuba aamwi,
ACT 2:45 mpawo bakawuzya nzibakali aazyo ambono zyabo, akuzyaabana boonse akati kabo, umwi awumwi mbuli kubula kwabo.
ACT 2:46 Mubuzuba abuzuba bakalikulipeda lwabo amaboneno omwe muchikombelo, alimwi bakali kukwamuna chinkwa mumaanda aabo, kabaabana chakulya antoomwe chakukondwa amyoyo iwangunukide;
ACT 2:47 bakatembawula Leza akuba aaluzyalo kubantu boonse, alubo mazuba woonse Mwami wakayujngizya mweelwe wabaabo bakalikufutulwa.
ACT 3:1 Lino Pita a Jon bakalikuya muchikombelo muchiindi chakukomba, muwola lyamusanu atune.
ACT 3:2 Lino umwi mwaalumi wakalemene kuzwa mwida lyabanyina wakali kunoongwa wabwezwa wakutulwa aamulyango wachikombelo ooyo wakalikutegwa Mubotu. Bakalikumutula mpawaawo abuzuba kuchitila kuti kalikukumbila zipo kubantu banjila muchikolmbelo chazipo.
ACT 3:3 Naakabona Pita a Joni kabalikwaamba kunjila muchikombelo, wakabakumbila zipo.
ACT 3:4 Pita wakamulangisisya, kali a Joni, wakati “Tulange.”
ACT 3:5 Mwaalumi uulemene wakabalanga kalangila kutambula chimwi chintu kuzwa kulimbabo.
ACT 3:6 Pesi Pita wakati, “Nsiliva angolide nsikwe pe, pesi nchelaacho ndilakupa. Muzina lya Jesu Kkilisito waku Nazaleta, enda.”
ACT 3:7 Kamujisi akuboko kwakuchilisyo, Pita wakamunyampula, mpawo ingo amawulu aakwe akasima.
ACT 3:8 Wakasunkutila mujulu, mwaalumi mulema wakanyampuka wasanguna kweenda, mpawo wakanjila a Pita a Joni muchikombelo kayabweenda, kayabusunkuta akulumbayizya Leza.
ACT 3:9 Bantu boonse bakamubona kayabweenda akulumbayizya Leza.
ACT 3:10 Bakabona kuti nguwe uulya mwaalumi wakali kukumbila zipo kubantu aaMulyango Mubotu wachikombelo; mpawo bakagamba chakwiindilila nkaambo kachakachitika kulinguwe.
ACT 3:11 Nakachijisilidi kuli Pita a Joni, bantu boonse bakachijanina kulimbabo kubbazu litegwa ndilya Solomoni, kambagambide loko.
ACT 3:12 Pita nakazibona eezi wakabasandula bantu wati, “Inywe nombaalummi ba Izilayili nkamboonzi nimugamba? Nkamboonzi nimutulangisisya, aanga ndiswe twamuponia amangu eesu nakuti abu Leza bwesu?
ACT 3:13 Leza wa Abbulahamu, awa Ayizeki, awa Jakobo, Leza wama taata eesu, wapa bulemu kumulanda wakwe Jesu. Nguwe ngumwakapeda mwamukaka kubusyu bwa Payileti, aawo we naakasalide kumwaangununa.
ACT 3:14 Mwakakaka Musalali a Mululami. Pesi mwakalikumbilila mujayi kuti awangununwe.
ACT 3:15 Mwakajaya Sikwaanza buumi, ooyo Leza ngwakabusya kubafu, tulibakamboni bazyo eezi.
ACT 3:16 Nkaambo kalusyomo muzina lyakwe, zina lyakwe lyapa kuti ooyu mwaalumi, ngumubwene akuziba, kuti asime. Lusyomo kwiinda muli Jesu lwamupa bulondozi bubotu kunembo lyanu.
ACT 3:17 Lino nobakwesu ndilikwaamba kuti mwakachita mukutaziba, mbuli mbubakachita batongi benu.
ACT 3:18 Pesi zintu nzyakaamba Leza kwiinda mumilomo yaba sinsimi boonse, kuti Kkilisito wakwe uzopenzegwa, lino wazizuzikizya.
ACT 3:19 Amusanduke, aboobo, muboole, nkokuti zibi zyenu zisalazigwe. Kuchitila kuti kwaba zyiindi zyakulyookezya ku Mwami;
ACT 3:20 mpawo ulamutumina Kkilisito ngumwakasalilwa Jesu.
ACT 3:21 Ngonguwe weelede kutambulwa ajulu mane zintu zyoonse zikabweedezegwe muchiimo chazyo, aatala aazintu Leza nzyakaambuula kwiinda mumilomo yaba sinsimi basalala.
ACT 3:22 Mozesi kampatila wakati, Mwami Leza uzoobusya musinsimi uulimbuli ndime kuzwa aakati kabakwenu. Muyooswiilila zyoonse nzyatakaambe kulindinywe.
ACT 3:23 Chiyooba mbubo kuti muntu woonse uutakaleke kumuswiilila ooyo musinsimi uyoonyonyoonwa akati kabantu.
ACT 3:24 Iyii, aboonse basinsimi kuzwa kuli Samuyele abaabo bakazoza musule lyakwe, bakaambula akuzibisya aatala amazuba aaya.
ACT 3:25 Mulibana babasinsimi abachizuminano nchakachita Leza abasikale benu, mbuli mbakaamba kuli Abbulahamu kuti, 'Mumbuto yako, azikkalongezegwe mpuli zyoonse zyaanyika.'
ACT 3:26 Leza wakabusya mulanda wakwe wamutumina kulindinywe sansina, kuti amulongezye moonse akusandula umwi awumwi wenu kuzwa kuzibi zyakwe.”
ACT 4:1 Pita a Joni nkabali kwambula kubantu, bapaizyi amuzulwidi wa tempele, aba Sadusi bakabasikila.
ACT 4:2 Baka pengana kapati nkaambo Pita a Joni bakali kuyiisya bantu akubakambaukila Jesu akubuka kwakwe kubafu.
ACT 4:3 Bakabajata bababika muntolongo maane buzuba butobela, nkambo lyakali lyaba goko.
ACT 4:4 Pesi bantu biingi bakamvwa aya makani bakasyoma, imweelo wabalumi bakasyoma bakali zyuulu musanu
ACT 4:5 Nibwakaba buzuba butobela, bendelezi, bapati abalembi bakabungana aamwi mu Jelusalema.
ACT 4:6 Anasi mupayizyi mupati wakaliwo, Kefasi, Joni aa Alekizanda, abaabo boonse nzubo zyamupaizyi mupati.
ACT 4:7 Nibakabika bika Pita aa Johani akaati kabo, bakababuzya,” nzizyani nguzu, niliba zina ndimwachita aalyo eezi.
ACT 4:8 Pesi Pita, nkazwide Muuya Uusalala, wakati kulimbabo,
ACT 4:9 “Inywe nobendelezyi abapati, babantu, kuti mwatubeteka sunu atala amulimo mubotu ngutwakachita aliyoyu mwalumi uchiswa, akuti wapona buyeni.”
ACT 4:10 Ngakuzibinkane kulindinywe moonse akubantu bamu Izilayeli kuti oyu mwalumi uyimvwi kunembo lyanu nkaponede muzina lya Jesu Kilisito wa Nazaleta, Ooyo ngumwakabambula, ooyo Leza ngwakabusya kubafu.
ACT 4:11 Jesu Kkilisito ndibbwe bayaki ndibaka kaaka lyakaba chooko ( chiswi)
ACT 4:12 Takwe lufutuko mumuntu naba omwe, nkambo taakwe zina aansi ajulu lipedwe kubantu nditwelede kufutulwa.”
ACT 4:13 Lino nibakalanga busichamba bwa Pita aa Joni, mpawo bakaziba kuti mbantu babuyo, batayiide, bakagamba, nkabazi kuti Pita aa Johani bakali a Jesu.
ACT 4:14 Nkaambo bakabona mwalumi wakaponesegwa nkayimvwi aambabo, bakabula zyakwamba ataala nzizyo.
ACT 4:15 Pesi nibakabalayilila batumwa kuti babbude munkuta yabechipala, bakiizya akati kabo.
ACT 4:16 Bakati, “tuchite buyeni ataala abalumi aaba? Nkambo kamasimpe alabukamboni bwachitwa ambabo bwazibinkana kubantu boonse bamu Jelusalema” tatukonzyi kuzikazya.
ACT 4:17 Pesi kuti zileke kuyakunembo akati kabantu, ngatubachenjezye ikuti batambili naba omwe muzina eeli.”
ACT 4:18 Lino bakabita Pita a Joni babalayilila kuti batambuli nekuba kuyiisya alimwi muzina lya Jesu.
ACT 4:19 Pesi Pita aa Joni bakavwiila bati kulimbabo, “Saa nchibotu kumeso a Leza kuswiilila ndinywe kwiinda nguwe, amuli beteke.
ACT 4:20 Tatukonzyi kuti tuleke kwambula atala azeezi zintu nzitwakamvwa akubona.”
ACT 4:21 Nibakaba sinizya Pita a Joni, bakabaleka beenda. Tebakajana mulandu uyanda chisubulo, nkaambo bantu boonse bakali kutembaula Leza azeezyo zyakachitwa.
ACT 4:22 Oyo mwalumi wakajana oku kupona wakali aminyaka iyiinda kumakumi oone akuzyalwa.
ACT 4:23 Nibakangununwa, Pita aa Joni bakaza kulibamukowa wabo mpawo bakubambila zyoonse mupati wabapayiizyi abapati nzibakabambila.
ACT 4:24 Lino nibakamvwa eezi, bakoompolola ajwi limwi kuli Leza mpawo bati, “Mwami, wakalenga majulu aanyika alwizi, azyoonse zilimuli nzizyo.
ACT 4:25 webo owakambula a Muuya Uusalala kwindila mumulomo wabalanda bakwe, taata wesu Davida, 'Nkambonzi, inyika zyabamasi nizyanyema, abantu bayeeya zintu zitanambene.”
ACT 4:26 Ibaami banyika bakakkala aansi aamwi, Ibendeelezi bakabungana aamwi kukulwania Mwami, alimwi a Kilisito wakwe.'
ACT 4:27 Ninchonzyo, aba babili Helodi aa Pontiyasi Payileti, antomwe abamaasi bakabungana aamwi muchisi cha Izilayeli, kukwimikilana amulanda Uusalala Jesu, munanike wako.
ACT 4:28 Bakabunganamwi kuti bachite zyoonse eezyo luboko amabambe aako nguwakakanzide kale kale achiindi chibola atachitike.
ACT 4:29 Lino, Mwami, laanga inchenjezyo yabo alimwi ubape busichaamba balanda bako kuti bambule ijwi lyako.
ACT 4:30 Tandabika luboko lwako kuti uponie akubapa zitondezyo azigambyo kwindilila muzina lyamulanda wako Uusalala Jesu.”
ACT 4:31 Nibakamana kukomba, busena boonse bwakazula a Muuya Uusalala mpawo bakamba jwi lya Leza abusichaamba.
ACT 4:32 Mweelwe mupati wabaabo bakasyooma bakaba amoyo amuya woomwe. Takwe naba oomwe wakamba kuti nchakalacho nchichakwe, pesi bakalijisi zyelelne mubube bwabo.
ACT 4:33 Munguzu mpati batumwa bakakambauka bukamboni atala abubuke bwa Mwami Jesu, aboobo luzyalo lupati lwakaba mulimbabo boonse.
ACT 4:34 Akati kabo katakwe wakabula kufumbwa chiintu, nkambo boonse bakajisi nyiika amaanda bakaasambala mpawo beeta mali yanzezyo nzibakawuzya.
ACT 4:35 Mpawo bakatula kumawulu abatumwa, mpawo yakabwa kulumwi awumwi mbuli mukubula kwakwe.
ACT 4:36 Jozefu, mu Levi, ooyo batumwa ngubakalikuti Bbanabbasi ( zina lilabupanduluzi ibuti mwana wabusungwazyi) mu-Levi, mwalumi waku Sayipulasi,
ACT 4:37 wakasambala muunda wakwe mpawo waketa mali witula kumawulu abatumwa.
ACT 5:1 Lino umwi mwalumi uutegwa Ananiyasi, nkali a Safila mwanakazi wakwe, bakawuzya chimpanzi chabuvubi,
ACT 5:2 alimwi wakabamba musule chimpanzi chamuulo wamali ( mwanakazi wakwe kabiyo wakalizizi ezi), alimwi wakeeta chimpanzi chazyo alimwi wakachibika kumawulu amu abatumwa.
ACT 5:3 Pesi Pita wakati, “Ananiyasi, nkambonzi satani naazuzya moyo wako kuti ubeje ku Muuya Uusalala alimwi kuti ubambe musule chimpanzi chamuulo wamuunda?
ACT 5:4 Niwalikusyaala nkawutawuziziwwe, tensi wakayimvwi kawuli wako, alimwi akuzwa nkawuli wawuzigwa, saa wakali munsi lyanuzu zyako? Nwani oyo wabika eyi milimo mumoyo wako? Teensi wabejela muntu pesi kuli Leza.”
ACT 5:5 Naakamvwa majwi aya, Ananiyasi wakawida aansi mpawo wayoya kwakumaninsizya, alimwi kuyoowa kupati kwakasika kuli boonse bakamvwa eezi.
ACT 5:6 Balombe bakanyampuka alimwi bamuvunilizya, alimwi bakamubweza alimwi bakumuvwikka.
ACT 5:7 Nikwakiinda biyo otatwe mahoola, mwanakazi wakwe wakanjila, katezi kuti niinzi zyachitika.
ACT 5:8 Pita wakati kulinuwe, “Ndibuzye naanka mwawuzya muunda azeezi, “wakati, “Iyii, azeezi.”
ACT 5:9 Mpawo Pita wakati kulinuwe, “Mbuubuli mbumwazuminana moonse kuti musunke muuya wa Leza? Bona mawulu abaalumi bavwikka mulumi wako ali amulyango, alimwi bayokubweza ayebo.”
ACT 5:10 Mpawo mpawo wakawida ansi kumawulu aakwe alimwi wakayoya kwakumaninsizya. Elyo baluumi nibakanjila, bakamujana nkafwide, alimwi bakamubweza alimwi bakumuvwikka kumbali lyamulumi.
ACT 5:11 Kuyoowa kupati kwakasika akkati kayoonse imbungano alimwi aakati kaboonse aabo bakamvwa eezi.
ACT 5:12 Zyingi zitondezyo alimwi azigambyo zyakalikuchitika akati kabantu kwiinda mumaanza abatumwa. Bakali antoomwe kumulyango wa Solomoni.
ACT 5:13 Pesi takwe wabo wakaba aachiyandisyo chakuba antomwe ambabo; nikuba boobo bantu bakabalemeka.
ACT 5:14 Kabiyo biingi basyomi bakali kuyungizizigwa ku Mwami, bantu biingi bechalumi mpawo abanakazi,
ACT 5:15 nkokuti bakali kubweza bachiswa muchisi alimwi babalazika aabulo amuzitobo, kuchitila kuti awo Pita nayosika, muzuzumbwe wakwe wayino wida alibamwi babo.
ACT 5:16 Mpawo bakasika kabiyo antomwe bantu biingi bazwa muchisi chilafwifwi a Jelusalema, nkabeeta bachiswa alimwi abaabo bajiswi aa myuya yamatombe, alimwi balikuponesegwa boonse.
ACT 5:17 Pesi mupayizi mupati wakanyampuka, mpawo aboonse abo bakali anguwe ( aabo benkamu yama Sajusizi); alimwi bakazwa munyono
ACT 5:18 alimwi bakabika maanza aatala lyaba tumwa, mpawo babawala muntolongo yakazibinkene.
ACT 5:19 Elyo muchindi chamansiku mungelo wa Leza wakajula mulyano wentolongo alimwi wakabagwisya aanze, mpawo wakati,
ACT 5:20 “Mwiinke, mwime muntempele mpawo mwambule kubantu majwi woonse abuumi.”
ACT 5:21 Nibakamvwa eezi, bakanjila muntempele nkakuli kwamba kucha mpawo bayiisya. Pesi mupayizi mupati wakasika mpawo ababo bakali anguwe, alimwi bakayita mulubeta antomwe, boonse bapati babantu bamu Izilayeli, mpawo babatuma kuntolongo kuti bakeete batumwa.
ACT 5:22 Pesi bakapokola abo bakayinka tebakabajana pe muntolongo, mpawo bakaboola kukuzowamba,
ACT 5:23 “Twajana intolongo mbuli mbukwelede kazijalidwe kabiyo balindizi kabiimvwi amulyango, pesi nitwajula, twajana takwe pe ulimukati.”
ACT 5:24 Lino basilumamba bentempele antomwe abapayizi bapati nibakamvwa aya majwi, baka bulikilwa atala ambabo kuti mbobuli mbubanga balazwa kulinzizyo.
ACT 5:25 Elyo umwi wakasika mpawo wabaambila, “Balumi aabo mbimwakabika mukkati kentolono balimvwi mukkati kantempele mpawo balikuyiisya bantu.”
ACT 5:26 Eelyo silumamba wakiinka aamwi abakapokola, mpawo wababoozya musule, pesi kakutakwe kulwana, eelyo nkabayowede kuti balabatulula mabwe.
ACT 5:27 Nibaka beeta, baka bakkazika munsi ababetesi. Mupayizi mupati wakaba buzisisya, nkati,
ACT 5:28 “Twalayilila ndinywe a mulawu kuti mutayiisyi muzina eeli, mpawo lino mwazuzya Jelusalema enjiisyo achiyandisyo chenu alimwi mwayeya akweeta bulowa bwamwalumi oyu atala lyesu.”
ACT 5:29 Alimwi Pita abatumwa bakasandula, “Twelede kulemeka Leza kwinda muntu.
ACT 5:30 Leza wabamataata wakabusya Jesu, oyo numwakajaya akumwanzika mumusamu.
