ROM 12:17 Mutabweedezyi chibi kuchibi. Muchite zintu zibotu mumeso abantu boonse.
ROM 12:18 Na kachikonzeka kuti azibe kuli nduwe, kupona chalumuno abantu boonse.
ROM 12:19 Mutabi lwanini nobayandwa, pesi amupe mweenya kubukali bwaLeza. Nkambo kulilembedwe kuti, “Kubweendezya nkukwangu, ndiyobweedezya mbwamba Mwami Leza.”
ROM 12:20 “Pesi na sinkondonyokwe waba anzala, musanine. Na waba anyota, mupe anywe. Ikuti na wachita oobo, ulalundika makala amulilo amutwe wakwe.”
ROM 12:21 Utazundwi abubi, pesi zunda bubi abubotu.
ROM 13:1 Muleke myuuya yoonse ilibombye kubweendelezi bulajulu, nkaambo bwendelezi buliwo bwakatondekwa aLeza.
ROM 13:2 Aboobo oyo upapila bweendelezi ukkazya mulawu waLeza, alimwi abo bawupapila bayotambula lubeta beni.
ROM 13:3 Kaambo beendelezi tabensi kuyoosya kumilimu mibotu, asi kumilimu mibi. Mulayanda kutaba abuyofu kuloyo ulimubweendelezi? Chita bubotu alimwi ulatambula bulumbu bwakwe.
ROM 13:4 Kaambo mubelesi waLeza kulindinywe kububotu. Asi kuti wachita bubi, yoowa; kaambo tabwezi panga chabuyo. Nkaambo mubelesi waLeza, nguukwichizya bukali kulaabo bataluleme.
ROM 13:5 Aboobo weelede kulibombya, kutali kuti kubukali, asi kaambo manjezezya.
ROM 13:6 Kaambo kazezi mulabbadala mutelo kaambo beendelezi mbabelesi baLeza, mbembabo balanga ezi zintu zyoonse.
ROM 13:7 Pa muntu woonse eezyo zimweelede: mutelo kulooyo weelede mutelo, bulumbu kulooyo weelede bulumbu, kuyowa kulooyo uuyowegwa, bulemu kulooyo uulemekeka.
ROM 13:8 Mutabi achikwelete kumuntu, kunze kwakuyandana umwi kumwenzinyina, kaambo ooyo uuyanda ngwayakilene aawe uzuzikizya mulawu.
ROM 13:9 Malayilile, “Utachiti mamambe, utajayi, utabbi, utabi ebbivwe,” alimwi kuti kakuli uumbi mulawu uliswanizizigwe muliwooyu, “Yanda ngoyakilene aawe mbuli nduwe.”
ROM 13:10 Luyando taluchiti bubi kuli ngoyakilene aawe. Aboobo, luyando luzuzikizya mulawu.
ROM 13:11 Kaambo kacheechi, mulizi chiindi, kuti chaba chiindi chakusinsimuka kuzwa mun'onzi. Kaambo lufutuko lwesu lwabaafwifwi kwiinda nkatusanguna kufutuka.
ROM 13:12 Busiku bwiinka, alimwi buzuba bwabaafwifwi. Atubike kumbali milimu yamudima, alimwi atuzwaate zilwanyo zyamumuni.
ROM 13:13 Atweende mbukweelede, mbuli sikati, pe pe mukupobweda kukkolwa kana bukolwi; alimwi tuteendi mubwaamu na muzisusi zibi, alimwi kutali munkondo na mubuzuba.
ROM 13:14 Asi amuzwaate Mwaami Jesu Kkilisito, alimwi mutapi mweenya kunyama, kutazuzikizya zisusi zyayo.
ROM 14:1 Tambula kufumbwa muntu mutete kulusyomo, kamutapi lubeta ataa akukazanya.
ROM 14:2 Umwi muntu ulalusyomo kukulya kufumbwa, awumwi mutete ulya chisyu kupela.
ROM 14:3 Oyo ulya zintu zintu zyoonse atanyansyi oyo utalyi; alimwi alakwe utalyi zintu zyonse atabeteki oyo ulya zintu zyoonse. Nkambo leza wamutambula.
ROM 14:4 Nduweni, iwe nobeteka mulanda wawumwi? Ezi zilikuli simalelo wakwe nkwayimvwi kana kuwida. Asi ulakonzya kwima, nkambo Mwami ulamukonzyezya kuti amwimike.
ROM 14:5 Umwi muntu ulalemya limwi zuba kwinda limwi. Awumwi ulalemya mazuba oonse mukwelene umwi awumwi ngabe akasimpe mumiyeyo yakwe.
ROM 14:6 Oyo ubamba buzuba, ulibambila Mwami; alimwi oyo ulya, ulyida Mwami, nkambo upabulumbu kuliLeza oyo utalyi, ulikachizizya kulya nkambo kaMwami, akulumbayizya Leza.
ROM 14:7 Aboobo takwe wesu uliponena mwini, alimwi takwe ulifwida mwini.
ROM 14:8 Anu kuti nkatupona tuponena Mwami, alimwi kuti twafwa, tufwida Mwami. Ninsya nkatupona kana kufwa, tuli baMwami.
ROM 14:9 Akaambo kazezi Kkilisitu wakafwa alimwi wakapona lubo, kuti abe mwami wabo boonse bafwide alimwi abaabo bapona.
ROM 14:10 Asi nywe, kambonzi nimubeteka munyokwe? Alimwi nywe kambonzi nimunyansya munyokwe? Kaambo swe tuyoyima kuchuuno chalubeta chaLeza.
ROM 14:11 Nkambo kulilembedwe, “Mbuli mbepona,”mbawamba Mwami, “ kulindime mazwi ayofugama, alimwi ndimi zyoonse ziyowamba kuliLeza.”
ROM 14:12 Aboobo, umwi awumwi wesu uyopa makkani alangene anguwe kuliLeza.
ROM 14:13 Aboobo, katutachibetekani, asi tuyeye ezi, kutabi ubika chilebyo kana kakole kumwenzinyina.
ROM 14:14 Ndilizi alimwi me ndasungilizigwa muMwamiJesu, kuti takwe chintu chisalala achilike. Kupela kuloyo uyeya kuti nchibi, kuloyo nchibi.
ROM 14:15 Ikuti nkambo kakulya munakwanu kula mutyola, tochendi muluyando. Utamujayi akulya kwako nkambo Kkilisitu wakamufwida.
ROM 14:16 Kamutazuminini echo nchimuti nchibi chambwe bubi.
ROM 14:17 Nkambo bwami bwaLeza tabwensi bwakulya na kunywa, pesi mbwabululami, lulumuno, alimwi akubotelwa muMuuya uSalala.
ROM 14:18 Aboobo oyo ubelekela Kkilisitu munzila eyi ulatambulika kuliLeza alimwi ulazumininwa abantu.
ROM 14:19 Aboobo, atusungwalile zintu zyalumuno alimwi zintu ziyaka umwi awumwi.
ROM 14:20 Mutajayi mulimu waLeza kumakkani akulya. Zyoonse zisalala, asi nchibi kumuntu ulya kufumbwa chintu chilebya mwenzinyina.
ROM 14:21 Tachili kabotu kuti ulye nyama, kana kunywa wayini, kana kuchita chintu chileba munyokwe.
ROM 14:22 Lusyomo ndomulalo, alubambwe akati kanu aLeza. Ulilongezegwe oyo utapi mulandu kulecho nchazumina.
ROM 14:23 Oyo udoneka ulalibeteka kuti walya, nkambo tachizwi kulusyomo. Alimwi choonse chitali chalusyomo nchibi.
ROM 15:1 Lino swebo tubayumu twelede kunyampula bukompami bwabakompeme, alimwi tatwelede kulibotezya tubeni.
ROM 15:2 Akube kuti umwi wesu abotezye simayake nyina nkambo nchibotu kuchita oobo. mukuti akakonzye kumuyaka.
ROM 15:3 Nkambo mbubonya oobo Kkilisito mbwakatalibotezya lwakwe mwini. kunze kwakuti kube mbuli mbukulembedwe, “zitusi zyabaabo bakamutukide zyakawida alindime.”
ROM 15:4 Kulizyonse zyakalembedwe zyakalembwa kuti zitupe malayilile ikuti kwinda mukusungwazigwa kwamalembe kuti tukabe abulangizi.
ROM 15:5 Lino Leza wabuuya abusungwazi amupe muzeezo umwi awumwi mbuli muli Kkilisito Jesu.
ROM 15:6 Amuchite eezi kuchitila kuti amuzeezo umwi mukonzye kulumbaizya amulomo umwi wa Leza ataata wamwana wesu Jesu Kkilisito.
ROM 15:7 Aboobo amutambule umwi awumwi, mbuli Kkilisito mbwakamutambula, mukuti Leza apegwe bulemu.
ROM 15:8 Nkambo ndaamba kuti Kkilisito wakandichitya muzike wabupalule muchibaka chalusinizyo lwa Leza, mukuti tuzuminane zisyomezyo zyakapegwa basikale,
ROM 15:9 akuti bamasi bakalumba izya Leza muluzyalo lwakwe. Mbuli mbukulembedwe, “aboobo ndiyokutembawula akati kabamasi akwiimba ntembawuzyo kuzina lyako.”
ROM 15:10 Alubo lilaamba kuti, “mubotelwa, nywebo nobamaasi, antomwe abantu bakwe.”
ROM 15:11 Alimwi, alumbayizigwe Leza, moonse nobamaasi; akube kuti bantu boonse bamulumbayizye.”
ROM 15:12 Alubo Isaya waamba kuti, “muyanda waJese uyosika, ooyo unyampuka akweende bamaasi. mulinguwe bamaasi bayooba abulangizi.
ROM 15:13 Lino Leza wabulangizi, amuzuzye lukondo alumuno mukusyoma, ikuti munguzu zya Muuya Uusalala mukakkalile mubulangizi.
ROM 15:14 Mebo ndemwini ndazuzikizigwa atala andinywe, nubakwesu. Ndazundikizigwa akuti nywebo nubeni muzwide bubotu, akuzuzikizigwa aluzibo loonse. Ndazundikizigwa alubo, kuti mulakonzya kulayilila amwi awumwi.
ROM 15:15 Pesi ndamulembela chakumusungwazya kapati atala azimwi zintu mukuti ndikamuyeezye lubo, nkambo kaluzyalo ndundipedwea Leza.
ROM 15:16 Eechi chipo chakali chakuti ndibe mulanda wa Kkilisito Jesu uyootumwa kulibamaasi, kuti ndikabe mbuuli mupayizi wamakani mabotu a Leza, kuti chipego chabamaasi chitambulikike, akusalazigwa a Muuya Uusalala.
ROM 15:17 Muli Kkilisito Jesu ndilaacha kulikankayizya amuli mulimu wangu wa Leza.
ROM 15:18 Pesi nsikonzyi kulitakata kwamba atala achimwi chintu kunze kwazezyo Kkilisito nzyakazuzikizya mulindime mukuswilizya mukuswilizya kwabamaasi. Ezi zintu ziitwa ajwi anchito,
ROM 15:19 Kwinda munguzu zyazitondezyo azigambyo, alimwi anguzu zya Muuya. Ezi zyakaba kuzwa ku Jelusalemu, akuzyunguluka kusika ku Ililikkamu, kuti ndubweze bukwene mulimo wa Kkilisito.
ROM 15:20 Munzila eyi: chiyandisyo changu chalichakuti ndikanane makani mabotu, pesi kuteensi ooko Kkilisitu nkwakazibinkene azina, mukuti nditakayaki atala antalisyo yawumwi muntu.
ROM 15:21 Zili mbuli mbuzilembedwe: kulibaabo batakalina kumvwa ataala azyanguwe bayomubona, abaabo batana kumvwa bayomvwisisisya.
ROM 15:22 Abobo ndakakachizigwa kwazyindi zyiingi lokokuti ndisike kulindinywe.
ROM 15:23 Pesi lino, tandichikwe busena pe mumasena aaya, alimwi ndali achiyandisyo kwamwaaka miinji kuboola kulindinywe
ROM 15:24 Ndilangila kuzomubona ndazoyinda oko kandiya ku Sipeyini, alimwi akugwasigwa andinywe mulweendo lwangu lwakuza ooko, alubo ndakondelwa kubandinywe kwachiindi chinini.
ROM 15:25 Pesi lino ndilikuya ku Jelusalemu, kandikutawukila bantu ba Leza basalala.
ROM 15:26 Nkambo kwakalikubotezya kuti Makkedoniya a Akkaya kuchita tumwi tusanngisangi twabachete akati kabamwi bantu ba Leza basalala bakkala mu Jelusalemu.
ROM 15:27 Iyi, iwakali lukondo lwabo, alubo bali achikwelete eechi kulimbabo. Nkambo na bamaasi bapa zipo zyabo zyamumuuya, nchikwelete kuba Juda kuti babalongezye azintu zijatika.
ROM 15:28 Aboobo, kuti ndamaninsya mulimu ooyu akupedekezya muchelo ooyu kulimbabo, ndizoza ku Sipeyini kandinda kulindinywe kumuswaya.
ROM 15:29 Ndilizi kuti ndiyoza kulindinywe ndiyoza mukuzulila kwazilongezyo zyoonse zya Kkilisito.
ROM 15:30 Lino ndamusungwazya nobakulana, mu Mwami wesu Jesu Kkilisito, amuluyando lwa Muuya, kuti mukakatile antomwe andime munkombyo zyanukuli Leza kundikombela.
ROM 15:31 Mukombe kuti ndikavunwe kuzwa kulibaabo bataswilizyi mu Judiya, akuti kubelekela Jelusalemu kwangu kukatambulike kubantu basalala ba Leza.
ROM 15:32 Mukombe kuti ndboole kulindinywe mulukondo kwinda mukuyanda kwa Leza, alubo ikuti ime, antoomwe andinywe, tukajane kulyokezya.
ROM 15:33 Akube kuti Leza walumuno abe anywebo. Ameni.
ROM 16:1 Ndamutumina Foyebbe muchizi wesu, mubeleki wa mbungano lili ku Sinkile,
ROM 16:2 kuti mumutambule muMwami. Uzicheezi munzila yelede bantu baLeza basalala, alubo mumupe loonse lugwasyo ndwayanda kuzwa kulindinywe nkmbo wakali mugwasyi mupati kubiingi akulindiswe awalo.
ROM 16:3 Juuzya Pulisila a Akwiyila, mubelesima muli Kilisito Jesu
ROM 16:4 nkambo kabuumi bwangu bakapedekezya buumi bwabo. Ndipa kulumba kulibaabo, kutali andikke; pesi alubo ambungano zyoonse zyabamaasi.
ROM 16:5 Juuzya imbungano ilimun'anda yabo. Juuzya Epanetasi uyandwa wangu ulingomuchelo mutanzi waEzyiya kuli Kkilisito.
ROM 16:6 Juuzya Maliya, wakakubelekela changuzu.
ROM 16:7 Juuzya Andilonikkasi a Juniya, wakuluzubo lwangu, alimwi musungwama. Bakalizibikene loko kubatumwa, alubo bakali muliKkilisito imw nkesina.
ROM 16:8 Juuzya Ampuliyatasi, muyandwa wangu muMwami.
ROM 16:9 Juuzya Ubbanasi, babelekima muli Kkilisito, a Sitakkisi, muyandwi wangu.
ROM 16:10 Juuzya Afelesi, utambwidwe muna Kkilisito. Ujuuzye boonse ben'anda ya Alisitobbulasi.
ROM 16:11 Ujuuzye Helodiyeni, wakuluzubo lwangu. Ujuuzye boonse ben'anda ya Nakkisasi bali muMwami.
ROM 16:12 Ujuuzye Tayifana a Tayifosa, basimilo basungu muMwami. Ujuuzye Pesisa uyandwa, wakachita mulimo mupati muMwami.
ROM 16:13 Ujuuzye Lufasi, usalidwe muMwami, abanyina abaama.
ROM 16:14 Ujuuzye Asiyikkitasi, Filegoni, Hemesi, Patilobbasi, Hemasi, abanyina mbalabo.
ROM 16:15 Ujuuzye Filologasi aJuliya, Nelewusa muchizi wakwe, Oliyimpasi, a boonse baLeza basalala balaambabo.
ROM 16:16 Mujuuzye umwi waumwi alumyonto lusalala. Zyoonse mbungano zya Kkilisito zilamujuuzya.
ROM 16:17 Lino ndamusungwazya, nibanama, kuti muyeye atala ababo balikwanzyana akaleba. Balikwindilila njiisyo njimwakayiisya. Amubafutatile.
ROM 16:18 Nkambo bantu balimbulaaba tababelekili Mwana Kkilisito wesu, pesi matumbu aabo. Azyaambo zibungusene akuwupawupa beenena myooyo yabatakwe mulandu.
ROM 16:19 Nkambo chitondezyo chakuteelela kwako kulasikila boonse. Ndilabotelwa, alubo anduwe, pesi ndiyanda kuti ube muchenjezi kulizeezyo zibotu, akutabaamulandu kulizeezyo zibi.
ROM 16:20 Leza waluumuno wapwaya Satani nsi amawulu ako. Luzyalo lwaMwami Jesu Kkilisito alubaayebo.
ROM 16:21 Timoti, ngutubelekaawe, ulakujuzya, aLusiyasi, Jasoni, aSosipata, sinzuboma.
ROM 16:22 Ime, Tetiyasi, iwakalemba lugwalo olu ansi, ndakujuuzya muMwami.
ROM 16:23 Galiyasi, mubutawukili wangu ambungano yoonse, balamujuuzya. Elasitasi, sinkomwe wadolopo, ulajuuzya, aKwatasi mwananyina.
ROM 16:24 Luzyalo lwaMwami wesu Jesu Kkilisito abe andinywe moonse. Ameni.
ROM 16:25 Lino kuliyoyo ukonzya kukuchita usime mbuli makani angu mabotu akompolola kwaJesu Kkilisito, mbuli chiyubunizyo chensiiswa zyakasisikene kwachiindi chilamfu,
ROM 16:26 pesi lino lyakayubununwa lyachitwa kuti lizibikane kwiinda akulemba kwaba sinsimi kunyika zyoonse, akulayilila kwaLeza bwinibwini, mukweeta kuteelela kwalusyomo.
ROM 16:27 Kuliyooyo uchenjede Leza kwindilila aJesu Kkilisito, abulemu kutamani. Ameni.
1CO 1:1 Pawulo, wakayiitwa aKkilisito Jesu kuti abe Mutumwa kwiinda mukuyanda kwaLeza, aSositinesi mukwesu,
1CO 1:2 kumbungano yaLeza iliku Kkolinto, abo bakasalazigwa muliKkilisitu Jesu akwambwa kuti mbantu basalala, antoomwe aboonse bali mumasena oonse abayiita zina lya Mwami Jesu Kkilisito, ulingonguwe Mwami waboandiswe.
1CO 1:3 Ngamube aluzyalo a lumunoluzwa kuli Leza Taata aMwami Jesu Kkilisito.
1CO 1:4 Ndilumba Leza nkambo kandinywe nkaambo kaluzyalo lwaLeza olo Kkilisito Jesu ndwakamupa.
1CO 1:5 Wakamuchita bavubi munzila zyoonse, mukwambula koonse aluzibo loonse,
1CO 1:6 alimwi mbuli bukamboni atala aKkilisito mbubwa boneka kuti mbwamasimpe akati kanu.
1CO 1:7 Aboobo tamubuli chipo chaMuuya mbumulindide chakulangila kuyubununwa kwaMwami wesu Jesu Kkilisito.
1CO 1:8 Uyoomuchita kuti mukasyome chakumaninina kusikila kumamanino, ikuti mutakabi amulandu mubuzuba bwaMwami wesu Jesu Kkilisito.
1CO 1:9 Leza ulisyomekede, wakamwita kuti mukabilane aMwana, Jesu Kkilisito Mwami wesu.
1CO 1:10 Lino ndamukumbila, nibakwesu, kwiinda muzina lyaMwami wesu Jesu Kkilisito, kuti moonse mulazuminana, akuti takuyoobi kupambukana antoomwe kamulamuzeezo umwi amakanze amwi.
1CO 1:11 Mbundakambilwa atala andinywe nobakwesu, kuzwa kubantu baKkuluzi ikuti kulikujatana akati kanu.
1CO 1:12 Ndilikwamba eechi: umwi awumwi waamba kuti, “Ime ndili wa Pawulo,” na kuti, “Ime ndili wa Apolosi,” na kuti “Ime ndili wa Sifasi,” na kuti “Ime ndili wa Kkilisito.”
1CO 1:13 Ani sa Kkilisito ulipambukene na? Ani Pawulo wakagankamininwa ndinywe na? Ani mwaka bbabbatisigwa muzina lyaPawulo na?
1CO 1:14 Ndilumba Leza kuti takwe ngundakabbabbatizya pe, kunze kwa Kilisipasi aGayosi.
1CO 1:15 Eechi chakachitwa kuti kutabi waamba kuti mwakabbabbatizigwa muzina lyangu.
1CO 1:16 ( Alimwi ndakabbabbatizya bang'anda yaSitefano. Kwiinda awo, tandikonzyi kuyeeya kuti kulibambi na mbindakabbabbatizya.)
1CO 1:17 Nkaambo Kkilisito takandituma kuti ndika bbabbatizye pesi ikuti ndikakambawuke makani mabotu kutaamba amajwi abuchenjezu, mukuti chingano chaKkilisito chitakawubulwi nguzu zyacho.
1CO 1:18 Nkaambo makani achingano chaKkilisito mbufubafuba kulabo balimukunyonyoka. Pesi akati kabaabo bafutulwa, ninguzu zyaLeza.
1CO 1:19 Nkaambo kulilembedwe kuti,”Ndiyomwayisya busongo bwabasongo. Ndiyokonga kumvwisisya kwabachenjede.”
1CO 1:20 Ulikuli muntu musongo? Ulikuli mulembi? Ulikuli sikukazya wanyika eeno? Sa Leza takasandula busongo bwanyika kubufubafuba?
1CO 1:21 Nkaambo nyika mubusongo bwayo teyakamuziba Leza, Leza wakabotelwa kuti afutule abo basyoma kwiinda mubufubafuba bwakukambawuka.
1CO 1:22 Nkaambo maJuda bakumbila zitondezyo zigambya baGiliki bayandula busongo.
1CO 1:23 Pesi tukambawuka Kkilisto wakagankaminwa, Nchilebyo kumaJuda alimwi mbufubafuba kulibaMasi.
1CO 1:24 Pesi kulaabo Leza mbakayita, aantomwe baJuda abaGiliki, tukambawuka Kkilisito mbuli nguzu abusongo bwaLeza.
1CO 1:25 Nkaambo bufubafuba bwaLeza bulayinda busongo bwabantu, alimwi kukompama kwaLeza kulanguzu kwiinda bantu.
1CO 1:26 Amulange kwiitwa kwanu, nobakwesu teeboonse banu bakali basongo mbuli kunyama. Teeboonse banu bakali basinguzu. Teeboonse banu bakalizyedwe kabali bana babaami.
1CO 1:27 Pesi Leza wakasala zintu zifubafuba zyanyika kuti awusye nsoni basongo. Leza, wakasala echo chikompeme munyika kuti akawusye nsoni echo chilanguzu.
1CO 1:28 Leza wakasala echo chilansi alimwi chawuubulwa munyika. Alimwi wakasala zintu zitegwa takwe mbuzibede pe, kuti akazijosye ansi ezyo, zilangilwa kuti zintu loko.
1CO 1:29 Wakazichita ezi kuti kutakabi nyama ilikankayizya kunembo lyakwe.
1CO 1:30 Nkaambo kacheechi Leza nchakachita, lino mwaba muliKkilisito Jesu oyo utubeda busongo buzwa kuli Leza. Wakaba bululami bwesu, busalali, alununuko lwesu.
1CO 1:31 Kuti kukabe mbuli mbukulembedwe kuti, “ Na kuli ulikankayizya, alikankayizizye muMwami Leza.”
1CO 2:1 Nindakaza kulindinywe, nobakwesu, tendakaza abunnone bwamulaka kana busongo awoo nindakompolola simpe lisisidwe ataala aLeza.
1CO 2:2 Nkambo ndakasala kutaziba chintu awo nindakali andinywe kunze kwa Jesu Kkilisito, akugankaminwa kwakwe.
1CO 2:3 Alimwi ndakali andinywe mukubula nguzu amukuyowa, amukukankama.
1CO 2:4 Alimwi mulayizyo wangu akukambawuka kwangu tekwakali amajwi akukombelezya chabusongo. Pesi, akali achitondezyo chamuuya anguzu,
1CO 2:5 kuchitila kuti lusyomo lwenu talubi mubusongo bwabantu, pesi munguzu zyaLeza.
1CO 2:6 Lino twambula busongo mukati kabantu bazyikitide, pesi butali busongo bwanyika eeyi, kana bwendelezi bwalino, aboo bayobwinda.
1CO 2:7 Anukuti twambula abusongo bwaLeza musimpe lisisidwe, busongo busisidwe oobo Leza mbwakali wabikka kunembo lyamyaka yabulemu besu.
1CO 2:8 Takwe naba omwe wabendelezi balino wakachimvwisisisya, nkambo anoli bakachimvwisissya, nikuli tebakamukankamina pe Mwami wabulemu.
1CO 2:9 Pesi mbuli mbukulembedwe, “Takwe lisyo lyabona, takwe kutwi kwamvwa, takwe moyo wamuntu waziyandula eezyo Leza nzyabambila aboo bamuyandula.”
1CO 2:10 Pesi Leza wayibununa zintu eezi kulindiswe kwiindila muMuuya. Nkambo Muuya ulayandula zintu zyoonse, nikuba zintu zyaLeza zinikide.
1CO 2:11 Nkambo ngwani uzi mizeezo yamuntu ado woMuuya wamuntu nuuli anguwe? Nkokuli alimwi, takwe muntu uzi zintu zyaLeza zinikide ado wo Muuya waLeza.
1CO 2:12 Pesi tetwakatambula Muuya wanyika pesi Muuya ooyo uzwa kuli Leza.
1CO 2:13 Twambule atala azintu eezi mumajwi akatayisigwa abusongo bwamuntu pesi aMuuya, kawupandulula zintu zyaMuuya kubantu baMuuya.
1CO 2:14 Muntu utakwe Muuya tazitambuli pe zintu zyaku Muuya waLeza, nkambo nzyabufubafuba kuli nguwe. Takonzyi pe kuzimvwisisisya nkambo ziselezegwa aMuuya.
1CO 2:15 Ooyo ulimuMuuya ngukonzya kweela zintu zyoonse, psi takonzeki kweelwa azimwi.
1CO 2:16 “Nkambo ngwani ulikonzya kuziba kuyeya kwaMwami chakuti unga ulamulayilila? Pesi ulijisi muzeezo waKkilisito.
1CO 3:1 Alimwi andime, bakwesu, tendalikunowambula kulindinywe mbuli bantu basimuuya, pesi biyo mbuli kubantu banyama, mbuli kubana baniini muliKkilisito.
1CO 3:2 Ndakamusanina amakupa, pe pe chakulya chiyumu, nkambo temwalina libambila; nikuba lino tamuna kulibambila.
1CO 3:3 Nkaambo inywebo muchili munyama. Kaambo aali buzuba akukazyanya akati kanu, tamulikupona mbuli basinyama, tamulikwenda mbuli kupona kwamubuntu na?
1CO 3:4 Nkaambo umwi waamba kuti, “Nditobela Pawulo,” alubo umwi waamba kuti, “Nditobela Apolosi,” tamuli zilengwa zyabuntu biyo na?
1CO 3:5 Ngwani mpo Apolosi? Ngwani Pawulo? Babelesi kwiinda mumulawu ngwakazumina, mbuli Mwaami mbakapa mulimu kuli umwi.”
1CO 3:6 Ndakabyala, alubo Apolosi wakatilila, pesi Leza nguupa kukomezya.
1CO 3:7 Mpo lino, te ooyo uubyala na utilila uli mbabede. Pesi nguLeza uupa kukomena.
1CO 3:8 Lino ooyo uubyala alubo uutilila mbamwi, alubo umwi uyootambula chaabilo chakwe mbuli kumulimu wakwe.
1CO 3:9 Nkaambo tuli basimulimunyina aLeza. Mulimuunda waLeza, mayake aLeza.
1CO 3:10 Mbuli kuluzyalo lwaLeza lwakapegwa ndime mbuli muyaki ukonzesya, ndakabika intalisyo alubo umwi ulayaka alinjiyo. Pesi muleke umwi uyeyesya Mbayaka alinjiyo.
1CO 3:11 Nkaambo takukwe uunga ulabamba ntalisyo imbi itali eeyo yakabikwa, kiili, Jesu Kkilisito.
1CO 3:12 Lino na umwi ulayaka aatala antalisyo a ngolide, nsiliva, mabwe ayandika, zisamu, makuba, matete,
1CO 3:13 mulimu wakwe ulakuyubununwa, nkaambo buzuba buyobuyubununa. Nkaambo uyooyubununwa mumulilo. Mulilo ulabweezya bube bwawumwi anzyakachita.
1CO 3:14 Na mulimu wawumwi ukayimikile, ulakutambula chabilo;
1CO 3:15 pesi na mulimu wawumwi wapya, ulakujana kuswekelwa, pesi we lwakwe uyofutulwa, mbuli ufutuka kwiinda mumulilo.
1CO 3:16 Tamuzi na kuti muli tempele yaLeza akuti muuya waLeza ukkala muli ndinywe?
1CO 3:17 Na umwi ulajaya tempele yaLeza, Leza ulamujaya muntu ooyo. Nkaambo tempele yaLeza ilasalala, alubo alwenu.
1CO 3:18 Kutabi umwi uulyena. Na umwi wenu akati kenu uyeya kuti musongo muchiindi echino, mumuleke abe “mufubafuba” kuti abe musongo.
1CO 3:19 Kaambo busongo bwenyika iino mbufubafuba aLeza. Kaambo kulilembedwe, “Ulajata basongo mubuchenjezu bwabo.”
1CO 3:20 Alubo, “Mwaami ulizi kuti kuyeya kwabasongo nkwabuyo.”
1CO 3:21 Akaambo kacheechi kutabi umwi ulikankayizya mubantu. Zyoonse zintu nzizyenu,
1CO 3:22 do Pawulo, na Apolosi, na Kefasi, na nyika, na buumi, na lufu, na zintu ziliko, na zintu zichiza. Zyoonse zintu nzizyenu,
1CO 3:23 alubo muli baKkilisito, alimwi Kkilisito ngu waLeza.
1CO 4:1 Mbuboobu muntu mbwayelede kutubona, mbuli balanda ba Kkilisito ababanzi bakasimpe ka Leza kasisikene.
1CO 4:2 Lino chiyandika kubabanzi nchakujanika mukusyomeka.
1CO 4:3 Pesi kulindime nchintu chinini kuti ndibetekwe andinywe nikuba nkutaya abantu. Nkambo nsikwe nindili beteka ndemwini.
1CO 4:4 Taakwe luzibo atala alubeteko lwachitwa atala andime, pesi echo tachaambi kuti ndategwa tandikwe kaambo. Oyo undibeteka ngu Mwami.
1CO 4:5 Nkenkaako utambilizyi lubeta atala achimwi chintu kachitanasika chiindi, katanakubola Mwami. Uyoyeta kumumuuni zintu zisisikene zyamumudima akuyubununa makanze amoyo. Mpawo umwi awumwi uyotambula kulumbayizigwa kuzwa kuli Leza.
1CO 4:6 Lino, nopbakwesu, ndakabelesya malayilile aya kulindime ndemwini a Apolosi nkambo kandinwe, kuchitila kuti kuzwa kulindiswe inga mulayiiya kuti, “Utaakwindilili kuli zilembedwe.” Eechi chili boobu kuchitila kuti kutabi umwi ulisumpula atala aluumwi.
1CO 4:7 Ino ngwani uubona nikuba musiyano akati kanduwe awumwi? Ninzi nchalacho eecho nchotatambwide? Ikuti wakachitambula, nkamboonzi nolikankayizya mbotatedi tewakachitambula?
1CO 4:8 Ikaale mwakali azyo zyoonse nzimwali kunoyanda. Ikale mwababavubi! Mwakatanguna kwendelezya alubo akuba ampela kuzwa kulindiswe! Inchoonzyo, ndalikuyandisya kuti mwendelezye andinywe.
1CO 4:9 Nkambo ndiyeeya kuti Leza wakatubika ba Apositola akutondezya mbuli chakumaninizya mumunchali, mukubambulula, ambuli balumi batongelwa lufu. Twaba chitondezyo kunyika - akuba anelo, akubantususu.
1CO 4:10 Tuli bafubafuba nkambo ka Kkilisito, pesi mulibasongo muli Kkilisito. Twateta, pesi mulibayumu. Mwajatwa mubulemu, pesi twajatwa mukubawulwa.
1CO 4:11 Manedo kuchiindi echi tulenzala enyota, twazwata chabuchete, twawumwa, alimwi tatuchikwe myunzi.
1CO 4:12 Tubeleka chenuzu nkatubelesya maboko eesu. Nitwatukilwa twalongezegwa. Nitupenzewa, tulakakatila.
1CO 4:13 Nitusampawulwa, tulambuula chaluzyalo. Twachita biyo mbuli masifwinini biyo aanyika atombe lyazintu zyonse.
1CO 4:14 Tandili kulemba zintu ezi kukumufwisya bweeme pe, pesi kukumu chenjezya mbuli bana bangu bayandisi.
1CO 4:15 Aboobo nikuba kuti waba ezyuulu zilikkumi zyabasimalelo muli Kkilisito, tokwe bamawuso biingi pe. Nkambo ndakaba wuso wanu muli Kkilisito Jesu kwinda mumakani mabotu.
1CO 4:16 Aboobo ndamusunwazya kuti mube basikutobelezya ndime.
1CO 4:17 Nchenchicho nchindaka mutumina Timoti, muyandwi wangu amwana wanu usyomeka mu Mwami. Uyomuyeezya inzila zyangu muli Kkilisito, mbubonya mbuli mbundimuyiisya konse konse amumbungano zyonse.
1CO 4:18 Lino bamwi benu bakaba basikulisumpula, kabachitanga tandichibooli kuli ndinywe.
1CO 4:19 Pesi ndizoboola chakufwambana kulindinywe, naa kuti Mwami wayanda. Aboobo tandikwe kuyoziba majwi abuyo pe aboobo balisumpula, pesi ndiyobona nguzu zyabo.
1CO 4:20 Nkambo ibwami bwa Leza tabuli bwakwamba biyo pesi munguzu.
1CO 4:21 Niinzi nchimuyanda? Sena ndize kulindinywe ankoli naa aluyando mumuuya muteteete?
1CO 5:1 Twakamvwa mpuwo kuti mamambe akati kanu, musyobo wamalalane utazumizigwi akati kabatali bazumini.
1CO 5:2 Mwalumi ulala amwanakazi wawisi. Mwafundikila! Sena tamuyelede kulila, kuchitila kuti umwi wachita chiito eecho agwisigwe kuzwa akati kanu.
1CO 5:3 Nikuba nsiko mumubili, mpundili mumuya. Ndapa kale lubeteko ali wumwi wachita eechi, mbuli kubanga ndaliwo.
1CO 5:4 Kuti kamungene muzina lyaMwami wesu Jesu mpawo ndili andinywe mumuya aanguzu zyaMwami wesu Jesu mpuzili.
1CO 5:5 Mupe mwalumi oyu kuli dyabbulosi nkambo kakunyonyonwa kwanyama, kuchitila kuti muuya wakwe ufutulw mubuzuba bwaMwami.
1CO 5:6 Kulisumpula kwako tensi kubotu. Tuzi na kuti kaswezyo kache kalafufumuna chibunge?
1CO 5:7 Lisalazye lwako kuzwa kubuswezyo bukulukulu kuchitila kuti kube chiwela chipya, chitakwe buswezyo, mbuli mbumubede choonzyo. Kuli Kkilisito, kabelele kesu kakwindilila, kaka payigwa.
1CO 5:8 Lino atubotelwe pobwe, litakwe buswezyo bukulukulu, buswezyo bwazichito zibi aa buntu bubi. Pesi, atubotelwe aachibunge chitakwe buswezyo nchoozyo aa bwini.
1CO 5:9 Ndakamulembela mulugwalo lwangu mutavwelani abantu abasimamambe.
1CO 5:10 Kakutakwe nzila imbi nsyambi basibwamu bayino nyika, olo muunyu, silweeno, kana kuti basimamambe, kuzwa kukkala kule ambabo muyelede kuzwa kunyika.
1CO 5:11 Lino ndamulembela kuti mutalivwelanganisyi amuntu uyitwa kuti mukwesu pesi upona mumalalane, kana kuti muunyu na kuti sibwamu, na kuti simakani alunyansyano, na kuti mukolwi, na kuti silweeno. Mutalyi chiiyo amuntu ulibobu.
1CO 5:12 Ndinjilali kukubeteka abo bali aanze achikombelo?
1CO 5:13 Pesi, tuyelede kubeleka aabo bali aanze. “Gwasya muntu mubi kuzwa akati kanu.”
1CO 6:1 Kuti umwi ulakambo atala awumwi, ulayinka kumulawu na wabataluleme kwiinda kuti aye kubantu baLeza basalala?
1CO 6:2 Tamuzi na kuti bantu baLeza basalala bayoobeteeka nyika? Kuti na katuyoobeteka nyika, sa tamukonzyi kukkazikwa twaambo tunini?
1CO 6:3 Tamuzi na kuti tuyoobeteka baangelo? kwiinda biyeni mpo, sa ngatulabeteka makani abuumi obu?
1CO 6:4 Kuti na kamuyoochita lubeta lweendelene abuumi bwamazuba oonse, nkaambonzi nimutola twaambo kulibabo mbuli ootu kuli baabo balangilwa ansi mumbungano?
1CO 6:5 Ndamwambila eechi kuti ndimuusye nsoni. Takwe na umwi akati kanu musongo unga ulakonzya kukkazikizya twaambo kulibakwesu?
1CO 6:6 Pesi umwi mukwesu uya kumulawu atala awumwi mukwesu, alimwi kazi chitilwa kunembo lyabatasyomi pe!
1CO 6:7 Nkambo kakuti muyisi kubetekana chanu chanu muzundidwe kale. Nkambo nimutake mwalipeda kuba babi? Nkambo nywebo nubeni nimutakwe mwalipeda kubbidwa?
1CO 6:8 alimwi muchita eezi kuli bamwi banu!
1CO 6:9 Tamuzi na kuti bataluleme tabakoyookona Bwami bwaLeza? Muteenwi. Basimalalano, basikukomba mizimu, basibwamu, balumi baanu abo bakwatana chabo chabo,
1CO 6:10 babba, batangala, bakolwa, basikutamikizya, abasikulyamaanu takwe akati kabo uyookona bwami bwaLeza.
1CO 6:11 Mbubaalibede bamwi banu. Pesi mwakasanzigwa, akusalazigwa, akululamikwa muzina lyaMwami Jesu Kkilisito aMuuya waLeza.
1CO 6:12 “Zyoonse zilimumulawo kulindime,” Pesi teezyoonse zipa mpindu. “Zyoonse zilimumulawu kulindime” Pesi tandikwe kwakwendeleezegwa nikuba achimwi chazyo.
1CO 6:13 “Chakulya nchabula, alimwi bula mbwachakulya” Pesi Leza uyoozimwayisya zyoonse. Mubili tweesi wabwaamu, pesi mubili ngwaMwami Leza, alubo Mwami nguyoopa nziyanda mubili.
1CO 6:14 Leza antoomwe wakabusya Mwami alimwi uyootubusya aswebo munguzu zyakwe. Tamuzi na kuti mibili yanu nzizo zyaKkilisito?
1CO 6:15 Sa tulelede na kuti ndigwisye zizo zyaKkilisito akuziswanizya kubwamu? Kutabi mbuboobo!
1CO 6:16 Tamuzi na kuti oyo uswanizigwa kumamambe ngawaba mubili umwi anguwe? Mbuli malembe mbwaamba kuti, “Babili bayoobanyama imwi.”
1CO 6:17 Pesi oyo uswanizigwa kuMwami ulaba muuya umwi anguwe.
1CO 6:18 Amuchije kumalalano! Kufumbwa chibi muntu nchachita chili kunze amubili, pesi malalano abisya mubili wako numwini.
1CO 6:19 Tamuzi na kuti mibili yanu nin'anda yaMuuya Usalala, upona mulindinywe, ngumulaawo muliLeza? Tamuzi na kuti tamulibenu pe? Nkambo mwakawulwa amuulo.
1CO 6:20 Nkikaako ngamulumbayizye Leza amibili yanu amumuuya wanu nkambo nzizyakwe.
1CO 7:1 Lino kumakani ngimwakandilembela, “Nchibotu kuti mwaalumi atagumi mwanakazi.”
1CO 7:2 Pele akaambo kamasunko anchito zyiingi zyamamambe, umwi awumwi mwaalumi weelede kuba a mwnwkazi wakwe, alkwe mwanakazi abe a mwaalumi wakwe.
1CO 7:3 Mwaalumi weelede kuzuzikizya mulimu wakwe akuba alulalano a mwanakazi wakwe, mbubonya oobo alakwe mwanakazi kumulimu wakwe.
1CO 7:4 Teensi mwanakazi uli abwaami kumubili wakwe, pele mulumi. Alimwi mwaalumi tajisi bwaami aatala amubili wakwe, pele mwanakazi nguujisi.
1CO 7:5 Mutakatazyanyi umwi awumwi, pele amuzuminane kuchita oobo zimwi zyiindi. Muchite oobo kuti mubike myoyo kukukomba. Eelyo mubole muswanane lubo, kuti Satani atamusunki nkaambo kakukachilwa kwanu kulijata.
1CO 7:6 Pele ndaamba makani aya miyeyo yangu pe pe mbuli mulayizyo.
1CO 7:7 Ndili kuyeya kuti woonse abe mbuli ndime. Pele umwi awumwi uli achipo chakwe kuzwa kuli Leza. Umwi uli awoyu musyobo wachipo, awumwi uulya musyobo.
1CO 7:8 Kuli batakwetwe akuli bamukabafu ndamba kuti nchintu chibotu kuti bukkale kabatakwetwe mbuli ndime.
1CO 7:9 Pele kuti kabatakonzyi kulijata, baleelede kukwata na kukwatwa. Nkaambo nchintu chibotu kuti bakwate na kukwatwa kwiinda kufwa amunyamunya.
1CO 7:10 Lino kuli bakwete, ndamupa mulawu ooyu, - teensi ndime, pele nguMwaami: “Mwanakazi teeled kulekana amulumi wakwe.”
1CO 7:11 Pele waanzana amulumi wakwe, uleelede kukkala katakwetwe kana kubwedelana a mulumi wakwe.
1CO 7:12 Pele kuli boonse ndati - Ime, pe pe Mwaami - kuti mukwesu uli a mwanakazi utali muzumini, kuti kakkutisikene kukkala anguwe, teelede kumuleka pe.
1CO 7:13 Kuti mwanakazi uli a mwaalumi utali utazumini, kuti kakkutisikene kukkala anguwe, teelede kumuleka pe.
1CO 7:14 Nkaambo mwaalumi utazumini ulasalazigwa nkambo ka mwanakazi wakwe, alakwe mwanakazi utazumini ulasalazigwa nkambo kamunyina. Abalo bana benu nibatasalali, pele lino balasalala.
1CO 7:15 Pele kuti utazumini wayanda kweenda, muleke ayinke. Muchiimo chiliboobo, mukwesu na muchizi taangidwe pe kuchikonke chabo. Leza watwiita kuti tukkale muluumuno.
1CO 7:16 Mbobuti mbokonzya kuziba, yomwanakazi, amwi uyoofutula mwaalumi wako? Na mbobuti mbokonzya kuziba, yomwaalumi, amwi uyoofutula mwanakazi wako?
1CO 7:17 Nekubaboobo, mbuli kuti Mwaami wakapa umwi awumwi chibela chakwe, umwi awumwi mbuli Leza mbakamwiita. Ooyu ngumulayizyo wangu kumbungano zyoonse.
1CO 7:18 Sa kufumbwa muntu wakali mupalulwe nakitwa kukuzumina? Teeled kusoleka kuboneka katapalwidwe. Sa kufumbwa muntu wakatapalwidwe nakitwa kukusyoma? Ooyo atapalulwi.
1CO 7:19 Teensi kuti kupalulwa na kutapalulwa nkukujisi makani. Chijisi makani nkuswilila milawu yaLeza.
1CO 7:20 Umwi awumwi akkale mbuli mbayitwa aLeza kukuzumina.
1CO 7:21 Wakali muzike na Leza naakakwiita? Utalikatazyi anzizyo. Pele kuti kokonzya kwaangunuka kulaba mbubo.
1CO 7:22 Ooyo wakiitwa aMwaami kalimuzike ngumwaangunuke waMwaami. Mbubonya oobo, alakwe wakali mwaangunuke nakitwa kukuzumina ngomuzike waKkilisito.
1CO 7:23 Mwawulwa amuulo, mutachibi bazike babantu.
1CO 7:24 Bakwesu, kufumbwa chiimo nchuwakabede nwakayitwa, umwi awumwi akkale aLeza.
1CO 7:25 Lino kumakani abanakalindu, nsikwe mulawu uuzwa kuMwaami. Pele ndamupa miyeeyo yangu mbuliumwi, muluse lwaMwaami, akuba uusyomeka.
1CO 7:26 Nkaambo kaako, ndayeya kuti nkaambo kamapenzi aaboola, nchintu chibotu kumwaalumi kuti akkale mbwabede.
1CO 7:27 Sa ulangidwe kumwanakazi. Utazyanduuli kulekana. Kuti kwaangunukide kumwanakazi, utayanduuli mwanakazi.
1CO 7:28 Pele kuti wakwata, tobisizye pe. Pele aabo bachita balaja mapenzi miingi anyama, pesi ndayanda kumuvuna kuli zeezi.
1CO 7:29 Lino ncheechi nchingamba, bakwesu: Chiindi nchifwifwi. Kuzwa sunu kuya kunembo, aabo bakwete banakazi babe mbuli batakwete.
1CO 7:30 Abaabo balili babe mbuli batalili, abaabo basekelela babe mbuli batasekeleli, abaabo bawula babe mbuli batavubide chintu.
1CO 7:31 Abaabo babelesya zintu zyaansi batapangiki myoyo yabo kukubelesya nzizyo. Nkaambo nyika chiimo nchilimulinchicho iya kumamanino.
1CO 7:32 Ndayanda kuti mwaangunuke mumakatazyo. Mwaalumi utakwete ulalikatazizya zintu zyaMwaami, kuti abotezye Mwaami.
1CO 7:33 Pele mwaalumi ukwete ulalikatazizya zintu zyaansi, kuti abotezye mukakwe -
1CO 7:34 ulaanzene. Musimbi utakwetwe ulalikatazizya kuzintu zyaMwaami kuti asalale nikuba kumubili nikuba kumuuya. Pele mwanakazi uukwetwe ulalikankayizizya zintu zyaansi, kuti abotezye mulumi wakwe.
1CO 7:35 Aaya ndawamba kuti mugwasigwe, nsiyandi kubika kakole kulindinywe. Ndaamba aaya kuti kube zyeelede zibotu, mukalitakate kuMwaami kaatakwe lunyonyoko.
1CO 7:36 Kuti mpali uyeeya kuti tachitili munakalindu wakwe kabotu - kali munsi aaminyaka yakukwatwa - weelede kuchita mbayanda. Talimukubisya pe. Beelede kukwatana.
1CO 7:37 Pele mwaalumi uyima akujatisya mukati kamoyo wakwe, kuti katamanikide pele ulakonzya kweendelezya kuyanda kwakwe, alimwi kuti wayeya kuchita eezi mumoyo, akkale mbwabede, ulachita kabotu.
1CO 7:38 Elyo ooyo ukwata nakalindu ulachita kabotu, pele ooyo ulisalila kutakwata ulachita kabotu chakwiinda.
1CO 7:39 Mwanakazi ulaangidwe kumulumi wakwe nachipona. Pele mulumi wakwe aafwa, waangunuka kukwatwa kufumbwa ngwayanda, pele kali muMwaami.
1CO 7:40 Pele mukuyeya kwangu nchibotu loko kuti ukkale mbuli mbabede. Alimwi ndayeya kuti ndili aMuuya waLeza.
1CO 8:1 Lino atala azilyo zipayizigwa kuzikozyano: Tulizi kuti toonse tulijisi luzib. Iluzibo lulatutundumika, pesi luyando lulatuyaka.
1CO 8:2 Na umwi muntu uyeeya kuti ulizi chimwi, ooyo muntu tana kuziba mbuli mbweelede kuziba.
1CO 8:3 Pesi na umwi wayanda Leza ooyo muntu ulaziba aanguwe.
1CO 8:4 Nkiinkako atala akulya kuzipayilizidwe kuzikozyano: Tulizi kuti chikozyano chili muli eeyi inyika nchabiyo ngwabiyo akuti takukwe Leza pesi umwi.
1CO 8:5 Nikuba kuti nkubali bakali bakali kutegwa mbaleza, nikuba kujulu naba ansi ( mbuli mbubali bayingi “baleza” amubwini bwabo “bami”),
1CO 8:6 nikubabobo kulindiswe kuli Leza umwi biyo Taatesu, nkuzyakazwida zintu zyonse alimwi nutuponena swebo, amwami numwi Jesu Kkilisito, akwinda mulinuwe zintu zyonse zilapona, alimwi swebo tuponena kulinguwe.
1CO 8:7 Aboobo, kuti luzibo olu taluli kuli boonse. Pesi kuti, chimwi chindi bakali kukomba chikozyano, alimwi bakalya kulya oku mbuli chintu chakapayizidwe kuzikozyano. Miyeeyo ili sofwede nkaambo ilikompeme.
1CO 8:8 Pesi tensi kulya takukoyo twimikilila kuli Leza. Takukonzyi kubija na tetwalya zili mbubo na twalya.
1CO 8:9 Pesi amuchenjele kuti lwangunuko lwenu lutabi chilebyo kuli wabo bakompeme kulusyomo.
1CO 8:10 Nakuti tutedi umwi wakubona, ulaluzibo, ulokulya mung'anda yazikozyano. Sa temizeezo ikompeme kuti abe amanjeezezya kukulya zipayizigwa kuzikozyano?
1CO 8:11 Nkambo kumvwisisisya kwanu atala abube bwazikozyano, oyo ukompeme wabunyina ngwakafwida Kkilisito, wanyonyoonwa.
1CO 8:12 Nchinchicho, nchimubisizya bakwesu akujaya miyeyo yabo ikompeme, mukubisizya Kkilisito.
1CO 8:13 Nkinkaako, na kulya chaba chilebyo kumukwesu, nsikoyoolya limbi nyama, kuti nditawisyi mukwesu.
1CO 9:1 Ani nsilimwangunuke? Ani nsili mutumwa? Te ndakamubona na Jesu Mwami wesu?
1CO 9:2 Kuti nketali mutumwa kulibwami, pele ndilinguwe kulindinwe. Nkambo inywe mulichitondezyo chabutumwa bwangu muMwami.
1CO 9:3 Echi nchili kwabilizyo changu kulabo bandi lungulula:
1CO 9:4 Tatukwe chelelo na chakulya alubo aunywa?
1CO 9:5 Tatukwe chelelo na chakwenda antomwe amukazi nyina, mbuli mbuba chita boonse batumwa, alubo bananyina baMwami, alubo aKefasi?
1CO 9:6 Na takuli Bbanabbasi andime abo batakwe chelelo chakubeleka?
1CO 9:7 Ngwani ubeleka mbuli silumamba ulifozya? Ngwani ubyala munda wamasansa aboobo atalyi muchelo yawo? Kana ngwani wembela butanga aboobo katanywi malili kuzwa kubutanga?
1CO 9:8 Tandambi ezi zintu kazizwa kunguzu zyamuntu? Awalo mulawu tawambi obo na?
1CO 9:9 Nkambo kuli lembedwe mulawo waMozesi,” mutamwangi mulomo musune ulyatuka miila.” Alimwi musune na Leza ngwayanda.
1CO 9:10 Talikwambula atala andiswe na? Zyakalembelwa ndiswe, kaambo oyo ulima welede kulima abulangilizi, pele upola welede abulangizi bwa kwabana mubutebuzi.
1CO 9:11 Ikuti twakabyala zintu zyamuya akati kanu, zilindide na kuti tutyole zintu zijatika kuzwa kulindinywe?
1CO 9:12 Kuti bamwi bakali kuchita zyelelo kuzwa kulindinwe, swebo tatwelede zyindilide na? Asi tetwakayanda echi chelelo. Asikuti twaka kkakatila zintu zyoonse kuti kutabi chikachizya makani aKkilisito. Sa tamuzi na kuti abo bachita milimo yamunganda yaLeza bajana kulya kwabo munganda yaLeza?
1CO 9:13 Sa tamuzi na kuti abo babeleka kuchipayilo babilana ezyo nzibatula echipayililo?
1CO 9:14 Munzila njiyeyo, Mwami wakalayilila kuti abo bakkambawuka makani mabotu belede kujana zyakuli gwasya kumakani mabotu.
1CO 9:15 Asi tendakayanda chimwi chezyelelo ezi. Alimwi nsilembeli kuti ndichitilwe chimwi chintu. Nizyakalikabotu mendifwe. Takwe muntu uyondisampawula kukulikankayizya oku!
1CO 9:16 Na kuti ndakambawuka makani mabotu, nsyelede kulisumpula, nkambo ndelede kuchita obo, alimwi maawe kuli ndime kuti tenda kambawuka makani mabotu!
1CO 9:17 Na kuti ndachita chakuyanda, ndila mpindu. Asi kuti chakutayanda ndichila bubanzi mbundakapegwa. Nimpindunzi yangu?
1CO 9:18 Na kuti nekambawuka, ndipe vangeli katakwe mbadalo alimwi nsibwezi chelelo chizwide mumakani mabotu.
1CO 9:19 Nikuba ndangunwidwe kulizyoonse, ndakaba muzike kuliboonse kuchitila kuti ndijane zyiingi.
1CO 9:20 Kuba Juda ndakaba mbuli muJuda, kuchitila kuti ndijane abo balimunsi amulawu. Ndakachita echi nikuba kuti nsilimunsi amulawu. (ULB ula: Ndakachita ezi ime lwangu nketali munsi lyamuwa. Magwalo achi Giliki echindi kalimache alubo kayandika abumwi bupanduluzi bwachindi asiya kunze munchali oyu.)
1CO 9:21 Kulabo balanze amulawu, ndakaba mbuli umwi ulanze amulawo, nekuba tendakali kunze amulawo waLeza lwangu asi kunsi amulawu waKkilisito. Ndakachita ezi kuchitila kuti ndijane abo balanze amulawu.
1CO 9:22 Kuba teteete ndakaba muteteete, kuchitila kuti ndeete bateteete. Ndakaba zintu zyoonse kubantu boonse kuchitila kuti amwi anzila zimwi ndalikufutula bamwi.
1CO 9:23 Ndichita zintu zyoonse nkambo kamakani mabotu kuchitila kuti ndikabe achabilo muzyolwe zyamakani mabotu.
1CO 9:24 Tamuzi na kuti mumuzundano boonse bala chijana basikuchijana muzundano, asi omwe ngujana bulumbu.
1CO 9:25 Umwi awumwi uchijana welede kulijata muzintu zyoonse. Balazichita kuti batambule musini umana, asi tulazichita kuti tutambule oyo utamani.
1CO 9:26 Aboobo mbubobu mbundichijana, mbuli utakwe utakwe makanze; mbubobu mbewuma, katalimbuli uwuuma luwo.
1CO 9:27 Asi ndazunda mubili wangu alimwi nduuchita muzike, kuchitila kuti ndamana kukambawuka kuli bamwi, ime lwangu ntakajaniki abubi.
1CO 10:1 Tandiyandi kuti mutazibi, bakwesu, kuti bamataatesu bakali munsi ajoba alimwi bakayinda mulwiz.
1CO 10:2 Boonse bakabbabbatizigwa muli Mozesi mujoba alimwi amulwizi,
1CO 10:3 alimwi bonse bakalya chilyo chamuuya chikozyania.
1CO 10:4 Bonse bakanywa chakunywa chamuuya chikozyania. Nkambo bakanywa kubbwe lyamuuya elyo lyakabatobela, alimwi ibbwe elyo lyakali Kkilisito.
1CO 10:5 Pele bonse bakabotelwa abiingi babo, alimwi mitunta yabo yakalisapeene munkanda.
1CO 10:6 Lino zintu ezi zyakali chitondezyo kuli ndiswe, kuti tutakabi abo bemuuzya zintu zibi mbuli mbubakeemuzya.
1CO 10:7 Mutabi basikukomba mituni mbuli bamwi babo mbubakabede. Echi chilobu mbuli mbukulembedwe, “Bantu bakakkala aansi kuti balye akunywa, alimwi kunyampuka kuti balisenie.”
1CO 10:8 Tutachiti bwamu, mbuli biingi babo mbubakachita, muzuba limwi, zyuulu zyamakumi abili azitatu zyabantu bakafwa nkambo kanchicho.
1CO 10:9 Tutabiki Kkilisito mukusunkwa, mbuli biingi babo mbubakachita alimwi bakanyonyoonwa anzoka.
1CO 10:10 Alimwi mutangunguni, mbuli bingi babo mbubakachita alimwi bakanyonyoonwa amungelo walufu.
1CO 10:11 Lino ezi zintu zyakachitika kuli mbabo mbuli chitondezyo kuli ndiswe. Zyakalembelwa kuti lube lulayo kulindiswe - kuli ndiswe abo mamanino achindi ngasikilide.
1CO 10:12 Nkambo kaako kufumbwa ani uyeeya kuti ulimvwi alangisisye kuti atabi nawa.
1CO 10:13 Takwe musunko umusikila atali ayo azibinkene kubantu boonse. Pele, Leza ulisyomekede. Takaoyomuzumizya kuti mukasunkwe zyiinda munguzu anu. Kusunko uyobikka inzila yakulizwa yo, kuchitila kuti mukakonzye kulyiminina.
1CO 10:14 Nkambo kako nobayandwa bangu, amuchije kuzwa kukukkomba mituni.
1CO 10:15 Imebo ndiwambula kulindinywe mbuli bantu bali akumvwisisisya, abobo mulakonzya kulangisisya nzindaamba.
1CO 10:16 Ikanywido kazilongezyo ako nkitulongezya, sena takali kakwabilana mubulowa bwa Kkilisito? Chinkwa nchitukwamuna tachili chakwabilana mumubili wa Kkilisito?
1CO 10:17 Nkambo kuli chinkwa chimwi, iswe nituli bingi tuli mubili umwi. Toonse tutola kuchinkwa chimwi antoomwe.
1CO 10:18 Langa kubantu bakwa Izilayeli. Tabali abo balya zipayizyo bali achakuchita achipayililo?
1CO 10:19 Ndokwambanzi mpo? Kuti chikozyanio nchimwi chintu? Nanka kulya kupayizigwa kuchikozyanio nchimwi chintu?
1CO 10:20 Pele ndikwamba atala azintu bamaasi nzibapayila, kuti batula zintu ezi kumadimoni kutali kuli Leza. Tandiyandi kuti mube azyakuchita amadimoni!
1CO 10:21 Tamukonzyi kunywa kanywido ka Mwamiakanywido kamadimoni.
1CO 10:22 Naa tudyokola Leza kubuzuba? Tulamanguzu na kwinda mbwabede?
1CO 10:23 “Choonse chintu chilazumizigwa,” pesi tazili zyonse zintu zigwasya. “Chonse chintu chilazumizigwa,” Pele tensi chonse chintu chiyaka bantu.
1CO 10:24 Takwe muntu uyelede kuyandula chigwasya nguwe luzutu. Asi, umwi awumwi uyelede kuyandula chigwasya ngwayakilene anguwe.
1CO 10:25 Ulakonzya kulya chonse chuzigwa kuchisambalilo kotabuzyi mibuzyo yakulilya mumizezo.
1CO 10:26 Nkambo nyika nja Mwami alimwi abuzulilo bwayo.”
1CO 10:27 Na utasyomi wakutamba kukulya chilyo, alimwikoyanda kwinka, lya kufumbwa chabikwa kunembo lyako kotabuzyi mibuzyo yakulilya mumizezo.
1CO 10:28 Pele na umwi wamba kuti kulinduwe, “Echi chatuulwa kuchipayizyo,” elyo utachilyi. Kuchitila yooyo wakwambila webo, alimwi akambo kamiyeeyo yakulilya -
1CO 10:29 Amwi mabbuku achindi alamalembe achi Giliki alayungizya aya, nkambo nyika azyonse zintu zilimumo nzya Mwami. Pele mabbuku ayinda achindi amalembe achi Giliki tajisi ezi pe. Bingi basichikolo babona kuyungizya mbuli kwindulula munchali. Kulilya kwawumwi muntu, ndikwamba, alimwi chitali chako. Ino nkambonzi kulyendelela kwangu nikubetekwa akulilya kwawumwi?
1CO 10:30 Na ndalya chilyo amoyo usalala, nkambonzi imebo nentukililwa echo nchindapeda kulumba?
1CO 10:31 Nkambo kako, naa walya kana kunywa, kana kufumbwa nchochita, kochita zyonse kuti kube bulemu kuli Leza.
1CO 10:32 Utajapi mulandu kuba Juda akuba Giliki, nikuba kumbungano ya Leza.
1CO 10:33 Munzila ikozyenie ndeezya kubotezya bantu boonse muzintu zyonse. Tandiyanduli zindigwasyalwangu, pele ezyo zyabiingi. Ndilachita echi kuti antela bayinofutuka.
1CO 11:1 Amwiiye ndime, mbuli mbwendi sikwiiya wa Kkilisitu.
1CO 11:2 Lino ndilamulumbayizya nkambo mulajatisisya kutunsiyansiya mbuli mbondakamwambila.
1CO 11:3 Lino ndiyanda kuti mumvwisye kuti Kkilisito nguwe mutwe wamwanakazi akuti Leza mutwe wa Kkilisitu.
1CO 11:4 Kufumbwa mwalumi ukomba nekuba kusinsima kavumbide kumutwe wakwe wawubula mutwe wakwe.
1CO 11:5 Pesi kufumbwa mwanakazi ukomba nekuba kusinsima kavumbide mutwe wakwe ulawubula mutwe wakw. Aboobo chilikozyenie akuti mutwe wakwe wakululwa.
1CO 11:6 Nkabela kuti mwanakazi tavumba mutwe wakwe, uleelede kugela masusu aakwe afwimpe. Na chitawusisya insoni kuti mwanakazi agele masusu naa kukululwa mutwe wakwe, avumbe mutwe wakwe.
1CO 11:7 Nkabela mwalumi tayelede kuvumba mutwe wakwe, nkambo kakuti nchikozyanisyo chabulemu bwa Leza. Pesi mwanakazi mbulemu bwamwaalumi.
1CO 11:8 Nkambo mwalumi takalengwa kuzwa kumwanakazi. Anukuti mwanakazi wakalengwa kuzwa kumwalumi.
1CO 11:9 Nkabela teensi mwalumi wakalengelwa mwanakazi. Anukuti, mwanakazi wakalengelwa mwalumi.
1CO 11:10 Nchenchicho mwanakazi nchayelede kuba chitondezyo chabulemu amutwe wakwe, nkambo kabaangelo.
1CO 11:11 Nekubaboobo, mu Mwami, mwanakazi taponi chakulyiminina katakwe mwalumi, naba mwalumi taponi chakulyiminina katakwe mwanakazi wakwe.
1CO 11:12 Mbuli mwanakazi mbwazwa kumwalumi, alakwe mwalumi uzwa kumwanakazi. Alimwi zintu zyonse zizwa kuli Leza.
1CO 11:13 Amulibeteke nobeni: Saa chililuleme kuti mwanakazi kakomba kuli Leza amutwe wakwe kutavumbidwe?
1CO 11:14 Saa bulenwe bwanu tabumuyiisyi kuti naa mwalumi waba amasusu malamfu, nkutalemeka kwakwe?
1CO 11:15 Bulengwe bwanu tabumuyiisyi naa kuti mwanakazi aaba amasusu malamfu, mbulemu bwakwe? Nkambo masusu akwe akapegwa kulinuwe mbuli chilivumbyo.
1CO 11:16 Pesi kuti umwi wayanda atala azeezi, tatukwe nechiba chimwi chaanza, neziba mbungano zya Leza.
1CO 11:17 Pesi mumalayilile atobela, tandikonzyi kumutembawula. Nikuba nemubungana, tensi nkwakubotya pesi nkwakubisya.
1CO 11:18 Nkabela lutanzi, ndilamvwa kuti nemuswanana mumbungano, kuli mipampo mipampo akati kanu, alimwi mubuche ndilasyoma.
1CO 11:19 Nkenkaako kulelede alimwi tubunga tubuna akati kanu, kuchitila kuti abo bakalomesegwa ngabala libonia akati kenu.
1CO 11:20 Nkenkaako nemubungana, tensi nchilyo chamwami nchemulya.
1CO 11:21 Nemulya, awumwi awumwi ulya kulya kwakwe mwini bamwi kabatana kujana chilyo chabo. Umwi waba anzala, alimwi umwi wakolwa.
1CO 11:22 Tamukwe maanda na mukalye akunywida mukati? Mulasampawulana imbungano ya Leza akulangilila aansi abo batakwe nzebalazyo? Ngambe buti kulindinywe? Ndimutembawule na? Nsikomutembawula nkambo kazeezi!
1CO 11:23 Eelyo ndakatambula kuzwa ku Mwami makani ngendakamusiila, kuti Mwami Jesu, mansiku nakaabwa, wakatola chibune.
1CO 11:24 Musule akupa kulumba, wakachikwamuna akwamba kuti, “Oyu mubili wangu, nonguwe wenu. Muchiite obu kukundiyeya ndime.”
1CO 11:25 Mbubonya obo wakatola nkomeki musule achilalilo, alimwi wakati, “Eyi nkomeki nchizuminano chipya chabulowa bwanu. Amuchite boobo muzyindi nemubunywa, kuti mukandiyeeye.”
1CO 11:26 Kuchindi choonse nchemulya echi chibunge akunywa eyi nkomeki, kamuyeeya lufu lwa Mwami mane akaboole.
1CO 11:27 Nkabela, oyo, uulya chibune nawanywa inkomeki ya Mwami munzila italuleme uyoba amulandu wamubili abulowa bwa Mwami.
1CO 11:28 Muleke muntu alilingule lwakwe chakusanuna, alimwi muleyi inzila amumuleke alye chibune akunywa munkomeki.
1CO 11:29 Alakwe oyo uulya akunywa katalililinguli mubili walya akunywa lubeta kulinguwe mwini.
1CO 11:30 Nkenkako biingi akati kanu mulamana manguzu akuchiswa, alimwi bamwi benu bafwa.
1CO 11:31 Pesi kuti twalilingula tobeni, tatukoyo betekwa.
1CO 11:32 Pesi elyo notubetekwa a Mwami, tulalulamikwa, kuchitila kuti tutakabetekwi anyika.
1CO 11:33 Nkeenkako, nobakwesu, nemuswanana antomwe kukulya, amulindane.
1CO 11:34 Naa umwi wenu wafwanzala, mumuleke akalye kumunzi, kuchitila kuti nemuswanana antomwe kutakabi kwalubeta. Alimwi atala aamwi makani ngemwakalemba, ndiyomupa malayilile elyo ndasika.
1CO 12:1 Ataala azipego zyamuuya, nobakwesu, nsiyandi kuti mubule luzibo.
1CO 12:2 Mulizizi kuti nimwakatali kusyoma Mwami Leza, mwakali kwenzegwa munzila ziswekede kumituni yakatali kwambul, munzila kufumbwa nzemwakali kwenzegwa aazyo.
1CO 12:3 Aboobo njanda kuti muzibe kuti takwe muntu uwambuzigwa a Muuya wa Leza ukonzya kwamba kuti, “Jesu mutuke.” Takwe ukonzya kwamba kuti “Jesu Mwami,” ado Muuya Uusalala.
1CO 12:4 Lino kuli zipego zisiyene, pesi Muuya ngumwi.
1CO 12:5 Kuli milimo isiyene siyene, pesi Mwami ngonguwe,
1CO 12:6 alubo kuli kwaandana kwamisyobo yamilimu, pesi nonguwe Leza ubeleka zyonse muli zyonse.
1CO 12:7 Lino kuli umwi awumwi kulipedwe chimo cha Muuya kuti kugwasigwe boonse.
1CO 12:8 Nkambo kuli pedwe ku Muuya ijwi lyabusongo, mpawo kuli umwi ijwi lyaluzibo a Muuya omwe.
1CO 12:9 Kuli umwi kuli pedwe lusyomo anguwo Muuya, alimwi kuli umwizipo zyakuponesya anguwo Muuya omwe.
1CO 12:10 Kuli umwi kuli pedwe milimu yakuchita zigambyo, mpawo kuli umwi businsimi. Kuli umwi ulipedwe kukonzya kusiyanisya misyobo yandimi, mpawo kuli umwi kupandululwa kwandimi.
1CO 12:11 Eezi zyoonse milimu ya Muuya omwe biyo, kupa zipego kuli umwi awumwi, mbuli mbwasala.
1CO 12:12 Nkambo mubili mbuli umwi mpawo nkujisi zizo zyiingi mpawo zizo zyonse ezi nzyamubili omwe, mbuboobo mbukubede a Kkilisito.
1CO 12:13 Nkambo a Muuya omwe twaka bbabbatizigwa mumubili omwe, nibaba ba Juda nanka ba Giliki nibaba bazike na balubusi, aawo bonse bakachitwa kuti banywe ku Muuya omwe.
1CO 12:14 Nkambo mubili teensi chizo chomwe pe, pesi nzyiingi.
1CO 12:15 Ikuti kuulu kwati, “Nkambo kakuti nsili mutwe, aboobo nsilichizo chamubili,” tensi nchimpanzi chinini pe chamubili.
1CO 12:16 Na kuti ikutwii kwamba kuti, “Nkambo kakuti nsili linso, nsilichimpanzi chamubili,” tensi nchinini pe chamubili.
1CO 12:17 Ikuti mubili woonse lyaba linso, chimpanzi chakumvwa chilazwayi? Kuti mubili wonse kakuba kutwi, chimpanzi chakumvwabwema chalikuno zwayi?
1CO 12:18 Pesi Leza wakabika chimpanzi chimwi achimwi chamubili mbuli mbwakayanda.
1CO 12:19 Kaansinga kaziba chimpanzi chomwe, mubili nulikuli?
1CO 12:20 Aboobo linobu kuli zimpanzi zyiingi, pesi mubili ngumwi biyo.
1CO 12:21 Ilinso talikonzyi kwamba kuti kukuboko, “Nsikwe mupundulo anduwe.” Nanka mutwe kuti utedi kumawulu, “Nsikwe mupundulo anduwe.”
1CO 12:22 Pesi zimpanzi zyamubili zilangika kukompama azilazyo zilamulimo,
1CO 12:23 alimwi azimwi zipanzi nzituyeyela kuti tazilemekwi, tuzipe bulemu bupati, aboobo bamwi besu batakwe chiiwa chitambulika babe abulemu bwini.
1CO 12:24 Lino bamwi besu balachiwa chitambulika tabakwe ziyandisyo zilobu. Kwindilila, Leza wakachita mubili, nkapa bulemu bupati kuzimpanzi zitakwaabo.
1CO 12:25 Wakachita ezi kuchitila kuti kutabi kwaanzana mumubili, pesi kuti zimpanzi eezi zigwasyanie amaboneno ayelene.
1CO 12:26 Kuti na chimwi chimpanzi chaba epenzi, zyonse ina zyabamupenzi; na chimwi chalemekwa, zyoonse zimpanzi zilabotelwa antomwe.
1CO 12:27 Lino muli mubili wa Kkilisito elyo umwi awumwi nchimpanzi chawo.
1CO 12:28 Alimwi Leza wakabikka muchikombelo lutanzi batumwa, bachibili mbasinsimi, bachitatu mbayiisyi, mpawo ababo bachita maleele, mpawo zipo zyakuponia, abaabo bagwasizya bamwi abo bachita milimu yabwendelezi, abaabo baala misyobo myiingi yendimi.
1CO 12:29 Boonse mbatumwa na? Mbasinsimi na boonse? Bonse mbayiisyi na? Bonse bachita maleele na? Bonse bachita milimu igambya na?
1CO 12:30 Boonse balazipego zyakuponia na? Bonse baambula myaambo na? Bonse bala pandulula na myaambo?
1CO 12:31 Musungwalile kuyandula zipego zipati. Pesi ndiyomutondezya inzila imbotu loko.
1CO 13:1 Nikuba kuti ndaambuula mundimi zyabantu azyabangelo. Pesi kuti kanditakwe luyando, nooli ndaba mulangu usabila naanka chisaka chichokola chokola.
1CO 13:2 Nikuba kuti ndachita chabusinsimi achakumvwisisisya toonse tusimpi tusisidwe aluzibo, mpawo akuba aaloonse lusyomo lwakunyampula zilundu. Pesi kuti kanditakwe luyando, nsichili chintu.
1CO 13:3 Alubo nikuba kuti ndapa boonse buvubi bwangu kukusanina bafwaba, akuti ndapeda mubili wangu kukuyotetwa. Pesi kuti kanditakwe luyando, takwe nchindijana.
1CO 13:4 Luyando lulabulindizi amuuya. Luyando taluli munyono mpawo talulidundizyi. Talulisumpuli.
1CO 13:5 Na chinguni. Talulilangilili chintu. Taluliniakidwe, na kulondola twaambo twabubi.
1CO 13:6 Talubotelwi mububi nakuti, kubotelwa mubwini.
1CO 13:7 Luyando lunyampula zyoonse zintu, lusyoma zyoonse zintu, lulangilila zyoonse zintu mpawo lulakakatila kuli zyoonse zintu.
1CO 13:8 Luyando talumani. Nikwali basinsimi, zyalinooyinda. Nikwali myaambo yalikuyoomana.
1CO 13:9 Nitwali luzibo, luyooyinda. Mbuli mbutuzi mubuche mpawo tusinsima mubuche.
1CO 13:10 Pesi eelyo bululami nibwaayoosika, oobo butazulilide buyooyinda.
1CO 13:11 Nindakachili munini, ndakalikwambuula mbuli munini, ndalikuyeya mbuli munini, ndalikubuzyania mbuli munini.
1CO 13:12 Nindakazooba mupati, ndakabikka kule zintu zyabunini. Mbuli mbutubona chakutilulama muchiboniboni, pesi kumeso akumeso. Lino ndizi mubuche, pesi eelyo ndiyooziba bumaninide mbuuli mbezibedwe bumaninide.
1CO 13:13 Pesi lino eezi zintu zitatu zisyeede: Lusyomo, bulangilizi mpawo aluyando. Pesi chipati loko kuli Leza nduyando.
1CO 14:1 Fundumanina luyando alimwi unangatile kukujana zipo zyamuuya, kapati nkukuti ukonzye kusinsima.
1CO 14:2 Nkambo ooyo uwambula mululimi tawambuli abantu pesi uwambuila a Leza. Nkambo takwe umumvwisisya nkambo uwaambula zigambyo zyamumuuya.
1CO 14:3 Pesi oyo usinsima wambuula abantu kuti aba yake, kubasimya akubawonga.
1CO 14:4 Ooyo wambula mululimi uliyaka lwakwe, pesi oyo usinsima uyaka mbungano.
1CO 14:5 Lino ndipeekezya kuti anoli moonse mukonzya kwambuula mundimi. Pesi nikuba kwinda ezyo, ndali kupeekezya kuti kansiinga mwali kusinsima. Oyo usinsima mupati kwinda kwinda ooyo uwambula mundimi ( ado umwi wapandulula kuchitila kuti imbungano ijane luzibo).
1CO 14:6 Pesi lino, nobakwesu, kuti ndeza kulindinywe nkewambula mundimi, ngandamugwasya biyeni? Takwe pe, adokuti ndambula andinywe akuyubununa, na aluzibo, na businsimi, na kuyiisya.
1CO 14:7 Muli njiyeyo inzila, awo zibelesyo zitaponi nizichita muyoliyoli mbuli muteetele kana kantimbwa kuti tezyasiyana ndililo, umwi muntu nga ulaziba biyeni kuti ndwimbonzi lulikulizigwa amuteetele kana kantimbwa.
1CO 14:8 Nkambo kakuti inyele yasibwa akalizyo katazibinkene, umwi muntu nga ulaziba buti kuti chaba chindi chakubambila inkondo?
1CO 14:9 Njimwi inzila anduwe nowambula mundimi. Kuti waamba zyambo zyakubulunguzya, zilamvwisisigwa biyeni zilimukwambwa? Unoli kowambula muluwo biyo.
1CO 14:10 Chilizibinkene kuti kuli milaka myiingi isiyene siyene munyika, aboobo tuuwo pe utakwe nchuwamba.
1CO 14:11 Pesi kuti nkesizi mulaka nchuwamba, ndinoli muzwakule kuli oyo sikuwambula, alubo sikwambula unoli muzwakule kuli ndime.
1CO 14:12 Nkokuti chili kuli nduwe. Mbulikuti ulachiyandisyo chakuyubununwa kwamuuya, yanduula kuyungizizigwa kwambungano kuchitila kuti muvule.
1CO 14:13 Nkokuti oyo uwambula mundimi welede kukombela kuti akonzye kupandulula.
1CO 14:14 Nkambo kuti ndakomba mundimi, imuuya wangu ulakkomba, pesi mizeezo yangu inooli tayikwe michelo.
1CO 14:15 Ndicheteenzi? Ndilakomba amuuya wangu, pesi ndilakomba alimwi amiyeeyo yangu. Ndiyoyimba amuuya wangu, alimwi ndinoyimba amizezo yangu.
1CO 14:16 Anolikuti, na walongezya Leza amuuya, muntu wakunze ulaamba biyeni kuti “Amen” aawo nolikupa kulumba kuti kotazi nzli kwaamba?
1CO 14:17 Nkambo chanchonzyo ukwizi loko kupa kulumba, pesi umwi muntu tabumbikene.
1CO 14:18 Ndilumba Leza kuti ndilamwinda monse kwambula mundimi.
1CO 14:19 Pesi mumbungano chili kabotu kuti ngambuule majwi musanu muku mvwisisisya kwangu kuchitila kuti ndikonzye kulayilila bamwi, kwinda kwamba kkumi lyamajwi mundimi.
1CO 14:20 Nobakwesu, tamubi bana mukuyeeya kwenu. Chilabota kuti, kuzibi mube mbuli zisukasuka. Pesi kukuyeeya muzikitizye chipati.
1CO 14:21 Mumulawu kulilembedwe kuti, “Kwindilila kubantu bandimi zita zibinkene akumilomo yamazwakule ndiyowambula kubantu aaba. Nikuba obo tabakoyo ndimvwa,” mbwawamba Mwami.
1CO 14:22 Nkokuti lino, indimi nzitondezyo, pepe kubasyomi, pesi kuli batasyomi. Pesi businsimi mbwa chitondezyo, peepe chabatasyomi, pesi chabasyomi.
1CO 14:23 Na, kakuli boobo, imbungano yoonse yaza aamwi alimwi boonse baambula mundimi, alimwi ibazwa kunze abatasyomi banjila, tabakombi kuti muli pengede na?
1CO 14:24 Pesi anoli moonse mwali kusinsimi alimwi utasyomi na oyo uuzwa kunze kanjila, wali kunotusika kuli zyonse nzyali kumvwa. Zyonse zyali kunowambwa zyali kunomubeteka.
1CO 14:25 Insiswa zyamumoyo wakwe zyali kunobbusigwa. Mbuli chitondezyo, wali kunowa kavundama akukomba Leza. Wali kunopa bukamboni kuti nchoonzyo Leza mpali akati kenu.
1CO 14:26 Niinzi chitobela bakwesu? Nimubungana, awumwi uli antembawuzyo, injiisyo, chiyubunuzyo, indimi, kana bupanduluzi. Amuzichite zyonse kuchitila kuti muyake imbungano.
1CO 14:27 Ikuti imwi wambuula mundimi, ababe babili kanakuti batatu, batobelane umwi awumwi, alimwi kwelede kuti umwi apandulule zilimukwambwa.
1CO 14:28 Pesi kuti kakutakwe uupandulula, boonse abo ngabawumune biyo mumbungano. Kube kuti umwi awumwi alyambwide lwakwe mwini kuli Leza.
1CO 14:29 Akwambuule basinsimi bobile kana batatu bamwi baswilizye akutobelezya zilikwambwa.
1CO 14:30 Pesi kuti kwaba chiyubunuzyo kuli umwi uukkede, wakusanguna ngawumune.
1CO 14:31 Nkambo monse mulakonzya kusinsima uumwi awumwi kuchitila kuti umwi awumwi ayiiye alimwi bonse basungwazigwe.
1CO 14:32 Nkambo myuuya yabasinsimi ilangene abasinsimi.
1CO 14:33 Nkambo Leza teensi ngu Leza walunyongano, pesi ngwa lumuno. Oyui ngomulawu wambungano zyoonse zyabantu ba Leza basalala.
1CO 14:34 Banakazi belede kuba chumunizi mumbungano. Nkambo kakuti tabazumizigwi kwambula. Anukuti, belede kulibombya, alimwi nkambo mulawu mbuwamba.
1CO 14:35 Kuti kakuli chimwi chintu nchibayanda kwiiya, ngababuzye balumi babo kumyunzi yabo. Nkambo chipa mawuse kuti mwanakazi awambuule mumbungano.
1CO 14:36 Ijwi lya Leza lyakazwa kuli ndinywe na? Lyakasika kulindinywe amulikke na?
1CO 14:37 Kuti kuli uyeya kuti musinsimi na kuti uli a muuya, ulelede kubbusya kuti zintu nzindamulembela amalayilile a Mwami.
1CO 14:38 Pesi kuti kakuli umwi utazitambuli eezi, alakwe atatambuliki.
1CO 14:39 Nkokuti, bakwesu, amube achiyandisyo chukusinsima, alimwi tamukasyi umwi kukwaambula mundimi.
1CO 14:40 Pesi amuchite kuti zyonse zintu zichitwe kabotu akubambikana munzila mbotu.
1CO 15:1 Lino ndayanda kuti kuzibikane akulindinwe, nobakwesu, makani ngindakamwambila alimwi ngimwimikilide.
1CO 15:2 Alimwi ngimufutulwa awo, na mwajatisya majwi ngindakamukambawukila, kunze kwakuti mwakasyoma chitawo.
1CO 15:3 Nkambo ndakamwabila nchindakatambula lutanzi, ikuti Kkilisito wakafwida zibi zyesu mbuli malembe mbwaamba,
1CO 15:4 ikuti wakazikwa akuti wakabusigwa mubuzuba bwatatu mbuli malembe mbwaamba.
1CO 15:5 Kkilisito wakalibonya kuliSifasi, akuli balikumi;
1CO 15:6 mpawo wakalibonya kulibakwesu balimyanda musanu kuchindi chimwi. Bayingi babo bachili bawumi, pesi bamwi bakafwa.
1CO 15:7 Mpawo wakalibonya kuliJemusi akubatumwa boonse.
1CO 15:8 Kumamanino azyoonse, wakalibonya kulindime, kukabunga mbulimuntu wakazyalwa kalimbwelule.
1CO 15:9 Nkaambo ndime munini wabo boonse batumwa. Tandelede kwamba kutegwa mutumwa nkambo ndakapenzya mbungano yaLeza.
1CO 15:10 Pesi nkambo kaluzyalo lwaLeza ndili nzindilinzizyo, alimwi luzyalo lwakwe mulindime te lwakaba lwabuyo pe. Pesi ndakabeleka changuzu kwinda boonse. Asi kakutensi ndime pe, pesi nduzyalo lwaLeza olo lulandime.
1CO 15:11 Nkikako na ndime na kuti mbabo, twaka kambawuka alimwi mwakasanduka.
1CO 15:12 Lino na kula kambawukwa kuti Kkilisito wakabusigwa kuzwa kubafu, lino nkambonzi bamwi banu nibamba kuti bubuke bwabafu?
1CO 15:13 Pesi na takwe bubuke bwabafu, chamba kuti olo Kkilisito takwe nakabusigwa kubafu.
1CO 15:14 Alimwi na Kkilisito tabukide kubafu, nkikako kukambawuka kwesu nkwabuyo, alimwi lusyomo lwesu ndwabuyo.
1CO 15:15 Alubo, tulajanika katuli bakamboni bakubeja atala aLeza, nkambo twakapa bukamboni bwakuti Leza wakamubusya Kkilisito kuzwa kubafu. Pesi katamubusizye pe, na ndisimpe kuti bafwide tababukide pe.
1CO 15:16 Nkambo na bafu tababukide, alakwe Kkilisito takabukide pe.
1CO 15:17 Alimwi na Kkilisito tabukide, lusyomo lwanu ndwabuyo alimwi muchili muzibi zyanu.
1CO 15:18 Chaamba kuti abo bafwa muliKkilisito abalabo bakafwidilila.
1CO 15:19 Kuti kakulikuti bulangizi bwesu bulimuliKkilisito, kubantu boonse twelede kufwidwa insoni.
1CO 15:20 Pesi lino Kkilisito wakbusigwa kuzwa kubafu mbuli muchelo mutazi wabaabo boona.
1CO 15:21 Nkambo lufu lwakaza amuntu, amuntu lubo bubuki bwabafu buyosika.
1CO 15:22 Mbuli kuti muliAdamu woonse muntu ulafwa, amuliKkilisito woonse ulaba muumi.
1CO 15:23 Pesi umwi awumwi mumabambe akwe: Kkilisito, ulinguwe muchelo mutanzi, aboonse abo balimuli Kkilisito bayoba bawumi kukuboola kwakwe.
1CO 15:24 Ayooba ngimamanino, awo nayojosya bwami kuliLeza Taata. Elyo nayolobya bwendelezi abaami abasinguzu.
1CO 15:25 Nkambo ulelede kwendelezya kusikila akabike basinkondonyina boonse kunsi azituta zyakwe.
1CO 15:26 Sinkondonyina wamamanino ngwayolobya ndufu.
1CO 15:27 Nkambo, “ wakabika zintu zyoonse kumawulu akwe.” Pesi naamba kuti “ wakabika zintu zyoonse,” zilantanganana kuti ezi tazilikubikilizya oyo wakabika zintu kunsi lyakwe.
1CO 15:28 Kuti zintu zyoonse zyakabikwa kunsi lyakwe, we mwana lwakwe uyoba kunsi lyayoyo wakabika zintu kunsi lyakwe, kuti Leza akabe nguwe muli zyoonse.
1CO 15:29 Na kuti niinzi nchibayochita aabo bakabbabbatizigwa kulufu? Kuti na bafu takwe nibayoobusigwa, nkaambonzi nibayobbabbatizigilwa ambabo?
1CO 15:30 Nkambonzi nituli mukufwa chiindi achiindi?
1CO 15:31 Ndilafwa buzuba abuzuba! Eechi nichonzyo mbuli kulikankayizya kwangu mulindinwe, ndundilalo muliKkilisito Jesu Mwami wangu.
1CO 15:32 Ninzi nchindijana, kuzwa kumaboneno abuntu, kanzonga ndakalwana abbulu wangombe kuEfeso, nkukuti bafu tababuki? “ Atulye tunywe nkaambo junza tulafwa.”
1CO 15:33 Mutenwi pe: “ Kabunga kabi kalajaya kupona kulikabotu.”
1CO 15:34 Mupone kabotu! Mupone buumi bwakululama mutendeli anembo akubisya nkaambo bamwi banu tabakwe luzibo lwaLeza. Ndamwambila eechi kuti ndimusye nsoni.
1CO 15:35 Pesi umwi ulamba kuti, “ Ani babusigwa byeni bafu, alimwi bayoba amibili ilibyeni?”
1CO 15:36 Inwebo nobafubafuba eecho nchimubyala tachikonzyi kuba abuumi chatafwa.
1CO 15:37 Nchimwakabyala nachensi ngumubili uyoba pesi inseke itakamene. Ngelakonzya kuba witi na chimbi chintu.
1CO 15:38 Pesi uyoyipa mubili mbuli mbwasala, akulimwi nseke mubili wayo.
1CO 15:39 Tenyama yoonse pe ikozyene, pesi, kulimubili umwi kubantu, amubili wabanyama, amubili wabayuni, amubili wabaswi.
1CO 15:40 Kuli lubo mibili yakujulu amibili yansi. Pesi bulemu bwamubili wakujulu musyobo umwi abulemu wamubili wansi ngumbi.
1CO 15:41 Kulibulemu bumwi bwazuba abulemu bumwi bwamweezi, abulemu bwanyenyezi. Nkunkuti imwi inyenyezi busiyene ayimw.
1CO 15:42 Mbukuyoba akububuke bwabafu. Echo chibyala chila loba achibusigwa tachilobi.
1CO 15:43 Chakabyalwa mumasampu; chilabusigwa mubulemu. Chakabyalwa mukukompama, chiyobusigwa munguzu.
1CO 15:44 Chakabyalwa mumubili uboneka; chiyobusigwa mumubili wamuuya. Kuti kakuli mubili uboneka, mpuli alawo mubili wamuuya.
1CO 15:45 Nchikulembedwe kuti, “ Adamu mutanzi wakaba muuya upona.” Adamu wa mamanino wakaba muuya upa buumi.
1CO 15:46 Pesi wamuuya te nguwe wakasanguna kusika pesi wanyama, mpawo wamuuya.
1CO 15:47 Muntu mutanzi ngwansi, wakalengwa alusuko. Muntu wabili ngwakujulu.
1CO 15:48 Ulimbuli woyo wakalengwa kulusuko, kuti abe mbuli abo babumbwa kulusuko, amuntu wakujulu mbwabede, ambuli baabo bakujulu.
1CO 15:49 Mbuli mbukwakakuzyalwa chiimo chamuntu walusuko, tuyoozyala chiimo chamuntu wakujulu.
1CO 15:50 Lino ndamba kuti, nobakwesu, eyo nyama abulowa tazikonzyi kukona Bwami bwaLeza.
1CO 15:51 Amulange! ndamwambila lwaano lwasimpe lusisikide: Tatukoyoowona pe toonse, pesi tonse tuyosandulwa.
1CO 15:52 Tuyosandulwa mukayindi kanini, mbuli kulaba kwaliso, kumweembo wamamanino. Nkaambo mweembo uyolila, elyo bafu bayoobuka amubili utafwiki, alimwi tuyosandulwa.
1CO 15:53 Nkaambo oyu mubili ufwa welede kusama oyo utafwi.
1CO 15:54 Pesi na mubili ufwa wakusama oyo utafwi, alimwi na mutunta wasamikwa oyo muumi, mpawo tuyooba mbuli eecho chakambwa chilembedwe kuti,” Lufu lwakamenwa mukuzunda.”
1CO 15:55 “ Lufu, lulikuli luzundo lwako. Lufu, lulikuli lumoola lwako?”
1CO 15:56 Lumoola lwafu nchibi, anguzu zyachibi mulawu.
1CO 15:57 Pesi ngalumbwe Leza, wakatupa kuzunda kwiinda muMwami wesu Jesu Kkilisito!
1CO 15:58 Nkikaako, nobakwesu, ngamuyime akutasunzulwa. Ngamukkalilile mumilimu yaMwami, nkaambo mulizi kuti milimu yanu muMwami teesi yabuyo pe.
1CO 16:1 Lino mukulanga kubunganizya kwabantu basalala baLeza: Mbuli mbundakakalayilila mbungano zyaku Galantiya, lino, anywebo mwalelede kuchita.
1CO 16:2 Mubuunsi bwakusanguna bwamviki, umwi awumwi wanu welede kubikka chimwi ambali alimwi akuchibamba, mbuli mbwajana. Muchite eehi kuti kutazobi kubunganya eelyo nintaboole.
1CO 16:3 Naa ndaboola, kuli naba ni ooyo ngumuzuminina, ndiyoomupa magwalo, amanjililo kuli mbabo alimwi ndiyomutumizya achipo chanu kuJelusalema.
1CO 16:4 Kuti kachili kabotu kuli ndime kwiinka lubo, bayoyinka andime.
1CO 16:5 Pesi ndiyosika kuli ndinywe nindiyoyinda kuMasedoniya. Nkambo ndiyoyinda mu Masedoniya.
1CO 16:6 Ambweni ndilakonzya kukkala andinywe nikuba kumana chilimu, kuchitila kuti ngamulandigwasya a lweendo lwangu, kufumbwa nkundinga ndilayinka.
1CO 16:7 Nkambo tandilombozyi kumubona pe lino kukumuswaya kwangu kwakwinda luzutu. Nkambo ndilaabulangizi bwakuba achiindi chilamfu kandili andinywe, kuti Mwami wazumizya.
1CO 16:8 Pesi ndiyokkala muEfesasi do mane Pentekkositi,
1CO 16:9 nkambo mulyango ukwazeme wajuluka kuli ndime, alimwi kuli zyiingi zikachizya.
1CO 16:10 Lino naa Timoti wasika, mubone kuti waba andinywe akutayowa pe, nkambo ulikubeleka chakuminwa kumulimu waMwami, mbuli mbundilikuchita.
1CO 16:11 Kutabi nikuba umwi umusampawula. Mumugwasye munzila yakwe muluumuno, kuchita kuti azoboole kulindime. Nkambo ndilikumulangilila kuboola ababunyina.
1CO 16:12 Lino mukulanga mukwesu Apolosi, ndakamusungwazya kapati kuti amuswaye antoomwe ababunyina. Pesi nikuba biyeni tekwakali kuyanda kwakwe pe kuti aboole lino. Nikuba boobo, uzoboola kuti chiindi chaba kabotu.
1CO 16:13 Muchenjele, mukakatile mulusyomo, muchite mbuli baalumi, musime.
1CO 16:14 Muchite kuti zyoonse nzimuchita zyiitwe muluyando.
1CO 16:15 Mulilizi isuwa lya Sitefanasi, kuti bakali njimichelo yakusanguna yaAchayila, alimwi bakalipeda kumulimu wabantu ba Leza basalala. Lino ndamwaambila inywe, bakwesu,
1CO 16:16 kuti mube mukulifwinsya kubantu baliboobo alimwi akuli woonse ugwasizya mumulimu alimwi kaminwa andiswe.
1CO 16:17 Ndilabotelwa kuboola kwaSitefanasi, Fotunatasi, alimwi a Achayikkasi. Bakayiizyiita mukutaba kwako.
1CO 16:18 Nkambo bakatontozya muuya wangu awanu. Mpawo eelyo, amubayeye bantu bali mbuli mbabo.
1CO 16:19 Imbungano zyaku Asiya zilamwanzya. Akwila a Pulisila baamwanzya muMwami ambungano eeyo ilimumunzi wabo.
1CO 16:20 Boonse beenzuma balamwaanzya. Mwaanzyane umwi awumwi alumyonto lusalala
1CO 16:21 Ime, ndiPawulo, ndilemba eechi aluboko lwangu.
1CO 16:22 Kuti umwi katamuyandipe Mwami, ngatukwe.
1CO 16:23 Luzyalo lwaMwami wesu Jesu alube andinywe.
1CO 16:24 Luyando lwangu alube andinywe moonse kuli Kilisito Jesu.
2CO 1:1 Pawulu apositolo waKkilisito Jesu mumaknze aLeza aTimoteyo mukulana wesu kumbungano yaLeza ilimuKkolinto, akubantu baleza boonse basalali muchisi choonse cheAkkasia.
2CO 1:2 Luzyalo kaluba mulindinwe aluumuno buzwa kuli Leza Tata wesu aMwami Jesu Kkilisito.
2CO 1:3 Alumbwe Leza aTata Mwami wesu Jesu Kkilisito. Ngu Tata waluzyao aLeza wakumbulizya koonse.
2CO 1:4 Leza wakatumbulizya kumasukusyo esu woonse, kuti tukakonzye kumbulizya abo balimumasukuzyo. Tulumbulizya bamwi alumbulizyo ndulonya Leza ndwatumbulizya alo.
2CO 1:5 Mbuli machise aKkilisto mbwakavula nkambo kesu, lino aboobo kumbulizigwa kwesu kwakavulisya kwindila mumachise aKkilisito.
2CO 1:6 Pesi na twapenzegwa, ndumbulizyo lwanu alufutuko; na twawumbulizigwa anwebo mwawumbulizigwa. Lumbulizyo lwanu lulokubeleka kabotu mukwabana kupenzegwa kukozyenye akwesu.
2CO 1:7 Bulangizi bwesu kulindinwe taluteketi: nkambo tulizi kuti mbumwabana mapenzi mwakabana, akumbulizigwa kwesu.
2CO 1:8 Nkambo tatuyandi kuti muleke kuzibisigwa nobakwesu, atala amasukusyo ngitwakalawo muEziya. Twakali kulemenwa kwinda nguzu zyesu, lino kuti tutakate nikuba buumi bwesu.
2CO 1:9 Iyii twakabetekelwa milandu yalufu. Pesi zyakali zyakuti tutabikki kusyomeka mulindiswe pesi muliLeza ubusya bafu.
2CO 1:10 Wakatuvuna mumapenzi ajeya, uyotuvuna lubo. Mulinguwe twabika bulangizi bwakuti ulatuvuna.
2CO 1:11 Wazichita ezi mbuli mbumulokutugwasya ankombyo zyanu, mpawo bingi bayotulumbila nkambo kazipo zyaluzyalo nzitupegwa kulindiswe kwindila munkombyo zyingi.
2CO 1:12 Makanze akulisumpula kwesu ngaaya: kutaba aluzyalo kwesu kuntwakachita lwesu munyika abusalali abantu abuleza bwini kutaponena mubusongo bwanyama pesi muluzyalo lwaLeza.
2CO 1:13 Takwe nchitwakalemba pe kulindinywe chitabaliki akumvwisikana ndasyoma kuti mulaba akumvwisisya kumaninide.
2CO 1:14 Mbuli mbumwakatumvwa mubuche kuti mukalikankayizizye atala andiswe mubuzuba bwaMwami Jesu, mbuli mbutuyolikankayizya andinywe.
2CO 1:15 Nkambo ndakasimpe azezi ndalikuyanda kusanguna kusika kulindinywe kuti mutambule zipo zysluzyalo zyabili.
2CO 1:16 Ndalikuyeya kumuswaya nkinjindililakuyosika kuMasedoniya. Alubo ndayandide kumswaya ndakuzwa lubo mulwendo lwaku Masedoniy, akuti nkayindilile kuya kuJudiya.
2CO 1:17 Nindakachili kuyeya nzila eyi, ndakalengwana na? Sena ndibamba zintu munyama? Lino ndakati, “ iyii, iyii “ a “pe pe” muchindi chimwi?
2CO 1:18 Pesi mbuli Leza mbasyomekede, majwi esu kulindinywe tesi akuti “ Iyii”a “pe.”
2CO 1:19 Nkaambo Mwana aLeza, Jesu Kkilisito, oyo Silivanasi, Timoteyo andime ngutwakakupandulula akati kanu tensi “iyii” a “pe. Anukuti, ngu iyii kwalyoonse.
2CO 1:20 Nkambo zisyomezyo zyoonse zyaLeza ngu “iyii”Mulinguwe. Lino aboobo kwinda mulinguwe twamba kuti “Ameni” kubulemu bwaLeza.
2CO 1:21 Lino nguLeza uzuzikizya ndiswe andinywe muliKkilisito, wakatunanika swe.
2CO 1:22 Wakadinda chidindo alindiswe akutupa muuya mumyoyo yesu mbuli chitondezyo chibola.
2CO 1:23 Pesi ndayita Leza kuti abe kamboni amuuya wangu kuti tendakakkonzya pe kusika kuKkolinto lino kuti ndizomusiye.
2CO 1:24 Eechi tachambi kuti tuyanda kuba baami kulusyoma lwanu. Anukuti, tuli basimilimo nyokwe akukondwa kwanu, mbuli mbumwimvwi mulusyomo lwanu.
2CO 2:1 Elyo ndakayeya kulubazu lwangu kuti sikoza kulinduwe muzyiindi zichiza.
2CO 2:2 Na ndachita kuti umvwe kuchisa, nguni unga ulandisekelezya pesi oyo nguwenya ngundachisa moyo ime?
2CO 2:3 Ndalemba mbuli mbunda chita kuchitila kuti ndaza kulinduwe nditachisigwi moyo ababo belede kundichita kuti ndikondelelwe. Ndilalusyomo atala andinywe moonse kuti lukondelo lwangu lulikozyene alukondelelo ndimulalo.
2CO 2:4 Ndakulembela chakupengana kupati akuchisa kwamoyo, alubo amisozi mingi. Tendalikuyanda kuti ndikwetele kuchisa. Nkabela, ndalikuyanda kuti uzibe bukomezi bwaluyando ndwejisi kulinduwe.
2CO 2:5 Kuti kuli wakachita kuti ube mumachise, teewaka zichita kulindime, pesi ayimwi nzila-kuti atakulemezyi - kulindinywe moonse.
2CO 2:6 Echi chisyubulo chamuntu oyu abinji zilikwene.
2CO 2:7 Lino kwinda chisyubulo, mweelede kulekelela akumumbulizya we. Muchiteezi kuti atakatazigwi amawuse manji.
2CO 2:8 Ndamukumbila kuti mutondezye luyando kulinduwe.
2CO 2:9 Nkaambo nchenchicho nchindakamulembela, kuti ndimusunke alubo ndizibe kuti mulaswilila mulizyoonse.
2CO 2:10 Elyo mwalekelela muntu chintu, ambebo ndamulekelela oyo muntu. Nchindalekelela - kuti ndalekelela nchintu -chilalekelelwa nkaambo kanduwe mubube bwaKkilisito.”
2CO 2:11 Ezi zilobu kuti Satani atatchengi toonse. Nkaambo tatuli bafubafuba kumaano akwe.
2CO 2:12 Mulyango wakajulwa kulindime aMwami ninda kaza kudolopo lyaTekisasi kuzokambawuka makani mabotu aKkilisito oko.
2CO 2:13 Taakwe nindakaangunikide mu muuya nkaambo takwe nindakajana Tayitasi oko. Ndakabasiya alubo ndaya kuMasedoniya.
2CO 2:14 Pesi alumbwe Leza unga muliKkilisito utuzulwida mukuzunda lyoonse. Kwindilila mulindiswe ulayubununa mununko unona waluzibo lwakwe koonse.
2CO 2:15 Nkambo kuliLeza tuli tununkilizyo tunona muliKkilisito antomwe ababo baponede alubo akati kababo balikufwa.
2CO 2:16 Kubantu balikufwa, nkanunkililo kazwa kulufu kaya kulufu. Kulibabo baponesegwa nkanunkilizyo kuzwa kubumi kuyakubumi. Nguni welede ezi zintu?
2CO 2:17 Nkaambo tatulimbuli bantu binji bawuzya ijwi lyaLeza kuti bajane mpindu. Asi kuti, akusalala kwamizezo, tulambula muliKkilisito, mbuli mbututumvwa kuzwa kuli Leza kubusyu bwaLeza.
2CO 3:1 Ani tulokutalika kulilumbayizya lwesu lubobiya na? Swe tatuyandi lugwalo lwachizibyo kuli ndinywe na kuzwa kuli ndinywe, mbuli bamwi bantu, nga tulachita obo?
2CO 3:2 Inywe lwanu muli lugwalo lwachizibyo, lulembedwe amyoyo yesu, tulizibikene alimwi akubalwa abantu boonse.
2CO 3:3 Mutondezya kuti mulilugwalo kuzwa kuli Kkilisito, Impindu yamulimu wesu. Te yaka lembwa achilembyo pesi aMuuya waLeza upona. Te yakalembedwe atala abbwe, pesi atala amyoyo yabantu.
2CO 3:4 Alimwi eechi nchichisimizyo nchitujisi kwindila muli Kkilisito kunembo lyaLeza.
2CO 3:5 Tatukwe luzibo muli ndiswe mukwamba nikuba chili mbuli chizwa kulindiswe, pesi kuti luzibo kuzwa kuli Leza.
2CO 3:6 NguLeza wakatuchita twakonzya kuba balanda bachizuminano chitali cha lugwalo pesi chaMuuya, nkaambo luwalo lulajeya, pesi Muuya upa buumi.
2CO 3:7 Lino mulimu wa lufu- wakavundikwa mulugwalo lulamabwe - wakasika muli obu bulemu kuti bana balombe bamuIzilayeli tebakakonzya pe kulangana abusyu bwaMozesi. Echi nkambo kabulemu bwabusyu bwakwe, bulemu bwakali kuzima.
2CO 3:8 Ngabula vula byeni bulemu bwakubeleka bwamuuya mbukuyoba?
2CO 3:9 Nkambo na mulimulimu wakupa mulandu wakalabulemu, mbuvule bwingi bulibyeni buchita mulimu wabululami bukkalila mubulemu!
2CO 3:10 Mukwambisya echo chakali mulichimwi chindi chachitwa chaba abulewe tachichikwe bulemu muchimo echi, nkambo kabulemu obu bwindilila.
2CO 3:11 Nkambo kuti echo chiinda chakali abulewe ngabuloba bwingi bulibyeni bulewe kulichecho chikalilila!
2CO 3:12 Mbuli mbutujisi obu bulangilizi, tulibatakwe kuyowa.
2CO 3:13 Tatuli mboli Mozesi, wakabika chisitikizyo kubusyu bwakwe kuchitila kuti bana ba-Izilayeli tebakakonzya kulangana kumamanino abulemu obu bwakakali kwinda.
2CO 3:14 Pesi miyeyo yabo yakayumisigwa. Nkambo kusika sunu, elyo nibakali kubala chizuminano chipya, echo chisitikizyo chomwe mpuchichili. Takwe nichakagwisigwa pe, nkambo muliKkilisito kupela muchikonzya kugwisigwa.
2CO 3:15 Pesi nikuba sunu elyo kufumbwa Mozesi nabalwa chisitikizyo chivwinika myoyo yabo.
2CO 3:16 Pesi elyo muntu kasandukila kuMwami, chisitikizyo chilagwisigwa.
2CO 3:17 Lino Mwami nguMuuya oko kuliMuuya kulikwangunuka, lino swe toonse katuli abusyu bugwisigile chisitikizyo, tubona bulemu bwaMwami.
2CO 3:18 Tulabukulusigwa kunjila mubulemu bukozyanya bomwe kuzwa kuchibela chomwe chabulemu kunjila mulichimwi mbuli kuzwa kumwami oyo uliMuuya.
2CO 4:1 Nkinkako, nkambo tuli amulimu oyu alimwi mbuli mbutwakatambula luzyalo, tatusiki mukutyompwa.
2CO 4:2 Pesi, twakakkaka nsiswa anzila zyabusu. Tatwendi mububumbwe mpawo tatujati bubi pe ijwi lyaLeza akupedekezya kasimpe, twalizumizya tobeni kuliwonse mbwamvwa kubbazu lyaLeza.
2CO 4:3 Pesi na esu makani avumbwa, avumbidwe kupela kulibabo balimukunyonyoka.
2CO 4:4 Mukambo kabo, baLeza bayeyi nyika bawofwazya ikutasyoma kwamizezo. Nkambo kambubobu, tabakonzyi kubona mumuni wamakani mabotu abulemu bwaKkilisito, ulichikozyanyo chaLeza.
2CO 4:5 Nkambo tatuli lungululi tobeni, pesi KkilisitoJesu mbuliMwami mpawo swebo mbuli babelesi banu nkambo kaJesu.
2CO 4:6 Lino Leza nguwenya wakati, “Mumuni oyu munika mumudima.” Wakatondezya mumyoyo yesu kupa mumuni waluzibo lwabuna Leza mubuliwo bwaJesu Kkilisito.
2CO 4:7 Pesi tuli abuvubi muchibikilo chanongo, Kuchitila kuti kuboneke nguzu zyindilide mpati nzizyaLeza pepe kulindiswe.
2CO 4:8 Twapenzegwa munzila zyoonse, pesi pepe kuzundwa. Twakanyonganisigwa pesi pepe akuzuzigwa akupupulwa.
2CO 4:9 Twapenzegwa pesi pepe kusiyigwa, twakasowelwa pesi pepe kunyonyoka.
2CO 4:10 Lyoonse katubwezede mulindiswe mumibili yalufu lwaJesu, kuchitila kuti bumi bwaJesu alubo bukayubununwe mumibili yesu.
2CO 4:11 Kulindiswe nitupona twakapedekezegwa kulufu nkaambo kaJesu kuchitila kuti buumi bwaJesu buyubununwe mumubili wesu wanyama.
2CO 4:12 Lino lufu luli amilimu mulindiswe pesi buumi buli amilimu mulindinywe.
2CO 4:13 Pesi tuli amuuya omwe walusyomo mbuli echo chakalembedwe: “ Ndasyoma, alubo ndamba.” Alubo tulasyoma aboobo tulamba.
2CO 4:14 Nkambo tulizi oyo wakabusya Mwami Jesu alubo andiswe oyo uyotubusya amwi aJesu mpawo akutweta antomwe mubuliwo bwakwe.
2CO 4:15 Kulizyoonse nkambo kandinywe kuchitila luzyalo kuti lusikile kuliboonse bantu bachite kulumbayizya kuyungizigwe kubulemu bwaLeza.
2CO 4:16 Lino tatwelede kuba batyompwa. Nikuba kuti chanze tulikuswekelwa, chamukati tulabukuluka buzuba abuzuba.
2CO 4:17 Echi chiyezyo mapenzi mawubawuba alikutubambila butamani bundemenene bwabulemu obo bwindilila zyoonse zyelesyo.
2CO 4:18 Lino tatulangililwi kuzintu ezyo zibonwa pesi kuzintu zitabonwi. Zintu ezi nzitubona zilamana, pesi zintu zitabonwi tazimani.
2CO 5:1 Tulizi kuti na nganda yesu yansi chilawu - yamwayisigwa, tulabuyaki kuliLeza. Ninganda itayakwi amaboko abantu pesi nganda itamani, ilikujulu.
2CO 5:2 Nkambo muchilawu echi tulalila kapati, kuti tukasamikwe abukalo bwesu bwakujulu.
2CO 5:3 Tulabulangilila bukkalo obu nkambo na twabusama tatukoyo janika katuli azintanda.
2CO 5:4 Kasimpe nituchili muchilawu echi tulalila kapati akulemenwa. Tatuyandi pe tukaleke kusamikwa. Pesi, tuyanda kusamikwa kuti echo chifwa chikamenegwe abuumi.
2CO 5:5 Watubambila echi chintu nguLeza, wakatupa muuya usalala mbuli chitondezyo cha echo chiyosika.
2CO 5:6 Aboobo amube alusyomo, kuti katuchili kumunzi mumubili, tuli kule aMwami.
2CO 5:7 Nkambo twenda akusyoma pepe akubona.
2CO 5:8 Lino tuli akusyomesesya katutali mumibili pele katuli mumunzi aMwami.
2CO 5:9 Lino twita kuti chibe chintulangilila swebo nekuba tuchiliku munzi nekuba katutali nkuko kuti mukamubotezye.
2CO 5:10 Mbunga toonse tuyoboneka kunembo lyachuno chalubeta chaKkilisito kwitila kuti umwi awumwi utakatambule zilengene azintu zichitwa mumubili na bubotu nekuba bubi.
2CO 5:11 Nekuba boobo, kuziba kuyowa Mwami tukombelezya bantu. Kulabonwa kabotu mbutubede aLeza, ndilangilila kuti kulibabo kumanjezezya anu.
2CO 5:12 Tatuli kwezya lubo kukombelezya ndinywe katuboneka katulibasyomekede pesi tunokumupa makani makani akulidunda atala andiswe, kuti mukabe ansandulo kuli babo balikankayizya atala akuboneka kwabo pesi kakutali mbukubede mumoyo.
2CO 5:13 Na tulizwide mumiyeyo yesu nkukwaLeza; pele na kuti mumiyeyo mibotu nkuyanda kwako.
2CO 5:14 Luyando lwaKkilisito lwatuchunda nkambo twakamanisya echi. Kuti muntu umwi wakafwida boonse aboobo boonse bakafwa.
2CO 5:15 Wakafwida boonse kuti bapona kabatachiponeni lwabo beni pesi baponene oyo nkambo nkako wakabafwida akubusigwa.
2CO 5:16 Ankambo kachechi kuzwa lino kaziya kunembo tatukabwene mumwi mukwinda munyam, nekuba kuti twakali muzi Kkilisito mukwinda munyama. Pesi kwalino tatuchizi.
2CO 5:17 Nkikako na umwi uli muli Kkilisito, waba chilenge chipya. Zintu zyachindi zyayinda. Bona zyaba zipya.
2CO 5:18 Ezi nzitu zyoonse zizwa kuliLez, wakatubwedezya mulinguwe lubo mukwinda muliKkilisito akutipa mulimo wakubwedezyanya.
2CO 5:19 Nkokuti muli Kkilisito leza unolikubwedezyanya nyika kuli nguwe, kutesi kubala milaka ilatala ambaabo. Unokutupa makani akubweedelana.
2CO 5:20 Aboobo twakatondekwa mbuli bayimikilila baKkilisito mbuli anga Leza walikuchita kukombelezya mukwinda mulindiswe.”Twamukumbila, ankambo kwakuyanda kwaKkilisito: Amubwedelane aLeza.”
2CO 5:21 Wakamubumba oyo wakalezi chibi kuti abe chibi kulindiswe, kuti tukabe bululami bwaLeza mulinguwe, kuti abe chibi kulindiswe, kuti tukabe bululami bwaLeza mulinguwe.
2CO 6:1 Mbuli mbutubeleka aamwi anguwe, yulamukumbila kut mutatambuli luzyalo lyaLeza chabiyo.
2CO 6:2 Mbuli mbaamba kuti; “Kuchiindi cheelede ndakakuswiilizya, amubuzuba bwalufutuko ndakakugwasya.” Bona, lino nchiindi cheelede. Bona, lino ndizuba lya lufutuko.
2CO 6:3 Tatukonzyi kubika zilebyo kunembo lyawumwi awumwi, kuchitila kuti milimu yesu itasampawulwi.
2CO 6:4 Ani kuti, munchito zyesu zyoonse tulalitondezya kuti tulibalanda baLeza. Tulibalanda mulukakatilo lupati, mumapenzi, amumakatazyo, amubuyumu,
2CO 6:5 mukuumwa, mukubikwa muntolongo, mulupyopyongano, mukubeleka changuzu, mukubula n'onzi, munzala,
2CO 6:6 mubusalali, muluzibo, kuba aamoyo mulamfu, mubuuya, amuMuuya uusalala, muluyando lwini.
2CO 6:7 Tulibalanda bakwe mujwi lyakasimpe, munguzu zyaLeza. Tulaazilwanyo zyabululami kujanza lyachilisyo alyachimwensi.
2CO 6:8 Tubeleka mubulemu amukunyansigwa, amumpuwo mbi amukulumbayizigwa mbuli balaalweno pesi katuli bakasimpe.
2CO 6:9 Tubeleka mbuli batazibidwe anu kuti tulizidwe kabotu. Tulabeleka mbuli bafwide - bona! - tuchipona. Tubeleka mbuli bali muchisubulo chanchito zyesu pesi mbuli batapedwe mulandu walufu.
