2CO 6:10 Tubeleka mbuki bawuside, pele tulabotelwa chalyoonse. Tubeleka mbuli bafwaba, pele tulokuvuzya buvubi. Tubeleka mbuli batakwe ani kuti tuli azintu zyiingi.
2CO 6:11 Twakaambula kasimpe koonse kulindinywe, nibaKkolinto, alimwi moyo wesu ulaangunukide loko.
2CO 6:12 Teensi musyanikizigilwe aandiswe pe, pele mulilisyanikizizye lwenu mumyoyo yenu.
2CO 6:13 Lino mukwaabilana kweelene - ndamwaambila mbuli bana - andinywe mujule myoyo yenu.
2CO 6:14 Mutasungwi jogwe aantomwe abatali bazumini. Nga bululami bulalyidilana buti abubi? Nga mbulyidilanoonzi buli aakati amumuni amudima?
2CO 6:15 Nchizuminano nzi Kkilisito nchakonzya kuzuminana aBbeliyali? Muzumini ulaatwambo nzi aantomwe awutali muzumini?
2CO 6:16 Ani n'anda yaLeza ijisi chizuminanoonzi amituni? Tuli n'anda yaLeza iipona, mbuli Leza mbaakaamba: “Ndiyookkala aakati kabo akweenda aakati kabo. Ndiyooba Leza wabo, abalabo bayooba bantu bangu.”
2CO 6:17 Aboobo, “Amuzwe aakati kabo, akulitantamuna,” mbwaamba Mwaami. “Mutagumi chintu chitasalali, eelyo ndiyomutambula.
2CO 6:18 Ndiyooba Taata wenu, alimwi muyooba bana bangu balombe abasimbi,” mbwaamba Mwaami Singuzuzyoonse.
2CO 7:1 Nobayandwa, mbukunga tuli aazisyomezyo eezi, muleke tulisalazye tubeni kubusofwazi boonse bwakunyama akumuuya. Amuleke tutobele busalali mukuyowa Leza.
2CO 7:2 Amutupe mweenya! Takwe ngutwabisizya.
2CO 7:3 Takwe nitwakanyonganya muntu. Nkaambo ndakazyaamba kale kuti muli mumyoyo yesu, kuti tufwe aantomwe akuti tupone aantomwe.
2CO 7:4 Ndili aakutayowela kupati mulindinywe, alimwi nkupati kulidunda aatala andinywe. Ndilizwide aluumbuluzyo/. Ndilafwasuka alukondo nikuba mumafwabi eesu.
2CO 7:5 Elyo nitwakasika kuMasedoniya, nyama zyesu tezyakali akulyookezya. Asikuti, twakakatazigwa munzila yoonse akutakkalinkana kunze alubo akuyowa mukati.
2CO 7:6 Pesi Leza, wuumbulizya balaansi, wakatuumbulizya akusika kwaTayitasi.
2CO 7:7 Tekwali kusika kwakwe biyo pe Leza nchaakatuumbulizizya. Alubo chakali alumbuluzyo Tayitasi ndwakatambwide kulindinywe. Wakatwaambila aatala aluyando lwanu, mapenzi anu, alubo chiyandisyo chenu kulindime. Akaako ndakakondelwa kwiindilide.
2CO 7:8 Nikuba kuti lugwalo lwangu lwakamuchita kuti musululwe, takwe nindilipa mulandu pe. Pesi ndakalipa mulandu eelyo nindakabona kuti lugwalo lwangu lwamusuluzya, nikuba kwali kwachiindi chiniini biyo.
2CO 7:9 Lino ndilakondwa, pe pe akaambo kakuti mwakalikatazikene, pesi nkaambo kusululwa kwenu kwakamuleta kukweempwa. Mwakabona kuusa kwabuLeza, kwakuti takwe nimwakasweekelwa pe akambo kandiswe.
2CO 7:10 Nkaambo kuusa kwabuLeza kuleta kweempwa oko kuzuzikizya lufutuko kakutakwe kulipa mulandu. Kuusa kwakunyika, biyeni obo, kuleta lufu.
2CO 7:11 Amubone bupati bwakuyandisisya kwakuuasa kwabuLeza mbubwakaleta mulindinywe. Kwakali kupati biyeni kuyandisisya mulindinywe mukutondeezya kuti tamukwe mulandu. Kwalibupati biyeni kusesemwa kwenu buyofu bwenu, kutaakizya kwenu, bunkutwe bwenu, alubo chiyandisyo chanu kubona kuti kubeleka kabotu makani kweelede kuchitwa.
2CO 7:12 Nikuba kuti ndakalemba kulindinywe, tendakalemba akaambo kasimuchita chibi, na ooyo wakachitilwa chibi, pesi kuti kuyanda kwanu kubotu kulindiswe kuchitwe kuti kuboneke kulindinywe kumenso aLeza.
2CO 7:13 Nkaambo kazeezi mpotusungilizigwa. Mukuyungizya muluumbuluzyo lwesu, twakakondelwa alubo loko nkaambo kalukondo lwaTayitasi, nkaambo muuya wakwe wakabukulusigwa andinywe moonse.
2CO 7:14 Na ndakalikankayizya aatala andinywe, tendakawusigwa nsoni. Mulilumwi lubazu, mbuli zyoonse nzitwakaamba kulindinywe nisimpe, kulikankayizya kwesu aatala andinywe kuliTayitasi zyakaboneka kalili simpe.
2CO 7:15 Luyando lunikide kulindinywe ndupati mbuli nayeya kuswiilila kwenu moonse, mbuli mbumwakamutambula kabotu akuyowa akuzazama.
2CO 7:16 Ndilakondwa nkaambo ndili aakutamuyowela kuzulide.
2CO 8:1 Tuyanda kuziba, bakwesu, aatala aluzyalo lwaLeza lwakapegwa mambungano aaMakkedoniya.
2CO 8:2 Muchiindi chakusunkwa kumasukuusyo mapati, akukondwa kuzulilide, abuchete bwabo bwiindilide bakaba aabuvubi bupati bwabuuya.
2CO 8:3 Elyo ndipa bukamboni kuti bakapa mubwiingi mbuli mbubakali kukonzya, mpawo nikuba kwiindilila mpubakali kukonzya, elyo mukwiindila mukwaangunuka kwabo
2CO 8:4 bakatukombelezya kwamoyo woonse mucheelelo chakwaabana muli ooku kugwasya basalali baLeza.
2CO 8:5 Eechi techakachitika mbuli mbutwakali kulangilila, pesi bakatanguna kulipeda kuMwaami lwabo mpawo akulindiswe mukwiinda mukuyanda kwaLeza.
2CO 8:6 Elyo twakasungwaazya Tayitasi, ooyo wakali watalika kale mulimu ooyu, kuti amninizye kuchita kwaluzyalo oku.
2CO 8:7 Pesi mujatikizye zyoonse - mulusyomo, mukwaambula, muluzibo, mubukozu boonse, muluyando lwenu ndumulaalo kulindiswe. Elyo alubo amubone kuti mwiinkilila kunembo mukuchita luzyalo olu.
2CO 8:8 Tandili kwaamba oobu chakwaangila, pesi, ndaamba oobu kuti ndisunke kunika kwaluyando lwenu mukweelanisya alo kuchiyandisyo chabamwi bantu.
2CO 8:9 Nkaambo mulizi luzyalo lwaMwaami wesu Jesu Kkilisito. Nikuba kuti wakali muvubi wakaba muchete nkaambo kesu, kuchitila kuti mukwiinda mukufwaba kwakwe tube bavubi.
2CO 8:10 Mukaambo aaka ndiyoomupa nchenjezyo iyoomugwasya. Munyaka omwe wiindide tamutalikide biyo kuchita chimwi chintu pesi mwakaaba aachiyandisyo kuti muchichite.
2CO 8:11 Lino amuchimaninsye. Mbuli mbukwakalichiyandisyo akumaninina mukuchichita lino, alubo ngamuchimaninizye mubupati mbumukonzya.
2CO 8:12 Pesi na kolaachiyandisisyo chakuchita inchito eeyi, nchintu chibotu chitambulika. Cheelede kweendelana azintu muntu nzyaleezyo, pe pe kuleezyo nzyatakweezyo.
2CO 8:13 Nkaambo oku takuli mbuli kuubisizya bamwi eelyo kulinduwe kube buyumuyumu. Anu kuti, kweelede kweelana.
2CO 8:14 Ikuzulila kwenu muchiindi eechino kuyoobeetela eezyo nzibayanda. Kuli mbubo akulako kuti buzulile bwabo bumweetele nzimuyanda, eelyo kuti kube kweelana.
2CO 8:15 Chili mbuli mbuchilembedwe: “Ooyo iwakali aazyiingi takwe nzyaakakuchala azyo, mpawo ooyo wakali aziche takwe nakabula.”
2CO 8:16 Pesi kulumba akube kuliLeza, ooyo wakabika muliTayitasi moyo wakulikkataazya aatala abamwi mbuli mbundilaawo kulindinywe.
2CO 8:17 Nkaambo tatambwide buyo chikkumbizyo chesu pesi wakalikkataazya loko kulinzizyo. Wakaaza kulindinywe mukuyanda kwakwe mwini.
2CO 8:18 Twakamutuma aamwi amukwesu uulumbayizigwa mumambungano woonse kumulimu wakwe wakwaambilizya makani mabotu.
2CO 8:19 Kutali eezi azilike, pesi alubo wakasalwa amambungano kuti abe sikweenda awe munyendo anchito eeyi yaluzyalo, ilikweendelezegwa andiswe mubulemu bwaMwaami lwakwe akuyanda kwesu kubotu.
2CO 8:20 Tulikuchitila kuti umwi atakonzyi kutongooka aatala abuuya mbutuyobuchita.
2CO 8:21 Tulabamba mukuchita zilikabotu, kutali kunembo lyaMwaami luzutu pesi akunembo lyabantu lubo.
2CO 8:22 Tulikutuma lubo umwi mukwesu aamwi ambabo. Twakamusunka munzila nyingi mpawo twakajana kali aabukozu kumilimu myiingi. Alubo ulisungweete kapati lino nkaambo kabusichaamba bupati mbwalaabo kulindinywe.
2CO 8:23 Mbuli Tayitasi, ooyu mweenzuma alubo ngusimilimuma kulindinywe. Mbuli kubakwesu, mbeendelezi bamakani kuzwa mumambungano. Eelyo mbulemu kuli Kkilisito.
2CO 8:24 Eelyo amubatondeezye luyando lwenu, alubo amutondeezye mambungano kuti nkaambonzi nitulikankayizya aatala andinywe.
2CO 9:1 Kwambisya milimo yabantu baLeza basalala, twekweelede kuti ndamulembela njiyo pe.
2CO 9:2 Ndilizi atala aziyandisyo zyanu, ezyo nzindakalikankayizya atala andinywe kubantu bakuMakkedoniya. Ndakabaambila kuti Akkaya wakalibambila kuzwa munyaka wayiinda. busungusungu bwanu bwakasungwaazya bayingi kuti bachite mbubonya.
2CO 9:3 Lino ndakatuma bakwesu kuti kulikankayizya kwesu andinywe kutabi kufwisya bweeme akuti mukalibambile, mbuli mbundakamwaambila.
2CO 9:4 Ambweni, kuti baMakkedoniya bamwi ndaza abo akujana kamutalibambilide, ngatuyoofwa bweeme - takukwe nchinga ndilamba atala andinywe - nkaambo ndilikkusikene mulindinywe.
2CO 9:5 Ndakayeya kuti kulikabotu kuti ndisungwaazye bakwesu basike kiulindinywe akuti muzobambilile chipo nchimwakasyomezya. Kuchitila kuti chibambike mbuli chilongezyo, akuti chitabi mbuli chakumusinikizya ped.
2CO 9:6 Ichiliko ncheechi: Ooyo ubuala chakuchesya ulatebula mubuche, ayooyo ubyala chakulangila choolwe ulatebula chilongezyo.
2CO 9:7 Amuleke umwi awumwi ape mbuli kukanza kwamoyo wakwe. Kutali chamunyono na kuti kusinikizigwa. Nkaambo Leza uyanda uupa chalumwemwe.
2CO 9:8 Alimwi Leza ulakonzya kuchita luzyalo loonse kuti lweete kulindinywe ikuti kukabe, muzyiindi zyoonse, muzintu zyoonse, kuti mujane zyoonse nzimuyanda. Eechi chiyooba kuti mukayungizye milimu mibotu.
2CO 9:9 Kuli mbuli mbukulembedwe: “Wakaaba buvubi bwakwe akubupa kubachete. Bululami bwakwe bulapona kwalyoonse.”
2CO 9:10 Ooyo uupa mbuto kubalimi nguubyala alimwi chinkwa chakulya uyoopa akuyungizya mbuto yakubyala. Uyoyungizya butebuzi bwabululami bwako.
2CO 9:11 Muyoovubisigwa munzila zyoonse akuba sibuuya. Eezi ziyooleta kulumba kuliLeza kwiinda mulindiswe.
2CO 9:12 Kukunyampula mulimu ooyu takuli kugwasizya bantu baLeza basalala luzutu pe, pesi alubo kuyooyeta muzintu zyiingi zyakupa Leza zipo.
2CO 9:13 Nkaambo kakweezegwa akwiimikizigwa kwenu amulimu ooyu, alimwi muyoolumbayizya Leza akuswilila kukuzumina makani mabotu aaKkilisito. Muyoolumbayizya Leza alubo azipo nzimuyoobunganisya chalumwemwe kulimbabo akuli wumwi awumwi.
2CO 9:14 Mbibanu, alimwi balikumukombela. Bachita eezi nkaambo kaluzyalo lupati lwaLeza luli alindinywe.
2CO 9:15 Ngalumbwe Leza achipo chakwe chitaambiki!
2CO 10:1 Ime nde Pawulo, lwangu ndamusungilizya, mukulibombya alimwi mubwiime bwaKkilisito. Ndateta chiindi neli anywebo, pesi tandikwe buyofu kulindinywe chiindi netawo.
2CO 10:2 Ndamukumbila kuti, kuchiindi neli anywebo, tandikoyooyowa akwaamba kanzambwene. Pesi ndiyeya kuba akutayowa kuchiindi nchekazya babo bachitaanga tulenda kwiinda munyama.
2CO 10:3 Pele nanka tulenda munyama, tatulwani inkondo kwiinda kunyama.
2CO 10:4 Pele zilwanyonzetulwanya tazili zyanyama. Anukuti, tuli amanguzu mapti ngetumwayisya mampangala mayumu. Zyeeta inkazi zisowa kukazya buyo.
2CO 10:5 Abobo tulamwaya zyoonse zintu zyakujulu zilibusya akukazya luzibo lwaLeza. Tulabweza akwaanga miyeyo yoonse yabuzike kuti iswiilizye Kkilisito.
2CO 10:6 Alimwi twalibambila kupa chisubulo kumichito yakutaswilila, chakufwambana mbuli kuswilizya kwangu mbukuzulide.
2CO 10:7 Langa ziboneka kunembo lyako. Na umwi ulizumide kuti nguwaKkilisito, mbubo aswe mbutubede.
2CO 10:8 Nkaambo na ndalikankayizya bunini kupati atala anguzu zyesu, ezyo Mwaami nzyakatupa kukumuyaka alimwi pepe kumumwaya, nsikoyoofwa nsoni.
2CO 10:9 Nsiyandi kuti kuboneke aanga ndikumuyosya kumugwalo angu.
2CO 10:10 Nkaambo bamwi bantu, “Magwalo akwe alisungwete a changuzu, pele bube bwamubili mbuteteete. Majwi akwe tayeeleli kwaaswilila.”
2CO 10:11 Amuleke bantu baliboobo bazibe kuti nzetubede mumajwi amumagwalo eesu chiindi nitutawo abobo mbutuzoba munchito zyesu anetuliwo.
2CO 10:12 Tatukonzyi kwiinka kule kuyolibunga lwesu na kulyezyanisya lwesu ababo balidundizya lwabo beni. Pesi nibakalyela lwabo beni mumwi mumwi akulyezyanisya lwabo beni akuli umwi awumwi abobo tababoni.
2CO 10:13 Swebo, nchobeni, tatulikankayizyi kwiinda mumweelwe. Anu kuti tuyochita oobo luzutu mweelwe wesu Leza ngwatweelesezya, mweelwe uyosika oko kule nkubede.
2CO 10:14 Nkaambo tatulyoololi lwesu chiindi nchetusika kulindinywe. Twakali batanzi kusika kule kukindinywe amakani mabotu a Kkilisito.
2CO 10:15 Tatulikankayizyi kwiinda kumweelwe wamulimu wabamwi. Anukuti, bulangizi bwesu mbwakuti lusyomo lwenu kaluchiya bukomena, amulimu wesu akati kenu ulakomena kapati.
2CO 10:16 Tulalangila ezi, kuchitila kuti tukakambawuke makani nekuba kuzisi zilikunembo lyanu. Tatulikankayizyi atala a mulimu ulikuchitwa mumasena awumwi.
2CO 10:17 “Pesi muleke uulikankayizya alikankayizye muMwaami.”
2CO 10:18 Nkaambo tensi ooyo ulisala lwakwe nguzuminwa. Anukuti, ngoyo uzumininwa aMwaami.
2CO 11:1 Ndipeekezya kuti ube aandime muli bumwi bufubafuba. Pesi nkasimpe kuti ulaandime!
2CO 11:2 Nkaambo ndili aabbivwe anduwe. Ndikuchitila bbivwe lilaabunaLeza, nkaambo ndakakusyomezya lukwatano kumulumi omwe. Ndakasyomezya kukutondeezya kubantu mbuli nakalindu uumaninide kuli Kkilisito.
2CO 11:3 Pesi ndilikuyowa kuti muliimwi nzila, aawo mubbi sizibi nakeeneena Eva abusongo bwabumpelenge bwakwe, miyeyo yako ikonzya kusweeka kuzwa kukukomba kusinizizye alimwi kusalala kuliKkilisito.
2CO 11:4 Nkaambo kuti umwi muntu wasika wakambawuka uumwi Jesu kwiinda ooyo ngutwakakambawuka. Na kuti mwatambula uumbi muuya kwiinda ngumwakatambula kale kana kuti mwatambula limbi ijwi lisiyene kuli eelyo ndimwakatambula kale. Mbuli mbumukkala kamuzibona zintu eezi!
2CO 11:5 Nkaambo ndiyeya kuti nsili aansi kababo baambwa kuti mbebatumwa bantu loko.
2CO 11:6 Pesi nikuba kuti tendakayiya zyakwaambuula, tachaambi kuti nsikwe luzibo. Muli zyoonse nzila amuzintu zyoonse twakachita kuti eechi chizibwe kulindinywe.
2CO 11:7 Ndakabisya na kulibombya kuchitila kuti musumpulwe? Nkaambo ndakamukambawukilamijwi lyaLeza kakutakwe muulo.
2CO 11:8 Ndakabbida zimwi mbungano mukutambula lugwasyo lwabo kuti ndizoomubelekele.
2CO 11:9 Nindakali aandinywe alimwi nkebulide taakwe ngundakalemezya. Nkaambo nzindakali kuponaazyo zyakali kuzwa kubakwesu ibakwaza kuMasedoniya. Kuli zyoonse ndakalibamba kuti nsibi mukuli kulindinywe, alimwi ndiyochita mbubo lyoonse.
2CO 11:10 Mbuli simpe lyaKkilisito mbulili mulindime, ooku kupakala kwangu takukoyoowumuzigwa pe muli amwi masena aaku Akkayiya.
2CO 11:11 Nkaambonzi? Nkaambo nsimuyandi pe? Leza nguuzi.
2CO 11:12 Alimwi nzichita ndiyoyinkilila kunembo akuzichita, kuchitila kuti ndikagonke mweenya wababo bayanda mweenya wakujanika kabali mbuli ndiswe muzintu nzibalidundiizya aatala anzizyo.
2CO 11:13 Nkaambo bantu baliboobu mbatumwa babeji alimwi mbabelesi balaalweeno. Balyeena kuti mbatumwa baKkilisito.
2CO 11:14 Alimwi eezi tazigambyi pe, nkaambo alakwe Satani ulyeena kuti mungelo wa mumuni.
2CO 11:15 Tachili chigambyo chipati pe kuti abalabo babelesi bakwe balyeena kuti mbabelesi ba bulumami. Impindu yabo iyooba eezyo zyeendelana amilimo yabo.
2CO 11:16 Ndilaamba alimwi: Takubi muntu uyeya kuti ndili chifubafuba. Pesi kuti mboyeya, munditambule mbuli chifubafuba kuchitila kuti ndipakale buniini.
2CO 11:17 Nzindilikwaamba akupakala ooku kwakudundula - nsili kwaambuula munzila njali kunowambuula aayo pe Mwaami - njindili kuti mbuli chifubafuba.
2CO 11:18 Mbuli kuti bantu biingi bapakala zyeendelana anyama, ambebo ndiyoopakala.
2CO 11:19 Nkaambo mulabotelwa kubaamwi abantu bafubafuba. Inywe lwenu muli basongo!
2CO 11:20 Nkaambo muntu umuchita bazike, na wamunyonyoona, wamulya maanu, walisumpula, na kuti wamusinka lubayi kumenso.
2CO 11:21 Ndiyowamba kumawuse eesu kuti twakalilekelela loko akuchita oobo. Anu kuti umwi muntu wapakala - Ndili kwaambula mbuli chifubafuba - Ambebo ndilapakala.
2CO 11:22 Mba Hibbulu na? Ambebo mbebede. Mba Izilayeli na? Ambebo mbebede. Mba mazyalane aa Abbulahamu na? Ambebo mbebede.
2CO 11:23 Mbabelesi baKkilisito na? (Ndili kwaambula anga ndapenga.) Ndiliinda aawo: kumilimu miyumu, muntolongo nyingi, mukuumwa kwiindilide, mukuswanana antenda nyingi ziyosya.
2CO 11:24 Kuzwa kubaJuda ndakatambula tuli musanu “kunabbwa myoondo makumi one kakugwisigwa omwe.”
2CO 11:25 Tutatu ndakawumwa atulamu. Lumwi nketululwa mabwe. Tutatu nkezapukilwa bwaato. Ndakakkala busiku azuba lyomwe aantanganana mulwizi.
2CO 11:26 Ndakeenda twiingi nketentuuka milonga, nketentuuka bajayi, nketentuuka kubantu bakulindiswe, nketentuuka kuli bamasi, nketentuuka mugunzi, nketentuuka mulusaka, nketentuuka kulwizi, nketentuuka kuli bakwesu babeji.
2CO 11:27 Ndakabeleka mubuzike akoomba, mumansiku miingi akatali koonwa, munzala amunyota, twiingi kelyimya, mumpeyo amuchintanda.
2CO 11:28 Kusiya kuli zyoonse zimwi, kuli kupengaana kwangu mazuba woonse nkeyeeya aatala ambungano zyoonse.
2CO 11:29 Ngwani utakwe nguzu alimwi ime nsibulide nguzu? Ngwani wadadalisigwa, alimwi ime nsipyi?
2CO 11:30 Kuti keyelede kupakala, ndiyopakala aatala azezyo zitondeezya kutasima kwangu.
2CO 11:31 Leza alimwi Wisi waMwaami Jesu, ooyo wakalongezegwa kutamani, ulizi kuti nsili kubeja pe!
2CO 11:32 Ku Damasikkasi, imuleli munsi lyaMwaami Aletasi wakali kulinda gunzi lyaDamasikkasi kuti andisunge.
2CO 11:33 Pesi ndakaselezegwa muchizuma kuzwa kumpulunguzyo yabulambo, alimwi ndakafutuka kuzwa kumaboko aakwe.
2CO 12:1 Njelede kuli dundizya, nikuba kuti tachigwasyi. Pesi ndilaya kuzilengaano aziyubunuzyo zizwa kuMwaami.
2CO 12:2 Kuli mwaalumi umwi ngundizi muliKkilisito oyo minyaka iili kumi ayine yakayiinda - wakali mumubili tandizi pe, Leza nguuzi - wakatolwa kujulu lyatatu.
2CO 12:3 Alimwi ndilizi kuti oyu mwaalumi - naa muumubili, kanakuti kunze aamubili tandizi pe, Leza nguuzi -
2CO 12:4 wakatolwa kubusena bwakulyookezya nkwakaakumvwa majwi aatambiki alimwi tachili mumulawu kuti bantu baawambe.
2CO 12:5 Mukuyiminina muntu uuli oobo ndali dundiizya. Pesi ime ime nkelyiimvwilidi lwangu nsikolidundilizya pe, ado biyo aatalaakubula nguzu kwangu.
2CO 12:6 Na kuti ndasla kulidundiizya, nsikoba chifubafuba, nkaambo ndinoli nkengamba kasimpe. Pesi ndilatantamuka kukuli dundiizya, kuchitila kuti kutabi uumwi undiyeeyela atala loko kwinda ezyoo nzyabona mulindime na kuti nzyamvwa kuzwa kuli ndime.
2CO 12:7 Mukundigwaysa kuti nditalisumpuli nkaambo kakukwiindilila kwabupati bwaziyubunuzyo, ndakapegwa buumvwa munyama, kuti mutumwa wasatani andipenzye kuchitila kuti nditali sumpuli.
2CO 12:8 Ndakakkombelezya Mwami tutatu aatala acheechi, kuti achigwisye kuzwa kulindime.
2CO 12:9 Pesi wakati kulindime, “ Luzyalo lwangu aalinduwe lulizulide, nkaambo nguzu zilazulizigwa mukubula nguzu.” Aboobo inga chilabota loko kulidundiizya aatala akubula nguzu kwangu, kuchitila kuti nguzu zyaKkilisito zikale aali ndime.
2CO 12:10 Aboobo, ndilakutisika nkaambo kaKkilisito mukubula nguzu, muzisapi, mukupenzegwa, amuzyiimo zityompya. Awo nesikwe nguzu mpimpawo mpelaanguzu.
2CO 12:11 Ndaba chifubafuba! Ndinywe mwakandisyanikizya kuchita oobu, nkaambo ndakeelede kulumbayizigwaa andinywe. Nkaambo teenzi ndakali muniini pe kulaabo bateegwa mbatumwa bapati, nikuba kuti nsili chintu.
2CO 12:12 Zitondeezyo zyakasimpe zyamutumwa zyakachitwa aakati kanu akukakatila koonse, zitondeezyo, azigambyo amaleele.
2CO 12:13 Ino mwakacheya biyeni kubupati kwiinda mbungano zyoonse, kunze kwakuti teensi ndakali mukkulikuli ndinywe? Mundilekelele mukubisya ooku!
2CO 12:14 Mulange! ndilibambilide kuza kuli ndinywe ilwatatu. Nsikozooba mukkuli kulindinywe, nkaambo nsiyanduuli zyenu. Ndiyanda ndinywe. Nkaambo bana tabeelede kuyobwenda bana.
2CO 12:15 Chakubotelwa inga ndila maninsya lubono lwangu akumana ime lwangu nkemaninina myuya yanu. Nankemuyanda loko, ino ime ndiyandwe buniini na?
2CO 12:16 Mbuuli mbukubede takwe nindaka mulemezya pe. Pesi nkaambo ndilimuchenjezu loko, ndime ndakamujata chalweeno.
2CO 12:17 Ani ndakalya maanu na kwindila kuli baabo mbindakatuma kuli ndinywe?
2CO 12:18 Ndakasungwazya Tayitasi kuti ayinke kuli ndinywe, alimwi ndakatuma uumwi mukwesu kuti amusindikile. Ani Tayitasi wakamulya maanu na? Teetwakenda mumuuya omwe na? Teetwakakeenda mumuuyaomwe na? Teetwakeenda muntambo zyomwe na?
2CO 12:19 Ani muyeeya kuti echi chiindi choonse twakali kulikwabilila kuli ndinywe? Mumenso aaLeza, nomuyandw, muliKkilisito twali kwamba zyoonse katuzyambula kusimisigwa kwanu.
2CO 12:20 Ndiyoowa kuti ndaza amwi nsiko zoomujana mbuui mbepeekezya. Ndiyowa kuti amwi tamukozoondijana mbuli mbumupeekezya. Ndiyowa kuti amwi kunoli kukkazyania, bbivwe kunyemezya, kusaluulana kuninaania, kuvwiya, bulutiluti akutabambika kabotu.
2CO 12:21 Ndiyoowa kuti ndaboola Leza wangu uyoondibombya kunembo lyenu. Ndiyoowa kuti amwi ndizoowusa nkaambo kabwiingi bwabaabo bakabisya kale kabateempedwe pe kubusofwaazi abusangu alimwi akwemuzya kusofweede nkubakachita.
2CO 13:1 Aaka nkachitatu aawo kandilikuza kulindinywe. “Kaambo koonse keelede kwaambuulwa kakali aabazi chakchitika babili nikuba batatu bakamboni.”
2CO 13:2 Ndakaamba kale kulibaabo bakabisya chiindi alimwi akuli boonse nindakali nkuko kwachibili, alimwi ndaamba lubo: Ndazooza lubo, tandikozoobalekelela pe.
2CO 13:3 Ndamwaambila eechi nkaambo mulikuyanduula bukamboni bwakuti Kkilisito uliikwaambula mukwiinda mulindime. Tawongedwe pe kulindime. Anukuti ulaanguzu mpati mulindinywe.
2CO 13:4 Nkabela wakabambuula mukukompama, pesi tuyoopona anguwe anguzu zyaLeza akati kanu.
2CO 13:5 Amulilingule lwanu kuti mubone na muli mulusyomo. Mulisunke lwaenu. Tamuyeyi eechi na aatala alwanu, kuti Jesu Kkilisito uli mulindinywe? - kunze akuti, iyi, mwakakachilwa musunko.
2CO 13:6 Alimwi ndili aabulangilizi bwakuti muyooyeya kuti tatukachidwe pe musunko.
2CO 13:7 Lino twakomba kuliLeza kuti mutakayiti chibi pe. Tandikombeli kuti pe tukalibonye akuzunda musunko. Anukuti ndikomba kuti mukachite chilikabotu, nikuba ngatulalibonya mbuli bakakachilwa musunko.
2CO 13:8 Nkaambo tatukonzyi pe kuchita nikuba chimwi chintu chilwana akasimpe, pesi buyo kwakasimpe.
2CO 13:9 Nkinkaako tulakondwa na katukompeme alimwi kamusimide. Tuliikukomba lubo kuti mubambwe zizulide.
2CO 13:10 Ndilemba zintu eezi kandili kule andinywe kuchitila kuti na kandili aandinywe nditazoochiti zyalunyemo andinywe mukubelesya cheelelo changu - eecho Mwaami nchakandipa kuchitila kuti ndimuyake, pe pe kumunyonyoona.
2CO 13:11 Kumamaninsizyo, bakwesu, mukondwe! Mubelekele kuchitululwa, amusungwaazigwe, muzuminane, mukkale muluumuno. Alimwi Leza waluyando aluumuno uyooba aandinywe.
2CO 13:12 Mujuzyanye alumyonto lusalala.
2CO 13:13 Bantu basalali boonse baLeza balamujuzya.
2CO 13:14 Luzyalo lwaMwaami Jesu Kkilisito, luyando lwaLeza, alimwi bulyidilano bwa Muuya Uusalala bukabe aandinywe moonse.
GAL 1:1 Pawulu, mutumwa - uutali mutumwa uzwa kubantu naanka kwiinda mumilimo yabantu, pesi kwiindilila muli Jesu Kkilisito mpawo a Leza Taata, oyo wakamubusya kuzwa kubafu -
GAL 1:2 mpawo aboonse balombe bali andime, muzibunga zyaku Galantiya:
GAL 1:3 Luzyalo kulindinywe mpawo aluumuno luzwa kuli Leza taatesu mpawo a Mwami Jesu Kkilisito,
GAL 1:4 Wakalipeda lwakwe kuzibi zyesu kuchitilakuti atwaangunune kuzwa kububi bwalino, kwiinda mukuyanda kwa Leza wesu mpwao a Taata,
GAL 1:5 Kulinguwe akube bulemu kwalyoonse alyoonse. Amen.
GAL 1:6 Ndagamba kuti mulikubweeda achakufwambana kuzwa kulinguwe wakamwiita muluzyalo lwa Kkilisito. Ndagamba kuti wasandukila kumakani asiyene,
GAL 1:7 teensi kuti kulaambi makani, Pesi kulibamwi bantu bayanda kumuchitila mapenzi a Kkilisito
GAL 1:8 Pesi nikubakuti swe naa mungelo uuzwa kujulu walikukambawuka kulinduwe makani aatali mbuli aya ngitwakali kukambawuka kulindinywe, ngabe mutuke.
GAL 1:9 Mbuli mbutwamba kumatalikilo, mpawo lino ndaamba lubo, “naa umwi wakambawuka kulindinywe makani aatali mbuli ngimwakatambula, ayo ngabe mutuke.”
GAL 1:10 Sa lino ndikulanguula buuya bwamuntu nanka bwa Leza? Saa ndikulangula kuboteezya muntuma? kuti nkecheezya kubotezya muntu, nsichili mulanda waKkilisito.
GAL 1:11 Mbuli mbiyanda kuti muzibe, nobakwesu, kuti makani ngindakambawuka teensi aamuntu.
GAL 1:12 Teensi ndakatambula kuzwa kumuntu naba oomwe naanka kuyiisigwa. Nikuba boobo, kwakalikwinda muchiyubunuzyo cha Jesu Kkilisito kulindime.
GAL 1:13 Mwakamvwa ataata akupona kwangu mutunsiyansiya twaba Juda, mbuli mbundakapenzya mbungano zya Leza kuzwa mubwelede mpawo ndalikwezya kuzimwaya.
GAL 1:14 Ndakakkomena muchanza chamuJuda bwindilide kubiingi oboo bakali beselalyangu, kuzwa kubantu bangu. Obu mbubo bwindilide bwechiyandisyo nchindakali aacho kuchaanza chabamataata.
GAL 1:15 Pesi elyo nakandibikka kumbali kuzwa muda lyabaama, mpawo ooyo wakandiita kwiinda muluzyalo lwakwe,
GAL 1:16 wakabotelwa akutondezya mwanakwe mulindime, kuchitila kuti ndikakkambawuke akati kabamaasi, Teenda kabukakubuzya aamubili abulowa.
GAL 1:17 Teensi ndakayinka ku Jelusalema kuli baabo bakali batumwa kunembo lyangu. Kwinda kuchita oobu, ndakayinka ku Alabbiya mpawo ndaboola ku Damasikkasi.
GAL 1:18 Alimwi nikwakiinda minyaka yotaatwe ndakayinka ku Jelusalema kuti nkazibe Sifasi mpawo ndakakukkala anguwe mazuba aalikkumi amusanu.
GAL 1:19 Pesi takwe mutumwa ngwindakabona kunze kwa Jemusi, mwanike wa Mwami.
GAL 1:20 Kulizezi nzindalemba kulindinywe, ndasyomezya kunembo lya Leza kuti nsilikubeja pe.
GAL 1:21 Mpawo ndakayinka kuchisi cha Siliya aku Silisiya.
GAL 1:22 Teensi ndakalizibidwe kumenso akumambungano aku Judaya ali muli Kkilisito.
GAL 1:23 Bakazimvwa biyo kazilikwambwa, “mwalumi wakali kutupenzya lino ngulikukambawuka makkani mabotu aa lusyomo ndwakali kwezya kumwaya.”
GAL 1:24 Mpawo bakalemeka Leza nkambo kangu.
GAL 2:1 Nikwakinda myaka kkumi ayiine ndakabweda ku Jelusalema a Bbanabbasi, ndakabweza Tito alakwe.
GAL 2:2 Ndakinka nkambo kachiyubunuzyo akubapandulwida makani ngindakali kukambawuka akati kabamaasi. Ndakambula kunsiswa abalemekeka, kuti ndibe akanzambwenene kuti kuchijana - teendakachijana- chabuyo.
GAL 2:3 Asi nekuba kuti Tito wakali andime awakali mu Giliki, bakasungilizya kupalulwa.
GAL 2:4 Bakwesu babeji bakaza munsiswa kuzolingula lwangunuko ndutulalo muli Kkilisito Jesu. Bakali kuyanda kutuchita bazike.
GAL 2:5 Pesi tetwaka zumina kulibombya kulimbabo muchiindi chinini, kuchitila kuti simpe lyamakani mabotu likkalilile mulindinywe.
GAL 2:6 Asikulabo balikulangila kulemekwa ( kufumbwa mbubakabede takwe nichamba chintu kulindime, Leza talangilili chiimo) -abo, ndati, abo bakalikulangika nkabalemekeka tabayungizizye chintu kulindime.
GAL 2:7 Musiyano, bakazobona kuti ndakapegwa makani mabotu kulabo batapalwidwe, mbokunga Pita wakapegwa makani mabotu kulaabo bapalwidwe.
GAL 2:8 Nkambo Leza, wakabeleka kuli Pita kubutumwa kulibabo bapalwidwe, wakabeleka kulindime kulibamaasi.
GAL 2:9 Awo Jemusi, Kkefasi a Joni, abo bakali minsemu, bakabona luzyalo ndundakapegwa, bakamuzuminina Bbanabbasi ambebo. Bakatuzuminina kuti twiinke kuli bamaasi ambabo bayekulabo bapallwidwe.
GAL 2:10 Bakakumbila kutituyeeye bachete, nchintu nchindakalibambilide kuchita.
GAL 2:11 Asi Kafasi nakasika ku Antiyoki, ndakamukazya kumeso akwe nkambo wakalijana kalamulandu.
GAL 2:12 Nkabatanasika balumi bakazwide kuli Jemusi, Kkefasi wakali abamaasi. Pesi nibakasika balum, wakaleka wakalisosolosya kulibamaasi. Wakayoowa abobakali kuyandisisya bupalule.
GAL 2:13 Abobo boonse bamaJuda bakanjilana awe mukuwupawupa. Nikuba Bbanabbasi wakapambuka abo mukuwupawupa kwabo.
GAL 2:14 Pesi nindakababona kuti kuchita kwabo takuli kwakutobela simpe lyamakani mabotu pe, Ndakati kuli Kkefasi kunembo lyabo boonse, “Kuti nkoli mu Juda nkoli kupona mbuli muJuda, ulalangila biyeni bamaasi kuti bapone mbuli bama Juda?”
GAL 2:15 Iswetubeni tuli maJuda mukuzyalwa pepe bamaasi basizibi,
GAL 2:16 Eno tulizi kuti takwe muntu ululamikwa amilimu yamulawu pesi kulusyomo muli Kkilisito Jesu. Iswe twakasyoma muli Kkilisito Jesu ikuti tululamikwe a lusyomo muli Kkilisito kutali kwamilimo yamulawu. Kumilimo yamulawu takwe nyama iyolulamikwa.
GAL 2:17 Pesikuti twayanda kululamikwa muli Kkilisito, iswebo tuyojanwa nkatuli basizibi, lino Kkilisito mubelesi wabasizibi?
GAL 2:18 Kuti nkelikuyakulula zintu nzindaka mwayide, ndili tondezya kuti ndichili sikutyola mulawu.
GAL 2:19 Kambo kwinda kumulawo ndakafwa kumulawo, kuti ndiponene Leza
GAL 2:20 Ndakabambulwa antomwe a Kkilisito, Takucheensi ndime upona, asikuti Kkilisito ngupona mulindime. Ibuumi lino mbwendipona munyama ndapona mulusyomo mumwana a Leza, Oyo wakandiyanda wakapelida kambo kangu.
GAL 2:21 Nsibikide kumbali luzyalo lwa Leza, ikuti bululami bwalikujanwa kwinda mumuulo, unoli Kkilisito wakafwida chabuyo!
GAL 3:1 Nibana Galatiya nobafubafuba! Ngwani wakamulowa? Kunembo lyamenso enu Jesu Kkilisitu wakatondeezegwa mbuli mbakabambuulwa.
GAL 3:2 Echi nchicho chintu chimwi nchindiyanda kwiiya kuzwa kulindinywe: Mwakatambula Muya na kuzwa kumilimu yamulawu na kuzwa kukusyoma nzimwakamvwa?
GAL 3:3 Mulibafubafuba oobu? Kamunoli mwatanguna aMuya, muyomaninsya munyama na?
GAL 3:4 Mwakafwaba na muzintu zyiingi chabuyo - na mwakachita chabuyo?
GAL 3:5 Ooyo uupa Muya kulindinywe akuchita maleele akati kenu ulazichita kwiinda mumulawu na kana mukumvwa chalusyomo?
GAL 3:6 Mbuli Abbulahamu “mbakasyoma Leza alimwi zyakayesyanisigwa mbuli musalali kulinguwe,”
GAL 3:7 munzila njiyo eyi, mumvwisisisye, lino, kuti mbalusyomo aabo biitwa kuti mbana baAbbulahamu.
GAL 3:8 Malembe mbuli mbaalangililidwe kuti Leza uyolulamika baMasi alusyomo, wakakambawuka kale makani mabotu kuli Abbulahamu, kati, “Mulinduwe masi woonse ayolongezegwa.”
GAL 3:9 Nkinkaako, aabo balusyomo balalongezegwa aantomwe aAbbulahamu, muntu walusyomo.
GAL 3:10 Aabo boonse baponena kumilimu yamulawu balitukidwe; alubo kuli lembedwe, “Ulitukidwe ooyo woonse uutatobelezyi zyoonse zilembedwe mubbuku lyamulawu, akuzichita.”
GAL 3:11 Lino zili aantanganana kuti takukwe muntu uululamikwa kunembo lyaLeza amulawu, nkambo baluleme bayoopona chalusyomo.
GAL 3:12 Pele mulawu teensi walusyomo, pesi, “Muntu uuchita milimu yamulawu weelede kuponena njiyo.”
GAL 3:13 Kkilisito wakatuunununa kuzwa kulutuko lwamulawu mukuba lutuko lwesu - nkambo kulilembedwe, “Ulitukidwe woonse uulengelela mumusamu” -
GAL 3:14 kuti chilongezyo chaAbbulahamu kusikile baMasi muliKkilisito Jesu, kuchitila kuti alusyomo tukonzye kutambula chisyomezyo chaMuya.
GAL 3:15 Bakwesu, muleke ndaambe mubuntu. Muchizuminano chabambwa abantu, tawope muntu unga ulachibika kumbali na kuyungizizya kulinchicho, na chayimikwa amulawo.
GAL 3:16 Lino zisyomezyo zyakaambwa kuli Abbulahamu akulunyungu lwakwe. Tachaambi kuti, “ku lunyungu” kwaamba biingi, pesi kuliwumwi biyo, “alimwi kulunyungu lwakwe,” kali Kkilisito.
GAL 3:17 Lino nchewamba ncheechi: Mulawu, wakasika kakuli kwiinda myaaka ili myanda iine ili a makkumi aatatu, tiibiki kunze pe chizuminano chakabambwa aLeza.
GAL 3:18 Nkaambo na lukono kaluza akambo kamulawu, nkokuti taluchizi achisyomezyo. Pele Leza wakachipa Abbulahamu chalusyomo.
GAL 3:19 Ninzi mpo, ugwasya nyamayi mulawu? Wakayungizigwa akambo kazibi, kusikila lunyungu lwaAbbulahamu lwasika kuliwooyo wakapegwa chisyomezyo. Mulawu wakabikwa mukubeleka kwiinda mubangelo mumanza aasimwaama aakati.
GAL 3:20 Lino simwima aakati zyaamba zyiinda muntu womwe, pele Leza ngumwi.
GAL 3:21 Akaako mulawu ulakazyanya na azisyomezyo zyaLeza? Chanchobeni pe! Na mulawu wakali wapegwa kuti upe bumi, akaako bululami chanchoonzyo ninga bwakasika a mulawu.
GAL 3:22 Pele malembe akabika zyoonse zyachibi muntolongo. Leza wakazichita ezi kuti chisyomezyo chakutufutula muli Jesu Kkilisito chikakonzye kupegwa kulibaabo basyoma.
GAL 3:23 Lino kalutanasika lusyomo, twakalijiswi mubwange bwamulawu, katwaangidwe kusikila lusyomo lyayubununwa.
GAL 3:24 Aboobo mulawu wakatubeda mwiiminini kusikila Kkilisito wasika, kuchitila kuti tukonzye kululamikwa mulusyomo.
GAL 3:25 Pele lino mukuti lusyomo lyakasika, tatuchili mumaboko a mwiiminini.
GAL 3:26 Nkaambo nywebo moonse muli bana baLeza kwiinda mulusyomo muli Kkilisito Jesu.
GAL 3:27 Nkaambo mbuli biingi benu mbubakabbabbatisigwa muli Kkilisito, mwakatambula Kkilisito.
GAL 3:28 Takukwe muJuda na muGiliki, takukwe muzike na waangunukide, takukwe mwalumi na mwanakazi, nkaambo mulibamwi muli Kkilisito Jesu.
GAL 3:29 Alimwi na kamuli baKkilisito, zyaamba kuti muli lunyungu lwa Abbulahamu, abasikukona mbuli muchisyomezyo.
GAL 4:1 Ndaamba aya kuli sikulyalukono, kuciindi nowakacilimwana, takwe kusiyana amuzike, asikoli mwanibusena boonse.
GAL 4:2 Pele kali munsi abuzuluzi abwendelezi kusikila kuciindi cakabikwa a wisi.
GAL 4:3 Mbubonya nitwakachili bana, twakali mubuzike kumalengelo, akumulawu wayeyi nyika.
GAL 4:4 Asi ciindi nichakasika, Leza wakatuma mwana wakwe, wakazyalwa kumwanakazi, wazyalwa aansi amulawu.
GAL 4:5 Wakachita oobo kukunununa aabo balikuunsi amulawu, kuti tukatambulwe mbuli bana.
GAL 4:6 Nkambo kakuti muli bana, Leza wakatuma mumyoyo yesu muuya wamwana wakwe, ngutwiita kuti, “Abba, Taata.”
GAL 4:7 Aboobo tochili muzike, asi mwana, alimwi mbuli mboli mwana, waba sikulyalukono lwa Leza.
GAL 4:8 Asi kuciindi echo, nchiwakatalina kuziba Leza, wakali mubuzike bwayooyo, utajisi bu Leza bwinibwini.
GAL 4:9 Pesi bwalino mwakaziba Leza, nkambonzi mwabweda kuzichito zitete zitagwasyi zyamalengelo amulawu? Muchiyanda kuba mubuzike lubo na?
GAL 4:10 Mulalangisisya mazuba amyeezi mipya azyiindi aminyaka!
GAL 4:11 Ndamuyowela kuti amwi milimo yangu njindaka mubelekela yaba yabuyo.
GAL 4:12 Ndamukumbila, bakwesu, amube mbulindime, nkambo ambebo ndaba mbuli ndinywe. Takwe nimwa ndibisizya.
GAL 4:13 Aboobo mulizi kuti kambo kabulwazi bwanyama nkindakamukambawukila ijwi chiindi chitaanzi.
GAL 4:14 Nekuba kuti nyama yangu yamunjizya mumisunko, takwe nimwa ndiwabasya na kundikaka. Pele mwakanditambula mbali angelo wa Leza.
GAL 4:15 Lulikuli lulongezyo lwanu? Mbuli mbundi lungulula kulindinywe kuti, ansinga zyalikukonzeeka, kamunonkoola meso anu kamwapa ndime.
GAL 4:16 Nekubobo inga ndaba sinkondonyokwe nkabo kakumwambila kasimpe?
GAL 4:17 Balisungwete kuyanda kukona, Asi katakwe mpindu mbotu,. Bayanda kumumuuzya akuti musungwalile mbabo.
GAL 4:18 Nchibotu lyoonse kusungwalila bubotu bulampindu, kutaamba neli anywe kupelape.
GAL 4:19 Na twana twangu, lubo ndabamumachise akutumbuka ado Kkilisito abumbwe mulindinywe.
GAL 4:20 Ndilombozya kuba akati kanu lino akuchincha mambwido angu, nkamo mwandigambya.
GAL 4:21 Amundambile inywe nimuyanda kuba aansi amulawo, temwakumvwa mulawu?
GAL 4:22 Nkambo kulilembedwe kuti Abbulahamu kajisi bana balombe bobile, omwe kali mwana wamusimbi muzike awomwe kali mwana wamwanakazi uwakangunukide.
GAL 4:23 Omwe wakazyalwa kumusimbi muzike nkambo kanyama, asi umwi wakazyalwa kumwanakazi uwakangunukide kwinda muchisyomezyo.
GAL 4:24 Ezi zilapandulula kaaano kachiindi kuti banakazi aba bobile bayiminina zizuminano zyobile. Omwe wabo wakali kuzwa kuchilundu cha Sinayi abobo wakazyala bana mubuzike. Oyu ngu Hagayi.
GAL 4:25 Lino Hagayi uyiminina chilundu cha Sinayi mu Alabbiya; aboobo uyiminina bubebwa Jelusalema, nkali mubuzike abana bakwe.
GAL 4:26 Pele Jelusalemu uulikujulu ulangunukide, nkambo ngonguwe baama.
GAL 4:27 Nkambo kulilembedwe kuti, “Amusekelele, nywebo nongoomwa nimuyazyali; kkwila akutambwiizya kwalukondo, wenotali koomba amachise abutumbu; nkambo bana bayooyo utakwetwe mbiingi kwinda bamwanakazi ula mulumi.”
GAL 4:28 Asi nywebo, bakwesu, mbuli Izaka, mulibana bachisyomezyo.
GAL 4:29 Kuchiindi echo ooyo wakazyalwa kunyama wakapenzyaoyo wakazyalwa kumuuya. Mbukubede alino.
GAL 4:30 Pele malembe atyeni? “Taanda musimbi muzike amwana wakwe. Nkambo mwana wamusimbi muzike takonzyi kwabana lukono amwana wamwanakazi walwangunuko,”
GAL 4:31 Aboobo, bakwesu, tatuli bana bamusimbi muzike pe, tulibana bamwanakazi walwangunuko.
GAL 5:1 Mulwaangunuko Kkilisito wakatwaangununa. Amwiime nji, alimwi, mutakabikwi limbi mubweendelezi bwa moyo wabuzike.
GAL 5:2 Amubone, me, ndePawulo, ndamwaambila kuti na muntu wazuminina kuti apalulwe, Kkilisito takwe mbayomupa mpindu nikuba kutyeni.
GAL 5:3 Ndipa bukamboni lubo kumwaalumi woonse uuzuminina kupalulwa kuti unoli weeela kutobelezya mulawu woonse.
GAL 5:4 Wagwisigwa kuli Kkilisito, iwebo notazosalazigwe a mulawu; tokojana limbi luzyalo.
GAL 5:5 Nkaambo kwiinda muMuya, chalusyomo, tulalindila chalusinizyo bulangilizi bwabululami.
GAL 5:6 Muli Kkilisito Jesu uupalwide naba utapalwide takwe nchaamba pe, pesi biyo lusyomo lubeleka muluyando.
GAL 5:7 Mwakali kweenda kabotu. Ngwani wakamukachizya kutobela kasimpe?
GAL 5:8 Olu lweeno taluzwi kuli wooyo wakamwiita!
GAL 5:9 Busweezyo buche bulaluzya nongo yoonse.
GAL 5:10 Ndili abusichichaamba muMwami kuti tamukoyoyeeya zimbi zisiyene. Ooyo uli kumupenzya uyoofwaba mulubeta, nikuba kuti ngwani.
GAL 5:11 Bakwesu, na kandichaambula aazyabupalulwe, nkaambonzi nenchiyobupenzegwa? Mukuba oobo chilebyo chachiingano chagwisigwa.
GAL 5:12 Kuli kulibaabo balikumupenzya, ndipeekezya kuti balizibe lwabo!
GAL 5:13 Nkaambo mwakayitwa kulwaangunuko, bakwesu. Pele mutabelesyi lwaangunuko lwenu mbuli mweenya wazyanyama; anikuti kwiinda muluyando amugwasyanye awumwi awumwi.
GAL 5:14 Nkaambo mulawu woonse ulizuzikizigilwe mumulawo womwe; mukuti “Weelde kuyanda simayakilanwi wako mbuli mbuliyanda webo nomwini.”
GAL 5:15 Pele na mwalumana akulyana, amuchenjele kuti mutakamanani.
GAL 5:16 Pele ndati, amweenda chaMuya alimwi tamukoyozuzikizya ziyandisyo zyenyama.
GAL 5:17 Nkaambo ziyandisyo zyenyama zilalwana aMuya, alimwi ziyandisyo zyaMuya zilalwana anyama. Nkaambo ezi zilalwana chimwi achimwi, kuti mutachiti chintu nchimuyanda.
GAL 5:18 Pele na mwazulwidwa aMuya tamuli munsi lyamulawu pe.
GAL 5:19 Lino milimu yenyama ilalitondezya: busofwazi muli zyamalalani, busofwazi, inkosya,
GAL 5:20 kukomba mituni, busondi, kanyetunyetu, inkondo, ibbivwe, kufwambana kubijilwa, inkazi, inkazyanyo, kwaanzana,
GAL 5:21 kubijilwa, bukolwi, mapobwe akukolwa, azimwi ziliboobu. Ndamuchenjezya, mbuli mbundakamuchenjezezye kale lutanzi, kuti aabo bachita zintu ezi tabakoyookonzya kunjila mubwami bwaLeza.
GAL 5:22 Pele michelo yaMuya nduyando, lukondo, lumuno, bulindizi, buuya, bubotu, lusyomo,
GAL 5:23 bubombe, alimwi akulijata; aatala azezi zintu tuuwo pe mulawu.
GAL 5:24 Aabo bali muli Kkilisito Jesu bakagankamina nyama aantomwe ampeekezyo alimwi aziyandisyo zyayo.
GAL 5:25 Na katupona mu Muya, ngatweende muMuya.
GAL 5:26 Tatunolifunkayizyi, kunyesesyanya, akweemuzyanya.
GAL 6:1 Nobakwesu, naumwi wenu wajanika ulimukubisya, inywe nimuli amuuya mwelede kumuboozya amuuya muboombe. Amulikatazye lwenu nubeeni, ikuti inywebo mutasunkwi.
GAL 6:2 Mubwezelane mukuli, mpawo muzuzikizye mulawu waKkilisito.
GAL 6:3 Na umwi uyeeya kuti ulimbwabede wekatakwe mbwabede pe, ulikuyeeya lwakwe mwini.
GAL 6:4 Awumwi alingule mulimo wakwe, mpawo kulikankayizya kwakwe kunoli mulinguwe kakutali kulumwi pe.
GAL 6:5 Kambo umwi awumwi uyonyampula mukuli wakwe.
GAL 6:6 Ooyo uyiisigwa ijwi welede kwabilaana zintu zibotu awoyo uyiisya.
GAL 6:7 Muteeenwi pe. Leza tasekwi, kufumbwa muntu nchabyala, nchenchiicho nchayotebula.
GAL 6:8 Nkambo oyo ubyala imbuto munyama yakwe, kuzwa kunyama uyotebula lunyonyko. Kuli ooyo ubyala imbuto kumuuya kuzwa kumuuya uyotebula buumi ibutamani.
GAL 6:9 Tutakatali mukuchita kabotu, nkambo kuchindi cheelede tuyotebula, kuti tetwakalengwana.
GAL 6:10 Alimwi, nituchili amweenya, ngatuchitile bantu boonse bubotu, kwindilila abo bang'anda yalusyomo.
GAL 6:11 Mulange kukomena kwamagwalo ngimulembela amaboko aangu.
GAL 6:12 Abo bayanda kubotesya izyanyama balikweezya kumwangila ikuti mupalulwe. Balikuchita obo biyo kuti batapenzegwi nkambo kachiingano chaKkilisito.
GAL 6:13 Nikuba kulaabo bakalipalula takwe nibakabamba mulawu, Pesi bayanda kuti mupalulwe ikuti bakali kankayizye nkambo kamibili yanu.
GAL 6:14 Pesi nsyelede kulikankayizya pe kunze kwakulikankayizizya chiingano cha Mwami wesu Jesu Kkilisito, mukwiinda mulinchicho inyika yakakankaminwa alindime, andime kunyika.
GAL 6:15 Nikuba kupalulwa na kutapalulwa takwambi chintu pe, pesi chibaligwa biyo mbulenge bupya.
GAL 6:16 Kuli boonse benda munzila eeyi, lumuuno aluzyalo alube alimbabo nikuba kulabo bana ba Izilayili wa Leza.
GAL 6:17 Kuzwa lino kutabi uchindikazya pe, nkambo amubili wangu ndibwezede impa zya Jesu.
GAL 6:18 Luzyalo lwaMwami Jesu Kkilisito alube amyuuya yanu, nobakwesu, Amen.
EPH 1:1 Pawulu, mutumwa wa Kkilisito Jesu kwindila mukuyanda kwa Leza, muli Kkilisito Jesu.
EPH 1:2 Luzyalo kuli ndinywe a lumuuno luzwa kuli Leza Taata wesu, a Mwami Jesu Kkilisito.
EPH 1:3 Eelyo Leza a Taata wa Mwami Jesu Kkilisito ngatembawulwe, oyo wakatulongezya azyoonse zilongezyo zyamuuya mumasena aakujulu muli Kkilisito.
EPH 1:4 Leza wakatusala mulinguwe kuzwa kumatalikilo enyika kuti tukabe basalali akubula chibi kumenso akwe muluyando.
EPH 1:5 Muluyando Leza wakatukanzila yejunza swe kuti atubweze mbuli bana kwinda muli Jesu Kkilisito kwindila mukulibonia mukulibotezya kwakuyanda kwakwe.
EPH 1:6 Kubwezwa kwesu kweta kutambawula kuluzyalo lulabulemu oolo we ndwakatupa swe kakutakwe muulo muuli umwi ngwakayanda.
EPH 1:7 Muli Jesu Kkilisito tulalununuko kwinda mugaze lyakwe akulekelelwa kwazibizyesu, kwindila mubuvubi bwaluzyalo lwakwe.
EPH 1:8 Wakavuzya luzyalo oolu kulindiswe a boonse busongo akumvwisisiya.
EPH 1:9 Leza wakazichita kuti zizibwe kulindiswe zisisikene zyakuyanda kwakwe, kwindila kulizezyo zyakamubotezya, azyakatondezya muli Kkilisito,
EPH 1:10 nkali a maboneno kukubambila kuzulila kwachindi, kukweta zintu zyoonse antoomwe, zyoonse zintu zilikujulu azilaansi, munsi amutwe womwe, nkokuti Kkilisito.
EPH 1:11 Muli Kkilisito twakasalwa achisalo, wakatuyanda mukwindila mumabambe akwe ooyo ubeleka kuzwa kulizyoonse kwindila kumakanze akuyanda kwakwe
EPH 1:12 Leza wakatusala swe mbuli basilukono kuchitila kuti swe, tobatanzi kubulangizi muliKkilisito, tukabe bakutembawula bulemu bwakwe.
EPH 1:13 Muli Kkilisito, inywe kabiyo, eelyo nimwakamvwa ijwi lyakasimpe, makani mabotu alufutuko lwenu, mwakasyoma mulinguwe mpawo mwakasinizigwa a chisyomezyo chamuuya Uusalala,
EPH 1:14 ooyo mwakabikwa kulukkono lwesu kuyosika kulununuko lwanzitulaazyo, kukutembawula bulemu bwakwe.
EPH 1:15 Kuleechi chilengwa, kuzwa nkesinaamvwa aatala alusyomo lwanu mu Mwami Jesu aluyando lwenu kuli boonse bantu ba Leza basalala,
EPH 1:16 tendakaleka kulumba Leza nkambo kenu mbuuli mbindamwaamba munkoombyo zyangu.
EPH 1:17 Ndakomba kuti Leza waMwami wesu Jesu Kkilisito, Taata wabulemu, uyopa kulindinywe muuya wabusongo aziyubunuzyo muluzibo lwakwe.
EPH 1:18 Ndakkomba kuti meso amyoyo yanu amunikilwe, kuti mukazibe bulangizi kuli zezyo nzyakamwitila bantu ba Leza basalala.
EPH 1:19 Munkombyo zyangu ndikumbila kuti muzibe mbuzibede inguzu zyakwe mpati loko zyiinda nzyajisi kulindiswe nitusyoma, kwindila mukubeleka kwanguzu zyabulemu bwakwe.
EPH 1:20 Eezi nzenzizyo nguzu ezyo Leza nzyakabelesya muli Kkilisito eelyo nakamubusya kuzwa kubafu akumukkazika kujanza lyalulyo lwakwe mumasena akujulu.
EPH 1:21 Wakakkazika Kkilisito kule atala lyayoonse milawu abwendelezi anguzu abasinguzu, alyoonse zina eelyo lyuzikidwe Kkilisito uyoyendelezya kutensi mulicheechi chibela luzutu, pesi amuchibeela chiza.
EPH 1:22 Leza wakabikka zyoonse zintu mukuzipeda kuunsi lyamawulu aKkilisitu alimwi wakamupa kumbungano mubili mutwe atala lyazyoonse zintu.
EPH 1:23 Imbungano mubili wakwe, buzule bwakwe oyo uzuzya zyoonse muli zyoonse.
EPH 2:1 Alimwi kulindinywe, mwakalifwide mumilandu yenu azibi.
EPH 2:2 Mwakali kupona kwindila kumuzuluzi wamulawu wamuuya, muuya oyo ulikubeleka mubana batakwe lulayo.
EPH 2:3 Eelyo toonse twalikupona akati kabantu aba, kuzuzikizya makanze asiluuni wamibili yesu, akubweza makanze eenyama alimwi amiyeyo. Twakali kwindilila mubwiime bwabana babukali, mbuli bumwi bwabuntu. Twakali abuntu bwabwana babisya mbuli kuchita bamwi.
EPH 2:4 Pesi Leza ulabuvubi muluzyalo nkambo kaluyando lwakwe lupati oolo ndwakatuyandisya swe.
EPH 2:5 Nikuba twakalifwide mumilandu, wakatuchita bawumi antomwe muli Kkilisito aluzyalo mwakafutulwa.
EPH 2:6 Leza wakatubusya antomwe a Kkilisito, alimwi Leza wakatuchita kuti tukkale a Kkilisitu, alimwi Leza wakatuchita kuti tukkale antomwe mumyenya yakujulu muli Kkilisitu Jesu.
EPH 2:7 Kuchitila kuti muminyaka iza akatondezya kulindiswe kulindiswe buvubi bwakwe bupati buteleki kwa luzyalo lwakwe lutondezegwe mulwetelelo lwakwe kulindiswe muli Kkilisitu Jesu.
EPH 2:8 Nkambo a luzyalo mwakafutulwa kwindila mulusyomo, alimwi echi techakazwa kulindinywe, nchipo cha Leza.
EPH 2:9 Pepe kuzwa kumilimo, kuchitila kuti takwe atakali kankayizye.
EPH 2:10 Nkambo tuli basimilimo ba Leza, bakalongezegwa muli Kkilisito Jesu kukuchita milimu mibotu eyo Leza njakatubambila kalekale, kuchitila kuti tukeende mulinjiiyo.
EPH 2:11 Nkiinkako amuyeeye kuti bamaasi munyama mwiitwa kuti “chitapalwidwe” acheecho chitegwa a “kupalulwa.. munyama chakuchitwa amaboko amuntu.
EPH 2:12 Nkambo kachecho chiindi mwakalanzanisizigwe kuli Kkilisitu kamuli bazwakule kuchisi chamu Izilayeli, batuba kuzizuminano zyachisyomezyo, kamutakwe bulangizi alimwi nkakutakwe Leza munyika.
EPH 2:13 Pele lino muli Kkilisitu Jesu inywe nimwakali kule loko kuzwa kuli Leza mwakaboozegwa afwifwi kwindila mugaze lya Kkilisitu.
EPH 2:14 Nkambo ngonguwe lumuuno lwesu. Wakachita kuti kubili baabe umwi. Kwinda kunyama yakwe wakanyonyoona bulambo bwankoondo bwakatwanzanisizye.
EPH 2:15 Nkinkako, wakalobya mulawu wamilawu amalayilile kuchitila kuti alenge muntu omwe mupya mulinguwe, nkokuti kube lumuuno.
EPH 2:16 Kkilisito wakababoozya amwi bantu bobile mumubili omwe kuli Leza kwinda muchiingano, kukujaya nkondo yakali akati kabo.
EPH 2:17 Jesu wakasika akukambawuka makani mabotu aluumuno kulindinywe nimwakali kule alumuno kuli aabo bakali afwifwi.
EPH 2:18 Eelyo kwindilila muli Jesu toonse mutujana luswano mumuuya omwe kuli Taata.
EPH 2:19 Nkambo kaako, lino inywe nobamaasi tamuchili batuuba amazwakule pe. Nkokuti muli benyika yomwe abantu ba Leza basalala abantu bamung'anda ya Leza.
EPH 2:20 Chamba kuti mwakayakilwa entalisyo yabatumwa abasinsim, alimwi Kkilisito Jesu lwakwe ngonguwe bbwe lyachooko.
EPH 2:21 Mulinguwe ing'anda yoonse ikkwana oobotu antoomwe alimwikikkomena kabotu mbuuli tempele iisalala mu Mwami.
EPH 2:22 Mulinguwe omo mumulikuyakwa kabiyo antomwe mbuli chikkalilo cha-Jesu mu Muuya.
EPH 3:1 Nkambo kacheechi ime, Pawulu, ndimwaange wa Kkilisito Jesu nkambo kandinywe bamaasi.
EPH 3:2 Ndasyoma kuti mwakamvwa abubanzi bwaluzyalo bwa Leza obo bwakapegwa kuli ndime nkambo kenu.
EPH 3:3 Ndilikulemba kwindila kuchiyubunuzyo nchindakazibisigwa. Aka nkikasimpe kasisidwe nkindaka mulembela mubufwifwi kulindinywe.
EPH 3:4 Nimuyobala aatala azeezi, muyokkonzya kumvwisisisya atala a Kkilisitu.
EPH 3:5 Kumvwisisisya kwangu muli aka kasimpe tekakazibisigwa kubana babantu. Pesi lino kayubununwa a Muuya kubatumwa bakwe basalala abasinsimi.
EPH 3:6 Aka kasimpe kasisidwe nkakuti bamasi mbasilukkononyokwe, alimwi mbasizizonyokwe mumubili, alimwi balabilana chisyomezyo muli Kkilisito Jesu kwindila mumakani mabotu.
EPH 3:7 Eelyo ndakaba mulanda wamakani aya nkwinda kuchipo chaluzyalo lwa Leza ndwindakapegwa kwindila mukubeleka kwanguzu zyakwe.
EPH 3:8 Kuli ndime - nikuba kuti ndendime munini kuli boonse bantu ba Leza basalala - olu luzyalo wakapegwa, kukukambawuka kuli bamaasi buvubi butayanduliki bwa Kkilisitu
EPH 3:9 akweta kumumuni kuli boonse mabambe - ezintu zyakasisidwe kwaminyaka myiingi muli Leza, wakalenga zintu zyoonse.
EPH 3:10 Aya mabambe akazibisigwa kwindila mumbungano kuchitila kuti bendeelezi abasinguzu bamumilenga lenga akujulu bakasike mpubaziba mabazu - mingi abube bwabusongo bwa Leza.
EPH 3:11 Eezi zyakachitika kwindilila kumabambe atamani ayo ngakazuzikizya muli Kkilisito Jesu Mwami wesu.
EPH 3:12 Eelyo muli Kkilisitu tulijisi busichaamba akuswenenena alusinizyo nkambo kalusyomo.
EPH 3:13 Nkinkaako ndamukumbila kuti mutalengwani nkambo kamafwabi aangu nkefwabila ndinywe, wo mbobulemu bwenu.
EPH 3:14 Nkambo kaaka ndafugamina Taata amazwi aangu,
EPH 3:15 kuzwa kulinguwe zyoonse mpuli zyakujulu aansi ziluzikidwe.
EPH 3:16 Ndakamba kuti akamupe kwindila kubuumi bwabulemu bwakwe, kuti mukasimisigwe anguzu kwinda kumuuya wakwe oyo uuli mubuntu bwenu bwamukati.
EPH 3:17 Ndakomba kuti Kkilisitu akkale mumyoyo yenu kwinda kulusyomo, miyanda yenu antalisyo muluyando lwakwe, kuchitila
EPH 3:18 kuti muka kkonzye kumvwisisya, antoomwe aboonse bantu ba Leza basalal, kuti mbuubuli busasa, bwanda, bulamfu bwakuya kujulu akunika muluyando lwa Kkilisitu.
EPH 3:19 Akuziba luyando lwa Kkilisitu, lwiinda aluzibo, kuchitila kuti mukazule buzule bwa Leza boonse.
EPH 3:20 Lino kuli nguwe oyo ukkonzya kuchita kwindilide kulizyoonse nzitukkumbila naa kuyeya, kwindila kunguzu zyakwe zibeleka mulindiswe,
EPH 3:21 Kulinguwe akube bulemu mumbungano amuli Kkilisito Jesu kumikkowa yoonse kwalyoonse alyoonse. Amen.
EPH 4:1 Nekubabobo, mbuli mwange nkambo ka Mwami, ndamukombelezya kuti mwende chakwelela kubwiite obo mbumwakiitwa.
EPH 4:2 Ndamukombelezya kuti mupone akulibombya kupati achakulitoba aansi akubamoyo mulamfu, mumvwidilane luzyalo umwi awumwi muluyando.
EPH 4:3 Muchite zyelede kukulondola kujatana kwamuuya kunchoonzyo achalumuno.
EPH 4:4 Kuli mubili omwe amuuya omwe, kabiyo mbuli mbumwakiitwa mubulangizi boomwe bwabwitwe bwenu.
EPH 4:5 Alimwi kuli Mwami omwe, lusyomo lomwe, lubbabbatizyo lomwe, a Leza womwe a Taata waboonse,
EPH 4:6 uletela lyazyoonse alimwi kwindila kulizyoonse amulizyonse.
EPH 4:7 Kuli umwi awumwi wesu luzyalo wakapegwa kwindila mumwelo wachipo cha Kkilisito.
EPH 4:8 Kuli mbuli malembe mbwaamba kuti: “Naakatanta kujulu. wakazulwida baange mubwange alimwi wakapa zipo kubantu.”
EPH 4:9 Chambanzi kuti, “Wakatanta kujulu,” kunze akuti wakaseluka kunsi anyika?
EPH 4:10 Ooyo wakaselukide ngonguwe muntu kabiyo wakatanta kule atala lyamajulu oonse, kuti azuzye zyoonse zintu.
EPH 4:11 Kkilisitu wakapa bamwi kuti babe batumwa, bamwi mbuli basinsimi, bamwi babe bakambawusi alimwi bamwi babe bembeli abayiisi.
EPH 4:12 Wakapa zipo ezi kusamika bantu ba Leza basalala kubasamikila mulimu wakugwasya nkachitila kuyakwa kwamubili wa Kkilisitu.
EPH 4:13 Kwinkilila anembo akuyaka mubili wakwe maane toonse tukasikile lujatano lwalusyomo aluzibo lwaMwana Leza, akuti tukasime akusikila mwelwe wabuzule bwa Kkilisitu.
EPH 4:14 Kkilisitu wakatuyaka kuchitila kuti tatuchinoli bana bapupulwidwe musule akunembo aguuwo, kubwezegwa aguwo lyonse lyanjisyo yabuchenjezu bwabantu mumabambe abo alweno.
EPH 4:15 Twelede kwaamba kasimpe muluyando, twelede kukomena mulizyonse inzila mulinguwe ooyo silutwe, nkokuti Kkilisitu.
EPH 4:16 Kkilisitu uyaka mubili wonse, alimwi yonse igwasizya, alimwi mubili kuti ukomene kuchitila kuti uliyake mwini muluyando.
EPH 4:17 Nkinkako, ndaamba kuti ndasimya kuleezi mu Mwami kuti tamuchinoyendi mbuli kweenda bamaasi, mubufubafuba bwamyoyo yabo.
EPH 4:18 Bali siyilidwe mukumvwisisisya kwabo, kuti kulimbabo, nkambo kakuyuma kwamyoyo yabo.
EPH 4:19 Tabakwe nsoni alimwi bakalipeda kutubuno, alimwi bakiiya yoonse misyobo yazibi abulyabi.
EPH 4:20 Pele tensi mbubo mbumwakayiya atala akkilisito.
EPH 4:21 Ndiyeyela kuti mwakamvwa atala anguwe, akuti amwakayisigwa mulinguwe, mbuli kuti bwini buli muli Jesu.
EPH 4:22 Mwakayisigwa kuti musowe zyoonse zyemponeno yechiindi akusowa muntu wechiindi. Muntu wechiindi ngonguwe nguusofwede nkaambo kalweno lwaziyandisyo zyakwe.
EPH 4:23 Musowe buntu bwechiindi kuti mulengululwe bupya mumiyeyo yanu,
EPH 4:24 muchite echi kuti muzwate muntu mupya oyo ulengedwe muchiimo cha Leza-mubululami bwakasimpe abusalali.
EPH 4:25 Nkinkaako, amusowe bubeji, alimwi muleke uumwi awumwi wanu aambe kasimpe kulisimabambanwa wakwe, nkambo tulichizo chawumwi awumwi.
EPH 4:26 “Nyema, pele utabisyi.” Utazumini kuti zuba likabbile nkochinyemede.
EPH 4:27 Utapi mwenya kuli dyabulusi.
EPH 4:28 Ooyo wakali kubba atachinobbi lubo welede kubeleka, kubelekela kulecho chibotu amaanza akwe, kuchitila kuti abe achimwi chakwabilana ababo babulide.
EPH 4:29 Utazumizyi kwambuula kuchisa kuti kuzwe mumulomo wako. Belesya biyo majwi mabotu kuchitila kugwasigwa kwabaabo bakuyanda, kuchitila kuti majwi ako ape luzyalo kulaabo baamvwa.
EPH 4:30 Alimwi mutapenzyi Muuya Uusalala wa Leza, nkaambo nguwe wakamusimisizya buzuba bwalununuko lwenu.
EPH 4:31 Musowe boonse buluti amaambani, lunyemo, ndutiluti azisapi aantomwe abubi boonse.
EPH 4:32 Mube aluzyalo kuli umwi awumwi, moyo mubombe, mwambilane umwi awumwi, mbuli Leza muli Kkilisitu mbwakamulekelela.
EPH 5:1 Nkinkaako amube basikwiya ba Leza, mbuli bana bayandisi.
EPH 5:2 Alimwi mweende muluyando, mbuli Kkilisitu mbwakatuyanda swe akulyabilila lwakwe nkambo kesu. Nchinunkilizyo chachituuzyo achipayizyo kuli Leza.
EPH 5:3 Pesi takwelede nikuba kwambula akati kenu atala abwaamu na kufumbwa misyobo yabusofwazi naa buunyu, nkambo ezi taziluleme kubantu ba Leza basalala.
EPH 5:4 Eelyo kutabi zisapi, kutabi twambo twabufubafuba, abuchapa kukwambula zyoonse azezyo zitali zyabululami. Nikuba kuti kwelede kuba chipo chakulumba.
EPH 5:5 Alimwi mbuli mbumuzi kuti takwe sibwamu, sibusofwazi naa muntu muunyu ayooyoy sikukomba mituni - uli alukono mubwami bwa Kkilisito a Leza.
EPH 5:6 Kutabi umwi umweena amajwi abuuyo, eelyo nkambo kazeezi zintu bululami bwa Leza bulaza atala lyabana bataswilili.
EPH 5:7 Nkinkaako, mutaswanani antomwe ambabo.
EPH 5:8 Elyo mwakali mumudima, pesi lino mwakaba mumumuuni muMwami.
EPH 5:9 Amweende mbuli bana bamumumuuni. (Nkambo michelo yamumuni mwiili muli zyonse zibotu, busalali, akasimpe),
EPH 5:10 Mpawo mwiiye ezyo zikoonda Mwami.
EPH 5:11 Mutanobi aamwi amilimu itazyali michelo yamumudima pesi amwiyubunune.
EPH 5:12 Eelyo mawuse nikuba kwaamba zintu nzibachita chakusisa.
EPH 5:13 Pesi kuti kufumbwa chintu chabikwa mumumuuni, ngachali bonia.
EPH 5:14 Eelyo kufumbwa chintu chilibonia mumuni. Nkinkaako kwambwa kuti, “sinsimuka, iwe nosikoona alimwi buka kuzwa kubafu, alimwi Kkilisitu uyomunika kulindime.”
EPH 5:15 Langisisisya kabotu kabotu mbayeenda - pepe mbuli bafubafuba pesi mbuli basongo.
EPH 5:16 Bamba chiindi nkambo mazuba mabi.
EPH 5:17 Nkinkaako, mutabi bafubafuba, pesi mumvwisisye kuti kuyanda kwa Mwami nkukuli.
EPH 5:18 Alimwi mutakkolwi abukkande, nkambo bwetela budakwi mumizeezo. Nikuba kuti, amuzuzigwe a Muuya Uusalala,
EPH 5:19 amwambule kuli umwi awumwi muntembawuzyo enyimbo alimwi enyimbo zyamuuya, kwimba akulumbaizya ku Mwami amyoyo yanu yoonse,
EPH 5:20 Lyoonse kamupa kulumba kuli zyoonse, muzina lya Mwami wesu Jesu Kkilisitu kuli Leza Taata,
EPH 5:21 akuli bombya kuli umwi awumwi mukulemeka Kkilisitu.
EPH 5:22 Nobanakazi amulibombye kubalumi banu, mbuli kuMwami.
EPH 5:23 Nkambo mwalumi ngomutwe wamwanakazi mbuli Kkilisitu mbwali mutwe wembungano, welwakwe mufutuli wamubili.
EPH 5:24 Pesi mbuli mbungano mbilibombya kuli Kkilisitu, eelyo anywebo nobanakazi kubalumi banu muli zyoonse.
EPH 5:25 Nobalumi, amuyande banakazi benu, mbuli Kkilisitu mbwakayanda mbungano akulipeda lwakwe kuli nguwe.
EPH 5:26 Kuchitila kuti akamusanzye, kuti ayisalazye, kukwisalazya akwisanzya kwamanzi ejwi,
EPH 5:27 kuti akapede mbungano kulinguwe mbuuli bulemu butakwe kabata naa bubi naa kamwi kampenda kamusyobo oyo, pesi isalala akutaba akampenda.
EPH 5:28 Munzila iyendelene abululami belede kuyanda banakazi mbuli mibili yabo beni. Oyo uyanda mwanakazi ulaliyanda mwini.
EPH 5:29 Eelyo takwe umwi wakabijilwa amubili wakwe, pesi ulawubamba akusilika chamaanu, mbubonya mbuli Kkilisitu mbwakananika akusilika mbungano chamaanu,
EPH 5:30 nkambo tuli bana bamubili wakwe.
EPH 5:31 “Nkambo kacheechi mwalumi unonga kasiya wisi abanyina alimwi uyoba antomwe amwanakazi wakwe, alimwibabili bayoba nyama yomwe.”
EPH 5:32 Obu bwini busisidwe mbupati - pesi ndikwambula atala a Kkilisitu ambungano.
EPH 5:33 Nikuba boobo, umwi awumwi wanu kabiyo welede kuyanda mwanakazi wakwe mwini mbuli lwakwe, alimwi mwanakazi welede kulemeka mulumi wakwe.
EPH 6:1 Banike, amulemeke bazyali benu mu Mwami, nkambo eechi chililuleme.
EPH 6:2 “Lemeka Uuso abanyoko” ( oyu ngomulazyo mutanzi ulechisyomezyo),
EPH 6:3 kuchitila kuti kubekabotu kulinduwe akupona chiindi chilamfu munyika.”
EPH 6:4 Anywebo, nomataata, mutanoniaki banabenu kukunyema nikuba kuti, mubanyampule mululayo amulayilile a Mwami.
EPH 6:5 Nobazike, amumvwe kubaami benu kwindila kunyama akulemeka kunikide achakuyoowa, mukusyomeka kwamyoyo yanu.
EPH 6:6 Amumvwisisisye kulimbabo mbuli mbumumvwisisisya kuli Kkilisitu. Amumvwisisisye mubabotezye. Nikuba kuti, amubeleke mbuli bazike baKkilisitu, abo bachita kuyanda kwa Leza kuzwa mumoyo yanu.
EPH 6:7 Muchite amyoyo yenu yonse, mbuli mbumwakali kuchitila Mwami alimwi pepe bantu,
EPH 6:8 Nkambo tulizi kuti kufumbwa zichito zibotu awumwi muntu nzyachita, uyotambula mpindu kuzwa kuMwami, nikuba muzike naa ufutwidwe.
EPH 6:9 Nubaami, mubelesye bazike benu munzila yelene. Mutabakanzi bubi mulizi kuti oyo uuli kobile mubelesyi wabo awanu ulikujulu., alimwi mulizi kuti takwepe kulangilwa kwachiwa chamuntu.
EPH 6:10 Kumaninizya, amusime mu Mwami amunguzu zyabupati bwakwe.
EPH 6:11 Muzwate mulizyoonse zilwanyo zya Leza, nkokuti mukakkonzye kwimininana amanjezezya akuyeya kwadyabulosi.
EPH 6:12 Eelyo kupengana kwesu takwiminene enyama abulowa, pesi kwiminene abendelezi abendelezi, kwiminene anguzu ezi ziliwo zyamudima, kwiminene abwendelezi bwamyuya mibi ili mumilengalenga yakujulu.
EPH 6:13 Nkinkaako muzwate zyoonse zilwanio zya Leza, kuchitila kuti mukakonzye kwimikila mubuzuba bwakabi, alimwi nkamuli mwamaninsya kuchita zyoonse, kukwimikila nji.
EPH 6:14 Mwime njii, alutambo lwabwini luzyungulukide zikkungu zyenu, alimwi mulizwatike zizwaato zyakukaango zyabululami,
EPH 6:15 alimwi, azituta zibambwe kukuzwatikwa amakani amakani mabotu alumuno.
EPH 6:16 Muli zyonse zichitwa mubweze ntobo yalusyomo, mbubonya muyokkonzya kugwisya yoonse mivwi iyaka yamubi.
EPH 6:17 Alimwi mubweze ngowani yalufutuko apanga lyamuuya, lilindendilyo ijwi lya Leza.
EPH 6:18 Azyoonse nkombyo azikkumbizyo, mukombe kuzyiindi zyoonse mumuuya. Dokumamanino, lyoonse kamulangilizya aboonse busungu nkamupeda nkombyo kuli bonse bantu ba Leza basalala.
EPH 6:19 Alimwi mundikombele, kuti mulumbe ukapegwe kulindime nindayojula mulomo wangu. Mukombe kuti ndikazibisigwe kasimpe kasisidwe aatala evangeli.
EPH 6:20 Ndendilyo lye vangeli elyo ndiyobuzulwida oyo uli mumacheni, kuchitila kuti ndikaambe akanzambwenene, mbuli mbiyelede kwamba.
EPH 6:21 Pele nkukuti mukakonzye kuziba amabelekelo angu mbwendikuchita, Tayichikkasi, mwalumi muyandisi alimwi mulanda usyomeka mu Mwami, uyomubuzya zyoonse, kuchitila kuti mukazibe mbuli mbwendikuchita.
EPH 6:22 Ndakamutuma kulindinywe kulingaaya ya makanze, kuchitila kuti mukazibe mbutubede, alimwi kuchitila kuti akusungwazye myoyo yenu.
EPH 6:23 Akube kuti lumuno lube kubakwesu, alimwi luyando alusyomo luzwa kuli Leza Taata a Mwami Jesu Kkilisitu.
EPH 6:24 Luzyalo alube kuli boonse abo bayanda Mwami wesu Jesu Kkilisitu aluyando lutakwe kampenda.
PHI 1:1 Pawulu a Timoti, ibabelesi ba Kkilisito Jesu, ibabelekela bantu ba Leza basalala muli Jesu Kkilisito ibali ku Filipi, abeendelezi bapati abadikoni.
PHI 1:2 Iluzyalo alumuno luzwa kuli Leza taata wesu a Mwami Jesu Kkilisito alube kulindinywe.
PHI 1:3 Ndilumba Leza wangu chindi choonse nindimuyeeya.
PHI 1:4 Lyoonse, munkombyo zyangu zyonse nzindimuchitila, nkekkomba mukubotelwa
PHI 1:5 nkambo kakujatisyania andinywe ijwi kuzwa kubuzuba butaanzi kuzosika lino.
PHI 1:6 Ndilakkutisika anchiicho chintu echi, chakuli oyo iwakatalika mulimo mubotu mulindinywe uyoyinkilila kunembo akuchita kuti akawumane ado kubuzuba bwa Jesu Kkilisito.
PHI 1:7 Chilikabotu kuti ndilimvwe kabotu atala andinywe nkambo muli mumoyo wangu. Moonse mwalijisini andime chaluzyalo nikuba mukujalilwa muntolongo akububotu bwangu amukusisikizigwa kwajwi.
PHI 1:8 Nkambo Leza ngukkamboni wangu, mukumuyandisya kwangu moonse alwetelelo lwa Kkilisito Jesu.
PHI 1:9 Aboobo njeyi inkombyo yangu: Kuti luyando lwanu lukomene mubwiingi lyoonse muluzibo akumvwisisisya koonse
PHI 1:10 kuchitila kuti mubotye eecho chibotu kwindilila, alimwi mukuti mube aabwini akutaba amulandu mane busike buzuba bwa Kkilisito,
PHI 1:11 nkamuzwide muchelo wabululami ooyo uuza kubulemu akutembawulwa kwa Leza kwindila muli Jesu Kkilisito.
PHI 1:12 Lino ndiyanda kuti muzibe, nobakwesu, kuti ezi zyakachitika kulindime zyagwasya loko kukunyampula kwendelela kwajwi.
PHI 1:13 Nkaambo kaako inketani zyangu muli Kkilisito zyaboneka kuli basikulinda muunzi wa Mwami akubantu boonse.
PHI 1:14 Ibakwesu biingi bajana kumvwisisisya muMwami akambo kanketani zyangu, alimwi baba abukozu bwakwambula ijwi kabatayoowi.
PHI 1:15 Nchonzyo bamwi bakonzya kukambawuka Kkilisito chakutangalilana abulwani na, alimwi bamwi bachita amoyo mubotu.
PHI 1:16 Ibamusule bachita aluyando, mukuziba kubi ndabikwa aano kuti ndikwabilile ijwi.
PHI 1:17 Pesi ibakayinda bakambawuka Kkilisito amizeezo yakulipa, pepe mubwini. Bayeeya kuti balandiinda mpuwo aawo nenchisungidwe.
PHI 1:18 Ani niinzi lino? Ado kuti munzila zyoonse nikuba zyajungwe lyakubeja kana lyakasimpe - Kkilisito uli kukkambawukwa, alimwi eezi zilandibotezya. Iyii, alimwi ndiyobotelwa,
PHI 1:19 nkambo ndilizi kuti eezi ziyondipa kwangununwa kwinda munkoombyo zyenu alugwasyo lwa Muuya wa Jesu Kkilisito.
PHI 1:20 Kuzumana kwabulangizi alusyomo lwangu kuti taakwe mbundiyooba amawuse pesi ndiyoba aanguzu, lino mbuli kuti lyoonse, Kkilisito uyomemezegwa mumubili wangu, nikuba mukupona kana kulufu.
PHI 1:21 Nkambo kuti ndiponede ngu Kkilisito alimwi kufwa nimpindu.
PHI 1:22 Pesi aanoli kwali kuti ndipona munyama, eechi chaamba mulimu uzyala michelo kuli ndime. Pesi ndilasala chili? Nsichizi pe.
PHI 1:23 Nkambo ndilimanikizigwe azintu zibili. Ikupeekezya kwangu nkuti ndizwe ndikabe aa Kkilisito, kachili nchechintu chibotu loko,
PHI 1:24 Pesi kupona munyama mukubona kachili chintu chipati kuli ndinywe.
PHI 1:25 Mukukkutisika acheechi, ndilizi kuti ndiyochala akwinkilila kunembo andinywe, kuchitila kuzwidilila akubotelwa kwenu mulusyomo.
PHI 1:26 Kuchitila kuti muli ndime mukajane twaambo twingi tutakamupe kupakala muli Kkilisito Jesu aawo ndakuubola lubo kulindinywe.
PHI 1:27 Inywe amulyendelezye biyomunzila iyendelana aajwi lya Kkilisito, kuchitila kuti ndaboola kuzomubona kana tendabola, ndikonzye kumvwa aatala andinywe, kuti muliimvwi njii mumuuya omwe, amuzeezo oomwe wakufundumanina lusyomo lyajwi kali antoomwe.
PHI 1:28 Tamukongwi nikuba muli iili inzila abaabo mbimu suleene aabo. Eechi nchikozyanisyo kuli mbabo ichaamba kumwayika kwabo, pesi kuli ndinywe ndufutuko - alimwi luzwa kuli Leza.
PHI 1:29 Nkaambo lwakapegwa biyo kuli ndinywe akambo ka Kkilisito kutali kuti biyo musyome mulinguwe, pesi akuti mumufwabile,
PHI 1:30 kamuli ensandulo lukazyanio ndumwakabona mulindime, alimwi lino mulalumvwa muli ndime.
PHI 2:1 Ndiyeeya kuti kuli kusungwazigwa muli Kkilisito. Ndiyeyela kuti kulikulyiiba kujanika muluyando lwakwe. Ndiyeyela kuti kuli luswanano lwa Muuya. Ndiyeyela kuti kuli kufwidwa nsoni alwetelelo.
PHI 2:2 Amuzuzye kubotelwa kwangu mukuba bamwi amumuzeezo omwe, amukuba aluyando lomwe, kamujisini amumuuya, akuba anchito ikozyenie yoomwe.
PHI 2:3 Tamuchiti chintu mubufubafuba kana mukulipenzya biyo. Pesi mumawuse mwelede kubona bamwi kabali kabotu kwinda ndinywe.
PHI 2:4 Umwi awumwi wenu atalangi nzyayanda lwakwe mwini biyo, pesi alange alimwi iziyanda bamwi.
PHI 2:5 Amube acho echi mumizeezo yanu ichakali muli Kkilisito Jesu.
PHI 2:6 Ooyo, nikuba kuti wakapona muchiimo cha Leza, taakalibona kayelene pe a Leza mbuli chintu chakujatilila kuli nchicho.
PHI 2:7 Pesi, wakalyubula akulibika muchiimo chamubelesi, aboobo wakazyalwa muchiimo chikozyenie abantu.
PHI 2:8 Wakalibombya akusyomeka kuyosika kuchiindi chalufu, akukuyofwa achiingano.
PHI 2:9 Nkinkaako Leza wakamunyampula loko alimwi.
PHI 2:10 Wakachita obo kuchitila kuti muzina lya Jesu woonse mazwi akatifuke, imazwi aababo balikujulu abali aansi abali munsi aanyika.
PHI 2:11 Wakachita boobo kuchitila kuti zyoonse indimi zikape bukamboni bwakwamba kuti Jesu Kkilisitu ngu Mwami, kubulemu bwa Leza Taata.
PHI 2:12 Nkokuti lino, nobayandwa, mbuli mbumulemeka kale lyoonse, kutaamba neliwo biyo pesi kapati nensiwo, amubelekele lufutuko lwanu mukuyowa amukukankama.
PHI 2:13 Nkaambo ngu Leza uulikubeleka muli ndinywe munzila zibili zyakuyanda akukubelekela kubotelwa kwakwe kubotu.
PHI 2:14 Muchite zintu zyoonse kamuta tongooki nikuba kukazyania.
PHI 2:15 kuchitila kuti mumaninine tamubi akampenda, ibana ba Leza ibatakwe ibubi mukati kabuzyalane bubbilingene alimwi bulangililwa aansi, oomo mumumvwika mbuli malampi munyika yoonse.
PHI 2:16 Amujatilile kujwi lya buumi kuchitila kuti mubuzuba bwa Kkilisito ndikalidundiizye kuti tendakachijana biyo kana kubelekela mayabwe.
PHI 2:17 Pesi nikuba kuti ndilikutilwambuli chipo kuchipayililo akuba mulimo walusyomo lwanu, Ndilalumba akubotelwa andinywe moonse.
PHI 2:18 Muli njiyeeyo inzila yomwe anywebo mwelede kulumba akubotelwa andime.
PHI 2:19 Pesi ndilasyoma ku Mwami Jesu kuti atume Timoti kuli ndinywe kufwambana, kuchitila kuti ambebo ndisungwazigwe.
PHI 2:20 Nkaambo nsikwe uumbi uulimbuli nguwe, uuli aluyando andinywe.
PHI 2:21 Nkambo boonse bayanduula nzibayanda beeni, izitaala azya Jesu Kkilisito.
PHI 2:22 Pesi mulizi bupati bwakwe, nkambo mbuli mwana uli awisi, nkinkaako wakabeleka andime mujwi.
PHI 2:23 Aboobo ndisyoma kumutuma kufwamabana awoo ndabona kuti zintu zilandendela byeni.
PHI 2:24 Pesi ndilasyoma ku Mwami kuti ambebo lwangu ndize kufwambana.
PHI 2:25 Pesi ndibona kuti chilelede kutuma Epafuloditasi kuti aboole kulindinywe. Mukwesu alimwi mubelesima, alimwi ngu silumambaama, alimwi ngusinyenda wenu kali mubelesi wa nzindibula.
PHI 2:26 Nkambo wakatyompedwe loko, alimwi wakali wazimba kubandinywe moonse, nkambo mwakamvwa kuti wakali kuchiswa.
PHI 2:27 Nkambo inchoonzyo wakalichisidwe kwakuti wakasifwe. Pesi Leza wakamufwida luzyalo, kakutali nguwe biyo, pesi akulindime, kuchitila kuti nsikabi aamawuse ajulu lyamawuse.
PHI 2:28 Nkokuti chilimubusungu kwindilide kuti ndimutume, kuchitila kuti mwamubona lubo mubotelwe, alimwi nditawusi loko.
PHI 2:29 Mumutambule Epafuloditasi mu Mwami alukondo loonse. Mulemeke bantu balimbuli nguwe.
PHI 2:30 Nkambo wakasifwe akaambo kamulimu wa Kkilisitu. Wakasanga buumi bwakwe mukundibelekela akuzuzikizya eezyo nzimwakatali kukkonzya kundichitila.
PHI 3:1 Ichamamanino nobakwesu, amubotelwe muMwami. Nkambo kuti ndimulembele lubo zintu ezi teensi penzi pe kulindime, alimwi chilandikwabilila.
PHI 3:2 Amuchenjelele bankala. Amuchenjelele aabo babelesi babisyi. Amuchenjelele zikonzya kumuchelezya.
PHI 3:3 Nkambo ndiswe bapalwidwe — abo bakomba a Muuya wa Leza, alimwi balamantukwe muli Kkilisito Jesu, alimwi tatukwe lusyomo kunyama.
PHI 3:4 Nikuba boobo, ime lwangu ndakonzya kusyoma kunyama. Kuti kaliwo umwi muntu uyeeya kuti ulasyoma kunyama, ime ndikonzya kusyoma kwindilila.
PHI 3:5 Ndakapalulwa mubuzuba bwamusanu amazuba ootatwe, kubantu ba Izilayeli, kumusyobo waba Bbenjamini, mu Hibbulu waba Hibbulu; mbuli mukulemukezya mulawo, mufalisi.
PHI 3:6 Ndakasungwala chenguzu kukupenzya imbungano. Alimwi kumakani aabusalali kumulawu, tendakalikwe mulandu.
PHI 3:7 Pesi zyoonse zintu zyakali mpindu kulindime, ndazibona kakuli kuswekelwa akambo ka Kkilisito.
PHI 3:8 Isimpe nkuti, lino ndibona zyoonse mbuli mayabwe nkambo kabukkolokolo bwaluzibo lwa Kkilisito Jesu Mwami wangu. Nkambo kakwe ndisiya zyoonse zintu - alimwi ndazibona mbuli tombe - kuchitila kuti ndijane Kkilisito
PHI 3:9 akuti ndijanike mulinguwe, akuti nsijaniki aabusalali bwakulichitila kumulawu, pesi kuti eezyo zizwa mukusyoma kuli Kkilisito - ibusalali buzwa kuli Leza uuli lusyomo lwangu.
PHI 3:10 Nkambo lino ndiyanda kumuziba anguzu zyakubuka kwakwe abuzolwani bwa koomba kwakwe akubuka mbuli nguwe kulufu lwakwe.
PHI 3:11 Kuchitila kuti mulimwinzila ndikakonzye kubuka kuzwa kubafu.
PHI 3:12 Teensi kwaamba kuti ndazijana kale pe zintu eezi, kana kuti ndili libambilide kumaninina, pesi ndilipeda kukujatilila kuli eecho nchindakabwezelwa kuti ndijate a Kkilisito Jesu.
PHI 3:13 Nobakwesu, nsiyeeyi kuti ime lwangu ndakachijatilila kale pe, Pesi chintu chomwe nchindichita: Nkuluba echo chakiinda akunangatila eecho chili kunembo.
PHI 3:14 Ndijatisya kuya kunembo kubulangizi nkelamuzeezo wakujana lwiito lwa Leza undinyampula muli Kkilisito Jesu.
PHI 3:15 Toonse swebo nitwakakkomena, atuyeye boobu. Alimwi kuti chimwi chintu wachiyeeya busiyene, alimwi Leza ulachiyubununa kuli nduwe.
PHI 3:16 Muliimwi inzila, kumaboneno aachecho nchitwajana, atubambe nguyooyo mweelo wachiimo.
PHI 3:17 Amundiiye, nobakwesu. Amulangisisye aabo bayobwenda muchikkozyano nchimulacho muli ndiswe.
PHI 3:18 Mbiingi bayobwenda - aabo mbindikkala nkemwambila atala ambabo, alimwi lino ndikumwambila akulila - mbuli basinkondonyina baachingano cha Kkilisito.
PHI 3:19 Imagolelo aabo nkunyonyooka. Nkambo leza wabo mbula bwabo, alimwi bulemu bwabo buli mukuusa kwabo. Bayeeya zintu zyanyika.
PHI 3:20 Pesi ibukkale bwesu bulikujulu, ooko nkutulindide Mufutuli kuti azobole, i Mwami Jesu Kkilisito.
PHI 3:21 Uyosandula mibili yesu myuuba akayichite mibili ilengedwe mbuli wakwe mubili wabulemu, uubumbidwe abupati bwanguzu zyakwe kuti zintu zyoonse zilangane aanguwe.
PHI 4:1 Nkinkaako, nobakwesu bayandwa mbindizimbide, ikubotelwa kwangu abulemu, muli yeeyi inzila kulizyandamene mu Mwami, benzuuma nimuyandwa.
PHI 4:2 Ndili kukkombelezyania a Ewuyodiya, alimwi ndili kukkombelezyania a Sintiki, kuti babe amoyo omwe mu Mwami.
PHI 4:3 Iyii, ndili kumukkumbila, nobasindikizyi bangu bakasimpe, kuti mugwasye banakazi aba ibakabeleka andime kukwendelezya ijwi antoomwe a Kkilementi abamwi boonse mbindibeleka aabo, bali amazina aalembedwe mu Bbuku lya Buumi.
PHI 4:4 Amubotelwe mu Mwami lyoonse. Alimwi ndinowamba kuti, amubotelwe.
PHI 4:5 Muchite kuti bubombe bwanu buzibinkane kubantu boonse. Mwami waaba afwifwi.
PHI 4:6 Tamubilili chintu nichiba chomwe. Anu kuti, mulizyoonse mukukkomba alimwi akutongooka akupa zilumbyo, izikkumbilo zyenu azizibinkane kuli Leza,
PHI 4:7 alimwi Lumuuno lwa Leza, lwiinda kumvwisisisya koonse, luyokwabilila myoyo yanu amizeezo yanu muli Kkilisito Jesu.
PHI 4:8 Kumamanino, nobakwesu, kufumbwa zintu zyanchoonzyo, kufumbwa zintu zyabulemu, kufumbwa zintu zyabwiini, kufumbwa zintu zisalala, kufumbwa zintuzyebeka, kufumbwa zintu zyaambwa kabotu, kuti kakuli chimwi chibotu kwindilila, kuti kakuli chintu chiyanda kulumbayizigwa, amuziyeeye zintu eezi.
PHI 4:9 Izintu nzimwakiiya, akutambula, akumvwa akubona kulindime, amuchite zintu ezi, alimwi Leza waluumuno uyooba aandinywe.
PHI 4:10 Ndili akubotelwa kupati mu Mwami nkambo lino mwakonzya kubambulula bupya imandiyeyelo anu. Nkasimpe kuti mwali kundiyeeya kale, pesi tekwakali mweenya pe wakuti mundigwasye.
PHI 4:11 Nsili mukwambila kuti ndilibulide pe. Nkaambo ndakiiya kukkutisika muzyiimo zyoonse.
PHI 4:12 Ndilibwizi buchete, munzila zyoonse zintu amuzintu zyoonse ndakiiya insiswa yakusaninwa kabotu alimwi akuba enzala, alimwi akuba azyoonse na mukubula.
PHI 4:13 Ndakonzya kuchita ezi zintu kwinda mulinguwe ooyo undisimya.
PHI 4:14 Nikuba boobo, mwakachita kabotu kwabilana andime nindali mubuyumuyumu.
PHI 4:15 Inywe nobantu baku Filipi mulizi loko kuti kumatalikilo aajwi, aawo nindakazwa mu Masedoniya, takwepe imbungano yakandigwasya munzila yakundipa kana kutambula kunze kwandinywe luzutu amulikke.
PHI 4:16 Koonse ani ndakali mu Tesalonika, mwakanditumizya twiingi lugwasyo lwazintu nzindakabulide.
PHI 4:17 Tachaambi kuti ndiyanda kupegwa pe. Pesi, ndiyanda muchelo uuyungizya impuwo yenu.
PHI 4:18 Ndakatambula zintu zyoonse, kazikkwene kana kwindilila. Ndakakkutisikana. Ndakazitambula kuzwa kuli Epafuloditasi izintu nzimwakamutumizya. Nzintu zinunkilila bunonono, mbusange butambulika akubotelezya kuli Leza.
PHI 4:19 Leza wangu uyomupa zyoonse nzimubula mbuuli mubuvubi bwakwe amubulemu muli Kkilisito Jesu.
PHI 4:20 Lino kuli Leza a Taata akube bulemu bwalyoonse alyoonse. Ameni.
PHI 4:21 Mujuzye boonse bazumina muli Kkilisito Jesu. Balikumujuzya loko bakwesu mbindaabo.
PHI 4:22 Bamujuzya boonse bazumini ba Leza baluleme bali kokuno, ikapati aabo bempuli ya Siiza.
PHI 4:23 Iluzyalo lwa Mwami Jesu Kkilisito lube amyuuya yanu. Amwi malembe mapati abasikale mumulaka wechi Giliki ayungizya kuti, Ameni, alimwi kuli amwi malembe aansiku muchiGiliki aalabbala eelyo kumamanino kwa lyoonse bbuku lya Chizuminano Chipya. Alimwi kuli malembe mapati miingi aansiku muchi Giliki aatakwe Amen ku mamanino.
COL 1:1 Pawulu, mutumwa wa Kkilisito Jesu kwinda mubukanze bwa Leza, antomwe a Timoti mukwesu,
COL 1:2 akubasalali ba Leza akubakwesu basyomekede muli Kkilisito baliku Kkolose. Luzyalo lube anywe, aluumuno luzwa kuli Leza Taata wesu.
COL 1:3 Tupa kulumba kuli Leza, wisi wa Mwami wesu Jesu Kkilisito, elyo tulamukombela kwalyoonse.
COL 1:4 Twakamvwa zyalusyomo lwenu lwamuli Kkilisito Jesu aluyando ndomulaalo kubasalali ba Leza boonse.
COL 1:5 Mulijisi luyando oolu nkambo kabulangizi mbomubambilidwe kujulu. Mwakamvwa atala abulangizi obu kamutana kukambawukilwa ijwi lyakasimpe, makani mabotu,
COL 1:6 Akasika kulindinywe. Ijwi eli lilazyala michelo akuya bukomena munyika yoonse. Lyakali kuchita obo akulindinywe kuzwa kubuzuba nimwakalimvwa animwakayiiya ataala aluzyalo lwa Leza mubwini.
COL 1:7 Aya ngimakani ngimwakiiya kuli Epafulasi, muzikema uyandwa, muzike usyomeka wa Kkilisito utwimikilila.
COL 1:8 Epafulasi wachita kuti luyando lwako luzibinkane kulindiswe mumuuya.
COL 1:9 Nkambo kaluyando olu, kuzwa mubuzuba mbutwakamvwa echi tetwakaleka pe kumukombela. Twali kumukumbilila kuti mukazuzigwe luzibo lwakuyanda kwakwe amubusongo boonse amukumvwisisisya kwamumuuya.
COL 1:10 Twali kumukombela kuti mweende munzila iyeelede Mwami ayeeyo imubotelezya munzila zyoonse. Twalikumukombela kuti muzyale michelo yamilimo mibotu amukukomena mukuziba Leza.
COL 1:11 Tukombela kuti muyumisigwe mulizyonse mbuli mbukwelede mubulemu bwanguzu zyakwe, akuba akukakatila abulangizi.
COL 1:12 Tukombela kuti mukape kulumba chakukondwa kuli Taatesu, wakamuchiita kuti mukonzye kuba achaabilo chalukono lwabasalali ba Leza bali mumumuuni.
COL 1:13 Wakatuvuna kuzwa kunguzu zyamumudima akutulonzya kututola kubwami bwa Mwana wakwe uyandwa.
COL 1:14 Mu Mwana wakwe mutujene lununuko, lwakulekelelwa kwazibi.
COL 1:15 Oyu Mwana nchikozyano cha Leza utaboneki. Ngonguwe mutanzi kuzyalwa kuzilenge zyoonse.
COL 1:16 Nkambo mulinguwe zintu zyoonse zyakalengwa, ezyo zili kujulu, azezyo zitaboneki. Nikuba zyuno zyabwam, nibaba baami, nibaaba bendelezi, nibaaba basinguzu, zyoonse zyakalengwa kwinda mulinguwe kuti zibe zyakwe.
COL 1:17 Ilwakwe mwini ngomutaanzi kuzintu zyoonse, elyo mulinguwe zintu zyoonse muzijisini.
COL 1:18 Alubo ngomutwe wamubili, nkokuti imbungano. Ngonguwe matalikilo alubo ngomjtaanzi kukuzyaligwa kuzwa mukati kabafu, chaamba kuti ulabusena butaanzi bwazintu zyoonse.
COL 1:19 Nkambo Leza ubotelwa buzwide bwakwe kuti bukkale mulinguwe.
COL 1:20 Alimwi wakali yanzanisizya mumwanakwe zintu zyoonse mulinguwe. Leza wakabikka lumuuno kwindila kubulowa achingano chakwe; Leza wakabweduluzya zintu zyonse kulinguwe, neziba zintu zyaansi neziba zintu zili kujulu.
COL 1:21 Alimwi anwebo, kuchindi chakamana, mwakali bazwamaasi kuli Leza alimwi mwakali basinkondonyina a Leza mumizeezo amumichito mibi.
COL 1:22 Pele lino wakamuyanzanya mumubili wakwe ufwika kwinda mulufu wakachita eezi kuti amupedekezye kamusalala, kamutakwe kampenda, akutaba amulandu kunembo lyakwe,
COL 1:23 Nkukuti na mwakakatila mulusyomo, akwima njii akutasunzulusigwa mulusyomo lwamakani ngimwakamvwa. Aya makani akaambwa kumuntu woonse wakalengwa aansi ejulu. Aaya ngingawo makani mabotu kuti ime, ndi Pawulu, ndibe muzike.
COL 1:24 Lino ndilakondelwa machiswe angu nkambo kandinywe. Alimwi ndilazuzya mubili wangu makani achisyeede amapenzi a Kkilisito nkambo kamubili wakwe, nkukuti imbungano.
COL 1:25 Nkambo kambungano eeyi nchendimuzike, nkambo kakuti eyi milimo ndakayibikilwa a Leza nkambo kenu, akuzuzikizya ijwi lya Leza.
COL 1:26 Makani aayubide aasisidwe muchindi chamazyalani akalekale. Pele kwaino aliyubunwidwe kubasalali ba Leza.
COL 1:27 Kulibaaba Leza wakayanda kuyubununa mbububede buvubi bulemu bwamakani aya akati kabamasi, nkukuti Kkilisito uli mulindinywe, bulangizi bwabulemu.
COL 1:28 Oyo ngonguwe ngutu kambawuka. Tulalulamika akuyiisya bantu boonse achabusongo, kuchitila kuti tubayimikizye boonse kubusyu bwa Kkilisito chakulondoka.
COL 1:29 Nchichonya echo nchembeleka akusolekesya mbuli nguzu zyakwe mbuzilokubeleka mulindime changuzu.
COL 2:1 Nkambo ndiyanda kuti muzibe bupati bwamapenzi ngindakajana aandinywe, nkambo kabaabo baliku Layodisiya, abaabo bakatakonzya kubona busyu bwangu munyama.
COL 2:2 Ndilabeleka kuchitila kuti myoyo yabo isungwazike akambo kakwetwa antomwe muluyando alubo amuliboonse buvubi buzwide kanzambwenene akumvwisisisya, nsiswa zya Leza, izili Kkilisito.
COL 2:3 Mulinguwe boonse buvubi bwabusongo aluzibo muzisisidwe.
COL 2:4 Ndaamba echi kuchitila kuti takwepe anaba umwi ukonzya kumwena amakani akumuyunga.
COL 2:5 Nikuba nsili andinywe munyama, ndili andinywe mumuuya. Ndilabotelwa kubona kubamba obotu anguzu zyalusyomo lwenu muli Kkilisito.
COL 2:6 Mbuli mbumwakatambula Kkilisito Mwami, amweenda mulinguwe.
COL 2:7 Amukabyalwe muzyandamikwe mulinguwe, mukayakwe alinguwe, mukasimpikwe mulusyomo mbuli mbumwakayiisigwa, aakufwasuka mukulumba.
COL 2:8 Amubone kuti kutabi naba omwe umuyunga kukwamba makani alweno ataawo, kaziyendelana atunsiya-nsiya twabantu, azwa kuzilenge zyaansi atazwi kuli Kkilisito.
COL 2:9 Nkambo mulinguwe boonse buzwide bwa Leza mubuponi muchiimo chamubili.
COL 2:10 Alimwi mulazuzigwa mulinguwe. Ngomutwe wanguzu zyonse abwendelezi.
COL 2:11 Mulinguwe mumwakapalulwa abupalulwe butachitwi abantu mukugwisya nyama yamubili, Pesi mubupalulwe bwa Kkilisito.
COL 2:12 Mwakazikwa anguwe mulubbabbatizyo, amulinguwe mwakabusigwa mukwindila mulusyomo lwanguzu zya Leza, oyo wakamubusya kuzwa kubafu.
COL 2:13 Nimwakafwide muzibi zyenu animwakatapalwidwe kunyama zyenu, wakamuchita kuti mupone antomwe anguwe akutulekelela zibi zyesu.
COL 2:14 Wakazima makani abubi ayiminina andiswe amalayilile awo. Wakachigwisya akuchigankamina achingaano.
COL 2:15 Wakasamununa bendelezi abasibwami akubachitya kufwa bweme, akubazunda bo achingano.
COL 2:16 Akambo kaboobo, kutabi naba umwi umubeteka mukulya nimuba mukunywa, nikuba kumazuba amapobwe nanka amweezi mupya, nikuba kumazuba a Sabata.
COL 2:17 Eezi mwenzule wazintu zichiza, pesi mubili mwini ngu Kkilisito.
COL 2:18 Kutabi naba umwi uyanda kulifwinsya akukomba baangelo umubeteka kuzwa kumpindu yenu. Oyo muntu uliboobu ulanjila muzintu nzyakabona akuba mbwapekezya katakwe anchachitila mumiyeyo yanyama zyakwe.
COL 2:19 Tajisilidi kumutwe, nkuuzwa kumutwe mubili woonse nkujisilidi mungo amilambi yoonse nkwijisini amwi; ilakomena akukomena kupegwa a Leza.
COL 2:20 Kuti na mwakafwa aamwi a Kkilisito kuzilenge zyanyika, nkamboonzi muchipona kamuchibanga mulibe nyika:
COL 2:21 “Utagumi, nanka utalabili, nanka kujata”?
COL 2:22 Zintu zyoonse ezi ziyoloba akubelesegwa, kazilangene kumalayilile anjiisyo zyabantu.
COL 2:23 Eeyi milayizyo ilayubununa busongo, akulibombya beni akulibombya kweeta kusilikwa kwamibili yabo. Pesi tazijisi milimu yakutukasya kuzumina zichito zibi mumyoyo yesu.
COL 3:1 Kuti kakuli kuti Leza wakamubusya amwi a Kkilisito, amuyanduule zintu zyakujulu, oko Kkilisito nkwakkede kujanza lyechilisyo lya Leza.
COL 3:2 Amuyeeye atala azintu zyakujulu, pepe azimwi zili aansi.
COL 3:3 Nkambo mwakafwa, mpawo buumi bwenu bulisisidwe a Kkilisito muli Leza.
COL 3:4 Awo Kkilisito nazolibonia, uuli mbobumi bwenu, awo muyolibonia aamwi anguwe mubulemu.
COL 3:5 Muzibike kulufu, mpawo, zizo zyamunyika - bwamu, busofwazi, mpeekezyo, kuyandisya zibi, abusyachivulemwangu, kazili mituni.
COL 3:6 Nkambo kazeezi bukali bwa Leza nchibusikila bana bakutaswilila.
COL 3:7 Mulizeezi zintu nzimwakali mwenda mulinzizyo nimwakali kupona mulinzizyo.
COL 3:8 Pesi lino muyelede kuchenjela kuzintu zyonse ezi - bukali, lunyemo, mpeekezyo imbi, lunyansyo, amatusi kuzwa mumilomo yenu.
COL 3:9 Mutanowambilani zyakubeja umwi amwenzinyina, mbuli mbumwaka samununa buntu bukulukulu amwi azyiimbo zyabo,
COL 3:10 mpawo mwakazwata muntu mupya iwakachitwa mupya muluzibo mbukwelede kuchiimo chawoyo iwakachilenga.
COL 3:11 Awo mpawo atakwe muGiliki a muJuda, upalwidwe awutapalwidwe, basikubwelebweza, mu Sitiyeni, muzike, silwangunuko, pesi Kkilisito ulizulide, akuba muli zyoonse.
COL 3:12 Amuzwaate, mpawo, mbuli basale ba Leza, basalali bayandika, amuzwate moyo waluuse, buuya, kulibombya, kulifwinsya akukakatila.
COL 3:13 Amukkazikane myoyo umwi awumwi, amube aluzyalo umwi awumwi. Nakuti kuli uli akambo kumwenzinyina, umulekelele mbuli Mwami mbwakamulekelela.
COL 3:14 Atala azintu zyoonse, amube aluyando, lulindondulo chaanzyo chabubotu.
COL 3:15 Luumuno lwa Leza lwendelezye mumyoyo yenu, nkambo kandulolu lumuno nchimwakayitilwa mumubili omwe. Amube akulumba.
COL 3:16 Akube kuti Ijwi lya Kkilisito lipone mulindinywe, kuyiisya akululamikana umwi awumwi abusongo boonse, mukwimba nyimbo antembawuzyo anyimbo zyamumuya akulumba mumyoyo yenu kuli Leza.
