COL 3:17 Alimwi zyoonse nzimuchita, mumajwi amumichito, amuzichite zyoonse muzina lya Mwami Jesu. Amupe kulumba kuli Leza Taata kwinda mulinguwe.
COL 3:18 Nobanakazi, amulifwinsye kubaalumi benu, nkambo nchicheelede mu Mwami.
COL 3:19 Nobaluumi, amuyande banakazi benu, nkabela mutanobi abukkali kulimbabo.
COL 3:20 Nobana, amuswilile bazyali benu muzintu zyoonse, nkambo eezi zilabotelezya mu Mwami.
COL 3:21 Nomataata, mutanokkalalili bana benu, kuchitila kuti baleke kusululwa.
COL 3:22 Nobazike, amulemeke basimalelo benu munyama amuzintu zyoonse, pepe chipameso biyo, mbuli bantu basikuupaupa, pesi amoyo wanchoonzyo. Muyowe Mwami.
COL 3:23 Zyoonse nzimuchita, mubeleke kuzwa kumuuya wa Leza alubo pepe kubantu.
COL 3:24 Mulizi kuti muyotambula kuzwa ku Mwami mpindu yalukono. Ngu Mwami Kkilisito ngumubelekela.
COL 3:25 Nkambo kuliwoonse utachiti bululami ulatambula chisubulo chakutalulama kwakwe nkwachita, nkambo takulangwi chiimo chamuntu pe.
COL 4:1 Nobasimalelo, amupe balanda benu chakululama achakweleka. Mbumwizi kuti anywebo mulijisi simalelo uli kujulu.
COL 4:2 Amujatisye kukomba, musungwalile nkuko akulumba.
COL 4:3 Nkabela amutukombele aswebo, kuti Leza atujulile myeenya yajwi, kwamba makani masisike a Kkilisito. Nkambo kacheechi, ndilangidwe anketani.
COL 4:4 Amukombe kuti nkakonzye kulungulula, mbunjelede kuyowamba.
COL 4:5 Amweende chabusongo kulibaabo balaanze, amununune chiindi.
COL 4:6 Kwamba kwenu akube kwaluzyalo lyoonse, kulweezegwe amwinyo wakulumba, kuti mube abusongo bwakuvwiila kabotu kubantu boonse.
COL 4:7 Lino kumakani alatala andime, Tukiko mukwesu ulachita kuti mwazibe. Mukwesu uyandika, simulimoma musyomesi, muzikema mu Mwami.
COL 4:8 Ndamutuma kulindinywe nkambo kacheechi, kuti amuzibye makani andiswe, akusungilizya myoyo yenu.
COL 4:9 Ndilamutuma antomwe a Onesimasi, ulisyomekede alimwi mukwesu uyandika, kali umwi wenu. Bayomuzibisya zyoonse zyakachitika okuno.
COL 4:10 Alisitachasi, mwangema, ulokumujuzya, antomwe a Maakki, mwenzinyina wa Bbanabbasi (mulitambwide kale mulazyo wakuti, asika kulindinywe, mumutambule),
COL 4:11 antomwe a Jesu uyiitwa kuti ngu Jusitasi, Abo boonse babupalule mbasimilimoma mumulimo wabwami bwa Leza. Mbibakali lumbulizyo lwamoyo wangu.
COL 4:12 Epafulatasi ulokumujuzya loko. Nguumwi wenu alubo muzike wa Kkilsito Jesu. Ukkala kamwitilila munkombyo, kuchitila kuti mukiime chakuzulila akuba bwiini kulizyoonse muluyando lwa Leza.
COL 4:13 Ndipa bukamboni kuti umubelekela chamanguzu, kuli aabo balimu Layodisiya, antomwe akulibaabo balimu Hilapolisi.
COL 4:14 Lukka musilisi uyandika antomwe a Demasi balokumujuzya loko.
COL 4:15 Mujuzye bakwesu balimu Layodisiya, aku Nimfu, embungano ilimu ng'anda yakwe.
COL 4:16 Olu lugwalo lwamana kubalwa kulindinywe, amuchite kuti lubalwe akulako kumbungano yabaku Layodikiya.
COL 4:17 Amwambile Akkipa kuti, “Langa kabotu kumilimo njiwakatambula ku Mwami, kuti uyelede kuzuzikizya.”
COL 4:18 Olu lujuzyo ndalulemba amaboko aangu - ndime Pawulu. Kamuyeeya inketani zyangu. Luzyalo alube anywebo.
1TH 1:1 Pawuli, Siluvanisi aTimoti, kumbungano yakuTesalonika muliLeza Taata aMwami Jesu Kkilisito. Lino luzyalo alumuno alube kulindinywe kuzwa kuliLeza Taata aMwami Jesu Kkilisito
1TH 1:2 Lyoonse tupa kulumba kuliLeza kamulimoonse mbuli mbutumwaamba kwalyonse munkombyo zyesu.
1TH 1:3 Tulayeya kuti leza wesu aTaata kumulimu yalusyomo milimo yaluyando, ayabulindilizi mukulangilila muMwami Jesu Kkilisito.
1TH 1:4 Bakwesu nimuyandwa aLeza, tulizi wakamusala,
1TH 1:5 nkaambo majwi mabotu akasika kulindinywe pe pe mumajwi luzutu, pesi aalubo manguzu mumuuya usalala, mpawo amubwingi bwazisyomezyo. Aalubo, mulizi kuti twakali bantu balibyeni aakati kanu nkambo kanu.
1TH 1:6 Mwakaba basikwiya kulindiswe akumwami, nimwaka tambula majwi mumakataazyo alukondo kuzwa kumuya usalala.
1TH 1:7 Mbuli mpindu, mwakaba chitondezyo kuli boonse baliku Masedoniya aKkayiya basyoma.
1TH 1:8 Kuzwa kulindinywe jwi layMwami lyayitwa, mpo tee kuMasedoniya luzutu pe, akuKkayiya, pesi lusyomo kuliLeza lwakazulila koonse-koonse. Nkaambokako tatuyelede kwamba chintu kufumbwa.
1TH 1:9 Kuli mbabo lwabo kulangisisya ndiswe, kuti tulabulidilano nzi aakati kanu ambubakasanduka kuli Leza kuzwa kumuzimu kubelekela Leza wabwiini upona.
1TH 1:10 Akulindila mwanakwe kuzwa kujulu, oyo wakabuka kuzwa kubafu - Jesu, unununa kuzwa kubukali buzakuza.
1TH 2:1 Mbuli mbumuzi lwanu, bakwesu, kuti kuza kwesu kuli ndinywe tekwali kwabiyo.
1TH 2:2 Naabi mbuli mbumuzi, mikuba chiindi twakafwabisigwa akujatwa chakuusa kuFilipi, twakasima muliLeza wesu kwambula mumakani mabotu aaLeza mukombozeka kwinji.
1TH 2:3 Nkambo kakukombelezya kwesu tetwaka zwa kukubisya, mbuli nakwakazwa kukusalalamikuba kulweeno.
1TH 2:4 Kwinda mbuli mbutwakazumininwa aLeza, akusyomeka kumakani mabotu, lino tulambula, chakutabotezya muntu, pesi Leza ngonguwe uyoolanga myoyo yesu.
1TH 2:5 Elyo takwe nitwaka belesya majwi akuyosya, mbuli mbumuzi, na amuzee zowakuvumba butangazu Leza mukkamboni wesu.
1TH 2:6 Na tuyandula bulemu buzwa kubantu, nikuba kuzwa kulindinywe, na ba apositolo aabami.
1TH 2:7 Ikwinda, twakaba batete akti kanumbuli banyina bawumbulizya bana babo.
1TH 2:8 Munzila eeyi twakali kumuyanda. Twakabotelwa kwabana andinywe kakutali kumani aaLeza luzutu pesi alimwi abuumi bwesu. Mbuli kuti mwakati mwaba bayandwi kulindiswe.
1TH 2:9 Mbuli mbumuyeya, bakwesu, milimu yesu amamanino. Mansiku asikati twakali kubeleka kuti tuatabi mukuli kulumwi awumwi akati kanu. Mbuli mbutwaka kambawuka makani mabotu aaLeza.
1TH 2:10 Inywe mulibakkamboni, alimwi aaLeza mbuli mbwasalala, mbwaluleme, achakutaba amulandu, yakuba imponeno kuli ndinywe nimusyoma.
1TH 2:11 Munzila njiyeeyo mulizi mbutwakalibede kuli umwi awumwi wanu, mbuli wisi kubana bakwe, ndamusiya akumumbulizya akumukombelezya
1TH 2:12 kuti mweende munzila iyeelede yaLeza, umwita kubwami akubulemu.
1TH 2:13 Nkambo kakaako alimwi tilumba Leza lyoonse, kuti na mwatambula ijwi lyaLeza eelyo ndimwakamvwa kuzwa kuli ndiswe, temwakalitambula anga lyakazwa kumunt, pesi mbuli akakasimpe, ndijwi lyaLeza alimwi lila aamulimui mulindinywe nimusyoma.
1TH 2:14 Alimwi bakwesu mwakaba basikwiiya bambungano zyaLeza zili muJudiya muliKkilisito Jesu. Nkikaako alimwi mwakafwabisigwa muzintu zikozyene kuzwa kubantu banyika yanu, mbuli mbubakachita kuzwa kumaJuda.
1TH 2:15 Bakajaya antoomwe Mwami Jesu abansimi alimwi bakatutandila anze. tababotezyi Leza. Kwinda, Kukazyanya abantu boonse.
1TH 2:16 Batukasya kwambula abaMasi kuti bafutulwe. Impindu njakuti lyoonse bakali kuzuzya zibi zyabo kusikila kumamanino.
1TH 2:17 Pesi iswe bakwesu, twakali pambukene andinywe kwachiindi chifwifwi mubuntu peepe mumoyo. Twakalipeda loko, achiyandisyo chipati kuti tubone masyu anu.
1TH 2:18 Mbokunga twakali kuyanda kusika kulindinywe - ichonzyo me - Pawulo, lumwi alubo - pesi Satani wakatwimikizya.
1TH 2:19 Nkaambo ninzi bulangizi bwesu na kubotelwa, na musini wakulisumpula kunembo lyaMwami Jesu kukuboola kwakwe? Tensi nduwe?
1TH 2:20 Mbokunga uli bulemu, alukondo lwesu.
1TH 3:1 Nkekako, muchiindi netwaka tachilikukonzya, twakayeya kachili chibotu kusyala musule muAtene luzutu.
1TH 3:2 Twakatuma Timoti mukwesu alimwi simulimunyina waLeza mumakani aKkilisito, kukusimya akumumbulizya katulangana alusyomo lwanu,
1TH 3:3 kuchitila kuti takwe uyozunganisigwa amapenzi aya. Nkaambo inywe nobeni mulizi kuti eezi nzitwakasalilwa.
1TH 3:4 Kasimpe nitwakali anywebo, twaka mwambila kakuchilichindi kuti twakali twabafwifwi kunjila mumapenzi, alimwi zyakachitikan mbubonya obo, mbuli mbomuzi.
1TH 3:5 Nkambo kaako, nendaka takachilikukonzya, ndakatumina kuti ambweni ndalikunoziba zili ajulu alusyomo lwanu. Ambweni sikusunka mulimwi nzila wakamunsuka, mpawo mulimu wesu wakaba wabiyo.
1TH 3:6 Pesi Timoti wakasika kulindiswe kazwa kulindinywe akutwetela makani mabotu aalusyomo lwaano aluyando. Waka twaambila kutimualtuyibalikwa lyoonse alimwi kuti mulayandisya kumubona aswebo.
1TH 3:7 Nkaambo kazeezi, nobakwesu, twaka wumbulizigwa andinywe nkaambo kalusyomo lwanu, mubuusu akupega kwesu koonse.
1TH 3:8 Nkekaako lino tulapona, naamwayima nji muMwami.
1TH 3:9 Nkaambo chilumbo nzi ncetunga tulapa kuliLeza nkaambo kanu, nkaako luyando loonse ndotulalo kunembo lyaLeza wesu alube alindinywe.
1TH 3:10 Mansiku esikati tulakombesya kuti netwakali kumubona kumeso aanu akupa ezyoo zibulikide mulusyomo lwanu.
1TH 3:11 Tukumbila kuti Leza wesu alimwi Taata lwakwe, aMwami wesu Jesu batululamikile nzila yesu iiza kulindinywe.
1TH 3:12 Akube kuti Mwami amuchite kuti muvule alimwi akumufwasusya muluyando lwawumwi amwenzinyinaakuli boonse bantu, mbubonya mbotu muchitila.
1TH 3:13 Akube kuti amuyumye mumoyo kuchitila kuti ibe myoyo itakwe kampenda mubusalali kunembo lyaLeza alimwi Taata wesu akuboola kwaMwami Jesu antomwe abasalali bakwe boonse.
1TH 4:1 Kumamanino, bakwesu, tuza kulindinywe akumukombelezya tulamusungilizya muMwami Jesu. Mbuli mbumwakatambula malayilile kuzwa kulindiswe atala mbumweledee kwenda akubotezya Leza, alubo munzila yalwendo olu kuchitila kuti mwinkilile kunembo.
1TH 4:2 Mulazi malayilile ngitwa kamupa muMwami Jesu.
1TH 4:3 Pele okunkuyanda kwaLeza, kulisalazya kwanu, kuti muleke bwamu,
1TH 4:4 kuti umwi wanu azibe mbwayelede kujana chibelesyo chakwe mubusalalialimwi mubulemu,
1TH 4:5 kutali mumiyeyo yabubi (mbuli bamasi batazi Leza.)
1TH 4:6 Kutabi muntu utaluka akubisya munyina kulezi zintu. Nkaambo leza ngubwedezya muzintu zyoonse mbuli, mbuli mbutwakamuchenjezya akumupa bukamboni.
1TH 4:7 Asi Leza taakamwitila kutasalala asi kubusalali.
1TH 4:8 Alimwi oyo ukaka eeli takakili muntu, pele Leza uupa muuya usalala kuli ndinywe.
1TH 4:9 Nkatwamba aluyando lwabunyina, tamuchelede umwi muntu amulembele, kambo inywe lwanu muyisigwa aLeza kuti muyande umwi awumwi.
1TH 4:10 Nchobeni, mulachita ezi akuba kwesu boonse balikuMasedoniya. Pesi tulamusungilisya, bakwesu kuti muchitisye echi.
1TH 4:11 Tula musungilizya kuti mulangilile kupona buumi bwalumuno, langana azyako, akubeleka amaboko ako, mbuli mbutwakamulayilila.
1TH 4:12 Kuchitila kuti mwende obotu kunembo lyabali anze alusyomo olu alimwi akutabula chintu.
1TH 4:13 Tatuyandi kuti mube batabizigwa, bakwesu, abaabo boona, kuchitila kuti mutapengi mbuli boonse, abo batakwe bulangilizi.
1TH 4:14 Pele kuti nkatusyoma kuti Jesu wakafwa wabuka alimwi wakabuka lubo. Mbuboobo Leza uyoyeta aJesu abo bakoona mulinguwe.
1TH 4:15 Aboobo twamba ezi kulindinywe ajwi lyaMwami, kuti iswe nituchipona, abo basyede kukubola kwaMwami, kasimpe tatukoyo tangunina abo bakatanguna koona.
1TH 4:16 Pele Mwami lwakwe uyoselela kuzwa kujulu. Uyoboola amongololo, ajwi lyamungelo silutwe, alimwi amweembo waLeza. Alimwi bafwide muli Kkilisito bayobuka kusanguna.
1TH 4:17 Pele swe tobawumi, basyede, tuyobwezwa toonse ambabo mumayoba kuyoswana Mwami mumulengalenga. Munzila eyi tunoli antomwe aMwami.
1TH 4:18 Aboobo, amumbulizyanye umwi awumwi amajwi aya.
1TH 5:1 Lino katulangene achindi alimwi azyindi zyamwaka nobakwesu, tamukwe chimunga mulalembulula.
1TH 5:2 Nkambo anywebo lwanu mulizi kabotu kuti bunsi bwaMwami busika mbuli mubbi mansiku.
1TH 5:3 Elyo nibati,”Lumuno alimwi akubambikana,”mpawo kunyonyoka kwamachampmamo kulobasikila. Kunoli mbuli machise akuzyala kumwanakazi ulaada. takukwe mbubanga balapuzuka.
1TH 5:4 Pesi inywe, nobakwesu, tamuli mumudima zyakuti buzuba nga bulamuzida mbuli mubbi.
1TH 5:5 Nkambo nywe moonse muli bana balombe bamumuni alimwi bana balombe babuzuba. Tatuli bana balombe bamansiku naa bamudima.
1TH 5:6 Nkinkako tatoni mbuli bingi mbubachita. Ani kuti, tusinsimuke akuba changa.
1TH 5:7 Nkambo abo bawona bachita obo mansiku, alimwi abo bakolwa bachita obo mansiku.
1TH 5:8 Pesi mbutuli babuzuba, twelede kukkala katuli changa alimwi akuzwata lusyomo aluyando mbuli ntobo, alimwi bulangilizi bwalufutuko bwangwani yesu.
1TH 5:9 Nkambo leza takatusalila bukali, pesi kujana lufutuko kwindila muli Mwami Jesu Kkilisito.
1TH 5:10 Nguwe wakatufwida swe kut, nikuba tulalanga na tulona, tukapone amwi anguwe.
1TH 5:11 Nkinkanko mumbulizyanye umwi awumwi alimwi muyakane, mbuli mbumulokuchita kale.
1TH 5:12 Tulokumukombelezya chamoyo, nobakwesu kuti muyeye abo babeleka akati kanu alimwi abo balajulu lyanu muMwami alimwi bamulayilila.
1TH 5:13 Twamukumbila alubo mubalemeke loko muluyando nkambo kamilimo yabo. Ngamube alumuno akati kanu.
1TH 5:14 Tulamusungwazya, nobakwesu; muchenjezye abo bakandu, musungwazye batyompedwe, mugwasye batete, alimwi mube amoyo mulamfu kulibonse.
1TH 5:15 Mubone kuti Takwe naba omwe ubwedezya chibi achibi kuli umwi. Anu kuti, mutobele ezyo zibotu kuli umwi awumwi alimwi kulibonse.
1TH 5:16 Mukondwe lyonse.
1TH 5:17 Mukombe katakwe kwimikila.
1TH 5:18 Mulizyonse mupe kulumba. Nkambo oku nkukuyanda kwaLeza muli Kkilisito Jesu kulindinywe.
1TH 5:19 Mutatontozyi Muuya.
1TH 5:20 Mutanyansyi businsimi.
1TH 5:21 Musunke zintu zyonse. Mujatilile kuzibotu.
1TH 5:22 Muswene kule kuzwa kububi bwamisyobo yoonse.
1TH 5:23 Inche Leza walumuno amusalazye kumaninide. Inche amuuya wanu wonse, moyo, alimwi, mubili zibambwe katakwe mulandu nkambo kwakuboola kwaMwami wesu Jesu Kkilisito.
1TH 5:24 Ulisyomekede oyo umwiita, oyo ulozichita lubo.
1TH 5:25 Nobakwesu, mutukombele aswebo.
1TH 5:26 Mujuzye bakwesu a nkisi isalala.
1TH 5:27 Ndamulayilila chamoyo wonse kwinda muMwami kuti olu lugwalo lubalwe kubakwesu bonse.
1TH 5:28 Iluzyalo lwaMwami Jesu Kkilisito lube anywebo.
2TH 1:1 Pawulu, aSilivansi, aTimoti, kumbungano yakuTesalonika muliLeza Taatesu aMwami Jesu Kkilisito.
2TH 1:2 Luzyalo kulindinywe aluumuno luzwa kuliLeza Taatesu aMwami Jesu Kkilisito.
2TH 1:3 Twelede kupa kulumba lyoonse kuliLeza nkambo kenu, nobakwesu, mbuli mbukwelede, nkaambo lusyomo lwanu lulikukkomena bwindilide abwindilide, alimwi aluyando nwebo ndumulalo kuli umwi awumwi lulikuyungizigwa.
2TH 1:4 Elyo iswe lwesu tulalidundilizya atala andinywe mumbungano yaLeza nkambo lukakatila alusyomo muliwonse masukusyo aanu, amumapenzi aayo ngimuswanana awo.
2TH 1:5 Eechi nchitondezyo chalubeta lwaLeza lusalala, kuchitila kuti mukeele loko kubwami bwaLeza mbumulikupenzegwa biyo.
2TH 1:6 Nkambokako, chililuleme kuliLeza kubwedezya mapenzi kuli baabo bamupenzya,
2TH 1:7 akubwedezegwa kulindinywe aabo bapenzegwa andiswe, elyo mwami Jesu nayolibonya kuzwa kujulu abangelo bakwe basinguzu.
2TH 1:8 Mubbalabala lyamulilo, uyobwedezya zibi kulibabo batamwizi Leza akuli babo batalemeki kujwi lyamwami wesu Jesu.
2TH 1:9 Bayopengana achisubulo chalunyonyoko lutamanikuzwa kunembo lyaMwami akuzwa kubulemu bwanguzuzyakwe.
2TH 1:10 Uyochita eezi nayoboola mubuzuba obo kuti akalumbayizigwe mubantu bakwe basalala akulumbayizigwa abantu boonse abo bamusyoma, nkaambo bukamboni bwesu kulindinwe bakasyoma.
2TH 1:11 Nkaambo kazezi tulamukombela chakutaleka, nkokuti Leza wesu akalangisisye lokokubwitwe bwenu, anguzu zyakwe uyozuzikizya wonse makanze mabotu ayoonse milimu yalusyomo.
2TH 1:12 Tukomba boobu kuchitila kuti zina lyamwami Jesu lilumbayizigwe mulindinywe andinywe mulinguwe, kwiinda muluzyalo lwa Leza a Mwami Jesu Kkilisito.
2TH 2:1 Lino atala, akuboola kwaMwamiJesu Kkilisito akubungana kwesu katulantomwe kuti tukabe awe, twamukumbila changuzu bakwesu,
2TH 2:2 kuti mutakazungani kumiyeyo na kumafwabi anu, nekuba mumuuya, na kujwi, nekuba kulugwalo lubanga luzwa kulondiswe. Chakuyeya kuti buzuba bwaMwami buliswenede kale.
2TH 2:3 Kutabi muntu umwena kufumbwa munzila ilibyeni. Nkaambo tabukoyosika mane kulebwa kusike, pele muntu mubi ayubunuke, mwana walunyonyoko.
2TH 2:4 Oyo ukazya akulisumpula mwini ajulu azyoonse zyaamba Leza na zikombw. Kuzwano ngukala mung'anda yaLeza akulyamba kuti, ndime Leza.
2TH 2:5 Tamuyeyi nindakalandinywe mbundakamwambila ezi zintu?
2TH 2:6 Lino mulichizi chintu chimukasya kuti, uyoyubunuka luzutu kuchindi chelede.
2TH 2:7 Nkaambo makani asisidwe akusotoka mulawu alikubeleka kale, pele kulumwi umukasya mane akagwisigwe munzila.
2TH 2:8 Elyo nayoyubunuka sikusotoka milawo, oyo mwami Jesu ngwayonyonyona amuuya wamulomo wakwe akumulobya akulibonya kwakubola kwakwe.
2TH 2:9 Kuboola kwasikusotoka milawu uyobeleka milimo yaSatani anguzu zyoonse, azitondezyo, azigambyo zyakubeja,
2TH 2:10 amisyobo yoonse yabubi akweena abo bali mukunyonyoka, nkaambo tebakatambula luyando lwakasimbe kuti bafutulwe.
2TH 2:11 Akaambo kako, Leza wabatumina nguzu zyalweeno kuti bakasyome kuli yakubeja.
2TH 2:12 Kuti boonse bakapegwe mulandu akutasyoma kasimpe ababo balibotezya mukutalulama.
2TH 2:13 Pele tuleelede lyoonse kupa kulumba kuliLeza akaambo kanu bakwesu bayandwa aLeza wakamusala mbuli michelo mitaanzi kwiindila mukutambula lufutuko amukusalazigwa kunguzu zyamuuya akusyoma kasimpe.
2TH 2:14 Wakamwiita kwinda kumakani mabotu esu. Kuti mukavube bulemu bwa Mwami wesu Jesu Kkilisito.
2TH 2:15 Nkaambo kaako bakwes, amwime nji akujatisya kumilawu njemwakayisigwa, nikuba kujwi na kulugwalo lwesu.
2TH 2:16 Elyo Mwami wesu Jesu Kkilisito mwini aLeza Taatesu, wakatuyanda akutupa lumbulizyo lutamani abulangilizi bubootu kwiinda muluzyalo,
2TH 2:17 awumbulizye akusimya myooyo yanu kumilimu yoonse mibotu akujwi.
2TH 3:1 Lino nobakwesu amutukombele, kuti ijjwi lyaMwami lyeende alimwi libe abulemu mbulimbuzibede zilimulindinwe.
2TH 3:2 Alimwi kuti tukangununwe kububi akubantu babi, nkaambo teboonse pe balalusyomo.
2TH 3:3 Pesi Mwami ulasyomeka, uyomusimya akumukwabilila kuzwa kumubi.
2TH 3:4 Tulachibindi muMwami atala andiwe, kuli zyoonse zyomuchita alimwi tulendelela anembo kuchita zintu zitulayilila.
2TH 3:5 Mwami alulamike myoyo yanu kuluyando lwaLeza akulukakatilo lwaKkilisito.
2TH 3:6 Lino tulamulayilila kuti, bakwesu, muzina lyaMwami wesu Jesu Kkilisito, kuti mukasya woonse mukwesu weenda munzila italuleme alimwi taponi katobelezya ziyanza nzimwakatambula kuzwa kulindiswe.
2TH 3:7 Nganywebo lwenu mulizi kabotu mulindinywe kutobelezya ndiswe, nkaambo tetakalibulikidwe nitwakali andinywe.
2TH 3:8 Tetwakalya chinkwa chawumwi katutachibhadalide, pesi twakalikubeleka isikati amansiku mukuminwa kapati kuti tutalemwi kufumbwa wanu.
2TH 3:9 Twakachita ezi zitambi kuti tetwakalikwe bwendelezi, pesi twakachita echi chibe chitondezyo kulindinywe, kuti mukatutobelezye.
2TH 3:10 Ngambuli mbutakali andinywe, twakamulayilila, “oyo utazumini kubeleka telede kulya.”
2TH 3:11 Ngatwamvwa kuti bamwi akati kanu beenda mukuleya, kutali kujatikana akubeleka, pesi mibili ijatikene.
2TH 3:12 Lino bali boobo tulabalayilila akukombelezya muMwami Jesu Kkilisito, kuti belede kubeleka chabuninzi alimwi balye chinkwa chabo.
2TH 3:13 Pesi nywebo, nobakwesu, mutakatali mukuchita zibotu.
2TH 3:14 Pesi na umwi katalemeki ijwi lyesu mulugwalo olu amulangisisye alimwi mutabi abulidilane anguwe, kuchitila kuti akanyansigwe.
2TH 3:15 Nikuba boobo mutakamubwezi mbulisinkondo nyokwe, pesi mukamuchenjezye mbuli munyokwe.
2TH 3:16 Lino Mwami walumuno lwakwe mwini amupe lumuno chiindi choonse munzila zyoonse. Mwami abe andinywe moonse.
2TH 3:17 Ime ndiPawulo, ndalemba ezi aluboko lwangu, chili chichitondezyo mumagwalo woonse ngindilemba.
2TH 3:18 Luzyalo lwaMwami wesu Jesu Kkilisito lube andinywe moonse. Ameni.
1TI 1:1 Pawulu, mutumwa waKkilisito Jesu mbuli mumalayilile aLeza Mufutuli wesu a Kkilisito Jesu bulangilizi bwesu,
1TI 1:2 kuli Timoti, mwanan mulombe wasimpe mulusyomo: Lizyalo, luse, a luumuno kuzwa kuli Leza Taata aKkilisito Jesu Mwaami wesu.
1TI 1:3 Mbuli mbundakakusungwaazya kuti uchite aawo nindakali kuzwa kuya kuMasedoniya, syaala mu Efeso nkokuti ukonzye kulayilila bamwi bantu kutibatayiisyi iimwi njisyo iisiyene.
1TI 1:4 Nikuba boobo bataswilizyi twaano amazyalani aatagoli. Eezi zichita kukazyanya kwiinda kuba balondozi baLeza, kabuli bwa lusyomo.
1TI 1:5 Lino bulangilili bwa malayilile nduyando luzwa mumoyo uusalala, kuzwa mukulimvwida kubotu, a kuzwa mulusyomo lwini.
1TI 1:6 Bamwi bantu balookusweka kuzwa kuzintu eezi akusandukila kukwaambula kwabufubafuba.
1TI 1:7 Bayanda kuba bayisi bamulawu, pesi tabamvwisisisyi eezyo nzibaambula nikuba eezyo nzibazikitizya kwaamba.
1TI 1:8 Pesi iswe tulizi kuti mulawu mubotu ikuti na umwi wawubelesya chamulawu.
1TI 1:9 Swe tulizi, kuti mulwawu tewakabikilwa baalumi baluleme pe abusena, pesi kuli aabo batakwe mulawu alimwi bantu bakapanduka, aabo bantu batakwe bunaleza alimwi a basizibi, abaabo batasalali alimwi kabateeli, nguwabaabo bajaya mawisi a manyina, ngwabajayi,
1TI 1:10 ngwabantu bayandisya zyakulalana, ababo bachita zyakulalana lwabo lwabo, ababo babba bantu akubachita bazike, ngwababeja, abaamba bukamboni bwakubeja alimwi kufumbwa zyoonse eezyo zikazyanya aanjisyo ntuloko.
1TI 1:11 Oku kulayilila kuli mbuli makani mabotu aabulemu bwaLeza ulongezegelwe kuli ngawo ngindakapegwa.
1TI 1:12 Ndilumba Kkilisito Jesu Mwaami wesu. Wakandisimya, nkaambo wakandiyeya mbuli uusyomekede, alimwi wakandinanikila mulimu.
1TI 1:13 Ndakali kusampawula Leza, mufwabyi, alimwi mwaalumi wankondo. Pesi ndakatambula luse nkaambo ndakalikuchita mukutaziba a mukutasyoma.
1TI 1:14 Alimwi luzyalo lwaMwaami wesu lwakafusuka aantomwe a lusyomo alimwi a luyando oolo luli muli Kkilisito Jesu.
1TI 1:15 Ooyu mulumbe nguwanchoonzyo alimwi uleelede kutambulwa koonse, kuti Kkilisito Jesu wakasika munyika kuzofutula basizibi.
1TI 1:16 Pesi nkaambo kaboobo ndakapegwa luse, kuti mulindime, mutanzi, Kkilisito Jesu akonzyed kutondezya moyo mulamfu. Wakachita eechi mbuli chitondezyo kulibaabo bayosyoma mulinguwe kubuumi butamani.
1TI 1:17 Lino kuMwaami wachindi, utafwi, utabonwi, Leza uumwi luzutu, ngakube bulumbu alimwi bulemu kuli lyoonsea lyoonse. Ameni.
1TI 1:18 Ndilokubika malayilile aaya kunembo lyako, Timoti, mwana wangu, mukweendelana kwabusinsimi bwakachitwa musule aatala a nduwe kuti ukonzye kulwana kulwana kubotu,
1TI 1:19 kojisilidi kulusyomo alimwi akukulimvwida kubotu. Aakukaka eezi, bamwi bakasweekelwa alusyomo lwabo.
1TI 1:20 Bo mba Himeniyasi a Alekizanda, aabo mbindakapeda kuli Satani kuchitila kuti bakakuyisigwe kutasampawula Leza.
1TI 2:1 Nkinkaako, lutanzi kuli zyoonse, ndasungwazya kuti nkumbizyo, nkombyo, nkumbililo, alimwi kupa kulumba kuchitilwe bantu boonse,
1TI 2:2 kwa Baami alimwi aboonse bali mubweendelezi, kuchitila kuti tupone buumi bwaluumuno alimwi butontwede mubunaleza boonse akuzikatila.
1TI 2:3 Eechi nchibotu alimwi chilatambulika kunembo lyaLeza Mufutuli wesu.
1TI 2:4 Uulombozya kuti bantu bonse bafutulwe alimwi akusika kuluzibo lwasimpe.
1TI 2:5 Nkaambo kuli Leza umwi, alimwi kuli mwiiminini omwe waLeza a muntu, mwaalumi Kkilisito Jesu.
1TI 2:6 Wakalipa lwakwe mbuli muulo waboonse, mbuli bukamboni kuchiindi cheelede.
1TI 2:7 Nkaambo kamakanze aaya ndakasalilwa kuba mukambawusi akuba mutumwa - ndokwamba simpe, tandilokubeja pe - alimwi muyisi wa baMaasi mulusyomo a musimpe.
1TI 2:8 Nkinkaako, ndiyanda baalumi mumasena woonse bakombe alimwi banyampule maboko aasalala kakutakwe kunyema akukazyanya.
1TI 2:9 Munzila yomwe, bayelede kuzwata ingubo ntuloko, zipa buntu alimwi alikujata, kabatakwe masusu aalukidwe na ngolide na zyebeka na ingubo zidula,
1TI 2:10 pesi zyeelela banakazi aabo baamba bunaLeza kwiindila amilimu mibotu.
1TI 2:11 Mwanakazi uyelede kwiiya muchuumunizi amukulibombya koonse.
1TI 2:12 Tandizumizyi mwanakazi kuyisya na kubelesya bweendelezi aatala amwaalumio, pesi kupona muchuumunizi.
1TI 2:13 Nkaambo Adamu wakasanguna kulengwa, mpawo Eva.
1TI 2:14 Adamu takenwa pe, pesi mwanakazi nguwakeenwa alimwi wakaba mubisyi.
1TI 2:15 Nikubaboobo, uyofutulwa kwiinda mukuzyala bana, kuti bayinkilila mulusyomo a muluyando a mukusalazigwa aantomwe amunse wamiyeyo.
1TI 3:1 Eechi chaambyo chilinchicho: Na muntu kayanda kuba mupati wambungano, ulombozya mulimu mubotu.
1TI 3:2 Nkinkaako mupati wambungano teelede kuba akampenda pe. Uyelede kuba mulumi wa mwanakazi umwe. Uleelede kuba muntu uli achiimo chibotu, uyeya kabotu, uzikatide, alimwi usamawusya. Uyelede kukonzya kuyisya.
1TI 3:3 Teelede kuba muntu uyandisya wayini, utakazyi a kutalwana pe, pesi aboobo, kalisibuuya, siluumuno. Teelede kuba simuyanda mali pe.
1TI 3:4 Abe muntu ukonzya kubamba n'anda yakwe kabotu, alimwi uyeelede kuba aanchonzyo kuti bana bakwe balamuswilizya akumulemeka munzila zyoonse.
1TI 3:5 Nkaambo na mwaalumi katazi kubamba n'anda yakwe mwini, kujana ulakonzya biyeni kubamba mbungano yaLeza?
1TI 3:6 Teelede kuba muntu uuchisanduka, kuchitila kuti katazimbi chakulisumpula alimwi ulakonzya kuwida mukupegwa mulandu mbuli Satani.
1TI 3:7 Aboobo abe muntu ulempuwo mbotu kuli baabo balaanze, kuti atawide mu mawuse a mukakole ka dyabbulosi.
1TI 3:8 Munzila ikozyenye, madikkoni beelede kuba abulemu, batabi bandimi-zyobile. Tabeelede kunywa loko wayini a kutangala.
1TI 3:9 Baleelede kubamba nsiswa chalusyomo a miyeyo isalala.
1TI 3:10 Baleelede kuzumininwa lutanzi, alimwi elyo beelede kubeleka nkaambo tabakwe kampenda.
1TI 3:11 Munzila ikozyenye, banakazi babo beelede kuba abulemu, batakwe manwa, pesi balijisi alimwi basyomekede muzintu zyoonse.
1TI 3:12 Badikkoni kabali balumi ba mwanakazi umwi. Baleelede kubamba kabotu bana babo a n'anda zyabo.
1TI 3:13 Nkaambo aabo bakabeleka kabotu balajana lwabo kwimikila kubotu alimwi a busichaamba bupati mulusyomo luli muliKkilisito Jesu.
1TI 3:14 Mbuli mbundikulemba zintu ezi kulinduwe, ndabulangilizi bwakusika kulinduwe akufwambana.
1TI 3:15 Pesi na ndanonoka, ndikukulembela kuti uzibe kuti kulibambwa biyeni mun'anda yaLeza, ili njiyo mbungano yaLeza muumi, njembandama a mugwasyi wasimpe.
1TI 3:16 toonse tulazumina kuti insiswa yabunaleza nimpati loko: “Wakayubununwa munyama, wakachitwa uusalala aMuuya, wakabonwa a bangelo, wakaambwa akati kamanyika, wakasyomegwa munyika, alimwi wakatolwa kujulu mubulemu.”
1TI 4:1 Lino Muuya ulaamba entanganana kuti muzyiindi ziyotobela bamwi bantu bayosiya lusyomo alimwi bakaswiilile myuuya yalweeneeno akunjiisyo zyabadayimona
1TI 4:2 mukubeja kwakuupawupa, mamvwido aabo beni kaali asizigwa.
1TI 4:3 Bayokasya bantu kuti bakwatane alimwi akuyanda kuti balilesye kuzilyo Leza nzyakalenga kuti zitambulwe chakupa kulumba abaabo basyoma akuziba kasimpe.
1TI 4:4 Nkaambo choonse chilengwa chaLeza nchibotu, alimwi takwe pe chitambwidwe kakulikupa kulumba chiyokakwa.
1TI 4:5 Nkaambo chakasalazigwa ajwi lyaLea ankombyo.
1TI 4:6 Na wabika eezi zintu kunembo lyabakwesu, uyooba mulanda mubotu wa Jesu Kkilisito. Nkaambo mulikukomezegwa amajwi alusyomo alimwi akunjiisyo mbotu nzimwakatobela.
1TI 4:7 Pesi amukake twaano twanyika twakayandwa aabanakazi bapati. Aboobo, amukaliyiisye nobeni mubunaleza.
1TI 4:8 Nkaambo kuliyiisya kwamumubili kuli empindu nini, pesi bunaLeza bulabelesegwa kuzintu zyoonse. Kujisi chisyomezyo chabuumi bwalino alimwi akubuumi buza.
1TI 4:9 Mulumbe ooyu ulisyomekede alimwi uleelede kutambulwa kuzwide.
1TI 4:10 Nkaambo nkinkaako nchitubeleka akulwisya. Nkaambo tulalangilila muliLeza muumi, Mufutuli wabantu boonse, pesi ikapati wabasyomi.
1TI 4:11 Mubululami layilila alimwi yiisya zintu eezi.
1TI 4:12 Kutabi muntu uulangilila aansi bukubusi bwako. Aboobo, kulibaabo basyoma, ba chitondezyo mukwaambula, mukuchita, muluyando, mukusyoma a mubusalali.
1TI 4:13 Mane do ndisike, kkala mukubala, mukulumbayizya alimwi a mukuyiisya.
1TI 4:14 Utalekeleli chipo chili mulinduwe, chakapegwa kulinduwe kwiinda muchisinsim, akubikwa maanza abapati bembungano.
1TI 4:15 Bamba zintu eezi. Ba mulinzizyo, kuti kuzwidilila kwako kukaboneke kubantu boonse.
1TI 4:16 Kolibamba chakulangisisya lwako mwini akukuyiisya. Kkalilila muzintu eezi. Nkaambo mukuchita oobo, uyolifutula lwako alimwi abaabo batakaswiilizye nduwe.
1TI 5:1 Utanokkalalili mwaalumi mupati. Aboobo, komunyampula mbuli mukuti ngundeende. Kobanyampula baalumi banini mbuli bakulana,
1TI 5:2 banakazi bapati mbuli mamama, alimwi basimbi banini mbuli bachizi, mubusalali boonse.
1TI 5:3 Lemeka bamukabafu, bamukabafu banchoonzyo.
1TI 5:4 Pesi kuti mukamufu kali aabana na bazukulu, ngabatangune lwabo kwiiya kutondezya kulemeka mun'anda yabo beni. Ngababweedezezye bazyali babo nkaambo eechi chilbotezya kuli Leza.
1TI 5:5 Pesi kulooyo mukamufu wanchoonzyo, uucheede kali alike, ubikide bulangilizi bwakwe kuliLeza akwwinkilila kunembo mukuchita nkumbizyo alimwi akupa nkombyo mansiku a sikati.
1TI 5:6 Nikubaboobo, mwanakazi uupona chakulikondelezya ulifwide nikuba kachipona.
1TI 5:7 Mubululami layilila eezi lubo, kuchitila kuti batabi amulandu.
1TI 5:8 Pesi na umwi katakonzyi kupa banzubo zyakwe, kapati kuli aabo bamun'anda yakwe, unoli wakaka lusyomo alimwi wabija kwiinda utasyomi.
1TI 5:9 Leka mwanakazi alembwe mbuli mukamufu utali munini kuminyaka iili makkumi aali musanu alimwi kukomena, kali mwanakazi wa mulumi uumwi.
1TI 5:10 Uli aampuwo yakuchita milimu mibotu, nikuba kuti wakabambide bana, na wakali kusamawusya beenzu, na wali kusanzya mawulu aabasalali baLeza, na wakalikulemutuzya bali aamapenzi, na wakalilipedelede kumilimu yoonse mibotu.
1TI 5:11 Pesi kuli bamukabafu bachili banini, kaka kubalemba mulibamwi. Nkaambo elyo bakuzundwa kuziyandisyo zyanyama kukubukila Kkilisito bayanda kukkwatwa.
1TI 5:12 Muliyeeyi nzila bayojana milandu nkaambo banoli bakachilwa mukulipeda kwabo kutaanzi.
1TI 5:13 Muchiindi nchicheecho, bayoyiya kuba bakandu akweenda chakuzyunguluka kuzwa kun'anda akun'anda. Tabakoyooba bakandu biyo pe, pesi bayowambuula zitakwe munse akunjila zyaambo zyabamwi, kabaamba zintu nzibateelede kwaamba.
1TI 5:14 Nkinkaako ndiyanda banakazi banini kuti bakkwatwe kuti bazyale bana, kuti babambe mpuli, alimwi akutapa mweenya kuli sinkondonyina kuti atwaambe bubi.
1TI 5:15 Mbuli bamwi mbubakabwedela kuli Satani.
1TI 5:16 Na kuti kakuli mwanakazi musyomi uli abamukabafu, ngabagwasye, kuchitila kuti imbungano itabi aamukuli, kuti igwasizye bamukabafu banchoonzyo.
1TI 5:17 Leka bapati bembungano beendelezya kabotu bapegwe bulemu bwiindulwidwe, kwaambisya aabo babeleka ajwi alimwi amukuyiisya.
1TI 5:18 Mbuli makani mabotu mbawamba kuti, “Utamwaangi kumulomo musune aawo nachilyatila zilyo” alimwi “Similimu uleelede kujana mpindu yakwe.”
1TI 5:19 Utatambuli kubejelezya kwiiminana abapati, adukuti kube babili na batatu bapa bukamboni.
1TI 5:20 Lulamika basizibi kunembo lyabantu boonse kuchitila kuti bamwi bayowe.
1TI 5:21 Mubululami ndakulayilila iwe, kunembo lyaLeza aJesu Kkilisito akubangelo basale, kukubamba malayilile chakutabasikusaluuzya, akutachita chimwi chintu chakuteelanya.
1TI 5:22 Utabiki maanza chakufwambana aluumwi. Utaabilani muzibi zyawumwi muntu. Weelede kulibamba chabusalali.
1TI 5:23 Tucheelede limbi kunywa manzi. Aboobo, uyeelede kunywa wayini muche kuchitila bula amalwazi aako akkala kakuchisa.
1TI 5:24 Zibi zyabamwi bantu zilizibikene aantanganana, alimwi zyeenda kunembo lyabo mulubeta. Pesi zibi zimwi zitobela musule.
1TI 5:25 Mbubonya oobo, imwi milimu mibotu ilizibidwe antaanganana, pesi nikuba imwi tikonzyi kusisigwa.
1TI 6:1 Leka boonse balimunsi ejogwe mbuli bazike babone basimalelo babo kabeelela boonse bulemu. Beelede kuchita eechi kuchitila kuti izina lyaLeza alimwi aluyiisyo lutakasampawulwi.
1TI 6:2 Bazike bali abasimalelo babo basyoma tabeelede kutondezya kutabalemeka nkaambo mbananyina. Aboobo, beelede kubabelekela milimu mukwiindilila. Nkaambo basimalelo bagwasikana amilimu yabo mbasyomi alimwi mbayandisi. Yiisya alimwi waambe eezi zintu.
1TI 6:3 Na umwi wayiisya injiisyo yakubeja alimwi katazuminani amajwi aalamunse aMwaami wesu Jesu Kkilisito alimwi ayabunaleza injiisyo,
1TI 6:4 ulalisumpula alimwi takwe nchamvwisisisya pe. Uli aachiyandisyo chisofweede mukukazyanya akubonisyanya aatala amajwi ayeta lunyemo, kulwana, zisapi, kuyeeyelana bubi,
1TI 6:5 alimwi akulwana kutamani aakati kabantu bali aabuntu bwamiyeyo mibi. Bakasweekelwa simpe alimwi bayeya kuti bunaleza ninzila yakujanisya mali nyingi. Amwi malembe achiindi alayungizizya mukulumbayizya, Musosoloke kuzwa kuzintu ziliboobu. Pesi malembe mabotu achiindi lok taajisi.
1TI 6:6 Lino bunaleza buli aakukkutisikana nkulijanina kupati,
1TI 6:7 nkaambo takwe nchitwakeeta munyika, alimwi takwe nchiinga tulakonzya kugwisya mulinjiyo.
1TI 6:8 Aboobo, ngatukakkutisikane achakulya akuzisamo.
1TI 6:9 Lino aabo bayanda kuba bavubi bawida mumasunko, mukakole. Bawida mubufubafuba bwiingi amuziyandisyo zinyonyoona, alimwi kufumbwa mulizimwi zibbizya bantu mukunyonyooka amukumwaya.
1TI 6:10 Nkaambo luyando lwemali muyanda wamisyobo yoonse yabubi. Bamwi bantu bayiyanda bakasowegwa kulusyomo alimwi bakaliyasa akumvwa machise mapati.
1TI 6:11 Pesi iwe, muntu waLeza, chija kulizeezi zintu. Tobela bululami, bunaleza, kusyomeka, luyando, lukakatilo, alimwi a bubombe.
1TI 6:12 Lwana kulwana kubotu kwalusyomo. Jatisya buumi butamani ooko nkuwakiitwa, alimwi ooko nkuwakapa kwaamba kabotu kunembo lyabakamboni biingi.
1TI 6:13 Ndapa malayilile aaya kulinduwe kunembo lyaLeza, uupa buumi kuli zyoonse zintu, alimwi kunembi lyaKkilisito Jesu, wakaamba chakasimpe kuzumina kubotu kunembo lyaPontiyasi Pilato,
1TI 6:14 kuti abambe mulawu kakutakwe kampenda na kusolwa, kusikila kukuboneka kwaMwaami wesu Jesu Kkilisito.
1TI 6:15 Leza uyootondezya kuboneka kwaKkilisito aachiindi cheelede - Leza, wakalongezegwa alimwi Singuzu alike, Mwaami weendelezya aMwaami uutonga.
1TI 6:16 Alike utafwi alimwi uukkala mumumuni utakonzyi kuswenegwa aafwifwi. Tawo pe muntu kumubona na ukonzya kumulanga. Kulinguwe akube bulemu abweendelezi butamani. Ameni.
1TI 6:17 Mubululami layilila ibanotede munyika iino kuti batabi balisumpula alimwi batabi balangilila kubunoti, butazibinkene. Aboobo, beelede kuba aabulangilizi muliLeza. Ulapa kulindiswe toonse bunoti bwanchoonzyo kuti tunonenwe.
1TI 6:18 Baambile bachite bubotu, banote mumilimu miubotu, akupa kwiindilide alimwi bayandisye kwaabana.
1TI 6:19 Munzila eeyo bayoolilondweda beni intalisyo mbotu yacheecho chizoosika, kuti bakalijatile buumi loko.
1TI 6:20 Timiti, kkwabilila chakapegwa kulinduwe. Kaka kubula bunaleza, kwaambula kutasalali amiyeeyo iikazyanya kulicheecho chibejelwa kuti nduzibo.
1TI 6:21 Bamwi baalumi baamba eezi bakasweeka kuzwa kulusyomo. Luzyalo lube aandinywe.
2TI 1:1 Pawulo, mutumwa wa Kkilisito Jesu mukwiinda mu luyando lwaLeza, mukwiinda mu chisyomezyo cha buumi buli muli Kkilisito Jesu,
2TI 1:2 kuli Timoti, mwana muyandwi: Luzyalo, lweetelelo a luumuno kuzwa kuli Leza Taata aKkilisito Jesu Mwaami wesu.
2TI 1:3 Ndilumba Leza, ngwekomba kuzwa kuli bamataata, amoyo uutakwe kampenda, mbuli mbemuyeya munkombyo zyangu mansiku a sikati.
2TI 1:4 Mbuli mbendiyeya misozi yako, ndiyandisya kukubona, kuti ndizule alukondo.
2TI 1:5 Ndali kuyeezegwa alusyomo lwako lwinilwini, oolo lwakali muli banyookulu Loyisi anbanyoko Yunisi, alimwi ndili aakasimpe kuti lulakkala mulinduwe ayebo.
2TI 1:6 Nkenkaako nkendakuyeezezya kuti ubukulusye chipo chaLeza chili mulinduwe chakaba kandikubika maboko.
2TI 1:7 Nkaambo Leza taakatupa muuya wabuyoofu, pesi wamanguzu a luyando akulibamba.
2TI 1:8 Aboobo utabi eensoni abukamboni bwa Mwaami wesu, na lwangu, Pawulo, mwaange wakwe. Nikuba boobo abila mumachise kuchitila makani mabotu mukwiindila munguzu zyaLeza.
2TI 1:9 Ngu Leza wakakufutula alimwi wakatwiita alwiito lusalala. Wakachita eezi, kutali kumilimu yesu, pesi mukwiindilila mumakanze aakwe aluzyalo. Wakatupa zintu zyoonse eezi muli Kkilisito Jesu zintu zyoonse nkazitanabawo.
2TI 1:10 Pesi lino lufutuko lwaLeza lwakayubununwa mukulibonia kwaMufutuli wesu Kkilisito Jesu. NguKkilisito wakamaninsya lufu akweeta buumi butamani kumunika kwiindila mumakani mabotu.
2TI 1:11 Nkaambo kacheechi, nchindakasalwa kuba mukambawusi, mutumwa, alimwi muyiisi.
2TI 1:12 Akaambo kacheechi ndilafwabila eezi zintu. Pesi nsifwi bweeme, nkaambo ndilizi ooyo ngwesyoma. Ndili aakasimpe kuti ulakonzya kubamba eezyo nzindakamupa kusikila eelyo zuba.
2TI 1:13 Bamba chitondeezyo chamajwi aamvwika aayo nguwakamvwa kulindime, alusyomo aluyando eezyo zili muli Kkilisito Jesu.
2TI 1:14 Zintu zibotu Leza nzyaakakupa, zibambe mukwiinda mu Muuya Uusalala, uukkala mulindiswe.
2TI 1:15 Ulichizi eechi, kuti boonse bakkala kuAsiya bakandipapila. Mukabunga aaka muli Figelasi a Hemojinisi.
2TI 1:16 Mwaami ngape luzyalo kun'anda ya Onesifolasi, nkaambo wakali kundibukulusya alimwi taakaba aamawuse aakwaangwa kwangu.
2TI 1:17 Nikubaboobo, nakali kuLoma, wakandiyanduula chabusungu, alimwi wakandijana.
2TI 1:18 Mwaami amujanie luzyalo kulinguwe muli eelyo zuba. Nzila zyoonse nzyakandigwasya mu Efeso, ulizi kabotu.
2TI 2:1 Iwe akooko, mwanaangu, koyuma muluzyalo luli muli Kkilisito Jesu.
2TI 2:2 Zintu nziwakamvwa kulindime aakati kabakamboni biingi, zipe kubantu basyomekede aabo bakonzya kuyiisya bamwi abalabo.
2TI 2:3 Njila mubuyumu aantomwe andime, mbuli silumamba mubotu wa Kkilisito Jesu.
2TI 2:4 Takwe silumamba uubeleka aawo kachaangidwe mumakani aabumi oobu, kuti aantela ulabotezya ooyo wakamunjizya mumulimu.
2TI 2:5 Alimwi, kuti umwi kazundana mbuli sikuchijaana, tapegwi musini ado wabamba milawu yakuchijaana.
2TI 2:6 Chileelede kuti mulimi uubeleka changuzu atambule chaabilo chabutebuzi kusanguna.
2TI 2:7 Yeeya aatala anzindili mukwaamba, nkaambo Mwaami uyokupa kumvwisisisya muzintu zyoonse.
2TI 2:8 Koyeeya Jesu Kkilisito, walunyungu lwaDeviti, ooyo wakabusigwa kuzwa kubafu. Eezi zileendelana amakani aangu mabotu,
2TI 2:9 ayo ngendifwabila kusika kuchiimo chakwaangwa anketani mbuli simulandu. Pesi ijwi lyaLeza talyangidwe.
2TI 2:10 Aboobo ndakakatila muzintu zyoonse akaambo kabasale, kuti ambweni abalabo bakatambule lufutuko oolo luli muli Kkilisito Jesu, abulemu butamani.
2TI 2:11 Ooku nkwaamba kusinizizye: “Twakafwa anguwe, tuyopona alimwi anguwe.
2TI 2:12 Na twakakatila, tuyoyendelezya aawe. Kuti twamukkaka, alakwe uyootukkaka,
2TI 2:13 na katutasyomekede, we unoosyomekede lyoonse, nkaambo takonzyi kulitama mwini.”
2TI 2:14 Inkilila aanembo nkobayeezya zintu eezi. Bachenjezye kunembo lyaLeza aatala akukazyania aatala ambala; tazigwasyi, aboobo zijaya aabo baswiilila.
2TI 2:15 Kosungwaala kulitondeezya kunembo lya Leza mbuli muntu uutambulika, simulimu utakwe chintu chimuusya nsoni, uuyisya kabotu makani aalusinizyo.
2TI 2:16 Leka majwi aabufubafuba, aatola kububi bwiindilide.
2TI 2:17 Zyaambo zyabo zilasaalila mbuli kkuni. Aakati kabo kuli Hameniyasi a Filetasi,
2TI 2:18 aabo bakaleya kusimpe. Baamba kuti bubuke bwabasalali bwakachitikana kale, alimwi bamwaya lusyomo lwabamwi.
2TI 2:19 Nekubaboobo intalisyo yaLeza iliimvwi. Ilembedwe oobu: “Mwaami ulibezi bakwe” alimwi “Woonse waamba izina lyaMwaami weelede kusosoloka kububi.”
2TI 2:20 Mumuunzi wabuvubi, teensi zibilkilo zya ngolide a nsiliva luzutu. Kuli zibikilo zya zisamu azya bulongo. Zimwi zyazeezi nzyabulemu, alimwi zimwi teensi zyabulemu.
2TI 2:21 Pesi kuti muntu walisalazya kubusofwaazi, uba chibikilo chabulemu. Ulasalwa, abelesegwe asimalelo, alimwi abambililwe milimu mibotu.
2TI 2:22 Kochija ngemuzyo zyabukubusi. Yanduula bululami, lusyomo, luyando, alimwi a luumuno ababo bayita Mwaami mumoyo uusalala.
2TI 2:23 Pesi kokaka mibuzyo yabufubafuba a yakutaziba. Ulizi kuti izyala nkazyanio.
2TI 2:24 Muzike waLeza tayeelede kulwana pe. Anu kuti weelede kuba mubombe kuli boonse, uukkonzya kuyiisya, alimwi mubombe.
2TI 2:25 Weelede kuyiisya chamoyo mubombe aabo bamukazya. Antela Leza ulabapa kusandukila ku luzibo lwa kasimpe.
2TI 2:26 Kuti antela bali kuboola kumiyeeyo yabo alimwi akusiya tukkole twa Saatani, ooko nkubakaangilidwe ku luyando lwakwe.
2TI 3:1 Pesi ziba eezi; kumazuba amamanino kuyooba zyiindi zyabuyumuyumu.
2TI 3:2 Bantu bayooba basikuliyanda, basimuyanda mali, basimuntumbwantumbwa, basikakomokomo. basikasankusanku. batamvwi bazyali, batamvwi bazyali, alimwi batakombi.
2TI 3:3 Basikanchimwa, basimfundiilili, basiluvwiyo lwakutamikizya, batalyeendeleli, basilupyopyongano, batayandi bubotu.
2TI 3:4 Basikuuzyania, basikayinya, basikulisumpula, bayandisya misalo yaansi kwiinda kuyanda Leza.
2TI 3:5 Bayooba achiwa chabukombi, pesi bayowatama manguzu aabo.
2TI 3:6 Eelyo bamwi babo bayoba baalumi banjila mumanda akubweza banakazi bafubafuba.
2TI 3:7 Aaba mbanakazi bazwide zibi alimwi bayendelezegwa azisusi zyamisyo misyobo. Aaba banakazi balayiya chiindi choonse, pesi balakachilwa kusika kuluzibo lwakasimpe.
2TI 3:8 Mbubo mbuli Jenisi a Jambulesi mbubakayiminana akukazyania a Mozesi. Muleeyi nzila aaba bayiisi abalabo balakazyania akasimpe. Mbantu balamiyeyo mibi, ibatalomene kulusyomo.
2TI 3:9 Pesi tabakoya kunembo. Nkaambo bufubafuba bwabo buyolibonia kuli boonse, mbubo mbuli bwabaabo bantu.
2TI 3:10 Pesi webo, wakatobela njiisyo yangu, kweendelezya, makanze, lusyomo, mukkazika moyo, mukuyandaana amulukakatilo,
2TI 3:11 mukupenzegwa, mukuchiswa azeezyo zyakachitika kulindime ku Antiyokkiya, ku Ikkoniyamu, aku Lisitiya. Ndakalemenwa mapenzi, kuzwa, muli woonse, Mwami wakandinununa.
2TI 3:12 Aabo boonse bayanda kupona chakululama muli Kkilisito Jesu uyoopenzegwa.
2TI 3:13 Baantu babi abasikulibeja bayooyindilizya kukubisya. Bayoyenena bamwi. Abaalabo beni balalemenwa.
2TI 3:14 Pesi webo kojatisya kuzintu nzwakayiiya akuzuminisya.
2TI 3:15 Ulizi kuti kuzwa kubwanikenike wakaziba malembe aasalala. Ulakonzya kukuchita kuti ube musongo mukufutulwa kwiinda mulusyomo muli Kkilisito Jesu.
2TI 3:16 Magwalo wonse akayoyelwa a Leza. Alikondede kukuyiisya, akoloola akukupandulula makani abululami.
2TI 3:17 Kuliboobo kuchitila kuti muna Leza alibambe, azulile kuchita wonse mulimu mubotu.
2TI 4:1 Ndakupa lulayililo kunembo lyaLeza aKkilisito Jesu, Oyu uyobeteka bawumi abafwide, alimwi nkaambo kakulibonya kwakwe abwami bwakwe:
2TI 4:2 Kambawuka ijwi kolibambila kuchindi cheelede akuchindi chiteelede. Kosungwala kulaya, akukalila, akukombelezya, akukkazikizya moya alimwi akuyiisya.
2TI 4:3 Eno chilasika elyo bantu nchebatakaleke kuzumina injisyo yanchobeni. Elyo bayoliyandwida beni bayiisi mukwiindila mukuyanda kwabo. Bayokondelelwa kubaswilila kwabo.
2TI 4:4 Bayosinka matwi aabo kuzwa kukasimpe, alimwi bayotobela zintu zyabuyo.
2TI 4:5 Pesi iwebo, kolibamba muzintu zyoonse, kofwabalika, kochita mulimu wamukambawusi; kozuzikizya mulimuwako.
2TI 4:6 Nkambo imebo ndazulila kale. Ichiindi changu chakwinka chasika.
2TI 4:7 Ndakalwana inkondo imbotu; ndakalumana lweendo, Ndakulubamba lusyomo.
2TI 4:8 Musini wabusalali ndilubambilidwe, oyo Mwami, mubetesi ululeme ngwayondipa mubuzuba obo, alimwi kutali ndime luzutu, pesi akuli boonse baynada kulibonya kwakwe.
2TI 4:9 Kosungwala kuchita kabotu kuti uze kulindime chakufwambana.
2TI 4:10 Nkaambo Demasi wandikaka. Wayanda zintu zyanyika alimwi winka kuTesalonika. Kkilisensi wakaya kuaGalatiya, alimwi Tayitasi wakaya kuDalumatiya.
2TI 4:11 Luka alike ngulandime. Katole Maako uze awe nkambo ndugwasyo kulindime mumulimu.
2TI 4:12 Tayichikkasi ndakamutuma kuEfeso.
2TI 4:13 Chibaki ncendakasiya kuTiloyasi aKkalipasi, uzacho niwasika, amabbuku, ikapati mapepa.
2TI 4:14 Alekizanda mufuzi wakatondezya incito mbi kulindime. Mwami uyobwedezya kuli nguwe kwiindila mnchito zyakwe.
2TI 4:15 Ayebo ulelede kulikwabilila kuzwa kulinguwe, nkaambo wakakazya kapati makani eesu.
2TI 4:16 Kukubetekwa kwangu kutaanzi, takwena omwe wakimikila andime. Nkekaako boonse bakandisiya. Nekwakali kuti batakapegwi mulandu.
2TI 4:17 Pesi Mwami wakandiiminina akundiyumya kuchitila kuti, kwiinda mulinduwe, kukambawukwa kuzulile koonse, akuti baMasi boonse bakakonzye kumvwa, ndakanununwakuzwa kumulomo wamulavu.
2TI 4:18 Mwami uyondivuna kulizyoonse incito mbi akundifutula nkaambo kabwami bwakwe bwakujulu. Kulinguwe kube bulemu kwalyoonse alyoonse. Ameni.
2TI 4:19 Umujuzye Pulisila, Akkwila, abanganda yaOnesifolasi.
2TI 4:20 Elasitasi wakasyaala kuKkolinto, Pesi Tilofimasi ndakamusiya nkachisidwe kuMiletasi.
2TI 4:21 Kosungwala kuboola nechitanasika chiindi champeyo. Yubbulasi ulakujuzya, alakwe Pudensi, Linasi, Kkilawudiya aboonse bakkwesu.
2TI 4:22 Mwami abe amuuya wako, luzyalo lube anduwe.
TIT 1:1 Pawulu, mulanda wa Leza alimwi mutumwa wa Jesu Kkilisito alusyomo lwabantu basalidwe ba Leza alimwi aluzibo lwanchoonzyo oolo luzuminana abuleza,
TIT 1:2 abulangilizi bwabuumi bwalyoonse oobo Leza utabeji pe, mbwakasyomezya chiindi kakutana kwaba zyoonse pe.
TIT 1:3 Muchindi cheelede wakayubununa jwi lyakwe mukwinda kunkambawuko ilinjiyo njindakapegwa mukwinda amukulayililwa a Leza mufutuli.
TIT 1:4 Kuli Tayitasi, mwana wanchoonzyo mulusyomo lwesu luzibinkene. Luzyalo alimwi alumuno kuzwa kuli Leza Taata a Jesu Kkilisito mufutuli wesu.
TIT 1:5 Nkambo kazeezi nchindakakusila mu Kkilete, kuti ambweni nga ulakonzya kubika zintu mbuzyelede eezyo zitanamana pe alimwi akunanika bazulwidi mumyunzi yoonse mbuli mbundakakulayilila.
TIT 1:6 Muzulwidi tayelede kuba akampendape, mwalumi ujisi mwanakazi umwi, ulaabana basyomekene pepe bambwa bubi nikuba kutalemeka.
TIT 1:7 Zilayandikana kumupati wabayiisyi mbuli sikulanga wang'anda ya Leza kuti itabi abubi pe. Teelede pe kuti abe sinchiki, atabi ulya ufwambana kunyemesegwa, pepe ukomedwe kubukande, pepe sinkondo, alimwi pepe simatalo.
TIT 1:8 Kwinda kuchita oobo, welede kuba Ailweetelelo alimwi mwenzinyina wachili kabotu. Welede kumvwika nzyamba, simuchita zibotu, musalali, alimwi ulizyotolola.
TIT 1:9 Welede kujatisya kapati kujwi lilume eelyo lyakayiisigwa, kuchitila kuti akakonzye kuyosungwazya bamwi anjiisyo ilikabotu alimwi akuyolulamika aabo bakaka zyakwe.
TIT 1:10 Ko kuli biingi bantu bapapide baambula zitawope alimwi akuyunga, kapati aabo bakapalulwa.
TIT 1:11 Kulayandikana kubayimikizya. Babilizya mpuli zyoonse akuyiisya kwampindu yabweeme nzibateelede kuyiisisya pe.
TIT 1:12 Umwi wabasinsimi wabo wakaamba kuti, “Ba Kkiletanisi mbabeji choonse chiindi, mbanyama babi, batolo.
TIT 1:13 Twambo ootu ntwanchoonzyo. Lino, mubalulamike changuzu, kuchitila kuti amwi ngabalamvwika oobotu mulusyomo.
TIT 1:14 Pepe kupa kuswilizya abunini kulweeno lwaba Juda nikuba kumalayilile abantu aabo baleya kuzwa kunchoonzyo.
TIT 1:15 Kuli baabo basalala, zintu zyoonse zilasalala. Pesi kuli baabo basofwede alimwi batazumini pe, takwe pe chisalala, pesi zyoonse nzibapona anzizyo zyakabija.
TIT 1:16 Balibika bayanda Leza, pesi balamukaka munchito zyabo. mbasesemyi, tabalemeki pe, alimwi tabeeledwe nikuba ulibiyeni mulimu mubotu.
TIT 2:1 Pesi iwebo, kowambula zyelela malayilile ayendelana njiisyo yalusyomo.
TIT 2:2 Baalumi bapati babe basitikide, balilemeka, akulibatamika, bayumu mulusyomo, aluyando, antomwe amukakatila.
TIT 2:3 Munzila ikozyenie, koyiisya banakazi bapati kuba aachiwa chabulemu, batanotamikizyi, nekuba kuti babe bazike bakunywa bukande, pesi ngababe bayiisyi bazintu zibotu.
TIT 2:4 Aboobo amuyiisye banakazi banini kuti bayande baalumi babo akuyanda bana babo.
TIT 2:5 Babayiisye kuti kabalibatamika, akusalala, kubamba maanda aabo, akulibombya kubalumi babo, kuti makani a Leza atasampawulwi.
TIT 2:6 Munzila ikozyenie, ubasungilizye baalumi banini kuti babe akumvwisisisya kubotu.
TIT 2:7 Munzila zyoonse uyelede kuba chitondezyo chamilimu mibotu. Mukuyiisya kwako akube kwamasimpe abulemu.
TIT 2:8 Majwi ngowamba abote, kuchitila kuti kufumbwa ukazya afwisigwe bweeme, nkambo ulabula chibi chakwamba andiswe.
TIT 2:9 Koyiisya bazike kulemeka baami babo muzintu zyonse, bababotezye pepe kukazyania aabo.
TIT 2:10 Batanobabbidi, pesi kabatondezya calusyomo lubotu, kuti munzila zyoonse beete kulumbayizya kwenjiisyo yejwi lya Leza mufutuli wesu.
TIT 2:11 Nkambo luzyalo lwa Leza lwalibonia kukufutula bantu bonse.
TIT 2:12 Lwakatuyiisya kukukazika zintu zitakwe buna Leza azisusi zyenyika, akupona chakulijata, akululama, akupona buumi bulabuna Leza muchiindi echino.
TIT 2:13 Nituchilangilila kutambula bulangizi bwesu bulongezezegwe kuboneka kwabulemu bwa Leza wesu mupati amufutuli wesu Jesu Kkilisito.
TIT 2:14 Jesu wakalipeda lwakwe kulindiswe kukutuvuna kuzwa kuzibi zyoonse akulisalazizya bantu bayandisi abo bakonzya kuchita milimu mibotu.
TIT 2:15 Amwambuule ezintu ezi, amusungilizye bantu kuzichita, akuzyololola cabwami boonse kutabi naba omwe ukunyansya webo.
TIT 3:1 Mubayeezye kuti balibombye kubendelezi akulibasimulawu, kamubaswlizya, akulibambila kuli yonse milimu mibotu
TIT 3:2 Mubayezye kutawambula bubi awumwi, kutaba achiyandisyo chakulwana, alimwi abusichamba, akutondezya kuliwinsya kubantu bonse.
TIT 3:3 Nkambo limwi lyamazuba iswe lwesu twakali abaya batayeeyi akutaswilizya. Twakazulwidwa mukusweka alimwi akuba mubuzike kwinda aziyandisyo zisiyene siyene alimwi azibotezya. Twakali kupona mububi amumabbivwe. Twakali chisesemyo alimwi katutayandani abamwi.
TIT 3:4 Pesi eelyo buuya bwa Leza Mufutuli wesu antomwe aluyando lwakwe lwakumisyobo yoonse yakayubunuka,
TIT 3:5 Tensi kwakali kwamilimo yabusalali obo mbutwakachita swebo, pesi mukwinda muluse lwakwe elyo wakatufutula, kwindila mukusanzigwa a Muuya Uusalala.
TIT 3:6 Leza wakafonkola watila Muuya Uusalala alindiswe mukwinda mumufutuli wesu Jesu Kkilisito.
TIT 3:7 Ezi wakazichita kuti tululamikwe kuluzyalo, tuzobe basikukona katulabulangizi bwabuumi ibutamani.
TIT 3:8 Oyu mulumbe ulasyomeka. Ndiyanda kuti mwambule chabusichaamba atala azintu ezi, kuchitila kuti abo bakasyoma muli Leza bajatisye mumilimo mibotu. Makani mabotu, alalugwasyo kubantu boonse.
TIT 3:9 Pesi amuleke kukazyania kwabufubafuba alimwi amazyalani amikowa amapenzi akutamvwanana atala amulawo. Ezyo zintu tazikwe mpindu alimwi tazigwasyi.
TIT 3:10 Mumukake nabaani uyetelezya kwanzaana akati kanu, nimwamana kumuchenjezya lumwi na tubili,
TIT 3:11 mbuli mbomuzi kuti muntu uliboobo wakasanduka kuzwa munzila iluleme alimwi ulokubisya ulikulipa mulandu lwakwe.
TIT 3:12 Elwo nindatuma Atemasi naba Tuchikkasi kulindinywe, ufwambane alimwi usike kulindime ku Nikkopolisi, oko nkundakayeeya kulomaninsya chindi champeeyo nkendinkuko.
TIT 3:13 Ufwambane utume Zenasi, unikide kumilawu, antomwe a Apolosi, enzila yakuti batakabuli chintu.
TIT 3:14 Bantu besungabayiiye kulinjizya lwabo beni kumilimu mibotu eyo ipa ziyandisi akufwambana alimwi kuti batabi bantu batazyali michelo.
TIT 3:15 Boonse abo balandime balikumujuzya. Mubajuzye bonse abo batuyanda mulusyomo. Luzyalo alube anywebo moonse.
PHM 1:1 Pawulo, musungwa wa Kkilisito Jesu, amukwesu Timoti kuli Filimoni, mweenzuma uyandika kali mubelesima,
PHM 1:2 alubo kuli Afia muchizi wesu, alubo kuli Akkifasi silumambama, alubo akumbungano ziswanana mun'anda yenu.
PHM 1:3 Luzyalo alube kuli ndiwe aluumuno luzwa kuli Leza taatesu aMwami Jesu Kkilisito.
PHM 1:4 Ime abuzuba ngandilumba Leza wangu elyo ndakudombola munkombyo zyangu,
PHM 1:5 nkambo ndimvwa atala alusyomo ndolalo kuli Mwami Jesu aluyando ndolalo kuli boonse bantu bakwe basalala.
PHM 1:6 Ndikomba kuti kwaabana kwalusyomo lwakwe kuchite kuti lube chiswayo akumvwisisisya kuzwide kwchintu choonse chibotu nchitulacho muMwami.
PHM 1:7 Nkambondijisi kukondwa kupati akumbuluzigwa nkambo kaluyando lwakwe, nkambo myoyo yabantu baLeza basalala yakakatalukwa ayebo, mwanama,.
PHM 1:8 Lino, nikuba kuti ndijisi koonse kutayowa muliKkilisito kukulayilila iwe kuchita nzyooyelede kuchita,
PHM 1:9 nikubaboobo nkambo kaluyando, ime ndikombelela kulinduwe kwinda kuti - Ime, Pawulo, munene, alubo lino musungwa waKkilisito.
PHM 1:10 Ime ndikombelezya kulinduwe nkambo kamwana ngu Onesimasi, ngundakazyala muncheni zyangu.
PHM 1:11 Nkambo chindi chamana taakalikwe mulimo kulindiwe, pesi lino wabamilimu koonse kulinduwe akuli ndime.
PHM 1:12 Ndamutuma alimwi kulinduwe, ngumoyo wangu.
PHM 1:13 Ndalikuyandisya kuti ndimubambe afwifwi andime kuti azoondichitile milimo kwachindi chinini ndilimumacheni nkambo kamakani mabotu.
PHM 1:14 Pesi tendalikuyanda kuchita chimwi chintu kanditakwe mvumo yako. Tandilikuyanda nchito zyako zibotu kuti zizwe kukusinikizya pesi kuzwa kubabotu bwakuliyandila.
PHM 1:15 Alimwi kuli zeezi wakaanzanisigwa ayebo kwachindi, kuti uzyoobawe musule akutamani.
PHM 1:16 Taakwe na chizoba muzike, pesi mbubombubo kwinda muzike, imwanama uyandwa kapati kuli ndime, alubo akwindilila kulinduwe, muziyanza zyobili munyama amuMwami.
PHM 1:17 Kuti kondijisi mbuli mwenzinyokwe, mutambule mbuli ndime.
PHM 1:18 Kuti kaliwakubisizya nikubaujisi chikwelete chamusyobonzi, chibikke kulindime.
PHM 1:19 Ime, Pawulo, ndilembeezi aluboko lwangu. Ime lwangu ndizyo yibbadala- kanditadomboli kuti undikweleta bube bwako!
PHM 1:20 Ili, mwanama, leka ndijane zimwi zijanwa kuzwa kulindime muMwami bambulula moyo wangu muli Kkilisito.
PHM 1:21 Ndasyoma atala akuswiilila kwako, ndakulembela. Ndilizi kuti ulachita kwinda nzindakulembela.
PHM 1:22 Muchiindi eecho, mundibambile n'anda yabenzu, nkambo ndilangilila kuti kwindilila ankombyo zyanu ndizyoomupegwa lubo.
PHM 1:23 Epafulasi, musungwama muli Kkilisito Jesu, ulamujuuzya.
PHM 1:24 AMakko alakwe, Alisitakkasi, Demasi, a Lukka mubelesima.
PHM 1:25 Luzyalo lwa Mwami wesu Jesu Kkilisito lube amuuya wako. Amen.
HEB 1:1 Chiindi chakale Leza wakaambula kuli basikale besu kwiinda muba sinsimi muzyiindi zyiingi alimwi amunzila zyiingi.
HEB 1:2 Pesi muli aaya mazuba aamamanino wakaambula kulindiswe kwiinda mumwana mulombe, ooyo ngwaakayimikizya kuti akabesikulya lukonowezintu zyoonse. Nkwiindila mulinguwe alubo Leza wakachita bwaanze.
HEB 1:3 We ngusikubalangala kwabulemu bwa Leza. Bwiiminizi bulimbubo bwabwiime bwakwe. Aboobo ulajata zinti zyoonse amwii ajwi lyamanguzu aakwe. Naakamana kusanzya zibi, wakakkala aansi kululyo lwabupati kujulu.
HEB 1:4 Wakaba ulanguzu kubangelo mbuli zina ndyakakona liluleme kwiinda aabo mazina.
HEB 1:5 Nkaambo nkuli uuli wabangelo Leza ngwakatgi “Uli mwana wangu, sunu ndaba wuso”? Nakuti nguuli wabangelo Leza ngwakati, “Ndiyoba wisi kulinguwe alimwi we uyoba mwana kulindime”?
HEB 1:6 Pesi lubo aawo Leza nayeta mwana mutaanzi munyika, we utii, “Boonse bangelo mba Leza beelede kumukomba.”
HEB 1:7 Aatala abangelo utii, “Nguwe uuchita bangelo bakwe babe myuuya, mpawo balanda bakwe babe malabi amulilo
HEB 1:8 Pesi aatala amwana utuu, “Chuuno chakwe, Leza, chikkala mane kukabe kutamani. Lubeteko lwabwami bwako ndubeteko lwabululami.
HEB 1:9 Wakayanda bulumi mpawo wasula kutabaamba mulawu. Nkunkaako webo Leza wako wakunanika amafuta aalukondo kwiinda beenzinyokwe.”
HEB 1:10 “Kumatalikilo, Mwami wakayala matalisyo aanyika. Majulu milimo yamaboko aako.
HEB 1:11 Bayoonyonyooka, pesi uyooyinkila kunembo. Bayoozakala boonse mbuli chimpanzi chasila.
HEB 1:12 Uyobavunga mbuli chizwaato mpawo bayosandulwa mbuli chimpanzi chasila. Pesi webo tosanduki, amyaaka yako tiimani.”
HEB 1:13 Mpesi kuli ooyo bangelo ba Leza bakati amulichili chiikndi, “Kkala kululyo lwangu mane ndikachite basinkondonyokwe bakabe chilyatilizyo chamawulu aako.”?
HEB 1:14 Teensi bangelo boonse myuuya iibeleka na, abaabo bakatumwa kutabilila aabo bayokona lufutuko?
HEB 2:1 Aboobo tweelede kuswilisisya kuleezyo nzitwakamvwa kuti tutaka sosoloki kulinzizyo.
HEB 2:2 Nkaambo naa makani akaambwa kubangelo akaboneka kuti ngakusinizya, akuti zibi zyoonse akutaswiilila zipegw chisubulo.
HEB 2:3 Nga tulachija biyeni kuti twawuzya kulufutuko luli boobu? Olu ndulufutuko lwakatalika kwaambilizigwa a Mwami akuzuminwa kulindiswe abaabo bakalumvwa.
HEB 2:4 Muchiindi nchicheecho Leza wapa bukamboni, azitondeezyo azigambyo, amaleele asiyene siyen, akwaabila zipo akwaabila zipo zya Muuya Uusalala mbuli kuyanda kwakwe
HEB 2:5 Nkaambo teensi nkubangelo Leza nkwaka bombya nyika kuti isike, atala anzitwaambula.
HEB 2:6 Pesi umwi wakaba kamboni kumwi, kaamba kuti, “Niinzi chitegwa muntu ooyo ngumuyeeya aatala anguwe? Na mwana wamuntu ooyo ngumulikatazya aawe?
HEB 2:7 Wakachita kuti muntu abe ansi kubangelo, wakamusamika bulemu akulemekwa. amwi malembe mapati achiindi achi Giliki alayungizya, alimwi wakamubika aatala yamilimu yamaanza aakwe.
HEB 2:8 Wakabika zykooknse mukuzibombya munsi lyazituta zyakwe.” Nkaambo nguwe Leza ngwakabikka qkuzintu zykoonse eezi. Pesi lino tatunazibona pe zyoonse nzyakabikilwa
HEB 2:9 Pesi tulikumubona ooyo wakabikidwe kunsi kubangelo, muchiindi chiniini Jesu, wakasamikwa bulemu akulemekwa nkaambo kamapenzi aalufu lwakwe kuti muluzyalo lwa Leza akalabizye lufu lwabantu boonse.
HEB 2:10 Nkaambo chaleelede kuti Leza, nkaambo zyoonse ziponena nguwe kwiinda mulinguwe, kuti alete myuuya yoonse kubulemu. Chakeelela kulinguwe kuti abe ntalisyo yalufutuko kiizwide kwiindila mukupenzegwa kwakwe.
HEB 2:11 Nkaambo ooyo uusalazya abasalizigwa boonse bazwa kumwi. Nkikaako tawuusi pe kubiita kuti banabakwabo.
HEB 2:12 Waamba kuti, “Ndiyolungulula zina lyako kubana bakwesu, ndiyoyimba atala anduwe mukati mumbungano.”
HEB 2:13 Alubo, “Ndiyoosyoma mulinguwe,” alubo “Amulange, mpaano mpebede abana mbaakandipa Leza.”
HEB 2:14 Aboobo, mbulikuti bana ba Leza banyama abulowa bomwe, Jesu alakwe wakali umwi kuzintu zyiingi ambabo, kuchitila kuti mulufu akakonzye kuzunda ooyo wakali aamanguzu alufu, ooyo, kudyabbulosi.
HEB 2:15 Chakaba oobo kuti akaangunune boonse abao bakaba akuyoowa lufu balkapona buumi bwabo boonse mubuzike.
HEB 2:16 Nkaambo nchoonzyo tanyongani nkaambo kabangelo pe; pesi; ulanyongana loko kumbuto ya Abbulahamu.
HEB 2:17 Aboobo chakaleelede kuti akabe mbuli bana bakwabo munzila zyoonse, kuchitila kuti akabe mupayizi uusyomekede alimwi uulaluzyalo mubulyidilano azintu zya Leza, akuti akakonzye kweeta lulekelelo kuzibi zyapbantu.
HEB 2:18 Nkaambo Jesu lwakwe wakapenzegwa mumasunko, ulakonzya kugwasiya aabo balikusunkwa.
HEB 3:1 Aboobo, nobakwesu basalala, anywebo muli aalukono mulwiito lwakujulu. Amuyeeye Jesu, mutumwa alimwi kali mupayizi mupati waluzumino lwesu.
HEB 3:2 Wakalisyomekede kuli Leza, wakamusala, mbuli mbaakasyomekede alakwe Mozesi mung'anda ya Leza.
HEB 3:3 Nkaambo Jesu wakajanika kali musalali abulemu bupati kwiinda bwa Mozesi, nkaambo ooyo uuyaka ng'anda ujana bulemu kwiinda ng'anda lwayo.
HEB 3:4 Nkaambo ang'anda ang'anda ilamuntu uyiyaka, pesi wakayaka zyoonse ngu Leza.
HEB 3:5 Kulilimbi bbazu, Mozesi wakali zyomekede mung'anda ya Leza yoonse. Walkali kaamboni aatala azintu zyalikuzowambulwa mulilya juunza.
HEB 3:6 Pesi Kkilisito mwana mweendelezi wang'anda ya Lez. Tuli ng'anda yakwe, na twajatisya kubusichaamba bwesu akubotelwa mukusima kwesu.
HEB 3:7 Aboobo, zilimbuli mbawamba Muuya Uusalala uti: “Sunu na mwalimvwa jwi lyakwe
HEB 3:8 mutayumyi myoyo yanu mbuli mulupapi, muchiindi chakusunkwa munkanda.
HEB 3:9 Awa mpawo bamawuso nibaknodikpapila akundisunka lubo, alubo, mumyaaka makumi one bakabona nchito zyangu.
HEB 3:10 Aboobo zyalane eelyo telyakandibotezya pe. Ndakati, 'Bakkede kabasweeka mumyoyo yabo. Tabana kuziba nzila zyangu.'
HEB 3:11 Kulibiyo mbuli mbundakakonka mukunyema kwangu: 'Tabakoyonjila pe mukulykookezya kwangu.'”
HEB 3:12 Amuchenjele, nobakwesu, kuchitila kuti akati kenu takubi naba omwe uyooba amoyo mubi wakutasyoma, moyo uuchija kuzwa kuli Leza uupona.
HEB 3:13 Pesi, amusungwaazyanie abuzuba, biyo kalitegwa ngu “sunu,” kuchitila kuti kutakabi akati kenu uyoyuma moyo nkaambo ka lweeno lwachibi.
HEB 3:14 Nkaambo twakaba balyidilani aKkilisito, tulijisi busichaamba busimide mulinguwe kuzwa kumatalikilo kuyosika kumamanino.
HEB 3:15 Aatala azeezi zyakaambwa kuti, “Sunu, na mwamvwa jwi lyakwe, mutayumyi moyo yenu, mbuli mulupapi.”
HEB 3:16 Ngwani wakamvwa Leza mpawo wapapa? Teensi mbaabo boonse na bakazwa mu Ijipiti kabagwisigwa a Mozesi?
HEB 3:17 Ngwani ngwaakanyemenede kwamyaaka makumi one? Teensi mbaabo bakabisya na, aabo nbalamitunta yakawida musokwe?
HEB 3:18 Nkulini nkwaakakonka kuti tabakoyonjila mukulyookezya kwakwe, na kakutali kuli aabo bakatamulemeka?
HEB 3:19 Alimwi tuli kubwene kuti tebakakonzya pe kunjila mukulyookezya kwakwe nkaambo kakutasyoma.
HEB 4:1 Aboobo atuchenjele kuchitila kuti kutabi umwi aakati kenu uyoboneka kakachilwa kuzuzikizya chisyomezyo nchimwaka siilwa chakunjila mukulyookezya kwa Leza.
HEB 4:2 Nkaambo twakabuzigwa majwi mabotu mbuli mbaabede. Pesi aayo majwi taakabagwasya pe aabo bakatajatana mulusyomo abaabo bakalemeka.
HEB 4:3 Nkaambo swebo nitwakasyoma ndiswe tutakanjile mukulyookezya, mbuli mbakaamba kuti, “Mbuli mbundakakonka mubunyeme bwangu, tabakaoyonjila pe mukulyookezya kwangu.” Nikuba boobo, milimo yoonse njaakalenga yakamaninsigwa kumalengelo aanyika.
HEB 4:4 Nkaambo wakati muli bumwi busena aataka abuzuba bwamusanu atubili, “Leza wakalyookezya mubuzuba bwamusanu atubili kuzwa kumilimu yakwe yoonse,”
HEB 4:5 Alubo pwakati, “Tabakoyonjila mukulyookezya kwangu.”
HEB 4:6 Aboobo, mbulikuti kuchili mweenya wabamwi biyo kuti bakanjile mukulyookezya kwakwe, akuti nkaambo kakuti bana Izilayili biingi taakwe nibakakunjila nkaambo kakuleya milawu,
HEB 4:7 Leza watala alubo limbi zuba litegwa, “Sunu.” Musule lyamazuba miingi, wakaambuula kwiinda muli Devidi kuti, mbuli mbuzyakaambidwe kusanguna, “Sunu na mwalimvwa jwi lyakwe, tamuyumyi myoyo yenu.”
HEB 4:8 Nkaambo kansinga Joshuwa wakabapa kulyookezya, Leza wakalikunowaambuula aatala alimbi zuba.
HEB 4:9 Aboobo mpukuchili kulyookezya kwa Sabata kubambilidwe bantu ba Leza.
HEB 4:10 Nkaambo awumwi uunjila mukulyookezya kwa Leza, alakwe mwini unoli walyookezya kumilimu yakwe, mbuli Leza mbalyokezya kuli yakwe.
HEB 4:11 Aboobo, atuyandisye kunjila mukulyookezya ooko, kuchitila kuti kutabo uyoonjila mukutaswilila mbuli mbubakachita.
HEB 4:12 Nkaambo jwi lya Leza lilapona alimwi lilabosya kwiinda panga linenga mabazu aabili. Lilayasa nikuba kuyowanzaania muuya wamuntu amuuya wa Leza, antoomwe akwaanzaania moolyo aawo mpuuswaanana. Lilakonzya kuziba ziyandwa aziyeyegwa aamoyo.
HEB 4:13 Taakwe chakalengwa chisisidwe kunembo lya Leza. Pesi zyoonse zili salede alimwi zili aantanganana kumenso aakwe ngutweelede kulemeka
HEB 4:14 Aboobo, mbukunga tuli amupayizi mupati loko wakayinda mumajulu, Jesu mwana wa Leza, wakapa kuti tujatisye kulusyomo lwesu.
HEB 4:15 Nkaambo tatuke mupayizi muati uutakonzyi kutufwida nsoni mubutela bwesu. Pesi, tuli aawe wakanjila munzila zyoonse zyamasunko mbulindiswe, kusiya biyo kuti we takwe chibi pe.
HEB 4:16 Atwiinke aboobo abusichaamba kuchuuno chakwe chaluzyalo, kuchitila kuti tukatambule nsoni akujana luzyalo lwakugwasya muchiindi chapenzi.
HEB 5:1 Nkaambo awumwi mupayizi mupati, wakasalwa kuzwa mubantu, usalilwa kwiiminina bantu muzintu zya Leza, kuchitila kuti apede zipo azipayizyo zyazibi.
HEB 5:2 Ulakonzya kubeleka kabotu abatazi abaabo bapapide nkaambo we alakwe ulaabo butela.
HEB 5:3 Nkaambo kazeezi we alakwe kwelede kuti ape zipayizyo zyazibi zyakwe, mbuli mbachita kuzibi zyabantu.
HEB 5:4 Alimwi tachili chakwe pe kuti umwi abweze bulemu bwakwe. Uliitwa a Leza, mbuli Aaloni mbakabede.
HEB 5:5 Munzila njiyeeyo, alakwe Kkilisito taakwe naakalisumpula mukulichita mupayizi, Pesi, ooyo wakalikwaambuula aawe wakalikuti, “Ulimwana wangu; sunu ndaba Wuso.”
HEB 5:6 Kulimbuli mbukwaambidwe kulibumwi busena kutgi, “Uli mupayizi walyoonse mbuli Melukkizedeki.”
HEB 5:7 Muchiindi chakwe chakuba munyama, Kkilisito wakapeda nkambyo azikumbizyo ajwi pati lyakulila misozi kuli Leza, ooyo walikukonzya kumufutula kuzwa kulufu. Wakamvigwa nkaambo kakulila kwakwe.
HEB 5:8 Nikuba kuti wakali mwana, wakayiya kuteelela kuzintou nzyakapenzegwa kulinzizyo.
HEB 5:9 Wakachitwa mululami mpawo, kubantu boonse bamulemeka, wakabapa lufutuko lutaman.
HEB 5:10 Wakasalwa a Leza mbuli mupayizi mupati mbuli Melukkizedeki.
HEB 5:11 Tuli aazyiikngi zyakwaambula aatala aJesu, pesi kwayuma kupandulula nkaambo mwayuma kumizeezo yenu akukumvwa.
HEB 5:12 Nikuba muli eehi chiindi mwelede kuba bayiisyi, mucheelede kuba aamuntu umuyiisya ziiyandikana zya Leza amajwi aakwe. Muyanda malili peepe chakulya chisimide.
HEB 5:13 Nkaambo awumi unywa malili tanakomena pe mumajwi aabululami nkaambo uchili mwana mutete.
HEB 5:14 Pesi chakulya chisimide nchabantu baati. Aba mbaabo banga nkaamo kakukomena kwabo balalwiiyo mukumvwisisisya kwabo akwaanzaania chibi kuzwa kuchibpotu
HEB 6:1 Mpawo elyo atusimye matalikilo aamkani aaaJesu mpawo tuye kunembo akukomena. Tutayali lubo matalikilo azya kusanduka kuzwa kumilimu ifwide azyalusyomo muli Leza.
HEB 6:2 Olo matalikilo aanjisyo yazyalubbabbatizyo, buyale bwamaboko, bubuke bwabafu, alubeta lutamani.
HEB 6:3 Tuyochita lubo aswe echi naLeza wachizumizya.
HEB 6:4 Nkaambo nchiyumu kuli aabo ibakali bamunikilwa, ibalakalabila zipo zyakujulu, abo bakali basikwaaba baMuuya Uusalala,
HEB 6:5 mpawo akulabila ijwi bbotu lyaLeza amanguzu achiindi chiza,
HEB 6:6 pesi abo ibakawa - nkuyumu kubaboozya lubo kukusanduka. Kuloobu akaambo kakuti balikuligankamina lubo Mwana waLeza, mpawo akumusya lubo chaantanganana.
HEB 6:7 Nkambo inyiika inywa kumvula iyiwida aachiindi, akumezeka ziliimwa zilamulimu kuli abo nyika mbiyakaliminwa - eyi ninyika itambula zilongezyo zizwa kuli Leza.
HEB 6:8 Pesi ikuti yazyala maamvwa, amanchenya, tayigwasyi pe elyoo ili afwifwi alutuko. Mamanino ayo alimukutentwa.
HEB 6:9 Pesi twakakomenenwa kuzintu zili mbubombubo aatala anduwe, nobayandwa, zintu zilangene alufutuko, nikuba kuto twaamba oobu.
HEB 6:10 Nkaambo Leza takwe lubazu. Takoyoluba mulimu wako aluyamdo nduwakatondeezya kuzina lyakwe, nkaambo wakagwasya basalali bakwe, a lino uchibagwasya.
HEB 6:11 Tuli achiyandisyo kapati kuti awumwi akati kanu akatondezye bukozu bukozyene kumamanino, kuti bulangizi bwanu bube bwanchonzyo.
HEB 6:12 Eechi nkokuti mutakabi bakand, pesi batobelezyi babaabo kwindila mulusyomo abulindizi bakone zisyomezyo.
HEB 6:13 Nkaambo Leza naakachita chisyomezyo kuli Abbulamu, wakalikonkezya mwini, mukuti taali kanookonkezya kuli umwi mupati kampatila.
HEB 6:14 Wakati “ Chonzyo ndiyokulongezya a kukomezya myeelwe yako.”
HEB 6:15 Munzila eeyi, Abbulamu wakachijana echo nchakasyomezegwa musule abulindizi buzulide.
HEB 6:16 NKaambo bantu balakonkezya kuli umwi mupati kwinda lwabo beni. Kumamanino a twaambo twabo, achizuminano chiyoba mbuli chizuzikizyo.
HEB 6:17 Elyo Leza nakasala kutondeezya chilaantanganana kuli basimulya lukono lwazisyomezyo kutasanduka kwabube bwakwe, wakachibikila chizuminano.
HEB 6:18 Wakachita obu kuti kuzintu zibili zitasandululwi - kuli eecho chitakonzeki kuti Leza abeje - iswe, nitwakachijila kumayubilo, tuyooba akusungwazigwa kupati mukujatisya changuzu bulangizi bubikidwe kunembo lyesu.
HEB 6:19 Tulabulangizi obu mbuli chikwabilizyo chesu a chisimyo chitazunganisigwi chamuuya, bulangizi obo mubusena bwamukatikati kusule a chisitikizyo, oko
HEB 6:20 Jesu, wakeendakunembo lyesu, nkwakanjilila mubusena obo akambo kesu. Elyo wakaba mupayizi mupati kwakutamani musule amalayilile aMelikizedeki.
HEB 7:1 Wakali ooyu Melekizedeki mwami wakuSalemu, mupayizi waLeza usumpukide wakaswanana aAbbulamu kaboola kuzwa kwakali kufundwa baami mpawo wakamulongezya.
HEB 7:2 Nkulinguwe oko Abbulamu nkwakapa chibeela chaachakummi chazyonse. Lutanzi kupandulwa kwazina lyakwe chaamba kuuti “mwaami wabululami,” alimwi utegwa “mwami wakuSalemu,” chamba kuti “mwami walumuno.”
HEB 7:3 Takwe wisi, takwe banyina, takwe basikale, katakwe nikuba kutalika kwamazuba anikuba kwabuumi. Nikuba oobo, uyiminide mwana waLeza, nkambo unolimupayizi kwalyonse.
HEB 7:4 Bona bupati kuloyu mwalumi wachiindi Abbulamu ngwakapa chipanzi chakkumi kuzintu nzyakatola munkondo.
HEB 7:5 Izyalane lya Levi eelyo litambula mulimu wabupayizi balamalayilile kwinda mumulawu kuti batole zyachakkumi, kubantu nkuukuti chizwa kuli babunyina nikuba kuti ambabo nizyalane lizwa kuliAbbulamu.
HEB 7:6 Pesi Melekizedeki, ulazyalane elyo lyakatali lyabo lyakatambula chakkumi kuzwa kuli mbabo, wakatambula zyakkumi kuzwa kuli Abbulamu akumulongezya, oyo wakali azisyomezyo.
HEB 7:7 Takwe zikazyana akuti muntu munini ulongezegwa amupati.
HEB 7:8 Mulaya makkani muntu wanyama ulatambula chakkumi, pesi mumakani aya kulibukamboni bwakuti unochipona.
HEB 7:9 Mpawo, kwinda munzila yakwambula, muLevi ooyo wakali kutambula chakkumi, alakwe wakali kugwisya chakkumi kwinda kuli Abbulamu,
HEB 7:10 nkaambo Levi wakali mumubili wazyalane awo Melekizedeki nakaswanana aAbbulamu.
HEB 7:11 Lino anoli bululami bwakali konzekene kwindila mubupayizi bwabu Levi (aawo muunsi azezi bantu bakatambula mulawo), ninzi eecho chakali kuyandikana kunembo eecho chinoli chakalelede kubawo kuti kube umbi mupayizi kuti abewo kunembo mubube bwa Melekizedeki, mpawo kitatolegwi kuti ibe kunembo kuliAaloni?
HEB 7:12 Mpawo kuti bupayizyo bwasandulwa, mulawo awulawo uyelede kuti wasandulwa.
HEB 7:13 Ooyo umwi wambwa azeezi zintu ngwawumbi musyobo, utakwe umwi wakali wabelekela achipayililo.
HEB 7:14 Lino zilantanganana kuti eezi zizwa kuli Juda oko Mwami nkwakazyalilwa, musyobo Mozesi ngwakwakatamba atala abupayizi.
HEB 7:15 Ezyo nzitwamba zimvwikka loko zyakuti anoli umwi mupayizi wabuka muchikozya chaMelekizedeki.
HEB 7:16 Tewakalanagene loko pe aziyandikana amulawu wanyama kukuba muapayizi, pesi wo wali atala amanguzu abuumi butamani.
HEB 7:17 Nkambo magwalo ababukamboni anguwe: “Ulimupayizi kwalyoonse kwinda mumabmbe aMelikizedeki.”
HEB 7:18 Tazyambi kuti ayo malayilile achindi akabikwa kumbi kumbali akaambo alikumpeme akubula mulimu.
HEB 7:19 Nkaambo mulawo takwe nchwakachita chiluleme - pesi alubo bulangizi balimbubo bwakazibisigwa kwinda nituswena kuliLeza.
HEB 7:20 Chamba kuti tezyakali achikonke pe! Bamwi bakaba bapayizi kabatakwe chikonke pe.
HEB 7:21 Pesi wakaba mupayizi kwinda muchikonke nchaakatola kulumwi ooyo wakati kulinguwe, “Mwaami wakakonka alubo taakwe nazosanduka pe muzezo wakwe: Ulimupayizi kwalyoonse.”
HEB 7:22 Alubo kuli eechiJesu wakapa chisinizyo chachizuminano chilimbubo.
HEB 7:23 Bapayizi bataanzi bakali biingi mumweelwe, mbulu kuti lufu lwakabakachizya kuti bayimkilile nkabali munganda yamulimu.
HEB 7:24 Pesi akambo kakuti Jesu ulapona kwalyonse, ulabupayizi bwalyoonse.
HEB 7:25 Mpawo ulakonzya lubo kufutula chakumanina basikila Leza kwinda mulinguwe nkaambo choonse chiindi uponena kubakombela.
HEB 7:26 Nkaambo nochoonzyo chaakelela kuti tuube amupayizi mupati, ooyo usalala, utakwe chiibi, uwanzanisigilwe kuzya kuli basizibi akusumpulwa ataala lyamajulu.
HEB 7:27 Ooyo utayandi, uatali mbuli bapayizi balaajula, kuti ape zipayizyo zyabuzu abuza, kutaangu chazibi zyakwe, mpawo zyazibi zyabantu. Nakachita eechi lumwi kuli boonse nakalipeda.
HEB 7:28 Nkambo mulawu upa bapayizi kumuntu ulabukompami. Pesi ijwi lyachi chikonke, eelyo lyakaza kunembo amulawu, lyakapa mwana, ooyo wakasalazigwa kwalyoonse.
HEB 8:1 Lino kaambo nkitulikwaamba: Tulijisi mupayizi mupati wakkala aansi kuluboko lwachilisyo lwachuuno chabulemu cha Singuzu zsyoonse mumajulu.
HEB 8:2 Mubeleki mubusena busalala, idyuumba lya choonzyo, elyo Mwami pepe muntu, ndyakayala.
HEB 8:3 Woonse mupayizi ulasalwa kuti ape zipo antjkoomwe azituuzyo. Lino kulayandikana kuba achimwi chakupa.
HEB 8:4 Lino koonzinga Jesu uli aanyika, tewalikunoba mupayizi kale pe, mbulikuthi kuli aabo bapa zipo kwiinda mumu lawu.
HEB 8:5 Babeleka kabatobelezya alimwi munzinzimwa wazintu zyakujulu. Kuli biyo mbuli Mozesi mbaka chenjezegwa a Leza naakali waamba kuyaka dyumba: Leza wakaamba kuti, “Langa kuti uchite zyoonse mbuli mumabambe aayo ngwaakatondezegwa aatala lyachilundu.”
HEB 8:6 Pesi lino Jesu watambulwa mumbungano ilimbubo, mbuli mbali simwiima akati kachizuminano chilimbubo eecho chichita zisyomezyo zilimbubo.
HEB 8:7 Kuti eechiya chizuminano chakutanguna teechakali abubi, taakwe nikwalikuno chitwa chimbi chizuminano.
HEB 8:8 Elyo Leza nkalikunoonga wajana bubi abantu, wakalikwaamba kuthi, “Amubone mazuba ayobuza, mbwaamba Mwami - elyo nindiyo chita chizuminano chipya ang'anda ya Izilayeli alimwi ang'anda ya Juda.
HEB 8:9 Takukwe nikuyoba mbuli chizuminano nchindakachitide abasikale benu mubuzuba mbundakabajata akuboko kubagwisya mu Ijipiti. Nkaambno tebakeenda muchizuminano changu, alimwi ndakabatakata - mbawamba Mwami.
HEB 8:10 Nkaambo eechi nche chizuminano nchindiyochita ang'anda ya Izilayeli musule lyamazuba ayo - mbawamba Mwami. Ndiyobikka milawu yangu mumizeezo yabo, alimwi ndiyoyi lemba mumykoyo yabo. Ndiyoba Leza wabo alimwi bayoba bantu bangu
HEB 8:11 Tabakoykooyiisya basimabambanwa babo na bana bakwaabo kabati, 'Ziba Mwami.' Nkaambo boonse bayondiziba], kuzwa kumuniini kuyoosika kumupati wabo.
HEB 8:12 Nkaambo ndiyooba aluzyalo kuchito zyabo zyakutalulama, alimwi nsikoyoziyeeya lubo pe zibi zyabo.”
HEB 8:13 Mukwiita chizuminano echi kuti, “chipya,” wakachita chizuminano chakusanguna chibe chikulukulu. Alimwi eecho chaba chachiindi alimwi kachili chi kulukulu chaba afwiifwi kuti chiinde.
HEB 9:1 Lino nikuba chizuminano chitanzi chakalijisi milawo atala akukukomba abusena bwachiyubilo chaansi.
HEB 9:2 Nkaambo dumba lyakukombela mwakalichibikilo chalambe atebuli, achinkwa chabuliwo bwakwe, bwakali kuyitwa kuti busena busalala.
HEB 9:3 Musule adembo lyachibili kwakali limbi dumba lyakukombela, buitwa kuti busena busalalisya.
HEB 9:4 Lyakali angolide yachipayililo yatununkilizyo. Alimwi ilabhokesi bwachizuminano, yakazililwidwe angolide koonse, koonse. Mukati mwakali nkomesi yangolide yakajisi chitegwa maana, musako waAloni wakalinonga wasyukila aya mabbwe akalembedwe majwi achizuminano.
HEB 9:5 Atala abhokesi lyachizuminano, bangelo bajisi bulemu bakavumbide chivunisyo, echo chitutakonzyi kwambula atala anchicho mubunike.
HEB 9:6 Nizyakamana kubambwa ezi zintu bapayizi choonse chiindi bakalikunjilila mung'andu yakunze ya dumba lyakukombela kuti bakachite milimu yabo.
HEB 9:7 Pesi mupayizi mupati luzutu wakanonga wanjila mung'anda yakunze ya dumba lyakukombela kuti bakachite milimu yabo.
HEB 9:8 Muuya usalalala wakatondezya kuti na dumba taanzi kalichimvwi mukati kanzila yabusena busalalisya butaboneki.
HEB 9:9 Echi chakulitondezya muchindi echo zyonse ziipo azipayililo ezyo lino zilikupegwa tazichiti kusalazya bakombi amamvwido.
HEB 9:10 Balalangilila kupela chakulya akunywa azyakutula zisiyene - siyene zyakusamba, malayilile amibili kusiika chiindi chabubambululwe bupya.
HEB 9:11 Kilisito nakasika mbuli muapayizi mupati wazintu zibotu zyaksika wakeenda mukati kadumba lyakukombela pati lisalalisya litesi lyakabumbwa amaanza abantu chimwi kachitali chanyika eyi yakalengwa.
HEB 9:12 Tekwakali kwabulowa bwampongo abwang'ombe, pesi abulowa bwakwe obo bwakanjilila mubusena busalalisya kamwi kwalyoonse akujana akukwabilila kwaununuko lwenu lutamani.
HEB 9:13 Kansinga bulowa bwampongo abaasune, akusansayilwa kwadyota kulibabo bakalisofwazya zyakaba salazya kukusanzigwa kwamibili yabo,
HEB 9:14 buyoba byeni bulowa bwaKkilisito, ngwani mukwiinda mumuya uusalala utamani wakalipeda lwakwe mwiini kutakwe kampenda kuli Leza, kuto asalazye kubisya kwesu kuzwa kumilimu ifwide kuti babelekele Leza upona?
HEB 9:15 Akambo kabobu ngusikwima akati wachizuminano chipya. Ezi zilimbulikuti kuzwa kuchindi lufu nilwakabweza busena mulwangunuko kulibabo bali ansi achizuminano chitanzi kuzwa kuzibi zyabo, abo bayitwa kuti bayojana chisyomezyo chitamani chalukono.
HEB 9:16 Awo ali chiyandisyo, lufu lwamuntu wakuluchita uyoluzuzikizya.
HEB 9:17 Nkaambo kuyanda kubabiyo nakwakaba lufu, nkaambo takwe lukakatizya kuliyoyo wakalubumba uchipona.
HEB 9:18 Pesi alacho chizuminano chitanzi chakabambwa kachitakwe bulowa.
HEB 9:19 Kufumbwa Mozesi wakalikupa lulayililo luli mumulawu kubantu kubantu boonse, wakabweza bulowa bwabana bang'ombe ampongo, ameenda, buluba busalala, amichelo yahisopi akubusansila zyoonse ibhuku abantu boonse.
HEB 9:20 Wakati, “ Obu mbulowa bwachizuminano echo Leza nchakamulayilila.”
HEB 9:21 Alubo wakasansila bulowa mu dumba lyachikombelo azyoonse zibikilo zyakalikubelesya mumilimu.
HEB 9:22 Mbuli kumulawo zyoonse zyakasalazigwa abulowa kakutali kutika kwabulowa takwe lulekelelo.
HEB 9:23 Nkinkakako nchikwakalikabotu kuti, zikozyanyo zyazintu zyakujulu kuti zisalazigwe azipayizyo zyabanyama aba. Aboobo, zintu zyakujulu lwazyo zyakalelede kusalazigwa azipayizyo zilikabotu.
HEB 9:24 Nkaambo Kkilisito takanjila mubusena busalalisya bwakachitwa amaboko, kachili chikozyano chawumwi wakasimpe. Pesi wakanjilwa kujulu lini kuti alibonye mubuliwo bwaLeza mulindiswe.
HEB 9:25 Takayinka oko kuti akalipe mwini muzintu zyiingi, mbuli mbuwakachita mupayizi mupati, unjila mubusena busalalisaya bwamunyaka amunyaka abulowa bwawumwi.
HEB 9:26 Nikuli ako nkikaambo, mpawo ulelede kufwaba muzintu zyiingo kuzwa kuntalisyo yanyika. Pesi lino wasika chantanganana kumamanino azyiindi kuzogwisya kulibali azibi kulipayizya kwakwe mwini.
HEB 9:27 Mbuli muntu bwakasalwa kuti afwe kamwi, alimwi kuzwawo kuyosika lubeta.
HEB 9:28 Alubo, Kkilisito wakapedwa lumwi kuti agwisye zibi zyabiingi, alimwi uzoboneka lwabili, kuti atazobi abwendelezi azibi, pesi lufutuko kulibabo bamulindilide.
HEB 10:1 Nkaambo mulawu mwenzwide bikupayilwayo wazikntu zibotu zichiza, kawutali chiimo loko pe chazintu eezi. Aabo baza kuli Leza tabakonzyi pe kululamikwa anzizyo zipayizyo nzibaswini kabapayila munyaka amunyaka.
HEB 10:2 Mulikumwi kwaamba konzo zipayizyo tezyaka yimikizigwa? Na kakuli boobo, na kazili zyasalazigwa zyamanina aatu, basykomi teensi balikunoba kabaziba zibi pe.
HEB 10:3 Pesi muzipayizyo eezi kuli kuyeezegwa kwazibi amunyaka amunyaka.
HEB 10:4 Nkaambo tazichiti pe kuti bulowa bwaba pule bang'ombe ampongo bumane milandu.
HEB 10:5 Lino Kkilisito naakasika munyika, wakati, “Zipayizyho azipo tenzizyo nzwakayandisisya pe. Pesi, wakali mubili ngumwakandibambila.
HEB 10:6 Kazitali muzipayizyho zitentedwe na zipayizyo zyazibi nzimwakabotelwa kulinzizyo.
HEB 10:7 Mpawo ndakati, 'Langa, ndasika, mbuli mukulembedwe atala andime mumalembe, chita kuyanda kwako.'”
HEB 10:8 Kakutanguna wakati, “Teensi zipayizyo pe, na zipo, niziba zyoonse zipayizyo zyakuumpa, mna zipayizyo zyazibi nzimwakalikuyanda. Na kubotelwa mulinzizyo.” Eezi nzezipayizyo zipegwa kwiinda mumulawu.
HEB 10:9 Mpawo wakati, “Langa mpawa ndili wano kuti ndichite lkuyanda kwenu.” Wakagwisya mabelekelo mataanzi kuti asangune mabelekelo aabili.
HEB 10:10 Munzila eeyi, twakasalazigwa kwiinda mukupayilwa kwamubili wa Jesu Kkilisitu mpawo kwamanina aatu.
HEB 10:11 Kulilimwi bbazu, buzuba abuzuba, awumwi mupayizi ulayimikila kubelekela Leza. Ukkede kapayila zipayizyo nzizyo nzizyo, nikuba tazikwe nizisalazya zibi pe.
HEB 10:12 Kúli limwi bbazu, Kkilisito wakapayila chipayizyo chomwe kwa lyoonse, wakakkala ansi kululyo lwa Leza.
HEB 10:13 Ulilindide mane basinkondonyina bakachitwe chilyatilizyo chamawulu aakwe.
HEB 10:14 Nkaambo achipayizyo chomwe wakalulamika aabo balikusalazigwa.
HEB 10:15 Alimwi Muuya Uusalala ulatwaambilila kulindiswe. Nkaambno usanguna kati,
HEB 10:16 “Eechi nchechizuminano nchesikachite aabo musule lyawayo mazuba ayo, mbawamba Mwami. Ndiyobikka milawu yangu mumyoyo akwilemba mumizeezo yabo
HEB 10:17 Taakwe nesikaziyeeye lubo pe zibi zyabo.”
HEB 10:18 Lino aawo ali kulekelelwa kwabaaba, taachikwe nikucheelede zipayizyo zyazibi pe.
HEB 10:19 Aboobo, bana bakwesu, twaba achaamba chakunjila mubusena busalalisya nkaambo kabulowa bwa Jesu.
HEB 10:20 Njenzila mpya yakupomna njatujulila kwiinda mudyembo nkukwaambo kuti mubili wakwe.
HEB 10:21 Nkaambo tujis mupayizi mupati kampatila wang'anda ya Leza,
HEB 10:22 atunjile amyooyo yachoonzyo amulusyomo luzwide, moyo yesu kiisaledekuzwa kumizeezo amibili yesu kisanzizigwe amaanzi aaslala.
HEB 10:23 Alukbo ngatujatisye katutazungani kubulangizi mbutulingulula, nkaambo ooyo wakasyomezya ulisyomekede.
HEB 10:24 Tuyeesesye mbutunga tulasungwaazyania umwi awumi mumilimu yaluyando.
HEB 10:25 Tutanoleki kuswaanana, mbuli mbubakaleka bamwi. Pesoi agtusungwaazyanie umwi awumwi mukuvula akwiinkila kunembo mbuli mbumukubwene kuti buzuba bwaba afwiifwi.
HEB 10:26 Kuti na twachita chibi achaali musule akutambula busongo akasimpe, chipayizyo chazibi tachichiwo pe.
HEB 10:27 Pele kwasyaala biyo kubetekwa kuyoosya, abukali bwamulilo buyotenta basinkondonyina ba Leza.
HEB 10:28 Kufumbwa uukaka mulawu wa Mozesi ulafwa katausilwi pe kakuli bakamboni babili na nbatatu.
HEB 10:29 Muyeeya kuti nga chilatana aali chisubulo chipegwa ooyo wakaba kunsi lyamawulu aMwana wa Leza, oyo wakabweza bulowa bwachizuminano mbuli butasalede, - bulowa bulimbubo bwakamululamika - mpawo wakatukila Muuya waluzyalo?
HEB 10:30 Nkaambo tulimuzi wakati, “Kukolotya nkukwangu; ndiyobbadala.” Alubo, Mwami uyobeteka bantu bakwe.”
HEB 10:31 Nchintu chiyoosya kuwida mumaboko a Leza uupona.
HEB 10:32 Pesi aukayeeye mazuba akusanguna nimwakajana mumuni, kuti mwakasima biyeni mukulwana amukoomba.
HEB 10:33 Mwakaba akusampawoulwa aluundu akupenzegwa, alimwi mwakali kwaabilana abaabo bamwi bakiinda mubusampawuzi amapenzi aya.
HEB 10:34 Nkaambo mwakali aluse kuli aabo bakangidwe alimwi mwakali kutambula amoyo omwe kunyanzigwa zintu zyenu. Mwakalizi lwanu kuti mwakalizi kuti mulijis lubono lutamani.
HEB 10:35 Aboobo tamusowi chaamba chenu, chijyoomweetela mpindu mpati.
