HEB 10:36 Nkaambo muyanda kuba akukakatila, kuchitila kuti mukatambule eezyo Leza nzyakamusyhomezya, kamuli mwachita luyando lwakwe.
HEB 10:37 “Nkaambo muchiindi chifwiifwi chimboola, ooyo uzabuza ulasika alimwi tachedwi pe.
HEB 10:38 Mululami wangu uyoopona alusyomo. Naayoowa, nsikoyoomubotelwa pe.”
HEB 10:39 Pesi tatuli babaabo bawa pe kababweeda kukunyonyoonwa. Pesi, tuli bamwi babaabo bajisi lusyomo lwakubamba myuuya yesu.
HEB 11:1 Lino lusyomo nkuba akasimpe kazintu zilangilidwe alimwi abwini bwazintu zitaboneko.
HEB 11:2 Aboobo nkaambo kacheechi basikale bakatambulika nkaambo kalusyomo lwabo.
HEB 11:3 Kwiinda mulusyomo tumvwisisya kuti nyika yakalengwa akulayilila kwaLez, kutondezya kuti iziboneka tezyakalengwa kuzwa kuzintu zyakali kuboneka.
HEB 11:4 Nkaambo kalusyomo Abbelu wakapa Leza chipayizyo chibotu kwiinda cha Keyini, nkakasunkwa aacho kukuba mululami alimwi Leza wakambula kabotu aatala anguwe nkaambo kazipayizyo zyakwe, alimwi kwiinda mulusyomo Abbelu uchambuula nikuba kuti ulifwide.
HEB 11:5 Nkaambo kalusyomo Inoki wakatolwa biyo kujulu katabwene lufu. “Taakajanika nkaambo Leza wakamubweza.” Awo katana tolw, kwakaba bukmaboni bwakuti wakali wabotezya Leza.
HEB 11:6 Lino uti kakutakwe lusyomo tazikonzeki pe kumubotezya. Nkaambo chileelede kuti kufumbwa uuza kuliLeza welede kusyoma kuti mpali alimwi mulumbuli wababo bamuyandula.
HEB 11:7 Ndusyomo lwakachita kuti Nowa, nakali wapegwa mulumbe wakujulu aatala azintu zikatalina boneka mukuba abulemu buli abunaLeza wakayaka bwaato ktui afutule mpuli yakwe. Mukuchita oobu wakiipa mulandu nyika eelyo wakaba simulyazina wabululami buza alusyomo.
HEB 11:8 Ndusyomo lwakachita kuti Abbulamu, nakiitwa wakateelela wiinka kubusena, oobo mbwakelede kutambula mbuuli lukono. Wakazwa wiinka, katanzi nkwaali kuya.
HEB 11:9 Ndusyomo lwakachita kuti akale munyika yechisyomezyo mbuli muzwa kule. Wakakala mumatente antoomwe aAyizeki aJekkobbu, basimulyazinanyina kuchisyomezyo chomwe biyo.
HEB 11:10 Nkaambo wakali kulangilila kugunzi lilaantalisyo mubambi amuyaki wazyo kali nguLeza.
HEB 11:11 Mulusyomo - alimwi Sala lwakwe wakali ngomwa wakatambula kukonzya kumita mwana mubuchembele bwakwe, mukubona kasyomekede oyo wakapa chisyomezyo. Kulimubuzyo wakutii lwakali lusyomo lwaAbbulahamu na kana lwaSala lwakali kuboneka awa. Mulusyomo Sala, nikuba kuti wakali wachembala, wakatambula nguzu zyakuzyala mwana, nkaambo wakabona kasyomekede oyo wakapa chisyomezyo.
HEB 11:12 Aboobo kuzwa kumwalumi oyu omwe alimwiwakali wamba kufwa - kwakazyalwa bana bingi mbuuli nyenyeezi zya julu alimwi batabaliki mbuuli luseese lwakumbali alwizi.
HEB 11:13 Chakali mulusyomo kuti boons aaba bakafwa kabatatambwide zisyomezyo. Muchiindi eecho, nibaka ibona akuzi juzya kazili kule, bakazumina kuti bakali banasinakooma munyika.
HEB 11:14 Kuli aabo baamba zintu ziliboobu babika antaanganana kuti bayandula nyika yakukala.
HEB 11:15 Nikwali kuti bakali kuyeeya nyika njibakazwa kulinjiyo bali kunoowujana mweenya wakubweeda.
HEB 11:16 Pesi mbuuli mbuzibede bayndula nyika mbotu kwiinda, nkokuti, yakujulu. Aboobo Leza takwe nsoni akwambwa kuti nguLeza wabo, mbuli kuti wakaba bambila muunzi.
HEB 11:17 Nguwakali mwana wakwe omwe biyo ngwakapedekezy, ooyo wakatambula zisyomezyo.
HEB 11:18 Ezi zyakambilwa Abbulahamu, “mazyalane aako ayowuzikwa kwindila muli Ayizeki”
HEB 11:19 Abbulahamu wakayeeya kuti Leza wakalikukonzya kumubusya Ayizeki kuzwa kubafu, alimwi kwaambisya mumaboneno aakwe wakamutambulalubo kuzwa kulimbabo.
HEB 11:20 Ayizeki wakalongezya Jekkobbu aIsawu kwindilila mulusyomo aatala azintu zyakachiyobuza.
HEB 11:21 Kwindila mulusyomo Jakkobbu naakaba afwiifwi akufwa wakalongezya banabaJOzefu balombe umwi awumwi. Jekkobbu wakakomba, kakoteme aamufunko wakwe.
HEB 11:22 Kwindila mulusyomo Jozef, mamanino aakwe naakab aafwifwi, wakambuula atala akulonga kwabana ba - Isilayeli kuzwa ku - Igipite alimwi wakabalayilila aatala amafuwa akwe.
HEB 11:23 Kwakalikwindila mulusymo, Mozesi naakazyala, wakasiswa kwamyeezi yotatwe abazyali bakwe nkaambo bakabona kuti mwana mubotu. Tabayowede kulayilila kwamwami.
HEB 11:24 Kwakkali kwiindila mulusyomo kuti Mozesi, naakakomena wakakkaka kwambwa kuti mwana waFalo.
HEB 11:25 Wakasala kupenzegwa antoomwe abantu baLeza kwiinda kulibotzya abunone bwachibi chindi chinini.
HEB 11:26 Wakayeya kuti kusampulwa kwakutobela Kkilisito bwakali buvubi bupati kwiinda buvubi bwaIgipita. Nkaambo menso aakwe wakaabikide kubulumbu bwakwe.
HEB 11:27 Mulusyomo Mozesi wakazwa Igipita. Takwe nakayoowa bukkali bwaMwaam. Takwe nakayowa bukkali bwaMwaam, nkaambo wakakalatila aanga wakali mubwene ooyo uutabonwi.
HEB 11:28 Alusyomo wakabamba Pasika akusansilwa kwabulowa, kuchitila kuti sikujaya bana bataanzi atagumi bana babana-Izilayeli balombe batanzi.
HEB 11:29 Alusyomo bakiinda mu; wizi lwamatete mbuli kwiinda aanyika njumu. Awobana-Igipita nibakayanda kuchita oobo bakamenwa.
HEB 11:30 Alusyomo bulambo bwakuJelikko bwakakkolomoka musule akuzyungulukwa kwamazuba alimusanu abili.
HEB 11:31 Zyakachitika mulusyomo kuti sibwaamu taakafwa pe antoomwe abasikutaswilila, nkaambo wakatambula basikutwela muluumuno.
HEB 11:32 Ninzi chimwi nchekonzya kwaamba? Ichiindi nsikoba aacho kuti ngambuule zyaGidiyoni, Bbalakki, Samisoni, Jefutati, Devidi, Samiyeli alimwi atala abasinsimi.
HEB 11:33 Kwakali kwindila mulusyomo kuti bakazunda zisi, bendelezya, bululami, alimwi bakatambula zisyomezyo. Bakajala milomo yabalavu,
HEB 11:34 akuzima nguzu zyamililo, bakaloboka kuyaswa asumu, bakaponesegwa kumalwazi bakaba basinguzu munkondo, akuzunda basilumamba bamazwa kule.
HEB 11:35 Banakazi bakatambula bafu babo abubuke. Bamwi bakoomba akufwabisigwa, kabatatambuli kwangununwa kuchitila kuti bajane bubuke bubotu kwiinda.
HEB 11:36 Bamwi bakatambula kunyansigwa aunabbwa, alimwi amaketaniakubikwa muntolongo.
HEB 11:37 Bakatululwa mabbwe. Bakkandulwa aakati. Bakajigwa asumu. Bakapwenta kabazwete zikumba zyambelele azyempongo. Bakali mubuchete, akudyamizigwa, kabtajatwi oobotu.
HEB 11:38 Nyika teyakabapa bulemu Lyoonse bakali bakalikupwenta munkanda amuzilundu amumapako munyika.
HEB 11:39 Nikuba kuti boonse bantu aaba bakalitambwidwe aLeza nkaambo kalusyomo lwabo, taakwe nibakachitambula chisyomezyo.
HEB 11:40 Leza wakatubambila chimwi chintu chibotu kwiinda, kuchitila kuti kuboneke aanoli tetwaliwo tebali kunoomaninizigwa pe.
HEB 12:1 Mbukuliboobo, mbulikuti yuzyungulukdwe joba paiti lyabakamboni, atubikke kumbali kulemenwa koonse antoomwe aibi zyoonse. Atube amoyo mulamfu mukuchijaana mujiizyanio ooyu wambikkwa kunembo lyesu.
HEB 12:2 Atuswiilile Jesu, we ngomutaliko amumaninizyi walusyomo. Nkaambo lukondo lwakabikkwa kunembo lyakwe, wakalipeda kuchiingan, nikuba chakalikupa mawuse, mpawo wakakukkala kululyo lwachuuno chabulemu cha Leza.
HEB 12:3 Aboobo amumuyeye, ooyo wakatola chiimo chili boobo kuli basizibi chiteendelani aguwe, kuchihtila kuti tamubi abutela mumyoyo yanu.
HEB 12:4 Taakwe nimwalina lwana achibi kuyosika kubulowa.
HEB 12:5 Alimwi mwakaluba kusungwaazigwa kumwaambila kuti inywe mbuli bana balombe: “Mwanangu, utayeeyi kuti milawu ya Mwami myuuba, na kuba abutela awo nowambilwa atala akuchita chibi anguwe.
HEB 12:6 Nkaambo Mwami ulapa malayilile kuli woonse muntu ngwayanda alimwi ulasubula mwana woonse ngwatambula.
HEB 12:7 Sima mukuenzegwa akulayigwa. Leza ubeleka andinywe mbuli bana. Ulabanzi ooyo mwana uula wisi utamu layi?
HEB 12:8 Pesi kuti kotakwe buntu, obo bantu boonse mbubaabana, ulimwana uutatambuliki alimwi toyelede pe kuba mwana wakwe.
HEB 12:9 Kuyakukunembo, twakalijisi bama taata bamunyama mbuli basikiutulayilila, alimwi twakabalemeka. Tatweelede na aboobo kuti tulemeke Wisi wa myuuya kuti tupone?
HEB 12:10 Nkaambo kulilimwi bbazu, bama taata besu bakatulayilila kwamazuba mache mbuli mbubakalikubona kazyeelede kulimbabo. Pesi kulilimwi bbazu leza uchita oobo kuti zitubotele kuchitila kuti tukaabaane aawe mubusalali.
HEB 12:11 Taakwe kulayililwa kuboneka kakubotela muntu muli eecho chiindi pesi kulachisa. Pesi muchiindi chiboola kuleta muchelo waluumuno mubululami kuli aabo bakalayililwa.
HEB 12:12 Aboobo simya maboko aako aayo asiminina aansi mazwi aako.
HEB 12:13 Panga nzila ziluleme zyamawulu aako, kuchitila kuti eezyo zilemene tazikoyookachilwa pesi ziyoponesegwa.
HEB 12:14 Amuyanduule luumuno abamwi boonse, antoomwe abusalali nkaambo iuutakwe busalali taakwe nayoomubona Mwami.
HEB 12:15 Amuchenjele kuti kuti takubi ubula luzyalo lwa Leza, alimwi takubi nuuba muyanda wakunyema uunga ulayeta kutamvwanana, kuchitila kuti biingi tababi kababisigwa ankuko.
HEB 12:16 Amuchenjele kuti takubi zyakunjila munobo zitaluleme na kuba muntu utaluleme mbuli Isawu, ooyo wakawuzya bupati bwakwe nkaambo kakulya.
HEB 12:17 Nkaambo mulizi kuti musule lyazezyo, naakazoyanda kutola chilongezyo, taakatambulika pe, nkaambo wakabula mweenya wakusanduka, nikunba kuti waka chiyanduula amisozi.
HEB 12:18 Nkaambo teensi mwaza kuchilundu chikonzeka kugumwa, chilundu chaulilo uuyaka, mudima, kutaboneka a guwo pati.
HEB 12:19 Teensi mwaza kuzolizya nyeele, na kujwi lyaambula majwi basikumvwa kabatamwi niliba limbi jwi lyaambuulwa kulimbabo.
HEB 12:20 Nkaambo tabakonzyi kuzikalilila eezyo nzibalayililwa: “Namnsya nuuba munyama waguma chilundu welede kutululwa mabwe.”
HEB 12:21 Chakalikuyoosya loko echi chakabonwa a Mozesi awo naakati, “Ndilikuyoowa alimwi ndilikukankama.”
HEB 12:22 Pesi mwasika kuchilundu cha Zayoni akudolopo lya Leza upona, Jelusalemu lyakujulu, akumakumi azyuulu zyabangelo zili kupobola.
HEB 12:23 Mwasika kumbungano yamwana wabubele, ooyo wakalembwa kujulu. Mwasika kuli Leza, Mubetesi waboomnse, akumyuuya yabaluleme bakalulamikwa.
HEB 12:24 Alimwi mwasika kuli Jesu, simwiima aakati wachizuminano chipya, akubulowa bwakasamnsiilwa bwaambula zilimbubo kwiinda bulowa bwa Abela.
HEB 12:25 Amubone kuti tamumukasyi ooyo uulikwaambula. Nkaambo kaansinga tebakafutuka nibakachija ooyo wakabalayilila aanyika, nkuche kuti tufuke na twachija ooyo ulikutulayilila kuzwa kujulu.
HEB 12:26 Mulichimwi chiindi, jwi lyakwe lyakateketesya nyika. Pesi lino wasyomezya wati, “Ilubo, nsikozoteketya nyika ayilike pe, pesi amajulu woonse.”
HEB 12:27 Aya majwi, “Chimbi lubo chiindi,” kwaamba kugwisya eezyo zintu zikonzya kuteketesegwa, kwaamba kuti, zintu zyakalengwa, kuchitila kuti zintu zitakonzeki kuteketesegwa zichaale.
HEB 12:28 Aboobo, kutambula bwami butakonzyi kuteketesegwa, atulumbe, amuleyi nzila tumukombe Leza mubulemu bupati akuyoowa.
HEB 12:29 Nkaambo Leza wesu mulilo uyaka akutenta.
HEB 13:1 Aamulekke Luyando lwabunyina lwinkilile anembo.
HEB 13:2 Mutalubi kujata akabotu beenzu. Mukwindila kulechi, bamwi bakajata kabotu ibangelo kabatazi pe.
HEB 13:3 Kamuyeya ibangidwe mbuli kuthi mwangidwe aamwi ambabo. Kamubayeya aaba batajiswi kabotu muli mulimubili omwe.
HEB 13:4 Aamuleke makwatano alemekwe kuliboonse, alimwi buulo bwamakwatano abusalale, nkambo leza uyobeteka abo ibayanda malalano abasimamambe.
HEB 13:5 Machitilo anu atabi akuyanda mali. Amukutisikane kuzinini nzimulazyo. Nkambo Leza lwakwe wakamba kuti,”Sikoyomuleka pe, nanka kumusiya.”
HEB 13:6 Atukutisikane tukabe abusichamba mukwamba, “Mwami ngomugwasyi wangu; nsikoyoyowa pe. Ino muntu ulandichitanzi?
HEB 13:7 Kamuyeeya bazuluzi ibanu, kulabo bakamba aabo bakamwambila jwi lyaLeza, Alimwi kamwibalukwa impindu zyabweende bwabo. Kamutobelzye lusyomo lwabo.
HEB 13:8 Jesu Kkilisito nguwe wajilo, sunu mane kukabe kutamani.
HEB 13:9 Mutenwi anjisyo nzimutazi zyamusyobomusyobo. Nkambo nchibotu kuti Moyo usisimisigwe aluzyalo pe- pe azyakulya. eezyo zitagwasyi aabo benda anzizyo.
HEB 13:10 Tulijisi chipayililo chizwa kulabo ibabeleka muDumba lyakukkombela eelyo tabakwe cheelelo chakulya.
HEB 13:11 Nkambo bulowa bwabwanyama bwakafwida zibi bwaketwa abapayizi ibapati mukati kenganda isalala, muchindi echo mibili yabo yakatentwa anze mpubakakede.
HEB 13:12 Eelyo Jesu alakwe wakapenzegwa anze amulyango wamunzi, mukambo kakuti basalazye ibantu mukwindila mubulowa bwakwe.
HEB 13:13 Nkinkaako atwiinke kulinguwe kumbali amunzi, atubweze mawuse akwe.
HEB 13:14 Kambo tatukwe munzi wakukalilila pe ano, Pesi tuchiyandula munzi umbi uchiza.
HEB 13:15 Kwiinda mulinguwe, aboobo, tweelede chindi choonse tupede chipayizyo chakutembawula Leza, lumbayizya michelo yamilomo akuzumina muzina lyakwe.
HEB 13:16 Elyoo tutalubi nituluba mukuchita bubotu akwabilana, nkaambo mukwindila muchipayizyo chilobu Leza ulachibotelwa.
HEB 13:17 Kuswilila akulibombya kubazululi banu, eelyo mbembabo balanga myuya yanu mbuli abo bamupeda bukamboni bwaabo beni, Mulemeke kuchitila kuti bazuluzi banu bakachite echi chakubotelwa akutangunguna, pesi chakatali kumugwasya inywe.
HEB 13:18 Kamutukombela aswebo, nkambo twakombelezegwa munjisyoimbotu akuti twayandisya kukala muzintu zyoonse.
HEB 13:19 Ndilikumusungwazya nikuba nanka mukwindila mukuchita obu nkambo ndobozegwa kuli ndinywe mukufwambana.
HEB 13:20 Lino Leza waluumuno oyo wakabozya kuzwa kulufu mweembeli mupati wembelele, Mwami wesu Jesu, akubulowa bwachizuminano chitamani.
HEB 13:21 Kupa zyonse zibelesyo mukukusimya kuzintu zyoonse, mukubeleka mulindiswe kulecho chimubotezya, mukwindila muliJesu Kkilisito, kulinguwe akube bulemu kwalyoonse alyoonse. Ameni.
HEB 13:22 Lino ndamusungwazya, nobakwesu, ikuti mubweze ijwi eeli lyakumusungwazya ndindamulembela mubufwifwi.
HEB 13:23 Muzibe mukwesu Timoti wangununwa, ooyo ngwesizawe kuzomubona kuti afwambana kusika.
HEB 13:24 Mujuzye bazuluzi banu boonse antomwe abasalali abantu boonse baLeza. Abo bazwa kuItali balokumujuzya.
HEB 13:25 Luzyalo alube anywebo moonseni.
JAM 1:1 Jemusi, mubelesi wa Leza a Mwami Jesu Kkilisito, kumusyobo yabantu ili kkumi ayibili imwayikide munyika: Injuzyo.
JAM 1:2 Zyoonse muzibweze mbuli lukondo, nobakwesu, awo nimuyoswanana amakatazyo asiyenesiyene.
JAM 1:3 Mulizi kuti kusunkwa kwalusyomo lwanu kuzyala banangatizi.
JAM 1:4 Amulekele bunangatizi, bumaninsye mulimo wabo kuchitila kuti mukonzye kukkomena akumaninina, kamuta chibuli chintu.
JAM 1:5 Pesi kuti umwi wanu kayanda busongo, amumuleke abukkumbile kuli Leza, ooyo uupa chakwangunuka alimwi katasandukili pe kulabo bakkumbila, alimwi uyomupa mbubo.
JAM 1:6 Pesi amumuleke akumbile mukusyoma, kakutakwe kudoneka. Nkambo kufumbwa muntu uudoneka uli mbuli juwe mulwizi ilitontwa aluuwo alimwi kaliyumbwa kumabbazu woonse.
JAM 1:7 Nkambo muntu oyo tayelede kuyeya kuti uyotambula chimwi chintu kuzwa ku Mwami.
JAM 1:8 Muntu ulobo ulamizezo-ibili, utakkalinkene pe munzila zyakwe zyonse.
JAM 1:9 Mumuleke mukwesu wachiimo chilaansi apakale muchuno chakwe chaajulu,
JAM 1:10 pesi imuvubi muchuno chakwe chilaansi, nkambo uzoyinda mbuli dubaluba lyalusaka musokwe.
JAM 1:11 Nkambo izuba lizwa akupya akutenta alimwi kuyumya masokwe idubaluba lilaloka, alimwi bubotu bwalyo ngabwamana. Muli njiyeyi inzila, muntu uvubide uyoyangala akkati kalweendo lwakwe.
JAM 1:12 Ulilongezezegwe oyo unangatila muchindi chamasunko. Nkambo aazunda masunko uyotambula ipande lyabuumi, eelyo lyakasyomezegwa aabo bayanda Leza.
JAM 1:13 Kutakabi muntu utakaambe kuti akusunkwa, “Ndasungwa a Leza.” nkambo Leza tasunkwi achibi, alimwi we lwakwe tasunki muntu.
JAM 1:14 Pesi umwi muntu usunkwa akupeekezya kwakwe, ikumukwelela kule akumweneena.
JAM 1:15 Musule aakuti impeekezyo yakomena mbuli chibi nichakakomena, chizyala lufu.
JAM 1:16 Tamweneenwi, nobakwesu bayandwa.
JAM 1:17 Chonse chipo chibotu achoonse chipo chimaninide chizwa kujulu. Chiiza ansi kuzwa kuli Wisi wa mimuni. Kulinguwe takukwe kusanduka na imwenzule nkambo kakuchengunuka.
JAM 1:18 Leza wakasala kuti tuzyalwe ajwi lyakasimpe, kuchitila kuti tube musyobo wamichelo mitanzi kuzintu zyoonse nzyakalenga.
JAM 1:19 Mulichizi echi, nobakwesu bayandwa: amuchite kuti muntu woonse afwambane kumvwa, anelele kukwambuula, anelele kukunyema.
JAM 1:20 Nkambo kunyema kwamuntu takumaninizyi bululami bwa Leza.
JAM 1:21 Nkinkako amugwisye woonse mawunda mawunda aabulewusi busesemya bwazibi. Mubuntu amutambule ijwi litanyukulwi, eelyo likkonzya kuvuma myuuya yenu.
JAM 1:22 Amube bantu bachita zyamba ijwi pepe kuba baswilizi biyo, kamuli kulyena.
JAM 1:23 Nkambo kuti muntu kamvwa biyo ijwi pesi katalichiti, uli mbuli muntu ulyeba busyu bwakwe mbububumbidwe muchiboniboni.
JAM 1:24 Ulalyeeba aazwa aawo ayende alimwi alube mpawawo kuti wali biyeni.
JAM 1:25 Pesi muntu uulanga kabotu mumulawu walwangunuko, alimwi kayinkilila kunembo akuchita mbubobo, katali sikumvwa biyo uuluba, ooyu muntu ulalongezegwa kunchito zyakwe.
JAM 1:26 Kuti umwi muntu kaliyeya kuti ngwabuna Leza, pesi katazyotololi lulimi lwakwe, weena moyo wakwe, alimwi nzyasyoma nzyabuyo.
JAM 1:27 Ilusyomo lusalala lutakwe kampenda kunembo lya Leza aa Taata ngayakuti: kugwasya bamuchaala abamukabafu kuli zibakatazya, akuliyobola ilwabo beni chakutaba akampenda nikaba komwe kaansi.
JAM 2:1 Nobakwesu, mutajatilili kulusyomo mu Mwami wesu Jesu Kkilisito, iMwami wabulemu, chakulanga ibbazu limwi kuli bamwi bantu.
JAM 2:2 Atwambe kuti umwi muntu wanjila mumuswangano wako kazweete inwenwe zyangolide azizwato ziletombe.
JAM 2:3 Kuti walanga kumuntu uzwete zyakuzwata zibotu akwamba kuti, “Iwe kkala aawa abusena bubotu,” pesi kuli oyu muchete wasikuti, “Iwe kiminokiya,” nakuti, “Kkalaansi mpundilyatide,”
JAM 2:4 unoli toli kusalulana mukati kanu? Tewaba sikusalula amizezo mibi na?
JAM 2:5 Amuswilizye nobakwesu bayandika, Leza takwakasala bachete munyika kuti babe bavubi mulusyomo na alimwi kuti bazokone Bwami oobo mbwakasyomezya kuli baabo bamuyanda?
JAM 2:6 Pesi temwabalemeka pe bachete! Tabensi bavubi na bamudyamizya? Alubo tensi mbabo na bamukwelela kunkuta?
JAM 2:7 Tabali tukili na izina bbotu eelyo ndimwakayitwa andilyo?
JAM 2:8 Zyanchonzyo, kuti mwazuzikizya mulawo wa Mwami, wabubana kukalya mbuli mumalembe, “Muyoyandana ambimuyakilene aabo mbuli mbomuliyanda lwenu,” munoli muchita kabotu.
JAM 2:9 Pesi kuti kamusalula mbimuyanda kuchoitila kabotu, muli kuchita chibi, alimwi mulisungidwe amulawo mbuli basikuzungania.
JAM 2:10 Nkambo kufumbwa muntu ulemeka mulawu, uzumina kuti udadalikila munzila yomwe biyo, ulayowa kutyola mulawu wonse.
JAM 2:11 Nkambo ooyo wakati, “Utemuzyi chabumambi,” alimwi wakati, “utajayi.” kuti tewachita bumambi, pesi wajaya, unooli waba simutyola mulawu.
JAM 2:12 Nkinkaako ambula akuchita mbuli aabo batazosalwe alubeta lwanzila yamulawu walwangunuko.
JAM 2:13 Nkambo lubeta luza kalutakwe nsoni kuli aabo batatondezyi insoni. Ilwetelelo lulalilumbayizya amulubeta.
JAM 2:14 Nimpindunzi, nobakwesu, kuti umwi muntu wati ulijisi lusyomo, pesi katakwe milimo? Oolo lusyomo lulakonzya na kumuvuna?
JAM 2:15 Anikuti umwi mukwesu wachaalumi kana muchizi wachanakazi katasamide zisamo zilikabotu alimwi wabula kulya kwazuba lyonse.
JAM 2:16 Twambe kuti umwi wenu wamba kuti, “Kamuya mulumuno, mukkale mukkasalilwe alimwi mukkute.” Kuti temwabapa zintu zyelede mubili, kuli mpindunzi?
JAM 2:17 Munzila yomwe njiyeyo ilusyomo alulikke, kuti kalutakwe milimo, lulifwide.
JAM 2:18 Pesi umwi ukonzya kwamba kuti, “Uli aalusyomo, alimwi imebo ndili amilimo.” Nditondezye lusyomo lwako kakutakwe milimo, alimwi ndilakutondezya lusyomo lwangu kwinda mumilimo yangu.
JAM 2:19 Ulasyoma kuti kuli Leza omwe; ulikuchita kabotu. Pesi awalawo madimoni alazisyoma ezyo, aboobo alayoowa akuteketa.
JAM 2:20 Mulayanda na kuziba, nobaalumi bafubafuba, kuti lusyomo lutakwe milimo ndwabiyo? Amwi malembe aansiku aachi Giliki awamba kuti, Mulayanda na kuziba, nobalumi bafubafuba, kuti biyeni lusyomo lutakwe milimo lulifwide.
JAM 2:21 Abbulahamu taata wesu takalulamikwa amilimo na awo nakaba mwana wakwe Ayizeki kuchipayilo?
JAM 2:22 Mwabona kuti lusyomo lwakabeleka amilimo yakwe, alimwi kuti kwinda kumilimo yakwe lusyomo lwakwe lwakamaninina.
JAM 2:23 Akazuzikizigwa malembe awamba kuti, “Abbulahamu wakali kusyoma Leza, alimwi zyakamwambya kuti uli abululami,” alimwi wakamba kuti mwenzinyina wa Leza.
JAM 2:24 Mwabona kuti muntu wambwidwa aamilimo yakwe, pepe alusyomo biyo.
JAM 2:25 Munzila ikozyania alimwi, Lahabbu sibumambi tembwakalulamikwa na amilimo awo mpakatambula basikutumwa alimwi wakabalayila kuti bayinke ayimbi inzila?
JAM 2:26 Nkambo mbuuli mubili kuti kawanzene amuuya ulifwide, mbombubo alwalo lusyomo kuti kalwanzene milimo lulifwide.
JAM 3:1 Ibiingi benu tabeelede kuba bayiisyi pe, nobakwesu, nkambo mulizi kuti iswe nituyiisya tuyobetekwa zikkalikali.
JAM 3:2 Nkambo toonse tuladadalika munzila inyingi. Kuti umwi muntu katadadaliki kumajwi, ooyo muntu uliluleme chakumaninina, kakkonzya akululamika mubili wakwe woonse.
JAM 3:3 Lino kuti twabikka nkabyo mumulomo wamabbiza kuti atulemeke, tulakonzya alimwi kululamika mibili yawo.
JAM 3:4 Amuzibe alimwi ikuti maato, nikuba kuti mapati byeni alimwi aleenzegwa aluuwo, alayambwa ansoke nini loko kuyosika kufumbwa nkwayanda sikwayenzya ensoke.
JAM 3:5 Muli eyi inzila, lulimi nchizo chinini loko, pesi lukomezya zintu zipati loko. Amubone alimwi kalilo kanini mbukatantezya lusaka loonse.
JAM 3:6 Lulimi alulalo nkalilo, inyika yazibi ibikidwe mukkati kabamwi besu. Lulimi lubozeka mubili woonse, luumpa buumi boonse, alimwi alulalo lubikwa mumulilo mubbibi lyazibi.
JAM 3:7 Nkambo woonse musyobo wamunyanyama wamulusaka, bayuni, tukwaba, azyuuka zyamulwizi zilivubidwe alimwi zilazyolololwa abantu.
JAM 3:8 Pesi kumakani alulimi, tawope muntu ukonzya kululamika lulimi. Nchintu chitalulamikiki, chizwide buyoka bujaya.
JAM 3:9 Andulo lulimi tulalumbayizya Mwami wesu a Taata, alimwi tupa bantu milandu andulo, ibantu bakalengwa muchikozyano a Leza.
JAM 3:10 Kuzwa mumulomo nguwo omwe kuzwa zilongezyo azisapi zyamilandu, Nobakwesu, eezi zintu tazyelede kunochitika pe.
JAM 3:11 Sa ikasensa komwe kalazwa maanzi manono amanzi apanyuka?
JAM 3:12 Imukkuyu ulachita na nobakwesu, kuzyala insikili? Kana kuti masansa, azyale nkuyu? Aalo manzi tachikonzeki pe kuti akasensa komwe kuzwe alweela amanzi alamunse munono.
JAM 3:13 Alimwi ngwani musongo umvwisisisya aakati kenu? Mumuleke muntu oto atondeezye buumi bwakwe bubotu kwinda kumilimu yakwe mubuntu bwabusongo.
JAM 3:14 Pesi kuti koli aabbivwe lipanyuka amakanze mumoyo wako, ulikankayizyi pe akubejela kasimpe.
JAM 3:15 Obu tensi mbombubo pe busongo buza aansi kabuzwa kujulu. Pesi, tabukwe chintu, tabukwe muuya, buli amadimoni.
JAM 3:16 Nkambo awo ali bbivwe alukazyanyo, nkokuko kuli lupyopyongano anchito zyabulozi.
JAM 3:17 Pesi busongo buzwa kujulu lutanzi bulasalala, alimwi mbwalumuuno, bulatontola, bulalibombya, mbwamiyeeyo mibotu, buzwide ilwetelelo amichelo mibotu, tabujisi lwanzano lwamoyo lwamoyo alimwi buli bwinibwini.
JAM 3:18 Alimwi imichelo yabululami ilabyalwa muluumuno mukkati kabaabo bachita chalumuno.
JAM 4:1 Kuzwa kuli kupopotezyania ampyopyongano akati kenu? Tazizwidi muziyandisyo zyenu na eezyo zilwana akati kenu nubeni?
JAM 4:2 Mulapeekezya, pesi tamukwepe. Mulajaya akuba bbivwe, pesi tamukonzyi kujana. Mulalwana akupopotezyania. Takwe anchimulacho nkambo tamukumbili.
JAM 4:3 Mulakumbila pesi tamupegwi nkambo mukumbila aanzila italuleme, mukuyanda kuti muyibelesye kuziyandisyo zyenu.
JAM 4:4 Nywebo nobasimamaambe! Tamwizi na kuti buzolwani enyika nkulwana a-Leza? Nkokwamba kuti kufumbwa ulisalila kuba mwenzinyina wanyika ulichita sinkondonyina a Leza.
JAM 4:5 Na muyeya kuti malembe awamba zyabiyo aamba kuti, “Imuuya ngwakachita kuti upone mulindiswe uli abbivwe loko”?
JAM 4:6 Pesi Leza uupa luzyalo lwiingi, aboobo malembe awamba kuti, “Leza ulabakazya basikuliyanda, pesi ufwida luzyalo kuli balibombya.”
JAM 4:7 Nkokuti amulipede kuli Leza. Mumukkake satani, alimwi ulamutantamuka.
JAM 4:8 Amuswene afwifwi a Leza, alimwi uleza afwifwi andinywe, Amusalazye maboko eenu, inywe nobasizibi, alimwi musalazye myoyo yenu, inywe nobasimyoyo ibili.
JAM 4:9 Mumvwe machise, mupwaye mibila, akulila! Muchite kuti kuseka kwenu kube mawuse alimwi lukondo lwenu kube kukankabala.
JAM 4:10 Amulibombye kunembo lya Mwami, alimwi uyomupa bulemu.
JAM 4:11 Tamunowambuli chakutamikizyania, nobakwesu. Imuntu uwambula bubi aatala amuzyalwanyina na kupa mulandu kumuzyalwa nyina ukazyania amulawu alimwi uupa mulawu mulandu. Kutikopa mulawu mulandu, toli simuchita mulawu pe, pesi uli mubetesi.
JAM 4:12 Ngumwi biyo sikupa mulawu mubetesi. Ngooyo ukonzya kufutula akujaya. Nduweni, iwebo noopa mulalandu kuli simayake nyokwe?
JAM 4:13 Muswilizye lino, inywe nimwamba kuti, “sunu kana ijunza tuyonjila muchisi eechi, tukakkale munyaka nkukooko, tukasambale, alimwi tukajane impindu.”
JAM 4:14 Ngwani uuzi zitakachitike juunza, alimwi buumi bwako niinzi? Nkambo nduwe sikkunkwe uuboneka kwachiindi chinini mpawo wamwayika.
JAM 4:15 Anukuti, mwelede kwamba kuti, “Na Mwami kayanda, tulapona alimwi tuchite eechi kana echiya.”
JAM 4:16 Pesi lino mulalikankayizya aatala amabambe aanu. Kulikankayizya kuli bobiya konse nkubi.
JAM 4:17 Nkinkaako kuli woonse uuzi kuchita kabotu pesi katazichiti, kulinguwe nchoono.
JAM 5:1 Amuze lino, inywe nimuvubide, mulile mulyeeme akambo kamasukusyo aaza kulindinywe.
JAM 5:2 Buvubi bwenu bwabola, alimwi zisamo zyenu zyavunda ankubi.
JAM 5:3 Ingolida ansiliva zyenu zyabbulubana alimwi bulala bwazyo bulaba bukamboni butakamukone. Buyolya nyama yenu mbuli mulilo. Mwalondola buvubi bwenu kwamazuba amamamnino.
JAM 5:4 Amubone, bulumbu mbomulikujatila basimilimo benu bulikukwila - bulumbu mbumwakajatila abo basikumutebwida myuunda yenu. Kukwiila kwa basikutebula kwamvwikka kumatwi a Mwami wabasikuswayigwa.
JAM 5:5 Mwakkala mububotu bwebesi aansi alimwi mwalyokezya. Mwalinenesya myoyo kuti kuzobote buzuba bwakujayigwa.
JAM 5:6 Mwapa mulandu alimwi akujaya muntu musalali. Takwe naamulwana pe.
JAM 5:7 Nkinkako amube amoyo mulamfu, kwalino, nobakwesu, mane kukuboola kwa Mwami. Mubone mulimi mbwalindila muchelo mubotu kuzwa munyika alimwi uli amoyo mulamfu kukuulindila, mane do kuwa kwemvula ntaanzi ayamelelezyo.
JAM 5:8 Anywebo amukkazike myoyo yenu. Amusimye myoyo yenu nkambo kuboola kwa Mwami kwaba afwifwi.
JAM 5:9 Tamutongawuki, nobakwesu, akuzwangaana chenuchenu, kjti tamukajanwi amulandu. Amubone, mubetesi alimwi amulyango.
JAM 5:10 Amujane chikozyanisyo, nobakwesu, kuzwa kukoomba akulansya moyo kwabasinsimi, aabo bakaambula muzina lya Mwami.
JAM 5:11 Mubone, twamba kuti aabo bakawunduzya machise balilongezezegwe. Mwakamvwa Jobo mbakapengeleka, alimwi mulizi machitilo a Mwami, mbasalazizya moyo ansoni zyakwe.
JAM 5:12 Atala azyonse, nobakwesu, mutakonki, nikuba kwaana ejulu kana nyika, kana nikuba ichili zwecho chikonke. Anukuti, amwambe “Iyii” wenu awambe “Iyii” alimwi “Pepe” awambe “Pepe,” kuchitila kuti tamukanjili mukubetekwa.
JAM 5:13 Kuli umwi na akati kenu ulikoomba mubuyumuyumu? Ngakkombe. Kuli uli alumwemwe na? Ngayimbe ntembawuzyo.
JAM 5:14 Kuli umwi uchisidwe na akati kenu? Ngayite bapati bembungano, alimwi ngabamukombele. Abamunanike mafuta muzina lya Mwami.
JAM 5:15 Ikukomba kwalusyomo kulamuponia muntu uuchiswa, alimwi Mwami ulamubusya. Kuti kali wakachita zibi, Leza ulamulekelela.
JAM 5:16 Nkinkaako amulyaambe izibi zyenu kuli umwi awumwi, alimwi mukombelane, kuchitila kuti muponesegwe. Inkombyo yamuntu musalali ili anguzu loko kumabelekelo ayo.
JAM 5:17 Elayija wakali mwalumi mbuli ndiswe, wakakomba chakasimpe kuti imvula itawi, alimwi teyakawa kubusena oobo kwamyaka yotatwe amyezi musanu awumwi.
JAM 5:18 Mpawo Elayija wakakomba lubo. Imajulu akapa imvula, alimwi inyika yakazyala michelo yaayo.
JAM 5:19 Nobakwesu, kuti umwi akati kenu wasweka kukasimpe, alimwi umwi wamuboozya,
JAM 5:20 Ooyo muntu welede kuziba kuti kufumbwa muntu uboozya sizibi kuzwa kubulewusi bwanzila yakwe uyomuvuna kuzwa kulufu, alimwi uyovumba mweelwe mupati wazibi.
1PE 1:1 Pita, mutumwa wa Jesu Kkilisito, kubenzu bamwaikilide kumanyika, ibasalidwe, koonse ku Pontasi, Galantiya, Kkapadosiya, Eziya, aku Bbitiniya.
1PE 1:2 Eechi chilimumabambe amumakanze a Leza Taata, mukwinda mumubeleko usalazigwa a Muuya, kuti mumutelele alubo mukwinda mukusansailwa bulowa bwa Jesu Kkilisito. Iluzyalo ngalube alindinywe, alubo lumuuno ngaluyungizizigwe kulindinywe.
1PE 1:3 Akube kuti Leza wisi wa-Mwami Jesu Kkilisito alumbayizigwe! Muluzyalo lwakwe lupati, wakatupa kuzyalwa kupya iswebo bulabulangizi bwabuponi kwinda mububuke bwa Jesu Kkilisito kuzwa kubafu.
1PE 1:4 Eechi nchalukkono lutakabule kumana pe, lutakabule akabbata, alubo talukonzyi pe kuyokulumpana abunini. Lulibambidwe kujulu kalulinda nduwe.
1PE 1:5 Iwebo ulikwabilidwe munguzu zya-Leza kwinda mukusyoma kwalufutuko olo lwimvwilidi kuyoyubununwa mukugola kwechindi.
1PE 1:6 Ulikondedwe atala acheechi, nekuba kwalino kulelede kuti mube akuusa kukusunkwa kwiingi.
1PE 1:7 Echi chilabawo kuti kukabonwe lusyomo lwanu, olu lwindide ngolida mbotu ikulumpala, nekuba yakawumpwa mumulilo. Echi chilachitika kuti lusyomo lwanu lukajanike kalulempindu ilentembawuzyo, abulemu, achilemeko ayoyubununwa Jesu Kkilisito.
1PE 1:8 Tamuna kumubona pe, pesi mulamuyanda. Tamumuboni pe kwalino, pesi mulasyoma mulinguwe akukondwa alukondo lutambiiki luzwide bulemu.
1PE 1:9 Kwalino muyolitambwida lwenu mpindu yalusyomo lwanu, lufutuko lwa muuya yenu.
1PE 1:10 Ataala alufutuko olu, basinsiimi abo bakasinsima atala aluzyalo olo lwakali kuyanda kuza alindinywe, bakayandula chabusungu kabayanda kuziba,
1PE 1:11 Kabayandula kuziba kuti muntunzi nakuti chinoli chiindiinzi echo muuya wa Kkilisito nchiwakalikwamba mulimbabo awo mpakabambilide kuti katana kwabwa kuyoba machise a Kkilisito abulemu buyotobela.
1PE 1:12 Chakayubununwa kulimbabo kuti tebakali kulibelekela lwabo beni pe, pesi anywebo, awo mpobakali kwamba atala azintu ezyo zyakambwa kulindinywe ababo bamukambawukila mulumbe wamakani mabotu kulindinywe kwinda ku-Muuya Uusalala wakatumwa kuzwa kujulu-kachili chintu baangelo nchibakali kulakamizya {kupeekezya}.
1PE 1:13 Nkikaako amulyaange muzibuno zyanu zyakuyeeya kwenu. Amube babotu. Amubike bulangizi bwenu chakumaninina kuluzyalo olo luyoyetwa kulindinywe ayoyubununwa Jesu Kkilisito.
1PE 1:14 Mbuli bana bateelela, mutakabwedululi kukuyandisya kwenu nkumwakali kuponena chiindi nimwakachili mukutaziba.
1PE 1:15 Nkambo kakuti oyo iwakamwiita ulasalala, inywebo, kulelede, kuti musalale mubube bwanu boonse.
1PE 1:16 Nkambo mbuli mbukulembedwe, “Amusalale, nkambo Ambebo ndasalala.”
1PE 1:17 Na kamumwita kuti “Taata” oyo ubeteka chakutalanga chiimo chamuntu alubo umwi mbuli milimo yakwe, amwende lwendo olu muchindi chanu chakumuyowa.
1PE 1:18 Mulizi kuti techakachitwa ansiliva ikulumpala na ingolida ezyo nzimwakali kununulwa ezyo kukwenda kwenu kwabuyo nkomwakiiya kuliba mawuso.
1PE 1:19 Anukuti, nywebo mwakanunulwa abulowa bubotu bwa Kkilisito, oyo wakali m buli mwana wambelele utakwe kampenda nikaba kabbata.
1PE 1:20 Kkilisito wakalizibinkenwe kakutana kuba kulengwa kwenyika, pesi kwalino wakazoyubununwa kulindinywe muzyiindi zyamamanino.
1PE 1:21 Kwinda mulinguwe muzumine kuli Leza, oyo wakamubusya kuzwa kubafu akumupa bulemu, kuli lusyomo lwanu abulangizi bwenu bube kuli Leza.
1PE 1:22 Mwakachita myuya kuti ibote mukwinda mukutelela kukasimpe. Echi chakaba obo kukumwetela luyando lwababunyina; amukayandane umwi awumwi kazizwa mumoyo. Amwi malembe mapati abensiku bachiGiliki abalika obu, Mwakasalazya myoyo yanu kukutelela kukasimpe kwinda kumuya.
1PE 1:23 Mwakazyalwa bupya, kutali kuzwa kumbuto ikulumpala pe, pesi kuzwa kumbuto itakulumpali, kwinda mujwi lya-Leza litakasyale kalipona
1PE 1:24 Nkambo kakuti, “Nyama yoonse ilimbuli bwizu, abulemu bwayo bonse bulimbuli malubaluba abwizu bwamusokwe. Ibwizu ngabwayuma, awalo malubaluba nganyana awidaansi,
1PE 1:25 Pesi ijwi lya-Mwami linoliwo kwalyoonse.” Elijwi mulumbe wamakani mabotu ayo akakambawukwa kulindinywe.
1PE 2:1 Nkikaako amusowele kumbali ibubi bonse, alweno loonseni, akuupaupa, akwemuzya amabbivwe wonse.
1PE 2:2 Mbuli bana bavwanda, amube achiyandisyo amalili mabotu amuuya, kuchitila kuti mukwinda mulingawo mukonzye kukomena kulufutuko,
1PE 2:3 mbuli mbumwakalabila kale kuti Leza ngusibuuya.
1PE 2:4 Amubole kulinguwe mukuti ni bbwe igumi elyo lyakasowegwa abantu, pesi kalili nibbwe lyakasalidwe a-Leza mbuli bbwe liyandika kulinguwe.
1PE 2:5 Anywebo muli mbuli mabwe mawuumi ayo alimukuyakwa kuti mukabe ing'anda ya Muuya nkokuya mukabe bapayizi basalala abo bayopayila zipayilo zyamuuya zitambulika kuli Leza kwinda muli Jesu Kkilisito.
1PE 2:6 Mumagwalo kulambidwe eezi: “bona, ndiyoyala mu Ziyoni ibbwe lyechiswi, lisalidwe alubo liyandikana. kufumbwa uzumina kulinguwe takoyowusa insoni.”
1PE 2:7 Obu buyandisi, mbobwanu, inywebo nomuzumina. Pele kulibabo ibatazumini, “Elyo bbwe ndibakasowede bayaki, eli ndilyakazooba mutwe wachiswi,”
1PE 2:8 Alimwi, “Ibbwe lyakulebya antomwe amwala ubachita kuti balebwe.” Balalebwa nkambo bakalikaka ijwi-lili ndendilyo litondeka nzibakeelede kuchita.
1PE 2:9 Pesi inywebo muli bantu basalidwe, bapayizi bami, musyobo usalala, bantu bavubidwe kwa Leza, kuchitila kuti mukakambawuke milimo igambya ya yoyo iwakamwita inywebo kuzwa mumudima kumweta mumumuni wakwe ugambya.
1PE 2:10 Ichindi tensi mwakali bantu pe, Pesi ikwalino mwaba bantu ba-Leza. Tensi mwakali mwalutambula pe luzyalo, Pesi ikwaino mwakalutambula luzyalo.
1PE 2:11 Nomuyandwa, ndamulayilila mbuli beenzu bamwayikide aansi aano kuti mulilesye kukuyandisya kwenyama, oko kumulwana amyuya yenu.
1PE 2:12 Kwenda kwenu akati kabamasi kwelede kuba abulemo, kuchitila kuti awo mpobayomuvwiya kuti muli basizibi, bakabe bakamboni bamilimo yenu mibotu akuyobwedezya bulemu kuli Leza mubuzuba obo mbwayolibonia.
1PE 2:13 Amukalibombye kubwami boonse bwabantu nkambo ka-Mwami. Amukabatelele boonse bami mbubali bapati,
1PE 2:14 antomwe abendelezi, abo batumidwe kuti bakape zisubulo kuli basimuchita zibi akusumpula abo bachita ziluleme.
1PE 2:15 Nkambo olu luyando lwa-Leza, kuti mukwinda mukuchita zibotu munoli mwawumuzya kwambula kwendadanyanwa kwabantu bafubafuba.
1PE 2:16 Mbuli bantu bangunukide, mutakabelesyi lwangunuko lwenu kukuvumbya zibi, pesi ngamube mbuli babelesi ba-Leza.
1PE 2:17 Amulemeke bantu boonse. Amuyande babunyina boonse. Muyowe Leza. Mulemeke baami.
1PE 2:18 Nobalanda, amubatelele basimalelo benu akunobalemeka lyoonse. Mutanoteleli basimalelo babotu abatontozi kupela pe, pele akuli basikakomokomo.
1PE 2:19 Nkambo echi chilalumbayizika, nkambo ubikila maanu kuli Leza, muntu aswanana amapenzi kali mukuchisilwa zitamwelede.
1PE 2:20 Ino kuli amilimonzi na mwabisya akukkalilila kamuli mumachise? Pele na mwakachita zibotu mpawo mwazochiswa kamuli mukusubulwa, echi chilelede kulumbayizigwa kuzwa kuli Leza.
1PE 2:21 Nchenchicho echo nchimwakayitilwa, nkambo Kkilisito lwakwe wakamuchisilwa. Wakamusiila chitondezyo chakuti mukatobelezye mumukondo wakwe.
1PE 2:22 “Takwe echibi nchakachita, nekuba kujanika lweno lwakajanika mumulomo wakwe,”
1PE 2:23 Awo nakatukilwa, takwepe anakabwedezya. Awo nakachisigwa, takwepe nakababbodweda, pesi wakalipedekezya lwakwe kuliyoyo mubutesi mubotu.
1PE 2:24 Welwakwe wakayumuna zibi zyesu mumubili wakwe achisamu kuchitila kuti iswebo tukakkale kule echibi alubo tukaponene bululami. Kwinda mumibunda yakwe twakaponesegwa.
1PE 2:25 Nywebo monseni mwakali mbuli imbelele ziswekede, pesi kwalino mwakapiluka kumwembeli wenu, uliingula myuuya yenu.
1PE 3:1 Muleyi nzila, inywebo nobamakaintu amulibombye kubalumi benu. Amuchite obu nikuba kuli bala balumi batateleli kujwi, kuchitila kuti basanduke babule zyakwamba, kwinda mumichito yabamakaintu babo,
1PE 3:2 banoli baba bakamboni kuchilemeko chenu, enjendelo yenu mbotu.
1PE 3:3 Echi ngachichitwe pepe akulibotya-botya kwaanze mbuli kulilungitizya masusu, kuzwata ngolida atumwi tukumba, nikuba kulisamika mpasya zityola myoyo yabamwi.
1PE 3:4 Pesi, echi ngachichitwe amuntu wamukati wamumoyo, abubotu butagoli butontolela amuuya wachumunizi, kachili nchechibotu kunembo lya-Leza.
1PE 3:5 Nkambo obu mbombubo banakazi basalali bechiindi bakali kulangila Leza mbuba kalisamika, kwinda mukulibombya kubalumi babo.
1PE 3:6 Enzila njiyeeyi Sala wakalibombya kuli Abbulahamu alubo wakali kumwita kuti mba Simwami. Lino nywebo mwaba bana bakwe kapati na mwachita zibotu alubo na kamutayowi mapenzi.
1PE 3:7 Kakukozyania, anywebo nobalumi mulelede kupona kabotu abamakaintu benu mbuli mbomuzi kuti mwanakazi, ulimbuli chilongo chitasimide. Mulelede kubapa bulemo mbuli basikulyanyokwe lukono kubululami bwamuluzyalo. Amuchite obo kuti inkombyo zyenu zitambulike.
1PE 3:8 Kumamanino, monseeni, amube amuzeezo ukozyenie, mube akwetelelana, kuyandana mbuli babunyina, amoyo mutete, akulibombya.
1PE 3:9 Mutabwedezyi chitaluleme kuchibinyina nikuba kubwedezya chisapi kuchisapi. Anukuti amubwedezye kulongezya, nkambo ezi nzimwakaitilwa, kuti mukakonzye kuyokona zilongezyo.
1PE 3:10 “Oyo uyanda kubona buumi bubotu akubona mazuba mabotu uyelede kuti wakasya lulimi amulomo wakwe kukwambula chalweeno.
1PE 3:11 Akube kuti alilesye kububi akunochita zibotu kupela. Ayandule lumuuno akulutobela.
1PE 3:12 Nkambo meso a Mwami alabona baluleme, alubo matwi akwe alatelela kunkombyo zyabaluleme. Pesi busyu bwa Mwami bulabukali kulibabo bachita zibi.”
1PE 3:13 Kabi ngwani oyo unga ulamubisizya na mwasungwala kukuchita zibotu?
1PE 3:14 Pele na mwachiswa nkambo kabululami, mulilongezezegwe. Mutayowi ezyo nzibayowa. Mutakalikatazyi.
1PE 3:15 Pesi, ngamulemeke Mwami Kkilisito kuti musalali mumyoyo yenu. Mukkale kamuli bambilide kuti mukapandulwide boonse bamubuzya makani alusyomo ndomulalo -
1PE 3:16 Alubo, amukulibombya amukulemeka. Amube amuzezo mubotu kuchitila kuti abo bamutukilila buumi bubotu bwamuli Kkilisito bakawuse insoni nkambo banoli bakali kumwambula anga ndinywe basizibi.
1PE 3:17 Nchibotu loko, kuti kakuli nkuyanda kwa Leza, kuti mukachiswe akambo kakuchita zibotu kwinda kunochita zibi.
1PE 3:18 Alakwe Kkilisito wakachiswa lomwe kachisilwa zibi. Oyo wakaluleme wakatuchisilwa nitwakataluleme pe, kuchitila kuti atuswenzye kuli Leza. Wakatufwida kunyama, pesi wakabusigwa a-Muuya.
1PE 3:19 Kwinda ku Muuya, wakinka akuyokambawuka kumyuuya eyo ili muntolongo kwalino.
1PE 3:20 Eyo yakatatelela pe kuchindi nchakachili kukazika moyo wakwe Leza mumazuba aa-Nowa, mumazuba akuyakwa kwabwato, mpawo Leza wakavuna bantu bache buyo - myuuya musanu amwitaatu - kwinda mumanzi.
1PE 3:21 Echi nchitondezyo chamubbabbatizyo oyo umuvuna lino - takwensi kwamba kuti mbuli mbotusamba tombe amubili pe, pesi nkokuti mulayandula manjezezya mabotu mumeso a Leza - kwinda mububuke bwa Jesu Kkilisito.
1PE 3:22 Kkilisito ulikujanza lyalulyo lwa Leza. Wakaya kujulu. Bangelo, bendelezi, abasimanguzu boonse balelede kulibombya kuli nguwe.
1PE 4:1 Nkinkaako, akambo kakuti Kkilisito wakachiswa kunyama, amuliyumye lwenu amuyeeyo ukozyenie. Nkambo kufumbwa muntu uchiswa mumubili ulanzene acibi.
1PE 4:2 Impindu yakwe, muntu uloobo, chindi chakwe chingi kunyama, ngatacheendi mumakaanze anyama pe, pesi mumakaanze a Leza.
1PE 4:3 Nkambo chindi chakinda chakakwana chenu kuti kamuchichita kuyanda kwabamasi, mwakali kupona mubumpelenge, mukwemuzya, mubukoolwi, amukuyobukomba mizimu itondwa.
1PE 4:4 Balachibona kachilichigambyo na babona kamutajatilaamwi ambabo mukuya buvuzya michito italuleme, nkinkaako banoya bwamba bubi atala andinywe.
1PE 4:5 Bayolivwilila kulinguwe oyo ulibambilide kuzobeteka bawumi abafwide.
1PE 4:6 Akambo kanchichechi Makani Mabotu nchakakambawukwa akubafwide, kuchitila kuti, nekuba kabanoli babetekwa kunyama mbuli bantu, balelede kuti kabapona mumuuya munzila iyanda Leza.
1PE 4:7 Magozezyo azintu zyonse aba afwifwi. Nkinkaako amulibatamike amuzezo mubotu, alubo amube amiyeyo mibotu kuchitila kuti kamunokomba.
1PE 4:8 Kwinda zyonse zintu, amusungwalile kuyandana umwi amwenzinyina, nkambo luyando luvumba mulwi wazibi.
1PE 4:9 Amukabotezyanie umwi amwenzinyina katakwe ulila lila pe.
1PE 4:10 Mbuli mbomwakapegwa zipego umwi awumwi, amuzibelesye kukugwasyania anzizyo mbuli babaanzi baluzyalo lwa-Leza muzyimo zisiyenesiyene.
1PE 4:11 Na kakuli uwambula, kwambuula kwakwe akube kwamajwi a Leza. Na kakuli ubeleka milimo, abeleke kazizwa kunguzu nzyamupa Leza. Amukachite zyoonse zintu kuchitila kuti munzila zyonse Leza akalumbayizigwe kwinda muli Jesu Kkilisito. Akube kuti kuli Jesu Kkilisito bulemu abwami zibe kulinguwe kwalyoonse alyonse. Ameni.
1PE 4:12 Nomuyandwa, mutazibwezi mbuli chigambyo amasukusyo ayaaka mbuli mulilo ayo akamuchitikila, mbotatedi nchimwi chintu chigambya chakali kuchitikila ndinywe.
1PE 4:13 Pepe, anukuti muukuswanana amachise akaswanana a-Kkilisito, amukondwe, kuchitila kuti anywebo mukabotelwe kuchiindi echo bulemu bwakwe bwakuyubununwa.
1PE 4:14 Na mwakutukilwa nkambo kazina lya-Kkilisito, mulilongezezegwe, nkambo Muuya wabulemu antomwe a Muuya wa-Leza unoli ulokumusunka nywebo.
1PE 4:15 Pesi kutabi naba omwe wenu uyochiswa nkambo kabujayi, kubba, na simuchita zibi, nanka sindimi zyobile.
1PE 4:16 Pesi na umwi wachiswa mbuli muzumini, atabi nawusa insoni pe; pesi kuti, ngalumbayizye Leza akambo kazina lyakwe.
1PE 4:17 Nkambo chaba chindi chakuti lubeta lutalike empuli yakwa Leza. Kuti lwatalika alindiswe, balachitilwa buti abo batazumini kumakani mabotu a Leza?
1PE 4:18 Alubo “na kachili chiyumu kubaluleme kuti bakafutulwe, ino bayoba buti abo batazumini antomwe abasizibi?”
1PE 4:19 Nkenkaako akube kuti abo bachiswa nkambo kaluyando lwa Leza bapekezezye myuya yabo ku Mulengi usyomekede mukuchita zibotu.
1PE 5:1 Ndikwambila bapati balakati kanu, nkambo ambebo, ndemwini ndimupati, alubo ndikamboni wamapenzi aa-Kkilisito, alubo ndime umwi wabatakabane mubulemu obo buchizoyubununwa.
1PE 5:2 Amube basikwembela butanga bambelele zya-Leza obo mbomulo kubbasopa, kamulo kubbasopa mbuli balangi babo pepe anukuti nkambo mbumwelede, pesi akambo kakuba achiyandisyo, mbuli Leza mbwatanoli wayanda kuti mumubelekele - pepe kwempindu iwusyansoni pesi chakulipeda.
1PE 5:3 Mutabeleki mbuli baami atala bantu abo mbimubbasopa. Anukuti, amube chitondezyo kubutanga.
1PE 5:4 Kwakuti awo Mwembezi Simutwe akuyubununwa, inywebo mukalitambwide munsini wabulemu utakulumpali.
1PE 5:5 Munzila ikozyania, anywebo nobalumi bachikula, amukalibombye kubalumi bakakomena. Nywebo moonseni, amukalizwatiike myoyo miteete kamunogwasyania umwi awumwi. Nkambo Leza ulabakazya basikulisumpula, pesi abo balamyoyo mitete ulabapa luzyalo.
1PE 5:6 Nkinkako amulibombye munsi lyejanza pati lya-Leza nkokuti akamusumpule kuchiindi chelelede.
1PE 5:7 Amwasowele kulinguwe woonseni makatazyo anu nkambo ngumuchebuka lyoonse.
1PE 5:8 Amukalibombye, amukuchenjela, nkambo sinkondo nyokwe saatani ulendeenda mbuli mulavu uvuuluma, kayandula ngwatalume.
1PE 5:9 Amukamulwane, amuyume mulusyomo lwanu. Nkambo mulizizi kuti mapenzi akozyania ayaya ayosika kulibabunyina benu kumanyika woonse.
1PE 5:10 Musule akuyochiswa kwachindi chinini, Leza siluzyalo loonseni, oyo wakamwiita mubulemu bwakwe ibutamani muli Kkilisito, uyomusalazya, akumusimpa, akumusimya, akuyomuzikitizya.
1PE 5:11 Kulinguwe akube bwami kwalyonse a lyonse. Ameni.
1PE 5:12 Ndabweza Siluvenasi mbulimukwesu usyomekede, alubo ndalemba kulindinywe mubufwifwi kwindila mulinguwe. Ndikumusungwazya akupa bukamboni kulindinywe kuti ezyo nzindakalemba masimpe aluzyalo lwa-Leza. Amwimikile mulindilyo simpe.
1PE 5:13 Mukayintu ulimu Bbabbiloni, oyo usalidwe antomwe andinywe, ulokumujuzya loko. Antomwe a Makki, mwana wangu, ulamujuzya.
1PE 5:14 Amujuzyanie alumyontano lwaluyando. Iluzyalo alube kulindinywe moonseni nimuli muli-Kkilisito.
2PE 1:1 Ndime Sayimoni Pita, ndemuzike nkendi mutumwa wa Jesu Kkilisito, kulibabo bakatambula lusyomo lwamubululami kwa Leza a Mufutuli wesu Jesu Kkilisito.
2PE 1:2 Iluzyalo alumuuno ngaziyungizigwe mukuzibisya Leza a Jesu-Mwami wesu.
2PE 1:3 Munguzu zyakwe zyabu Leza, zintu zyonse zyabuna Leza zyakapegwa kulindiswe kwinda mukumuziba lwakwe oyo iwakatwiita mubulemu bwakwe amukuzwidilila kwakwe.
2PE 1:4 Kwinda mulizeezi wakatupa zisyomezyo zyakwe zibotu, kuti mulinzizyo tube achabilo chabuna Leza, akuyovunwa kubusofwazi bwaansi aano bwetelezegwa kuzwa kuzibi.
2PE 1:5 Akambo kazeezi, amusungwale kukuyungizya bubotu mulusyomo lwanu, akukubota muyungizye luzibo,
2PE 1:6 kuluzibo muyungizye kulyendeelela, kukulyendelela muyungizye lukakatilo, kulukakatilo muyungizye buna Leza,
2PE 1:7 kubuna leza muyungizye luyando lwakuba bantu bamwi, kuluyando lwakuba bantu bamwi, muvuzye luyando.
2PE 1:8 Kuti ezi zintu zyaba mulindinywe akukomena mulindinywe, ziyomukasya lwanu kukutazyala michelo nikuba kutazyala michelo yakuba luzibo lwa-Mwami wesu Jesu Kkilisito.
2PE 1:9 Pesi kufumbwa uyobula ezi zintu unoli waba simubonena afwifwi kwakuti unoli moofu, nkambo wakaluba kuti wakasalazigwa kuzwa kuzibi zyakwe zyachiindi.
2PE 1:10 Nkaambo kaako, nobakwesu, amuchiite bubotu bwiindilide kuchitila bwiitwe bwanu akusalwa kwanu kube kwanchoonzyo, nkambo na mwazichita zyonseezi, tamukoyolebwa pe.
2PE 1:11 Mukuchita obu muyofonkwedwa mubwingi lweenu imwenya wakuyonjila mubwami bwa Mwami a Mufutuli wesu Jesu Kkilisito.
2PE 1:12 Nkeenkako ndinokkala nkelibambilide kunomuyeezya nywebo zintu ezi, nekuba mulizizi, alubo nekuba mulibasimi mukasimpe ako nkemwakabaako kwalino.
2PE 1:13 Ndayeeya kuti nchibotu kulindime, kufumbwa nkechili aansi aano, kunokkala nkemutilimuna akumuyeezya.
2PE 1:14 Nkambo ndizi loko kuti aano ansi iteente lyangu liyomwayulwa chakufwambana, nkambo Mwami Jesu Kkilisito wandiyubunwida obo.
2PE 1:15 Alimwi ndilasungwala kuti musule akuzwa kwangu kamunochiyeyede kwalyoonse ezi zintu.
2PE 1:16 Nkambo tetwakali kutobela zyabusongo bwakulipangila nitwakachita kuti muzibe nguzu akuboola kwa Mwami wesu Jesu Kkilisito, pesi twakali bakamboni bakabona bupati bwakwe.
2PE 1:17 Nkambo wakatambula kulemekwa abulemu kuzwa kuli Leza Taata awo ijwi nilyakeetwa kulinguwe mubulemu bupati, lyamba kuti, “Oyu Mwanawangu ngunjandisya, mulinguwe ndilakondwa.”
2PE 1:18 Lwesu tobeni twakalimvwa ijwi eli lyakeetwa kuzwa kujulu awo mpotwakalamwi anguwe aatala achilundu chisalala.
2PE 1:19 Nkambo tulalyo ijwi lyachisinsiimi lyakatusimya, kwakuti muyochita obotu na mwalitelela. Lilimbuli chimunisyo echo chimunika mumudima mane kukabe kubuchedo awo kumazwido entanda mumyoyo yanu.
2PE 1:20 Ajulu azyonse, amube akumvwisisya kuti takwe pe businsimi bwamumagwalo bunga bulazwa mubupanduluzi bwamuntu.
2PE 1:21 Nkambo takwepe businsimi bwakali bwazwa kukuyanda kwamuntu, pesi bantu bakali kwambula zyakali kuzwa kuli Leza awo nibakali kubwezegwa a Muuya Uusalala.
2PE 2:1 Basinsimi babeji bakeza kubantu, abalo bayiisyi babeji bayoboola alimwi kulindinywe. Bayoza chakusisilikizya anjiisyo zinyonyoona, alubo bayomukaka naba Mwami wakabawula amulo. Bayolyetela lunyonyoko chakufwambana.
2PE 2:2 Lino bantu biingi bayotobela zyiimbo zyabo, alubo mukwinda mulimbabo inzila yesimpe iyosampawulwa.
2PE 2:3 Mukutangala kwabo bayomunyanzya nyanzya amajwi alweeno. Ilutuko lwabo talukoyononoka kusiika; alwalo lunyonyooko lwabo talukonzyi koona.
2PE 2:4 Nkambo Leza takabaleka nibaba baangelo ibakabisya. Pele wakabaaba kuli Tatalasi kuti babambwe mumacheni alamudima waansi mane dokukabe lubeta. Zimwi njiisyo mpati zyabansiku ba Giliki zibalika oobu, bayolondolwa mumilindi ilamudima unikide mane kukabe lubeta.
2PE 2:5 Alubo, takwakileka nyika yabasikale. Pesi, wakavuna Nowa, oyo wakali nkambawuko yabululami, kubikaamwi abali musanu ababili awo mpakazoyeta zambangulwe anyika yabantu batakwe bunaleza.
2PE 2:6 Alubo Leza wakazomwayula ziisi zya Sodomu a Gomola kuba mulota akubapa lutuko lwakunyonyoka kuti chibe chitondezyo chazichizochitikila aabo batakwe bunaleza.
2PE 2:7 Alubo wakavuna oyo wakaluleme Loti, oyo wakali kukatazigwa akwenda kwabataluleme batabambi mulawu -
2PE 2:8 Oyo mwalumi wakaluleme, wakali kukkala akatikabo kwamazuba, wakali kujatikana loko mumoyo wakwe ululeme nkambo kamilimo yabo yakali mibi njakabona akumvwa.
2PE 2:9 Mwami ulizi mbanga ulavuna aabo bayowa Leza kuzwa mumasunko alubo akubabamba abo bataluleme kababambilwa kusubulwa mubuzuba ob o bwalubeta.
2PE 2:10 Aka nkasimpe kapati kuli baabo bazumina munzila zisofwede zyanyama abaabo batalemyi bwami. Mbasikulipa akulisumpula balipa bupati, tabayowi awo niba sampawula balemu.
2PE 2:11 Baangelo balanguzu mpati abupati, pesi tabeeti lubeta lwalutuko ambabo kuti baze ku Mwami.
2PE 2:12 Pesi aba bantu, balimbuli banyama batayeeyi, bakalengelwa kuzochigwa alunyonyooko. Tabazi anchibatukila. Mulunyonyoko abalabo bayonyonyonwa.
2PE 2:13 Balabisizigwa achibwedezyo chakubisya kwabo. Bayeya kuti chibabotela isikati nkulikondezya. Ntotubata atumpenda otu. Balakondelelwa mumapobwe abo ngibapobola akati kanu. Nekuba boobo babotelwa michito yabo italuleeme awo nibapobola aandinywe. bumwi bupanduluzi bwamazubano bulaziloobu, “balabotelwa andinywe mumapobwe aluyando.”
2PE 2:14 Balijisi meso azwide bumambi; tabakwe nibakkutikana azibi. Balayunga myuuya itakkalinkene mukuchita zibi, alubo balamyoyo yakayumisigwa mukutangala. Mbana balutuko!
2PE 2:15 Bakasiya inzila iluleme bakasweka, bakatobela inzila ya Bbalamu mwana wa Bbiyoli, oyo wakali kuyandisya kuliyiigwa kuzintu zitaluleme. Bwiingi bupanduluzi bwamazubano bupandulula obu, Bbalamu mwana wa Bbiyoli mukuyanda kuti kwendelane azili muchizuminano chachindi mukulembwa kwelyo izina. Amwi malembe amazubano basala kulilemba kuti amalembelo achi Giliki, ayo abalika oobo, Bbalamu, mwana wa Bbiyoli.
2PE 2:16 Pesi wakalijanina lutuko nkambo kakubisya kwakwe - nkambo imbongolo itakwe mputo yakambuula ejwi lyabuntu yayimikizya bufubafuba bwamusinsiimi.
2PE 2:17 Aba balumi balimbuli zilambwa zitakwe meenda. Bali mbuli mayooba ayobupepuka aguuwo. Balindililwa amudima usiya ngubabambilidwe.
2PE 2:18 Balaambula amajwi akulisumpula atawope. Balayunga bantu mukwinda kuli ezyo zibotezya nyama. Alubo balayunga bantu abo banga balokwezya kuyanda kuloboka buponi bwamukutaziba.
2PE 2:19 Balabasyomezya lwangunuko, pesi bo lwabo mbazike babusyachivulemwangu. Nkambo muntu muzike wazeezyo kufumbwa zimuzunda.
2PE 2:20 Na kakuli kuti bavunwa kubusofwazi bwaansi mukwinda mukuziba Mwami a Mufutuli Jesu Kkilisito mpawo kabiyo bachigwa lubo mulimbabo akuzundwa, chimo chabo chinoli chayindilila kwinda chakutanguna.
2PE 2:21 Nichali kubota kuti kabayandokkede kabatabwizi pe bululami kwinda kuti wabuziba mpawo wazobusiya wazwa mumulawo Uusalala wakali wasisigwa kulimbabo.
2PE 2:22 Aka kambyo nkamasimpe kulimbabo; “Imubwa ubweda kumaluusi akwe, alubo ingulube yazwa kusanzigwa ilabwedulula kumatope.”
2PE 3:1 Kwalino, ndikulembela kuli nduwe, oyandwa, olu lugwalo lwabili ndundakulembela nchiibalusyo chakuno mwibulusya mumizeezo yanu,
2PE 3:2 kuti mukayibuluke majwi akambiidwe chiindi abasinsimi basalali antomwe amulawo wa Mwami a Mufutuli wakapegwa kwinda mubatumwa.
2PE 3:3 Kukusanguna echi ngachizibwe, kuti kuyosika basikaniako niako mumazuba amamanino.
2PE 3:4 Bayowamba kuti, “Ino kulikuli kuboola kwakwe nkwakasyomezya? Nkambo kakuti kuzwa chiindi nibakafwa bamataatesu, zyoonse zintu zichikkede kazili mbozyakabede, kuzwa kumatangunino azilengwa.”
2PE 3:5 Balalilubya lubya achaali kuti chiindi mukwinda mujwi lya Leza ijulu anyika zyakasika mpozibawo kazizwa mumeenda alubo mukwinda mumeenda,
2PE 3:6 alimwi eyo nyika kuchindi echo yakamwayulwa, yakazimazigwa ameenda.
2PE 3:7 Kwinda mujwi ndilyo ijulu anyika zyakabambililwa mulilo, zililondwedwe kazilindila elzo zuba lyalubeta alunyonyooko lwabantu batakwe bunaleza.
2PE 3:8 Pele nkuchili nchimutelede kuluba, nobayandwa, ncheechi chakuti ku Mwami buzuba bomwe buli mbuli chuulu chamwaaka, achilaacho chuulu chamyaaka chilimbuli buzuba bomwe.
2PE 3:9 Mwami tayendi bunini bunini pe kuzisyomezyo zyakwe, mbuli mbobayeeya bamwi kuti wanonoka. Pe pe, ngusibuuya andinywe. Tayandi pe kuti naba omwe wenu akafwidilile, pesi kuti woonse ajane mwenya wakusanduka.
2PE 3:10 Nekubaboobo, ibuzuba bwa Mwami bulasika mbuboonya mbuli uubba: Imajulu ayoloba amuzuzumo mupati. Tunyenyezi tuyopya amulilo, ayilayo inyika amichito ilimulinjiiyo ziyoloba. Takulentanganana pe kuti ndelili ijwi lyamulaka wachi Giliki lyelede kubelesegwa kujwi lyakujinsya munchali wekkumi, akkati kakuti, kusyalamaya nakuti kuumpwa, ngakulaba kulisalila. kuli kuzumbuuzya kuti ndilili ijwi lingalila belesegwa. Kulisalila kwabili ngakulaba oku, Itunyeenyezi tuyotentwa amulilo, ayilayo nyika antomwe azichitwa mulinjiyo ziyoloba akutentwa.
2PE 3:11 Mbokunga zyoonsenezi ziyoloba enzila eyi, ino mulelede kuba bantu balibiyeni? Mulelede kupona mubusalali amubuumi bwabunaleza.
2PE 3:12 Mulelede kulangila akuyandisya kusika kwazuba lya Leza. Mubuzuba oobo, imajulu ayomwayulwa amulilo, atwalo tunyenyezi tuyoyeemuka amusikitila wakupya.
2PE 3:13 Pesi mbuli mbwakasyomezya, tulokulindila ijulu ipya anyika impya, oko baluleeme nkubayokkala.
2PE 3:14 Nkambo kaako, nomuyandwa, mbokunga mulangila ezi zintu, amusungwale kuti mukajanike kamutakwe kabata nikaba kampenda kunembo lyakwe, kamuli mulumuno.
2PE 3:15 Alubo, amuyeeye kuti kukkazika moyo kwa Mwami nkokweta lufutuko, mbubonya mbuli uyandwa mukwesu Pawulu mbwakamulembela, mukwinda mubusongo mbwakapedwe.
2PE 3:16 Pawulu ulamba zintu zyonsezi mumagwalo akwe, kwakuti mukati kawo mozili zintu ziyumu kukumvwisisisya. Nkabela batayiide abatakkalinkene balasandula sandula amwi magwalo, chakuli nyonyoona lwabo.
2PE 3:17 Pele, nywebo nomuyandwa, mbokunga ezi zintu mulizizi kale, amukaliyaminine lwenu nkokuti tamukasowegwi abasilweeno batakwe mulawo mpawo mukaswekelwe lusyomo lwanu.
2PE 3:18 Pesi kamuya bukomena kuluzyalo amuluzibo lwa Mwami a Mufutuli wesu Jesu Kkilisito. Akube bulemu kulinguwe kwalyoonse sunu mane kukabe ikutamani. Ameni!
1JO 1:1 Echo chakazwa kumatalikilo - nchitwakamvwa, nchitwakabona amenso eesu, nchitwakalanga, alimwi maboko esu akachiguma - chilatala a Jwi lyabuumi.
1JO 1:2 Alimwi, buumi bwakachitwa kuti buzibwe, alimwi twakabubona, tububeda bukamboni. Tulikumwambila buumi ibutamani, bwakali a Taata, alimwi bwakazibisigwa kuli ndiswe.
1JO 1:3 Echo nchitwabona akumvwa aswebo tumwambila nchiicho, kuti anywebo mube abulidilano andiswe. Bulidilano bwesu buli a Taata alimwi aMwana wakwe Jesu Kkilisito.
1JO 1:4 Alimwi tulikulemba zintu ezi kulindinywe kuchitila kuti lukondo lwesu luzulile. Amwi malembe eensiku echiGiliki abalika boobu, alimwi tulikumulembela zintu ezi kuchitila kuti lukondo lwenu luzulile.
1JO 1:5 Aya ngemakani ngitwakamvwa kulinguwe ngitwamwambila: Leza mumuuni, alimwi mulinguwe tamukwe mudima abunini pe.
1JO 1:6 Kuti katwamba kuti tulabulidilano anguwe pele katwenda mumudima, tulikubeja alimwi tatuchiti bwini pe.
1JO 1:7 Pele kuti katwenda mumumuni mbuli mbwali mumumuni we, tulabulidilano umwi awumwi, alimwi bulowa bwa Jesu Mwana wakwe bulatusalazya kuzwa kuzibi zyoonse.
1JO 1:8 Kuti twati tatukwe chibi, tulikulyeena lwesu, alimwi bwini tabumo pe mulindiswe.
1JO 1:9 Pele kuti twalyaamba zibi zyesu, ulisyomekede akululama kutulekelela zibi zyesu akutusalazya kuzwa kukutalulama koonse.
1JO 1:10 Kuti twaati taakwe nitwakabisya, twamuchita mubeji, aboobo ijwi lyakwe talimo pe muli ndiswe.
1JO 2:1 Nobana, ndikumulembela zintu ezi kuchitila kuti mutabisyi. Pele naa kuti umwi wabisya, tulaawe sikutwiminina kuli Taata, Jesu Kkilisito, oyo ululeme.
1JO 2:2 Ngonguwe muliiyo wezibi zyesu, kutaamba zyeesu luzutu pele kuti azyenyika yoonse mbiizulwa.
1JO 2:3 Mulicheechi tulizi kuti twasika aakumuziba: naa twabamba milawu yakwe.
1JO 2:4 Oyo uwamba kuti, “Leza ndimwizi,” pesi katabambi milawu yakwe mubeji, alimwi bwini tabumo mulinguwe.
1JO 2:5 Pele oyo woonse uubamba ijwi lyakwe, mulinguwe nchobeni luyando lwa Leza lwakakwanisigwa. Acheechi tulizi kuti tuli mulinguwe.
1JO 2:6 Kufumbwa uuwamba kuti ukalilide muli Leza welede kweenda mbuli Jesu Kkilisito mbwakeenda.
1JO 2:7 Nomuyandwa, teensi ndikumulembela mulawu mupya pe, pele mulawu wachiindi ngumwakali aawo kuzwa kumatalikilo. Mulawu wachiindi ndijwi ndimwakamvwa.
1JO 2:8 Nikuba boobo ndimulembela mulawu mupya, oyo uuli nkikasimpe muli Kkilisito amulindinywe, nkambo mudima ulimukwiinda, alimwi mumuuni wabwini ulimukumweka kale.
1JO 2:9 Oyo uwamba kuti uli mumumuni kasulide munyiina uchili mumudima alino.
1JO 2:10 Oyo uyanda munyina ukkalilide mumumuni alimwi takwe mweenya wakudadalika mulinguwe.
1JO 2:11 Pele oyo uusula munyina uli mumudima alimwi weenda mumudima; tazi nkwayobuya nkambo mudima woofwazya menso aakwe.
1JO 2:12 Ndikulemba kulindinywe, nobana, nkambo izibi zyenu zilalekelelwa nkambo kezina lyakwe.
1JO 2:13 Ndikumulembela, nomandende, nkambo muli mwizi ooyo uzwa kumatalikilo. Ndilikumulembela, nobalumi banini, nkambo mwakamuzunda mubi. Ndamulembela nobana, nkambo muli mwizi Taata.
1JO 2:14 Ndamulembela nomandende, nkambo mulimwizi ooyo uzwa kumatalikilo. Ndamulembela nobalumi banini, nkambo mulanguuzu, alimwi ijwi lya Leza lilikalilide mulindinywe, alimwi mwamuzunda mubi.
1JO 2:15 Mutayandi inyika niziba zintu zili munyika. Kuti kakuli umwi uyanda nyika, luyando lwa Taata talumo mulinguwe.
1JO 2:16 Nkambo zyoonse zili munyika - menso menso azyanyama, nikuba chitumpya menso, akalutiluti kabuumi - tazizwi kuli Taata pele zizwa kunyika.
1JO 2:17 Alimwi nyika anzyiyanda ziliinda. Pele kufumbwa uuchita luyando lwa Leza uyokkalilila akutamani.
1JO 2:18 Nobana banini, lyaba hoola lyamamanino. Mbuuli mbumwakamvwa kuti sikukkazya Kkilisito ulasika, lino bamukazya Kkilisito mbiingi basika. Akambo kazeezi kuti nihoola lyamamanino.
1JO 2:19 Bakazwa mulindiswe, pele teensi bakali mulindiswe. Nkambo nikwali kuti balikuzwa muli ndiswe nibakakkalilila aswebo. Pele nibakazwa, zyakatondezya kuti teensi bakazwa muli ndiswe.
1JO 2:20 Pele mula kunanikwa kuzwa ku Musalali, alimwi mulikezi kasimpe.
1JO 2:21 Teensi ndakamulembela akaambo kakuti tamwizi bwini pe, pele nkambo mulibwizi alimwi taakwe kubeja kuzwa mubwini.
1JO 2:22 Ngwani mubeji pele oyo ukazya kuti Jesu ngo Kkilisito? Ooyo muntu ngonguwe sikukazya Kkilisito, mbuuli kuti wakaka Taata a Mwana.
1JO 2:23 Tawo pe uukkaka Mwana uula Taata. Kufumbwa uuzumina Mwana a Taata ulaawe.
1JO 2:24 Ino inywe, ezyo nzimwakamvwa kumatalikilo amuzileke zikkalilile mulindinywe. Kuti nzimwakamvwa kuzwa kumatalikilo zyakkalilila mulindinywe, muyokkalilila mu Mwana amuli Taata.
1JO 2:25 Eechi nchechisyomezyo nchaakapa kuli ndiswe - buumi ibutamani.
1JO 2:26 Ndalemba izintu eezi kuli ndinywe atala abaabo banga balamusowa.
1JO 2:27 Ino inywe, bunanike mbumwakatambula kuzwa kuli nguwe buli kkalilide muli ndinywe, alimwi tamuyanduuli sikumuyiisya pe. Pele kuti kunanika kwakwe kulakuyiisya zyoonse alimwi masimpe teensi nkubeja pe, mbuli mbukwakakuyiisya, kkalilila muli nguwe.
1JO 2:28 Alimwi lino, nobana, amukkalilile muli nguwe, kuchitila kuti nayoopamuka tukabe abusichaamba peepe kuyofwa insoni kunembo lyakwe akusika kwakwe.
1JO 2:29 Na kamwizi kuti uliluleme, mulizi kuti woonse uuchita bubotu wakazyalwa anguwe.
1JO 3:1 Amubone luyando Taata ndwakatupa, kuti tuteegwa tulibana baLeza, ino mbombubo mbotubede. Akaambo aka nyika titwiizi, nkambo teyakamuziba pe. Zimwi zyensiku zipati zililembedwe muchiGiliki zilasiya eezi, ezi nzizyo nzituli nzizyo.
1JO 3:2 Nomuyandwa, lino twaba bana ba Leza, alimwi tazina yubununwa nzituyooba nzizyo. Tulizi kuti Kkilisito apamuka, tuyooba mbuli nguwe, nkambo tuyomubona mbubonya mbuli mbwabede.
1JO 3:3 Woonse ujisi bulangizi obu mulinguwe ulalisalazya mbubonya mbuuli mbwasalala we lwakwe.
1JO 3:4 Woonse uubisya ulimukuchita nchito zitali mumulawu, nkambo chibi nkutaba mumulawu.
1JO 3:5 Mulizi kuti Kkilisito wakayubununwa kuchitila kuti agwisye zibi, alimwi mulinguwe tamukwe chibi pe.
1JO 3:6 Taakwe ukkalilila mulinguwe uyoyinkilila kunembo kabisya. Tawope wakamubona akumuziba uyinkilila kunembo akubisya.
1JO 3:7 Nobana, mutalekeli muntu naba omwe kuti amuzulwide mukusweeka. Ooyo uuchita bululami uliluleme, mbubonya Kkilisito mbwaluleme.
1JO 3:8 Oyo uchita chibi uzwa kuli dyabulosi, nkambo dyabulosi wakabisya kuzwa kumatalikilo. Akambo aka Mwana wa Leza wakayubununwa, kuchitila kuti anyoonyone milimu yadyabulosi.
1JO 3:9 Ooyo iwakazyalwa kuzwa kwa Leza tayinkilili kunembo kabisya pe, nkambo imbuto ya Leza ikkalilide mulinguwe. Takonzyi kwinkililila kunembo kabisya nkambo wakazyalwa a Leza.
1JO 3:10 Muleezi bana ba Leza abana ba dyabulosi balayubununwa. Kufumbwa uutachiti ziluleme tazwi kwa-Leza, nikuba ooyo utayandi munyina.
1JO 3:11 Aaya ngimakani ngimwakamvwa kuzwa kumatalikilo: Tweelede kuyandana umwi awumwi,
1JO 3:12 tatwelede kuba mbuli Kkayini, wakazwide kumubi alimwi wakajaya munyina. Ino wakamujilaanzi? Nkambo milimu yakwe yakali mibi ino yamunyiina kiluleme.
1JO 3:13 Mutagambi, nobakwesu, na inyika yamusula.
1JO 3:14 Tulizi kuti twakiinda kuzwa mulufu akunjila mubuumi, nkambo tulabayanda bakwesu, oyo utakonzyi kuyanda ukkalilide mulufu.
1JO 3:15 Kufumbwa uusula munyina mujayi. Mulizi kuti taakwe mujayi ulaabuumi butamani pe bukkede mulinguwe.
1JO 3:16 Aazezi mbutulwizi luyando, nkambo Kkilisito wakatulazikila buumi bwakwe aansi. Aswebo twelede kulazikila babunyina buumi bwesu aansi.
1JO 3:17 Pele kufumbwa uujisi zintu zyenyika, nabona munyina uubulide, wamujalila moyo waluzyalo, ino luyando lwa Leza lukkalilila byeni muli nguwe?
1JO 3:18 Bana bangu, luyando lwenu lutabi lwamajwi biyo na kuti alulimi biyo, pele munchiito amubwini.
1JO 3:19 Mukuchita boobu nitutazibe kuti tuzwa kubwini, alimwi tusimya myoyo yesu kunembo lyakwe.
1JO 3:20 Na kuti myoyo yesu kitusowa, Leza mupati kwinda myoyo yesu, alimwi ulizi zintu zyoonse.
1JO 3:21 Nomuyandwa, kuti myoyo yesu kitatusowi, tulabulangizi kuli Leza.
1JO 3:22 Kufumbwa nzitukumbila tulazitambula kuzwa kuli nguwe, nkambo tuliibamba milawu yakwe akuchita zintu zimubotelezya.
1JO 3:23 Oyu ngomulawu wakwe: kuti tusyome muzina lya Mwana wakwe Jesu Kkilisito alimwi tuyandane umwi awumwi, mbubonya mbuli mbwakapa mulawu oyu.
1JO 3:24 Ooyo uubamba milawu ya Leza wakkalilila muli nguwe. Nkaambo kazeezi tulizi kuti ulakkalilila muli ndiswe, kwinda mu Muuya ngwakatupa swebo.
1JO 4:1 Nomuyandwa, mutasyomi myuuya yoonse pele, amwisunke myuuya kuchitila kuti mubone kuti izwakuli Leza na, nkambo basinsimi mbiingi bakubeja banjila munyika.
1JO 4:2 Acheechi muyoziba Muuya wa-Leza - Muuya woonse uwamba kuti Jesu wakaba munyama uzwa kuli Leza,
1JO 4:3 pele muuya woonse utazumini Jesu tuuzwi kuli Leza. Ooyu ngumuuya uukkazya Kkilisito, ngumwakamvwa kuti ulasika, lino lino wabawo kale munyika. Zimwi zilembedwe muchiGiliki zyensiku zibalika boobu; Kufumbwa muuya utazumini kuti Jesu wakeza munyama tazwi kwa Leza pe. Ooyu ngumuuya ukkazya Kkilisito, ngumwakamvwa kuti ulasika ino lino wabawo kale munyika.
1JO 4:4 Muzwa kuli Leza nobana, alimwi mwakabazunda nkambo ooyo uli muli ndinywe mupati kwinda oyo uuli munyika.
1JO 4:5 Bazwa munyika, aboobo nzibaamba zizwa munyika, alimwi inyika ilabatelela.
1JO 4:6 Tuzwa kwa Leza. Kufumbwa uumwizi Leza ulamutelela. Ooyo utazwi kuli Leza tatuteeleli. Azeezi tulizi muuya wabwini amuuya waluleyo
1JO 4:7 Nobayandwa atuyandane, umwi awumwi, nkambo luyando luzwa kwa Leza, kufumbwa uyaanda uzyalwa kwa Leza alimwi ulimwizi Leza.
1JO 4:8 Muntu uutayandi tamwizi pe Leza, nkambo Leza nduyando.
1JO 4:9 Akambo kazeezi luyando lwa Leza lwakayubununwa aakati kesu, kuti Leza wakatuma Mwana wakwe simuzyalwa alikke munyika kuti tupone nkambo kakwe.
1JO 4:10 Muli echi muli luyando, peepe kuti twakamuyanda Leza, pele kuti nguwe wakatuyanda, akuti wakatuma Mwana wakwe kuti abe muliyo wezibi zyesu.
1JO 4:11 Nobayandwa, nakuti Leza wakatuyanda obuya, aswebo twelede kuyandana umwi awumwi.
1JO 4:12 Takwe walina kumubona Leza. Kuti katuyandana umwi awumwi, Leza ulakkalilila muli ndiswe, alimwi luyando lwakwe lulazulizigwa mulindiswe.
1JO 4:13 Acheechi tulizi kuti tulikkalilide muli nguwe alimwi alakwe uli mulindiswe, nkambo wakatupa umwi muuya wakwe.
1JO 4:14 Alimwi, twakabona alimwi tupa bukamboni kuti Taata kuti wakatuma Mwana wakwe kuti abe mufutuli wenyika.
1JO 4:15 Kufumbwa uwamba kuti Jesu ngonguwe Mwana wa Leza, Leza ulakkalilila muli nguwe alakwe muli Leza.
1JO 4:16 Alimwi twakaziba akusyoma luyando Leza ndwalaalo kuli ndiswe. Leza nduyando, alimwi oyo ukkalilila muluyando olu ulakkalilila muli Leza, alakwe Leza, ulakkalilila muli nguwe.
1JO 4:17 Nkaambo kacheechi, olu luyando lwakazulizigwa akati kesu, kuchitila kuti tukabe alusinizyo mubuzuba bwalubeta, nkambo mbuli mbwabede, aswebo mbutubede muliino nyika.
1JO 4:18 Muluyando tamukwe kuyoowa. Anukuti, luyando luzulide lusowela kunze buyoofu nkambo buyoofu bulachakuchita achisubulo. Pele oyo utayandi tanakkwanisizigwa muluyando.
1JO 4:19 Tulayanda nkambo Leza wakatuyanda kukusanguna.
1JO 4:20 Na kuti umwi waamba kuti, “Ndamuyanda Leza” pele kasula mwenzinyina, mubeji. Nkambo ooyo utayandi mwenzinyina, oyo ngwabona, takonzyi kumuyanda Leza, ngwatana buunsi wabona.
1JO 4:21 Alimwi oyu ngumulawu ngutujisi kuzwa kuli nguwe: Kufumbwa uuyanda Leza weelede kumuyanda munyiina wakwe.
1JO 5:1 Kufumbwa uusyoma kuti Jesu ngu Kkilisito uzyalwa kwa Leza. Alimwi ooyo uyanda Wisi, a Mwana ulamuyanda uzyalwa anguwe.
1JO 5:2 Nkambo obuya mbotuziba kuti tulabayanda bana ba Leza: nitumuyanda Leza akuteelela milawu yakwe.
1JO 5:3 Olu ndoluyando lwa Leza: kuti tubambe milawu yakwe. Alimwi milawu yakwe tilemi.
1JO 5:4 Woonse uuzyalwa kwa Leza uliizunda nyika. Olu ndoluzundo lwakazunda nyika, nkokuti lusyomo lwesu.
1JO 5:5 Ngwani oyo uzunda nyika? Ngooyo uusyoma kuti Jesu Mwana wa Leza.
1JO 5:6 Ooyu ngonguwe wakaza amanzi abulowa: Jesu Kkilisito. Teensi wakaza amanzi luzutu pele kuti maanzi abulowa. Muuya nguwe uupa bukamboni,
1JO 5:7 nkaambo Muuya ngobwiini. Nkaambo mbatatu bapa bukamboni;
1JO 5:8 Muuya, manzi, abulowa. Eezi zyotatwe zilazuminana. Zimwi zililembedwe zipati muchiGiliki mumalembe ansiku zibalika oobu, Nkambo mbatatu bapa bukamboni kujulu: Taata, Ijwi, a Muuya Uusalala. Aba botatwe mbaamwi: alimwi kuli batatu bapa bukamboni aansi: Muuya, Maanzi, abulowa: Ezi zyotatwe nzimwi. Nikuba boobo, amwi malembe mabotu kwinda taajisi makani aya.
1JO 5:9 Na kuti twatambula bukamboni bwabantu, bukamboni bwa Leza mbupati. Oobu mbobukamboni bwa Leza mbwaakapa atala a Mwana wakwe.
1JO 5:10 Kufumbwa uusyoma mu Mwana wa Leza ulijisi bukamboni mulinguwe lwakwe. Kufumbwa uutasyomi Leza wamuchita mubeji, nkambo teensi wakasyoma bukamboni oobo Leza mbwakapa eetala a Mwana wakwe.
1JO 5:11 Bukamboni mbobu: Leza wakatupa buumi butamani, alimwi obu buumi buli mu Mwana wakwe.
1JO 5:12 Oyo ula Mwana ula buumi. Oyo uutakwe Mwana wa Leza takwe buumi.
1JO 5:13 Ndamulembela zintu ezi kuchitila kuti muzibe kuti mula buumi butamani - kuli ndinywe nimusyoma muzina lya Mwana wa Leza.
1JO 5:14 Alimwi, olu ndolusinizyo ndotujisi kunembo lyakwe, kuti na twakumbila kufumbwa chintu kwindila mukuyanda kwakwe, ulatumvwa.
1JO 5:15 Alimwi, kuti katwizi kuti ulatumvwa - kufumbwa nzitwakumbila kuti twaba eezyo, eezi nzitwamukumbila.
1JO 5:16 Nakuti umwi wabona munyiina kachita chibi chitatoli kulufu, welede kukomba, eelyo Leza uyomupa buumi. Ndikwamba abo basizibi zitatoli kulufu. Kuli chibi ichitola kulufu; teensi ndikwaamba kuti akombele nchicho.
1JO 5:17 Kutalulaama koonse, nchiibi, pele kuli chibi chitatoli kulufu.
1JO 5:18 Tulizi kuti kufumbwa uuzyedwe kwa Leza tabisyi. Pele oyo wakazyalwa kwa Leza ulamukwabilila aboobo mubi takonzyi kumuchisa.
1JO 5:19 Tulizi kuti tuzwa kwa Leza, alimwi tulizi kuti nyika yoonse ililede munguzu zyamubi.
1JO 5:20 Pele tulizi kuti Mwana wa Leza wakaza alimwi wakatupa kumvwisisisya kuchitila kuti tumuzibe oyo wabwini. Alimwi, tuli mulinguwe oyo wabwiini, mu Mwana wakwe Jesu Kkilisito. Oyo ngo- Leza wabwini abuumi butamani.
1JO 5:21 Nobana, amulitantamune kuzwa kumituni yazikozyanisyo.
2JO 1:1 Kuzwa kumupati kaluya kumwanakazi musale abana bakwe, aabo mbeyanda mukasimpe - alubo kutalindime endikke, Pesi abalabo boonse bakaziba kasimpe -
2JO 1:2 Nkambo kakasimpe kakkalilide mulindiswe elyo kanoli andiswe mane kukabe kutamani.
2JO 1:3 Luzyalo, alwetelelo alumuuno zinoli aswebo kuzwa kuli Taata Leza akuzwa kuli Jesu Kkilisito, i Mwana wa Taata, mukasimpe amuluyando.
2JO 1:4 Ndikondwa kapati kuti ndajana bamwi ibana bako kabeenda mukasimpe, mbuli mbutwakatambula mulawu oyu kuzwa kuli Taata.
2JO 1:5 Lino ndakukumbilisya, amwanakazi - kutali kuti ndilo kukulembela mulawu mupya, pesi ooyo ngotulawo kuzwa kumatangunino - wakuti twelede kuyandana umwi awumwi.
2JO 1:6 Olu luyando, ndotwelede kwendela mukwindila mumilawu yakwe. Ooyu mulawu, mbuli mbumwakamvwa kuzwa kumatangunino, kuti mwende muli nguwo.
2JO 1:7 Nkambo basilweno lwiingi balizwide akutobela inyika, elyo tabazumini ikuti Jesu wakalizide munyama. Ooyu ngusilweeno alubo ngusinkondonyina a Kkilisito.
2JO 1:8 Amulilange, ikuti mutaswekelwi zintu nzitwakabelekela, pesi ikuti mutambule impindu izwide.
2JO 1:9 Kufumbwa oyo uyinkilila anembo elyo katakkalili munjiisyo yaKkilisito takwe Leza. Ooyo ukkalilila munjiisyo, oyu nguli a Taata antomwe a Mwana.
2JO 1:10 Na umwi waza kuli ndinywe elyo katayeti injiisyo eyi, mutakamutambuli mungánda yenu alubo mutakamujuzyi.
2JO 1:11 Nkambo oyo umujuzya unoli wagwasyania awe kumilimo mibi.
2JO 1:12 Ndilazyiingi zyakukulembela, pesi tandibede achiyandisyo ikuti ndizilembe mubbuku amuleende. Nikuba boobo, ndila bulangizi bwakuza kuli nduwe elyo tuzowambule katulangene busyu kubusyu, nkokuti kukondwa kwesu kuzozuzikizigwe.
2JO 1:13 Ibana bamuchizi wako musale balikukujuzya.
3JO 1:1 Mupati kuli uyandika Gayiyasi, ooyo ngwenjanda chakasimpe.
3JO 1:2 Oyandwa, Ndikukkombela ikuti zintu zyoonse zikwendele kabotu alubo upone kabotu, mbuli mbopona kabotu mumuuya wako.
3JO 1:3 Nkambo ndakakondwa ndakabotelwa loko inzubo nizyakasika akupa bukamboni bwakasimpe kaako, mbuli mboyenda mukasimpe.
3JO 1:4 Nsikwe kubotelwa kumbi kwinda oku pe, ikumvwa kuti bana bangu benda mukasimpe.
3JO 1:5 Oyandwa, uchita michito chalusyomo mpobelekela inzubo akubenzu,
3JO 1:6 aabo bakazopa bukamboni bwaluyando lwako kunembo lyembungano. Uchita kabotu kubasindikila munyeendo zyabo chakubotezya Leza,
3JO 1:7 nkambo kezina eelyo ndibayobwendela, nkabata tambwide chintu kuli bamasi.
3JO 1:8 Aboobo aswebo tulachitambula mbubo, ikuti tukabe basimulimo nyokwe mukasimpe.
3JO 1:9 Kuli nzindakalembela imbungano, pesi Diyotilefesi, oyo uyandisya kuba mutanzi akati kabo, tatutambuli pe swebo.
3JO 1:10 Eelyo, nindasika, nzomuyeezya milimo yakwe njali kuchita, yakututamikizya chakubeja amajwi mabi kulindiswe. Mukutakkutisika, takaki biyo kutambula ibana bakwabo, pesi ulakasya alubo kulaabo ibayanda kubatambula benzu mpawo akubatanda mumbungano.
3JO 1:11 Noyandwa, utatobeli kuchita zibi pesi kuleezyo zibotu. Ooyo uchita zibotu nguwa Leza; simuchita zibi tanakubona Leza,
3JO 1:12 Demetiliyasi wakatambula bukamboni bubotu kuli boonse amukasimpe. Alubo andiswe tuli bakamboni, alubo ayebo ulizi kuti bukamboni bwesu mbwakasimpe.
3JO 1:13 Ndali ezyiingi zyakukulembela pesi nsikkonzyi kukulembela pe zyoonse empesele amulende.
3JO 1:14 Pesi ndilangila kuzokubona lino lino, elyo tuzowambuula katulangene.
3JO 1:15 Lumuno alube ayebo. Benzuma balikumujuzya. Ujuzye ibeenzuma oko muzina.
JUD 1:1 Judi, mulanda wa Jesu Kkilisito amunyina wa Jemusi, kuli baabo bayitidwe, bayandwa muli Leza Taata babikidwe akaambo ka Jesu Kkilisito.
JUD 1:2 Luse aluumuno aluyando aluvuzigwe kuli ndinywe.
JUD 1:3 Nibayandwa, kandichili kubika nguzu zyoonse kumulembela aatala alufutuko luzibikene, ndakaba akumulembela nywebo kandimusumpula kuti mukakatile loko lusyomo lwakaabilwa boonse bantu ba Leza basalala.
JUD 1:4 kuli bakanjila chakusisikana aakati kan. Aaba mbaalumi bakalitandidwe ankaambo kalubeteko. Mbaalumi batakwe buleza bakasandula luzyalo lwa Lesu wesu akuba azisusi zibi, aabo bakaka simalelo a Mwami, Jesu Kkilisito.
JUD 1:5 Lino ndayanda kumuyeezya - nikuba mwakalizi loko - kuti Leza wakafutula bantu kuzwa munyika ya Igiputi pesi aampela wakabamwayisya aabo abakatazunina.
JUD 1:6 Alubo, baangelo batakwe bakabamba chuuno chabwendelezi, pesi aabo bakasya busena bwabo bulikabotu bwakukkala - Leza wakabamba kuzyaanzyo zitamani, akunjila mumudima, walubeteko lwazuba bupati.
JUD 1:7 Aboobo, Sodoma a Gomola amadolopo azisi zyengeelede aakati kabo balinjizya beni mumamambi anchinto zyabumambi aabo balabeleka mbuli chitondeezyo chabaabo bapenzengwa aachisubulo chamililo utamani.
JUD 1:8 Munzila ikozyene aaba basikulota alabo bakasofwaazya mibili yabo. balakaka bwami akusampawula aabo bali aabulemu.
JUD 1:9 Nikuba alakwe Mayikkelo mwaangelo mupati, nibakali kukazyana a Satani akunyanzyana anguwe munta wa Mozesi, takakonzya kweeta lubeteko aatala anguwe, pesi wati, “Akukalalile Mwami!”
JUD 1:10 Pesi bantu aaba balasampawula kufumbwa nchibatamvwi; anzibamvwa zyabube buliwo, mbuli banyama batayeeyi, eezi nzenzizyo zyakabamwaya.
JUD 1:11 Maawe kuli mbabo!” Nkaambo bayeenda munzila ya Kkayini akunjizigwa mukubisya kwa Bbalamu ankaambo kampindu, balafwa mulupapilo lwa Kkola
JUD 1:12 Aaba bantu mabwe ajeeya kumapobwe aluyando, kupobola andinywe chifwisya bweeme -beembeli balisanina beni. Mayoba atakwe mvula aabwezegwa aaluuwo; misamu yakulwaka itakwe michelo - bafwide tubili banonkwedwe.
JUD 1:13 Mayuwe ali aabukali amulwizi, akubumba bubi, inyenyeezi ziya bwendeende, babambilidwe kusiya kwamudima mawuse kwalyoonse.
JUD 1:14 Inoki mwana wamusaanu kuli Adamu, wakasinsima aatala ambabo, wakati, “Bona! Mwami ulasika azyuulu azyuulu zyabasalali bakwe uzosika kuzoopa lubeta kuli boonse.
JUD 1:15 Uzoosika kuzoopa luteko luli boonse. uyoosika kuzooyumununa zyoonse zitali zyabuleza akumilimu njibakachita munzila ityaliyabuleza akumajwi akumajwim woonse ankondo atakwe aatakwe buleza kuli basizibi nzibaakamba aatala anguwe.”
JUD 1:16 Aaba mbasikunyontooka abasikutongawuka mukutobela zbi zyabo. Milomo yabo ilaambulisya chakulikankayizya, impuwo zyabpo kukasya bamwi.
JUD 1:17 Pesi nubayandwa amuyeeye majwi akaambwa kuchiindi aba apositoli ba Mwami wesu Jesu Kkilisito.
JUD 1:18 Bakati kuli ndinywe, “Kuchiindi chakumamanino kuyooba basikunoonga batobela miyeeyo yabo itali yabuleza
JUD 1:19 .“Abaa mbaaba bachita kwanzyanya; mbaasinyika alubo tabakwe muuya.
JUD 1:20 Pesi nywebo, nobayandwa, amusime lwanu mulusyomo lupati lusalala, akukomba mu Muuya Uusalala.
JUD 1:21 Amukkale muluyando lwa Leza, akulinda luse lwa Mwami Jesu Kkilisitu weeta buumi butamani.
JUD 1:22 Amube aaluse kuli baabo batasyomi.
JUD 1:23 Futula bamwi akubagwisya kuzwa mumulilo. Kuli bamwi amube aaluse lwakuyoowa. Choonzyo nikuba chisamo chasofwazigwa amubili.
JUD 1:24 Lino kuliyooyo umukasya kuzwa mukuwa amukuchita kuti mwiimikile kunembo lyabulemu bwabuliwo butakwe bubi mbubakwaamba alukondo lupati,
JUD 1:25 kuli Leza luzutu mufutuli wesu mukwiinda muli Jesu Kkilisito Mwami wesu, akube bulemu, bupati anguzu, abwami, zyiindi zyoonse zyakaliwo, lino akwalyoonse. Amen.
REV 1:1 Eechi nchiyunuzyo cha Jesu Kkilisito eecho Leza nchakamupa kuti atondeezye balanda bakwe zintu zizochika chakufwambaana, wakazibisya makani aaya watuma angelo kumulanda wakwe Joni.
REV 1:2 Joni wakalungulula makani aa Leza abukamboni bwa Jesu Kkilisito, azintu zyoonse nzyakabona.
REV 1:3 Uli aacholwe uubala businsimi oobu ajwi pati abaabo balemeka zilembedwe mulimbubo, nkaambo chiindi chaba aafwiifwi.
REV 1:4 Joni, kumbungano zili musanu azibili zili mu Eziya: Luzyalo ngalube kuli ndinywe aluumuno luzwa kuli yooyo uliwo, lwakaliwo ooyo uuza, akuzwa kumyuuya ili musanu ayibili iimikila kuchuuno chakwe,
REV 1:5 akuzwa kuli Jesu Kkilisito, ooyo ulinguwe kamboni wakasimpe, mwana mutaanzi kuzwa kubafu, mpawo kali mweendelezi wabami baansi. Kulinguwe ooyo utuyanda watugwisya kuzwa muzibi zyesu abulowa bwakwe -
REV 1:6 wakatuchita kuba ba Pulisita babwami, bawisi Leza wakwe a wisikuli nguwe kube bulemu a nguzu mane kukabe kutamani. Ameni.
REV 1:7 Ngamulange, ulaza amayoba; meso woonse azoomubona kubikilizya aamwi abaabo bakamuyasa. Misyobo yamunyika izoolila nkaambo kanguwe. Iiyi, Ameni.
REV 1:8 “Ndime Alufa a Omega,” mbaamba Mwami Leza, ngunguwe uliwo, wakaliwo, ngunguwe uuza, Singuzu zyoonse.”
REV 1:9 Ime, nindaba Joni, monyoko unookwaabilana andinywe mukupenzegwa amubwami, amumoyo mulamfu zili muli Jesu - ndakali aa kasuwa kategwa Patimosi nkaambo kajwi lya Leza abukamboni bwa Mwami Jesu.
REV 1:10 Ndakali mumuuya mubuzuba bwa Mwami. Ndakamvwa jwi pati kusule lyangu lili mbuli mweembo.
REV 1:11 Lyakat, “Lemba nzwaabona mubbuku, mpawo uziotumizye kumbungano zili musanui azibili - ku Efeso, ku Similina, ku Pegamumu, ku Siyatila, ku Sadisi, ku Filadelufuya aku Lawodesiya.”
REV 1:12 Ndakacheba kuti ndibone kuti ngwani unukwambuula aandime, lino nindakacheba ndakabona zibikilo zyamampi zyangolida zilimusanu azibili.
REV 1:13 Aakati kazikilo eezi zyamalampi zyamalampi kwali umwi wakali mbuli mwana wamuntu kasamide dembo damfu lyakalikusika kumawulu aakwe amwiingwa nkwa wangolida kuzyungulukide kaango kakwe.
REV 1:14 Mutwe wakwe amasusu aakwe aakali kutuba mbuli buluba- kuta mbuli sikunku ameso aakwe akali mbuli mulilo.
REV 1:15 Mawulu aakwe aakali mbuli nsimbi yananikwa, mbuli nsimbi yasunkwa mumvuto yamulilo, ajwi lyakwe lyakali mbuli kuvuuma kwameenda mayingi.
REV 1:16 Wakalijisi nyenyezi zili musanu azibili kuluboko lwakwe lwalulyo. Mumulomo wakwe mwakazwa panga libosya koonse koonse. Busyu bwakwe bwakali kumweka mbuli zuba libalisya loko.
REV 1:17 Nindakamubona ndakawida ndakawida kumawulu aakwe mbuli muntu mufwide. Wakabika luboko lwakwe lwalulyo aalindime mpawo wakati, “Utayoowi. Ndime matalikilo amamanino
REV 1:18 ndime ooyo uupona lyoonse. Ndakalifwide pesi laanga, ndilapona kwalyoonse alyoonse! Alubo ndijisi chijaluzyo chalufu a Hedesi.
REV 1:19 Nkikaako lemba ansi nzwaabona, chiliwo lino achizoochitika kuzwa aawa.
REV 1:20 Bupanduluzi busisikene bwaamba nyenyezi zili musanu azibili nzwaabona muluboko lwangu lwalulyo, azibikilo zyangolida zili musanu azibili: Nyenyezi zili musanu azibili mbaangelo bambungano zili musanu azibili alazyo zibikilo zyamalampi zili musanu azibil, ni mbungano zili musanu azibili.”
REV 2:1 “Kumu ngelo wambungano yamu Efeso lemba boobu: Majwi ayooyo ujisi nyenyeezi zili musanu azibili mukuboko kwakwe kwalulyo alimwi ooyo weenda aakati kazibikilo zyamalampi aangolda zili musanu azibili,
REV 2:2 “Ndilizi milimo yako, kubeleka changuzu alubo alukakatilo lwako, akuti tubotelwi ababi, pesi wabasunka aabo balyaamba kuti mba Apositolo pesi kabatali mbabo pe, alimwi wabajana kabali basikubeja.
REV 2:3 Ulakakatila chakulansya moyo akunyampula zina lyangu, alimwi tukatede pe.
REV 2:4 Pesi biyo nchindaamba aanduwe nchakuti wakasiya luyando lwako lutaanzi.
REV 2:5 Kuyeeya aboobo kuzwa aawo mpuwakawida. Sanduka akuchita zintu eezyo zwzkachita lutaanzi. Kunze kwakuti usanduke, ndiyoboola kulinduwe alimwi ndiyoogwisya chibikilo chalampi aabusena bwacho.
REV 2:6 Pesi uli aacheechi: Usulide nchito zyaba Nikkolayiti, eezyo aandime nzindisulide.
REV 2:7 Akube kuti ooyo uli aakutwi, amvwe muuya nzyaambila mbungano. Kuli yooyo uzunda ndiyoomupa cheelelo chakuti akalye kumusamu wabuumi, ooyo uli mupaladayizi ya Leza.”
REV 2:8 “Kuli Angelo wambungano yaku Similina lemba boobu: 'Majwa ayooyo mutaanzi amamanino, ooyo wakalifwide pesi waba muumi lubo:
REV 2:9 “Ndilizi mapenzi aako abuchete bwako, pesi ulimuvubi. Ndilizi kuupawupa kwabaabo balyaamba kuti mba Juda, pesi tabali mbabo pe. Mbachikombelo cha Satani.
REV 2:10 Utayoowi mapenzi aayo nguutafwabe kulanga! Simwaaba waamba kuwalilwa bamwi banu muntolongo kuchitila kuti mukasunkwe, alimwi muyoopenzegwa kwamazuba aali kkumi. Kusyomeka kusikila kulufu, alimwi ndiyookupa musini wabuumi.
REV 2:11 Ooyo ulaakutwi: ngamvwe muuya nzyaamba ku mbungano. Ooyo uzunda taakwe kuyoochiswa pe kulufu lwabili
REV 2:12 “Kuli Angelo wambungano yamu Pegamamu lemba boobu: 'Mjwi ayooyo ujisi panga libosya koonse koonse:
REV 2:13 “Ndilizi ooko nkukkala ooko chuuno cha Satani nkuchibede. Pesi ndijisilidi kuzina lyangu. Ndilizi kuti tulukakide pe lusyomo lwako kulindime, nikuba mumazuba a Antipasi kamboni wangu, uusyomekede kuli ndime, ooyo wakajayigwa akati kanu, ooko Satani nkwakkala.
REV 2:14 Pesi ndili aazintu ziche biyo atala anduwe: Ulaabo nkuko ooko bamwi bajisilidi kunjiisyo ya Bbalamu, bakayiisya Bbalaki kuwaala chilebyo kunembo lyabana ba Isilayilikuti balye zyakulyazipiliidwe kumizimu akuli basimamambe.
REV 2:15 Munzila njiyonya eeyo, ulaabo alimwi bamwi bajisilidi kunjisyo yaba Nikolayitani.
REV 2:16 Sanduka, aboobo! kuti waleka, ndiyoofwambaana kuboola kulinduwe, ndiyootanguna nkondo ambabo apanga mumulomo wangu.
